verse_text: Ia atsh mahsi g Jesus Christ jewed thahm k ab d amjedkamaj hegai t-kekelibad ha-kownalig mash hab chehgig David. Kush g Davidbad ab d amjedkamaj hegai mash d t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo ch hab chehgig Abraham. In ant wo o'oha g ha-chechgig hegam mash d Jesus Christ shohshonbad.
Abraham atsh wa an alitht g Isaac. Tsh g Isaac an alitht g Jacob. Tsh g Jacob an ha a'alitht hegam Judah.
Tsh g Judah an ha a'alitht g Perez ch Zerah heg ab mash d Tamar. Tsh g Perez an alitht g Hezron. Tsh g Hezron an alitht g Ram.
Tsh g Ram an alitht g Amminadab. Tsh g Amminadab an alitht g Nahshon. Tsh g Nahshon an alitht g Salmon.
Tsh g Salmon an alitht g Boaz heg ab mash d Rahab. Tsh g Boaz an alitht g Obed heg ab mash d Ruth. Tsh Obed an alitht g Jesse.
Tsh g Jesse an alitht g David. David atsh an alitht g Solomon heg ab mash d chum hohnigaj g Uriah.
Tsh g Solomon an alitht g Rehoboam. Tsh g Rehoboam an alitht g Abijah. Tsh g Abijah an alitht g Asa.
Tsh g Asa an alitht g Jehoshaphat. Tsh g Jehoshaphat an alitht g Joram. Kush ihtha Joram d shonaj g Uzziah.
Tsh g Uzziah an alitht g Jotham. Tsh g Jotham an alitht g Ahaz. Tsh g Ahaz an alitht g Hezekiah.
Tsh g Hezekiah an alitht g Manassah. Tsh g Manassah an alitht g Amos. Tsh g Amos an alitht g Josiah.
Kush ihtha Josiah d ha-shon hegam Jeconiah matsh eda gm hu hab i e juh g t-shohshonbad Babylon kihhim wui.
Jeconiah atsh an hahawa alitht g Shealtiel. Tsh g Shealtiel an alitht g Zerubbabel.
Tsh g Zerubbabel an alitht g Abiud. Tsh g Abiud an alitht g Eliakim. Tsh g Eliakim an alitht g Azol.
Tsh g Azol an alitht g Zadok. Tsh g Zadok an alitht g Akim. Tsh g Akim an alitht g Eliud.
Tsh g Eliud an alitht g Eliazar. Tsh g Eliazar an alitht g Matthan. Tsh g Matthan an alitht g Jacob.
Tsh g Jacob an alitht g Joseph. Kush ihtha Joseph d kunaj hegai mo d Jesus je'e ch hab chehgig Mary. K ihtha Jesus hab e a'aga Christ.

Pegih, nt gamai gi'ik an o'oha g ha-chechgig hegam mo d e-o'ogbad am i amjed mash eda am oimmed g Abrahambad ch am hugkam mash eda am oimmed g Davidbad. Kunt hab wa'ap gamai gi'ik an o'oha g ha-chechgig hegam mo d e-o'ogbad heg i amjed ch gm hu hugkam matsh eda gm hu hab i e juh g t-shohshon Babylon wui. Kunt gamai gi'ik an o'oha g ha-chechgig hegam mo d e-o'ogbad heg i amjed ch gm hu hugkam matsh ab mahsi hegai mo hab e a'aga Jiosh si Kehsha (Christ).
Ia ant wo o'oha matsh has e juh matsh eda mahsi g Jesus Christ. Am amtsh i ap'ech matsh ihtham Joseph ch Mary wo e hohont. Tsh am hahawa s-e mai mat g ali wo bei.

K hab chu'ig g chehanig mat chum pi wo ha bei g cheoj matp hab wo wa e juh. Kush g Joseph am wabsh si s-ap oith g chehanig ch hekaj hab e elith mat pi wo be k wabshaba pi hedai wo ha ahgi. T hab pi wo si e el g Mary.

Sh am oithahim ihtha g Joseph. Kutsh am haha wabsh ab wui i e chehgi g anghil am chehchkij ed k hab kaij, “Joseph map ab d Davidbad amjedkam, am g wabsh s-ap e tahtk k wo bei g Mary mat d wo m-wehm kihkamk. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at hab juh ihtha ali mat g Mary wo bei.
Kut d wo cheojk. Kupt hab wo chehch Jesus mo hab d ahga ha-Tho'ibiakam. Bat wo chehgigk nat pi wo ha tho'ibia g e-hemajkamga ab ha-chu'ichig amjed.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil am Joseph wui.
Wehs atsh wa hab e juh ihtha hab masma mash wa hab masma heki hu hab kaij g Jiosh. Kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam atki an o'oha mash wa hab kaij:
Hema g si s-ap chehia at wo bei g cheoj ali pi koi ab hu i miabithk g cheoj. Kumt hab wo a'agath Manuel mo hab d ahga Jiosh o t-Wehmaj.
Kutsh hekith am i nea g Joseph k atsh am ha hekaj hab e juh mash has i kaij g anghil ab wui matsh an bei g Mary.
Sh wabshaba pi am hu hab masma e wehm kih mo g e wehm kihkam am hugkam mat hekith ip bei g ali. Tsh g Joseph hab hahawa chehch Jesus.

Jesus atsh am mahsi Bethlehem kihhim t am am Judea chekshani ch ed. Sh wenog am hema d kownal Judea ch ed ch hab chehgig Herod. Tsh ab ha'i hihi si'al tahgio amjed mash s-chu a'amichuth ab huhu'u t ab. K eda g Jerusalem d kownal thaikud am t-jewedga ed. Tsh am thatha ihtham k am ha kakke g haha'ichu ch hab kaij,

“Bah'o ha'ichug hegai ali matki hemu mahsi matsh d wo ge ha-kownaligk g Tutuligo. Am at thahiwua g hu'u matt heg amjed s-mai g mahsithaj. Kutt heg hekaj ab i hihi matt am hab wo juh g si has t-elitha ab wui.”
Kutsh si e kudu g kownal am i kahk. Tsh heg hekaj wehs g kihkam amai hab wa'ap e kudu.
Tsh g kownal am ha hekaj i ha hemapai g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham k ab ha kakke, “Bahtsh ab ha'ab wo mahsi hegai matsh g Jiosh d wo Kehshak mat d wo chum em-kownaligk?”
Sh hab ahg, “Ab Bethlehem t ab ith eda chekshani. Batki masma an hema o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mo g Jiosh hab kaij:
Tho al chum kihhim g Bethlehem. Kut eda am hema wo i wuhsh mat d wo ha-kownaligk ch wo ha wanimedath g ni-hemajkamga.”
Tsh g Herod am s-a'agim i ha wai hegam s-chu a'amichuththam k ab ha amjed s-mai matsh hekith ab i e mahsith hegai hu'u. Tsh am ahgi.

Tsh g Herod am hahawa ha ahgi mat gm hu wo hihi Bethlehem wui hab ha ahgch, “Am g wo hihim k am wo si i gah hegai ali k hekith wo sha chehg k ia wo ni-ahgi. Kunt ahni am hab wa'ap wo him k ab wo ihm mani ab has elith.”

Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihim k gm hu hebai i hihim. Tsh ab ep i e mahsith hegai hu'u mash am wa heki hu neith. Kush si s-hehegig am i neithok. Tsh heg am ha ba'ich him k am thahiwua heg thahm mash am thadha hegam Joseph.

Tsh am thatha k am i wahp kih ch ed. Sh am wo'o hegai ali. Kush g je'ej am wehmaj. Tsh ihtham s-chu a'amichuththam am wui i shul g ali k am hab juh g ab si has e-elitha k am hahawa i ha wuwhas g s-namkig ha'ichu k ab mah. Sh ith d ohla ch hegai s-ap uhwchu mo hekaj e iagchulith ch hegai mo hekaj e huhud g muhki.
Sh g Jiosh am ha ahgith am ha-chehchki ed matsh pi am hu ep wo hihi Herod wui. Kutsh heg hekaj im hu wabsh hihi e-jewedga wui am hema wohg ch ed.

Tsh ab hahawa i e chehgi g anghil Joseph wui am chehchkij ed k ash hab kaij, “Kownal Herod at am wo i gahghi ihtha ali mat wo chum s-mu'am. Mt heg hekaj gm hu wo hihi Egypt jewed wui k am wo ha'ichugkath. Kunt am wo em-ahgi mamt hekith ep wo i hihi.”
Kutsh am ha hekaj i wami g Joseph k am bei g ali ch je'ej k heg wa'i s-chuhugam hihi am Egypt wui

k am wa thadha. Ith atki am hab e juh mat hekaj s-ap hab wo e juh hegai matki heki hu wa'i o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Bo chu'ig g o'ohanaj mash g Jiosh hab kaij: Am ant wo i wuhshath g ni-alithag Egypt jewed amjed.

Pegih, tsh pi am hu ep i hihi Herod wui hegam s-chu a'amichuththam mash wa am ha ahgith g Jiosh. Tsh heg hekaj bagat g Herod. Sh eda ihtham heki hu ahgith mo am hu d i gohk a'ahithag mat wa am cheh hegai hu'u. Kutsh heg hekaj ha cheha g e-shonthalig matsh wehs wo ha koktha g a'al wihpiop mash d gohk ahithkam ch am i wecho amai Bethlehem ch ed ch an i wehgaj.

Neh, ith atsh wa hab e juh hab masma mash wa g Jiosh heki hu wa'i hab kaij matsh hab masma hab wo e juh. Hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Jeremiah atki an o'oha mash hab kaij g Jiosh:
Am ant wo kah g shoshaki Ramah ch ed. Rachelbad amjedkam at am wo shoanith g a'al ha wehhejed ch pi ha'as wo shosha nat pi wehs wo e koktha.
Sh am thadha hegam Joseph g ali wehm Egypt jewed ch ed. Sh am hu hebai, tsh g Herod muh. Tsh am hahawa ep i e chehgi g anghil am chehchkij ed g Joseph k ash hab kaij,
“Muh at hegai mat chum s-mu'am g ali. Mt heg hekaj wo wahpamig k wo uhpam hihi am e-jewedga wui.”
Kutsh am i wami g Joseph k am ha ui g ali ch je'ej k ep hihi am e-jewedga wui.

K wabshaba g Herodbad alithag wenog am d kownal Judea ch ed ch hab chehgig Arkelaus. Tsh g Joseph am i s-mai mo ith d kownal k atsh sha s-ehbeni mas am wo i thahiwua amai. Tsh g Jiosh am ep ahgi chehchkij ed matsh pi am hu ep wo hihi Judea wui. Tsh hekaj imhab ha'ab ep hihi Galilee chekshani wui
k am thadhaiwua Nazareth kihhim ch ed. Heki atki hu hema o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mamt hab wo a'agath ihtha “Nazareth t am o'othham.”
Tsh am hahawa jegko i wuhsh Judea chekshani ch ed ihtha mash d John ch ha pahl wapkon g hemajkam.
John jehnigitha ash hab chu'ig, “Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. E o aihim mat in wo i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig.”

Neh, ith o hab ahg John hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah mash eda hab kaij: Hema atsh gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch: Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako.
Sh ab e enigadathch g John g ka-mihyo wopo ikuskaj ch ge hogi giwud ch heg wa'i hekaj e gegosith kohktpul ch sit'ol.
Kutsh ab wui i hihi g hemajkam miajed ch an i a'ai wehskojed g Judea chekshani, chum hems ab Jerusalem t amjed.
Mu'i ash am ahg g pi ap e-chu'ichig am i kahkch g John. Kush heg am ha pahl wapkon Jordan akimel ch ed.

Ha'i atsh am thatha hegam mo d Palasi ch hegam mo d Sajusi matsh wo nei ihtha pahl wakona. Sh hab ha ahg g John, “Hah, ahpim mam pi ap chegitoithag, bamki e elith mamt wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag heg wabsh hekaj mam ab d Abrahambad amjedkam. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mamt pi woho wo e tho'ibia, heg hi wa mamt am wo e chehgi am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam mamt gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Wehs hegam mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi at d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak ch hekaj hab masma wo e kuint mo d Abrahambad amjedkam, chum wa g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
Kumt ahpim gm hu wo s-e ohhoth hab masma mat g pi kehg bahithkam u'us mamtp pi gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k pi am hu hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.”

Kush hab ep kaij g John, “Pi g hab wo ni-elith manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ab at hema wo i wuhsh ni-oithk k d wo si ha'ichuk. Ahni ani hi wa em-pahl wapkon mamt eda gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. T wabshaba heg ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi em-ap'ekam hab sha masma mat g mehi wo mehi g sha'i.

Nam hig pi nehnichuth g pilkan mamt g mohgaj gm hu wo i gawulkath k wo mehith k g pilkani gd hu wo i ba'iha. Pegih, t hab wa'ap am a'ai wo i ha gawulkai g hemajkam am lothaita ch ed ihtha mani em-ahgith k wo ha tho'ibia g s-ap'ekam k g pi ap'ekam s-ko'okam wo ha namkith. T g ha-namkithadag pi hekith wo huhug.” Neh, bash kaij g John.
Jesus atsh ab hahawa i hih Galilee chekshani t amjed mo hebai d i kihkam k ab jiwia Jordan akimel t ab matsh wo e pahl wako.
Sh g John chum pi pahl wakonamk hab kaijch, “Nis haschu ahgk wo m-pahl wako nap pi d hekia s-ap'ekam? Ahpi apt wo chum ni-pahl wako.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Bapt wo ni-juh no pi g Jiosh hab d elitha.” Tsh heg hekaj hab juh g John.
Tsh am haha wabsh i chum wuhsh g Jesus shuhthagi t amjed. Tsh g thahm kahchim gam i e kuhpi'o. Tsh ab i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ab g Jesus hab sha masma mat g hohhi.
Sh ab neok g Jiosh ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Ith o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ch am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma.”
Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab hahawa ahg g Jesus mat gm hu hejelko wo hih mo am d tohono jewed matsh wo e a'appe. Tsh heg hekaj gm hu hih g Jesus
k am ha'ichugkahim gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash ab pi ha'ichu ko'athch nash pi e ho'ige'ithahun ab Jiosh wui.
Kutsh ab wui jiwia g jijawul ha-ge'ejig am chum s-wuimk pi ap'ekam ch ed k hab kaij, “Bap chum e elith map d Jiosh alithag. Pegih, ab g hig chehani ihtham hohothai mat wo e pahnch naptki pi bihugim.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant hab wo juh. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh ne'oki o ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu mo hi g ha'ichu hugi. Kut g o'othham hemho ab wo wa s-wohog elithath.”
Kutsh g ge Jiawul am hahawa wuhpuij tahgio i mahsith g ge'e cheopi. Heg o am kehk amai mo hab e a'aga Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim ch d Jerusalem.

Kush hab ahg, “Maptp woho d wo Jiosh alithagk, pegih, am g i thah'i amjed mo gn hu si uhgk kihtas. No hig pi hab chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh at ab wo ha cheha g mu'i anghil mat wo m-nuhkuth. Kut an hu wo m-u'ukchith mapt nih g sha'i e-tahtad ab hu wo shul hohothai t ab.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ant wo pip'ich g Jiosh. An o hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed: Pi g wo sha'i pip'ichuthath g e-kownalig Jiosh.”
Kutsh am hahawa wuhpuij tahgio wehs i mahsith g kokownaltalig ch kaistalig jewed thahm
k ab wui hab kaij, “Wehs ant am wo m-mah ihtha maptp ab ni-wui wo i gehsh k ab wo ni-ihmath.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Gam g hu hihm, ahpi ge Jiawul. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Heg amt wa'i Jiosh ab wui wo i gehsh k ab wo ihmath ch heg ab wo wa'i s-wohog elithath.”
Kutsh wa woho gm hu hih g ge Jiawul. Tsh g anghil ab wui hihi g Jesus k am i wehmt.
Am hu hebai amtsh am kuh hegai John mo am wa ha pahl wapkon. Kutsh am i kah g Jesus mamtsh kuh k atsh gm hu hahawa hih Galilee chekshani wui
k am jiwia Nazareth t ab. K am hema ep d kihhim mo d Capernaum ch an hugithaj an g Galilee kahchki. Kutsh am i thahiwua g Jesus.
Neh, heki atki hu wa'i o'oha g Isaiabad matsh ith am hab wo e juh. K hegai o'ohanaj hab chu'ig:

Si ha'ichu at am hab wo e juh Galilee ch ed. Ihtha chekshani o an hab chu'ig kahchki hugith an ch am huduni tahgio amjed g Jordan akimel. K an kihthag hegam mo d Zebulonbad amjedkam ch hegam mo d Naphtalibad amjedkam ch hegam ehp mo d gawul mahs hemajkam.

Bo sha mahs mo am thadha s-chuhugam k ed no ge mahch g Jiosh. K g muhkig ab ha wui him. T wabshaba wo nei mat am ha'ichu wo i wuhshani k hab wo sha masmak mo g si ge'e tonlig. Neh, bash wa kaij g Isaiabad.
Kutsh wa woho am i wuhsh g Jesus k am i ahgahi g ha'ichu e-ahga hab kaijch, “Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. E o aihim mat in wo i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig.”

Sh an him g Jesus Galilee kahchki hugith an. Kush am ha'i oiopo g waptopi ha u'utham ch am wuhpa g chuagia shuhthagi ch ed ch hekaj am ha u'u g waptopi. Hema ash d Simon ch hab hahawa e chechcheg Peter. Kush hema d wehngaj ch hab chehgig Andrew. Jesus atsh am i ha nei ihtham
k hab ha ahg, “Ab g wo i ni-oith k wo ni-wehmajkath. Kunt ahni wo em-mashcha mamt g hemajkam wo i ha wanchkwua am s-ap'ekam wui.”
Kutsh am ha hekaj wabsh i thagito g e-chikpan k am i oi.

Tsh am sha'i hihi ha'as hu'i. Tsh g Jesus am i ha nei ihtham James ch John. Ihtham o hab wa'ap d e-wepngam ch ash am chikpan g e-ohg wehm wahlko ch ed ch am ap'echuth g e-chuagia. Tsh g Jesus ab ha wai mat am wo wehmajk.
Kutsh am ha hekaj wabsh i thagito g e-ohg ch e-chikpan k am i oi g Jesus.

Kush ihtham am hahawa hahasko oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed. Kush g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam ha-chechopi ed ch am ha ahgithahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g kownaltaligaj ch am ep ha thothajith g nahnko mahs kok'otham.

Tsh an wehsko i kaitha g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed am Syria jewed ch ed mo heg eda g Galilee d chekshani. Tsh g hemajkam heg hekaj wehs ab ha u'apa wui hegam mo nahnko masma kok'o ch hegam mo ha'ichukaj e kudut ch hegam mo g jijawul an u'ukch g ha-chegitoithag ch hegam mo s-ha chuhugchuth ch hegam mo pi himthag. Tsh g Jesus wehs ha thothaj.

Kutsh g hemajkam wehskojed i hihim k am oith g Jesus. Ihtham ash ha'i d Galilee t am o'othham ch ha'i ab amjed mo hab e a'aga Wehst-mahm Kihhim ch ha'i ab Jerusalem t amjed ch an wehskojed g Judea chekshani k ch ha'i ga hu aigojed g Jordan akimel.
Tsh am i ha nei g Jesus ihtham mu'i hemajkam k ab i chesh kawulk t ab mat ab ha wui wo neo. Kutsh an wehgaj i e hemapai hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham.
Tsh g Jesus am i ha mashcha. Kush ith d mashchamdaj:
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam ab e sho'igchuth Jiosh wui. Tho em-wehhejedkam g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam hemuch pi ap e tahtk ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. Jiosh at ab wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam.
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam ab wabsh i e sho'igchuthch. Wehs at ab wo em-mah g Jiosh hegai mo an o'ohanas mo ab em-makiog am jewed thahm.
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam am si e gahgith mamt d wo s-ap'ekamk. Bat wo em-juh g Jiosh mamt d wo si hekia s-ap'ekamk.
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam s-ha ho'ige'ith g hemajkam. Jiosh at hab wa'ap wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath.
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mamt gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Am o hiwgithas mamt ab wo neithath g Jiosh.
Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam am ha thotholimachuth g hemajkam. Mt wo s-em-mahchk mam d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
Mt wo em-sho'igch ahpim mamt hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui. K wabshaba d em-wehhejedkam g Jiosh kownaltalig. Kumt heg hekaj wo si s-ap e tahtkkath.
Mt wo s-ko'okam has em-ahgath ch wo em-sho'igchuthath ch nahnko masma hab wo wuath g iattogig ab em-ab nam pi ab s-ni-wohochuth. Kumt wabsh wo si s-ap e tahtkkath
ch wo si s-hehgigk no pi ge'e ha'ichu ab em-makiog g Jiosh. Heg at wa oithk am hihi g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.

“Neh, s-mahch am mat pi wo e padch g chuhkug mamtp wo si onmath. Pegih, mt hab wa masma ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk am ha shahgith hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i em-juh mamtp pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk hab masma mamt hab wo juh g on matp wo kahko.

“Ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig amt wehs wo ha tonolithath g hemajkam. Heg o wa wepo mam d tonlig am ha wehhejed. Pi g am wo ehstokch hegai mamt haschu hab wo junithath g Jiosh. Neh, no hig pi woho mat pi ap wo e ehsto g kihhim matp am wo thahmkath g tohnk.
T g lahmpa hab wa'ap pi wo e ehsto ha'ichu wecho. Mt an wo thai mat hebai wo em-tonolithath.
Pegih, mt ahpim pi wo ehsto g s-em-ap'ekam k wabsh wo ha hiwgithath g hemajkam mat wo nei. Kut hekaj ab wo si has elithath g em-ohg Jiosh.

“Pi ant hab ahgk ia jiwia jewed thahm manis gm hu hab wabsh wo i juh hegai chehanig ch mashchamadag matsh wa g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ab bei Jiosh t amjed. Heg eda o an o'ohanas mant has wo masmak ch has wo ni-juh k wo nahto g ni-chikpan.

Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat pi hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh g Jiosh chehanig. Wehs at s-ap wo e nahto hegai mo an o'ohanas mat koi wo huhug g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim, chum hems g si al chu'uchum ha'ichu.

Kut d wabsh wo pi ha'ichuk am Jiosh nena ed hegai mat hedai pi am hu wo wohog elithath g Jiosh chehanig ch wo ha mashcha ha'ijj ehp mat hab wa'ap pi ab hu wo wohog elithath. Kut heg d wo si ha'ichuk am Jiosh nena ed mat hedai ab wo wohog elithath g Jiosh chehanig ch wo ha mashcha ha'ijj ehp mat ab wo wohog elithath.
Bo e elith g chehanig em-mashchamtham ch Palasi mo s-ap oith g Jiosh chehanig. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mamt hemho wa ha ba'ich i s-ap wo oithath mamtp am s-wahpkim Jiosh kihthag ed.
“S-mahch am mo hab chu'ig g heki hu chehanig mamt pi wo ha mua g hemajkam. Kut hemho wa wo e lothai matp hedai wo sha ha mua.

Kunt ahni am ba'ich hab wo i ah mamt am wa hugkam ab wo moht g chu'ichig mo g ha mu'akam mamt chum hems wabsh wo bagat ab hema i wui k hab wo ah mo d wabsh pad ha'ichu. Ab o em-wui him mat g Jiosh wo em-lothai heg hekaj k gm hu wo i em-wua Jiawul kih ed.
“Am g wo ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun mamtp wo s-chegito mamt hema i pi ap thohththa. Pi at ab hu wo em-kaiha g Jiosh.
Wehpeg amt am wo i e ap'ech heg wui mamt pi ap thohththa k am haha wo e-ho'ige'ithahu.

Mtp hems wo em-lothai mamtp pi am hu s-hohtam wo i e ap'ech. Kumt wo e kuhpach am hugkam mamt wehs wo namkith wehhejed mamt has i juh. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt wehpeg hejel am wo i e ap'ech a'ai e wui.
“S-mahch am mo hab chu'ig g heki hu chehanig mamt pi wo ha ehs g ha-wehm kihkam.
Kunt ahni am ba'ich hab wo i ah mo heg wa wepo mamt ha ehs mamtp am wabsh wehmaj wo s-wo'iwuim hegai mo pi d em-wehm kihkam.
Kut d wo em-wuikamk mamt gm hu wo i e wua Jiawul kih ed. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt chum hems wo heb hu wua g e-nenthag.
Tho em-wuikam mamt am hu wo i e wua Jiawul kih ed chum ams haschu pi ap'ekam hab wo juh. K ba'ich i s-ap'e mamt chum hems wo heb hu wua g e-nowi.
“S-mahch am mo hab chu'ig g heki hu chehanig mamt hemho wa am wo i wuhshath g ohhotha tapial e-hohnig wehhejed mamtp wo s-ohhoth.

Nt wabshaba am wo em-ahgi mat d wo pi ap'ekamk mamt wo s-ohhoth, heg hi wa mamt wo s-mai am i chum hohntk mat heki hu ha wehm wo'iwua. Kut d wo pi ap'ekamk mat g em-ohhotha hema ep wo kunt. Ith at d wo em-chu'ichigk mamtp wo s-ohhoth. Kut hegai mat wo hohnt hab wa'ap wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
“S-mahch am mo hab chu'ig g heki hu chehanig mamt pi wo ha iattogithath ch hemho am hab wo wa juh mam haschu ha ahgith ch chehcheg g Jiosh.

Nt wabshaba am wo em-ahgi mamt hemho am hab wo wa juh g e-ne'oki. Pi o ap'e mams wabsh chum haschu wehhejed wo gewkaj g e-ne'oki. Neh, am am wabsh pehegia gewkaj g e-ne'oki am chehchegch g thahm kahchim. K eda g thahm kahchim d Jiosh kihthag. K hab wa masma mamtp hems g Jiosh am chehch.
Kum am ep chehcheg g jewed. K eda heg d Jiosh nahtoi ch heg wa wepo mo d keishpakudaj. Kum am ep chehcheg g Jerusalem. K eda heg d kihhimaj g Jiosh.

E-mo'o am hab wa'ap a'aga hab kaijch mamt wo moht g chu'ichig mamtp pi hab wo juh g e-ne'oki. T eda g Jiosh wo wa'i e nako mat wo em-mohto'i g chu'ichig. Ith o wehs hab masma mamtp hems am chehch g Jiosh.
Neh, bamt wo chum juh g e-ne'oki, chum ams pi wo gewkaj am chehchegch g Jiosh. T d wabsh wo ge Jiawul amjedkamk mamtp wo ha iattogi.
“S-mahch am mo hab chu'ig g heki hu chehanig mamt wo ha lothai mat hedai s-ko'okam has em-juh. T ab wui hab epai wo e juh mat has i em-juh.
Nt wabshaba am wo em-ahgi mamt pi wo sha'i e agwuim. Tp hems hema ab wo em-shonihi em-kahm ab. Pegih, mt wabsh wo hiwigi mat ab ep wo em-shonihi.
Kumt ba'ich ha'ichu ab wo mah hegai matp hedai wo em-lothai ha'ichu s-em-wohppo'ithamch.
Kumt gm hu wo si ba'iwich mam haschu chikpan em-mohto'ith wabsh s-ap e tahtkch.
Pi g wo sha'i tha'ith matp haschu i tatchua g sho'igkam.
“S-mahch am mo e ahgachug mamt ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-naipijju ch wo s-ha keh'ithath g e-obga.

Nt wabshaba am wo em-ahgi mamt pi hegam wa'i ab wo si ha tatchuath e-naipijju. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam ab si ha tatchua g e-naipijju ch wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo e tho'ibia. Neh, ahpim amt chum hems g e-obga wo si ha tatchuath ch am ha wehhejed wo e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui. Jiosh o chum hems g pi ap hemajkam ab si ha tatchua ch ab ha mahk g tash tonlig ch juhki. Kumt ahpim hab wo chum masmak mo g Jiosh nam pi d a'aligaj.
Em-ohg Jiosh o d si hekia s-ap'ekam. Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa'ap d wo si hekia s-ap'ekamk.”

Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am g wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi am hu hab wabsh wo wuath g ha'ichu s-ap'ekam hab ahgk mat g hemajkam wo neithath mam haschu am hab junihim. Jiosh at pi ab hu wo em-mah g s-kehg mahkigdag mamtp hab masma wabsh wo s-e chehgitham.

“Pi g wo s-e chehgithamk mamt hekith wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam. Hegam mo s-e chehgithamk mo i ha wehmt o am hab wua em-namki ed ch an kahya ch ed. K g hemajkam ab si has ha elith. Neh, ith o d ha-namkithadag. Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat g Jiosh pi ab hu has wo ha el.
Ahpim amt wabsh s-a'agi wo i ha wehmtath g sho'igkam mat pi hedai wo s-mahchk.
T g em-ohg Jiosh wo em-neith k ab wo si has em-elithath.

“Pi g wo s-e chehgithamk mamt hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahu. Hegam mo s-e chehgithamk at wo gegokiwua k wo e ho'ige'ithahu am em-namki ed ch an kahya ch ed. Kut wehsijj wo ha neith k ab wo si has ha elithath. Neh, ith o d ha namkithadag. Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat g Jiosh pi ab hu has wo ha elithath.
Ahpim amt am wo i wahp e-kih ed k ab wo si i kuh g kihjeg k am wabsh hejelko wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. Kut heg wo wa'i em-neithath ch ab wo has em-elithath.
“Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o am wabsh mu'ikko e thahm hab ha'ichu chech'e hab elithch mat hab wa'i masma wo ha kah g Jiosh. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma hab wo e junihith.
Jiosh o d em-ohg ch heki hu s-mahch mam haschu i tatchua mam wa chum koi ab hu tahni ha'ichu.
Bamt masma am wo e ho'ige'ithahunath: T-ohg Jiosh, an ap kihthag thahm kahchim ch ed. Kuch ab si has m-elith ch si ha'ichuchuth g m-chehgig.
Ab ach m-tahni mapt wo i ge'ethaj g e-kownaltalig ia t-shahgith mat g m-tatchui am hab wo e junihith ia jewed thahm hab masma mo an hab e wua m-kihthag ed.
Ab g i s-t-ho'ige'ith k ab wo t-mahkath g ha'ichu hugi wehs tashkaj.
Gam g hu hab i juhni g pi ap t-chu'ichig hab masma mach gm hu pi chechegitod g ha-chu'ichig hegam mat hedai pi ap has chu'i ab t-wui.
Pi g am hiwgith g Jiawul mas am wo t-shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. [Ahpi ap d kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm ch wehs edgith g gewkthag. Kutt ab wo si has m-elithath chum hekith.]
Neh, bamt masma am wo e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui wabsh pi chegitok g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. T g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig.
T wabshaba g em-chu'ichig pi gm hab wo i e juh mamtp pi wo pi chegito g ha-chu'ichig.

“Pi g wo s-e chehgithamk mam pi ap e tahtk mamt hekith he'ekkio pi wo e gegos e ho'ige'ithahunch. Hegam mat wo s-e chehgitham at wo nei g e-namkithadag mat g hemajkam ab wo si has ha el. Nt wabshaba wo si shel em-ahgi mat g Jiosh pi ab hu has wo ha el.
Am g wo wakon g e-wuhiosha k ab wo si i gaswua g e-mo'o.
T hab pi wo mahchk g hemajkam ab i em-neithk mam pi e gegosith. T heg wo wa'i s-mahchk em-ohg Jiosh ch ab wo si has em-elithath.
“Pi g an hu wo e to'ithahith g s-kaisthag ith thahm jewed. Tp hems wabsh wo padt o atp hems hema wo em-ehs.
Mt wabshaba wo hekaj g e-kaisthag am Jiosh wehhejed. T heg wo wa wepok mam heg an e to'ithahim Jiosh kihthag ed. T pi hekith wo padt. Kut pi hedai wo em-ehs.
Kumt am wo s-hihimim no pi g em-tatchuithag am ulinig mo hebai ha'ichug mam haschu hab i elith mo d em-kaisthag.
“Em-wuhpui at s-ap am wo i wahki g tonlig matp wo s-mamsk

k wabshaba pi am hu wo i wahki matp pi wo mamsk. Kum heg hekaj s-ap nuhkuth. Pegih, wahm amt wo si s-ap nuhkuthath g ha'ichu e-amichuthadag mat heg s-ap am wo i wahki g wohokam. That wo si ge'e s-chuhugamk em-wehhejed matp pi wo ap'ek g em-amichuthadag.

“Pi at hedai wo e nako mas ha wepo hab masma ab wo ha neithath g gohk e-a'amo. Hemho wa atp hems hema ba'ich wo i s-wohog elithath. Em-kaisthag o heg wa wepo mo d em-ahmo mamtp heg hekaj ba'ich wo i pihk e elithath mam hi g Jiosh.

“Neh, nt heg hekaj hab wo em-ah mamt pi wabsh wo i e kudutath heg hekaj mams haschukaj wo e gegos o mams haschukaj wo e enigadath. Jiosh at ab em-mah g em-thoakag, pegih, k ab hab wa'ap wo em-mah mamt haschukaj wo e thagio'ithath.

An g wo i ha neith hegam u'uwhig mo an nen'e. Ihtham o pi ha'ichu e'eshath ch pi od g ha'ichu esha ch pi gn hu e to'ithahim g ha'ichu bahithag. K wabshaba g em-ohg Jiosh ha nuhkuth. Kum eda ahpim ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g u'uwhig.
Pi amt wo e nako mams am ba'ich wo i himch g e-a'ahithagga, chum ams hems wo si e kudutath am chegitokch.
“Pi g am wo si e kudutath ab amjed mams haschu ab wo enigat. An g wo i neithath g ha'ichu heosig m an wehsko chuhch. Heg o wa wepo mo si s-kehg e enigadathch ch eda pi ha'ichu sha'i shohshom.
Solomonbad o pi hab masma s-kehg e enigadathch, chum as d si s-kais kownal.

Neh, ha'ichu wuhshanig o wabsh al he'ekia tash an hab chu'ig. K eda g Jiosh si s-kehg an wuhshath. Kum ahpim ba'ich d i ha'ichu am wehhejed. Kut woho ab wo em-enigadath. Pegih, mt heg hekaj ab wabsh wo si hiwgath
ch pi am hu wo e kudutath ab amjed mams hebai wo bei g e-gegosig o g e-wehschuga.
Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o ith am wa si oith. M eda ahpim d Jiosh a'aliga. K heg s-mahch mam tatchua wehs ihtha.
Wehpeg g am wo i e thagitok Jiosh wui k hab d wo s-ap'ekamk. Kut heg wehs ab wo i em-mah mam haschu i tatchua.
“Pi g am wo sha'i e kudutath heg amjed mat haschu has wo i e juh ba'ich tash. Am o wa ha'ichug g em-kudutadag ith i tashkaj ch pi hab chum mahs mams g si'alim kudutadag ab wo i wehnath.
“Pi g am hedai has wo ahgath nat pi ab uhpam wo i e nodagi em-wui.
Mamt has i masma wo has ha ahgath, t ab wo i nod em-wui g has ahgadag hab masma. Ab at wo i e nodagi em-wui mamt has i masma ab wo neithath hema.

“Pi g am wo si s-nen'oithath g hema chu'ichig. Tp hems ba'ich i ge'ej g hejel em-chu'ichig. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mam g chum ha'ichu ab i s-wuhshthamk wuhij ed mo eda ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu ab wo'o em-wuhi ed.

Tho iattogi mamtp hab wo chei mamt ha'ichu ab wo i wuhshath wuhij ed mo eda g ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu ab wo'o em-wuhi ed. Hemho wa amt wehpeg wo i ap'ech g pi e-ap'ethag k haha wo e nako mamt wo i ap'ech g hema pi ap'ethag.

“Pi g ab hu wo ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua. Heg at wo wa wepok mamt g s-ta ke'itham gogogs ab wo ha mah g hekia s-ap'ekam ha'ichu o g kokji ab wo ha mah g si s-namkig babiuga. Gogogs at hi ab wabsh wo i nehni k wo s-ko'okam has wo em-juh. T g kokji hi wabsh wo kehiwia g babiuga.
“Ab g wo ha tahnith ha'ichu k ab wo bebheth. Am g wo e gahgithath ha'ichu k wo cheh. Ab g wo shontpagath. T ab wo i e kuhpi'o g pualit em-wehhejed.
Ahpim o'og, namt hig wabsh g hothai wo mah g e-alithag mat g simito wo em-tai
o wabsh g wamad wo mah mat g watopi hithod ab wo em-tai?
Chum ams d pi ap'ekam ch eda s-mahch mamt s-kehg ha'ichu wo ha mah g e-a'aliga. Wahm hig g em-ohg Jiosh at woho ba'ich i s-kehg ha'ichu ab wo em-mah mamt ab wo tahnith ha'ichu.
“Am g hab wo ha juhkchith g hemajkam mam has i chum ha elith mat hab wo em-juhkchith. Bamt masma wehs am hab wo juh mo haschu an o'ohanas Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed.

“Am g wo i e thagitok Jiosh wui k ab wo s-wohog elithath. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt am i wahp al aj kihjeg t amjed k am aj wohg oithch hihim. Pi o mu'ijj hab masma hab e wua. Kumt hab wa'i masma am wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. (13) Pi o hasig mamt hab wabsh wo junihith g hejel e-tatchui. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt ab s-tadani kihjeg t amjed i wahp k am s-tadani wohg oithch hihim. Mu'ijj o hab masma hab e wua ch hab ab aihim g Jiawul kih.

“Mu'i at an wo i wuwha g s-chu i'attomkam k hab wo e a'agath mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Am g wo s-ha nen'oithath mat pi am hu wo i em-shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. T wo s-em-padchutham hab masma mat g sheh'e wo s-mu'am g kahwal.

Mt wo s-mahchk mo pi d wohokam am neithch mo has masma. Nat hig wo e nako g ho'i sha'i mat wo bahithagt g uhdwis o g suhna? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam s-chu i'attomkam mas wo em-oithk hab wo e juh.
Neh, heg at wo wa'i s-kehg bahithagt s-kehg ha'ichu wuhshanig.
T g pi kehg wuhshanig pi kehg wo bahithagt.
Kumt wo shonch k gm hu wo mei.
Neh, mt hab wa masma wo ha mai mas hu wa woho d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mamt wo nei mas wa woho ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh.
“Mu'ijj at hab wo chum ni-a'agath mani d s-ap'ekam ha-kownalig ch wabshaba pi am hu hab wo junihith g ni-ohg Jiosh tatchui. Kut g Jiosh pi am hu wo i ha wahpki e-kihthag ed.

“T ab wo i e ai g lothaita tash. T ihtham hab wo chum kaijjith ab ni-wui, ‘S-ap'ekam ni-kownalig, m-gewkthagkaj ach am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch gm hu i ha wuwhasith g jijawul ch am hab junihim g s-hasig ha'ichu.’
“Kunt hab wo chei ab ha wui, ‘Pi ani hekith sha'i s-em-mahch. Gam g hu wo hihim ab ni-amjed ahpim mam hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.’ T hemho wa gm hu wo hihi.
“Ab g wo s-wohog elithath g ha'ichu ni-ahga. T hab wo s-ap'ek g em-thoakag. Ith at heg wo wa wepok matp hems hema s-wihnam wo shondath g e-kihta.
T hab pi wo i gei mat hekith wo hewed k juh k wo s-gewkam mel g shuhthagi. Pegih, mt hab wa masma s-wihnam wo gegokkath mo ihtha kih mamtp ab wo s-ni-wohog elithath.
“T wabshaba pi wo ap'ek g em-thoakag mamtp pi ab hu wo wohog elithath g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Heg at wo wa wepok matp hems hema pi wihnam wo shondath g e-kihta.
T wo si hewed k juh k s-gewkam wo mel g shuhthagi. Kut g kihj wo i gehsh k am wabsh wo i e padch. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo i e padch g em-thoakag mo ihtha kih mamtp pi ab hu wo ni-wohog elithath.”
Neh, tsh am i ha'asa ha mashcha g Jesus. Tsh g hemajkam si has i el
no pi s-e mamachim ha mashcham. Sh eda hegam mo d chum chehanig ha mashchamtham pi hab masma s-e mamachim ha mashcham.
Tsh ab hahawa i hud g Jesus kawulk t amjed. Tsh ab i oi hegam mu'i hemajkam mo an wehmaj.

Tsh am hema jiwia g o'othham mash mumku heg hekaj mumkithag mo g chuhkugaj muhkhim k atsh ab i gei Jesus wecho k hab kaij, “S-ap'ekam ni-kownalig, ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i ni-thoajith, pej maptp wo tatchuath.”
Tsh g Jesus ab tahtam k hab kaij, “Am o wa s-ap'e. Thoajini.” Tsh am ha hekaj i thoa.

Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, pi apt hedai wo ahgith k wabshaba am ha hekaj wo hih pahl wui. T am wo m-chechga k wo wohokamch mapt thoa. Pt am hab haha wo juh hegai iagchulitha mo wa g Jiosh em-chehani Mosesbad o'ohana ed. T hab wo s-mahchk g hemajkam mapt woho thoa.”
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus k am thatha Capernaum t am. Sh amai am hema d shonthal ha-ge'ejig ch ab Rome t amjed am d ha kehsha ch ab si tahni g i wehmtadag ch hab kaij,
“S-ap'ekam ni-kownalig, mumku at g ni-pionag k ab wo'o ni-kih ab ch pi e nako mas an has wo i e juh k mu'i e sho'igchuth.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ant wo wa i him k wo thoaj.”
Sh hab kaij hegai shonthal ha-ge'ejig, “Pi ani am hu hugkam d ha'ichu maps am wo i wah ni-kih ed. Am apt hab wabsh wo chea. T wo thoa g ni-pionag.

Bo wa masma ab ha'ichu ni-chehani g ni-ge'ejig. Kuni ab s-wohog elith. K g ni-shonthalig hab wa'ap ab s-ni-wohog elith. Hema ant hab wo ah, ‘Am g hihm.’ T am wo hih. Nt hema hab ep wo ah, ‘Ab g i hihm.’ T ab wo i hih. Kuni g ni-pionag hab ep a'aga mat ha'ichu hab wo ni-juni. K am hab wua.”
Kutsh si has i el g Jesus am i kaiok k hab kaij ab ha wui hegam mo an wehmaj, “Neh, ab o si ni-hiwig ihtha gawul mahs o'othham. Pi ani hekith sha'i kah mas hab masma ab si ni-hiwig g Tutuligo.
Kunt hab wo em-ahgi mat mu'ijj ab wo i hihi si'al wecho amjed ch hudunig wecho amjed k am wo wehmaj thadhaiwua g Abrahambad ch Isaacbad ch Jacobbad an Jiosh kihthag ed.

Ith o d chum ha-ap'ethag g Tutuligo. T wabshaba mu'ijj pi am hu wo i wahp no pi pi ab hu ni-hiwig. T g Jiosh gm hu wo ha shul s-chuhugam k ed. Kut chum hekith am wo shoanith ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath.”
Kush hab hahawa kaij g Jesus heg wui shonthal ha-ge'ejig, “Gamai g hihm uhpam. T heg am hab wo e juh map haschu ab ni-tahni nap pi ab si ni-hiwig.” Kutsh heg wa'i ohla ab thoa g piongaj.
Kutsh amjed gm hu ha'i hihi ihtham Jesus Peter kih wui. Sh am wo'ok ch mumku g Peter hohnig je'e ch g s-toni iajithch.
Kush g Jesus an taht g nowij. Tsh ha hekaj huhug g s-tonjig ab ab. Kutsh am i wamig k ha hihithol.
Tsh gm hu i juh. Tsh g hemajkam mu'i am ha u'apa g kok'otham ch hegam mo g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Tsh g Jesus am i ha wuwhas g jijawul k am wehs ha thoaj g kok'otham.
Heki atki hu wa'i o'oha g Isaiabad matsh ith am hab wo e juh. K hegai o'ohanaj hab chu'ig: Heg at ab wo moht g t-mumkithag k im hu hab wo i juh ab t-amjed.
Sh mu'i hemajkam an ha wehgaj. Sh heg hekaj hab ha ahg g Jesus hegam mo si ha mashcham mat wo e nako. T gn hu aigojed wo i chehchsh g sikod shuhthagi.
Tsh wabshaba am hema jiwia g chehanig ha mashchamtham k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, ni-nahtokch ani mant am wo m-oi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt hig wo e nako? Neh, chum o hems g gagso ch u'uwhig ge koksh. Ni wabshaba ahni Jiosh si Kehsha pi sha'i ha kih ia jewed thahm. K heg hekaj s-hasig maps am wo ni-oi.”
Sh hema hab kaij hegam mash ab wecho e mashcham, “S-ap'ekam ni-kownalig, chum ani hi wa am i s-m-oithamk ithani. T wabshaba ho'ipki hekith muh g ni-ohg. Nt wo hiashpok haha wo m-oi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g ha hiwgith hegam mo pi u'ukch g wechij thoakag mat wo ha hiash g ko'i. Pt ahpi hi ab wo i him k wo ni-wehmajk.”
Sh g Jesus an hahawa thahiwua wahlko ch ed am ha wehm hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham k am gahi i shul.
Kutsh haha wabsh si s-gewkam ab i meh g hewel shuhthagi thahm k ab i to'otonkai g shuhthagi matsh gm hu si i chesh wahlko thahm. Sh g Jesus am wo'ok ch kohsh.
Kutsh am wui hihim k am wuhan k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, t-tho'ibiani. Ttki wo t-ko'ij.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Shahchu amt ahgk si e totoths. Pi amki ab hu si ni-hiwig.” Bash kaij ch am wamig k ab si chehani g hewel ch shuhthagi to'otonk mat wo thotholimat. Kutsh gm hu wabsh i pi shahm.
Tsh wehsijj si has i elith k hab kaij, “S has mahs d o'othham ihtha mo chum hems g hewel ch shuhthagi to'otonk ab s-wohog elith.”

Tsh am aigo thatha. K amai d ha-chekshani g Gadarene hemajkam. Sh am ge chehchog mo am g ko'i e to'aw. Tsh gohk ab i wuwha g chechoj. Kush g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Kush sha'i s-ta ehbithama. Sh chum hedai s-ehbith matsh am ha'ab wo i bij.

Tsh ihtham an ha nam k si s-kaitham hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Shahchu apt ahgk ab t-wui i hih, ahpi Jiosh alithag. Napt wo s-ko'okam t-namkith mat wa chum koi e ai g tash?” Bash kaij nash pi g Jesus s-ha wuwhasithamk g jijawul.
Sh eda mu'i an oiopo g kokji kawulk bahsho ch e gegosith.
Sh ihtham jijawul ab si tahni g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pt hig wo t-hiwigi matt am wo i wahp hegam ha eda kokji.”
Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Hijiwo.” Tsh wa woho gm hu i wuwha k am wahp kokji ha eda. Kutsh wehsijj ihtham kokji am agshp i wohp k am shul shuhthagi ch ed k wachkk.
Kutsh hegam mash am ha nuhkuth ihtham kokji gm hu si wohp k am thatha kihhim t am k am ha ahgith mat haschu has e juh am ha tahgio ihtham o'othham mash g jijawul an ha u'ukch.
Kutsh mu'ijj ab amjed hegai kihhim am i namkhi g Jesus k am i chehg k hab ahg mat wo si s-ha ho'ige'ith k gm hu wo hih ab ha-chekshani amjed.
Tsh an hahawa gahi ep hihi g wahlkokaj ihtham Jesus k am thatha Capernaum t am mo am kih.

Tsh am ha'i thatha hema wo'ichugch wahkus ch ed nash pi ab wabsh i s-moik ch pi himith. Sh am neith g Jesus mo ab si hiwig ihtham mat am wui u'apa ch hab kaij ab wui g mumkutham, “Am g si e gewkaj, ni-nawoj. Gm ant hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”
Sh ha'i gegok g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Ih, sho'o wa'i si pi ap neok hab masma e wepogithch g Jiosh.”
Kush g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am chegito ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am am g pi ap'ekam ha'ichu chegito

hab elithch mani hab wabsh kaij ch pi woho edgith g gewkthag mant gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. Bam elith mo s-pehegim hab e kaij, ‘Gm ant hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig,’ no ge hedai s-mahch mas s-wohom gm hu hab i e juh.
Pegih, nt wo em-chehgi mani woho ge gewkthag ch hab wua mani has i kaij ahni Jiosh si Kehsha,” k hab hahawa kaij ab wui ihtha mo ab wabsh i s-moik, “I g wamig k am beh'i g e-wahkus k hihm am uhpam.”
Kutsh am i wamig k gm hu hih uhpam.
Kutsh am i nei g hemajkam ihtha k si s-ehbeni k ab si has i el g Jiosh natki pi ab mah g Jesus ihtha gewkthag.

Tki amjed am hih g Jesus k am hu hebai himath ch ni-cheh ahni Matthew. Nid wa eda am chikpan mo am g kownal ha kowlant g hemajkam g lial. D hab kaij g Jesus ab ni-wui, “Ab g i hihm k ab si ni-wecho wo e mashchamath.” Nid am ha hekaj i wuhshani k am i oi.

Am hu hebai amjed, nid ab ha wai hegam Jesus mat am wo e gegos ni-kih am. D ab i hihi. Kud mu'i am thatha k am t-wehm e gegosith g lial ha kowlanttham ch hegam mo pi am hu si oith g t-shohshon ha-himthag.
Dki am ha'i thatha g Palasi. Kuchd eda am t-gegosith. D ihtham hab kaij ab t-wui, “Ih, k haschu ahgch g em-mashchamtham ha wehm e gegosith g pi ap hemajkam, chum hems g lial t-kowlanttham?”
D g Jesus am i ha kaiok hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ihtham pi ap hemajkam o s-e tho'ibiamk hab masma mat g kok'otham wo s-e thoajitham. Hegam mat hab wo e elithath mo s-ap'e at pi wo tatchua g mahkai.

Pi ant hab ahgk ia jiwia jewed thahm manis wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo pi e tho'ibiamk. Neh, an o o'ohanas mash wa hab kaij g Jiosh: S-ap am hab wua g iagchulitha ab ni-wui. K wabshaba ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mamt wo s-hehemajimak. Pegih, am g wo s-amichuth mo haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij.”

D am ha'i thatha hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham hegai John mo wa ha pahl wapkon k ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Neh, mu'ikko ach pi t-gegosith hab ahgch matt wo t-ho'ige'ithahu. K hegam Palasi hab wa'ap e wua. K eda haschu ahgch ihtham pi hab masma hab e wua mo ab si m-wecho e mashcham?”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nat hig pi wo e gegos g wo ha hohntam naipijju mat eda heg am wo ha wehmajk? T am wo i e ai mat pi am hu wo ha wehmajk. T am hahawa pi wo e gegos. Pegih, bat wo wa e juh ihtham ni-naipijju mant hekith pi ia hu wo ha wehmajk.”

D am hahawa chum ha tashogith g Jesus mat g wechij mashchama pi ap wo wehnath g heki hu himthag hab kaijch, “Pi at hedai g wechij ikuskaj wo shohsho g hekiuchij lihwa mat wo s-e wia nat pi wo i thahiwua hegai wechij ikus k ba'ich wo i wantp g hekiuchij.

K hab wa'ap pi hab mahs machs am wo toa g wechij uhdwis wadag am hekiuchij ha'ichu elithag kostal ch ed nat pi wo wantsh g hekiuchij am i e ak. Kut wo e iawua g uhdwis wadag. Wechij uhdwis wadag at am wo e toa wechij kokstal ch ed mat wehs wo s-ap e nuhkuth.”
D am wabsh kia ha wehm neok g Jesus. Kud am hema jiwia g t-haha'ichuga k ab i gei wui k hab kaij, “Ni-chehiaga atp hems heki hu muh. Pt wabshaba ab wo i him k ab wo taht. T wo e chegito.”
Kud gm hu wehmaj hih g Jesus. Kuchd ahchim gm hu ep ha oi.
Kudki eda am hema ha'ichug g uwi mash gamai gohk ahith ab wa'i mumku heg hekaj mo g eh'edaj jegwoni. Kuchd am hihim. Kudki ab i hih Jesus wui k ab taht g kahbaj hugithag
nash pi hab e elith matp hems an wabsh wo taht k wo thoa.
D g Jesus am sikol i kekiwua k neithok hab ahg, “Pegih, ni-uwiga, ab g si i e gewkath. Am apt wa thoa napt pi ab i s-ni-wohoch.” Kud amjed gm hu s-thoa.
D amjed gm hu hih g Jesus k am i wah heg kih ed matsh g chehiagaj muh. Sh am si s-nankosig g mumsigo ch shoanitham.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Gam g hu wo i wuwhaki wehsijj. Heg o wa wepo ni-wehhejed mo wabsh kohsh g chehia.” Kush wehsijj si s-ko'okam ash nash pi s-mahch matsh muh.
Kumtsh am wabsh i chum ha wuwhas. Tsh g Jesus am i wah mo am wo'o g chehia k ab bei nowij ab. Kutsh i wami.
Kum amjed an a'ai wehsko a'agahim mat has e juh.
Kuchd am hu hebai ep hihim. D gohk pi neneatham o'othham ab i oi g Jesus k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-t-ho'ige'ith ahpi mapsh d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam.”

Kuchd gd hu i wahp kih ch ed. D ihtham gohk pi neneatham am thatha wui g Jesus. Kud heg ab ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Nam s-wohochuth mant wo ni-nako mant wo em-nench?” D hab kaij ihtham, “Heu'u, ab ach si m-hiwig, s-ap'ekam t-kownalig.”
Kud g Jesus ab ha taht g ha-wuhpui k hab kaij, “Am at hab wo e juh mam has i masma ab s-wohochuth.”
Kud wa woho ab bei g e-nenthag. D g Jesus ab si s-gewkam ha ahgith, “Pi g am hedai wo sha'i ahgith ihtha.”
D wabshaba am wabsh i chum thagito k gm hu hihim k am a'ai i ahgahi wehsko anai ab amjed g Jesus.
D am hahawa ha'i ep thatha g hemajkam Jesus wui am hema u'apathch mo pi ha neok nash pi jiawul an u'ukch. D g Jesus gm hu wabsh chum i wuhshath g jiawul ab amjed.
Kud ha hekaj wabsh neo ihtha o'othham. D wehsijj si e tothsith k hab kaij, “Pi ach hekith ha'ichu hab sha'i masma neith am t-shahgith.”
Kud wabshaba g Palasi hab kaij, “Jijawul ha-ge'ejig o ab mahkch g gewkthag. Kuki heg hekaj e nakog ch ab i ha wuwhasith g jijawul.”

Am achd hahawa hahasko oiopoth ch am thaiw wehs kihhim ch ed. Kud g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam ha-chechopi ed ch am ha ahgithahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig ch am ep ha thothajith g nahnko mahs kok'otham.
D mu'i ab wui e chehm g hemajkam. Kudki g Jesus si i s-ha ho'ige'el no pi si e kudut ch e sho'igchuth hab sha masma mat g kakawal hab wo e wuath pi e nuhkuthch.

D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Neh, mu'ij o hegam mo e nahtokch mat wo e tho'ibia. Kuch eda pi mu'ij ahchim mach am ha ahgithahim g tho'ibiathag ahga. Ith o heg wa wepo mat hebai g ha-hihka wo si ge'ejk. T g ha-pionag pi wo mu'ijk.
Ab g wo si tahnith g Jiosh mat mu'i wo i ha chuhcha mat am wo i ha ahgithahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ch ab wo i ha ba'ihamath hegam mo e nahtokch.”
Ab ad hahawa i t-wai g Jesus ahchim mach ab si wecho t-mashcham k ab t-mah g gewkthag matt gm hu wo i ha wuwhas g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch k wo ha thothaj g kok'otham.

Thachd gamai gohk ahchim mach d si chuhchaij. Simon o d wehpegkam ch hab ep chehgig Peter. K g Simon shehpij hab wa'ap d Jesus kehsha ch hab chehgig Andrew. K ha'i ep d James ch John ch d e-wepngam. K g ha-ohg hab chehgig Zebedee.
K ha'i ep d Philip ch Bartholomew ch Thomas. Ni ahni hab wa'ap d kehshaj ch hab chehgig Matthew ch wa d ge lial ha kowlanttham. K hema d hegai James mo g ohgaj d Alphias. K hema hab chehgig Thaddaus.
K hema hab ep chehgig Simon ch d hema hegam mo tatchua matt ahchim Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g t-kownaltalig. K hema hab chehgig Judas Iscariot ch d ihtha matki wo gagda g Jesus.
D g Jesus am hahawa i t-shelini ahchim gamai gohk matt gm hu wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj hab kaijch, “Pi g am hu wo hihim gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui ch Samaria hemajkam ha wui ia'i ithani.
Am amt wo wa'i hihi hegam ha wui e-wehm Tutuligo. Ihtham o hab sha masma mo g heb hu hihimkam kahwal.
Am g wo hihim k ith am wo i ha ahgithahi mat am wo i himch g Jiosh g e-kownaltalig jewed thahm.

Mt wo ha thothaj g kok'otham k ab uhpam wo i ha chechegitoich hegam mat wabsh chum koi k g jijawul ab wo i ha wuwhas ha amjed hegam mo an u'ukch k wo ha thothaj hegam mo kok'o heg hekaj mo g ha-chuhkug wabsh muhkhim. Ab ant wabsh em-mah ihtha gewkthag. Kumt pi ha'ichu wo ha kowlantath am hab ha junithch.

“K wabshaba ab d ha-wuikam hegam mat ab wo em-kaiha mat ab aigo wo i em-wehmaj k wo em-thagio'i. Mt heg hekaj ab wabsh wo e enigadathch ch wo hihi pi ha'ichu u'athch mams hekaj wo e thagio'i o ams wo ha namkith. T g Jiosh wo em-nuhkuth. Kumt pi wo u'ath g cheowikud mamt hekaj wo e nuhkuth.

“Mt am wo i wahp kihhim ch ed k an wo i ha gahghi hegam mat hedai s-ap ab wo i em-nei k ab ha wui hab wo chei, ‘Jiosh o ab em-makiog g si ge'e s-ap tahhathkam.’ Kut am wo i em-wahpkith k wo em-thagio'i am hugkam mamt hekith gm hu ba'ich ep wo i hihi. Kutp hems hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei g kihkam. Kumt am wo si i shahmuth g jewed ab e-tahtad ab k hab wo ha chehgi mamt wo ha thagito.

Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat g Jiosh ba'ich i s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mat pi ab hu wo kaiha ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj matsh hi hegam hab ha juh pi ap hemajkam mash am kih Sodom ch Gomorra kihhimbad ch ed.

“Neh, am amt wo oiopoth ha shahgith g hemajkam. Kut ha'i wo s-ta ehbithamak am em-wehhejed hab sha masma mo g shesh'e am ha wehhejed g kahwal. Mt wo si s-e nen'oithath hab masma mo g ban ch wo si s-hehemajimak hab masma mo g hohohi.
Ab o him g tash mamt an wo em-u'u k wo em-lothait k atp hems ep wo em-gewitta am chechopi ch ed.
Am amt wo em-lothai ha tahgio g haha'ichu ch kokownal heg hekaj mam ab ni-hiwig. Kumt wo s-ni-mahch k ah am ha tahgio ch am ha tahgio g gawul mahs hemajkam.
Pi g wo sha'i e kudut ab amjed mamt has masma e wehhejed wo neo.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at wo em-ahgi mamt has wo chei.
“Haha'ichu at wo em-koktha. Kut ab ha wui wo em-gagda chum hems g em-wepnag o g em-jehj o g em-a'aliga.
Mu'i hemajkam at wo s-em-keh'ithath ni-hekaj. Kumt wo sha e nakog k wo gahi wuwha g e-sho'igthag. T g Jiosh am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.

Neh, mtp hems wo em-sho'igch hasko. Pegih, mt wo ahhio heg amjed kihhim k gm hu ba'ich kihhim wui ep wo hihi. Nt wo shel em-ahgi mant ep wo jiwia ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mamt koi wo ha chehmo g e-wehm o'othham ha-kihhim.

“E mashchamtham o ab wabsh wecho hegai mo d ha mashchamtham ch heg hekaj wepo wo nako ha'ichu. T g pion hab wa'ap wepo ha'ichu wo nako g e-ahmo. Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap ni-wepo wo nako ha'ichu. Neh, bo ni-a'aga ha'i mani d ge Jiawul ch wahm s-ko'okam has wo em-ahgath ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.
“Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath g hemajkam nat pi wehs wo i e ma'ishpi'o mo haschu i e ma'ishch ch wehs wo s-e mai mo haschu s-e a'agchuth.
Si amt tasho wo i ahgahi wehsko mani haschu ab si hejel em-ahgith.

Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam matp hedai wo chum s-em-kokthaim. Pi at wo e nako mas ba'ich i s-ko'okam has wo em-juh em-kokthak. Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat am wo em-tha'ich Jiawul kih ed mamtp pi am hu wo wohog elithath. Kumt heg ab wo wa'i si has elithath.

“K wabshaba g Jiosh si s-hemajima ch pi tatchua mas wo s-ko'okam em-juh. Am g wo oithahim mo chum hems g al u'uwhig s-ap ha nuhkuth. K eda chum alo pi ha'ichu namkig ihtham. Kum ahpim d si ha'ichu am tahgio. Jiosh o wehs ha'ichu s-mahch ab em-ab. Mt heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath ab wui e thagitokch.
“Neh, am amt wo s-ni-mahch k ah hemajkam ha tahgio mam d ni-wohochuththam. Kunt ahni hab wa'ap wo s-em-mahch k ah am tahgio g ni-ohg Jiosh.
Kutp wabshaba hedai pi wo ni-mahch k ah am ha tahgio g hemajkam, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo mahch k ah am tahgio g ni-ohg Jiosh.
“Pi g hab wo e elithath mat wo thotholimat g hemajkam mant ia jiwia. Ab at em-wui wo gegokiwua hegam mo pi ab hu has ni-elith.
Wihpiop atp hems wo s-keh'ithath g e-ohg ch g chetcha g e-je'e o g e-kahkma je'e.
Em-wehm kihkam atp hems d wo si em-obgak.
“Pi at ha'ichu wo namkigk g em-wohochuthadag mamtp pi ba'ich wo i ni-tatchua mam hi g e-ohg ch e-je'e ch e-a'aliga.

Mt gm hu wo thagito g hejel hab e elitha k ahni hab ni-elitha hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed e sho'igchuthch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith. Kut pi ha'ichu wo namkigk g em-wohochuthadag mamtp pi hab masma ab wo i ni-oi.
Pi amt wo heki wua g e-thoakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni-wehhejed. Heg at wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp hedai wo chum s-tha'ath.
“Heg o wa wepo mo s-ap ab ni-neith ahni matp hedai ahpim s-ap ab wo em-neithath. K hab wa'ap s-ap ab neith g Jiosh matp hedai s-ap ab wo ni-neithath.
Hegai mat hedai s-ap ab wo i ha nei g ni-chuhchai at ha wepo wo bei g s-kehg mahkigdag. Kut hegai mat hedai s-ap ab wo i nei g s-ap'ekam o'othham heg wepo wo bei g s-kehg mahkigdag.
Kut heg s-wohom ab wo bei g s-kehg e-mahkigdag mat hedai chum hems g s-hehpi shuhthagi ab wo hema ha wasibi ihtham al a'al am hema em-wehhejed ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.”
Am ad i ha'asa ha'ichu t-shelini g Jesus ahchim gamai gohk e-chuhchai k gm hu hahawa him k atsh an i ha mashcham k ha mihshmath mo an a'ai mia kihhimag.

Kumd wa eda am wabsh kia kuhpch hegai John mad am i shonwuich g pahl wakona. Sh hegam mad ab si wecho e mashcham am ahgith mo haschu chikpan hab wua g Jesus. Kutsh am ha'i ha cheha mat am wo hihim k ab wo kakke mas woho d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kudki am thatha
k ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ab o t-chehani g John matt ab wo m-kakke maps woho d Jiosh si Kehsha aha nat ab hahawa hema wo i wuhsh mat d wo hegaik.”
D eda g Jesus am ahg g e-kehg ha'ichu e-ahga ch ha thothajith g kok'otham ch hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui hegam John chuhchai, “Am g uhpam wo hihim k wo ahgi g John mam haschu i kah ch haschu i neith.
Ha ani thothajith g pi ha thothajitham kok'otham ch pi neneatham ch pi hihimithkam ch pi chechkaithkam ch ha chechegitoichuth g ko'i ch am ha ahgith g sho'igkam mat g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia.
T g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath mamtp hedai ab wabsh wo ni-hiwgath.”

Neh, d amjed gm hu uhpam hihi. D g Jesus am ha'ichu ha ahgith g hemajkam ab amjed g John ch hab kaij, “Neh, am amt wa hihim k ab kaiha g John. K wa eda am oimmelhim pi apkokam jewed ch ed. Kumt pi woho am hu wo i wuwha wui matp d wabsh s-pehegi o'othham ch am gawul wo wuath g e-ne'oki. Pi o an a'ai e wanchkwua g John.
Kumt pi hema s-neitham mo s-kakaisim e enigadathch. Hegam mo hab masma e enigadathch o si s-kakaisim kih.
Neh, heg amt s-kaim ha'ichu i tashogiththam k heg wa woho kah. K g John am ba'ich ha'ichu k ed ep kehk.
Heg o hab ahg g Jiosh ch hab kaij: Am ant wo hema i maskogi mat am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam am wehhejed g si ni-Kehsha jiwhiathag am jewed thahm. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.

Kunt wo em-ahgi mo g John wehs hemajkam ha ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu. T wabshaba am wo i e chehgi g Jiosh kownaltalig ith thahm jewed. T hahawa chum hems g si pi ha'ichukam Jiosh ab hiwigtham ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk mo hegai John.
Mu'i hemajkam, chum wa g pi ap hemajkam, o am i wahpk Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab i amjed mat g John ab i ahgahi g ha'ichu e-ahga.
Wehsijj g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam o am ahgachug mat wo e chehgi g Jiosh kownaltalig. K hegai t-chehanig mat g Mosesbad ab bei Jiosh t amjed hab wa'ap tashogith mat wo e chehgi.

Neh, heki ash hu si ha mihshmath hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Elijah. K g Jiosh o'ohana hab chu'ig matsh hema ep wo i wuhshani k hab wo masmak mash wa hegai. Pegih, ihtha John o d hegai mat an wo i wuhsh.
Neh, am g wo s-ap i a'amichuth ihtha.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Hegam mat pi ab hu wohog el g John k pi ab hu ni-bei o hab masma pi ta wepoma mo g a'al. Neh, tp hems am wo chichwith g a'al ch hab wo ha ah,
‘Am att em-gehgeth g e hohontam ha-piastakaj. Kumt pi e waila. Am att nei g muhki ne'i. Kumt pi sha'i shoshani.’
Ith ani hab ahg mat g John ab i wuhshani k pi ih'e g nawait ch mu'ikko pi e gegosith e ho'ige'ithahunch Jiosh wui. K mu'ijj hab kaij mo g jiawul an u'ukch g chegitoithaj.

Nt ahni ia jiwia Jiosh si Kehsha k wabsh chum hedai ha wehm ni-gegosith. K mu'ijj hab kaij mani s-banma ch s-i'ithag ch d ha-nawoj g s-ta keke'ithamakam lial ha kowlanttham ch hegam mo pi ap oith g t-chehanig. Neh, bo masma pi ta wepoma ch im hu hab wabsh i juh g Jiosh amichuthadag. K wabshaba hegam mo ab s-wohochuth g wohokam am chehgithch mo d wohokam.”
Mu'i kihhim ed ad wa am hab junihim g s-hasig ha'ichu g Jesus. D eda mu'ijj pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi ab kahk. D g Jesus si s-ha keh'ith

ch ab kaij, “Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu ant am hab juh Korasin ch Bethsaida kihhim ch ed. Kutki eda muijj amai pi ab hu ni-wohochuth k heg hekaj ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag ge'e lothaita tash ch ed. Hegam mo am kih Tyre ch Sidon t am ch pi ge'e mahch ab amjed g Jiosh at pi am hu hugkam wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Tp hems ab wo i e sho'igchuth k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi matp wo nei ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu.

Capernaum t am hemajkam o ab si e haschuth. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu wo shul Jiawul kih ed. Hegam mash wa am kih Sodombad t am at gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi matp wo nei ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu. Kut pi wo chum padch g ha-kihhim.
Ihtham at pi am hu hugkam wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mat g Capernaum t am hemajkam mat hekith wo e ai g ge'e lothaita.”

D g Jesus am hahawa e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg Jiosh, thap kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. K hab d m-elitha mat pi hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo s-amich g ha'ichu m-ahga. E o ehstokch am ha wehhejed g s-chu a'amichuththam ch ha'ichu s-mahchim. Kup wabshaba am ha chehgith ihtham mo ha'ichu s-mahchimk hab masma mo g a'al. Ni heg hekaj ab si m-ho'ige'ith.”

D hab ep kaij ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Ni-ohg at wehs ha'ichu ab ni-mah. Pi o hedai s-ni-mahch ch heg wa'i ni-ohg s-ni-mahch. K pi hedai mahch g ni-ohg. Ni ahni wa'i s-mahch ch hegam ehp mani hedai i ha wui tashogith.
“Ab g wo i e thagito ni-wui wehsijj ahpim mam d gewpkokam. Kunt ahni ab wo i em-mah g ulinihogig.

Pi o hasig g ni-himthag ch pi wechima wo i em-mohto'i ha'ichu. Si ani s-hemajima ch ab wabsh ni-sho'igchuth. Kumt ab ni-amjed wo s-mahch k wo e ulinihogithath. Hegai mant ab hehe'ejel wo em-mohto'i at wo s-hawkk nant pi am wo i em-wehmajk hab sha masma matt wo t-makodathch g yehwakaj.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
Kuchd am hu hebai hihim t-mihshmetha tash ed. K am eshas g pilkani wohg huhugith an. Kutt bihugk k hekaj ab ha wohni g pilkani ch i mohon ch ko'a.
Kudki t-neith hegam Palasi ch hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Neh'e, melchkwua o g t-chehanig mo ith hab wua mihshmetha tash ch ed.”
D g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Bo wabsh masma hab e wua matsh wa g Davidbad. Pi amtki chegitoi matsh heg has e juh am si i bihugimk. Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana

matsh am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ui g pahn k huh hegam ha wehm mash am wehmaj. K d hegai pahn mo am e to'aw k ch hegam d wa'i ha-wuikam papal. T eda hemho wa am hab e juh. K heg hekaj am wa s-ap'e.
“Am g ep wo oithahim mo g papal am hab junihim g e-chikpan ge'e cheopi ch ed mihshmetha tash ed. K eda g Jiosh pi ha mohto'ith g chu'ichig no pi hemho wa am hab junihim g e-chikpan ge'e cheopi ch ed.
Kuni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g ge'e cheopi.

“An o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: S-ap am hab wua g iagchulitha ab ni-wui. K wabshaba ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mamt wo s-hehemajimak. Neh, pi amt ab hu wo ha mohto'i g chu'ichig hegam mo pi d chu'ijkam mamtp woho wo s-amichuthath ihtha.
Pi am amichuth mani ahni d Jiosh si Kehsha ch gewkthag am thahm g mihshmetha tash.”
D am ha thagito g Jesus. Kuchd gm hu hihi hema wui g cheopi.
D am hema thaha g o'othham mad g nowij mahnikodag. D am ha'i g o'othham ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk g Jesus ch ab kakke, “No hiwgithas am t-chehanig ed mamt wo ha thoaj mihshmetha tash ed?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Matp hems hema g em-kahwaliga am wo gei wag ch ed mihshmetha tash ed. Namt hig pi wo chikpan k wo i wuhshath?
O'othham o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g kahwal. Pegih, k g t-chehanig am t-hiwgith matt am hema wo i wehmt mihshmetha tash ed.”
Neh, bad kaij ch hab hahawa ahg g mahnikokam, “Ab g si i shelin g e-nowi.” Kud am wabsh i chum shelin k am wa'i hekaj ap'et.
D amjed gm hu hihi g Palasi k e wehm a'aga mat has hig masma wo mua g Jesus.
D am i kah g Jesus mash am s-mu'amk k gm hu hih ab amjed amai. Kud mu'i hemajkam am i oi. D wehs ha thothaj g kok'otham
ab si ha chehanich mat pi hedai ha'ichu wo ahgithath ab amjed.
Neh, bad wa masma hab e juh hegai matki g Isaiabad heki hu wa'i o'oha matsh hab wo e juh. O'ohanaj o hab chu'ig mash g Jiosh an a'aga g si e-kehsha ch hab kaij:
Ith o d si ni-Kehsha mat d wo ni-pionagk. Ab ani si tatchua. K si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma. Ab ant wo mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam ni-Gewkthag. Kut am wo ha ahgi g wehs hemajkam mant s-ap wo ha a'appe.
Pi at wo ha ne'owinath ch pi wo hihnkath ch pi wo s-kaitham amogath am kahya ch ed.
T wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat chum alo pi wo e nako hab masma mamtp hems ahpim wo tho'ibia g e-e'es mo i gehsim. Am at wo ha gewkathch am hugkam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam.
T wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam ab ab wo i e gewpkai.
D ha'i g hemajkam am hema u'apa g o'othham Jesus wui. Kudki ith pi neath ch pi ha neok nadki pi g jiawul an u'ukch. D g Jesus thoaj ihtha o'othham. D hahawa e nako mad neok k ep ha'ichu neith.
D g mu'i hemajkam ab si has i el ihtha k hab kaij, “Shahag wepo mo ith d hegai Davidbad amjedkam mach ab nenida.”
D am i ha kah hegam Palasi k hab kaij, “Moki g jijawul ha-ge'ejig ab mahkch g gewkthag. Kuki heg hekaj gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”

D g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am chegito ch hab kaij ab ha wui. “S-mahch am mat g o'othham wo padch g hejel e-jewedga o g hejel e-kihhim mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia. T g e-wehm kihkam hab wa'ap wo padch g hejel e-kihthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
Pegih, t has hig masma g ge Jiawul pi wo padch g hejel e-kownaltalig matp ab wo sha ni-mah g gewkthag mant am wo i ha wuwhas g piongaj.

Neh, hegam mo ab si em-wecho e mashcham o hab wa'ap i ha wuwhasith g jijawul. Kum eda pi hab masma hab ha elith mo g Jiawul ab ha mahkch g gewkthag. Pegih, ith o am wohokamchuth mo pi woho hegai mam hab chum elith.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab ni-mahkch ihtha gewkthag mani hekaj gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul. K ith am wohokamchuth mat heki hu in i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig em-shahgith.
“Neh, wohppo'ith ani g ge Jiawul hegam mo an ha u'ukch. Kum s-mahch mat pi hedai wo e nako mas am hu wabsh wo wah hema kih ed mat wo s-ha'ahamak k am wo ui g enigaj, heg hi wa matp wehpeg wo wulsh.
“Hegai matp hedai pi ab hu wo i ni-wehmajk o ab ni-wui kehk ch wabsh ha gantan hegam mani s-ha tho'ibiamk.
Wehs o gm hu hab i junihog g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g Jiosh. K wabshaba si ge'ej g em-chu'ichig mamtp ab wo has ah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T g Jiosh pi hekith gm hu hab wo i juh.
Im at hu hab wo i juh g Jiosh g chu'ichigaj hegai mat ab wo has ni-ah ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k wabshaba pi hekith gm hu hab wo i juh g chu'ichigaj hegai mat wo has ah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
“Mt wo s-mai mas hedai d s-ap'ekam o'othham hab masma mamt wo s-mai mas s-kehgaj g bahithkam uhs. S-kehg uhs at wo s-kehg bahithagt. T g pi kehg uhs wo pi kehg bahithagt.
Ahpim Palasi am hab sha masma mam d kohk'oi ch pi wo sha'i e nako mams s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo chei nam pi d pi ap'ekam ch hemho wa am hab wo chei mo haschu am hab i chu'ig em-ihbthag ed.

S-kehg ha'ichu o am hab chu'ig ihbthaj ed g s-ap'ekam o'othham. Kut heg s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo kaijjith. K pi kehg ha'ichu am hab chu'ig ihbthaj ed g pi ap'ekam o'othham. Kut heg pi kehg ha'ichu hab wo kaijjith.

“Ith ant hab wo chei mat hemho wa wehs ha'ichu am wo mahsko e wua lothaita tash ch ed mam haschu has i kaij ith thahm jewed. Jiosh at wo hekaj g hejel em-ne'oki mat wo em-lothai, chum hems g s-pehegi em-ne'oki.”
D am ha'i ha'ichug g chehanig t-mashchamtham ch Palasi ch hab ahg g Jesus. “Ha mashchamtham, ab g t-chehgith g s-hasig ha'ichukaj maptp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Si o hig woho pi ap'e ch mehk ab amjed g Jiosh hegam mat pi ab hu wo ni-hiwgam k ho'ip nei g s-hasig ha'ichu. Heg ant ab wo wa'i ha chehgi mant am oithk hab wo ni-juh hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Jonah.
Ith ash wa waik tash oitham am ha'ichug ge'e watopi wohk ed. Neh, nt hab wa masma waik tash oitham am wo kahchk hiha'ini ch ed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.

“Jonabad ash wa am ha ahgith g Ninevah t am hemajkam g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kutsh wa gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k hab pi ab hu wo e chu'ichigch ge'e lothaita tash ch ed. Ni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g Jonabad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chu'ichig lothaita tash ed.

“Mehkjed atsh ab i hih g uwi kownal ab Sheba jewed t amjed matsh ab wo kaiha g Solomonbad ha'ichu mahchig. Ni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g Solomonbad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chu'ichig lothaita tash ed.”

Kud hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems g jiawul an wo hema u'ukch g o'othham k wabsh wo thagito mat am hebai ep wo e ul. Kut hegai o'othham wo i chum kegch g e-thoakag. T wabshaba g jiawul pi hebai wo chehg.
K hekaj hab wo i e ah, ‘Mo hig woho d ni-kih hegai o'othham. Nt hig am uhpam wo hih wui.’ Kut wa woho am wo uhpam him k wo cheh mo am wabsh jeg ch si kegchuthas ch hehosimhunas.

T am haha wo him k wewa'ak ep wo ha u'apa g jijawul. T ihtham ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek ch am wehmaj wo i chiwia. T ihtha o'othham ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek mo wa ga hu i heki hu. Neh, bat wa masma hab wo e juh hegam mat pi gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”
Am ad wabsh kia ha wui neok g hemajkam g Jesus. Kud am haha wabsh thatha g je'ej ch wepngaj s-neithamk. D wabshaba si mu'ij g hemajkam an wehgaj. Kud heg hekaj gm hu wabsh mehk gegok.
D hema hegam mo an wehgaj gegok g Jesus hab kaij ab wui, “M-je'e ch m-wepnag ash am hu gegok ch s-m-neithamk.”
D g Jesus hab ahg, “Neh, ihtham mo ab ni-kaiham o heg wa wepo mo d ni-je'e ch ni-wepnag.
Hegam mat hab wo junihith g ni-ohg Jiosh tatchui o hab masma mo d ni-wepnag ch ni-je'e.”
Heg wa'i tash ed achd gm hu hihi Galilee Kahchki wui. D am i chum thahiwua g Jesus mat wo t-mashcha.
Kud wabshaba sha'i mu'i hemajkam an e hemapai wehgaj. D heg hekaj gn hu i chesh g Jesus wahlko ch ed k an thahiwua k amjed ha mashcham. D g hemajkam an gegok shuhthagi koa an ch amjed ab kaiham.

Kud mu'i ha'ichu ha tashogith g wepogitha ahgakaj ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig. Ith o d ha'ichu ahgaj mo hab kaij: “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig wepogithch mat hema an i chum gantad g e-kaichka e-oith ed.
T ha'i gn hu shul wohg ch ed. T g u'uwhig am thatha k ko'ito.
T ha'i gn hu shul waw t ab mo pi ge'ej g jewed k ab ha hekaj hi wa chum i wuhsh no pi pi an hu juhk g jewed.
T ab i chesh g tash. Kut wabsh gaksh no ge mehk tatk.
T ha'i gn hu shul sha'i ch ed. Kut g sha'i ab i ge'ege k ha koktha g ha'ichu esha.
T wabshaba hegam mat an s-ap shul moihuna ch ed an wuhshani k mu'i ab kait. Ha'i at siant ab kait ch ha'i chuhthpo wehst-mahm ch ha'i waikko wehst-mahm.”
Kud hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus. “Neh, am g wo s-ap i a'amichuth ihtha.”
D am hahawa i e hejelko. Kuchd am wui hihim k ab kakke mas haschu ahgch pi ta amichutham ha mashcham g ha'ichu wepogithakaj.

D hab kaij, “Nt wo em-ahgi mo has d ahga no pi g Jiosh em-hiwgith mamt wo s-mai mo haschu hemu am maskogith ab amjed g e-kownaltalig. Ni wabshaba heg wa'i ha ahgith ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuthamk. T hab pi wo amich ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Hegam mat s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag at ba'ich ep wo i nei. T hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj wabsh wo heb hu wua.
Heg ani hekaj g ha'ichu wepogithakaj ha'ichu ha ahgith: Mat pi wo amich, chum as wo ha'ichu neith k wo ha'ichu kah
K hekaj am wohokamchuth hegai mo an hab chu'ig Isaiabad o'ohana ed mash wa hab kaij Jiosh. Bo chu'ig: Chum am hekith ab kah g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch ab neithchug g ni-ap'echutha ch wabsh pi amichuth

no pi g em-chegitoithag wabsh s-kohmagi. Heg o wa wepo mamt am si ha kuhkp g e-wuhpui ch e-nahnk mamt pi wo neith k pi wo kah k pi wo amich nam pi pi e nohnogithamk ab ni-wui. Kunt heg hekaj pi am hu wo i em-ap'ech. Neh, bo chu'i g g Jiosh o'ohana.
Kum eda ahpim pi hab sha'i mahs mo hegam mash pi amichuth. Jiosh o ab s-em-ho'ige'ith. Kum s-ap s-amichuth mam haschu i neith ch kah.

Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mo mu'ijj g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch Jiosh hemajkamga chum si tatchua mat wo neith k wo kah ihtha mam haschu i neith ch kah ithani. K wa wabshaba pi hab mahs am ha wehhejed.

“Am ant haha wo em-ahgi mani haschu chum em-mashcham ith hekaj ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g ha'ichu eshtham. Heg kaichka ani wepogith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ith o am e gantan ha shahgith g hemajkam hab masma mo g ha'ichu kai.
K eda ha'i pi amichuth no pi g ha-i'ibthag s-kawpk hab sha masma mo g wohg. K g Jiawul am wabsh s-pehegi ha wohppo'ith mo haschu i kah.
“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. K ihtham si s-hohho'ith ch kah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga
ch wabshaba pi wihnam ab hu u'ukch ch am hi wa he'es wo i s-chegitokahimch. T oi wa g kudutadag ab ha wui wo i hih. Kumt wo ha sho'igch ith hekaj Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T ha hekaj wabsh wo ta'i i shul.
“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai s-sha'ig. K am ha sha'ijithch g pihk ha-elithadag ch s-ha-kaisthag. Kut pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk am Jiosh wehhejed.

“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-moik hab sha masma mo g moihuna. Ihtham at wo s-amich g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo ahgachugath matp hems ha'i siant ab ep wo ha ba'iha k atp hems ha'i chuhthpo wehst-mahm k ha'i g waikko wehst-mahm ab ep wo ha ba'iha.”
Jesus ad am hema ep ha ahgi g hemajkam g ha'ichu wepogitha hab kaijch, “Am ant ba'ichu ep wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig wepogithch mat hema ei g s-kehg kai e-oith ed.
T am hu hebai haha wabsh hema jiwia g obgaj chuhug ch ed mo wehsijj kohksh k g sha'i kai am ei ha shahgith g pilkani k gm hu hahawa ep hih.
Kut am i wuhsh g e'es k ab i mudatht. T am hahawa s-masma i wuhsh g sha'i.
“K hab kaij g eshtham pionag, ‘S hebai amjed i wuhsh g sha'i mapt wa eda t-mah g s-kehg kaichka.’
“K hab kaij am ha wui, ‘Ni-obga at hab juh ihtha.’ “K hab hahawa ep kaij g piongaj, ‘Natt am wo i ha huhpsh hegam sha'i?’
“K hab ha ahg, ‘Pia'a. Mt wo am hu wabsh g pilkani ha huhpsh.

Am g wabsh wo hiwgith mat am e wehm wo wuwha. T ab wo e ai mat wo e hih. Kunt hab haha wo ha ahgi g hihktham mat g sha'i wehpeg am wo ha huhpsh k am wo i hemapath k gd hu wo mehith k am haha wo i hemapai g pilkani k gd hu wo i ba'iha.’ Neh, bo kaij g ha-ahmo.”
D am hema ep ah g ha'ichu wepogitha g Jesus hab kaijch. “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig am wepogithch g ha'ichu kai.

Neh, heg am e'esha mo al chumaj ch oi wa am wo wuhshani k ha'as wo i ge'etha mo g s-ehheg uhs. Tp hems g u'uwhig an ab wo koksht. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo ge'e i ge'etha g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as al chum am wo shonwua.”

D am hema ep ah g ha'ichu wepogitha g Jesus hab kaijch, “Jiosh kownaltalig o hab wa'ap wepogithas mo g jewajithakud. Heg amt wo be k am wo wah wehnathk g chu'i k am he'es wo i thai. T wo chehmo g wahga mat wehs am wo i kopothka. Pegih, t g Jiosh kownaltalig hab wa masma wo chehmo g jewed.”
Jesus ad haschu i ha ahgith g hemajkam ch heg wa'i hekaj ha'ichu wepogitha ahga.

Heki atki hu wa'i o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mat ith am hab wo wa e juh. K hab chu'ig g o'ohanaj: Ha'ichu wepogitha ant wo hekaj k am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam hegai mo pi hekith sha'i s-e mahch ga hu i shohshonk amjed.
D g Jesus gm hu ha thagito g hemajkam k gd hu i wah kih ch ed. Kuchd am wehmaj hihim k ab hahawa kakke mas has d ahga hegai wepogitha ahga ab amjed g sha'i mo am t-ahgith.
D hab kaij, “Heg ani wepogithas mo g ha'ichu eshtham ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.

K g oithag d ihtha jewed. K g s-kehg kai d hegam mat wo e tho'ibia k am wo ha'ichugk Jiosh kownaltalig ed. K g ni-obga d jijawul ha-ge'ejig. K g eshaj d hegam mat pi wo e tho'ibia. Hihka tash o d lothaita tash. K hegam mat hab wo juh g hihka d anghil.
“Hegai sha'i mehiththa o hab d ahga mat g pi ap hehemajkam gm hu wo i e shul jiawul kih ed mat hekith wo i e ai g lothaita tash.
Am ant wo i ha chuhcha g anghil ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut ab wo i hihi jewed wui k gm hu hab wo i juh hegai matp haschu am wo i em-wua pi ap'ekam ch ed
k gm hu wo ha shul g pi ap chu'ijkam mei ch ed. T ihtham wo si shoanith ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'isch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath.
T am hahawa wo si tondath g s-ap'ekam hemajkam e-ohg Jiosh kownaltalig ed. Neh, am g wo i a'amichuth ihtha ahpim mam kah!”

D am hema ep ah g Jesus g ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hab kaijch, “Jiosh kownaltalig o heg wepogithas mo g s-namkig ha'ichu mat am hema ehsto oithag ch ed k hahawa muh. T am hema haha wabsh chehg k am wabsh uhpam i ma'ishp k si s-hehgig ch am i wehs gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga k am hahawa uhpam ep him k wabsh wehs ha nolawt ihtha oithag.”

Kud hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Bamt masma wo s-behim g Jiosh kownaltalig mat g s-namkig hohothai nolawttham wo s-behim hegai mat wehs ha ba'ich wo i s-kehgajk. Heg at wehs wo gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga mat wo e nakog k wo ha nolawt hegai s-namkigchu.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig am wepogithch g waptopi u'ikud chuagia. Heg at am wo wua g waptopi ha u'utham shuhthagi ch ed. T am wo e ba'iha g nahnko mahs waptopi.
Kut am wo i wanchkwua shuhthagi hugith an k am wo thahiwua k wo i ha gawulkath k hegam wo e to'i mo s-kehgaj k g pi kehg waptopi gm hu wo nehnich.
Bat wo wa masmak mat hekith wo i e ai g lothaita tash. Anghil at am wo a'ai hihim k am wo i ha gawulkai g pi ap'ekam hemajkam
k gd hu wo ha shul mei ch ed. T ihtham wo si shoanith ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath.”
D g Jesus ab hahawa t-kakke, “Namt am wa s-amich wehs ihtha?” Kuchd hab kaij, “Heu'u.”
D hab hahawa ep kaij ab t-wui, “Pegih, mt hahawa pi wabsh g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana wo ha mashchamath ch wabshaba ith wehnathk ep wo ha mashchamath wechij mashchama ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
D g Jesus am i ha'asa ah ihtham ha'ichu wepogitha ahga.

Kuchd gm hu hihi Nazareth wui mo am d si kihkam. D g Jesus am ha'ichu ha mashcham ha-cheopi ed. D si has elith hegam mo am kah ch ab wabsh a'ai i e kakke. “Kus hebai mai wehs ihtha amichuthadag ch ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu.
No hig pi woho d alithaj hegai t-nawojbad mo d huk chikpantham? No hig pi g Mary d je'ej ch g wepngaj d James ch Joses ch Simon ch Jude.
Ia o wa kih g u'uwigaj. Kus hebai mai wehs ihtha.”

Neh, bad kaij ch wabsh pi ha'ichuch. D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at chum hebai ab wo si has e elithath. T wabshaba g si kih'amkam o'othham ch wehmaj kihkam pi ab hu has wo elithath.”
Neh, bad kaij ch pi mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu hab juh amai no pi pi ab hu wohochuth ihtham mas d Jiosh si Kehsha.
D eda am hahasko ha'i d ha-kokownalig g Tutuligo ch d gi'ik. D ihtham am hema d kownal Galilee chekshani ch ed ch hab chehgig Herod. Kumd eda wehsko a'aga g Jesus.
Kush ith hab ha ahgith g e-haha'ichuga, “Heg oki d hegai mo wa ha pahl wapkonahim ch hab chehgig John. Mua ant. Kutki wabshaba uhpam e chegito k hekaj hab e nakog mat hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu.”

Herod atsh wa an bei g John k wulshp k gd hu si kuh am wehhejed g e-hohnig. Ith ash hab chehgig Herodias ch ash d chum hohnigaj g Herod wehnag. Kush heg hab chehgig Philip. Tsh g Herod ehs g hohnigaj.
Sh amjed g John chum hekith hab a a'aga. “Mo pi sha'i hiwgithas maps g e-wehnag hohnig wo ehs.” Kush g Herodias heg hekaj ahgith g Herod mat gd hu wo si kuh.
Tsh g Herod chum s-mu'am nash pi am ahg g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. K wabshaba g Tutuligo hab kaij mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kush s-ha ehbith ch hekaj pi mua.
Kutsh am i e ai g Herod mahsithag. Sh ge'e piastchuth. Tsh g Herodias uwi mad am e waila ha tahgio. Tsh g Herod si s-hohho'i ihtha
k wehs ha kaichuthch si s-kaitham hab kaij mat hemho wa wo mah mat haschu ab wo i tai.
Sh g je'ej hab ahg mat hab wo chei mat ab wo mah g mo'oj g John am hoas-ha'a ch ed thahshk. Tsh wa woho heg ab tai.
Kutsh si pi ap e taht g kownal. Sh wabshaba wehsijj kah mo has i kaij. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas pi am hu hab wo juh
k am hahawa hema cheha g shonthal mat an wo him k wo shonch g John mo'o.
Tsh wa woho hab e juh k am hahawa u'apa g mo'oj am hoas-ha'a ch ed thahshch k ab mah ihtha uwi. Kut ihtha gd hu hahawa epai mah g e-je'e.
Kutsh am hahawa thatha hegam mad ab si wecho e mashcham g John k am bei g honshpadaj k gd hu chehg k am hahawa hihim k gd hu ahgith g Jesus.
D am i kah g Jesus mamt mua g John k am hahawa gm hu hejelko s-himimk. Kuchd an thadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k gm hu aigo i chehchsh ha'abjed. Dki wabshaba kah g hemajkam k gn hu i bihbij wabsh hihimk.
Kuchd am thatha k am wabsh i chum huhud. D eda mu'ijj am heki hu ha'ichug g hemajkam. D g Jesus si i s-ha ho'ige'ith k ha thothaj g kok'otham.

D gm hu si i juh. Kuchd am wui thatha g Jesus k hab chum ahg. “Neh, mehk at wa'i juh. K eda ia hu wabsh si jegko. Am g ha ahgith g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi kihhim wui k wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi mat wo huh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Ahpim amt wo ha'ichu ha mah mat wo huh.”
Kuchd hab kaij ab wui, “Pi ach ge'e ha'ichu edgith. Al hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi ach am to'akch.”
D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wo i u'uka'i.” Kud am e u'apa.

D am hahawa ha cheha g hemajkam mat am wo thadhaiwua washai ch ed. Kud am thadhaiwua. Kud am ui ihtha hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi k am e thahm i nen k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahain k ab t-mah. Kuchd gm hu a'ai ha mahkhi g hemajkam.
Kuchd wehsijj hug k kokwoth. Kuchd ahchim chuhchaij an hahawa i u'ihim k u'apa g wihpi'ithaj mat am hu'i gamai gohk hoha wo ha shuhshuth.
Kuchd am hu d i hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'ijj g u'uwi ch a'al ehp.
D am hahawa t-ahgi g Jesus matt gm hu aigo wo hihi. Tsh heg am wo wi'i k am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi e-kihki wui. Kuchd an i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu hihi.
D g Jesus am ha thagito g hemajkam. Kud gm hu himto. D am hahawa hejel i chesh kawulk thahm k am e ho'ige'ithahu. D am i hud. D am wabsh kia hejel ha'ichug.
D g t-wahlko gm hu si eda i cheka g shuhthagi. Kud g hewel ab si s-gewkam meh ab t-wui. D g shuhthagi to'otonk am si a'ai hab t-wua wehs s-chuhugam oithk.
Kud koi mahsi. D ab hema him t-wui an wabsh shuhthagi thahm.
Kuchd ab i neithok si s-ehbeni ch si hihnk ch hab kaij mo d wabsh kok'oi.
D ab hahawa si t-wui neok ch d Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g wo sha'i ni-ehbenith. Thani ahni. Mt oi wo s-ap e taht.”
Kud g Peter si s-kaitham hab kaij ab wui, “Ni-kownalig, maptp d wo ahpik ch ab wo i ni-wai. Nt ab wo i hih m-wui an wabsh shuhthagi thahm.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Oi g ab i hihm.” D wa woho ab i hud wahlko t-amjed k am wui i hih shuhthagi thahm.
D wabshaba am wabsh si s-gewkam hewed. D g Peter si s-ehbenith k gm hu wabsh i wachumkahi shuhthagi ch ed k ab si e sho'igchuth k hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, ni-tho'ibiani.”
D ha hekaj am i wuhshath g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “Pi apki ab hu si ni-hiwig.”
D gd hu hahawa e wehm i chehchsh wahlko ch ed. D am wa'i hekaj huhug g hewel.
Kuchd ab hahawa si has elith ch ab ihm g Jesus ch hab kaij ab wui, “Woho apki d Jiosh alithag.”
Ga achd hu aigo i chehchsh k ab thatha Gennesaret t am.
Kud g hemajkam s-amich g Jesus k hekaj ab i ha wai g kok'otham wehsko an heg oithk chekshani. Md ha u'apa Jesus wui
k ab si e sho'igchuth k ab ahgith mat chum hems wabsh g kahbaj hugithag an wo taht. Kud s-ap ha thotha mad hedai an i taht.
D am ha'i thatha g Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ab Jerusalem t amjed k ab kakke g Jesus hab kaijch,
“K haschu ahgch g m-pionag pi ab hu wohog elith g ha'ichu ha-mashchamadag g kekelibad? Neh, e o gegosith pi am hu t-himthag oithch ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “M ahpim haschu ahgch pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh chehanig ch wabsh g hejel e-himthag am hab junihim?
Ith o d chehanigaj g Jiosh mo hab chu'ig: Ab g si has wo i ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e, ch ith ehp, Mat hemho wo wa e muhkith hegai mat hedai wo sha s-ko'okam has ah g e-jehj.
Kum eda ahpim ha mashcham mat pi ab hu has wo ha elithath ch ab ha wui hab wo chei, ‘Mah ant g Jiosh hegai mat haschu ab d wo i chum em-wuikamk.’
Kum hab masma im hu hab wabsh i wua g Jiosh ne'oki ch am ha mashcham hegai mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi.
Bam wabsh s-e junimk mam ab has elith g Jiosh. Kuki wabshaba g Jiosh hab em-ahg ch hab kaij ihtha matki g Isaiabad an o'oha:
Ha'i ihtham mo d chum ni-hemajkamga o hab kaij mo ab si has ni-elith ch ab ni-ihm. K wabshaba g ha-i'ibthag si s-kawpk ch si mehk ab ni-amjed.
Pi o sha'i wohom ab has ni-elith no pi wabsh g hemajkam ha-chehanig ha mashcham hab chum masma mo d ni-chehanig.”
D g Jesus ab hahawa i ha wai g hemajkam k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab g wo ni-kaiham k wo s-amich.
Pi at im hu hab wo i em-juh g Jiosh heg hekaj mamt haschu wo huh k wabshaba im hu hab wo i em-juh heg hekaj pi kehg em-chegitoithag.”
Kuchd am thatha wui ahchim k hab kaij, “Nap s-mahch mat si e taht g Palasi heg hekaj map hab kaij?”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g has wo e tahtkkath ab ha amjed. Tho chum em-wanimedtham ch eda hab sha masma mo d pi neneatham ch chum ha wanimed g ha'i ep pi neneatham ch atp hems am wabsh ha wehm wo i shul hiktani ch ed. Ni-ohg Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i ha juh hab sha masma mamt wo huhpsh k gm hu wo nehnich g ha'ichu wuhshthag am e-esha ed.”
D g Peter ab neok ch hab kaij, “Am g t-ahgith maps haschu tashogith ch hab kaij mat pi im hu hab wo i t-juh g Jiosh heg hekaj matt haschu wo huh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap pi koi sha'i amich hegai mani em-ahgith.
Pi at im hu hab wo i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh mamtp haschu wo huh.
Heg at im hu hab wabsh wo i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh mat wo pi ap'ek g em-chegitoi.

Heg at hab wo em-juh mamt hab wo juh g ha'ichu pi ap'ekam. Neh, mtp hems wo ha mua o wo ha ehs g ha-wehm kihkam o hab wo juh g s-tohntom ha'ichu o wo ha'ichu ha ehs o wo ha'ichu ha iattogi ab hema i ep amjed o wo pi ap neo.
Ith o d hegai mat im hu hab wo i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Pi at heg im hu hab wo i em-juh mamt pi am hu ha-chehanig oithk wo wapko g e-nohnhoi k haha wo e gegos.”
Kuchd gm hu hahawa hihi Syria jewed wui k am miabi g Tyre ch Sidon kihhim.

D am hema d uwi ch pi d t-wehm o'othham ch am t-wui jiwia k hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “S-ap'ekam ni-kownalig mapsh d Davidbad amjedkam, ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith. Ni-chehiaga o g jiawul an u'ukch ch si sho'igchuth.”
D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu has sha'i kaij wui. Kuchd ab si ahgith mat hig wo cheha mat gm hu wo hih no pi an t-oithahim ch si s-nakosig.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui ihtha uwi, “Heg o d wa'i ni-chikpan ithani mant wo i ha wehmt g Tutuligo hemajkam.”
D ab ha hekaj i gei wecho ihtha uwi k hab kaij, “Am g hig i ni-wehmt.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at wo wa wepok mamt ab wo ha mah g gogogs g ha-chechmait g a'al.”
D hab kaij hegai uwi, “Woho o wa. T wabshaba chum hems g gogogs am wo huh g a'al ha-ha'ichu hugi hahainig. Kunt ahni hab wa masma wo si s-ap ni-taht mapt ith am hab wo al i ni-juni.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, m-ne'oki o am chehgith map ab si ni-hiwig. T heg hekaj am hab wo e juh ihtha map ab ni-tahni.” Kutsh am wa'i hekaj thoa hegai chehiagaj.
Amjed achd gm hu hahawa ep hihi Galilee shuhthagi babsho. D g Jesus am i chesh kawulk thahm.
Kud mu'ijj am thatha g hemajkam k am ha u'apa g pi hihimithkam ch pi neneatham ch pi neneokthan ch mu'i nahnko mahs kok'otham. D g Jesus ha thothaj.
Kud si has i elith g hemajkam neithok mo neneok g mumio ch g pi hihimithkam oiopo ch g momjo hahawa ab wehsig ch g pi neneatham s-ap ha'ichu neith. D wehsijj ab si has elith g Jiosh.

D g Jesus ab hahawa i t-waith k hab kaij, “Neh, waik tashkaj in o wa'i t-wehmaj ihtham hemajkam ch heki hu wa'i pi ha'ichu huh. Ni s-ha ho'ige'ith. Tp hems ha'i wo s-e chuhugi matp gm hu wo sha hihi pi ha'ichu hugok.”
