Kuchd hab kaij ab wui, “Kuchs hebai hig wo ui g ha'ichu hugi ith eda tohono jewed matt hekaj wo ha gegos g ha'akia hemajkam?”
D hab kaij g Jesus. “He'ekia at am i wih g sismito?” Chd hab kaij, “Al wewa'ak sismito ch al he'ekia chu'uchum waptopi.”
D g Jesus am hahawa ha chehani g hemajkam mat wo thadhaiwua. Kud am thadhaiwua.
D am ha ui hegam wewa'ak sismito ch waptopi k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am i hahain k ab t-mah. Kuchd an i ha mahkhi g hemajkam.

D wehsijj hug k oi wa hi si s-kokwoth chum as am hu hebai d gi'ik mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp mo d u'uwi ch a'al ch pi kuintas. Kuchd an hahawa i u'ihi g wihpi'ithaj mat am hu'i wewa'ak hoha wo ha shuhshuth.
D g Jesus am hahawa ha ahgi g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi. Kuchd gn hu thadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k gm hu aigo i chehchsh Magadan chekshani am.
D am ha'i thatha g Palasi ch Sajusi k ab ne'owin g Jesus ch ab chum si chehani mat am wo ha chehgi g si s-hasig ha'ichu matp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.

D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, s-mahch am mat has mahs tash ab wo himath ab wabsh neithch mas hebaijed hewed ch has mahs chewagi i wushke. Pegih, mt hab wa'ap wo chum s-mahchk mo haschu has e junihog ia'i ithani am neithch mo haschu hab e junihim.”

D hab ep kaij, “Si o hig woho pi ap'e ch mehk ab amjed g Jiosh hegam mat pi ab hu wo ni-hiwgam k ho'ip nei g s-hasig ha'ichu. Heg ant ab wo wa'i ha chehgi mant am oithk hab wo ni-juh hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash d Jonah.” Bad che'iok k am ha thagito k gm hu hih.
Kuchd am gahi ep i shul wahlko ch ed k ga hu aigo thatha k s-mai machdki pi ha'i u'uk g sismito.
D am wa'i hekaj mad hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Si g wo s-e nen'oithk mat pi wo em-cheawogi g ha-jewajithakud hegam Palasi ch Sajusi.”
Kuchd am si a'aga ihtha k hab kaij, “Heg oki hekaj hab kaij mattki pi ha'i u'uk g sismito.”
Kudki s-t-amichuth g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi amki koi amichuth mani he'es edgith g gewkthag ch hekaj am a'aga mach pi ha sismitoga.
Am am wa chum neith mant al hetasp sismitokaj ha gegos g hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp. Ms hu'i pi chegito mamt he'ekia i hoha an i ui g wihpi'ithaj.
Kum am wa chum neith mant al wewa'ak sismitokaj ha gegos g gi'ik mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp. Ms hu'i pi chegito mamt he'ekia i hoha an i ui g wihpi'ithaj.
Pegih, mt wo chum s-mahchk mani pi wabsh g ha'ichu hugi hab ahg ch hab kaij mamt wo s-e nen'oithath ab amjed g Palasi ch Sajusi ha-jewajithakud.”
Kuchd am hahawa i s-amich moki pi heg hab ahg jewajithakud mo hekaj e pahnt ch oki heg hab ahg Palasi ch Sajusi ha-mashchamadag.
Kuchd gm hu hahawa hihim k am i miabi g Cesaria Philippi kihhim. D g Jesus ab t-kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g wo ni-ahgith Thoh'o ni-elith g hemajkam?”
Kuchd hab kaij, “Ha'ijj o hab m-elith map d hegai Johnbad mo wa chum t-pahl wapkonahim ch ha'ijj hab kaij map d Elijabad o Jeremiabad o hema i ep kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
D ab hahawa ep t-kakke, “M ahpim hig hedai ni-elith?”
D ihtha Simon mamt hab hahawa chehch Peter hab kaij, “Thap Jiosh alithag ch d si Kehshaj g Jiosh,”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Simon, Jiosh at si s-m-ho'ige'ith k am m-chehgi mani d si Kehshaj. Pi at wabsh g hemajkam am m-chehgi.

Kupt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh k ab si ni-hiwig. Nt heg hekaj hab wo m-chehch Peter (Hothai). Neh, ith ab waw ant am wo i kei g ni-cheopiga. Bani ahgch hab kaij mat wehsijj hegam mat hab wa'ap ab wo si ni-hiwgath at d wo ni-hemajkamgak. Kut pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wo ha keshwua, chum hems g jijawul.

Kunt ab wo m-mah g gewkthag mapt wo s-mahch k ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k hab wo yahwitpi'o g ap'ethag am ha wehhejed hegam mat ab wo s-wohoch. Ab ant wo m-mah g gewkthag mapt hab wo ah mo haschu shohbithas ch haschu hiwgithas am ha wehhejed hegam mat ab wo ni-hiwgath.”
Neh, bad kaij g Jesus ch ab hahawa si t-chehani matt pi hedai wo ahgi mo heg d Jiosh si Kehsha.

D am i amjed am hahawa si tasho t-ahgi g Jesus k hab kaij, “Hemho wa ant am wo hih Jerusalem wui. Kut mu'i wo ni-sho'igch g ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham k am wo i ni-thagito mant wo ni-muhkith. T wabshaba am wo him k d wo i waik tashk amjed. Nt ab wo uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
D g Peter im hu go'olko i be k ab si s-gewkam neok wui hab kaijch. “Pi at woho wo sha'i hiwigi g Jiosh mamt hab wo m-juh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi g sha'i ni-shohbith. Tho wabsh hejel hab m-elitha ihtha. Kup ab wui kehk g Jiosh hab elitha hab masma mo g ge Jiawul.”

D hab hahawa ep kaij ab wehsijj t-wui, “Mamtp am wo s-oitham g ni'himthag k hemho wa gm hu wo thagito g hejel e-tatchui k ahni ni-tatchui hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed e sho'igchuthch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
Pi amt wo heki wua g e-thoakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni-wehhejed am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Heg at wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp hedai wo chum s-tha'ath.

Pi at ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk matp g o'othham wehs wo bei mo haschu i tatchua ith thahm jewed k wabshaba pi wo e tho'ibia. Pi o an hu ha'ichug ith thahm jewed mas heg hekaj wo e tho'ibia g o'othham.

“Jiosh at ab uhpam wo ni-mah g si ge'e gewkthag an e-kihthag ed. Kunt heg hekaj si s-tondam wo tondath ch ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm. T mu'i anghil wo i ni-wehmajk. Kunt wehs wo ha namkith g hemajkam heg hekaj mo haschu hab i junihim.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt ha'ijj an d wabsh wo kia thothakamk ch wo nei mant s-gewkam am wo chehgi g ni-kownaltalig em-shahgith.”
D am d i chuhthp tash amjed. D g Jesus ab i ha wai g Peter ch James ch John. D am wehmaj ab i chehchsh hema uhgk tho'ag t ab k atsh gn hu thatha tho'ag thahm.
Kutsh g Jesus am hahawa gawul e juh. Sh g wuhioshaj hab wa'i masma tonod mo g tash ch g wehschugaj hab masma s-tohta mo g tonlig.
Kutsh ab haha wabsh i e chehgi g Mosesbad ch Elijabad k am wehmaj neneok g Jesus.
Sh g Peter hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “T-kownalig, s-ap'e oki mach ia ha'ichug. Kutt ia waik wo ha chuhcha g al chechopi matt hekaj ab wo si has em-el ahpi ch Mosesbad ch Elijabad maptp wo tatchuath.”

Neh, sh am wabsh kia neok g Peter. Kutsh g si s-mahs chewagi ab i wuhshani k ab ehka ha thahm. Tsh g Jiosh ne'oki ab kaitha chewagi t amjed k hab kaij, “Jesus o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag. Heg amt ab wo si kaihamath.”
Kutsh si s-ehbeni hegam Peter am i kahk g ne'oki k am wabsh si kupal shul jewedo.
Tsh am hahawa jiwia g Jesus k an ha tahtam k hab kaij, “Gegokiwuio. Pi g wo sha'i e tothsith.”
Tsh am hahawa i chum nenhog. Kush heg wa'i Jesus hejel am kehk. Sh pi am hu ha'ichug hegam gohk.
Sh ab hahawa i huhudkhim tho'ag t amjed. Sh ab si ha chehani g Jesus ch hab kaij. “Pi g am hedai wo sha'i ahgith mamt haschu nei, nt ho'ip kia uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”

Kush hab kaij ihtham ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, bo chech'e hegam chehanig t-mashchamtham matsh ia wehpeg wo e maskogi g Elijabad. Tsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ia haha wo e maskogi. Pegih, t haschu ahgk pi ia wehpeg m-ba'ich e maskogi hegai Elijabad?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hema at woho wehpeg wo e maskogith k hab wo masmak mash wa g Elijabad ch wehs ha'ichu wo i ap'ech.

Kunt wo em-ahgi mat wa woho heki hu jiwia. K Wabshaba mu'ijj pi mahch mo hedai wud ch ab wui hab wabsh juh g pi ap e-tatchui. Pegih, k e aihim mat hab wa'ap wo ni-juh k wo ni-sho'igch ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kutsh am hahawa i amich ihtham moki heg hab ahg John mat wa am i shonwuich g pahl wakona.
D eda mu'i hemajkam am ha'ichug amai machd am wih. Kud am uhpam thatha hegam Jesus. D ab hema i tonwua Jesus wui
k hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ho'ige'ith g ni-sulijga. Si o pi ap mumku ch hebai am wabsh s-e chuchkagith ch mu'ikko am gegshe nahtha ch ed o am shuhthagi ch ed.
Kunt ia chum u'apa ha wui ihtham m-chuhchai. T pi e nako mas wo thoaj.”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Sho'o wa'i pi ge'ej g em-wohochuthadag. M im hu hab wabsh i si e Juhkch ab ni-amjed. Shahag wepo mant tash ia wo em-wehmajkath ch wo em-nakogath mat haha wo i ge'etha.” Bad kaij g Jesus ch hab hahawa ahg hegai o'othham. “Ab g i beka'i g e-alithag.”
D ab hahawa i bei wui. D g Jesus am si s-gewkam chehani g jiawul mat gm hu hab wo i e juh. Kud wa woho hab e juh. D am ha hekaj wabsh i thoa g ali.
Kuchd ab hahawa hejelko kakke g Jesus machs haschu ahgk ahchim pi t-nako matt gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul.

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg amt hekaj pi e nako mam pi ab hu wohochuth mat hab wo e juh. Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt wo e nakog k wabsh chum haschu hab wo juh mamt hab wo chei s-wohochuthch mat hab wo e juh. Chum at hems g ge'e tho'ag gn hu hab wo i kekiwua mamt wabsh wo ahgi s-wohochuthch mat hab wo e juh. [
T wabshaba ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu hab wa'i masma gm hu hab wo i juh mamt wo si e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui pi ha'ichu ko'athch.]”
Am achd wabsh kia oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed. D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “E o aihim mat wo ni-bei hegam mo s-ni-keh'ith k ab wo ni-thagito
mant wo ni-muhkith. T wabshaba am wo him k d wo i waik tashk amjed. Nt ab wo uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed.” Neh, kuchd wehsijj si pi ap t-taht am i kaiok ihtha.
Kuchd gd hu thatha Capernaum t am. D am hema jiwia Peter wui hegam mo an hemapath g cheopi kowlanta k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “No ha namkith g cheopi kowlanta g em-mashchamtham?”
D hab kaij g Peter. “Hemho wa,” K amjed gd hu i wah kih ch ed. D g Jesus ab ha hekaj kakke ch hab kaij. “Simon Peter, nap hab elith mat g kokownal ab wo ha'ichu ha kowlant hegam mo d ha wehm kihkam?”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Pia'a.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus. “Pegih, t heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo ni-kowlant g Jiosh.

Ch wabshaba pi tatchua machs wo ha kudu ihtham hemajkam. Kupt heg hekaj am wo hih shuhthagi wui k am wo wua g waptopi hukshpakud. Kut g si wehpeg watopi mapt wo huksh g lial ab wo kamshchith mat wo ai hegai cheopi kowlanta an ni-wehhejed ch ep m-wehhejed. Pt am wo be k hekaj wo ha namkith.”
Kuchd ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij. “Thoht d wo si s-has ha'ichuk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed?”
D eda an hema kehk g al chum ali. D g Jesus am i waith k ab t-ba'ich i kehsh
k hab kaij, “Nt wo shel em-ahgi mamt hab wa'i masma am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed mamt am gawul wo juh g e-chegitoithag k ab wabsh wo i pi e ha'ichuchuth k hab wo masmak mo ihtha al chum ali.
Hegai mat hab wo juh ihtha at d wo s-has ha'ichuk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
T hedai i s-ap ab wo i ha nei g a'al am ni-wehhejed o heg wa wepo mat ahni s-ap ab ni-nei.

“S-to'o ehbitham hab mahs am wehhejed hegai mat hema am wo i ha wanchkwua pi ap'ekam wui ihtham al a'al mo ab al ni-hiwig. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchuth k wo e muhkith mat koi hab wo juh ihtha chu'ichig.
Chum o hekith an hab e wua g pi ap'ekam jewed thahm. K hegam mo hab wua am ha'i ep ha wanchshulig pi ap'ekam wui. T g Jiosh hemho wo wa ha namkith.

“Pi at hedai wo e nako mas ab uhpam wo i wuhsh Jiawul kih amjed. Kut pi hekith wo huhug g ha-sho'igchutha amai. Heg at wo wa wepok mat am mei ch ed wo e sho'igchuthath. Mt heg hekaj am wo i e nako mamt pi am hu wo gei heg eda. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt chum hems wo heb hu wua g e-nowi o g e-tad o g e-wuhi matp hema ihtham hab wo em-juh mamt am wo gei Jiawul kih ed k pi wo bei hegai pi ha huhugetham thoakag mo g Jiosh ab em-makiog.
“Am g wo s-nen'oithk mamt pi wo s-ha keh'ithath ihtham al chu'uchumchu. Jiosh o ab si has ha elith ch am ha nuhkuthachuth g anghil. [
Ia ant jiwia jewed thahm mant wo ha tho'ibia g heb hu hihimkam. ]

“Neh, am g wo i oithahim ihtha. Mamtp hems hema ahpim siant wo kahwaligak. Kut hema wo heb hu hih. Namt hig pi woho am wo s-apko ha thagito hegam humukto gamai humukt k am wo hih tho'ag oithk k am wo i gahghi g heb hu himkam e-shoiga.
Kut woho d wo s-hehgigk mamtp wo cheh.
Bo wa masma pi sha'i tatchua g em-ohg Jiosh mat hema wo heb hu hih ihtham al chu'uchum a'al.
“Mt heg wa'i hejel wo ahgi e-wehm wohochuththam matp pi ap wo chu'i ab em-wui. Kutp hems ab s-ap wo em-kaiha. Kut ab hahawa ep wo i e hemakoch g em-chegitoithag,
Tp wabshaba pi ab hu wo em-kaiha, kumt hemako o gohk am ha wehm wo him k am wo ah g chu'ichigaj. Kut hab masma gohk o waik wo s-mahchk g chu'ichigaj mo ith hab masma an o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed.
Kutp eda wa sha pi ab hu wo em-kaiha, kumt am wo ha ahgi wehsijj hegam mam am ha wehm e mihshmath. Kutp pi ab hu wo ha kaiha ihtham, kumt haha wo thagito hab masma mo pi d em-wehm wohochuththam.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mant ab wo em-mah g gewkthag mamt hab wo ah mo haschu shohbithas ch haschu hiwgithas am ha wehhejed g ni-hemajkamga.
Jiosh at am hab wo em-juni mamt haschu ab wo tahnith e wepo hab elithch.
Kunt am wo ha'ichugk em-shahgith mamt hebai am wo i e hemapai, chum ams d wo wa'i gohkk o waikk.”
D g Peter ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, nant wewa'akko ab wabsh wo i s-ho'ige'el g ni-wehm wohochuththam matp ha'akkio hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam ab ni-wui?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt wabsh wewa'akko ab wo i s-ho'ige'el. Matp he'ekkio hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam, mt ha'akkio wo s-ho'ige'el.
Bo wa e wua g em-kownalig Jiosh ch em-tatchuith mamt am hab wa'ap wo e junihith. “Ith ant am wo em-tashogi em-ahgithch matp hems hema d wo kownalk ch am wo i ha hoa g e-pionag ha-wulshpadag,
Kumt am hema u'apa g piongaj, K ith ab ab e wulshch g mu'i mi-yohn pihsh.

Kuki ihtha pi am hu hugkam edgith g lial mat wo namkith g e-wulshpadag. T hekaj g ahmoj am ha cheha mamt wo gagda k g wehmaj kihkam ch a'aligaj ch ha'ichu enigaj ep wo ha gagda. T d wabsh wo neneholk.
“Kut ihtha ha-pionag ab i gei e-ahmo wui k ab i tahni mat ab wabsh wo i s-ho'ige'el. Kut wo wa wehs ha namkith.
T am i s-ho'ige'el g ahmoj k im hu hab i juh g wulshpadaj k thagito.
Kut am hih ihtha o'othham. “K eda hema g wehmaj pion al he'ekia pihsh ab ab e wulshch hegai mamt ab i s-ho'ige'el. Kut heg nam k g ba'ichuj be k hab si ah mat wo namkith.
“Kut ihtha wehmaj pion ab i gei wecho k ab i e sho'igchuth wui mat ab wabsh wo i nenida. Kut wo wa uhpam namkith.
“Kut wabshaba pi ab hu kaiham k wabsh ha chehani mamt gd hu wo si kuh am hugkam mat hekith wo i namkith.
“Neh, t ha'i ehp g pion si pi ap e taht neithok mat has e juh k am hihim k am ahgith g e-ahmo wehs ha'ichu.
“T g ha-ahmo ab i wai ihtha e-pionag k hab kaij ab wui, ‘Ahpi si pi amkam ni-pionag, ab ant i si s-m-ho'ige'ith k im hu hab i juh wehs hegai m-wulshpadag heg wa'i hekaj map ab si ni-tahni.
Kupt hab wa masma wo chum s-ho'ige'el g e-wehm pion mant has i masma s-m-ho'ige'el.’
Neh, bo kaij ch si bagat k gd hu si kuh am hugkam mat hekith wehs wo i namkith.
“Pegih, t hab wa masma am hab wo em-juh g ni-ohg Jiosh mamtp pi hab hu e-ihbthag amjed wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab em-wui pi ap wo chu'i.”
Am ad i ha'asa ha mashcha g Jesus k am i thagito g Galilee chekshani. Kuchd gm hu aigo hihi Jordan akimel ha'abjed k am hihim k am thatha Judea chekshani ch ed.
D mu'i hemajkam an oithahim g Jesus. Kud ha thoajith.
D am ha'i thatha g Palasi hab chum ahgk mat ab wo ha'ichu kakke k hekaj wo heki himch. K g ha-kakkei hab chu'ig, “No hiwgithas an t-chehanig ed mat g o'othham wo s-ohhoth g e-hohnig?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Ga hu i wehpeg at am ha nahto g Jiosh g cheoj ch uwi mat d wo e wehhejedkamk
k hab kaij: I'ajed at g o'othham wo ha thagito g e-ohg ch e-je'e k ab wo i wehmt g e-wehm kihkam. T ihtham d haha wo hemakok.
Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. K pi hab chum mahs mas g o'othham ab a'ai wo i ha gawulkai hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha hemakoch.”
D hab kaij g Palasi ab wui, “K wabshaba an o'ohanas t-chehanig ed matsh g o'othham wo mah g e-hohnig g ohhotha tapial k wo s-ohhoth.”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, bo chu'ig mamt wo ha mah g ohhotha tapial mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath g Jiosh ch pi wo pihk e elithath ha hekaj. K wa eda chum pi hab masma ga hu i wehpeg mat in ha nahto g Jiosh g hemajkam.
Kunt ith hab wo em-ahgi mat d wo pi ap'ekamk mamt wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo hohnt, heg hi wa mamt wo s-mai am i chum hohntk matki heki hu ha wehm wo'iwua.”
Kuchd hab kaij ab wui, “Kuki heg hekaj ba'ich i chum s-ap'e mat g o'othham pi wo ha hohnt.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi at wehsijj wo e nako hab masma, heg hi wa mat g Jiosh am wo i ha wehmt.

Ha'ijj at pi wo hohont no pi hab masma d mahsikam mo pi tatchua g hohnig ch ha'ijj d hegam mamt hab wabsh ha juh mat pi ap wo hohont. Ha'ijj o ep pi hohont heg hekaj mo g Jiosh kownaltalig ba'ich hab i elith. Kumt ith am hab wo juh mamtp wo e nako.”
Kud ha'i am ha u'apa g e-a'aliga mat ab wo ha taht g Jesus k wo e ho'ige'ithahu ha wehhejed. Kuchd chum s-ha keh'ith mo hab e wua.

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgith g a'al mat ab wo i hihi ni-wui k pi an hu wo sha'i ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s-moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni-hiwigch. Kumt hab wa'i masma am wo i wahp.”
Neh, bad kaij ch ab hahawa ha tahtam k amjed gm hu hih.
D am hu hebai am hema jiwia g wechij o'othham Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, shahchu ant am hab wo juh g s-ap'ekam mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
K hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ap ni-kakke ab amjed g s-ap'ekam. K eda heg wa'i Jiosh d s-ap'ekam. Am g hab junihith g Jiosh chehanig maptp wo tatchuath mapt wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”

D hab kaij g o'othham, “Hedai hegam chehanig?” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ihtham mo hab chu'ig: Pi g am hu ha mua'i g o'othham. Pi g am hu ha ehsithath g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha ehsithath. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha iattogithath.
Ab g si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e.
D hab kaij g o'othham, “Wehs ani am hab wa chum ha junihim ihtham chehanig. Shahchu ant hab ep wo juh?”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pegih, pt am wo him k wo gagda wehs ha'ichu map haschu i eniga k wo ha mah g namkigaj g sho'igkam k ab wo i him k wo ni-oithath maptp woho s-behimk hegai map chum e gahgith.”
Kud si pi ap e taht am i kaiok k gm hu hih no pi d sha'i si s-kais ch si s-huwith g e-kaisthag.
D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab t-wui. “Neh, nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat wo sha'i si s-hasigk mas g s-kakais am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
Mam hig hab elith mat wo e nako g ka-mihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh ho'ipad jeg ed? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g ha'ichu e-eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
Kuchd am wabsh i pi amichuth k hab kaij ab wui, “A t hedai hig wo e tho'ibia.”
D g Jesus ab si shel i t-neith k hab kaij, “Pi at wo e nako wabsh g o'othham. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo e nako mat wabsh chum haschu am hab wo juh.”
D g Peter hab kaij, “Neh'e, ahchim att wehs ha'ichu thagito k am i m-oi. Tt haschu ab wo bei heg hekaj?”

D g Jesus hab kaij ab t-wui, “Woho o wa mamt ab si i ni-oi. Kunt am wo si shel em-ahgi mant an wo thahiwua s-kehg ni-kownal thaikud ed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kumt ahpim an hab wa'ap wo thadhaiwua gamai gohk kownal thathaikud an k d wo u'usagakamk am ha thahm hegam gamai gohk thakam e-wehm Tutuligo.
Matp hedai am wo i thagito g e-kih o g e-wepnag o g e-jehj o g e-a'aliga o g e-oithag at ab wo ui siant e thahm ba'ich i mu'i k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Mu'ijj hegam mo d wehpegkam hemu at d wo si ha oithchkamk ch mu'ijj hegam mo ga hu si ha oithch hemu d wo wehpegkamk.
“Ith ant am wo em-tashogi ith hekaj mant wo ha'ichu wepogi g Jiosh kownaltalig. Heg o wepogithas mat g uhdwis oithag enigakam wabsh i si'alim am him k ha'i ha ui g o'othham mat am wo chikp oithaj ed.
T g ha-namkithadag d wo hegaik mo haschu i u'u g pion tash ab. T am ha hekaj hihim k chikp.
“T am hahawa ep hih humukt ohla ch ed. K am ha'i gegok g o'othham ch pi ha'ichu has wua.
K hab ha ahg, ‘Nt wo s-ap em-namkith mamt wo chikp am ni-oithag ed.’
Kut wa woho am chikpano ihtham. T hab wa masma hab ep e juh am i gamai gohk ohla ch ed ch waik ohla ch ed.
“K am hu d i hetasp ohla. T am hih kahya wui. K am wabsh ha'i gegok. K hab kaij ab ha wui, ‘Shahchu am ahgch wabsh heki wua g tash pi ha'ichu has wuathch?’
“K hab kaij ihtham, ‘Pi at hedai t-chikpanach.’ “K hab hahawa ep kaij ab ha wui, ‘Pegih, k am wo hihim k wo chikp am ni-oithag ed.’

“Neh, t gm hu si i juh. Kut ihtha oithag enigakam hab ah g e-pionag ha-ge'ejig, ‘Ab g i ha waith g pion k ab wo i ha namkithahi. T hegam wehpeg wo e namkith mant si ha oithch an ha ui k amjed hegam ehp mant ep ha ui k hegam ga hu si ha oithk wo e namkith mant si wehpeg an ha ui.’
“Kut hegam mat gm hu si i juhk chikp mo d i hetasp ohla ab ui g e-namkithadag ha'akia mo he'ekia u'u g pion tash ab ch amjed wehs g ha'i.
“Kut ab ha ai hegam mat wabsh i si'alim chikp. K hab e ahg mat ba'ich i mu'i wo ui g e-namkithadag. Mt wabshaba ha'akia wa ha namkith.
T ab ui g e-lialiga k babgat ab wui g e-ahmo k ab wui hab kaij,
‘Neh, hegam o'othham mapt si oithk an ha ui al hemako ohla ab chikp. Kutt ahchim ge tash oithk chikp am s-toni k ed. Kupt eda am wo ha'akia t-namkith mapt hegam.’
“K hab kaij g oithag enigakam ab wui hegai mo ha wehhejed neok, ‘Neh, ni-nawoj, pi ant sha'i em-iattogi namt pi am wa ap'ech mamt ha'akia k ab wo chikp ni-wehhejed.
Pegih, ab g wabsh wo uh'i g e-namkithadag k gm hu hihim uhpam no hig pi ab ni-ab ahni hejel mant ha'akia wo wa ha namkith hegam mant gm hu si i juhk ha ui mant ahpim he'ekia em-namkith.
Ab o ni-ab mant has masma wo hekaj g ni-lialiga. Aha nam wabsh s-ni-hehgamk mani s-hemajima?’ ”
D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh'e, t hekaj hab hegam mo gm hu si i ha oithch d wo wehpegkamk ch hegam mo d wehpegkam ga hu wo si ha oithchk.”
Am achd i t-nakog k gm hu hihi. Kud g Jesus am hejelko t-wai ahchim gamai gohk
k hab kaij, “Neh, am att wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T hegam mo s-ni-keh'ith am wo ni-thagito ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig em-mashchamtham. Kut ihtham ab wo ha'ichu ni-abch s-ni-mu'amk

k am wo ni-thagito ha wui g go'ol hemajkam. T ihtham wo nahnko ni-ahgath ch wo ni-gewittan k amjed ab wo ni-sisish kots t ab. Nt ab wo muh. T am wo him k d wo i waik tashk amjed. Nt ab wo uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed.”
D eda am t-wehmaj g ha-je'e g James ch John. D ihtham am wehmaj hihi Jesus wui ab ha'ichu s-tahnimk. D g ha-je'e ab si has elith k ab wui hab kaij matsh ab wo ha'ichu tai.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ap tatchua?” D hab kaij ihtha, “Pt hig wo i ha chuhcha ihtham gohk ni-mahmad mat am m-oithch d wo haha'ichuk mapt hekith am wo i himch g e-kownaltalig.”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi am sha'i ap mahch mam haschu ab ni-tahni. Wehpeg ant ab wo nako g ge'e sho'igthag. Kut hegam mat am ni-oithch d wo si haha'ichuk hab wa'ap wo e juh.” D hab kaij ihtham, “Pegih, tt wo t-nako.”

D hab hahawa ha ahg g Jesus, “Pegih, woho amt ab wo nako hegai hab mahs sho'igthag. K wabshaba pi ab hu ni-ab manis ahni am wo i ha chuhcha mat hedai am ni-oithch d wo haha'ichuk. Hegam at am wo i e chuhcha mat hedai i ha wehhejed am ap'ech g Jiosh.”
Kuchd ahchim ha'i babgat ab ha wui hegam gohk mad hab masma ab hejel chum e ha'ichuchuth.
D g Jesus ab hahawa wehs i t-hemapath k hab kaij ab t-wui, “S-mahch am mo g ha-maliomig s-gewkam ha chehani g e-pionag ch g ha wanimedtham am ha himchuthahim.

T wabshaba pi hab masma hab wo sha'i chum mahsk am em-shahgith. Mt wabsh si s-hemajim am wo i ha wehmtath g e-wehm wohochuththam hab sha masma mam d wabsh ha-pionag mamtp wo tatchuath mamt wo ha wanimedath.

Ahni ani hab wa masma si s-hemajim i em-wehmt ch pi ab hu ni-ha'ichuchuth em-thahm, chum anis d Jiosh si Kehsha. Ab o em-wui him g s-ko'ok namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap em-chu'ichig. Nt wabshaba ahni em-wehhejed wo nako mamt wo e wupul'o.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
Kuchd gm hu i wuwha ab Jerico t amjed. D mu'i hemajkam ab i t-oi.

D am hu hebai wohg hugith an gohk am thadha g pi neneatham o'othham. Kuchd am hihim. D am i t-kah k s-mai mo an him g Jesus k si s-kaitham hab chech'e, “Ab g si i s-t-ho'ige'ith, ahpi map d s-ap'ekam t-kownalig ch apsh d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
D hegam mo an ha wehgaj si s-ha keh'ith ch hab ha ahg mat wo pi shahmunik. D wabshaba ba'ich haha wabsh i s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-t-ho'ige'ith, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
Kud am hahawa i kekiwua g Jesus k ab i ha waith k hab kaij, “Shahchu am tatchua mant hab wo em-juni?”
D hab kaij ihtham, “Si g s-t-ho'ige'ith k ab i t-nenchuth.”
Kud si s-ha ho'ige'el g Jesus k ab ha taht ha-wuhpui ab. D ha hekaj ha'ichu s-ap neith k ab i oi.
Kuchd amjed am hihim Jerusalem wui k am ai g Olive U'us Kawulk. D heg mia kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage.
D g Jesus gohk hab ha ah g e-chuhchai, “Am g wo hihim k ga hu wo thatha kihhim t am. Kut am hema wo wulshpik g wuhlu g e-mad wehm. Mt gam wo ha wul'o.
Kumt ab wo em-kakke mams has wo juh. Kumt hab wo ha ah mani ahni d em-mashchamtham ch tatchua. Kut ab wabsh wo i ha thagito mamt ab wo i ha wanim ni-wui.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
K eda heki hu wa'i o'ohanas matsh ith am hab wo e juh. Hema atki wa an o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogitham. K g o'ohanaj hab chu'ig:
Am g wo ha ahgith g hemajkam am Jerusalem kihhim t am: Ab at wo hih g s-ap'ekam em-kownalig em-wui k ab wabsh wo si e sho'igchuthch ch hab g wechij wuhlu wo cheshajhith.
Kud am hihi ihtham gohk k am hab juh mo haschu hab ha ahg g Jesus
k am ha u'apa hegam wuplu. Kuchd an toa g t-liliwa ha ab. D an thahiwua heg an mo d wechij.
Kud mu'i hemajkam an t-wehgaj ch am i tahtdahim g e-liliwa wohg ch ed. D ha'i g wechij u'us i'ibhonig an hikkumi'ak k am to'ahim wohg oithch.

D hegam mu'i hemajkam mo an t-wehgaj hihim si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “T-tho'ibiakam! Thap amjedkamaj g t-kownaligbad David. Jiosh atki ia i m-wuhshath k ab si s-m-ho'ige'ith. Kuch ab si has elith g Jiosh.”
Kuchd am i thatha Jerusalem kihhim t am. D mu'ijj am wabsh i pi amich mo haschu has e wua k hab kaij, “Thoh'o wud hegai?”
D ha'ijj hab ep kaij, “Ith oki d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hab chehgig Jesus ch am d kihkam Nazareth t am am Galilee chekshani ch ed.”

D am i wah g Jesus kolhai ch ed mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. D eda am ha'i thadha mo am ha'ichu gagda ch ha'ichu ha nolawt cheopi miabithch. D g Jesus gm hu si ha shahmuth k g ha-thathaikud kuhkpal ha shul. D am ha'i ep thadha ch am kammialt g lial. Kud g ha-mimsa gm hu a'ai kuhkpal si ha shulig

k hab hahawa wehs ha ah, “Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni o d ni-wehhejedkam ihtha ge'e cheopi. Kut ith wui ab wo hihhimath g hemajkam mat ab wo ni-ihmath. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt wabshaba ahpim an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e-tatchui ch chum hems ha'ichu s-a'agi ha ehsith ab ha wui ha'ichu gagdach.”
Kumd am wui ha u'apa am ge'e cheopi t am hegam mo d pi neneatham ch hegam mo pi a'apkodag. Kud ha thothaj.

D g a'al am si hihnk ge'e cheopi t am ch hab kaij, “Ab ach si has elith ihtha mo d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam ch d Jiosh si Kehsha.” Kud g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham neith mo g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua ch ha kah g a'al ch sha'i si babgat

k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Shahchu ap ahgch pi ha shohbith? Aha nap pi has sha'i elith mo has i kaij?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am o wa s-ap'e. Jiosh at hab masma ha nahto g a'al mat si s-ap ab wo hehgchulithath mo hab masma an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus
ch am ha thagito. Kuchd gm hu hihi Bethany kihhim wui k am kohk.
Ba'ich tash, chd gm hu hebai uhpam hihim Jerusalem wui. Tsh bihugim g Jesus.

D eda am hu hema kehk g suhna uhs. Kuchd ab wui hihi no pi s-hahhagag ch ab wo chum bahithagk. D oi wa pi ab hu ha'ichu sha'i ihbthag. D hekaj hab kaij, “Pi at thahm ab hu ep wo bahithagt.” Kudki wa woho gaksh.
Kuchd am i neithok si has i elith k hab kaij, “S has masma sha'i si s-hohtam gaksh.”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt ab wabsh wo hiwgath g Jiosh. Kut wabsh chum haschu hab wo em-juni. Mtp hems wo cheha ihtha tho'ag mat gm hu wo e wua ge shuhthagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh mamtp wo s-wohochuthath mat hab wo e juh.
Ab g wo tahnith g Jiosh mamt haschu wo i tatchua. T heg hab wo em-junithath mamtp woho wo s-wohochuthath mat hab wo e juh.”

Kuchd gd hu uhpam thatha mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. D g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam. D am ha'i thatha g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Thohp amjed hab chum e elith map an u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch am hab ha'ichu wua? Oi g am t-ahgith.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai wo ha'ichu em-kakke. Mt am wo ni-ahgi. Nt am haha wo em-ahgi g em-kakkei.

Am g hig wo ni-ahgith mams hedai amjed hab elith mo wa g Johnbad ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch ha pahl wapkonahim. No ab Jiosh amjed aha no ab o'othham amjed?” D ihtham am wabsh chum hejel si a'aga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T wo s-t-keh'ith k ab wo t-kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch g Johnbad mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed u'ukch g gewkthag.
T g hemajkam has wo t-juh mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh o'othham amjed u'ukch. Mu'ijj o hab elith mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogitham.”

Neh, bad kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach sha'i mahch mas hedai amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag.” D g Jesus hab epai kaij, “Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo sha'i em-ahgi mani hedai amjed u'ukch g ni-gewkthag ch hab wua wehs ihtha.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am g wo oithahim ihtha mant wo em-ahgi. Matp hems hema g o'othham gohk wo a'alithagk ch hab wo ah g ge'echu, ‘Ni-sulijga, am g hihm k chikpan am uhdwis oithag ch ed ith i tashkaj.’
“K hab kaij ihtha, ‘Pi ani tatchua mant am wo hih,’ ch wabshaba am sha'i he'es gawul juh g e-chegitoithag k am hih oithag wui.
“Kut ihtha ohg am hahawa hih heg wui alichu e-alithag k hab wa'ap kaij ab wui. “K hab kaij ihtha, ‘Heu'u, am ant wo wa hih,’ ch wabshaba pi am hu hih.

“Thohm hab elith mat ab s-wohog el g e-ohg?” D hab kaij hegam, “Hegai mo d ge'echu.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat g em-uhwaitha chechoj ch chechpa'awi u'uwi am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed matp ab wo hiwgath g Jiosh. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi am hu wo i wahp mamtp pi ab hu wo hiwgath.

Ha pahl wapkontham John at wa ia jiwia em-wui k am chum em-chehgi g s-apkokam. Kumt pi ab hu wohoch. T wabshaba ihtham ab s-wohoch. Kumt wa chum nei ihtha k eda wa pi gawul juh g pi ap e-chegitoi mamt ab wo s-wohoch.

“Am g hema ep wo kaiham g ha'ichu wepogitha,” bad kaij g Jesus. “Neh, matp hems hema g jewed enigakam am wo ei g uhdwis e-oithag ed. T g piongaj an si kolhaidath k heg ep nahto mat hekaj am wo i wuhshath g wadgaj k am kei g uhgk kih mat heg amjed wo nuhkuthath g eshaj. “T gm hu hasko chihpia g enigakam k ha'i ha hiwigi g e-oithag.
T am i e ai mat g uhdwis bai. T am ha'i ha cheha g e-pionag mat am wo hihim k ab wo bei hegai wadgaj mo ab d i chum wuikamaj g enigakam. “T am hihim k am thatha.
Kut ihtham nuhkuththam an ha u'u k hema gewittan k hema mu'a k hema ep ma'ichkwua.
“Kut am hahawa ba'ich i mu'i ep ha cheha mat am wo hihi. Kut am hihim k am thatha. T am hab wa masma hab ep ha juh hegam nuhkuththam.
“T g e-alithag am hahawa ep cheha gm hu si ha oithch no pi hab ha elith mat ab wo wa has el.
“T wabshaba ihtham oithag nuhkuththam am i nei g alithaj k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, ‘Ith o d enigakam alithag. Oi g wo, tt wo mu'a k wehs wo bei g enigaj.’
Neh, t wa woho an be k gm hu si i wuhshath ab amjed g uhdwis oithag k mua.
“Pegih neh, shaht hig wo ha juh ihtham g enigakam hekith i jiwiak?”
D ha'ijj hab kaij hegam. “Hemho wa at wo ha koktha hegam si pi ap chechoj k gm hu ba'ich ha'ijj ab wo ha nuhkuthach mat ihtham ab hi wo mah hegai mo haschu ab d i wuikamaj.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, nat pi s-ohhoth g enigakam alithag. Kumt hab wa masma wo s-ni-ohhoth. Ith o hab ahgch hab chu'ig g wepogitha ahga Jiosh o'ohana ed: Kihttham at wo hema chum s-ohhotham g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed. Ith o hab d ahga mat si s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo juh g Jiosh.
“Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana. T g Jiosh wo em-wohppo'i g e-kownaltalig ahpim Tutuligo k hegam ab wo ha mah mat s-ap am wo i chikp.

Neh, t wo e sho'igch hegam mat pi wo ni-amich. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e keiko hothai t ab. Kut hegam mat wo s-ni-ohhoth wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat g hothai ab ha ab wo gehsh k am wabsh wo s-ha wia.”
D hegam u'ugchu papal ch Palasi s-mahch mo g Jesus ha wepogith hegam pi ap pion
ch heg hekaj an chum s-behim. D wabshaba g hemajkam hab elith mo g Jesus d hema Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K hegam u'ukchu papal s-ha gihug.
Jesus ad am hema ep ha ahgith g ha'ichu wepogitha am neokch ha wui g hemajkam ch hab kaij,
“Bant masma am ep wo wepogi g Jiosh kownaltalig matp hems hema g kownal am wo i ap'ech g ge'e gegosig am wehhejed g e-alithag nat pi wo ha hohnt.
T am i e ai. Kut am ha cheha g e-pionag mat an wo ha ahgithahi hegam mam ab heki hu ha waith. Kut wabshaba ihtham pi ab hu i hihimim.

“Kut am hahawa ha'i ep ha cheha g e-pionag mat an ep wo i ha ahgithahi. K ihtham an ha ahgithahim ch hab kaij, ‘Heki at hu e chuama g s-gihgim ch e gag'e g wipsilo ch wehs ha'ichu e nahtokch. Kumt ab wo i hihim k wo e gegos.’
“T wabshaba ihtham mam ab ha waith pi ab hu sha'i kaiham k gm hu hab wabsh wua g hejel e-chikpan. Hema at gm hu hih e-oithag wui. T hema gm hu ep hih e-tiannaga wui.
Kut ha'ijj an ha ui ihtham pion k ha gewittan k ha koktha.
Kut sha'i si bagat hegai kownal k am ha cheha g e-shonthalig mat am wo hihim k epai wo ha koktha hegam mat ha koktha g pion k wo mehi g ha-kihhim. T wa woho hab juh.
“T am hahawa i ha wai g e-pionag k hab kaij, ‘E at nahto g gegosig wehhejed g ni-alithag hohnta. T wabshaba hegam hemajkam mant ab i chum ha wai hab e juh mo pi d hahawa ha-wuikam.
Kumt am wo hihi wohg oithk k ab wo i ha wai gegosig wui mamtp he'ekia i hemajkam wo ha cheh.’

“Kut am wa woho hihi g piongaj wohg oithk k ab wehs i ha wai hegam mat ha cheh, chum hems g pi ap hemajkam. T am hahawa mu'i thatha. Kumt wehsijj ab ha mah g s-kehg eniga heg wehhejed k am i ha wahpki. Kut shuhth g kih.
“Kut am i wah g kownal k am ha nei hegam mat am thatha. K am hahawa wabsh hema thaha g o'othham mo pi ab hu wahkch hegai s-kehg eniga.
K ab kakke ch hab kaij, ‘Ni-nawoj, shahpt masma ia i wah pi ab hu wahkch g s-kehg eniga ith wehhejed?’ “T am wabsh i pi amich ihtha o'othham mat has wo chei.

Kut ihtha kownal am hahawa ha ahgi g e-pionag k hab kaij, ‘Am g wo si wulshp k gm hu wo tha'ich s-chuhugam k ed. Kut am hu wo shoak k ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath.’
“Pegih, nt wo em-ahgi mo mu'i ab ha waith g Jiosh. K wabshaba al he'ekia d i hemajkamgaj.”
Kutsh am i e hemapai g Palasi am i a'amich mat has masma wo heki himch g Jesus ab ha'ichu kakkek.

Tki am ha'i i ha wehmt hegam mo ab si has elith g kownal Herod k am ha wehm hihi ha'i hegam Palasi k am thatha k hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, s-mahch ach map s-ap d o'othham ch wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g Jiosh himthag, chum as has wo chei hedai i.
Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi maps has elith g ge'e kownal lial kowlanta. No hig t-hiwgith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkith aha no pi t-hiwgith?”
D wabshaba g Jesus am wa s-ha amichuth mo g pi ap'ekam hab elith ch hab ha ahg, “Ahpim s-chu i'attomkam am wabsh chum heki s-ni-himchuthamk.
Ab g wo hema ni-chehgith hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkith.” Kumd ab hema chehgi.
D hab ha ahg, “Am g hig wo ni-ahgith mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab o'ohadag ith ab lial?”

D hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t-kownalig.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, ab g wo i thagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i thagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.”
Kud si has i el hegam k gm hu hihi ab amjed.
D heg wa'i tash ed am ha'i thatha g Sajusi Jesus wui. Hegam mo d Sajusi o pi wohochuth mat g muhki ab uhpam wo i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.

D hab kaij ihtham, “Ha mashchamtham, Mosesbad atki an o'oha hegai chehanigaj g Jiosh mo hab chu'ig matsh g am oithchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha a'alithagkch hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e-wehnagbad. Tsh g ha-a'aliga hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo a'alithajk hegai mat muh.
“Pegih, k am hu hebai wewa'ak d e-wepngam ch am t-wehm kih. Kut g si ge'echu ge hohnt k pi ab hu ha a'alitht k muh k an thagito g e-hohnig. T g am oithchkam nawojij an hahawa ep bei g hohnigaj
k hab wa'ap pi ab hu ha a'alitht k hab wa'ap muh. Kut ihtha g oithchkam hab wa'ap hohnt k hab wa'ap muh pi ab hu ha a'alithtk. Neh, t hab masma i e oi ihtham wewa'ak k wehsijj ko'ok huhug.
K am hu'i hebai, t haha wabsh muh hab wa ehp ihtha uwi.
Pegih, am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai d wo hohnigkath ihtha matp ep wo e chegito g ko'i no pi wehsijj hohnigkahim.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi am ap chegito nam pi pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh o'ohana ch ep pi sha'i mahch mo he'es i gewkthag.
Woho at ab uhpam wo ha mah g ko'i g thoakag. T wabshaba hahawa pi wo hohontath hab masma mo g anghil pi hohont.
Mosesbad atki an o'oha mash wa hab kaij g Jiosh:

Ahni ani d ha-Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Neh, ith o hab kaij g Jiosh, chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkuth ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed. Pi amt woho wo i huhug am i ko'ok matp g Jiosh d em-Jioshga.”
Kud am i kah ihtha g hemajkam k si has i el g mashchamaj.
Kud am ha'i thatha g Palasi mat wo heki himch g Jesus am i kaiok mat ab si ha chehmo g Sajusi.
D hema hegam d Jiosh chehanig hudawogtham
ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, shahchu o d si ba'iwechkim ge'e chehanigaj g Jiosh?”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ith o d si ge'e ch ba'ich i si s-has ha'ichu chehanig: Hemho wa amt ab wo si tatchuath g e-kownalig Jiosh wehs e-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs e-thoakagkaj ch wehs e-chegitoikaj.
K ith am oithch d si s-has ha'ichu chehanig ch wepo chu'ig: Hemho wa amt ab wo tatchuath g hemajkam hab masma mam ab hejel e tatchua.
Ihtham gohk chehanig o ab ab wehs shohshonas g Jiosh chehanig ch wehs hegai matki kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha.”
D am i e hemapai g Palasi. D g Jesus hab ha ahg,
“Am g wo ni-ahgith mam hedai hab elith mat g Jiosh si Kehsha ab d wo amjedkamk?” D hab kaij hegam, “Heg atsh d wo amjedkamk t-kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, sh wa eda g Davidbad hab a'aga, ‘ni-kownalig’ ch hab kaij g gewkthajkaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag:
Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-kownalig wui: In g thahiwua ni-wehm ni-kownal thaikud ed. Kunt wo ha gewito g m-obga mat ab wabsh wo m-wechok.
Neh, namt hig s-ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihtha mash d ge'e kownaligaj?”
Kud pi hedai e nako mas ab hu uhpam has wo chei Jesus wui nih hemako ne'oki. D heg i tashkaj amjed pi hedai e nako mas ab hu ha'ichu ep wo kakke.
Mu'i hemajkam ad am ha'ichug t-wehm.
Kud hab kaij g Jesus ab wehsijj t-wui, “Hegam chehanig em-mashchamtham ch Palasi o d hegam mo ab mahks g gewkthag mat am wo i tashogi g chehanig.
Kumt heg hekaj ab wo s-ha wohog elithath. K wabshaba mu'ijj ihtham pi am hu hab junihim mo haschu em-mashcham. Kumt hekaj pi am hu ha oithk hab wo masmak.
Neh, mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu o ab em-chehani. K ith d s-wehch ha'ichu mohtoi am em-wehhejed. K eda pi ha'ichu hab sha'i wua mas hekaj em-wehm wo moht.
Wehs ha'ichu o heg wabsh hekaj am hab junihim mamt wo ha neithath. An o u'a g Jiosh o'ohana heg wabsh hekaj mamt hab wo ha elithath mo ab wohog elith.
Si o s-hohho'ith mat si s-apko wo thadhaiwua am ge'e gegosig ch ed ch am wa si hejelko thathaikud am cheopi ch ed.
Si o s-hohho'ith mamt ab wo si has ha elithath am hemajkam ha-shahgith ch hab wo ha a'agath mo d ge ha mashchamtham.
“Ahpim g pi wo sha'i tatchuath mams hab wo em-a'agath ‘ha mashchamtham’ nam pi d a'ai e-wepngam. Kuni ahni d wa'i em-mashchamtham.
Pi g hedai hab wo a'agath ‘ge ni-ohg’ ith thahm jewed. Heg amt wa'i Jiosh hab wo a'agath mo d ge em-ohg.
Pi g hab wo e a'agath mam d ha wanimedtham. Ahni ani d wa'i em-wanimedtham Jiosh si Kehsha.
Bamt wa'i masma d wo si ha'ichuk mamt d wabsh wo ha-pionagk.
Kut d wabsh wo pi ha'ichuk hegai matp hedai hab wo chum e elithath mo d si ha'ichu. Heg at d wo si ha'ichuk matp hedai ab wabsh wo i pi e ha'ichuchuthch.”

D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, mu'ijj ahpim chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ahpim Palasi am d wabsh s-chu i'attomkam. Ih, sho'ig! Jiosh at si s-ko'okam wo em-namkith heg hekaj. Pi am ha hiwgith hegam mo am i chum s-wahpkimk Jiosh kownaltalig ed ch hab wa'ap hejel pi am hu i wahp. Heg o wa wepo mam ab si yahwidathch g kihjeg am Jiosh kownaltalig wui.
[“Ha am iattogith g hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi ch ha ehsith g ha-kihki ch eda am wabsh s-e chehgithamk mam si chew e ho'ige'ithahun. Ith at hekaj ba'ich wo i s-ko'okk g em-namkithadag.]

“Am am si i e nakog mamt chum hems hemako am wo i wanchkwua pi wohokam e-himthag ed. T ihtha ba'ich i s-gewkam wo wulshpik mam ahpim mat am wo gei Jiawul kih ed nat pi ba'ich i s-gewkam am wo oithath g pi wohokam em-himthag. T g Jiosh si s-ko'okam wo em-namkith heg hekaj.

“Neh, am am ha'i ep chum ha mashcham ch eda hab chech'e, ‘Pi att hemho wa hab wo juh g t-ne'oki mattp wabsh wo gewkaj chehchegch g ge'e cheopi, heg hi wa matt wo chehcheg hegai ohla mo hekaj e heosith.’
K eda g ge'e cheopi ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hegai heosithakud.

“Kum hab ep chech'e, ‘Pi att hemho wa hab wo juh g t-ne'oki mattp wabsh wo gewkaj chehchegch hegai iagchulithakud mo am hab chu'ig ge'e cheopi t ab, heg hi wa matt wo chehcheg hegai mo an ab e iagchulith.’
K eda g iagchulithakud ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hi hegai mo an ab e iagchulith.
K heg wa wepo mam heg chehcheg iagchulithakud mam eda chehcheg g iagchulitha.
Kum chehcheg g Jiosh mam eda chehcheg g ge'e cheopi no pi heg d Jiosh kih.
Kum hab wa'ap chehcheg g Jiosh mam eda chehcheg g thahm kahchim.

“Im am hu hab wabsh i juhkch hegai mo d chum si ha'ichu am Jiosh chehanig ed mamt hab wabsh wo juhkchith g al chum ha'ichu. Neh, wehs am ha'ichu hemako tahpani mahk g Jiosh mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch, chum hems g ha'ichu hahhag ch ha'ichu kai, ch wabshaba pi ap ha lothait ch pi ha ho'ige'ith ch pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj si s-ko'okam wo em-namkith.

Am am wabsh s-nen'oith g al chu'uchum ha'ichu ch g ge'eged ha'ichu pi chegito. Ith o heg wa wepo mamtp hems wo o'os g e-wasib mat am eda wo gei g al chukumug k wabshaba wabsh wo bah wehnathk g ka-mihyo matp heg am eda wo gei.
“Ba'ich at wo i s-ko'okk g em-namkithadag nam pi hi wa chum si s-ap e chehgith. K wabshaba am em-eda ha'ichug g pi amdag ch s-chu tha'athag.
Am g wo i e kegchuth e-i'ibthag ed. T g ha'ichu hab em-juni am haha wo s-ap'ek.
“Neh, nat hig pi wo i e kegch g hiha'ini an e thahm, chum as am eda wo wehchk g oh'o ch jewalig? Pegih, m ahpim hab sha masma mo g hiha'ini
nam pi ab chum e chehgithch mam d s-ap'ekam. K eda g em-chegitoi pi a'pe. Ih sho'ig! Jiosh at si s-ko'okam wo em-namkith.

“Em-shohshon at mu'i ha koktha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kum ahpim si s-kehg ha hehosith g ha-hiha'iniga hegam mamt ha koktha ch hab chech'e mamt ahpim hi pi wo chum ha koktha. Tham s-chu i'attomkam ch ha wepo masma mash wa g em-shohshon. Ih, sho'ig! Jiosh at si s-ko'okam wo em-namkith namt pi am ha oithk hab wo e juh.
S-ap amt wo nahto hegai mat g em-shohshonbad i shonwuich.
Thamt wo ha mu'akamk hab masma mo g kohk'oi ch hekaj pi hab mahs mams wo e tho'ibia.

Pegih, nt wo em-ahgi mant am i ha wuwhas g ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch s-chu a'amichuththam ch ha mashchamtham am em-shahgith. Kumt ha'i wo ha gewitta am e-chechopi ed k ha'i an has wo ha shahmuthahim k ha'i wo ha koktha, chum hems ab ha sisishpk kots t ab.

T g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag ab em-ab wo gei hemu s-hohtam. Neh, Abelbad atsh wa wehpeg e muhkith. Tsh amjed mu'i ep e ko'ij. Tsh ga hu si ha oithch hegai Zecariabad mash d Barackiabad alithag e muhkith am ha shahgith g ge'e cheopi ch iagchulithakud, Kum ahpim ha wepo chu'ichig hegam matsh wa ha koktha ch ha wepo masma wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamtp hedai ha wepo elith ha'ichu.”

K hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ih, sho'ig, ahpim Jerusalem t am hemajkam, nat pi g Jiosh s-ap wo em-thagito. Em-shohshon ash wa ha ma'ichshulig ch mu'i ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kumt ahpim am ha oithk hab wo e juh. Mu'ikko ani chum tatchua mant wo si s-ap em-nuhkuth hab sha masma mat g chuchul g e-mahmad ab e wecho wo ha hemapai. M wabshaba pi ab hu tatchua manis hab wo em-juh.

K eda an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mamt ab wo chum ni-ihmath ch hab wo chech'eth mat g Jiosh am ni-kehsh k si s-ni-ho'ige'ith. Kunt ia wo i s-ap em-thagito am hugkam mamt hab hahawa masma hab wo e juh.”
Kud gm hu hahawa i wuhsh g Jesus ab amjed g ge'e cheopi. Kuchd am i oith k am wui thatha k am a'aga mo si s-kehg hab mahs g ge'e cheopi.
D hab kaij, “Heu'u, woho o hi wa si s-kehg hab mahs. Nt wabshaba si shel wo em-ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihtha.”

Kuchd amjed gm hu hejelko hihi wehmaj g Jesus k ab i chehchsh k ab thadhaiwua Olive U'us Kawulk t ab. Kuchd hab ahg g Jesus, “Am g hig t-ahgith mas hekith hab wo i e juh hegai map am t-ahgith. Kut haschu d wo chehgithak matt heg ab wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mapt ep wo jiwia. T g jewed wo huhug.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo si s-e nen'oithath mat pi hedai wo em-iattogi.
Mu'i at an wo i wuwha a'ahithag oitham k ni-wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut mu'ijj ab wo s-ha wohoch.

T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch jejewed ab a'ai wo i e checheggia. Mt wabshaba pi wo e totoths. Hemho wa at hab wo e juh hab masma. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo kuhgit. Bihugig at wo gehsh k g jewed wo u'ugij mu'ikpa.
Ith at d wabsh wo shohshonajk g sho'igthag nat pi ba'ich wo i ge'etha.
“T wo e ai mamt am wo em-u'u k wo em-thagito mamt wo em-sho'igchuth k wo em-koktha. Wehsko jejewed thakam hemajkam at wo s-em-keh'ithath ni-hekaj.
Mu'ijj at wo ni-thagito heg hekaj k wo a'ai e gagda k wo s-e keh'ithath.
Mu'i at an wo i wuwha g s-chu i'attomkam k hab wo e a'agath mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. T mu'i hemajkam ab wo s-ha wohoch.
Pi ap'ekam at wo i ge'etha. T mu'ijj wo huhug g pihk ha-elithadag ab a'ai e wui.
“Mt wo sha e nakog k wo gahi wuwha g e-sho'igthag. T g Jiosh am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.
Ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g kownaltaligaj at an wehsko wo e ah jewed thahm. T am haha wo e ai mat wo kuhgit.
“Am g wo amichuth ihtha mam in ne'okchulith. Hegai Danielbad mash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at an o'oha mat g em-obga am wo i kei g s-uam ha'ichu gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi.
Kut hemho wa am wo ahhio thohtha'ag wui hegam mat hedai ia wo ha'ichugk Judea jewed ch ed.
Kut pi hedai am hu wo sha'i chum i wah e-kih ed mat am wo ha'ichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo wa'i oimmedath e-kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanath oithag ch ed.
S-ta at ehbitham wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chu'uchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia wo'ok g ali.
“Mt ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mat pi eda hab wo e juh ihtha em-mihshmetha tash ed o g s-hehpich'ed.
Ba'ich at d wo i si ge'e sho'igthagk mo pi hekith g hemajkam sha'i neith ch pi hekith hab masma ep wo nei.
Pi at hedai wo e nako mas am gahi wo wuhsh hegai sho'igthag matp tash wo hih. T g Jiosh heg hekaj wo i shopolkai am ha wehhejed g e-hemajkamga.
“Pi g wo sha'i ha wohochuth matp hema hab wo sha chei mo am hebai ha'ichug g Jiosh si Kehsha.

Mu'i at in wo i wuwhag k hab wo chei mo d ni-ahni Jiosh si Kehsha o d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam k am hab wo wuath g s-hasig ha'ichu mat hekaj wo i chum ha wanchshul g Jiosh hemajkamga matp wo e nako.
Neh, ni heki hu am em-ahgith mamt hekaj wo s-e nen'oithk.
“Tp hems ha'i hab wo chei mo am ha'ichug g Jiosh si Kehsha tohono jewed ch ed o am hebai e ehstokch. Kumt wabshaba pi wo ha wohochuth k pi am hu wo chum hihi.
Wehsko ant wo ni-chehgi mant hekith ep wo jiwia jewed thahm ahni Jiosh si Kehsha hab sha masma mat g wepgi s-masma an gahi wo kekiwua chewagi ch ed.
“Neh, s-mahch am mat hebai wo wo'ok g ha'ichu muhkig an wabsh ha neithch g nunuwi mat am wo e chehm. Pegih, mt hab wa'ap s-ap wo s-mahchk mant hebai wo ha'ichugk.”
D hab ep kaij, “T am wabsh wo i chum kuhgi hegai jewed shuhthgim sho'igthag. T g tash tonlig wo huhug. T g mashath ep pi wo ha ton. T g thahm kahchim wo ugij. T g huhu'u wo i shul.
Nt ab haha wo i ni-chehgi ab thahm kahchim t amjed k wo jiwia. T wehs hemajkam wo si shoanith ab i ni-neithok. Nt si s-masma ab wo hudunihi chewagi ch ed. Kut am wo e maskogi g ni-gewkthag.

T ab si s-kaitham wo e kuhu g kuikud. Kunt wo ha cheha g ni-anghiliga mat ab wehs wo i ha hemapai hegam mant am i ha chuhcha mat wo e tho'ibia. T am wo hihi imhab si'al tahgio ch imhab hudunig tahgio ch imhab wakolim tahgio ch imhab juhpin tahgio k wo ha hemapai.”
“Nt wo ha'ichu em-mashcha heg hekaj suhna uhs. Mt wo s-mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat ab wo i i'iwgi.
Pegih, mt hab wa'ap wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mat wehs wo kuhgit mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh hegai mani em-ahgith.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat d wabsh wo kia thothakamk hegam mat wo nei ihtha mani em-ahgith mat hekith wehs wo kuhgit.
Neh, wehs at gm hu hab wo i e juh ihtha Jiosh nahtoi mam in neith. T wabshaba g ni-ne'oki pi hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
D hab ep kaij, “Heg o wa'i s-mahch ni-ohg Jiosh mant hekith ep wo jiwia. Pi o hedai ep s-mahch, chum hems g anghil nih ahni mani d hi wa chum alithaj.
Bat wo masmak ha'ichu mant hekith ep wo jiwia mash wa hab chu'ig mash eda g Noahbad in d thoakam.
Hemajkam ash wa gm hu wabsh i si neneath ch e gegosith ch ih'eth ch e hohont ch gm hu wabsh i pi chegito g Jiosh. T haha wabsh e ai g tash mat hegam Noahbad am i wahp ge'e wahlko ch ed.
Kut wehs ha wi'in g hemajkam k ha hugio. Kut hab wo wa masmak mant hekith ep wo jiwia.
Neh, gohkajj at am wo chikpanath oithag ch ed. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo wa i e wuiok.
Gohk u'uwi at am wo ha'ichu chu'ath. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo wa i e wuiok.
“Pegih, mt wo si s-e nen'oithath. Pi o ta machima am em-wehhejed mant haschu tash ed ep wo jiwia ahni em-kownalig.
Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekith hema wo jiwia g s-chu ehskam. Kum heg hekaj chum hekith nuhkuth g e-kihthag.
Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ta machima em-wehhejed manis hekith wo uhpam jiwia jewed wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Mt heg hekaj wo si e nahtokchith chum hekith.

“Chum amt hedai wo e nahtokch mamtp wo s-wapagimak ch wo s-chu a'amichuthath. S-mahch am mat g ha-ahmo hema wo e-gahgi g hab mahs pion k wo nuhkuthach g e-kihthag. T heg s-ap wo ha chikpanchuthath ch wo ha thagio'ithath g e-wehm pion mat eda pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g ha-ahmo.
T am ep wo jiwia k wo cheh mo s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan. Kut d wo si ge'e s-hehgigk heg wehhejed pion.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat g ahmoj am hahawa wehs thahm wo kei g e-kihthag.
“T wabshaba pi ap d wo ha kehshak matp hedai hab wo i e ah, ‘Pi at oi wo jiwia g ni-ahmo,’
k wo i ha sho'igch g e-wehm pion k g s-i'imkam ha wehm wo ih'eth ch wo e gegosithath.
T haha wabsh wo jiwia g ahmoj k wo cheh mo pi ap hab wua g e-chikpan

k wo si s-ko'okam namkith k gm hu hab wo i juh. Neh, bat wa masma hab wo e juh ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog elithath g Jiosh. Heg at s-ko'okam wo ha namkith. Kut heg hekaj wo shoakath ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ba'ich ant am wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig am wepogithch hegai kih mat hebai ha'i wo e hohont. Mt am ha'i ha wai wehst-mahm chetcha. T am hihi ha u'athch g e-lalampa k am wo i wahp g wo ha hohntam wehm mat hekith wo jiwia.
Hetasp ihtham o pi ha'ichu nen'oith
ch ep pi ha wa'igchug g a-saithi.
Hetasp o s-chu nen'oith ch ep ha wa'igchug g a-saithi.
Kut pi oi jiwia g wo ha hohntam. T wehsijj s-ha kohksimch ihtham chetcha. T gm hu kohk.
“Neh, t am i e ai g eda hugkam g s-chuhugam. T ab kaitha ihtha, ‘Ab o him g wo ha hohntam. Oi g wo i hihim k ab wo namkhi.’
T hegam wehst-mahm chetcha nehnen k i ha kegchuth g e-lalampa.
“K hab kaij hegam mo pi ha'ichu nen'oith, ‘Ab g wo i ha t-mahki g e-a-saithiga. Chuhchkim o g t-lalampa.’
“K hab kaij hegam mo s-chu nen'oith, ‘Pi att wo t-nako. Am o wabsh i hejel t-wehhejed ahim am shuhthagi ch pi wo em-ai. Am amt wo hihi tianna wui k am hejel wo ha nolawt.’

“T wa woho hab e juh hegam ha'i k gm hu hihi mat wo ha nolawt g a-saithi. Kut eda ia hu ha oithk jiwia g wo ha hohntam. Kut hegam hetasp mo e nahtokch gm hu wehmaj i wahp mat am wo e gegos wehmaj. T ab si e kuh g kihjeg.
“T am i uhpam thatha hegam ha'i k ab chum shoani ch hab kaij, ‘Ab g si s-t-ho'ige'ith k ab i kuhpi'oki matt am wo i wahp.’ “K hab kaij g wo ha hohntam,
‘Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mani pi sha'i em-mahch mams hedai wud,’ ch am hahawa si kuh g kihjeg.”
Neh, d am i kuhgit g e-wepogitha g Jesus hab kaijch, “Neh, mt wo s-e nen'oithath nam pi pi sha'i mahch mant hekith ep wo jiwia.
“Bant masma ep wo i wepogi g Jiosh kownaltalig matp hems g o'othham hema hasko wo him k ab i ha wai g e-pionag mat ab wo ha nuhkuthach g ha'ichu e-eniga.
Hema at mah g hetasp mihl pihsh k hema gohk mihl pihsh k hema ep g hemako mihl pihsh no pi s-mahch mat he'ekia i s-ap wo chikpanath k amjed gm hu mehk jewed wui hih.
“Hegai piongaj mat g hetasp mihl pihsh ab ui at am ha hekaj i e nakog k hekaj ihtha lial mat am thahm hetasp mihl pihsh ep nahto.
Kut hegai mat g gohk mihl pihsh ab ui hab wa'ap e juh k gohk mihl pihsh am thahm nahto.
T wabshaba hegai mat g hemako mihl pihsh ab ui gm hu him k am hebai wagt k am ehsto.
“K mehk amjed mat jiwia g ha-ahmo ihtham k am ha ui mat wo s-mai mat has masma hekaj g lialigaj.

“Hegai piongaj mat g hetasp mihl pihsh ab ui at ab i wah k ab i mah g hetasp mihl pihsh am thahm hegai mat ab ui k hab kaij, ‘Ab apt wa ni-mah g hetasp mihl pihsh. Neh, nt am ba'ich hetasp mihl pihsh ab ep wo m-mah mant nahto.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S-ap aptki hab e juh, s-ap'ekam ni-pionag, s-ap hekajk mant he'ekia ab i m-mah. Nt hekaj ab ba'ich i mu'i wo m-nuhkuthach. Am g ni-wehm s-hehgigkath.’
“T heg ab hahawa ep i wah piongaj mat g gohk mihl pihsh ab mah k hab kaij, ‘Neh, gohk mihl pihsh apt wa ab ni-mah. Kunt am ba'ich gohk mihl pihsh ab ep wo m-mah mant nahto.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S-ap aptki hab e juh, s-ap'ekam ni-pionag, s-ap hekajk mant he'ekia ab i m-mah. Nt hekaj ab ba'ich i mu'i wo m-nuhkuthach. Am g ni-wehm s-hehgigkath.’
“T ab hahawa i wah hegai piongaj mat g hemako mihl pihsh ab mah k hab kaij, ‘Ni-ahmo, s-mahch ani map s-ta ke'ithama ch s-beihimk hegai map haschu pi ab hu chikpan.
Kunt heg hekaj gm hu s-a'agko e'esto g m-lialiga. Neh, m ia wehch mo haschu d m-eniga.’
K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘Si pi ap ch s-padmakam ni-pionag, kups wa chum s-mahch mani s-ta ke'ithama ch s-beihimk hegai mani haschu pi ab hu chikpan.
Pegih neh, pt hems am hi wo wa chum toa g ni-lialiga wahnko ch ed. Kunt ab wehs uhpam wo ui wehnathk mat haschu ab wo i mahmadt.’
“K hab hahawa ha ahg g ha'i ep e-pionag, ‘Mt wo wohppo'ith k ab wo mah hegai mo wehst-mahm mihl pihsh edgith.
Ba'ich at ep wo nei g e-ap'ethag hegam mat hedai s-ap wo hekaj. T wabshaba wo e wohppo'ithach mo haschu al i edgith hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj.
Mt gm hu wo tha'ich hegai s-padmakam pion s-chuhugam k ed. T am wo si shoakath ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath.’
“An ant wo thahiwua ni-kownal thaikud an mant hekith wo i jiwia ha wehm g ni-anghiliga.
T wehs hemajkam am wo e hemapai ni-ba'ich. Nt ab wo i ha gawulkai hegam mo d wohokam ab ha amjed hegam mo pi d wohokam hab masma mamt am wo i ha gawulkai g kahwal ch siswat.

Bant wo ha ahgi hegam mant ab i ha gawulkai, ‘Ab g wo i hihim. S-em-ho'ige'ith o g Jiosh. Ni-gegos amt mani wa d bihugimkam k ni-wasibi mani wa d tonomkam k am i ni-wahki e-kih ed mani wa d wabsh ge o'othham k ni-enigadath mani wa pi ha'ichu edgith k ni-nuhkuth mani wa mumku k am ni-chechga mani wa d lihso. K g Jiosh am nahtokch g kihthag em-wehhejed ga hu i amjed mat in i nahto g jewed. Ab g wo i wahpkith k wo edagi.’
“Kut hab wo chei ab ni-wui, ‘T-kownalig, kuchs hekith i m-gegosith k m-wasbith k ab i m-wahki t-kih ed k ab m-enigadath k m-nuhkuth k am m-chechga?’
“Nt hab wo chei, ‘Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mam ahni am i ni-wehmt hekith am i ha wehmtch hegam mo d sho'igkam ch ab ni-hiwig.’

“Kunt hab haha wo chei ab ha wui hegam mant pi ab hu i ha gawulkai, ‘Gam g hu hab wo i e juhni. Ab o em-mohto'ith g Jiosh g s-ko'ok namkithadag. Pi amt ni-gegos mani wa d bihugimkam k pi ni-wasibi mani wa d tonomkam k pi am hu i ni-wahki e-kih ed mani wa d ge o'othham k pi ab hu ni-enigadath mani wa pi ha'ichu eniga k pi ni-nuhkuth mani wa mumku k pi am hu ni-chechga mani wa d lihso. Neh, am amt wo e shul heg eda mehi mo d ha wuikam g jijawul.’
“Kut hab wo chei hegam ab ni-wui, ‘T-kownalig, ch hekith i m-neith maps d bihugimkam o d tonomkam o d ge o'othham o pi ha'ichu eniga o mumku o d lihso, kuchs pi am hu i m-wehmt.’
“Nt hab wo chei, ‘Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mam ahni pi am hu i ni-wehmt, hekith pi am hu i ha wehmtch hegam mo d sho'igkam ch ab ni-hiwig.’
“Kut ihtham am wo e shul pi ha huhugetham s-ko'ok namkithadag ed. T g s-ap'ekam an wo i wahp anai mat an hahawa chum hekith wo edgithath g s-ap'ekam thoakag.”
D am i ha'asa ha'ichu ha mashcha g Jesus k hab hahawa kaij ab t-wui,

“S-mahch am mo gohk tash am wi'is matt wo wuhshath mat g Jiosh ha tho'ibia g t-shohshonbad. Kutki hab wo e juh mat an wo ni-bei hegam mo ab ni-wui gegok k ab wo ni-naggia kots t ab mat wo ni-mua.” Neh, heg o hab wa'i kaij.
Kumsh eda woho a'aga mamtsh has masma wo be k wo mua. Si uhgchu pahl atsh am i ha hemapai hegam ha'i u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged. Kutsh ab kihj ab nam
k am ap'ech mat s-a'agi an wo bei g Jesus k wo mua,
ash am wabsh a'ai e ahgith, “Hi wa pi am hu heg eda mat ia wo e hemapathch g hemajkam ith hekaj piast. T wo am hu e babgachuth k wo t-cheggia.”
Kuchd am hu hebai am thatha Bethany kihhim t am. D am d kihkam hegai mad hab chehgig Simon ch wa chum mumku heg hekaj mo g chuhkugaj wabsh muhkhim.
Ith ad ab i t-waith k t-gegos. Kuchd am thadhak ch t-gegosith. T ab haha wabsh hema i wah g uwi g si s-namkig s-ap uhw shuhthagi wa'igchugch am al s-toa hothai ha'a ch ed k ab iawua Jesus mo'o ab.
Kud ha'i si pi hohho'i g t-wehm e mashchamtham k hab kaij, “Ih, pt wabsh heki wua ihtha s-namkig ha'ichu.
Eda atp hu'i mu'i lial wo nam sha e gagdak. T heg wo e hekaj ha wehhejed g sho'igkam.”
Kud s-mahch g Jesus mach haschu am a'aga ch hab kaij ab t-wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i keh'ithath ihtha uwi. Si at s-kehg ha'ichu hab juh am ni-wehhejed.
Mt wabsh chum hekith wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam. Kunt ahni hi pi tash ia hu wo em-shahgithk.
Ab at iawua g uhw shuhthagi mat wo i nako g ni-honshpadag hiashpa.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat am wo s-e chegitok mat haschu has juh ihtha uwi mat hebai wo i e ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh an wehsko jewed thahm.”
D am ha hekaj t-thagito g Judas Iscariot k gm hu hih. Kuchd am i thahm s-mai matsh am hih u'ugchu papal ha wui
ash hab kaij, “He'ekia amt wo i ni-namkith mant an wo em-behi g Jesus?” Kutsh am chehgith k kuint g waikko wehst-mahm plahtha pihsh matsh ith wo mah.
Tsh ab i amjed g Judas am i e nako matsh wo gagda g Jesus.

D am hahawa s-ap i e ai hegai t-shohshonbad ha tho'ibiathag piast. K ith eda pi e ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas. Kud d wehpeg tash heg eda gegosig. Kuchd am thatha Jesus wui k ab kakke machs hebai wo i ap'ech matt am wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig.

D gohkajj hab t-ahg, “Am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. K am hema d kihkam ch am wo e chehgi. Mt hab wo ah mani hab kaij mat e ai g ni-tashga. Kutt t-wehm wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig am kihj am.”
Kud am hab e juh mad hab ha ahg g Jesus k am i ap'ech g gegosig.
D am i hud. Kuchd am thadhaiwua k am t-gegosith.
Kud hab haha wabsh kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat has wo e juh hemu. Hema amt wo ni-gagda ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.”
Kuchd si pi ap t-taht k gn hu hab i che'iatahi, “Ih, hi wa pi ahni, ni-kownalig.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at hab wo juh mat hedai am ni-wehm wo wakch g chemait hithod ch ed.

Bant masma wo ni-muhkith mo has masma heki hu o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkith. T wabshaba wo si s-ko'okam e namkith hegai mat wo ni-gagda. Ba'ich at wo i chum s-ap'ek heg wehhejed mat hems wabsh pi wo chum mahsi.”
D hegai Judas matki gagda hab kaij, “Aha nap ahni hab ni-ahg, t-mashchamtham?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Thap ahpi.”
Chd am wabsh kia t-gegosith. D g Jesus am bei g chemait k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa i hahain k ab t-mah k hab kaij, “Oi g wo huhgi ihtha. Tho ni-honshpadag.”
D am hahawa bei g tahsa k ab ep ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab t-mah g wasib k hab kaij, “Wehsijj g ab wo ih'e.

Ith o d ni-eh'ed. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith em-wehhejed. T g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab wo juh hegai mo wa hab kaij mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g hemajkam.
Ia o i s-ap'e. Kunt pi hekith em-wehm hab ep wo juh ihtha k wabshaba em-wehm wo si s-hehgigk Jiosh kihthag ed.”
Neh, kuchd am hahawa kuhgit am hema ahgk g mihshmetha ne'i k am wuwhag k gm hu hihi Olive U'us Kawulk wui.

D hab t-ahg g Jesus, “An o o'ohanas mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Nt wo hiwigi mamt wo mua g kahwal ha nuhkuththam. T g kahwal wabsh a'ai wo wohp. K ith hab d ahga mamt wehsijj wabsh wo ni-thagito k gm hu a'ai wo wohp mant hekith wo ni-muhkith.
Kunt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt ab ha'ab wo ni-nei.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.
D g Peter hab kaij, “Ahni ant hi pi hekith wo sha'i m-thagito, chum as wehsijj wo m-thagito ihtham.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mat koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul ith i chuhug ab. Kupt waikko hab wo wa'i chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Pi ant hekith hab wo sha'i chei manis pi m-mahch, chum anis wo ni-muhkith m-wehm.” Kuchd wehsijj hab wa'ap kaij.

Kuchd gd hu thatha heg ab oithag mo hab e a'aga Gethsemane. D pi am hu t-wehmaj g Judas Iscariot. D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Ia g hu wo i thadhak. Nt ahni am ba'ich wo i him k wo ni-ho'ige'ithahu.”
Bad kaij ch am ha u'uk g Peter ch James ch John. T ihtham gm hu oi. Kush s-masma si pi ap e tahtk g Jesus ch si e kudut
ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab at wabsh i si ni-shuhth g pi ap tahhathkam ch si s-ni-mukima tahhathchuth. Ia g wabsh wo thadk ch wo ha'ichu si nenashanath.” Kutsh am thadhaiwua.

Tsh g Jesus ba'ich ep sha'i him k am i gei jewedo k hab kaij ab Jiosh wui, “Ni-ohg, matp am wo s-ap'ek, pt im hu hab wo i juh hegai si s-ko'ok sho'igthag mo ab ni-wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m-tatchui hab wo e juh.”
Tsh am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui hegam waik. Kush am kohksh. Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amtki sha'i e nako mamt wo ni-wehm nenead al hemako ohla ab.
Si g wo ha'ichu nenashanath ch ab wo tai g Jiosh g gewkthag mamt pi am hu wo shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. Chum am hi wa g s-ap'ekam hab elith ch eda pi e nakog.”
Bash kaij ch amjed gm hu hahawa ep him k hab kaij ab Jiosh wui, “Ni-ohg, am o wa s-ap'e ni-wehhejed matp d wo m-tatchuik mant hemho wa wo nako ihtha si s-ko'ok sho'igthag.”
Neh, k am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui. Kush ep kohksh no pi sha'i s-ha kohksimchuth.
Tsh gm hu hahawa ep hih g Jesus k heg hab kaij ab Jiosh wui matsh wehpeg
ch am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui k hab kaij, “Kumtki ep kohk. T eda e ai mamt ni-gagda ahni Jiosh si Kehsha am ha wui g pi ap'ekam hemajkam.
Oi g wo wahpamigi. Tt wo hihi. Neh, ia at hu jiwia hegai mat ni-gagda.”
Am ad wabsh kia neok. Kud am jiwia g Judas. D sha'i si mu'ijj wehmaj, ha'ijj g i'is-papayo uh'ukch ch ha'ijj g u'us. Ihtham atki g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged am ha cheha matsh am wo hihim k wo bei.
Kuki eda g Judas heki hu ha ahgith ihtham mo am wehmaj mat ab wo chintath g Jesus kahmaj ab. T hab masma wo s-mahchk mat hedai an wo bei.
D am wabsh i chum jiwia g Judas k wabsh shel i hih ab Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Jiosh at wo s-m-ho'ige'el, ni-mashchamtham!” Neh, bad che'e k ab chintath.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, ni-nawoj, oi g s-hohtam am hab juhni hegai mapt haschu ahgk ia jiwia.” Kud ab ha'i hihim k an bei g Jesus k gn hu si s-wihnam u'ukch.
Kud hema g t-wehm e mashchamtham am i wuhshath g e-is-pahyo k ab si gehg g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl k an si hikuch g nahkaj.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui ihtha, “Ga g hu uhpam kehsh g e-is-pahyo. Hegam mat wo hekaj g is-pahyo at heg hekaj hab wa'ap wo e muhkith.
Aha nap pi mahch mantp ab wo tai g ni-ohg, t ha hekaj wo ha cheha g sha'i si mu'i mihl anghil mat ni-wehhejed wo ha cheggia.
K wabshaba an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat hemho wa am ni-tahgio hab wo e juh ihtha mo hab e wua.”

Neh, bad kaij g Jesus ch hab hahawa ha ahg hegam mat an bei, “Wehs tashkaj ani am thahiwup ch ha mashcham ge'e cheopi t am. Kumt pi an hu ni-be k wabshaba hahawa ia thatha an uh'ukch g i'is-papayo ch u'us mamt wo ni-bei.

Pegih, bat wa masma an heki hu o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mant hab masma an wo ni-behij mat g pi ap hemajkam.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus. Kuchd am haha wabsh i thagito k gm hu si a'ai wohp.
Kumtsh am i bei g Jesus heg kih wui uhgchu pahl mo hab chehgig Caiaphas. Tsh eda am heki hu i e hemapai g chehanig t-mashchamtham ch ge'eged.
Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oith ch am i wah kolhai ch ed. Sh am ha'i thadha g ha-pionag. Tsh g Peter am ha wehm i thahiwua s-neithamkch mams has wo juh g Jesus.
Sh g uhgchu pahl ch hegam e jehnigiththam am chum i e nakog mat g iattogi ha'ichu ab wo abch g Jesus mat heg hekaj wo mua.
Kutsh mu'i ehp am i gegokiwua k ab ha'ichu chum abch. Sh wabshaba pi e wepot g ha'ichu ha-ahga. Tsh am hahawa gohkajj i gegokiwua
k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o hab kaij matsh wo e nako mat wo i wua g Jiosh ge'e cheopiga. Tsh am d wo i waik tashk, tsh am uhpam ep wo kei.”
Tsh am hahawa kekiwua g uhgchu pahl k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Napt pi am hu has wo chei heg amjed mam ab m-abchuth?”

Kush wabshaba g Jesus pi has sha'i kaij. Tsh am ep neo g uhgchu pahl k hab kaij ab wui, “Am g t-ahgith g wohokam am tahgio g Jiosh. Nap hab e elith map ahpi d Jiosh alithag matp am t-thahm wo i e kei?”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni. Kunt ab ep wo em-ahgi mat g Jiosh am wo e chehgi mo ab si has ni-elith an e-hugith an ni-thahshk e-kownal thaikud ed. T am wo i e ai mant ab wo i hud chewagi ch ed k am ep wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kumt wehsijj wo s-mai mani d ahni.”
Tsh g uhgchu pahl ab si wantsh g e-eniga no pi si pi hohho'ith g ne'okij k hab kaij, “Pi ach hedai ep sha'i tatchua mas am wo ah g chu'ichigaj. Am am wa kah g pi kehg ne'okij.
Shahm i elith?” Kush hab kaij g e jehnigiththam, “Ab at moht g chu'ichig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkith.”
Tsh ihtham ab si siswua wuhioshaj ab k an si ma'ishk wuh g wuhpuij k ab si shonikkash
ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai ab m-shonikka, ahpi Jiosh si Kehsha e ahga.”
Sh eda g Peter am thaha kih bahsho. Kutsh am hema jiwia g uwi piongaj g uhgchu pahl k hab kaij ab Peter wui, “Ahpi ap ep wehmaj hegai Jesus.”
Tsh wabshaba g Peter pi mahch k e ah g Jesus am ha tahgio hegam mo am thadha hab kaijch, “Pi ani sha'i mahch maps haschu hab ahg.”
Bash kaij ch ha hekaj gm hu hih mash am ha'i gegok kolhai kihjeg t ab. Kush hema hab ep kaij ab ha wui, “Ith o ep wehmaj hegai Jesus.”
Kutsh ep pi e edagi g Peter hab kaijch, “Tho si wohokam mani pi sha'i mahch hegai o'othham.”
Kutsh sha'i ha'as, tsh hegam chechoj mo am gegok am thatha Peter wui k hab ahg, “Pi g sha'i pi e edgith. Thapki woho hema hegam Jesus. Ab ap wabsh e ahgch e-ne'oki ab map d ha wehm o'othham.”
Tsh g Peter am ha hekaj si ha ahgi, “Pi ani sha'i mahch ihtha o'othham mam an a'aga. T g Jiosh wo si ni-jehka'ich mantp em-iattogith.” Tsh am hahawa hema si kuhu g keli chuchul.

Tsh am ha hekaj i chegito g Peter mo wa g Jesus ab wui hab kaij, “Pi at koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul. Kupt waikko hab wo wa'i chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.” Tsh gm hu wuhsh g Peter k si pi ap e tahtk ch shoak.
Tsh am wabsh i chum mahsi. Tsh am hahawa i ap'ech g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged mat wo e muhkith g Jesus.
Tsh am i e kuhgit g ha-namki. Kutsh am si i maniadath g nohnhoij g Jesus k gm hu i wanim matsh am wo i bei heg wui mo d kownal heg eda chekshani ch hab chehgig Pilate.

Sh eda g Judas an himath ch ha neith. Sh am wanimed g Jesus kownal wui mat wo e muhkith. Kutsh si e toths g Judas k am him k am uhpam i ui hegai waikko wehst-mahm plahtha pihsh ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged
k hab kaij, “Tki wo e muhkith hegai mo pi ha chu'ichig. K d ni-chu'ichig nant pi ab em-wui gagda.” Sh hab kaij hegam haha'ichu, “Pi ach has sha'i elith hegai. Heg o ahpi ab m-ab.”
Tsh g Judas am si nehnich hegai lial k am shul ge'e cheopi ch ed k gm hu hahawa wuhsh jeg ed k wabsh hejel e naggia.
Tsh g u'ugchu papal am ui hegai lial k hab kaij, “Ith o d namkigaj mat hema wo e muhkith. K g t-chehanig pi t-hiwgith matt am wo toa ge'e cheopi wehhejed.”
Bash kaij ch am ap'ech matsh heg hekaj wo hema ha nolawt g oithag mat d wo ha-simin-jihlok hegam mo d wabsh ge o'othham. Hegai mamt ha nolawt o heki hu hab e a'aga Haha'attham Oithag
ch wabshaba hab hahawa e a'aga Eh'ed Oithag.

Neh, ith atsh wa hab e juh hab masma mash wa g Jiosh heki hu wa'i hab kaij matsh hab masma hab wo e juh. Hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Jeremiah atki an o'oha mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Tutuligo at wo hema nolawt g o'othham g waikko wehst-mahm plahtha pihshkaj.
Kumt ith am haha wo ui namkigaj k wo ha nolawt g haha'attham oithag.

Sh eda am kehk g Jesus kownal wui. Sh hegam mo s-mu'amk ab abchuth mo chum e kownalchuth. Sh g kownal ab kakke, “No wa woho mapsh hab chum e elith map d ha-kownalig ihtham Tutuligo?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni.”
Sh g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ab mu'i ha'ichu abchuth. Sh pi am hu has sha'i kaij g Jesus.
Sh hekaj hab kaij g Pilate ab wui, “Neh, mu'i ha'ichu o ab m-abchuth. Napt pi ab hu wo ha kaiha?”
Kush ep pi am hu has sha'i kaij g Jesus. Tsh heg hekaj si has i el g kownal.
K am hab e wua ahith ab ith eda gegosig mo g kownal hema thathagitod g lihso am ha wehhejed g hemajkam.
K am hema d lihso ch hab chehgig Barabbas. K wehsijj s-mahch ihtha.

Tsh am i e hemapai g hemajkam amai mash am thaha g Pilate ch hab wua g lothaita. Tsh ab ha kakke, “Nam hab elith mant wo thagito g Barabbas aha nam ith hab elith Jesus mo hab e a'aga Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Neh, bash kaij nash pi chum s-thagitoimk g Jesus ch hab ha elith mo hegam wa'i haha'ichu s-hehgamk ch s-mu'amk.

Sh am thaha g Pilate lothaita thaikud ed. Kutsh eda g wehmaj kihkam heki hu hema cheha matsh am wo him k wo ahgi mo hab kaij, “Pi g am hu has sha'i juhni hegai o'othham no pi pi ha chu'ichig. Mu'i ant ha'ichu nako chuhug chehchkch ab amjed.”
Sh eda hegam u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ab ha chehani g hemajkam matsh ab wo tai g Pilate mat wo thagito g Barabbas k g Jesus hab wo juh mat wo e muhkith.
Pegih, sh g kownal ab ha kakke mas hedai am wo i thagito ha wui ihtham gohk. Sh hab kaij g hemajkam, “Barabbas”.
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Pilate mas has wo juh hegai Jesus mo hab e a'aga Jiosh si Kehsha. Sh hab kaij g hemajkam, “Mu'ani ab kots t ab.”
Kutsh hab chum chei g Pilate, “Haschu ahg? Shahchu at hig pi ap has juh?” Kutsh oi wa wabsh ba'ich i si s-kaitham hab ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!”

Tsh am i nei g Pilate matki heki hu i babgat g hemajkam k am hu wo e cheggia. Tsh am ge was g shuhthagi k am hemajkam ha tahgio i ha wapko g e-nohnhoi k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi o ha'ichu d sha'i ni-chu'ichig matp wo e muhkith ihtha o'othham. Ahpim o d em-chu'ichig.”
Sh wehsijj hab kaij hegam mo am ha'ichug, “Ahchim g t-a'aliga ha wehm att ab wo moht g s-ko'ok namkithadag ith hekaj.”
Tsh g Pilate am hahawa i thagito g Barabbas ha wui k am ha cheha g shonthal mat wo gewitta g Jesus k am hahawa i thagito mat ab wo naggia kots t ab.
Tsh amjed g Pilate shonthaliga am i bei g Jesus k gd hu u'apa kownal ge'e kih am k am wehs ha wai g e-wehm shonthal.
Kutsh am i e hemapath k nahnko wua. Msh ab abchuth mash chum e kownalchuth. Pegih, tsh gam si wuashul g wehschugaj k g kownal eniga ab wahkith
k ge ho'i gihkot k ab wahki mo'oj ab k g uhs an behijel s-apko nowij an k wabsh nahnko ahg ch ab i tohtonwua wui k hab kaij, “Tash g d ha-kownaligk g Tutuligo.”
Sh ab si siswuimath k an si gewitta mo'oj an.
Tsh am i ha'asa nahnko juh k am wuahawua hegai kownal eniga k ab uhpam wahki g enigaj k gm hu hahawa i bei mat ab wo naggia kots t ab.
Tsh ab hema i ha nam g o'othham mo ab Cyrene kihhim t ab d kihkam ch hab chehgig Simon. Ith amtsh ab wabsh si kushwiotach hegai kots mamt ab ab wo naggia g Jesus.
Kumtsh gm hu i bei g Jesus mamtsh am wo naggia. K hab e a'aga amai Golgotha. K ith hab d ahga Koshwak.
Kumtsh ab chum i'ich g nawait mo g kulani am wehnags mat wo hehogi g s-ko'ok. Tsh ab chum jeh k pi ab hu ih.
Kumtsh ab hahawa sisish kots t ab k am i kei g kots. Tsh am ha'i e chichwi g shonthal k am a'ai e gehg g wehschugaj
k am hahawa i thadhaiwua k nuhkuth.
Kumtsh an o'oha mam haschu ab abchuth k ab sihsh kots t ab ab thahm mo ab i mo'okch g Jesus. Sh hab chu'ig, “Ith o d Jesus ch d Tutuligo ha-kownalig.”
Tsh gohk ab ep ha nahngia kokots t ab gn hu a'ai. Sh eda d s-chu e'eskam ihtham.
Sh hegam mo an bihbimhim si gahi e mo'ogith ch ab si s-ko'okam has ahg g Jesus
hab kaijch, “Naptsh woho wo i wua g ge'e cheopi k am uhpam ep wo kei waik tash ab? Pegih, ab g hig i huduni kots t amjed k wo e tho'ibia maptp woho d wo Jiosh alithagk.”
Sh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ge'eged hab wa masma ep nahnko ahg hab kaijch,
“Ith atsh ha'i ha tho'ibia k atki wabshaba pi wo e nako mas wo hejel e tho'ibia. Nash hig pi woho d t-kownalig? Pegih, tt ab wo s-wohoch matp ab wo i huduni k wo e tho'ibia.
Ab o si hiwig g Jiosh ch hab e ahg mo d alithaj. Pegih, tt hig wo nei mas hu wo tho'ibia g Jiosh hemu.”
Chum wa hema hegam s-chu e'eskam mamt ab hab wa'ap ha nahngia kots t ab hab wa'ap s-ko'okam has ahg.
T am i thahm juh. T wehsko gei g s-chuhugam waik ohla ab.
Kutsh am i e ai g waik ohla. Sh si s-kaitham hab kaij g Jesus, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani,” mo hab d ahga, “Ni-Jioshga, Ni-Jioshga, shahchu apt ahgk am wabsh i ni-thagito?”
Sh ha'ijj hab kaij hegam mo am gegok, “Elijabad o ab chum waith.”
Tsh ab hema ha hekaj i med k an ha'ichu usko mat am wakch nawait ch ed k am uhgk i be k ab chum i'ich g Jesus.
Kush ha'i hab kaij, “Kia koi, tt hig wo nei mas ia wo jiwia g Elijabad k wo tho'ibia.”
Kutsh am si s-kaitham hab ha'ichu ep chei g Jesus k am hahawa i muh.
Kutsh hegai s-kowk ikus kuhpadag mash am s-tadnim naggia gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi ab si shel e wantsh. T g jewed u'ugij k gam si e hahai g ge'eged hohothai.
Kutki g hiha'ini gam si e kuhkpi'o. T mu'ijj hegam mat heki hu koi ab s-wohochuthch g Jesus ab i wuwha muhkig amjed
i thahm mat g Jesus i wuhsh k gm hu i wahp amai mo hab e a'aga Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim ch d Jerusalem. K mu'ijj ha neith amai.
Tsh ihtham shonthal g e-ge'ejig wehm am i nei mat g Jesus muh k taht g jewed u'ujig k sha'i si e totothsith k hab kaij, “Woho oki d Jiosh alithag.”
Sh eda mu'ijj am ha'ichug hegam u'uwi mo ga hu amjed wehmaj g Jesus ab Galilee t amjed ch am ha'ichukaj i wehmaj. Ihtham ash ga hu wabsh mehk gegok ch ab neith.
Sh am ha wehmaj g Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha-je'e g James ch Joses ch heg ehp mo d Zebedeebad wehm kihkam ch d ha-je'e g James ch John.
Tsh am hahawa jiwia ihtha s-kais o'othham mo hab chehgig Joseph ch ab Arimathea t amjed ch ab s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. K eda e aihim mat wo i hud.
Tsh heg hekaj gm hu hih ihtha Joseph ab Pilate wui k ab tahni g Jesus honshpadag. Kush g Pilate am ha chehani mamt wo mah.

Tsh gm hu uhpam jiwia. Kumtsh am wehhejed ab i huduni g Jesus honshpadag. K am mia hab chu'ig g Joseph hiha'ini ch ab heki hu cheotas hothai ch ed. Kumtsh am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g si s-kehg ikuskaj k am cheh heg eda cheo k ab hahawa g ge ge'e hothai i himchuth k ab hekaj kuh g hiha'ini. Tsh gm hu hahawa uhpam hihi hegam Joseph.
Kush am thadha g Mary Magdalene heg wehm hema Mary ch am neith mat hebai cheh.
Ba'ich tash o d shahwai. Tsh am thatha g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi Pilate wui
k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, s-chegito ach mo wa ihtha s-chu iattomkam hab kaij matsh uhpam wo e chegito matsh d wo waik i tashk.

Neh pt am wo ha cheha mat wo si e nuhkuth g hiha'ini waik tash ab. T hekaj hab pi wo e nako g piongaj mas ab wo ha ehs g honshpadag k hab wo ha ahgi g hemajkam matki i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Neh, ihtha ha-iattogi at ba'ich wo i si pi ap'ek mo g wehpegkam.”
Kush hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Am g ha'i wo ha u'uk g shonthal k am has i masma ab wo nuhkuth g hiha'ini.”
Kutsh am ha oi g shonthal. Kutsh gm hu hihim k ab si s-wihnam i kuh g hiha'ini k an bithsh g hothai k ab si chepos. Sh ihtham shonthal am nuhkuth g hiha'ini tash oitham ch chuhug oitham.
Sh am e aihim g thomig tash. Tsh am hiha'ini wui hihi g Mary Magdalene heg wehm hema Mary.
D am hahawa si u'ugij g jewed. Tsh g anghil ab i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k im hu hab i melch g hothai k an thahm thahiwua.
Sh g wuhioshaj si s-masma tonod hab masma mo g wepgi. Sh g wehschugaj hab masma s-toha mo g s-mohoni gew.
Kutsh wabsh woho'i totoths hegam shonthal mo ab nuhkuth k si gigiwek ch amjed hab sha e juh mo d wabsh ko'i.
Kush ab neok hegai anghil ch hab kaij ab ha wui hegam u'uwi, “Pi g am wo sha'i e totothsith. M ani wa s-mahch mam g Jesus chuhkug an chum gahghim.
Ab g wo i hihim k wo nei mo pi ia hu ha'ichug iia mat ia e cheh. Uhpam at ep i wuhsh muhkig amjed mo wa hab wa kaij.

Kumt am s-hohtam wo hihim k wo ha ahgi hegam mo am wehmajkahim mat uhpam e chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt gm hu wo hihim k am ha'ab wo nei. Neh, am ani em-ahgith mo has i kaij.” Bash kaij g anghil.
Kutsh si e totothsith k si s-hohtam ga hu hihi ab amjed g hiha'ini k eda si s-hehgig ch ia hu chum wohp matsh wo t-ahgi.
Tsh wabshaba haha wabsh ha nam g Jesus k hab kaij, “T wo s-em ho'ige'el g Jiosh.” Tsh ab si i shul wui k an ui tahtdaj an k ab si ihm.
Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo ni-ehbenith. Am g wo hihim k wo ha ahgi g ni-wepnag mat am wo hihi Galilee wui k am ha'ab wo ni-nei.”
Kutsh gm hu hihi hegam u'uwi. Tsh hegam shonthal mash am nuhkuth g hiha'ini am ha'i hihim k gd hu thatha kihhim t am k am ha ahgi g u'ugchu papal wehs ha'ichu matsh haschu has i e juh.
Tsh g u'ugchu papal am ha wehm e nam g ge'eged k am e a'aga k am hahawa mu'i ha mah g lial ihtham shonthal
k hab ha ahg, “Bamt wo chei matki am thatha g piongaj chuhug ch ed k am em-ehs g honshpadag mam kohksh.
Kutp wo sha kah g kownal mam has i kaij, tt wo wa em-tho'ibia.”
Kutsh am ui g lial hegam shonthal k am hab e juh mam has i ha ahg. Ia o i ithani hab masma am e a'aga am ha shahgith g Tutuligo.
Kuchd ahchim gamai hemako am hihi heg wui tho'ag am Galilee ch ed mo wa hab kaij g Jesus matt am wo hihi.
D g Jesus am ha'ichug. Kuchd ab si ihm. D eda hi wa ha'i sha pi wohoch.
D ab si i t-miabi g Jesus k hab kaij ab t-wui, “Jiosh at ab ni-mah g gewkthag wehs ha'ichu thahm an thahm kahchim ch ed ch ith thahm jewed.

Gamai g wo hihim wehsko hemajkam ha wui k wo i ha mashcha g ha'ichu ni-ahga k ab wo i ha pahl wapko am chehchegch g ni-ohg Jiosh ch ahni ep ni-chehcheg mani d alithaj ch heg ehp Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Ab ani em-chehani mamt has wo masmak. Kumt ab wo i ha mashcha g hemajkam mat ab wo s-wohog elithath wehs ha'ichu mani haschu ab em-chehani. Kunt chum hekith wo em-wehmajk, chum as wo huhug g jewed.”
Ith o d s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. Shonaj ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj.

o an hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah. Heg atki an o'oha mash g Jiosh hab kaij ab e-alithag wui: An ant hema wo i wuhshath mat am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam mapt ahpi am wo i wuhsh jewed thahm.

Ith at gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch: Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako. Neh, bash ahg g e-alithag g Jiosh.

Kutsh wa woho am hab e juh. M atsh hema i wuhshath g Jiosh g o'othham. K ith hab chehgig John ch am i e chehgi Judea chekshani ch ed miabithch hegai akimel mo hab chehgig Jordan. Ab ash e enigadathch g John g ka-mihyo wopo ikuskaj ch ge hogi giwud ch heg wa'i hekaj e gegosith kohktpul ch sit'ol. Kush mu'i hemajkam am wui hihim heg amjed chekshani chum hems ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed. Sh g John am amog ch hab ha ahg, “Mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko. T g Jiosh ab wo i s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig.” Neh, bash kaij g John ch am ep ha pahl wapkon akimel ch ed hegam mash ab wui hihimath ch am ahg g pi ap e-chu'ichig.
Sh hab ha ahg g John. “Pi g hab wo ni-elith manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ab atsh hema wo i wuhsh ni-oithk mat d wo si s-has ha'ichuk.
Ahni ani hi wabsh em-pahl wapkon. Tsh wabshaba heg ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matsh heg chum hekith wo em-wehmajk.”

Kush eda g Jesus wenog ab d kihkam heg eda al kihhim mash d Nazareth ch am eda g Galilee chekshani. Kutsh am i him k am jiwia mo am oimmed g John hab ahgk matsh wo e pahl wako. Tsh g John am pahl wako akimel ch ed.
