Tsh ab wabsh i chum wuhsh ab amjed g shuhthagi. Tsh g thahm kahchim ab si i e kuhpi'o. Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i hud ab ab g Jesus hab sha masma mat g hohhi.
Sh ab neok g Jiosh thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ahpi ap d si ni-tachuithch ni-alithag ch am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma.”
Am wa'i hekaj, sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab ahg g Jesus matsh gm hu hejelko wo hih.

Kutsh am hih tohono jewed wui k am ha'ichug gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash ab mo am ha'ichug g mischini ha'ichu thoakam. Sh heg i oitham g ge Jiawul am chum s-wuimk pi ap'ekam ch ed. Sh wabshaba g anghil am nuhkuth.
Sh am hu hebai, tsh e kuhpach hegai John mo am ha pahl wapkon. Tsh heg i thahm am jiwia g Jesus Galilee chekshani t am am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh
hab kaijch, “Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i s-wohoch iththa s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. E at ai mat am ba'ich wo i e tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig.”

Neh, bash kaijhim ch an him hugithaj an hegai al kahchki mo d Galilee Kahchki. Sh eda am ha'i oiopo g waptopi ha u'utham ch am wuhpa g e-chuagia shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh am ha cheh g Jesus. Kush d ihtham gohk e wepngam mo hab chehgig Simon ch Andrew.
Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Ab g wo i ni-oith k pi hegam wa'i waptopi wo ha u'uth ch wabshaba g hemajkam wo i ha wanchkwua ab Jiosh wui.”
Kutsh ha hekaj thagito g e-chikpan k am i oi.
Tsh am sha'i hihim k haha wabsh gohk ep ha cheh. Ihtham ash am kegchuth g e-chuagia wahlko ch ed ch d James ch John. Kush g ohgaj hab chehgig Zebedee.
Tsh ab i ha wai g Jesus. Kutsh gm hu i oi am thagitok g e-ohg wahlko ch ed ha wehm g ha-pionag.
Kutsh am hihim k am thatha Capernaum kihhim t am. Tsh am i e ai g shahwai mach heg eda t-mihshmath. Kutsh am i wahp ha-cheopi ed. Tsh g Jesus am ha mihshmath.
Kutsh g hemajkam ab si e totoths ab mashchamathaj amjed nash pi ba'ich i si s-e mamachim ha mashcham mo hi hegam mo d chum chehanig ha mashchamtham.
Kush eda am hema ha'ichug g o'othham mash g jiawul u'ukch g chegitoithaj.

Tsh heg hab juh mash am si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Shahchu ap ahgch t-kudut, ahpi Jesus map ab Nazareth t amjed. Napt heg hekaj ia wabsh jiwia mapt gm hu hab wo i ni-juh ith amjed o'othham? S-m-mahch ani map d hekia s-ap'ekam ch ab d Jiosh amjedkam.”
Tsh g Jesus ab si s-keh'el g jiawul k hab kaij, “Ab g wabsh i pi shahmuni k gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
Tsh g jiawul si ugij ihtha o'othham. Kutsh si hihin. Tsh g jiawul hahawa thagito.
Kutsh wehsijj si e totothsith k ab a'ai i e kakke, “Shah'o d ahga ihtha? No d wechij mashchama? No pi ab kaiham g jijawul mo haschu ab i ha chehani.”
Kutsh an wehsko i e ahgithahi am Galilee ch ed matsh haschu s-kehg hab juh g Jesus.
Kutsh ab i wuwha hegam Jesus cheopi t amjed k gm hu wa hekaj hihi ha-kih wui hegam Simon ch Andrew. Tsh g James ch John ep i ha oi.
Kush eda am wo'o g Simon hohnig je'e ch g s-tonjigkaj mumku. Kumsh am ahgith g Jesus.
Tsh am i wah mo hebai wo'o k ab bei nowij ab k i wamigi. Kutsh ha hekaj am i ap'et k am ha'ichu ha hihithol.
Kutsh gm hu si i juh. Tsh g hemajkam ab i ha ui hegam mo kok'o ch hegam ehp mo g jijawul u'ukch g ha-chegitoithag.
k am i e hemapai ha-kih ab.
Kutsh g Jesus wehs ha thothaj ihtham k gm hu hab i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed. Sh g jijawul s-mahch mo d Jiosh alithag. Sh wabshaba pi ha hiwgith g Jesus mas ihtham am wo ah mo hedai wud.
Ba'ich si'alim mash wabsh kia s-chuhugam, tsh am i wami g Jesus k gm hu hejelko him k am e ho'ige'ithahun.
Kutsh ihtham Simon am i gahghio.
k am hebai chehg k am ahgith, “Mu'i hemajkam o an m-gahg.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Oi g wo. Tt hig wo hihi am ba'ich kihhim wui. Nt am ep wo ha mihshmath nant pi heg hekaj i wuhsh.”
Kutsh am i ha mihshmethahi ha-chechopi ed wehsko Galilee chekshani ch ed k gm hu hab i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.

Sh am hu hebai, tsh am hema jiwia Jesus wui k mumku heg hekaj mo hab e a'aga ‘leprosy’ ch chum pi ha thoajig. Ith ash ab wui e sho'igchuth g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pt wo e nako mapt wo ni-thoaj maptp wo tatchuath.”
Kutsh ab si i s-ho'ige'ith k ab taht k hab ahg, “Mant hab wo wa m-juni.”
Kutsh ha hekaj thoa.

Jesus atsh am hahawa si shel ahgith k hab kaij, “Pi g hedai sha'i ahgith k wabsh am wo him k am wo i e chehgi pahl wui. T am wo m-chechga. Kupt wo ha mah hegai mo wa g Jiosh em-chehani hab masma mat g Mosesbad o'oha mamt heg hekaj wo wohokamch mamt thoa.”

Kutsh oi wa ihtha o'othham wehsko i ha ahgithahi g hemajkam ab amjed. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako g Jesus mas am ep wo i wuhsh mo am hemajkamag kihhim ch ed k wabshaba gn hu hab wabsh jegko oimmed. Sh g hemajkam am wui himto ga hu wepsko amjed.
Kush d wabsh i he'ekia tash matsh am ep thatha hegam Jesus Capernaum t am. Tsh gn hu wa hekaj kaitha matsh am thatha.
Kutsh sha'i si mu'i e hemapai g hemajkam k am shuhthath g kih k ab kihjeg t ab ab wabsh i si s-kawkam gegokiwua. Kush g Jesus am ha mihshmath.
Tsh am ha'i thatha hema u'athch g pi himithkam. Ith ash ab wabsh i s-moik ch am wo'o e-wahkus ch ed. Kush gi'ik o'othham an u'a.
Sh wabshaba pi am hu sha'i jeg nash pi sha'i si s-hemajkamag. Kutsh gn hu i chehchsh kih thahm k am ge maggat g kih ma'ishpadag am hu i mash am thaha g Jesus k am i huduni g pi himithkam.
Kutsh g Jesus am i nei g ha-wohochuthadag k hab kaij heg wui pi himithkam, “Ni-nawoj, ab ani s-m-ho'ige'ith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”
Kush eda am ha'i thadha hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ash hab e ahg.
“Ih, pi oki ap neok hab masma e wepogithch g Jiosh. Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.”
Kutsh ha hekaj ha amich g Jesus mo haschu am oithahim k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i oithahim

manis hab wabsh kaij ch pi woho edgith g gewkthag mant gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. Bam elith mo s-pehegim hab e kaij mat gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj no ge hedai s-mahch mas s-wohom hab e juh.
Pegih, nt wo em-chehgi mani woho ge gewkthag ch hab wua mani has i kaij ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.” K hab hahawa kaij ab wui hegai pi himithkam,
“I g wamig k am beh'i g e-wahkus k gm hu hihm uhpam.”
Kutsh am ha hekaj bei g e-wahkus k gm hu hih uhpam am wehs ha-nena ed. Kutsh wehsijj si has i e tahtk k ab i si has elith g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Pi ach hebai sha'i neith ha'ichu hab masma.”
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus k gm hu thatha ge shuhthagi bahsho. Tsh mu'i am e chehm g hemajkam. Sh am ep ha mashcham.

Kush am hu hebai ep hihimath ch am bihbij amai mam am ha kowlant g lial kownal wehhejed. Sh am hema chikpan ch hab chehgig Levi (Matthew). Tsh g Jesus am jiwia wui k hab ahg, “Ab g i hihm k ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.” Kutsh am ha hekaj wabsh i oi.

Tsh am hu hebai i cheka. Kutsh g Levi am hab juh g gegosig ha wehhejed hegam Jesus. Kush am thadhak ch e gegosith. Sh am ha'i oiopo hegam mo d t-chehanig t-mashchamtham ch d ep Palasi. Ihtham Palasi o chum s-gewkam oithchug g t-himthag. K eda m u'i am oithchug g Jesus hegam mo pi am hu si oithchug g t-shohshon ha-himthag. Kush ha'i ihtham d lial t-kowlanttham heg wehhejed mash d ge'e kownal wehs jejewed thahm. Kush hegam t-chehanig t-mashchamtham hab ha ahg hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham g Jesus, “Ih, k haschu ahgch g em-mashchamtham ha wehm e gegosith g pi ap hemajkam, chum hems g lial t-kowlantham?”

Tsh am i ha kaiok g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ihtham pi ap hemajkam o s-e tho'ibiamk hab masma mat g kok'otham wo s-e thoajitham. Hegam mat hab wo e elithath mo s-ap'e at pi wo tatchua g mahkai. Pi ant hab ahgk ia jiwia jewed thahm manis wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo pi e tho'ibiamk.”

Hebaichuj ach he'ekkio pi t-gegosith matt ab wo t-ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. Kutsh am hu hebai am i e ai matsh hab wo chum e juh. Sh eda ihtham Jesus pi hab e wua. Kumsh hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Hemu o he'ekkio pi e gegosith hegam mo g Palasi ha mashcham ch hegam mo g John ha mashcham. K eda haschu ahgch ihtham pi hab masma hab e wua mo ab si m-wecho e mashcham?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nat hig pi wo e gegos g wo ha hohntam naipijju mat eda heg am wo ha wehmajk?
T am wo i e ai mat pi am hu wo ha wehmajk. T am hahawa pi wo e gegos. Pegih, bat wo wa e juh ihtham mant hekith pi ia hu wo ha wehmajk.”

Sh am hahawa chum ha tashogith g Jesus mat g mashchamaj pi ap wo wehnath g ha-himthag ash hab kaijch, “Pi at hedai g wechij ikuskaj wo shohsho g hekiuchij lihwa mat wo s-e wia nat pi wo i thahiwua k ba'ich wo i wantsh g hekiuchij.

K hab wa'ap pi hab mahs machs am wo toa g wechij uhdwis wadag am eda g hekiuchij ha'ichu elithag kostal. T wo am hu wantsh g hekiuchij k wo iawua. Wechij uhdwis wadag at am wo e toa wechij kokstal ch ed.”
Sh am hu hebai hihim ihtham Jesus t-mihshmetha tash ed. Kush am eshas g pilkani wohg huhugith an. Sh ihtham ha'i ab ha wohni g pilkani ch i mohon ch ko'a.
Kush ha'i hegam Palasi ab ha neith ch ab kakke g Jesus, “Shahchu o ahgch hab ha'ichu junihim mo pi hab sha'i chum mahs t-mihshmetha tash ed?”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Bo wabsh masma hab e wua matsh wa g Davidbad. Pi amtki chegito matsh heg has e Juh am i bihugimk. Bo chug'ig g Jiosh o'ohana

matsh wa am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ui g pahn k huh hegam ha wehm mash am wehmaj. K d hegai pahn mo am e to'aw k ch hegam d wa'i ha wuikam papal. T eda hemho wa am hab e juh. K heg hekaj am wa s-ap'e matsh ab mah g pahn hegai pahlibad mash am ha'ichug ch hab chehgig Abiathar.
Ith o am wohokamchuth mo g chehanig d i chum ha wehmtadag g hemajkam. Em-mihshmetha tash at am e ap'ech em-wehhejed. Kumt pi heg wehhejed e nahto e-mihshmetha tash.
Ni ahni d Jiosh si Kehsha ch gewkthag am thahm g em-mihshmetha tash.”
Sh am hu hebai, tsh am ep i wahp ihtham Jesus hema cheopi ch ed. Kush am hema thaha g o'othham mash g nowij mahnikodag.
Kush am ha'i thadha g Palasi ch am s-nen'eith mas hab wo juh g thoajitha am ha mihshmetha tash ed nash pi ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk.
Sh g Jesus hab kaij heg wui mahnikokam, “Ia g hu i kekiwua.” Kutsh gm hu i kekiwua.

Sh ab hahawa ha kakke, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elith mo pi hiwgithas mihshmetha tash ed mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth? Ab o em-ab mamt wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam k am wo i e nako mamt wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat am hu wo e ko'ij. Aha namt wabsh wo ha hiwigi mat wo e ko'ij?” Kush pi hedai has sha'i kaij

nash pi pi sha'i pihk e elith heg wui mahnikokam. Sh heg hekaj si s-ko'okam an i ha nenashad g Jesus ch eda ep pi ap e tahtk ha wehhejed ch ash hab kaij heg wui o'othham, “Ab g si i shelin g e-nowi.” Kutsh am wabsh i chum shelin k am wa'i hekaj ap'et.

Kutsh babgat g Palasi matsh ha thoaj ha mihshmetha tash ab k gm hu hihim k am ha wehm e nam g piongaj hegai mo wa d kownal heg eda chekshani ch hab chehgig Herod. Kush ihtham e wehm a'aga matsh has hig masma wo mua g Jesus.
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus ge shuhthagi wui. Kutsh mu'i hemajkam am i oi ab Galilee t amjed

ch ab Judea t amjed, chum hems ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed, ch Idumia chekshani ch gn hu aigojed g Jordan akimel ch gm hujed mash d Tyre ch Sidon kihhim. Ihtham mu'i atsh am himto am kaiok mo he'es i ge'e ha'ichu hab wuihim g Jesus.
Kush heg am ha ahgith hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham matsh g wahlko an wo u'ukchith am wehhejed natsh pi g hemajkam wabsh wo i si chehmo.
Kush wehs am chum s-ahimk g kok'otham ch ab s-tahtmamk mat wo ha ap'et natsh pi mu'ijj ha thothaj.
Kutsh hekith wo sha nei g Jesus hegam mash g jijawul ha u'ukch k ab wo i e sho'igch wui k wo si hihin k hab wo chei, “Ahpi ap d Jiosh alithag.”
Sh g Jesus am si ha chehani mat pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi mo hedai wud.

Tsh am hu hebai, tsh ab i chesh g Jesus kawulk t ab k ab i wai hegam mash ab s-wohochuth. Tsh ab wui i hihi. Kutsh gamai gohk am i ha chuhcha ab ha wui hab kaijch, “Ahpim amt chum hekith wo ni-wehmajkath. Kunt hebaichuj am wo em-cheha mamt am hebai wo hihim k wo ha mihshmath.
Kumt wo edgithath g gewkthag mamt gm hu hab wo i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”
Neh, bash kaij ch am i ha chuhcha hegam gamai gohk. Hema hegam o d Simon. Kutsh heg hab ep chehch Peter mo hab d ahga Hothai.
Ha'i ehp o d James ch John ch d Zebedee a'alithag. Kutsh ihtham hab ep ha chehch g Jesus ‘Tataniki Namkam.’

Ha'i ehp o d Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, ch Thomas. K hema d hegai mo d James ch d alithaj hegai mo hab chehgig Alphias. K hema hab ep chehgig Simon ch d hema hegam mo tatchua matt ahchim Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g t-kownaltalig. K hema d Thaddaus
K hema d hegai mat gagda g Jesus k hab chehgig Judas Iscariot. Neh, ihtham gamai gohk ash d Jesus chuhchai. Kush an oithchug.
Kutsh am uhpam hih g Jesus mash am kih. Tsh hegam gamai gohk am i oi. Kutsh g hemajkam am ep i e hemapath k sha'i si mu'itha. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas ep wo e gegos ihtham Jesus.
Kutsh am i kah g hahajunij k ab i hihim k am chum s-behimk hab elithch mat sha heb hu wua g e-chegitoi.

Sh am hai gegok g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch am thatha Jerusalem t amjed ch ash hab kaij, “Jijawul ha-ge'ejig oki an u'ukch g chegitoithaj ihtha.” Sh ha'i ep hab kaij, “Moki g jijawul ha-ge'ejig ab mahkch g gewkthag. K ith hekaj gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”
Tsh oi wa g Jesus ab i ha waith k hab masma am i ha tashogi, “Kus haschu ahgk hig g Jiawul wo i wuhshath g hejel e-pionag?
S-mahch am mat g o'othham wo padch g hejel e-jewedga mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
Kut g e wehm kihkam hab wa'ap wo padch g hejel e-kihthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
Pegih, t has hig masma g jijawul pi wo padch g hejel e-gewkthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia?

Neh, wohppo'ith ani g ge Jiawul hegam mo an ha u'ukch. Kum s-mahch mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas am hu wabsh wo wah hema kih ed mat wo s-ha'ahamak k am wo ui g enigaj, heg hi wa matp wehpeg wo wulsh.
“Wehs o gm hu hab i junihog g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g Jiosh.
K wabshaba si ge'ej g em-chu'ichig mamtp ab wo has ah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T g Jiosh pi hekith gm hu hab wo i juh.”
Bash kaij g Jesus no pi hab ge ahg mash g ge Jiawul u'ukch. Kush eda d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mo an u'ukch.

Kutsh am hahawa thatha g je'ej ch wepngaj g Jesus matsh wo nei. Sh wabshaba mu'ijj an wehgaj thadha g Jesus. Sh heg hekaj gm hu wabsh gegok jeg ed ch am chum waith. Kumsh am ahgith, “Neh'e, m-je'e ch m-wepnag o am gegok jeg ed ch ab m-waith.”
Sh g Jesus an i nenhoghi. Kush mu'i an wehgaj thadha hegam mo ab kaiham. Kush hab kaij, “Neh, ihtham mo ab ni-kaiham o heg wa wepo mo d ni-wepnag ch ni-je'e.
Hegam mat hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui o hab a masma mo d ni-wepnag ch ni-je'e.”

Sh am hu i hebai, sh g Jesus am ep ha mihshmath ge shuhthagi hugith an. Kush sha'i si mu'i hemajkam an wehgaj. Tsh heg hekaj gn hu i chesh g Jesus wahlko ch ed k an thahiwua k amjed ha mashcham. Sh hegam gn hu wabsh gegok shuhthagi hugith an.
Kush mu'i ha'ichu ha tashogith g wepogitha ahgakaj ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Ith ash d ha'ichu ahgaj mo hab kaij: “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig wepogithch mat hema an i chum gantad g e-kaichka e-oith ed.
T ha'i gn hu wabsh shul wohg ch ed. T g u'uwhig am thatha k ko'ito.
Kut ha'i gn hu wabsh shul waw t ab mo pi ge'ej g jewed k ab ha hekaj hi wa chum i wuhsh no pi pi an hu juhk g jewed.
T oi wa hekith ab i chesh g tash. T ha hekaj wabsh gaksh no ge mehk tatk.
T ha'i gn hu wabsh ep shul sha'i ch ed. T oi wa hekith ab i ge'ege g sha'i k wabsh ha koktha. T pi ab hu ha kait.
T wabshaba hegam mat gn hu shul moihuna ch ed an i wuhshani k ab kait. Ha'i atp hems waikko wehst-mahm ab kait k ha'i ep chuhthpo wehst-mahm ab ep kait k ha'i siant ab ep kait.
Neh, am g wo i oithahim ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch amjed am hahawa i e hejelkai. Kutsh ab wui i hihi g chuhchaij ha'i ep ha wehm k ab kakke, “A tt has masma wo s-ha amich g ha'ichu wepogitha ahga?”

Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Nt wo em-ahgi mo has d ahga no pi g Jiosh em-hiwgith mamt wo s-mai hegai mo hemu am maskogith ab amjed g e-kownaltalig. Ni wabshaba heg wa'i ha ahgith ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuthamk.
T hab pi wo amich ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as wo ha'ichu neith k wo ha'ichu kah. T g Jiosh pi gm hu hab wo sha'i i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig, heg hi wa mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi.”
Kush hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Mu'i ani ha'ichu chum em-ahgith g ha'ichu wepogitha ahgakaj. Kumki eda pi amichuth. Nt hemho am wo wa em-tashogi.
Hegai ha'ichu eshtham ani wepogith hegai mat an wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K g kaichkaj d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ith at am wo chum e ei o'othham amichuthadag ed.
K eda ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-kawpk hab masma mo g wohg. T g Jiawul am wabsh s-pehegi wo ha wohppo'i mo haschu i kah.

“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. T ihtham wo si s-hohho'i Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab kaiok k wabshaba pi wihnam ab hu wo bebhe k ch ab hi wa al he'es wo s-wohochuthath.
T ab wabsh wo i chum hih g a'appema. T ha hekaj wabsh wo ta'i i shul.
“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai s-sha'ig
no pi e sha'ijithch heg hekaj kudutadag ch s-kaisthag ch s-tahhathkam. Kut pi ha'ichu hab wo juh am Jiosh wehhejed.

“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-moik hab masma mo g moihuna. Kut ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo si i nuhkuth e-ihbthag ed k gm hu wo i ha ahgithahi g hemajkam k ha'akia ab wo wa'i ep ha ba'iha, Ha'i atp hems waikko wehst-mahm wo i ha ba'iha k ha'i chuhthpo wehst-mahm k ha'i siant ab ep wo i ha ba'iha.”

Kush hab hahawa ep kaij am ha wui, “Wohokam o wepogithas mo g lahmpa tonlig. Namt hig wo ehsto g lahmpa ab mehithk aha namt an wo thai mat hebai wo em-tonlithch. Pegih, mt hab wa masma pi wo chum ehsto g wohokam.
Wehs at wo s-e mai matp haschu chum e ehstokch.
Am g wo i oithahim ahpim mam kah ihtha.”

Sh hab ep kaij am ha wui, “Am g wo s-amichuth mam haschu i kah. Mamt has i masma s-ba'ama ab wo ha'ichu ha mah hedai i, t hab masma ab uhpam wo i e nodagi ha'ichu ab em-wui ch atp hems gm hu ba'ich i.
Hegam mat s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag at ba'ich ep wo i nei. T hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj wabsh wo heb hu wua.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Jiosh kownaltalig o heg wepogithas matp hems g o'othham am gantad g ha'ichu kai e-oith ed.
k am haha wabsh nenida he'ekia i tash. T g eshaj am i wuhshani k hahhagt k ab hahawa mudathagt k ab kait. K eda pi mahch g o'othham mo has masma hab e wua
no pi g ha'ichu kai wabsh hejel ab i wuhshani ab jewed t amjed.
T am wabsh i chum bai. Kut am ha hekaj ha cheha g e-chikpantham mat wo hihk k wo i ba'iha.”
Kush hab ep kaij, “Am ant ba'ich wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig am wepogithch g ha'ichu kai.
Neh, heg am e'esha mo al chumaj
ch oi wa am wo wuhshani k ha'as wo i ge'etha mo g s-ehheg uhs. Tp hems heg ab an wo koksht g u'uwhig. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo ge'e i ge'etha g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as al chum wo shonwua.”
Neh, bash masma heg wa'i hekaj am ha mihshmath wepogitha ahga mat he'es wo i s-amich.
Tsh gm hu wo hihi g hemajkam. Kutsh am haha wabsh ba'ich wo i ha tashogi g e-chuhchai g ha'ichu e-ahga.
Tsh gm hu si i juh. Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Oi g wo. Ga att hu shuhthagi aigojed wo i chehchsh.”
Kutsh am i ha thagito g hemajkam k ab i chehchsh wahlko ch ed wehmaj g Jesus. Kutsh eda am ha'i ep chum i ha oi g al wapalko.
Tsh ab haha wabsh i meh g s-gewk jegos k sha'i si hewed. Tsh g shuhthagi sha'i si uhgk hab i e juh k gd hu wabsh e was wahlko ch ed.
Sh eda am wo'ok ch kohsh g Jesus si baikko g wahlko. Kutsh am wuha g chuhchaij k hab ahg, “Nap pi has sha'i elith mattki wo wachkk.”
Tsh am hahawa wamig k ab si wui neo g hewel ch shuhthagi k hab ahg, “Am g wabsh i thotholimat k ha'asa i hewed.” Kutsh ab wabsh si heweto k g shuhthagi gm hu wabsh i pi hoini.
Sh hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo ha'ichu ehbithath ch ab wabsh wo ni-hiwgath.”
Kutsh eda si s-ehbeni k wabsh ab a'ai i e kakke, “A kus hedai wud ihtha o'othham mat g hewel ch shuhthagi ab kaiha.”
Kutsh gm hu thatha miabithch mo am d Gerasa kihhim.
Tsh ab wabsh i chum hud g Jesus wahlko t amjed. Kutsh ab hema nam g cheoj mash ab e ulish cheo ch ed mash eda ab d hiha'ini.
Sh g jijawul an u'ukch ihtha. Kush pi hedai e nakog mas wo mahshoch.
Mu'ikko amsh chum wulshshap g e hukshchim wapainomikaj. Sh wabshaba wabsh wanikumiak. Sh pi hedai e nakog mas wo shohbi nash pi sha'i si s-gewk.
Tash oitham ch chuhug oitham ash am ulinig hiha'ini ch ed ch am tho'ag shahgith am hihnk ch e hikkumiak g hohothaikaj.
Tsh am jiwia g Jesus. Kutsh mehkjed chehg k am med k ab i gei wui.
k am si s-kaitham neok k hab ahg, “Ni-thagitoni, ahpi alithaj g si Jiosh. Bani m-ahgith ab si ihmch g Jiosh mapt pi ia hu wo ni-hudawogath.”
Bash kaij nash pi g Jesus ab i s-wuhshthamk g jiawul ith amjed o'othham.
Sh g Jesus ab hahawa kakke, “Shahp chehgig?” Sh hab kaij hegai o'othham, “Bani chehgig ‘Mu'ichu’ nach pi mu'ij,”
ch ab wui si e sho'igchuth mat pi mehk gm hu hab wo i ha juh hegam jijawul mo an u'ukch.
Kush eda inhab sha'i si mu'i kokji e nuhkuth kawulk huda.
Kutsh g jijawul ab si tahni g Jesus, “Am g hig t-hiwgith matt am wo i wahp ha eda hegam kokji.”

Kutsh ha hiwigi. Kutsh ab i wuwha heg amjed o'othham k gm hu hihim k am i wahp ha eda hegam kokji. Kutsh ihtham am e totothsith k am agshp i wohp k gd hu shul ge shuhdagi ch ed k wachkk k ash eda am hu d i gohk mihl.
Hegam mash am chum ha nuhkuth atsh e totothsith k wohp k gn hu wehsko ha ahgith mat has e juh. Kutsh am himto g hemajkam s-neithamk matsh haschu has e juh
k am hu thatha. Kush am thak ch e enigadathch ch ash wabsh s-ap'e. Kutsh wehsijj si e totoths.
Hegam mash am neith atsh an i ha ahgithahi mat has e juh hegai mo g jijawul an u'ukch k am ep ha ahgi mat has e juh g kokji.
Kutsh ab wabsh si s-bahbagi i ahgi g Jesus g hemajkam, “Mapt gm hig wo i e mehkoth ab t-amjed.”
Kush g Jesus an cheshajhim wahlko ch ed. Tsh ihtha o'othham mash g jijawul u'ukch ab chum ahgi, “Nt wo m-oi.”
Kutsh oi wa pi hiwgith k ash hab wabsh ahg, “Pt wabsh wo wa hih am e-kih wui k wo ha ahgi g e-nan'aipijju mat haschu si s-kehg hab m-juni g Jiosh.”
Kutsh gm hu hih ihtha o'othham k gn hu ha ahgithahi g hemajkam amai mash am d Wehst-mahm Kihhim matsh he'es ge'e ha'ichu hab juni g Jesus. Kutsh wehsijj ab si has i e taht hegam mash kah.
Kutsh an ep thadhaiwua ihtham Jesus wahlko ch ed k gn hu aigo i chehchsh.
Tsh ab hema i hih g o'othham k d ha'ichu amai ha-cheopi ed ch hab chehgig Jairus. Tsh ab i hud g Jesus. Kutsh ab wui i gehsh
k hab kaij, “Si g s-ni-ho'ige'ith. Ni-chehiaga o muhkhim. Pt am wo him k wo thoaj.”
Kutsh am i chum hih matsh wo oi ihtha o'othham. Kush eda g hemajkam gn hu wabsh i si bihagch.
Sh eda am hema ha'ichug g uwi ch mumku gamai gohk a'ahithagkaj. Sh heg wehs oitham g eh'edaj chum hekith jegwoni.
Kush mu'i ha'ichu nakog ab ha amjed g mamakai ch wabshaba wabsh ba'ich i mumku. Kutsh g lialigaj huhug.
Sh am hahawa i kah mash haschu has junihim g Jesus. Kutsh am s-apkot matsh am wo jiwia wui. Kutsh ab oithk i him k an taht g wehschugaj
hab e ahgch, “Chum anis hems an wabsh wo taht g wehschugaj, t wo ni-ap'et.”
Tsh ha hekaj am wabsh si huh g eh'edaj. Tsh e taht mat ap'et.
Kutsh g Jesus taht matsh g thoajig gewkthag sha wuhsh ab ab k am ha hekaj i sikoliwua hemajkam ha wui k hab kaij, “Thoht an ni-taht?”
Kush hema hab kaij g chuhchaij, “An o si i t-bihagch g hemajkam. Kup haschu ahgch hab kaij, Thoht an ni-taht?”
Kutsh an i nenhoghim k ab i nei hegai uwi matsh an taht.
Kutsh heg si e tothsith k ab wui i gehsh k am ahgi mat thoa.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ni-uwiga, am apt wa thoa nap pi ab si ni-hiwig. Gam g s-ap e-taht k hihm k am wabsh s-thoakath.”
Kush am wabsh kia neok. Tsh am ha'i thatha ab kihj amjed hegai Jairus k hab kaij, “Muh at g m-chehiaga. Kupt haschu hig ahgk am ba'ich wo i kudu g ha mashchamtham?”
Kush wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab Jairus wui, “Pi g am sha'i has e tahtkkath ch am wabsh i ni-hiwgath.”
Bash kaij ch am hahawa ha ui g Peter ch James ch John k am i oi.
Kutsh am hihim k gd hu thatha mash am kih g Jairus. Kush am wabsh si s-nakosigam hab e wua no pi si shoani g hemajkam.
Kutsh am i wah g Jesus kih ch ed k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo shoanith. Heg o wa wepo ni-wehhejed mo wabsh kohsh g chehia.”
Kush wehsijj si s-ko'okam ash nash pi s-mahch matsh heki hu muh. Kutsh gm hu i ha wuhwhasith k am i ha ui hegam mash am wehmaj k am i wahp amai mash am wo'o g muhki. Tsh g jehjij am ep i ha oi.
Tsh g Jesus ab bei nowij ab k hab kaij, “I wamigi, chehia.”
Kutsh ab ha hekaj i wami g chehia k ab i hih. Kutsh si has i e taht g hemajkam.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wabsh mahki g chehia g ha'ichu hugi.” Kutsh ab mah. Sh hab ep ha ahg mat pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi mat has e juh. Kush d gamai gohk a'ahithag ihtha chehia.
Tsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus k gd hu thatha Nazareth t am mash am d si kihkam g Jesus.

Kush am d i t-mihshmetha tash. Tsh am ep ha mihshmath g Jesus ha-cheopi ed. Kush mu'i hemajkam am ha'ichug ch am kah ch si has i e tahtam k ab a'ai si e kakke, “ Kus hebai mai wehs ihtha amichuthadag k has masma hab wua ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu?
No hig pi woho d wabsh hegai huk chikpantham mo d madaj g Mary ch d ha-wehnag g James ch Joses ch Judas k ch Simon? No hig pi woho g u'uwi wepngaj ia kih?” Neh, bash kaij ch wabsh pi ha'ichuchuth.
Sh g Jesus si has i e tahtk ch hab kaij, “Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at chum hebai ab si has wo e elithath. T wabshaba g si kih'amkam o'othham ch wehmaj kihkam pi ab hu has wo elithath”
Kutsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas g si s-hasig ha'ichu hab wo junihith amai ch heg hab wa'i juh mat al he'ekia kok'otham ha thothaj.
Kutsh am hahawa i ha mihshmethahi g Jesus an wehgaj g Nazareth mo hebai i kihhimag.
Am hu hebai, tsh am ha cheha g e-chuhchai matsh go'ogok e wehm am wo ha mihshmethahi g hemajkam k gm hu hab wo i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.
Neh, bash ha ahg, “Gm amt hu wabsh wo i hihim k heg wa'i e-cheowikud wo u'ath ch pi wo bek g e-limoshan kostal o g lial o g ha'ichu hugi o g ha'ichu eniga.
Mt ab wo i em-wahpkith k wo em-thagio'ithath mamt hebai wo i ha mihshmath.
Kumt amokath k ab wo ai mamt ba'ich ep wo hihi.
Mt gm hu wabsh wo hihi mamt hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei gm hu shahmuthk g e-shuhshk. T ith wo ha chehgi mamt wabsh wo ha thagito nat pi pi ap hab chu'i. Thohwai.”
Kutsh wa woho an a'ai i ha ahgithahi g hemajkam matsh gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
Kutsh ab iawua g huhudakud ha-mohmi ab g kok'otham. Kutsh thotha. Tsh mu'i gm hu hab ep i ha juh g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.

An o wa wehsko hab kaithag mash has e junihim g Jesus. Kum am chum a'aga mas hedai wud. Ha'i o hab kaij matp hems d Elijabad o hema ehp hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K ha'i hab ep kaij matp hems d hegai Johnbad mat wa am i shonwuich g pahl wakona. E atsh wa mu'ajith k atp hems uhpam e chegito k hab s-hasig ha'ichu hab junihim.

Sh hegai Herod mo am d wa kownal Galilee chekshani ch ed hab ep kaij, “Thoki hegai John mo wa ha pahl wapkonahim. Heg ant mua. Kutki wabshaba uhpam e chegito k hekaj hab e nakog mat hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu.”

Ihtha Herod atsh wa heg hab juh am wehhejed g e-hohnig. Heg ash hab chehgig Herodias ch ash d chum hohnigaj g Herod wehnag. Kush heg hab chechgig Philip. Tsh g Herod ehs g hohnigaj. Sh amjed g John chum hekith hab chum a'aga. “Mo pi sha'i ap'e maps g e-wehnag hohnig wo ehs.” Sh g Herodias heg hekaj s-keh'ith ch am chehani g e-kun mat wo mua. Tsh Herod ha cheha g e-shonthalig mat wo be k wo kuh. K wabshaba si s-ap d o'othham g John. Kush heg hekaj s-ehbith g Herod ch wabsh kuhpch ch s-ap nuhkuth. Sh hab pi e nakog g Herodias mas wo mua. Kush g Herod s-hohho'ith ch kah g John mihshmetha, chum as si e kudut heg amjed.

Sh g Herodias am wabsh nenida mat am wo s-ap'et. Kutsh am hu hebai s-apkot wehhejed matsh e ai g Herod mahsithag tash. Kutsh g Herod ab i ha wai g e-shonthalig ha-ge'ege'ejig ch hegam mo d si haha'ichu am Galilee ch ed. Tsh ab i hihim k am wehmaj piast.
tsh am i wah g uwi madaj g Herodias k am e waila. Kush wehsijj s-hohho'ith. Sh g Herod hab ahg, “Maptp haschu hab wo i elithath ch ab wo i ni-tai, nt hab wo m-juni.” Sh pi has sha'i kaij ihtha uwi.
Kush hab hahawa ep si kaij, “Maptp haschu ab wo i ni-tai, nt wo m-mah, chum as hems eda hugkam g ni-kownaltalig.”
Kutsh am hahawa him k am kakke g e-je'e, “Shahchu ant wo tai?” Sh hab kaij g je'ej, “John mo'o apt wo tai”
Tsh ab uhpam i wah k hab ahg g Herod, “John mo'o apt wo ni-mah am hoas-ha'a ch ed thahshk”
Kutsh si pi ap e taht g Herod. Sh wabshaba wehsijj kah mo has i kaij. Tsh heg hekaj pi e nako mas pi am hu hab wo juh,
neh, k am hema cheha g shonthal mat am wo him k an wo shonchk g John mo'o k ab wo i bek. Kutsh am hih lilso ha-kih wui k an shonch g kuswoj g John
k am u'apa g mo'oj ab hoas-ha'a t ab k ab mah g uwi. Tsh g uwi am him k ab mah g e-je'e.
Kutsh am i kah hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham g John matsh e muhkith k am hihim k am bei g honaj mat wo s-ap juh.
Tsh am i uhpam thatha g Jesus chuhchai k am wehs ahgith mat haschu has i juh k haschu ep ha mashcham.
Sh eda ia'i ithani mu'i am thaiw g hemajkam. Tsh pi am hu sha'i ha apkot mas wo e gegos ihtham Jesus. Sh hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Am att hig wo t-hejelkoth k wo sha'i t-uh'ulinihogi.”
Kutsh gm hu hejelko hihi g wahlkokaj.
Mu'ijj ash ha neith mat gm hu hihi ch gm hu ha ba'ich wohp k gm hu heki hu thatha. Kutsh ihtham am hahawa i thatha
k am i huhud. Tsh g Jesus am i ha nei. Kush hab sha masma mo g heb hu hihimkam kakawal. Kutsh ab si i s-ha ho'ige'ith k mu'i ha'ichu ha mashcha.
Kutsh gm hu si i juh. Tsh g Jesus chuhchai am wui thatha k hab chum ahg, “Neh, mehk at wa'i juh. K eda ia hu wabsh si jegko.
Am g ha ahgith g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi kihhim wui k wo ha nolawt hegai mat wo huh”
Kush hab ha ahg, “Ahpim amt wo ha'ichu ha mah mat wo huh.” Sh hema hab kaij ihtham, “A tt haschukaj wo ha gegos? Mu'i lial at wo nam g ha'ichu hugi matt hekaj wo ha gegos.”
Sh ab ha kakke, “Shahchu o am i kahch? Am g wo neith.” Kutsh am neith k hab ahg, “Hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi.”
Kush hab ha ahg mat wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat wehsijj am wo thadhaiwua jewedo he'ekiajj i e wehm.
Tsh am ha cheha. Kutsh am thadhaiwua he'ekiajj i e wehm, ha'i am hu i siant k ch ha'i am hu i hehetaspo wepst-mahm.

Kutsh g Jesus am ui hegai ha'ichu hugi k am e thahm i nen k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahai hegai sismito k ab ha mah g e-chuhchai. Tsh an i ha mahkhi g hemajkam. Kutsh g waptopi an ep i hahain k ha mah. Tsh an i ha mahkhi.
Tsh wehsijj hug k oi wa hi si s-kokwoth.
Kutsh g chuhchaij an i u'ihim k u'apa g wihpi'ithaj mat am hu'i gamai gohk hoha wo ha shuhshuth.
Kush am hu d i hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'ijj g u'uwi ch a'al hegam matsh am e gegos.

Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi g e-chuhchai matsh gm hu aigo wo hihi heg wui kihhim mo hab chehgig Bethsaida. Tsh heg am wo wi'i k am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi e-kihki wui. Tsh heg hekaj an i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu hihi.
Tsh g Jesus am ha thagito g hemajkam. Tsh gm hu himto. Tsh am hahawa hejel i chesh kawulk thahm k am e ho'ige'ithahun.
Tsh am i hud. Sh am wabsh kia hejel ha'ichug. Tsh g wahlko gm hu si eda i cheka g shuhthagi.

Kush g hewel ab si s-gewkam med ha wui. Sh hekaj pi ap him. Kush s-ap ha neith g Jesus mash sha'i si s-wihnam himchuth g wahlko. Tsh koi mahsi. Kush ab him ha wui an wabsh shuhthagi thahm k hab e juh matsh an wabsh wo bij.
Tsh wabshaba am i nei s-chuhugam k ed k am si hihnk nash pi si s-ehbini hab e ahgch mash d wabsh kok'oi.
Kush hab ha ah, “Pi g wo sha'i ni-ehbenith. Thani ahni. Mt oi wo s-ap e taht,”
k gn hu hahawa i chesh wahlko ch ed. Kutsh am wabsh si heweto. Tsh ihtham si has i el
nash ge sha'i amichuth mokis ha'as edgith gewkthag. K eda d si s-hasig ha'ichu mat ha gegos hegam mu'i hemajkam.
Kutsh ga hu aigo i chehchsh k ab thatha amai mo am d Gennesaret k am wulsh g wahlko.
Tsh g hemajkam ha hekaj s-amich g Jesus
k gn hu a'ai wohp k an i ha u'ihi g kok'otham an ha-wohpikud ab k gd hu ha u'apa Jesus wui.

Kush an oiopo hegam Jesus ch am thaiw kihhim ch ed ch oithag ch ed. Kutsh g hemajkam ab wui wo ha u'apath g kok'otham ch ab wo ahgithath g Jesus mat wo ha hiwigi g kok'otham mat chum hems wabsh g hugithaj g enigaj an wo taht. Kush wehsijj thotha an tahtamk.
Kutsh ab ha'i hihi g Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham k am e hemapai an ha wehgaj hegam Jesus. Tsh eda wo chum e gegos.
Kutsh ihtham am cheh matsh am ha'i wabsh thadhaiwua pi hab masma ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi mo hab masma d ha-himthag g kekelibad.

Ahchim Tutuligo ach mu'i ha'ichu hab masma hab chum wua mo wa g t-kekelibadga. K ihtham Palasi wehs t-ba'ich i s-gewkam oith g ha-chehanig ch pi ha'ichu wo huh pi hab masma ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi mash wa g kekelibad.
Kut g ha'ichu hugi hab wa'ap wo si e wapko mamt hekith ab wo i ui tianna t amjed. T g hohas-haha'a ch hihithodakud ch chum hems g wohpikud hab masma wo e wapko mash wa g kekelibad hab wua.

Kush heg hekaj ihtham Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ab kakke g Jesus. “K haschu ahgch pi ab hu wohog elith g ha'ichu ha-mashchamadag g kekelibad ihtham mo ab si m-wecho e mashcham? Neh, e o gegosith pi am hu t-himthag oithch ha wapkonk g e-nohnhoi.”

(8) Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Kum ahpim haschu ahgch im hu hab wabsh wua g Jiosh chehanig ch im hu ha'ab ab s-wohochuth g ha-chehanig hegam mo d kekelibad ch d wabsh o'othham? (6) Isaiabad oki si s-ap hab em-ahg ahpim mam hab wabsh s-e junimk mat eda an o'oha mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Ha'i ihtham mo d chum ni-hemajkamga o hab kaij mo ab si has ni-elith ch ab ni-ihm. K wabshaba g ha-i'ibthag si s-kawpk ch si mehk ab ni-amjed. (7) Pi o sha'i wohom ab has ni-elith no pi wabsh g hemajkam ha-chehanig ha mashcham hab chum masma mo d ni-chehanig. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kum ahpim s-wohom hab masma mo wa an o'ohanas.”
K hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Si am s-e mahch mamt has masma im hu hab wabsh wo i juh g Jiosh chehanig ch am wo wa hekajith mo haschu d hejel em-mashchamig.
Mosesbad at an o'oha mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab g si has wo i ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e, ch ith ehp: Mat hemho wo wa e muhkith hegai mat hedai wo sha s-ko'okam has ha ah g e-jehj.
Kum eda ahpim ha mashcham mat pi ab hu has wo ha elithath ch ab ha wui hab wo chei, ‘Mah ant g Jiosh hegai mat haschu ab d wo i chum em-wuikamk.’
T hahawa pi ha'ichu hab wo ha juni g e-jehj.
Kum hab masma im hu hab wabsh i wua g Jiosh ne'oki ch am ha mashcham mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi. K mu'i d ha'ichu mam hab masma hab ep wua”

Kutsh am hahawa ep ha wai g hemajkam k hab kaij am ha wui, “ Ab g wo i ni-kaiham wehsijj ahpim k wo s-amich ihtha. (15) Pi at im hu hab wo sha'i em-juh g Jiosh heg hekaj mamt haschu wo huh k wabshaba im hu hab wo i em-juh heg hekaj pi kehg em-chegitoithag.”
Tsh am i ha thagito g hemajkam k im hu wah kih ch ed. Kumsh ab hahawa kakke ith amjed.
Sh hab kaij, “Pegih, kumtp ahpim hab wa'ap pi amichuth. Pi at im hu hab wo sha'i i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh mamt haschu wo huh
nat ge am hu wo i wah em-chegitoi ed k wabshaba gd hu em-wohk ed wo wah k amjed gm hu wabsh wo wuhsh.” Pegih, t hab masma am ha ahgi g Jesus mo wehs g ha'ichu hugi s-kehgaj.
k hab ep kaij, “Heg at im hu hab wabsh wo i em-juh ab amjed g Jiosh pi ap em-chegitoi
nat pi hab wo em-juh mamt hab wo juh g ha'ichu pi ap'ekam. Neh, mtp hems hema ha'ichu wo ehs o wo ha mua

o wo ha ehs g ha-wehm kihkam o wo tatchua g ha'ichu ha-eniga o wo s-chu iattomk o hab wo juh mat haschu si pi kehg hab wo mahsk o wo s-chu hehgamk o hema wabsh wo s-ko'okam has ahgath o wo chum si e haschuthath o wabsh pehegi has wo e wuath.
Ith at wehs ab wo i wuhsh ab amjed g pi kehg chegitoithaj g o'othham k im hu hab wabsh wo i juh ab amjed g Jiosh.”
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus k am thadhaiwua hema kih am mash am miabithch g Tyre kihhim matsh wo sha'i e hejelkoch. Kush eda an wa s-nen'oith g hemajkam ch ha hekai s-mai mo am thaha g Jesus.

Kutsh am hema jiwia g uwi mash am kih heg eda jewed ch d gawul mahs o'othham ch gm hu d mahsikam Syria jewed ch ed. Sh g ne'okij d Greek. Kush g jiawul an u'ukch g chehiagaj. Tsh heg hekaj ab i hih g uwi k ab wui i gei g Jesus k ab si tahni mat gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul ab amjed g chehia.
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at wo wa wepok mamt ab wo ha mah g gogogs g ha-chechmait g a'al. Wehpeg ant am wo i ap'ech g pi ha-ap'ethag g Tutuligo hemajkam no pi d chum Jiosh a'aliga.”

Kush hab kaij ihtha uwi, “Woho o wa. T wabshaba chum hems g gogogs am wo wa huh g a'al ha-ha'ichu hugi hahainig mat ab wo i shul mihsa wecho. Kunt ahni hab wa masma wo si s-ap ni-taht mapt ith am hab wo al i ni-juni.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “M-ne'oki o am chehgith map ab si ni-hiwig. Nt heg hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul ab amjed g m-chehiaga.”
Kutsh gm hu hih uhpam k s-mai matki gm hu hab i e juh g jiawul ab amjed g chehiagaj. Kush an wabsh s-ap wo'o.
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi hegam Jesus k am gahi wuwha g Sidon kihhim ch Wehst-mahm Kihhim chekshani k gm hu thatha Galilee kahchki am.
Kutsh am ha'i thatha g hemajkam k am hema u'apa g o'othham mash pi chekaithag ch ep pi ap neok k ab i tahni g Jesus mat ab wo taht k wo thoaj.
Kutsh imhab sha'i wuhshath hejelko k am i wahpki g al chu'uchum e-nohnhoi am nahnkaj ed k am hahawa sha'i wadagi g e-nowi g e-siswuadagkaj k ab hekaj taht g nehnij
k am i neh e thahm k si i ihbhuiwua k hab kaij, “Thoajini.”
Tsh hahawa chekaith. Tsh g nehnij ap'et matsh s-ap neo.
Kutsh g Jesus am hahawa wehs ha ahgi mat pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi ihtha. Sh oi wa haha wabsh wehsko ahg
nash pi si ge'e has elith ch hab kaij. “Sho'o wa'i si s-kehg ha'ichu hab junihim mo g pi chechkaithkam ha chechkaichuth ch pi neneoktham s-ap ha neokchuth.”
Kush pi sha'i tash amjed. Tsh mu'i am ep i e hemapai g hemajkam k ab kaiham g Jesus waik tashkaj. Sh hahawa pi an hu ha'ichug mas haschu wo huh. Tsh g Jesus am i ha wai g e-chuhchai k hah ha ahg.
“Neh, waik tashkaj o in wa'i t-wehmaj ihtham hemajkam ch heki hu wa'i pi ha'ichu huh. Ni s-ha ho'ige'ith.
Tp hems ha'ijj wo s-e chuhugi matp gm hu wo sha hihi pi ha'ichu hugok.”
Sh hegam ab i kakke, “Kuchs hebai hig wo ui g ha'ichu hugi mat wehs wo ha a'ahe ihtham?”
Sh ab ep ha kakke, “He'ekia at am i wih g sismito?” Sh hab kaij, “Wewa'ak”
Jesus atsh am hahawa ha ahgi g hemajkam mat am wo thadhaiwua. Kush am thadhaiwua. Tsh am ui g sismito k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahain k ha mah g e-chuhchai. Kutsh an i ha mahkhi g hemajkam.
Kumsh am hi wa ha'i al to'akch g waptopi. Kutsh ab ep ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am ha ahgi mat an ep wo i ha mahkhi. Tsh hab e juh.
Tsh wehsijj hug k oi wa hi si s-kokwoth, chum as am hu hebai d i gi'ik mihl chechoj ch mu'ijj g u'uwi ch a'al.
Tsh g Jesus chuhchai an i u'ihi g wihpi'ithaj mat am hu'i wewa'ak hoha wo ha shuhshuth. Kutsh g Jesus am hahawa ha ahgi g hemajkam mat gm hu wo hihi.
Tsh ihtham Jesus am ha hekaj i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu hihi mash am Dalmanutha chekshani k am i huhud.
Kutsh am ha'i thatha g Palasi k ab ne'owin g Jesus ch ab chum si chehani mat g si s-hasig ha'ichu am wo ha chehgi matp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.

Kutsh g Jesus am si ihbuiwua k hab kaij, “Kus haschu ahgch ab ni-kakke ihtham hemajkam mant g si s-hasig ha'ichu am wo ha chehgi. Si ant s-wohom hab wo chei mant pi am hu wo sha'i ha chehgi g si s-hasig ha'ichu.”
Neh bash kaij ch am hahawa ha thagito. Kutsh an ep i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu aigo ep hihi.
Tsh eda pi chegito ihtham mat wo ui g sismito. Kush hemako am kahch.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui, “Si g wo s-e nen'oithk mat pi wo em-cheawuagi g ha-jewajithakud hegam Palasi ch hegam mo ab si has elith g Herod.”
Sh hegam chuhchaij am hahawa a'aga ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Heg oki hekaj hab kaij mach pi ha sismitoga”
Kush eda g Jesus s-ha amichuth mo has kaij ch hab ha ahg, “Pi amki koi amichuth mani he'es edgith g gewkthag ch hekaj am a'aga mach pi ha sismitoga.
Am am wa chum neith mant al hetasp sismitokaj ha gegos g hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp. Pegih, namt pi chegito
mamt he'ekia i hoha shuhshuth k ui g wihpi'ithaj?” Kush hab kaij, “Gamai gohk.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Kumt he'ekia i hoha shuhshuth k ui g wihpi'ithaj mant al wewa'ak sismitokaj am ha gegos hegam gi'ik mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp?” Sh hab kaij, “Wewa'ak.”

Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, mt wo chum s-mahchk mani he'es i edgith g gewkthag ch hab wo s-amich mani pi heg hab ahg sismito ch wabshaba ha'ichu chum em-tashogith ch heg am wepogith g jewajithakud.”
Kutsh gm hu thatha Bethsaida t am k am i huhud. Kutsh g hemajkam am hema u'apa g o'othham Jesus wui mash pi nea k ab i e sho'igch wui mat ab wo taht.
Kutsh an bei g pi neatham nowij an k am i wanimed k gm hu i wuhshath ab kihhim t amjed k ab hahawa siswua wuhpuij ab k ab ep taht k ab kakke, “Shahchu ap hig neith?”
Tsh ab i nen k hab kaij, “Neith ani mo an oiopo g hemajkam ch wabshaba hab sha mahs mo g u'us wuhshanim.”
Tsh ab ep taht g wuhpuij. Kutsh ab ep i nea. Tsh g wuhpuij am i ap'et. Sh hahawa wehs ha'ichu si s-ap neith.
Sh g Jesus hab ahg matsh gm hu uhpam wo hih e-kihthag wui k pi am hu wo kia i wah kihhim ch ed.
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus am ha'i ep ha wui g kihhim am miabithch g Cesaria Philippi kihhim. Kush g Jesus ab ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g wo ni-ahgith, thoh'o ni-elith g hemajkam?”
Kush hab kaij, “Ha'ijj o hab m-elith map d hegai Johnbad mo chum t-pahl wapkonahim ch ha'ijj hab ep m-elith map d Elijabad o hema i ehp hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
Sh ab ep ha kakke g Jesus, “Kum ahpim hig hedai ni-elith?” Kush g Peter hab kaij, “Thap Jiosh si Kehsha maptsh ab wo i wuhsh si ha'ichu wehhejed.”
Kush hab ha ahg mat pi hedai wo sha'i ha ahgi hemu mo hedai wud.

Neh, tsh am i amjed am hahawa ha'ichu ha mashcha ab e amjed hab kaijch mat hemho wa mu'i wo e sho'igch g Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutsh pi ab hu wo tatchua g ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham k am wo i thagito mat wo e-muhkith. Tsh amjed d wo i waik tashk, tsh ep wo e-chegito.
Neh, sh ith am si tasho ha ahgith. Kutsh g Peter im hu go'olko i be k ab si s-gewkam neok wui hab kaijch mat pi woho hab wo e juh.

Kutsh wabshaba g Jesus ab ha'ab i kekiwua ha wui k ab epai si s-gewkam neo ab wui g Peter hab kaijch. “Pi g sha'i ni-shohbith. Tho wabsh hejel hab m-elitha ihtha. Kup ab wui kehk g Jiosh hab elitha hab masma mo g ge Jiawul.”

Sh eda mu'ij g hemajkam an ha wehgaj. Kutsh ab i ha waith k hab ha ahg, “Mamtp am wo s-oitham g ni-himthag k hemho wa gm hu wo thagito g hejel e-tatchui k ahni ni-tatchui hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed e sho'igchuthch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
Pi amt wo heki wua g e-thoakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni-wehhejed. Heg at wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp hedai wo chum s-tha'ath.
“Pi at ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk matp g o'othham wehs wo bei mo haschu i tatchua ith thahm jewed k wabshaba pi wo e tho'ibia.
Pi o an hu ha'ichug ith thahm jewed mas heg hekaj wo e tho'ibia g o'othham.

“Mu'i hemajkam at wabsh s-tahhatham hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch wo pi em-ha'ichuchuthath. Kumt wabshaba ahpim pi wo si e elithath ni-hekaj ch hekaj g ni-mashchamadag. Nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo si ni-elithath em-hekaj mant hekith ia ep wo jiwia. Ithani at ab ni-ab si s-tondam wo e chehgithath g ni-ohg gewkthag. T g mu'i anghil ni-wehm ab wo i hihi.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch hab ep kaij, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mo ia ha'i ha'ichug hemu mat pi koi wo koi k ho'ip nei mat ba'ich i s-gewkam inhab wo i e juh g Jiosh kownaltalig.”

Kush am d i chuhthp tash amjed. Tsh g Jesus ab i ha wai g Peter ch James ch John. Kutsh ihtham am wehmaj ab i chehchsh hema uhgk tho'ag t ab k gd hu thatha k haha wabsh nei. Tsh am gawul e juh g Jesus.
Tsh g wehschugaj hab e juh mash si s-tondam s-tohta mo pi hebai ha'ichu hab masma.
Kutsh ab haha wabsh i e chehgi g Elijabad ch Mosesbad k am wehmaj neneok g Jesus.

Kutsh si e totoths ihtham Peter. Tsh g Peter wabsh kohsh k tha'iwuni k hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “T-mashchamtham, s-ap'e oki mach ia ha'ichug. Tt ia waik wo ha chuhcha g al chechopi matt hekaj ab wo si has em-el ahpi ch Mosesbad ch Elijabad.”
Tsh an hahawa si ha ehkaj g chewagi. Tsh g Jiosh ne'oki ab kaitha chewagi t amjed k hab kaij, “Jesus o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag. Heg amt ab wo si kaihamath.”
Tsh am hahawa i chum nenhog hegam Peter. Kush hegai wa'i Jesus hejel am kehk. Sh pi am hu ha'ichug hegam gohk.

Sh ab hahawa i huhudkhim tho'ag t amjed. Sh ab si ha chehani g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai wo sha'i ahgith mamt haschu i nei, nt ho'ip kia am uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kutsh wa woho hab e juh k wabshaba hejel am a'aga mas has d ahga ihtha mo hab kaij matsh am uhpam wo i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.

Am hu hebai, sh hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, bo chech'e hegam chehanig t-mashchamtham matsh ia wehpeg wo e maskogi g Elijabad. Tsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ia haha wo e maskogi. Pegih, t haschu ahgk pi ia wehpeg m-ba'ich e maskogi hegai Elijabad.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hema at woho wehpeg wo e maskogith k hab wo masmak mash wa g Elijabad ch wehs ha'ichu wo i ap'ech. Kunt wo em-ahgi mat wa woho heki hu jiwia. T wabshaba g hemajkam am wui hab juh g pi ap e-tatchui mo hab masma an o'ohanas Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mat hab wo e juh. K an ep o'ohanas mat ep wo ni-sho'igchuth k wo s-ni-ohhoth ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Sh gd hu ha aihim hegam mat am wih. Kush mu'i hemajkam am oiopo. Sh ha'i d chehanig t-mashchamtham ch am ha ne'owin hegam mat am wa'i wih.
Tsh g hemajkam am i nei mo ab him g Jesus k si s-ap i e taht k ab i wohp k ab nam.
Sh g Jesus ab ha kakke hegam e-chuhchai mat am wa'i wih, “Shahchu am ha wehm a'aga?”
Kush am hema g o'othham hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Neh, ia ant heki hu chum u'apa g ni-alithag m-wui no pi g jiawul an u'ukch ch pi hiwgith mas wo neo.

Hebai atp am si has tahtchuth ch i wuhppa. K g totshagi i chechshshaj chinij ab. K g e-tahtami si kuhm ch ab wabsh wo i si gewka. Kuni heki hu am chum ha ahgith ihtham mat gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul. T pi e nako.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui, “Sho'o wa'i pi ge'ej g em-wohochuthadag. Shahag wepo mant tash ia wo em-wehmajkath ch ab wo em-nakogath mat hekaj wo i ge'etha.” Sh hab hahawa kaij heg wui o'othham, “Ab g i beka'i ni-wui.”
Kutsh ab hahawa i bei wui. Tsh ab i nei g Jesus. Kutsh g jiawul ha hekaj i wua g ali. Kutsh am gehsh k am si banimmed jewedo. Tsh g totshagi i wuhsh ab chinij ab.
Jesus ash ab hahawa kakke g ohgaj, “K hekith i amjed hab masma ihtha?” Kush hab kaij g ohgaj, “Gd hu wa'i e-alijk amjed o hab masma.
Mu'ikko o wa'i chum s-mu'amk ch am wuhppa shuhthagi ch ed ch am nahtha ch ed. Si g s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i wuhshath maptp wo e nako.”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Maptp ahpi wo e nako k ab wo i ni-hiw. Pi o ha'ichu sha'i wihnk am ni-wehhejed maptp ab wo ni-hiwgath.”
Kush hab kaij g ohgaj. “M ani wa he'es ab chum m-hiwig. Oi g i ni-wehmt. Nt ba'ich ab wo i m-hiwgath.”
Tsh eda ab a'aijed i wohp g hemajkam an ha wehgaj. Kush hekaj s-e hohtkith g Jesus ch si s-keh'el g jiawul k hab ahg, “Thagitoni g ali, ahpi jiawul, k pi thahm an hu ep wo sha'i u'ukchith.”
Tsh am si s-kaitham hihin k ab si s-gewkam e ugij g ali. Tsh am hahawa thagito. Tsh hab wabsh e juh mat muh g ali. Sh g hemajkam hab kaij, “Muh atki.”
Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab bei nowij ab k i wamigi. Tsh i wamig k kekiwua.
Kutsh gd hu i wahp kih ch ed ihtham Jesus. Tsh g chuhchaij am hahawa hejelko kakke, “Tt haschu ahgk ahchim pi t-nako machs gm hu hab wo i juh g jiawul?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus. “Jiawul at heg wa'i hekaj gm hu hab wo i e juh mamt ab wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui.”
Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hihim k gm hu gahi wuwha g Galilee chekshani. Tsh g Jesus pi am hu e chehgi hemajkam ha wui no pi ha mashchamahim g e-chuhchai ch hab ha ahg,
“E o aihim mat g s-ni-keh'iththam wo ni-bei ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo ni-thagito ha'i ha wui mat wo ni-mua. Nt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito mat d wo i waik tashk amjed.”
Sh oi wa pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg ch wabshaba pi ab hu kakke nat pi e totoths.

Kutsh am hihim k gd hu thatha Capernaum t am k am i wahp kih ch ed mash hebai thadha. Sh eda ha'i ha'ichukaj e ne'owin hihimathch. Kush ab hahawa ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchukaj am e ne'owinahim mach ab hihim?”
Kush oi wa pi hedai has sha'i kaij nash pi eda e ne'owinahim mas hedai ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk.

Kutsh am i thahiwua g Jesus k ab i ha wai. Tsh am i e hemapai wui. Kush hab ha ahg, “Pi g wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath mamtp hedai d wo uhgchuk am e-shahgith ch wabshaba hab wo e junihith mamt wehs d wo ha-pionagk.”
Sh am hema kehk g ali. Kutsh g Jesus an be k am kohm k hab kaij,
“Matp hedai hema wo ha thagio'ithath g ali am ni-wehhejed ch hekaj am wo e chehgithch mo ab si ni-tatchua ch ab ep si tatchua hegai mani d kehshaj.”
Kush g John hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Hema oki gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul heg hekaj m-chehgig. Kuch am chum shohbith no ge m-wecho e mashcham.”
Kush hab ha ahg, “Pi g am wo sha'i shohbith. Pi at woho has wo ni-ah matp hedai hekaj g ni-chehgig ch hab wua g s-wihnk ha'ichu.
Tki wo i t-wehmt hegai matp hedai pi ab hu t-wui kehk.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi matp hedai wo i em-wasibi g shuhthagi ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham k wo bei g s-ap'ekam e-namkithadag.”

Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Sho'o wa'i si s-ta ehbitham hab mahs am wehhejed hegai matp hedai hema am wo i ha wanchkwua pi ap'ekam wui ihtham al a'al mo ab al ni-hiwig. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchuth k wo e muhkith mat koi hab wo juh ihtha chu'ichig.

“Pi at hedai wo e nako mas ab uhpam wo i wuhsh Jiawul kih amjed. Kut pi hekith wo huhug g ha-sho'igchutha amai. Heg at wo wa wepok mat wo waptopadt k chum hekith wo e sho'igchuthath am mei ch ed. Mt heg hekaj am wo i e nako mamt pi am hu wo gei heg eda. Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt chum hems wo heb hu wua g e-nowi o g e-tad o g e-wuhi matp hema ihtham hab wo em-juh mamt am wo gei Jiawul kih ed k pi wo bei hegai wechij thoakag mo g Jiosh ab em-makiog.
“Hemho wa at wehs wo e maskogi g pi ap ha-chu'ichig g hemajkam.

Mt wabshaba hejel ab wo e abchuth k wo thagito hemu. T hab pi ab hu wo em-abch g Jiosh. Kumt ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk hab masma mo g on. Heg at pi has masma ep wo i e kegch mat wo onko. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi wo heb hu wua g s-e-ap'ek am k wabshaba wo s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.

Tsh amjed gm hu hihi hegam Jesus k am gahi wuwha g Judea chekshani k am gahi i shul g Jordan akimel k gm hu aigo thatha. Kutsh g hemajkam am ep i e hemapai Jesus wui. Tsh am ep ha mashcha mash chum hekith hab e wua.
Kutsh ab ha'i i hihi g Palasi k ab ha'ichu chum s-abchuthamk g Jesus ch ash ab kakke, “No hiwgith g t-chehanig mat g o'othham wo s-ohhoth g e-hohnig?”
Sh g Jesus ab epai ha kakke, “Nam hig pi mahch mo has chu'ig g chehanig?”
Kush hab kaij g Palasi, “Heu'u, hiwgith o mat g o'othham wo bei g tapial k wo ha mah k gm hu wo s-ohhoth.”
Kush oi wa hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, bo chu'ig mamt wo ha mah g ohhotha tapial mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath g Jiosh ch pi wo pihk e elithath ha hekaj.
K wabshaba gd hu i shohshonkam am ahgas: Jiosh at am ha nahto g cheoj ch uwi mat d wo e wehhejedkamk.
Kut ith hekaj g o'othham wo thagito g e-ohg ch e-je'e k am wo i e wehmt g e-hohnig wehm.
Kut hegam gohk hab wo e juh mat d wo hemakok. Pegih, t pi hab hahawa ep wo mahsk mat d wo gohkk ch wabshaba d wo hemakok.
Pi o hab sha'i mahs mas g o'othham wo ha gawulkai hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha wehnath.”
Tsh gd hu hahawa i wahp kih ch ed. Tsh g chuhchaij ab i kakke mas haschu hab ahg.
Kush hab kaij, “Bo wua g pi ap'ekam matp hedai wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo hohnt.
K g uwi hab wa'ap wua g pi ap'ekam matp wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo kunt.”
Kutsh am ha'i ha u'apa g e-a'aliga Jesus wui hab ahgch mat ab wo ha taht k wo e ho'ige'ithahu ha wehhejed. Kumsh chum s-ha keh'ith mo hab e wua.

Kutsh oi wa pi hohho'i g Jesus matsh chum pi ha hiwigi k hab ha ahg, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgith g al a'al mat ab wo i hihi ni-wui k pi an hu wo sha'i ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s-moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni-hiwigch.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt hab wa'i masma am wo i wahp.”
Neh, bash kaij ch an i ha kohmkahim k ab i ha tahtamahi ha-mohmi ab k ab i s-ha ho'ige'el.

Kutsh amjed haha wabsh i chum hihi. Kush ab hema med g o'othham ch ab i gei Jesus wui k ab kakke, “Ha mashchamtham map d s-ap'ekam, shahchu ant am hab wo juh mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi ap mahch map haschu ahgch hab ni-a'aga mani d s-ap'ekam. Heg o wa'i Jiosh d s-ap'ekam. Kup pi woho mahch mani hedai wud.

S-mahch ap g Jiosh chehanig. K hab chu'ig: Pi g am hu ha mua'i g o'othham. Pi g am hu ha ehsithath g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha ehsithath. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha iattogithath. Ab g si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e.”
Kush hab kaij ihtha o'othham, “Wehs ihtha ani hab junihim gd hu i ni-alijk amjed.”

Tsh Jesus ab i nei ihtha k ab si pihk i e el wui k hab kaij, “Hemako ha'ichu apki pi am hu hab wua. Him k gagda map haschu i eniga k ha mahki g namkigaj g sho'igkam k ab wo i him k ab si ni-wecho wo e mashchamath ch an haha wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg kaisthag Jiosh kihthag ed.”
Kutsh ihtha o'othham si pi ap e taht k kah mo has i kaij nash pi d s-kais ch atsh im hu hih pi ap e tahtkk.
Tsh g Jesus an i nenhog e wehgaj k hab kaij am ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Neh, t wo sha'i si s-hasigk mas g s-kakais am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
Kutsh si has i e taht hegam chuhchaij am i kaiok mash has kaij. Sh oi wa hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ni-naipijju, pi g hab wo elithath mat g o'othham wabsh s-pehegi am wo i wah Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
Nam hig hab elith mat wo e nako g kamihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh mo am jeg g ho'ipad? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g ha'ichu e-eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.”
Kutsh ba'ich i si has i e taht k ab a'ai e kakke, “Pegih, kus hedai hig wo e tho'ibia?”
Kutsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij, “O'othham wehhejed o s-hasig ch wabshaba am Jiosh wehhejed pi hasig. Jiosh at wo e nako mat wehs hab wo juh mo haschu i tatchua.”
Kutsh g Peter hab ha hekaj chei, “Neh'e, ahchim att hi wehs ha'ichu thagito k am i m-oi.”

Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt ba'ich i mu'i ha'ichu wo edagi mo chum hegai mam tp haschu i thagito am ni-wehhejed, kihki, wepnag, jehj, a'al, o'oithag. Kumt mu'i ha'ichu wo nako mamt wo ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab ni-amjed k am haha wo ai g pi ha huhugetham s-hehgig.
Kut wabshaba hegam mo wabsh hejel chum si e ha'ichuchuth hahawa pi d wo ha'ichuk. T hegam mo hejel pi e ha'ichuchuth am hahawa d wo si ha'ichuk.”

Kutsh gm hu i oi g wohg Jerusalem wui. Sh gm hu ha ba'ich him g Jesus. Kush si e totothsith g chuhchaij. Kush am ha'i ep ha wehm hihimath ch hab wa'ap e totothsith. Tsh g Jesus am i ha hemapai hegam gamai gohk k am ep ha ahgi mat haschu has wo e juh am tahgio,

ash hab kaij, “Neh'e, gm att hu wo hihi Jerusalem wui. Kut an wo ni-bei g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig em-mashchamtham k ab wo ni-mohto'i g chu'ichig ahni Jiosh si Kehsha no pi s-ni-mu'amk ch im hu hab hahawa ep wo ni-thagito ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam.
Kut hegam wo nahnko ni-ahgath ch ab ni-ab wo siswuath ch ep wo ni-gewittan k haha wo ni-mua. Kut d wo waik i tashk, nt ep wo ni-chegito.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Tsh amjed ab wui thatha g James ch John k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, am ach ha'ichu chum s-m-kakkeimk mapt am hab wo t-juni.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu am hab elith mant am hab wo em-juni?”
Sh hab kaij, “Pt hig am wo i t-chuhcha matt ahchim gohk am m-oithch d wo haha'ichuk mapt hekith am wo i himch g e-kownaltalig.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am sha'i ap mahch mam haschu ab ni-tahni. Wehpeg ant ab wo nako g ge'e sho'igthag. Kut hegam mat am ni-oithch d wo si haha'ichuk hab wa'ap wo e juh.”
Sh hab kaij, “Pegih, tt wo t-nako.” Kush g Jesus hab kaij, “Pegih, woho am t wo nako hegai mant ahni wo nako.
K wabshaba pi ab hu ni-ab manis ahni am wo i ha chuhcha mat hedai am ni-oithch d wo haha'ichuk. Hegam at am wo i e chuhcha mat hedai i ha wehhejed am e ap'ech.”
Kutsh hegam ha'i babgat ab ha wui g James ch John mash hab masma ab hejel e ha'ichuchuth.
Tsh g Jesus ab hahawa wehs i ha hemapath k hab kaij ab ha wui, “S-mahch am mo g ha-maliomig s-gewkam ha'ichu ha chehani g e-pionag ch g ha wanimedtham am ha himchuthahim.

T wabshaba pi hab masma hab wo sha'i chum mahsk am em-shahgith ahpim mam ab ni-hiwig. Mt wabsh si s-hemajim am wo i ha wehmtath g e-wehm wohochuththam hab sha masma mam d wabsh ha-pionag mamtp wo tatchuath mamt wo ha wanimedath.

Ahni ani hab wa masma si s-hemajim i em-wehmt ch pi ab hu ni-ha'ichuchuth em-thahm, chum anis d Jiosh si Kehsha. Ab o em-wui him g s-ko'ok namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap em-chu'ichig. Nt wabshaba ahni em-wehhejed wo nako mamt wo e wupul'o.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.

Kutsh am hihi ihtham Jesus k gm hu thatha Jerico t am. Sh am sha'i he'es. Tsh am ep i chum hihi hasko. Kutsh sha'i si mu'i hemajkam an ep i ha oithahi. Sh an hema thaha wohg hugith an ch ha limoshan nash pi d pi neatham. Ith amsh hab a'aga Bar Timaius nash pi d alithaj g Timaius.
Sh am hihim ihtham Jesus. Kutsh am i s-mai ihtha mash g Jesus an him k am ha hekaj si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, Jesus, mapsh d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
Kush mu'ijj s-keh'ith ch hab chum ahg matsh am wabsh wo i pi shahmunik. Tsh oi wabsh ba'ich i e gewkai, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
Kutsh am i kekiwua g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ab g wo i waith!” Kumtsh am ha hekaj wai hab ahgch, “S-ap g e tahtam k i wuhshani. Ab o m-waith.”
Kutsh heg am ha hekaj si wuahawua g e-lihwa k am si tha'iwuni k ab i him k am jiwia wui.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ant hab wo m-juni?” Sh hab kaij g pi neatham, “Ni-kownalig, ab g i ni-thoajith mant wo nent.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “S-ap g e tahtk k hihm. Thoa apt nap pi ab ni-hiwig.” Tsh am ha hekaj wabsh i ap'et k nei ha'ichu k gm hu hahawa i oi g Jesus.
Sh amjed ab hihim ihtham Jesus Jerusalem wui. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kutsh am ai g Olive U'us Kawulk. K heg mia gohk al kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage ch Bethany.
Tsh g Jesus gohk hab ha ah g e-chuhchai, “Am g wo hihim k ga hu wo thatha kihhim t am. Kut am hema wo wulshpik g wechij wuhlu mo koi sha'i e chechshshaj. Mt gam wo wul'o.
T hema ab wo em-kakke mams has wo juh. Kumt hab wo ah mani ahni d em-mashchamtham ch tatchua ch am haha wo thagito mamt uhpam wo u'apa. Kut ab wabsh wo i thagito mamt ab wo i wanim.”
Neh, tsh wa woho gm hu hihi ihtham gohk k am cheh mo am wulshpi g wuhlu k am wul'o.
Kush eda inhab ha'i gegok g o'othham ch ha neith mash am wupul'ok. Sh hema hab kaij, “Shahchu am ahgch am wupul'ok g wuhlu?”
Sh am i ha ahgith mash has kaij g Jesus. Kutsh heg hekaj ha hiwigi matsh am wo bei.
Kutsh am i wanimed k gd hu u'apa Jesus wui k an toa g e-liliwa an ab. Tsh an thahiwua g Jesus.
Sh mu'i hemajkam an ha wehgaj ch am i ha tahtdahim g e-liliwa wohg ch ed ch ha'ijj g wechij u'us i'ibhonig an hikkumiak ch am to'ahim heg oithch wohg mash am him g Jesus.
Kush hegam mash an wehgaj hihim si s-kaitham hab kaij: “T-tho'ibiakam! Jiosh atki ia i m-wuhshath k ab si s-m-ho'ige'ith.
Kupt ep wo i himch kownaltaligaj g t-kownaligbad David k ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'ithath. T wo t-tho'ibia g Jiosh.”

Kutsh gm hu thatha Jerusalem t am. Tsh am i hud g Jesus k am i wah mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi k an i neithahi mo an haschu has e wua. Sh am i hudunihim. Tsh hekaj am i wuwhag k gm hu hihi Bethany wui matsh am wo thadkath.
Sh am ba'ich d i tash mash ab uhpam hihim Jerusalem wui. Tsh bihugim g Jesus.
Kush am hu hema kehk g suhna uhs. Tsh ab wui hihi nash pi s-hahhagag ch ab wo chum bahithagk, chum as pi koi e ai mat wo bai. Kush oi wa pi ab hu ha'ichu sha'i ihbthag.
Kush hekaj hab kaij, “Pi at hedai ab hu ep wo huh g bahithag.” Kush kah ihtham.

Kud gd hu thatha Jerusalem t am k am i wahp mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. D eda am ha'i thadha ch am ha'ichu gagda ch ha'ichu ha nolawt ge'e cheopi miabithch. D g Jesus gm hu si ha shahmuth k gm hu a'ai kuhkpal si ha shul g ha-mimsa hegam mo g lial kammialt ch g ha thathaikud hegam mo g hohhi ha gagda.
D wenog g hemajkam ha'ichu gahi mohto mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. Kud g Jesus am ha shohbith

k am hahawa ha mashcham g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni o d ni-wehhejedkam ihtha ge'e cheopi. Kut ith wui ab wo hihhimath g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam mat ab wo ni-ihmath. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt eda an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e-tatchui ch chum hems ha'ichu s-a'agi ha ehsith ab ha wui ha'ichu gagdach.”
D mu'ijj g hemajkam ab si has elith g mashchamigaj. Kudki heg hekaj s-ehbith g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham ch am i a'aga mas has masma wo mua.
Kud am i hud. D am hahawa i wuwha kihhim t amjed hegam Jesus.
Ba'ich mahsi, tsh am ep bihbij amai mash am kehk g suhna k nei matki gaksh.
Sh g Peter hab kaij, “Neh, t-mashchamtham, hegai suhna mapt ab si has ah atki gaksh.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab g wabsh wo hiwgath g Jiosh.
Kut wabsh chum haschu hab wo em-juni. Mtp hems wo cheha ihtha tho'ag mat gm hu wo e wua ge shuhthagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh mamtp ab wo hiwgath mat hab wo e juh.
Ab g wabsh wo s-wohochuthath mat g Jiosh am hab wo em-juni hegai mamt haschu ab wo i tai. Kut wa woho hab wo em-juni.
Mt wabshaba wehpeg wo pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig hegam matp hedai ab em-wui hab juh g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh em-ohg ab haha wo s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig. [
Mtp wabshaba pi wo sha pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig, t g Jiosh g em-chu'ichig hab wa'ap pi gm hu hab wo i juh.]”
Kud gm hu ep thatha Jerusalem t am k gd hu i wahp mo am kehk g ge'e cheopi. Kutsh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham ch ge'eged am thatha wui g Jesus
k ab kakke, “Thohp amjed hab chum e elith map u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch am hab ha'ichu wua? Oi g am t-ahgith.”
Kush oi wa hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai wo ha'ichu em-kakke. Mt am wo ni-ahgi. Nt am epai wo em-ahgi g em-kakkei.
Am g hig wo ni-ahgith mams hedai amjed hab elith mo wa g Johnbad ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch ha pahl wapkonahim. No ab Jiosh amjed aha no ab o'othham amjed?”

Kush ihtham am wabsh chum hejel si a'aga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T wo s-t-keh'ith k ab wo t-kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch g Johnbad mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed u'ukch g gewkthag.
T g hemajkam has wo t-juh mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh o'othham amjed u'ukch. Mu'ijj o hab elith mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”

Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach sha'i mahch mas hedai amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag.” Kush g Jesus hab epai kaij ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo sha'i em-ahgi mani hedai amjed ab u'ukch g ni-gewkthag ch hab wua wehs ihtha.”

Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith ihtha wepogitha ahga hab kaijch, “Matp hems hema hab i e ah mat am hig wo ge ei g uhdwis. T g piongaj an ge kolhaidath k heg ep nahto mat hekaj am wo i wuhshath g wadgaj k am i kei g uhgk kih mat heg amjed wo nuhkuthath g eshaj. T gm hu hasko chihpia g enigakam k ha'i ha hiwigi g e-oithag.
“T am i e ai mat g uhdwis wo bai. Kut am hema ahgi g e-pionag mat am wo him k ab wo bei hegai wadgaj mo ab d i chum wuikamaj g enigakam.
Kut am him k am jiwia. T wabshaba hegam mo am nuhkuth g oithag am wabsh be k am gewittan k hab ah mat gm hu wo hih.
“K am hu i hebai, t am hema ep cheha e-pionag mat am wo hih. T am him k am jiwia. Kut am hab wa'i ep juh mat hab juh g wehpegkam k s-ko'okam juh g mo'oj k s-ko'okam has ah.

“T g enigakam am hema ep cheha g e-pionag mat am wo hih. T g nuhkuththam hab wa'ap juh k mua. T g enigakam am ha'i ep ha cheha mat am wo hihi. T g nuhkuththam hab wa'ap s-ko'okam ha juh k ha'i ha koktha.
“K am hema wi'is ch d alithaj. T heg am cheha mat am wo hih hab elithch mat ab has wo i el.
“T wabshaba ihtham oithag nuhkuththam am wabsh e wehm neneok k hab kaij, ‘Ith o d ihtha mat ab wui wo i wuhsh g oithag. Tt hig wo mua. T d haha wo t-enigak.’
Kut hab juh k mu'a k gm hu tha'ich ab kolhai amjed.
“Neh, m ant wo i em-tashogi mat has wo e juh g oithag enigakam. Ab at wo i him k wo ha koktha hegam mat am chum ha nuhkuthach g e-oithag k am ha'i ep wo ha nuhkuthach.
Pi amki sha'i amichuth mo has d ahga ihtha wepogitha ahga mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Kihttham at wo hema s-ohhoth g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed.
Ith o hab d ahga mat si s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo juh g Jiosh.”

Neh, bash wabsh ha ahg hegam t-u'ugchuga g Jesus nash pi chum s-ohhothamk. Kush heg hekaj an chum s-behimk mat wo kuh. K wabshaba mu'ijj g hemajkam ab si has elith g Jesus. Kush s-ha gihug ch am wabsh i thagito k gm hu hihi hasko.
Kumtsh am hahawa ha'i hab ha ah g Palasi ch Herod pionag matsh am wo hihi Jesus wui k wo ne'owin k wo ha'ichu cheh mat heg ab wo abch.

Kutsh am thatha wui k hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, s-mahch ach map s-ap d o'othham ch wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g Jiosh himthag, chum as has wo chei hedai i. Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi maps has elith g ge'e kownal lial kowlanta. No hig t-hiwgith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkith aha no pi t-hiwgith?”

Sh wabshaba g Jesus am wa s-ha amichuth mo g pi ap'ekam hab elith ch hab ha ahg, “Ahpim, s-chu i'attomkam am wabsh chum heki s-ni-himchuthamk. Ab g wo hema ni-chehgith hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkith.”
Kumtsh ab hema chehgi. Kush hab ha ahg, “Am g hig wo ni-ahgith mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab o'ohadag ith ab lial” Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t-kownalig.”
Kush hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, ab g wo i thagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i thagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.” Kutsh wehsijj si has i el g ne'okij.
Kutsh am ha'i thatha Jesus wui hegam mash d Sajusi. K ihtham o pi d ha-wohochuthadag mat g muhki ab uhpam ep wo i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.

Kush hab kaij ihtham, “Ha mashchamtham, Mosesbad atki an o'oha hegai chehanigaj g Jiosh mo hab chu'ig: Matsh g am oithchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha a'alithagkch hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e-wehnagbad. Tsh g ha-a'aliga hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo a'alithajk hegai mat muh.
Pegih, k am hu hebai wewa'ak d e-wepngam. Kut g si ge'echu hema hohnt g uwi k pi ab hu ha a'aligat k muh.
Kut g am oithchkam nawojij hahawa ep bei g hohnigaj k hab wa'ap pi ab hu ha a'alitht k hab wa'ap muh. Kut ihtha g oithchkam hab wa'ap hohnt k hab wa'ap muh pi ab hu ha a'alithtk.
Kut hegam ha'i hab wa'ap wehsijj i hohntahim k hab wa'ap koi pi ab hu ha a'alithtk. K am hu i hebai, t haha wabsh muh hab wa ehp ihtha uwi.
Pegih, am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai d wo hohnigkath ihtha matp ep wo e chegito g ko'i no pi wehsijj hohnigkahim.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi am ap chegito nam pi pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ep pi sha'i mahch mo he'es i gewkthag.
Woho at ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i. T wabshaba hahawa pi wo hohontath hab masma mo g anghil pi hohont.

Mosesbad atki an o'oha mash wa g Jiosh am e chehgith wui heg hekaj sha'i mash meihith ch pi meitto. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni ani d ha-Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac k ch Jacob. Neh, ith o hab kaij g Jiosh chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkuth ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed.
Pi amt wabsh woho wo i huhug am i ko'ok matp g Jiosh d em-Jioshga. K heg hekaj pi sha'i woho hegai mam ahpim hab chum elith.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.

Kush am hema kehk g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch am ha kaiham. K eda tasho mo s-ap hab ha ahg g Jesus. Neh, tsh hab i e ah mat ab hig epai ha'ichu wo kakke, ash hab kaij, “Shahchu o d si ba'iwechkim ge'e chehanigaj g Jiosh?”

Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Si ge'e chehanig o d ihtha: Ab g wo si tatchuath g e-kownalig Jiosh wehs e-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs e-thoakagkaj ch wehs e-chegitoikaj ch wehs e-gewkthagkaj. Ith g ab wo si kaihamath ahpim mam d chum hemajkamgaj no pi pi hema ep d em-Jioshga. Neh, ith o d si ge'e chehanig.
K ith hab wa'ap d si ge'e chehanig ch hab chu'ig: Ab g wo si ha tatchuath g hemajkam hab masma mam has i masma ab hejel si e tatchua. Ihtham gohk o d si ge'e chehanig.”
Kush hab kaij ihtha, “S-ap ap hab kaij, t-mashchamtham. M o wa woho mo g Jiosh si s-wohom d Jiosh ch pi an hu hema ehp.

Kutt hemho wa ab wo si tatchuath g Jiosh wehs t-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs t-chegitoikaj ch wehs t-gewkthagkaj ch ab wo si ha tatchuath g hemajkam mach has masma ab hejel si t-tatchua. Ihtham gohk o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hegai chehanig matt g ha'ichu t-shoiga wo mu'a k am wo iagchul Jiosh wui k ha'ichu si t-eniga wo i thagito am Jiosh wui.”
Kutsh am i kah g Jesus mo s-ap hab kaij k hab epai ahg, “Pi apki sha'i mehk ab Jiosh kownaltalig amjed.” Kutsh amjed hahawa pi hedai sha'i nako mas ab hu ha'ichu ep wo kakke.

Kush am ha mashcham g Jesus ge'e cheopi ch ed ch hab kaij. “Am g wo oithahim mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Chehanig em-mashchamtham o em-mashcham matsh heg d wo amjedkamk hegai t-kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.

Kush wa eda g Davidbad hab a'aga ‘ni-kownalig’ ch hab kaij g gewkthajkaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag: Bo Kaij g Jiosh ab ni-kownalig wui, In g thahiwua s-apkojed ni-hugith an. Kunt wo ha gewito g m-obga mat ab wabsh wo m-wechok.
Neh, namt hig s-ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihtha mash d kownaligaj?” Sh mu'ijj ab kaiham ch si s-ap e tahtk ch kah mo haschu ha mashcham.

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hegam mo d chehanig em-mashchamtham o am si s-apko thadhaiwup mam am e hehemapath ch si s-kehg e enigadath ch an oiopo no pi si tatchua mamt ab wo si has ha elithath. S-e g wo nen'oithath mamt pi hab wo masmak.

Chum as si chew e ho'ige'ithahun am em-tahgio ch eda ha'ichu s-a'agi ha wohppo'ith hegam mo d hehe'ejel wihpkam. T g Jiosh ba'ich i s-ko'okam wo ha namkith heg hekaj pi ap ha-chu'ichig no pi wabsh pehegia e ho'ige'ithahun.”
Kutsh am thahiwua g Jesus miabithch g ge'e cheopi. K ab e to'aw hegai lial mo hekaj e nuhkuth g cheopi. Sh g Jesus am ha neith hegam mo am to'aw. Kush g s-kakais sha'i si mumu'i am to'aw.
Tsh am hema jiwia g hejel wi'ikam oks k am hi wa al toa g gohk s-wepegchu.

Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith g e-chuhchai, “Neh'e, hegam mo ha'ichu s-edgith o hi wa ba'ich i mumu'i am to'aw. T wabshaba ihtha al oks ba'ich i si ha'ichu hab juh nat pi am al toa wehs hegai mo haschu al i edgith.”
Kutsh gm hu hahawa i wuwha ihtham Jesus ab amjed g ge'e cheopi. Kush ihtham hema hab kaij, “Neh'e, t-mashchamtham, sho'o wa'i si ge'eged hohothaikaj in kihtas g ge'e cheopi ch si s-kehg hab mahs.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, nt wabshaba si shel wo em-ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihtha.”
Tsh amjed gm hu hejelko hihi wehmaj g Jesus k ab i chehchsh Olive U'us Kawulk t ab k ab thadhaiwua ge'e cheopi wui. Kutsh ihtham Peter ch James ch John ch Andrew ab i hihi Jesus wui k hab ahg,
“Am g hig t-ahgith mas hekith am hab wo i e juh hegai map am t-ahgith. Kut haschu d wo chehgithak matt heg ab wo s-mahchk moki e aihim.”
Kush am ha ahgith g Jesus, “Mt wo si s-e nen'oithath mat pi hedai wo em-iattogi.
Mu'i at an wo i wuwha a'ahithag oitham k ni-wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut mu'ijj ab wo s-ha wohoch.

T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch jejewed ab a'ai wo i e checheggia. Mt wabshaba pi wo e totoths. Hemho at hab wo wa e juh hab masma. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo kuhgit. An at mu'ikpa wo u'ugij g jewed. T g bihugig an ep wo gei mu'ikpa. Ith at d wabsh wo shohshonajk g sho'igthag nat pi ba'ich wo i ge'etha.
“Kumt wo s-e nen'eithath namt pi wo em-u'u k wo em-lothait k am ep wo em-u'apa kokownal ha wui heg hekaj mam ab ni-hiwig. Mt wabshaba am wabsh wo ha ahgi g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
T an wehsko wo i e ahgahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mat koi wo kuhgit g jewed.
Pi g has wo sha'i e tahkkath mams has wo chei mat hekith wo em-u'apa k wo em-lothai. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab wo i em-ahgi mamt has wo chei.
“Haha'ichu at wo em-koktha. Kut ab ha wui wo em-gagda chum hems g em-wepnag o g em-jehj o g em-a'aliga.
Mu'i hemajkam at wo s-em-keh'ithath nam pi ab ni-hiwig. Kumt wo sha e nakog k wo gahi wuwha g e-sho'igthag. T g Jiosh ab wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.”

Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus. “Am g wo amichuth mamt haschu in wo ne'okchul Hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Daniel at an o'oha mat g em-obga am wo i kei g s-uam ha'ichu gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi. Kut hemho wa am haha wo ahhio thohtha'ag wui hegam mat ia wo ha'ichugk Judea jewed ch ed.
Kut pi hedai am hu wo sha'i chum i wah e-kih ed k am wo ha'ichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo wa'i oimmedath e-kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanath oithag ch ed.
S-ta at ehbitham wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chu'uchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia wo'ok g ali.
“Mt ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mat pi eda hab wo e juh ihtha s-hehpich'ed.
Ba'ich at d wo i si ge'e sho'igthagk mo pi hekith g hemajkam sha'i neith ch pi hekith hab masma ep wo nei.
Pi at hedai wo e nako mas am gahi wo wuhsh matp tash wo hih. T g Jiosh heg hekaj wo i shopolkai am ha wehhejed g e-hemajkamga.
“Pi g wo sha'i ha wohochuth matp hema hab wo sha chei mo am hebai ha'ichug g Jiosh si Kehsha.

Mu'i at in wo i wuwhag k hab wo chei mo d ni-ahni, Jiosh si Kehsha, o d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam k am hab wo wuath g si s-hasig ha'ichu mat hekaj wo i chum ha wanchshul g Jiosh hemajkamga matp wo e nako.
Ni wabshaba am heki hu em-ahgith ihtha mamt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'eithath.”
Sh hab ep kaij, “T am wabsh wo i chum kuhgit hegai jewed shuhthgim sho'igthag. Kut g tash tonlig wo huhug. T g mashath ep pi wo ha ton.
T g thahm kahchim wo ugij. T g huhu'u wo i shul.
Kunt ab hahawa si s-masma wo i hud chewagi ch ed ab Jiosh kihthag amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. T am wo e maskogi g ni-gewkthag.

Kunt wo ha cheha g ni-anghiliga mat ab wehs wo i ha hemapai hegam mant am i ha chuhcha mat wo e tho'ibia. T am wo hihi imhab si'al tahgio ch imhab juhpin tahgio ch imhab huduni tahgio k ch imhab wakolim tahgio k wo i ha hemapai.
“Nt wo ha'ichu em-mashcha heg hekaj suhna uhs. Mt wo s-mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat ab wo i i'iwgi.
Pegih, mt hab wa'ap wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mat wehs wo kuhgit mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh hegai mani em-ahgith.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat d wabsh wo kia thothakamk hegam mat wo nei ihtha mani em-ahgith mat hekith wehs wo kuhgit.
Neh, wehs at gm hu hab wo i e juh ihtha Jiosh nahtoi mam in neith. T wabshaba g ni-ne'oki pi hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
Kush hab ep kaij, “Heg o wa'i s-mahch ni-ohg Jiosh mant hekith ep wo jiwia. Pi o hedai ep s-mahch, chum hems g anghil nih ahni mani d hi wa chum alithaj.
Kumt wo si s-e nen'eithath ch ab wo neithachugath nam pi pi mahch mas hekith wo i k ihtha.

K hab sha masma am em-wehhejed matp hems hema wo ha hiwigi g e-kihthag g e-pionag k wo ha cheha mat has wo masmak hehemako k g kihjeg nuhkuththam ep wo cheha mat wo si s-e nen'eithath k gm hu hahawa mehk jewed wui wo hih. T ihtham chum hekith wo s-e nen'eithath no pi pi mahch mas hekith ep wo jiwia.
Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma wo s-e nen'eithath. Pi o ta machima am em-wehhejed mas hebai hab wo i e juh g tash an a'ai jejewed thahm mant hekith wo i uhpam jiwia.
Kuni wehs hab s-ha ahgithamk mani haschu hab em-ahg mat hab wa'ap wo s-e nen'eithath.”
K eda gohk tash am wi'is matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Kush ihtham u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham am chum e nakog mas has hu'i masma s-a'agim wo bei g Jesus k wo mua,
ash am wabsh a'ai e ahgith, “Hi wa pi am hu heg eda mat ia wo e hemapathch g hemajkam ith hekaj piast. T wo am hu e babgachuth k wo t-cheggia.”

Tsh am hu hebai am thatha hegam Jesus Bethany t am. K am hema d kihkam mo hab chehgig Simon ch wa chum mumku heg hekaj mo g chuhkugaj wabsh muhkhim. Ith atsh ab i ha waith k ha gegos. Sh am thadhak ch e gegosith. Tsh ab haha wabsh hema i wah g uwi g si s-namkig s-ap uhw shuhthagi wa'igchugch am al s-toa hothai ha'a ch ed. K hab e a'aga ‘spikenard’ ihtha shuhthagi. Kutsh am si hai g al ha'a k an wehs iawua Jesus mo'o thahm.
Kutsh ha'i babgat am i neithok matsh has e juh k s-ju'ujpij e wehm neneok ch ash hab kaij, “T wabsh heki e wua ihtha s-namkig ha'ichu.
Eda atp hu'i chum waik siant pihsh wo nam sha e gagdak. T heg wo e hekaj ha wehhejed g sho'igkam.” Neh, bash kaij ch si s-keh'ith g uwi.
Kush oi wa hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Pi g am wo sha'i keh'ith ihtha uwi. Si at s-kehg ha'ichu hab juh am ni-wehhejed.
Chum o hekith ia em-shahgith g sho'igkam. Kumt wabsh chum hekith wo i ha wehmt. Kunt ahni hi pi tash ia hu wo em-shahgithk.
T ihtha uwi hab juh mat haschu i e nako mat am heki hu s-ap juh ni-chuhkug g ni-muhkig wehhejed.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat am wo e ahgahith mat haschu has ni-juni mat hebai wo i e ahgahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.”
Kutsh am ha hekaj ha thagito g Judas Iscariot k gm hu hih u'ugchu papal ha wui hab ahgk matsh hegam ha wui wo gagda g Jesus.
Sh am si s-hohho'ith ch kah ihtham mash has i kaij, ash ab si ahgith matsh wo namkith. Kutsh am hahawa si i e nako g Judas matsh hebai wo s-ap'ek. Kutsh ab ha wui wo gagda.

T am hahawa s-ap i e ai hegai t-shohshonbad ha-tho'ibiathag piast. K ith eda pi e ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas. K d wehpeg tash mat eda wo e koktha g kahwal mahmad. Sh g Jesus chuhchai ab wui hab kaij, “Bahp hab elith matt am wo huh g ha-tho'ibiathag gegosig?”
Kutsh am hahawa gohk hab ha ah, “Am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T ab hema wo himath g cheoj ch wo wa'igchugath ab ha'a t ab.

Kumt am wo i oi. T am hu hebai wo him k am wo i wah hema kih ed. Kumt hab wo chei ab kihkam wui, ‘Neh, s-mahchimk o g t-mashchamtham mas an hebai i ha wi'is matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.’
Kut am wo hema em-chehgi g kih. T ith gn hu ha-kih thahm hab wo chu'igk ch wo ge'ejk ch am wo apchuthask. Kumt an ha'ab wo i ap'ech g t-gegosig.”
Kutsh wa woho am hihi ihtham gohk k gd hu thatha kihhim ch ed. Tsh wa woho s-ap am hab e juh mash has i ha ahg. Kutsh am i ap'ech g gegosig.
Tsh am i hud. Tsh am hahawa thatha hegam Jesus k am hu thadhaiwua k e gegosith.
Sh hab haha wabsh kaij g Jesus, “M ant wo si shel em-ahgi mat oi am hab wo e juh mamt hema wo ni-gagda ahpim mam ab si ni-wecho e mashcham.”
Kutsh wehsijj pi ap e taht k gn hu hab i che'iatahi, “Ih, hi wa pi ahni.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg at hab wo juh mat hedai am ni-wehm wo wakch g chemait hithod ch ed.

Bant masma wo ni-muhkith mo has masma heki hu o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkith. T wabshaba wo si s-ko'okam e namkith hegai mat wo ni-gagda. Ba'ich at wo i chum s-ap'ek heg wehhejed mat hems wabsh pi wo chum mahsi.”
Sh am wabsh kia e gegosith. Tsh g Jesus am bei g chemait k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa i hahain k an i ha mah k hab kaij, “Oi g wo huhgi ihtha. Tho ni-honshpadag.”
Tsh am hahawa bei g tahsa k ab ep ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab ha mah. Kutsh wehsijj ab ih.

Kush hab ha ahg, “Tho ni-eh'ed ihtha nawait. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith am em-wehhejed. T g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab wo juh hegai mo wa hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni.
Ia o i s-ap'e. Kunt pi hekith em-wehm hab ep wo juh ihtha k wabshaba em-wehm wo si s-hehgigk Jiosh kihthag ed.”
Neh, kutsh am hahawa kuhgit am hema ahgk g mihshmetha ne'i k am i wuwhag k gm hu hihi Olive U'us Kawulk wui.

Kush hab ha ahg g Jesus, “An o o'ohanas mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Nt wo hiwigi mamt wo mua g kahwal ha nuhkuththam. T g kahwal wabsh a'ai wo wohp. Neh, ith o d ha'ichu wepogitha ahga ch hab d ahga mamt wehsijj wabsh wo ni-thagito k gm hu a'ai wo wohp mant hekith wo ni-muhkith.
Kunt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt am ha'ab wo ni-nei.”
Kush g Peter hab kaij, “Ahni ant hi pi hekith wo sha'i m-thagito, chum as wehsijj wo m-thagito ihtham.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mat koi gokko wo kuhu g chuchul ith i chuhug ab, kupt eda heki hu waikko hab wo wa'i chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.”
Kutsh am wa si e gewkai g Peter, ash hab si kaij, “Pi ant hekith hab wo sha'i chei manis pi m-mahch, chum anis wo ni-muhkith m-wehm.” Kush wehsijj hab wa'ap kaij.
Kutsh gd hu thatha heg ab oithag mo hab e a'aga Gethsemane. Sh pi am hu ha wehmaj g Judas Iscariot. Kush hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Ia g hu wo i thadhak. Nt ahni am ba'ich wo i him k wo ni-ho'ige'ithahu.”
Bash kaij ch am ha u'uk g Peter ch James ch John. Tsh ihtham gm hu oi. Kush s-masma si pi ap e tahtk g Jesus ch si e kudut
ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab at wabsh i si ni-shuhth g pi ap tahhathkam ch s-ni-mukima tahhathchuth. Ia g wabsh wo thadk ch wo ha'ichu si nenashanath.” Kutsh am thadhaiwua.
