Tsh g Jesus gm hu hahawa him k am i gei jewedo k hab kaij ab Jiosh wui, “Ni-ohg, wehs ha'ichu o pi sha'i hasig am m-wehhejed. Pt wo e nako mapt im hu hab wo i juh hegai si s-ko'ok sho'igthag mo ab ni-wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m-tatchui hab wo e juh.”
Tsh am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui hegam waik. Kush am kohksh. Sh hab kaij ab wui g Peter, “Simon, pi aptki sha'i e nako maps am hu i hemako ohla ab wo s-nenashank,”
ch ab wehs ha wui hab kaij, “Si g wo ha'ichu nenashanath ch ab wo tai g Jiosh g gewkthag mamt pi am hu wo shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. Chum am hi wa g s-ap'ekam hab elith ch eda pi e nakog.”
Bash kaij ch amjed gm hu hahawa ep him k heg hab kaij ab Jiosh wui matsh wehpeg
ch am hahawa uhpam ep jiwia ha wui. Kush ep si kohksh ch pi sha'i nenashani ch pi sha'i mahch mas has wo chei ab wui.

Ash d i waikkokam, tsh am ep jiwia ha wui. Kush ep si kohksh. Kush hab kaij, “Kumtki ep kohk k e uh'ulinihogith. T eda e ai mamt ni-gagda k am wo i ni-thagito ha wui g pi ap'ekam hemajkam ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
Oi g wo wahpamigi. Tt wo hihi. Neh, ia at hu jiwia hegai mat ni-gagda.”

Sh am wabsh kia neok. Tsh am jiwia g Judas. Kush sha'i si mu'ijj am wehmaj ha'ijj g i'is-papayo uh'ukch ch ha'ijj g u'us. Ihtham atsh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham ch ge'eged am ha cheha matsh am wo hihim k wo bei.
Kush eda g Judas heki hu ha ahgith ihtham mo am wehmaj matsh ab wo chintath g Jesus kahmaj ab. Tsh hab masma wo s-mahchk mat hedai an wo bei.
Tsh am wabsh i chum jiwia g Judas k wabsh shel i hih ab Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ni-mashchamtham.” Neh, bash kaij ch ab chintath.
Tsh ab ha'i hihim k an bei g Jesus k gn hu si s-wihnam u'ukch.
Kutsh hema hegam chuhchaij am i wuhshath g e-ispahyo k ab si gehg g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl k an si hikuch g nahkaj.

Sh g Jesus hab ha ahg ihtham hemajkam, “Wehs tashkaj ani am thahiwup ch ha mashcham ge'e cheopi t am. Kumt pi an hu ni-be k wabshaba hahawa ia thatha an uh'ukch g i'is-papayo ch u'us mamt wo ni-bei. Pegih, bat wa masma an heki hu o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mant hab masma wo ni-behij mat g pi ap hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Kutsh am hahawa wehsijj wabsh i thagito hegam chuhchaij k gm hu si a'ai wohp.
Sh an hema oithahim g Jesus ch d wabsh wechij o'othham ch heg wa'i sawanokaj e hobinodch. Kutsh an chum bei g shonthal.
Tsh am wabsh i thagito g e-sawano k gm hu si meh ab wabsh i s-thahpkch.
Kumtsh am i bei g Jesus heg kih wui uhgchu pahl. Kush eda am e hemapthahim g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ch chehanig t-mashchamtham.
Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oith ch am i wah kolhai ch ed. Sh am ge nahthch g shonthal. Kush am ha wehm e huhkalith g Peter.
Kush eda ihtham e jehnigiththam am i chum ha'ichu gahg mat ab wo abch g Jesus mat heg hekaj wo mua.
Mu'ijj ash ab ha'ichu chum abchuth mash pi sha'i woho ch oi wa pi sha'i e wepo ha'ichu ahg.
Kutsh am hahawa ha'i gegokiwua k hab kaij,
“Kah ach mo hab kaij. ‘Nt wo padch ihtha ge'e cheopi mat g o'othham hab juh k hema ep wo nahto waik tash ab mat pi d wo o'othham nahtoik.’ ”
Kush ihtham hab wa'ap pi sha'i e wepot g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
Kutsh g si uhgchu pahl am i kekiwua ha shahgith k ab kakke g Jesus, “Napt pi am hu has wo sha'i chei ith amjed mo haschu ab m-abchuth ihtham?”
Kush oi wa pi am hu has sha'i ha kaij g Jesus. Kutsh ab ep si kakke, “Nap hab e elith map ahpi d Jiosh alithag matp am t-thahm wo e kei?”

Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni. T g Jiosh am wo e chehgi mo ab si has ni-elith an s-apkojed e-hugith an ni-thahshk e-kownal thaikud ed. T ab wo i e ai mant ab wo i hud chewagi ch ed k am ep wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kumt wehsijj wo s-mai mani d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kutsh g uhgchu pahl ab si wantsh g e-eniga hab elithch mo pi ap neok k hab kaij, “Pi ach hedai ep sha'i tatchua mas am wo ah g chu'ichigaj.
Am am wa kah g pi kehg ne'okij. Shahm i elith?” Kush wehsijj hab kaij matsh ab moht g chu'ichig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkith.

Kutsh ha'ijj ab si siswuimath g Jesus. Mtsh ab hahawa si ma'ishk wuh g wuhpuij k ab si shonikkash ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai ab m-shonikka.” Tsh g shonthal am hahawa be k ab si s-kapnim shonikkash.
Sh eda g Peter am thaha kih bahsho. Kutsh am hema jiwia g uwi piongaj g uhgchu pahl.
Sh am thaha g Peter ch e huhkalith. Tsh ith ab si i neith k hab kaij, “Ahpi ap ep wehmaj hegai Jesus.”
Kutsh pi mahch k e ah g Peter hab kaijch, “Pi ani sha'i mahch ch pi amichuth maps haschu hab ahg,” neh, k gm hu ha hekaj hih mash am ha'i gegok kolhai kihjeg t ab. Kush eda kuhu g keli chuchul.
Tsh am ep cheh g Peter hegai ha-pionag k hab kaij am ha wui hegam mash an gegok, “Ith o d ep hema hegam Jesus.”
Kutsh ep pi e edagi g Peter. Kutsh sha'i ha'as, sh hegam mash an gegok hab ep kaij ab wui, “Pi g sha'i pi e edgith. Thapki woho hema hegam Jesus napki pi ahpi hab wa'ap d Galilee t am o'othham.”
Kutsh g Peter am ha hekaj si ha ahgi, “Pi ani sha'i mahch ihtha o'othham mam an a'aga. T g Jiosh wo si ni-jehka'ich mantp em-iattogith.”

Kutsh am ha hekaj gokko kuhu g keli chuchul. Tsh g Peter am wabsh si i chegito mash wa hab kaij g Jesus, “Koi at gokko wo kuhu g chuchul kupt eda heki hu waikko hab wo chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.” Tsh wabsh woho'i pi ap e taht k s-jupij shoak.

Tsh am wabsh i chum mahsi. Tsh am ep e nam hegam u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ch chehanig t-mashchamtham mo d e jehnigiththam k atsh am i mamche mat has hahawa ep wo e juh. Tsh am i kuhgit g ha-namki. Kutsh am si maniadath g Jesus nohnhoi k gm hu be k am u'apa heg wui mo d kownal ch hab chehgig Pilate ab abchuthch mo chum e kownalchuth.
Kush ihtha Pilate ab kakke g Jesus, “No wa woho mapsh hab chum e elith map d ha-kownalig ihtham Tutuligo hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni.”
Sh g u'ugchu papal mu'i ha'ichu ab abchuth. Sh pi am hu has sha'i kaij g Jesus.
Sh g Pilate ab ep kakke, “Neh. mu'i ha'ichu o ab m-abchuth. Napt pi am hu has wo sha'i chei ab amjed?”
Kush ep pi am hu has sha'i ha kaij g Jesus. Tsh g Pilate si has i e taht heg hekaj.
K am hab e wua ahith ab ith eda gegosig mo g kownal am hema i thathagitod g lihso am ha wehhejed g hemajkam.
Kush eda am ha'i kuhpi g lilso matsh ha'i ha koktha am i chum wushshathch g kownal. Sh hema hab chehgig ihtham Barabbas.
Kutsh g hemajkam ab i kakke g Pilate matsh am hab hig wo ha juni hegai mash chum hekith am hab ha wuijith.
Sh g Pilate ab ha kakke, “Pegih, nam hab elith mant ith am wo i thagito am em-wehhejed mash d em-kownalig?” nash pi chum s-thagitoimk g Jesus
ch hab ha elith mo d wa'i ihtham u'ugchu papal ch s-hehgamk ch s-mu'amk.
Kutsh wabshaba g u'ugchu papal am i ha cheha g hemajkam matsh hab wo chei matsh g Barabbas wo e thagito. Kutsh wa woho am hab e juh.
Kush hab ep kaij g Pilate, “Pegih, kunt has wo juh ihtha o'othham mam hab a'aga mo d em-kownalig?”
Kush si s-kaitham hab kaij g hemajkam, “Mu'ani ab kots t ab!”
Kutsh hab chum chei g Pilate, “Haschu ahg? Shahchu at hig pi ap has juh?” Kush oi wa wabsh ba'ich i si s-kaitham hab wabsh ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab.”

Kush g Pilate tatchua mat wo s-hohho'i g hemajkam ch atsh heg hekaj am i thagito g Barabbas am ha wui k am ha cheha g shonthal mat am wo gewitta g Jesus. Kumtsh wa woho hab juh. Tsh am hahawa ha wui thagito matsh gm hu wo be k ab wo naggia kots t ab.
Kutsh gm hu hahawa i bei g shonthal g Jesus kownal ge'e kih am k am wehs ha wai g e-wehm shonthal.
Kutsh am i e hemapath k nahnko wua. Msh wa ab abchuth mash chum e kownalchuth. Pegih, tsh ab wahki g kownal eniga k ge ho'i gihkot k ab wahki mo'oj ab.
Kush hab wabsh s-ahgamk ch hab kaij, “Tash g d ha-kownaligk g Tutuligo hemajkam.”
Tsh ha'i an si gewitta mo'oj an g uhskaj k ab siswuimath k ab wui i shul pehegia ab has elithch.
Kumtsh am i ha'asa nahnkogith k am si wuahawua hegai kownal eniga k ab uhpam wahki g enigaj k gm hu hahawa i bei mat ab wo naggia kots t ab.

D ab hema i ha nam g o'othham ch ab him Jerusalem wui ch ash hab chehgig Simon. Ith ad an bei g shonthal k ab kushwiotach hegai kots mamt ab ab wo naggia g Jesus. Ihtha Simon ash ab d kihkam Cyrene kihhim t ab ch d ha-ohg ihtham Alexander ch Rufus.
Kumd gm hu i bei g Jesus mam am ha nahngia. K hab e a'aga amai Golgotha mo ith hab d ahga Koshwak.
Kumd am chum i'ich g nawait ch kulani mat wo hehogih g s-ko'ok. Kud pi sha'i ih g Jesus.
Kumd ab hahawa sisish kots t ab k am kei g kots. D am ha'i e chichwi g shonthal k wo nei mas hedai haschu wo bei g ha'ichu enigaj.
K eda ga hu i juhk madki heki hu e ai g humukt ohla mamd ab naggia kots t ab.
D an o'ohanas g ha-abchutha ab thahm mo ab i mo'okch g Jesus ch hab chu'ig, “Ith o d ha-Kownalig g Tutuligo Hemajkam.”
Kumd gohk ab ep ha nahngia kokots t ab gn hu a'ai. Sh eda d s-chu e'eskam ihtham. [
Kum hab masma am chehgithch mam hab elith mo g Jesus hab wa'ap d pi ap hemajkam. Neh, heki o hu an o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed mat ith am hab wo e juh.]
D hegam mo am bihbimhim nahnko ahg ch hab ahg, “Naptsh woho wo i wua g ge'e cheopi k am uhpam ep wo i kei waik tash ab?
Pegih, ab g hig i huduni kots t amjed k wo e tho'ibia maptp wo e nako.”
D g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig t-mashchamtham am hab wa'ap nahnko ahg hab kaijch ab a'ai e wui, “Ith atsh ha'i ha tho'ibia k atki wabshaba pi wo e nako mas wo hejel e tho'ibia.
Nash hig pi woho d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d t-kownalig? Pegih, tt ab wo s-wohoch matp ab wo i huduni k wo e tho'ibia.” D hegam ehp mad ab wehmaj nahngia hab wa'ap nahnko ahg.
D am i thahm juh. D wehsko gei g s-chuhugam waik ohla ab.
D am i e ai g waik ohla. D si s-kaitham hab kaij g Jesus, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani.” Ith o hab d ahga, “Ni-Jioshga, ni-Jioshga, pt haschu ahgk wabsh ni-thagito?”
D ha'ijj hab kaij hegam mad am gegok, “Neh'e, Elijabad o ab chum waith.”
Kud am hema med k an ha'ichu usko mad am wakch nawait ch ed k am uhgk i be k ab chum i'ich g Jesus k hab chei, “Kia koi, tt hig wo nei mas ia wo jiwia g Elijabad k ab wo i huduni.”
Kud am si s-kaitham ha'ichu hab ep chei g Jesus k am hahawa i muh.
Kutsh hegai s-kowk ikus kuhpadag mash am s-tadnim naggia gd hu si eda g ge'e cheopi ab si shel e wantsh.
D hegai moki d shonthal ha-ge'ejig gahab kehk kots wui ch am kah g Jesus ch am neith mat has masma muh ch hab kaij, “Ihtha oki si s-wohom d alithaj g Jiosh.”
D ga hu sha mehkjed g u'uwi ab ha'i neith mat haschu has e juh. Ha'i ihtham o d Salome ch Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha-je'e ihtham James ch Joses.
Ihtham waik ash am wehmaj oiopohim g Jesus ch ha'ichukaj i wehmt mo eda gm hu oimmelhim Galilee chekshani ch ed. Kud mu'i ihtham u'uwi am wehmaj ab i hihi g Jesus Jerusalem wui.

D am ha'ichug hegai e jehnigiththam mo ab Arimathea t amjed ch hab chehgig Joseph. Ith o si s-ap d o'othham ch ab s-neithamk g Jiosh kownaltalig. D eda e aihim mat wo i hud. Kuchd eda am chum t-nakog matt ba'ich i tash wo chum t-mihshmath. D heg hekaj am hih ihtha Joseph k atsh ab tai g kownal g Jesus honshpadag.
Kush g Pilate hab kaij, “A nat wa s-wohom heki hu i muh?” atsh am hahawa wai g shonthal ha-ge'ejig.
Sh ith hab kaij mat heki hu muh. Kush hab hahawa ahg g Joseph mo am wa s-ape mat am wo bei.

Kutsh g Joseph am him k am ha nolawt g si s-kehg ikus k am ep jiwia. Kumd am wehhejed ab i huduni g Jesus honshpadag. K am mia hab chu'ig g hiha'ini ch ab heki hu cheotas hothai ch ed. Kumd am i be k gd hu heg eda cheh am i hobinodk heg hekaj s-kehg ikus. Kumd ab hahawa kuh g ge'e hothaikaj.
D g Mary Magdalene ch hegai Mary mo d ha-je'e g James ch Joses am wa neith mad hebai e cheh.
Kud am bij g shahwai machd eda t-mihshmath. Kutsh am hahawa hihi g Salome ch Mary Magdalene ch hegai hema Mary k am ha nolawt g si s-ap uhwchu matsh hekaj wo huhu g muhki.

Wabsh i si'alim mo e aihim g thomig, tsh gm hu hihi ihtham hiha'ini wui k am neneokhim ch hab kaij, “Kus hedai t-wehhejed gm hu wo i nu'ichkwua hegai hothai mat ab hekaj e kuh g cheo?” Tsh ab i chesh g tash matsh eda gd hu thatha.
Tsh chum nei matsh heki hu in hu hab i e nu'ichkwua.
Tsh am i wahp. Kush inhab hema thak ch hab sha mahs mo g wechij o'othham. Sh g enigaj wabsh si s-toa. Kutsh si e totoths g u'uwi.
Sh wabshaba hab ha ahg, “Pi g am wo sha'i e totothsith. M ani wa s-mahch mam g Jesus chuhkug chum gahghim. Am g wo neith mo pi ia hu ha'ichug iia mat ia e woi. Uhpam at ep i wuhsh muhkig t amjed.
Kumt gm hu wo hihim k wo ha ahgi g chuhchaij, chum wa g Peter, mat uhpam e chegito k gm hu wo hih Galilee wui. Mt gm hu wo hihim k am ha'ab wo nei.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil.
Kutsh i wuwhag k gm hu uhpam wohp pi hedai sha'i ha ahgithch wohg oithch nash pi si e totothsith.
Kutsh am hihi g u'uwi k am ha ahgi ihtham Peter mat haschu kah.
Tsh heg i thahm g Jesus am hahawa ha cheha g e-chuhchai mat gm hu wehsko wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj mat g hemajkam ab wo s-wohochuth k wo e tho'ibia.]
Sh wabshaba pi sha'i wohochuth.
Sh am i thahm ha'i gm hu hasko hihimath ch d gohk. Tsh g Jesus gawul masma am i e chehgi ha wui.
Kutsh ihtham am uhpam ep hihim k gd hu wehs ha ahgi g chuhchaij. Kush pi sha'i ha wohochuth.
Tsh am hahawa i e chehgi g Jesus hegam ha wui gamai hemako e-chuhchai. Sh ihtham am e wehm e gegosith. Tsh am s-ha keh'el nash ge ha wohochuth hegam mash neith mo d thoakam
ch hab hahawa ha ahg, “Am g wo a'ai hihim k am wo i ha ahgithahi wehs hemajkam ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab ni-amjed.
Kut heg wo e tho'ibia matp hedai wo i s-wohochuth k wo e pahl wako. T wabshaba ab wo moht g pi ap e-chu'ichig k ab wo ai g pi ha huhugetham sho'igthag matp hedai pi ab hu wo wohoch.
T wo tashok mo hedai ab ni-hiwig nant pi ab wo ha mah g gewkthag. Kut am wo i ha wuwhasithath g jijawul ni-wehhejed ch ep wo neneokath g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj mat pi hebai mai.
Kut pi has wo e juh matp wo ha taht g kohk'oi o atp wo ih'eth g hialwui. Kut an wo ha taht g kok'otham. T wo thotha.”
Kutsh am i ha'as ha wehm neo g Jesus k am i thahm hahawa uhgk i e bei thahm kahchim wui k ga hu s-apkojed thahiwua e-ohg Jiosh hugith ab.
T ihtham gm hu a'ai ha ahgithahi g hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kut g Jiosh si s-hasig ha'ichu hab ha juni mat hekaj wo s-mahchk g hemajkam mo d wohokam g ha'ichu ha-ahga. [

Ni-nawoj map ab si tatchua g Jiosh: Ab apsh kaiham ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh alithag mach ab s-wohochuth. Kunt am wo ha'ichu m-o'ohani ab amjed mapt hekaj wo s-ap s-mahchk. Hegam mash am neith o am t-ahgith ab amjed. Kut mu'i am s-ap o'oha hegai mo haschu am t-ahgith. Nt ahni am si i hoa wehs ihtha k hekaj am wo m-o'ohanith k am ba'ich ha'ichu wo m-ahgi ab amjed.

Amjed atsh ab i shohshonwua ihtha mash eda g Herodbad am d kownal Judea chekshani ch ed am ha thahm g Tutuligo hemajkam. Sh am hema d ha-pahlig ch hab chehgig Zacaria. Sh g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Elisabeth. Ihtham ash ab d amjedkamaj hegai mash d ha-shohshonbad g papal ch hab chehgig Aaron. Kush g Zacaria ab hema d amjedkam mash hab chehgig Abia.
Kush ihtham Zacaria ch Elisabeth am si oith g s-ap'ekam ch s-ap am hab junihim wehs hegai mo g Jiosh ab ha chehani g Tutuligo.
Kutsh wabsh okst ihtha Elisabeth k pi ha mahmadt. Tsh g Zacaria hab wa'ap kelit.
Kutsh hema tash am i e ai matsh g Abiabad amjedkam am hab wo juh g e-chikpan ge'e cheopi ch ed.
Kumtsh am i kei g Zacaria matsh am wo ha mehmhei g s-ap uhw kuhbhonthakud. Tsh am i wah cheopi ch ed.
Kush am jeg ed gegok g hemajkam ch e ho'ige'ithahun.
Tsh am cheopi ch ed hema i e chehgi g anghil Zacaria tahgio k ash ab kehk s-apkojed abai mash ab kuhbhoni g s-ap uhw kuhbhonthakud.
Tsh am i nei g Zacaria k si e tothsith k si s-ehbeni ihtha.
Kush wabshaba hab kaij g anghil, “Pi g am sha'i e tothsith, Zacaria. Jiosh at kah g m-ho'ige'ithahuna. T g m-wehm kihkam wo wa hema madt. T d wo cheojk. Kupt hab wo chehch John.

Jiosh at ab a wo si has elithath. Kut pi koi wo mahsi. T g Jiosh ab wo mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kupt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigk. T g mu'i hemajkam hab wa'ap wo si s-hehgigk mat hekith wo mahsi. Kut ihtha em-aliga pi hekith wo ih'eth hegai mo s-nawmthag.
ch mu'i ab wo i ha nohnogi g Tutuligo hemajkam ab Jiosh wui.

T koi in hu wo i wuhsh g Jiosh si Kehsha jewed thahm. T g em-aliga ia wehpeg wo ahgachugath mat in wo i wuhsh. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo mah g gewkthag heg wehhejed hab masma mo wa ab mahkch g Elijabad. Kut hab wo ha juh g hemajkam mat ab wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-a'aliga k hegam hab wo ha juh mo d pi ap'ekam mat ab wo kaihamath g ha-amichuthadag hegam mo d s-ap'ekam. Neh, bat masma am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam heg wehhejed jiwhiathaj g Jiosh si Kehsha.” Neh, bash kaij hegai anghil.
Kush g Zacaria hab kaij, “Nt has hig masma wo si s-ap s-mahchk machs wo hema bei g ali natt pi kekelt?”
Sh hab kaij g anghil ab wui, “Thani Jiosh chikpantham, Gabriel. Kut ab ni-cheha mant ia wo m-ahgi ihtha si s-hehgig ha'ichu ahgaj.
Kupt eda pi ab hu ni-wohoch. T heg hekaj hab wo m-juh mapt pi wo sha'i e nako maps wo ha neokath ia'i amjed am hugkam mat hab wo e juh ihtha mani m-ahgith.” Neh, bash kaij hegai anghil.
Sh eda heg oitham am chum nenida g hemajkam g Zacaria ch si has i elith k hab kaij, “A t has e juh k pi oi ab hu i wuhsh?”

Tsh am hu hebai ab hahawa i wuhshani k chum neo am ha wui k wabsh pi sha'i e nako. Sh am ha hekaj wabsh i amich g hemajkam matki ab ha'ichu e chehgi wui no pi ab wabsh i ha magwuith g e-nowikaj ch pi ab hu has sha'i kaij.
Tsh am wabsh i chum huhug g tash mat he'es tash am hab wo juh g e-chikpan. Tsh gm uhpam hih e-kih wui.

Kush amai i mia amjed matsh wo'iwua g ali. Kush am wabsh s-ap e tahtk ch am e ehstokch g Elisabeth e-kih ed hetasp mashath hab kaijhim. “Chum ani hekith si ni-elith mani pi ha mahmadt. Kutki wabshaba ith hab ni-juni g Jiosh k hekaj gm hu hab i juh g si ni-edathag am hemajkam ha-nena ed.”

Neh, tsh am him k am d i chuhthp mashath am i thahm matsh am wo'iwua g Elisabeth mad. Tsh g Jiosh am chea hegai anghil mash d Gabriel matsh am wo u'apa g ha'ichu ahgaj hema wui g chehia. Sh hab chehgig ihtha chehia Mary ch am kih heg eda kihhim mash d Nazareth ch am eda g Galilee chekshani. Sh am hema ep d kihkam ch hab chehgig Joseph ch atsh wo hohnt hegai Mary. Ihtham ash ab hema d amjedkam mash kownalibad ch hab chehgig David.
Kutsh koi e ai matsh wo e hohont. Tsh am jiwia hegai anghil Mary wui k hab kaij. “Si g s-hehgigk Mary. Jiosh at ab i s-m-ho'ige'ith k am wo i m-wehmt.”
Tsh am wabsh i pi amich mas haschu hab ahg k si e kudu heg hekaj.
Sh hab ep kaij g anghil, “Pi g am sha'i e tothsith, Mary. Ab at i m-mah g Jiosh g ho'ige'ithadag.
Kut am wabsh wo e nahto g ali m-eda k wo mahsi k d wo cheojk. Kupt hab wo chehch Jesus.
Kut d wo si s-has ha'ichuk no pi d alithaj g Jiosh. T g Jiosh am wo i kei mat d wo kownalk am kehkud ed g e-shohshonbad David.
Kut chum hekith d wo ha-kownaligk g Jiosh hemajkamga. Pi at hekith wo huhug g kownaltaligaj.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil.
Sh hab kaij g Mary ab wui, “Nt has hig masma wo ge madt mani d wabsh kia chehia ch pi koi ha kun?”
Sh g anghil ab wui hab kaij, “Jiosh at ab wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T heg hab wo juh g Jiosh gewkthagkaj. Mt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mat d wo si hekia s-ap'ekam alik ch d wo Jiosh alithagk.
“Neh, s-mahch ap mat heki hu okst g m-hajuni Elisabeth k pi ha mahmadt. Kut eda g Jiosh ab s-ho'ige'el. Kut g cheoj ali wo bei. K d chuhthp mashath hemu mat am wo'iwua g ali.
Kupt ith amjed wo s-mahchk mat wo e nako g Jiosh mat am hab wo juh hegai mo haschu hab e ahgahim.” Neh, bash kaij g anghil.
Kush hab hahawa kaij g Mary, “Neh, thani piongaj g Jiosh. K am wa s-ap'e mat am hab wo juh g e-tatchui ab ni-ab” Tsh gm hahawa hih g anghil ab amjed.

Tsh ab ha hekaj i e nako g Mary mat am wo chehgim g Elisabeth. Sh hegam Elisabeth ch Zacaria am kih mash am hema kihhim ka'akwulk ch ed am Judea chekshani ch ed. Tsh am jiwia Mary ha-kih am k ab ha-ihm.
Tsh am i kah g Elisabeth k ab taht matsh g mathaj am si al i banimme eda. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewthag ab si i mah g gewthag.
Kush hekaj si s-hehgigam hab kaij ab wui g Mary. “Neh, ab atki si i s-m-ho'ige'el g Jiosh ba'iwechkim mo chum hedai uwi. Kutki wo mahsi m-amjed hegai mash ab mahks g si ge'e s-ap'ekam.
Kuptki d wo je'ejk hegai mat d wo ge t-kownalig. Kuni si s-ap ni-tahtk mapt ia'i ni-chehgim.
Neh. am at si i banimme g ni-mad mant am i m-kah mapt ab ni-ihm. K heg hekaj am ni-chehgith g Jiosh mo ab si s-m-ho'ige'ith.
Woho at hab wo e juh hegai mo ab m-chehgith g Jiosh. K d si ge'e ho'ige'ithalig mapt ab i s-wohoch.” Neh, bash kaij g Elisabeth.
Kush g Mary hab kaij: “Ab ani si hehgchulith g Jiosh
ch si s-ap ni-tahtk mo d ni-tho'ibiakam.

Thani wabsh sho'igkam. Kut eda ab si has i ni-elith k si ge'e ha'ichu ab hab ni-juni g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj. T Hab i'ajed chum hekith hab wo chei g hemajkam imhab a'ahithag oitham mat ab si i s-ni-ho'ige'el g Jiosh. Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh
ch eda ia'i a'ahithag himtham oithch si pihk e elith ab wehs ha wui hegam mo ab si has i elith.
T am wo chehgi g si ge'e e-gewkthag k wo has gewito hegam mo si e hahaschuth
k wo ha wohppo'i g kokownal g ha-gewthag k g s-kakais s-ha-kaisthag gm hu hab wo i juh k wabshaba g sho'igkam ab has wo i ha elith k heg ab wo i ha mah mo haschu i s-kehgaj ha wehhejed.
Neh, bash wa am ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad gd hu i Abraham amjed matsh ith am hab wo e juh. Ab o i t-wehmt g Jiosh ahchim mach ab d ha-amjedkam k ab wehs t-wui si pihk e elith i'ajed chum hekith.”
Neh, bash hahawa g Mary ch amjed am ha wehm thakahim waik mashath ab ch gm hahawa hih uhpam.
Tsh am hahawa i e ai. Tsh madt g Elisabeth. Kush d cheoj ali.
Sh g hajunij ch hugithaj an kihkam si s-hehgig wehmaj am i kaiok matsh g Jiosh ab si i s-ho'ige'el.
Kush am d i gigi'ik tash g ali. Kumtsh wo pahl hikuch mo d ha-himthag. Tsh am e chehm g hemajkam k hab wo chum chehch Zacaria am oithk g ohgaj.
Kush wabshaba hab kaij g je'ej, “Pi atsh g e-ohg oithk wo chehgigk ch wabshaba hab wo chehgigk John.”
Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi o hedai hab sha'i chehgig g m-hajuni,”
ch amjed ab wabsh i chum kakke g ohgaj mat am wo ha ahgi mas has wo chehch.
Sh heg hema ha tahni g o'ohanakud. Mtsh hema mah. Kutsh ith an o'oha, “Bo chehgig John”. Tsh wehsijj si e totoths.
Kutsh am wa'i hekaj s-ap neok k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ab si ho'ige'ith.
Tsh wehsijj ab si has el g Jiosh hegam mo an ha wehgaj kih. Tsh gn hu a'ai s-e mai am Judea chekshani ch ed mat has i e juh.
Ab ash si s-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ihtha ali. Kush wehsijj hegam mash am kah am si i oithahim ch hab kaij, “Kus has mahs wo ha'ichuk ihtha ali?”
Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g si ge'e gewkthag ab i mah g Zacaria. Tsh heg am si s-hewelim neok k gm hu ba'ich ah mat haschu has wo e juh hab kaijch:
“Ab ant wo si i hehgchul g s-ap'ekam t-kownalig Jiosh. E o nahtokch mat wo t-tho'ibia ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj
ch atsh hekaj am hema wo i maskogi mat d wo t-tho'ibiakamk. Heg at ab d wo kownal Davidbad amjedkamk ch wo u'ukch g si ge'e gewkthag.
Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam o heki hu am ahgachug matsh g Jiosh wo t-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g t-obga ch hegam mo s-t-keh'ith.
Ab at wo i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh mash wa hab masma ha ahgith g t-shohshon.
Bash si kaij ab Abrahambad wui mat wo t-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g t-obga. Tt hab pi hedai wo ehbithath ch ab si s-ap wo ihmath g Jiosh.
ch wo s-ap'ek am nenaj ed ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam chum hekith.

Ihtha ni-sulijga at d wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk ch wo ha ahgi g Jiosh hemajkamga mat g Jiosh ab wo s-ha ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k wo ha tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag. Kut heg hekaj wo e nahtokchith mat g tho'ibiakam am wo i e maskogi. Ith at am wo i wuhsh Jiosh t amjed k ab wo t-mah g amichuthadag.

hab masma mo g tash ab i chechshshaj ch ab t-mamka g tonlig. Ab ach wa hihim t-namkithadag wui mat g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i t-juh heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kut wabshaba g t-tho'ibiakam ab wo i t-chehgi matt has masma am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh wui.” Neh bash kaij g Zacaria.

Kutsh si s-gegokim i ge'etha g ali am e tashogith mo am Jiosh tatchui oithch him. Kush am hebai d i himtham, tsh gm hu i e gawulkai tohono jewed ch ed k am ha'ichugkahim ch ab ai mat am i e maskogi Tutuligo ha wui.
Sh am hema d si ge'e lai wehs ha thahm g jejewed ch hab chehgig Augustus. Sha am hu hebai, tsh ith am hab juh g chehanig matsh wehs wo e o'ohan k wo e kuint g hemajkam hehe'ejel e-kihhim ab.
Ith ash d si wehpeg kuintadag. Kush am hema d kownal Syria jewed ch ed hab chehgig Quirinius.
Tsh am himto g hemajkam ab hehe'ejel e-kihhim wui matsh wo e o'ohan k wo e kuint.

Tsh hegai Joseph mash wa am kih Nazareth t am ch atsh wo hohnt g Mary gm hu hih Bethlehem wui am Judea chekshani ch ed nash pi ab d kownalibad David amjedkam. Sh g Davidbad am d kihkam Bethlehem t am.
Tsh g Mary am oi g Joseph. Sh eda e aihim matsh wo bei g e-mad.

Tsh am thatha Bethlehem t am. Sh eda pi am hu ha jeg am koksikud kih ch ed. Tsh heg hekaj am thadhaiwua ha'ichu thoakam kih ch ed. Kutsh si e ai. Tsh madt g Mary. Kush heg d wehpegkam ch d cheoj. Kutsh am si i hobino s-moik ikus ch ed k am heg eda woi mo g ha'ichu thoakam am e gegosith.
Sh am ha'i thadha g kahwal ha nuhkuththam gm hu jeg ed ch an ha nuhkuth g e-shoshoiga.
Tsh ab haha wabsh ha wui e chehgi g anghil ab thahm kahchim t amjed. Kutsh an si i ton ha wehgaj matsh am e chehgi g Jiosh gewkthag. Kutsh wabsh woho'i e totoths.
Sh hab hahawa kaij g anghil, “Pi g am wo sha'i e totothsith. Ia ant jiwia mant ha'ichu wo em-ahgi. K ith wehs hemajkam d ha wuikam. T wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab amjed.
Ithani at am mahsi Davidbad kihhim ed hegai mo d Jiosh si Kehsha mat d wo em-tho'ibiakamk ch d wo ge'echu em-kownaligk.
Kumt ith ab wo s-mahchk mat am wo wo'ok heg eda mo am e gegosith g ha'ichu thoakam ch g s-moik ikuskaj wo e hobinodch.”
Tsh haha wabsh sha'i mu'i anghil ab ha wui i e chehgi wehmaj hegai hema k si ne'e ch ab hehgchulith g Jiosh ch hab kaij.
“Ab ach wehsijj hehgchulith g Jiosh an thahm kahchim ch ed. T hegam mo hohho'ithachuth g Jiosh an jewed thahm wo e tho'ibia k wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui.”

Neh, bash kaij g anghil ch gm hu hahawa i himto thahm kahchim wui. Sh hab kaij a kahwal ha nuhkuththam ab a'ai e wui, “Oi g wo hihim. Tt wo hihi am Bethlehem wui k am wo nei hegai matsh am hab e juh mo ab i t-ahgith g anghil am wehhejed g Jiosh.”
Tsh wa woho am si s-hohtam hihim k am i ha gahghim k ha cheh. Kush woho am wo'o g ali heg eda mo am e gegosith g ha'ichu thoakam.
Tsh hegam kahwal ha nuhkuththam am hahawa i ahgahi mash has kaij g anghil ab amjed.
Tsh wehsijj hegam mash ha kah ab si has i el mo haschu ha ahgith.
Kush am si oithahim g Mary ch am wabsh hejel i s-mahch.
Tsh g kahwal ha nuhkuththam gm hu uhpam hihi ab si hehgchulithch g Jiosh natsh pi wehs nei hegai mo haschu am ha ahgith g anghil.
Kush am d i gigi'ik tash g ali. Kumtsh an pahl hikuch mo d ha-himthag k hab chehch Jesus matsh wa g anghil ia u'apa g ahga mat eda koi wo'iwua.

Tsh am i e ai g tash matsh g Mary am wo e chehgi mo kegchuthas mat hab masma g Mosesbad an o'oha g Jiosh chehanig. Bo chu'ig matsh heg hekaj gohk wo ha koktha g hohhi o g pap-loloma k ab wo iagchul Jiosh wui. K hab ep chu'ig matp d wo cheojk g wehpeg mahsithkam ch ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui. Tsh heg hekaj am bei g ali k am hihi ge'e cheopi wui ab Jerusalem t ab.
Sh am hema kih g keli ch hab chehgig Simeon ch ash d si s-ap'ekam ch ab si has elith g Jiosh ch ash ab si nenida mat wo ha tho'ibia g Tutuligo. Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si wehmaj
ch ash am i tashogi matsh pi wo muh k ab wo ai mat wo nei g Jiosh si Kehsha.
Neh, tsh am i e ai g tash. Tsh am hahawa i tashogi mat am wo i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kutsh g Joseph ch Mary am u'apa g Jesus matsh am hab wo juni mo has i masma d ha-chehanig.
Tsh g Simeon an koh g ali k ab si e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui hab kaijch.
“Pegih ia o i s-ap'e, ni-Jioshga. Pt ab haha wo i ni-hiwigi mant wo si s-ap ni-taht k ni-pihhu map hab masma heki hu am ni-ahgith.
Neh, ni-wuhpuikaj ani hahawa neith ihtha mapt hekaj wo t-tho'ibia.
Kut wehs hemajkam wo s-mai ab amjed
nat pi d wo ha-tonligk g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch ab wo si uhgk i ha bei g m-hemajkamga.” Neh, bash kaij hegai Simeon.
Sh g Joseph ch Mary si has e tahtk heg hekaj mo has i kaij ab amjed g ali.

Sh hab hahawa kaij g Simeon ab ha wui. “Jiosh at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el,” ch ash hab ep kaij ab je'ej wui, “Neh, ihtha ali at g Jiosh am si i kei. Kut mu'i wo t-tho'ibia. T wabshaba mu'ijj g t-wehm Tutuligo pi ab hu wo wohochuth k im hu hab wo i e juh. Jiosh at ab wo e chehgi t-wui ith hekaj ali. T mu'ijj wo s-keh'ith
k hekaj wo mahsko wua g e-chegitoithag. Kut g m-ihbthag wo si s-ko'okkath hab wa'i masma matp hems g is-pahyo ab wo si m-chu'akath m-ihbthag ed.” Neh, bash kaij g Simeon.

Sh hema g oks am d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hab chehgig Anna. Sh g ohgajbad hab chehgig Phanuel ch ab d amjedkamaj g Asherbad. Kush g keligaj ihtha Anna muh mash eda d haha wabsh i e wehm kihkam wewa'ak a'ahith ab.

Sh am haha d hejel wi'ikam gigi'ikko gamai gi'ik (84) a'ahith ab. Tash oitham ch chuhug oitham ash am ha'ichug ge'e cheopi t am ch ab si has elith g Jiosh ab wui e ho'ige'ithahunch ch hab al he'es ha'ichu ko'a.

Sh am ha'ichug g ali ch je'ej g Joseph wehm. Kutsh am jiwia hegai Anna k ash ab ho'ige'elith g Jiosh ch am hahawa wehsijj ha ahgith ab amjed g ali hegam mash hab wa'ap nenida matsh g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia.
Neh, kutsh wehs am hab juh hegai mo an o'ohanas chehanig ch ed k gm hu hahawa uhpam hihi Galilee chekshani wui k am thatha e-kih am Nazareth kihhim t am.
Kutsh ab si s-gegokim i ge'elhi g ali k wabsh sha'i ha'ichu s-amichuth. Sh g Jiosh pihk elithadag am si e tashogith wehhejed.
Wehs ahith ab ash am e wushshath Jerusalem t am matsh wa ha tho'ibia g Jiosh g ha-shohshon ab ha amjed g Egypt t am hemajkam. Kush g Jesus jehj chum hekith am hihhim.
Kush am d i gamai gohk a'ahithag g Jesus. Tsh am i e ai hegai ha-tho'ibiathag wuhshtha. Tsh am ep hihi bekch g Jesus k am ha'ichugkahim mo he'es i tash am hab e wua.
Tsh am i kuhgit. Tsh gm hu i e nohnogi uhpam. Tsh eda am wa'i wih g Jesus Jerusalem t am. Sh g jehjij pi mahch mo pi am hu ha wehmaj
nash pi hab elith mash an wa hebai ha wehmaj g hihimtham mash am mu'i e wehm hihim. Kush hekaj hemako tash wa'i chihpia k an chum gahghi ha oithk g e-hajuni ch e-nan'aipijju.
Sh eda pi am hu ha'ichug. Kutsh oi wa gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui mat an wo i gahghi.
Kush am d i waik tash. Tsh gd hu hahawa cheh ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kush am thak ch ab ha kaiham g s-chu a'amichuththam ch ab si ha'ichu ha kakke mash am a'aga g Jiosh o'ohana.
Sh ihtham ab epai ha'ichu kakke. Kush si s-e mamachim neok ch si s-ap ab uhpam i nodgith g ha'ichu ha-kakkei. Sh wehsijj hegam mash kah ab wabsh i haha'athka si has i e tahtk.
Neh, tsh g Joseph ch Mary hab wa'ap si has i e taht am chehgiok. Sh g je'ej hab kaij, “Ni-sulijga, shahchu apt ahgk hab t-juh? Shelkam att nonda g m-ohg wehm pi m-edgithk.”
Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Chum am wa s-mahch mant hemho wa am wo ha'ichugk ni-ohg Jiosh kih ed.”
Sh eda pi sha'i amichuth mo haschu ahgch hab kaij.
Kutsh gm hu hahawa uhpam hih ha wehm Nazareth wui k ab ha wechokahim. Sh g je'ej pi hekith sha'i pi chegito ihtha matsh has e juh.
Neh, kutsh ab si s-gegokam i ge'ehogatahi g Jesus k ba'ich i edagi g amichuthadag k ash am si oith g Jiosh chehanig. Kush ab si s-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh. Sh g hemajkam ab si has elith.

Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kush am thaha ihtha John mo d Zacariabad alithag am tohono jewed ch ed. Sh wenog am hema d si uhgchu lai wehs ha thahm g jejewed ch hab chehgig Tiberius. Kush am hema ep d kownal Judea chekshani t am ch hab chehgig Pilate. Kush g Herodbad a'alithag hab wa'ap d kokownal. Hema ash hab wa'ap chehgig Herod ch ash am d kownal Galilee chekshani ch ed k ch hema hab chehgig Philip ch am d kownal Iturea ch ed ch Traconitis ch ed. Sh g Lisanias am d kownal Abelene ch ed. Kush ia'i ithani hegam am d si u'ugchu ha-papalig g Tutuligo mash hema hab chehgig Annas ch hema hab chehgig Caiaphas. Tsh g Jiosh ab mah g John g ha'ichu e-ahga mash eda hegai Tiberius am wa'i thaha gamai hetasp a'ahith ab.

Sh g John an wehsko ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga anai Jordan akimel wo'oshani ed hab ha ahgch, “Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko. Tsh g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig.”

Batsh wa e juh hab masma matki an heki hu o'oha hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah. K hab chu'ig g o'ohanaj: Hema atsh gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch, “Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako hab sha masma mamt am wo i ap'ech g pad wohg mat am oithk wo i hih g ge'e kownal.
Nat hig pi am wo i e ap'ech g wohg mo hebai pi apkothag mat hekith wo jiwia g ge'e kownal? Pegih, mt am hab wa'ap wo i ap'ech g e-thoakag am e tho'ibiak.
T hab wehs wo nei g hemajkam mat has masma wo chum ha tho'ibia g Jiosh.” Neh, batki masma an o'oha g Isaiabad. Kush g John woho hab masma hab e wua.

Tsh mu'i am wui e chehm g hemajkam matsh ab ab wo e pahl wapko. Ha'i ihtham o pi am hu gawul junimk g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kush hab ha ahg g John, “Hah, ahpim mam pi ap chegitoithag, bamki e elith mamt wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag heg wabsh hekaj mam ab d Abrahambad amjedkam. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mamt pi woho wo e tho'ibia, heg hi wa mamt am wo e chehgi am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam mamt gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Wehs hegam mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi at d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak ch hab masma wo e kuint mo d Abrahambad amjedkam, chum wa g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
Kumt ahpim gm hu wo s-e ohhoth hab masma mat g pi kehg bahithkam u'us mamtp pi gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k pi am hu hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.”
Kush ha'i g hemajkam ab kakke, “Pegih, tt has hig wo chum t-juh?”

Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Mt am wo i ap'ech g e-chegitoi Jiosh wui k amjed pi wo tha'i g e-eniga. Neh, tp hems hema pi wo ha kotonik. Kumt ab wo hema mah. Tp hems hema pi wo ha'ichu chekk. Mt ab wo mah g ha'ichu hugi.” Neh, bash kaij g John.
Kush ha'i hegam matsh am wui thatha k wo e pahl wapko d lial ha kowlanttham am kownal wehhejed ch ash ab kakke, “T-mashchamtham, tt ahchim has wo chum masmak?”
Kush hab ha ahg, “Pi amt gamai hu wabsh ba'ich i mu'i wo ha kowlant mo he'ekkia i mohto'is g o'othham.”

Kush ha'i d shonthal ch ab epai kakke, “Tt ahchim has wo chum masmak?” Sh hab ha ahg, “Pi g hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i ha wohppo'ithath ch pi ab hu hema ha'ichu wo sha'i abch mat pi wo wohok ch ehp mamt wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkk ch ab u'u mam he'ekkia i em-namkith.”
Kush g hemajkam pi am hu thotholimath am oithahimch mas hu ith d Jiosh si Kehsha matsh wo ha tho'ibia.

Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g John, “Pi g hab wo ni-elith manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ab at hema wo i wuhsh ni-oithk mat d wo si ha'ichuk. Ahni ani hi wa em-pahl wapkon. T wabshaba heg ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k gm hu hab wo i juh pi em-ap'ekam hab sha masma mat g mehi wo mei g sha'i.

“Nam hig pi nehnichuth g pilkani mamt g mohgaj gm hu wo i gawulkath k wo mehith k g pilkani gd hu wo i ba'iha. Pegih, t hab wa'ap am a'ai wo i ha gawulkai g hemajkam am lothaita ch ed ihtha mani em-ahgith k wo ha tho'ibia g s-ap'ekam k g pi ap'ekam s-ko'okam wo ha namkith. T g ha namkithadag pi hekith wo huhug.”
Neh, bash kaij g John ch nahnko masma am i chum ha tashogith g hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.

Sh eda hegai kownal mash hab chehgig Herod ge'e hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ch atsh g e-wehnag ehs g hohnigaj. Sh hab chehgig hegai Herodias. Kush g John ab s-keh'ith g kownal ch hab kaij mat pi hab wo chum e juh.
Tsh g Herod am ba'ich i pi ap ha'ichu hab juh matsh gd hu si kuh g John.

Tsh wabshaba koi e kuh g John k wehs ha pahl wapko hegam matsh am wui e chehm ab s-wohochuthch g Jiosh. Tsh g Jesus hab wa'ap am wui jiwia k e pahl wakon k am e ho'ige'ithahun. Tsh g thahm kahchim gam i e kuhpi'o.

Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i hud ab ab g Jesus k hab sha mahs mo g hohhi. Sh ab neok g Jiosh ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ahpi ap d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ch am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma.”

Jesus ash am hu d i waikko wehst-mahm a'ahithag matsh eda am i himch g e-chikpan k am i ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kush ihtham d shohshonaj mant g ha-chechgig an wo ha o'oha. Bash masma s-e mahch mo d Josephbad alithag. Sh g Joseph ab d Heli amjedkam.
Kush g Heli ohgbad Matthat. Sh g Matthat ohgbad d Levi. Sh g Levi ohgbad d Melchi. Sh g Melchi ohgbad d Jannai. Sh g Jannai ohgbad d Joseph.
Sh g Joseph ohgbad d Mattathias. Sh g Mattathias ohgbad d Amos. Sh g Amos ohgbad d Nahum. Sh g Nahum ohgbad d Esli. Sh g Esli ohgbad d Naggai.
Sh g Naggai ohgbad d Maath. Sh g Maath ohgbad d Mattathias. Sh g Mattathias ohgbad d Semein. Sh g Semein ohgbad d Josech. Sh g Josech ohgbad d Joda.
Sh g Joda ohgbad d Joanan. Sh g Joanan ohgbad d Resa. Sh g Resa ohgbad d Zerubbabel. Sh g Zerubbabel ohgbad d Shealtiel. Sh g Shealtiel ohgbad d Neri.
Sh g Neri ohgbad d Melchi. Sh g Melchi ohgbad d Addi. Sh g Addi ohgbad d Cosam. Sh g Cosam ohgbad d Elmadam. Sh g Elmadam ohgbad d Er.
Sh g Er ohgbad d Joshua. Sh g Joshua ohgbad d Eliezer. Sh g Eliezer ohgbad d Jorim. Sh g Jorim ohgbad d Matthat. Sh g Matthat ohgbad d Levi.
Sh g Levi ohgbad d Simeon. Sh g Simeon ohgbad d Judah. Sh g Judah ohgbad d Joseph. Sh g Joseph ohgbad d Jonam. Sh g Jonam ohgbad d Eliakim.
Sh g Eliakim ohgbad d Melea. Sh g Melea ohgbad d Menna. Sh g Menna ohgbad d Mattatha. Sh g Mattatha ohgbad d Nathan. Sh g Nathan ohgbad d David.
Sh g David ohgbad d Jesse. Sh g Jesse ohgbad d Obed. Sh g Obed ohgbad d Boaz. Sh g Boaz ohgbad d Shela. Sh g Shela ohgbad d Nashon.
Sh g Nashon ohgbad d Amminadab. Sh g Amminadab ohgbad d Admin. Sh g Admin ohgbad d Arni. Sh g Arni ohgbad d Hezron. Sh g Hezron ohgbad d Perez. Sh g Perez ohgbad d Judah.
Sh g Judah ohgbad d Jacob. Sh g Jacob ohgbad d Isaac. Sh g Isaac ohgbad d Abraham. Sh g Abraham ohgbad d Terah. Sh g Terah ohgbad d Nahor.
Sh g Nahor ohgbad d Serug. Sh g Serug ohgbad d Reu. Sh g Reu ohgbad d Peleg. Sh g Peleg ohgbad d Eber. Sh g Eber ohgbad d Shelah.
Sh g Shelah ohgbad d Cainan. Sh g Cainan ohgbad d Arphaxad. Sh g Arphaxad ohgbad d Shem. Sh g Shem ohgbad d Noah. Sh g Noah ohgbad d Lamec.
Sh g Lamec ohgbad d Methusela. Sh g Methusela ohgbad d Enoc. Sh g Enoc ohgbad d Jared. Sh g Jared ohgbad d Mahalaleel. Sh g Mahalaleel ohgbad d Cainan.
Sh g Cainan ohgbad d Enos. Sh g Enos ohgbad d Seth. Sh g Seth ohgbad d Adam. Sh g Adambad d amjedkamaj g Jiosh.
Jesus atsh gm hu hih ab amjed g Jordan akimel matsh hebai e pahl wako. Kush g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab mahkch g si ge'e gewkthag ch hab ahg mat gm hu wo hih am tohono jewed wui.
Kush am ha'ichugkahim gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash ab. Sh heg oitham g jijawul ha-ge'ejig am chum s-wuimk pi ap'ekam ch ed. Jesus ash pi ha'ichu ko'a heg oitham ch hekaj bihugim.
Sh g ge Jiawul ab wui hab kaij, “Bap chum e elith map d Jiosh alithag. Pegih, ab g hig chehani ihtha hothai mat wo e pahnch naptki pi bihugim.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant hab wo juh. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh ne'oki o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hi g ha'ichu hugi. Kut g o'othham hemho ab wo wa s-wohog elithath.”
Neh, tsh g Jiawul am hahawa sha'i si s-hohtam wuhpuij tahgio wehs i mahsith g kokownaltalig ith thahm jewed
k ab wui hab ep kaij, “Wehs o ab ni-mahks ihtha gewkthag ch kaisthag ch d ni-eniga mant wo wa mah mani hedai hab i elith.
Kunt wehs ab wo m-mah mapt ab ni-wui wo i gehsh k ab wo has ni-el.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant hab wo juh. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Heg amt wa'i Jiosh ab wui wo i gehsh k ab wo ihmath ch heg ab wo wa'i s-wohog elithath.”
Kutsh am hahawa wuhpuij tahgio i mahsith hegai ge'e cheopi mo am kehk Jerusalem t ab k hab ahg, “Maptp d wo Jiosh alithagk, pegih, am g i thah'i amjed mo gn hu si uhgk kihtas.
No hig pi an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh at ab wo ha cheha g mu'i anghil mat wo m-nuhkuth.
Kut an hu wo si m-u'ukchith mapt nih g sha'i e-tahtad ab hu wo shul hohothai t ab.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ant wo pip'ich g Jiosh. An o hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed: Pi g wo sha'i pip'ichuthath g e-kownalig Jiosh.”
Kush g Jiawul am hahawa sha thagito g Jesus am i wehs nahnko masma chum s-wuimkk pi ap'ekam ch ed.
Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Jesus Galilee chekshani wui. Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag si ge'e mahkch g gewkthag. Tsh gm hu a'ai s-e mai g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed.
Kush am ha mashcham ha e'eda g ha-chechopi. Sh wehsijj ab si has elith g hemajkam.

Kush am him k am hekith. Tsh gm hu hih g Jesus Nazareth kihhim wui mash wa am d si kihkam. Tsh g shahwai am i e ai. Kutsh am i e chehm g hemajkam cheopi ch ed nash pi eda e mihshmath. Tsh am jiwia g Jesus k am thahiwua hab masma mash wa chum hekith am hab e junihim. Kumtsh am hiwigi. Tsh am kekiwua matsh wo ne'okchul g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana.
Kumtsh ab hema mah g holiwk o'ohana. Sh d o'ohanaj g Isaiabad. Tsh an ne'okchul mo an hab chu'ig matsh g Jiosh si Kehsha hab wo chei:

Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant am wo ha ahgithahith g sho'igkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. K heg hekaj am ni-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch ab ni-mahkch g si ge'e gewkthag. K ab ni-chehani g Jiosh mant am wo ha ahgithahith g tho'ibiathag hegam mo ha'ichukaj e wupulshch ch wo ha nench g pi neneatham k ab wo i ha wuwhas hegam mo ha'ichukaj e kudut
k wo ahgachug mat e ai mat g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia g e-hemajkamga.
Tsh g Jesus ab i holiwkai g o'ohana k ab uhpam mah g nuhkuththam k am hahawa thahiwua mat ha'ichu hab wo chei. Sh wehsijj ab si kaiham mat has wo chei.
Kutsh am i neok k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, hemu at e ai. Ni ahni hab wua ihtha mant am ne'okchul em-wehhejed.”
Tsh wehsijj ab si has i el no pi si s-ap neok k wabshaba hab kaij, “Aha no hig pi woho d Josephbad alithag?”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “No hig pi woho mamt ab ni-wui hab wo chei hegai hab ha-che'ithag mo hab chu'ig, Am g i e maskogith maptp d ge mahkai, k hab ep wo chei, Ia g hu hig hab ep juhni g s-hasig ha'ichu e-kih am mapsh has masma am hab ge junihim Capernaum kihhim t am.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus. “Mo wa woho mam pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam amai mo hebai d i si kihkam.

Elijabad wehm o'othham ash wa hab masma pi ab hu has elith. Tsh heg hekaj pi am hu hema i wehmt matsh eda pi ha juh waik eda hugkam a'ahith ab. Tsh g bihugig i gei. Mu'ij ash g hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi amai.
Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh am cheha g Elijabad matsh am wo hih Seraphath kihhim wui am Sidon jewed ch ed k am wo hema i wehmt g hejel wi'ikam uwi amai.

Kush mu'i kok'o g Tutuligo heg hekaj pi ha thoththakam mumkithag mo hab e a'aga ‘leprosy’. Tsh eda pi hema sha'i ha thoaj hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Elisha. Sh hema heg hekaj mumku g gawul mahs o'othham ch hab chehgig Naaman ch am kih Syria jewed ch ed. Kutsh heg wa'i thoaj g Elishabad.”
Tsh wehsijj hegam mash am ha'ichug cheopi ch ed si babgat am i kaiok ihtha
k atsh gam si ne'iopa k am i chewaim g Jesus gm hu jegko. K eda g Nazareth an kehk kawulk t ab. Kutsh am i bei mo am hu hebai ge uhgk i koa g kawulk hab chum ahgk mat amjed wo i tha'ich.
Tsh wabshaba g Jesus am wabsh ha shahgith wuhshani k gm hu hih.
Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Jesus Capernaum wui heg eda chekshani k am ha mashcha g hemajkam cheopi ch ed mo am d i ha-mihshmetha tash.
Kutsh wehsijj si has i el kaiok mo has masma ha mashcham no pi si s-e mamachim neok.
Sh am hema thaha mo g jiawul an u'ukch. Kush si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij,
“Gam g hu hihm ahpi Jesus map ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam. A napt hab ahgk ia jiwia mapt wo t-koktha. S-mahch ani map hedai wud. Thap Jiosh si hekia s-ap'ekam kehsha.”

Tsh g Jesus ab si chehmo g jiawul k hab kaij, “Pi g shahmuni k ab i wuhshani ith amjed o'othham.” Tsh g jiawul am si wua hegai o'othham wehsijj ha tahgio k ab i wuhsh amjed k pi sha'i ko'okam has juh.
Kutsh wehsijj ab si has i el g Jesus k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Sha'i si s-gewkthag g ne'okij. Ab o chehani g jijawul mat ab wo i wuwha. K wa woho hab e wua.”
Kutsh wehsko e kah ihtha anai heg oithk jejewed.
Tsh amjed gm hu hih g Jesus heg kih wui mo hab chehgig Simon. Sh eda g hohnigaj je'e ihtha si mumku k ch s-toni iajithch. Kumsh am ahgith g Jesus ab amjed.
Tsh am him k am i kekiwua heg wo'ikud hugith an k am e ho'ige'ithahu. Tsh am ha hekaj ap'et k am i wamig k ha hihithol.
Tsh gm hu hud g tash. Tsh wehsijj hegam mo g ha-naipijju kok'o g nahnko mahs mumkithagkaj am ha u'apa Jesus wui. Kut wehsijj ab i ha tahtmahim k ha thothaj.

Tsh mu'i ab wui i hihi hegam mo g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Sh ihtham jijawul si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ahpi ap d Jiosh alithag.” Kush ab si s-ha keh'ith g Jesus ch gm hu i ha wuwhasith ch pi ha hiwgith mas am hu has wo kaijjith no pi s-mahch ihtham mo heg d Jiosh si Kehsha.
Sh am hu hebai wabsh i si'alim, tsh g Jesus gm hu jegko i wuhsh. Tsh am i gahghi g hemajkam k am i chehg k chum pi hiwigi mat wo hih ab ha amjed.
Kush wabshaba hab kaij ab ha wui, “Hemho wa ant am wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig an a'ai kihhim ch ed hab wa ehp nat pi hab ahgk i ni-kei g Jiosh.”
Tsh wa woho am i ha mihshmethahi wehsko ha-chechopi ed amai Galilee chekshani ch ed.
Sh am hu hebai g Jesus an kehk mo an i koa hegai al kahchki mo hab chehgig Galilee Kahchki. Kutsh g hemajkam ab wabsh i shodbinithahi s-kaimkch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Sh neith mo gohk wapalko am wupulshpi shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh g enigakam am ha thagito k gd hu ha wapkon g e-chuchagia.

Kutsh am i chesh g Jesus hema ha eda ihtham wapalko. Sh heg d Simon eniga. Sh hab ahg matsh am wo sha'i nu'ichkwua shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh g Simon hab juh. Tsh ab i thahiwua g Jesus wahlko ch ed k am ha mashcha g hemajkam.
Tsh am i ha'asa ha'ichu ha ahgith k hab ahg ihtha Simon mat am wo i himch g e-wahlko mo am s-juhk g shuhthagi k am wo i huduni g e-chuchagia ha wehm g e-wehm chikpantham.
Sh hab kaij g Simon, “T-mashchamtham, ge att chuhug sha'i si chikpan k pi ha'ichu sha'i bei. P wabshaba am t-ahgith matt am ep wo i huduni g t-chuchagia. Pegih, tt am hab wo t-juh.”
Kutsh wa woho am hihim k am i ha huhuds ge e-chuchagia k atsh sha'i si mu'i waptopi ha ui matsh chum alo e wanikumia g ha-chuchagia.
Kush am ha'i ep chikpan hema wahlko ch ed. Kumtsh ihtham ab hahawa si ha wai mat am wo i ha wehmt. Tsh wa woho ab i himch g e-wahlko k wehs ha shuhshuth g waptopikaj mat chum alo wachkk g ha-wapalko.

Tsh am i nei g Simon mat haschu has i e juh k ab si i gei g e-tohtonkaj Jesus wui k hab wabsh kaij, “Ih, thani wabsh pi ap'ekam o'othham. K pi hab chum mahs maps wo ni-wehmajk ahpi s-ap'ekam ni-kownalig.”
Kutsh wehsijj hegam mash wehmaj si e totoths neithch mat has e juh.

Ha'i hegam wehmaj chikpantham g Peter ash d James ch John ch ash d a'alithaj hegai mash hab chehgig Zebedee. Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab Simon wui, “Pi g am sha'i has e tahtkkath. I'ajed apt imhab g o'othham an wo ha u'uth ni-wehhejed.”
Tsh am wabsh i chum ai g shuhthagi koa ihtham k am i ha wuwhas g wapalko k wehs ha'ichu am wabsh i thagito k gm hu i oi g Jesus.

Sh am hu hebai g Jesus am hasko kihhim ch ed oimmed. Kush am hema g o'othham wehsko ma'ishch hegai mumkithag mo g chuhkugaj muhkhim. Tsh am jiwia g Jesus. Kutsh heg am i chehg k ab si kupal i gei wui k hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i ni-thoajith pej maptp wo tatchuath.”
Tsh g Jesus ab tahtam k hab kaij, “Am o wa s-ap'e. Thoajini.” Tsh am ha hekaj i thoa.

Tsh g Jesus ab chehani k hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai ahgith ab amjed ihtha k wabshaba am ha hekaj wo hih pahl wui. T am wo m-chechga k wo wohokamch mapt thoa. Pt am hab haha wo juh hegai iagchulitha mo wa g Jiosh em-chehani Mosesbad o'ohana ed. T hab wo s-mahchk g hemajkam mapt woho thoa.”
Tsh amjed gm hu hih hegai o'othham. Kutsh wehsko i e ahgahi ihtha matsh g Jesus hab juh. Tsh hekaj mu'i hemajkam am wui hihi mat wo kah g ha'ichu ahgaj k wo e thothaj.
Tsh g Jesus am wo ha mihshmath k wo ha thothajith k amjed gm hu hejelko wo him k wo e ho'ige'ithahu.

Sh am hu hebai ehp mash g Jesus am ha mashcham. Sh am ha'i thadha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch hegam mo si oith g chehanig ch hab e a'aga Palasi. Ihtham atsh ga hu a'aijed am thatha ab amjed g Galilee chekshani ch Judea chekshani ch ab Jerusalem kihhim t amjed. Tsh g Jiosh ab si mah g gewkthag g Jesus mat wo ha thothaj g kok'otham.
Tsh am ha'i thatha g chechoj hema u'athch g pi himithkam. Ith ash ab wabsh i s-moik ch am wo'o e-wahkus ed.

Kush am i chum s-wahkithamk kih ch ed matsh wo chehgi g Jesus ab si hiwigch mat wo thoaj. Sh wabshaba sha'i si s-hemajkamag. Kutsh pi has masma am hu wo i e wahki. Tsh heg hekaj gn hu hahawa i cheshaj kih thahm k am ge maggad g kih ma'ishpadag k amjed ab i huduni g wo'ikudaj am ha shahgith g hemajkam k am woi mash am kehk g Jesus.
Tsh am i nei g Jesus moki ab si hiwig ihtham k hab kaij ab wui ihtha o'othham, “Ni-nawoj, ab ani s-m-ho'ige'ith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”

Kush hegam chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi wabsh hejel hab e ahg, “Ih, sha'i si pi ap neok ihtha o'othham hab masma e wepogithch g Jiosh. Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.”
Sh g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am oithahim ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i oithahim manis pi woho edgith g gewkthag mant gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
Bam elith mo s-pehegim hab e kaij mat gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj no ge hedai s-mahch mas s-wohom hab e juh.

Pegih, nt wo em-chehgi mani woho ge gewkthag ch hab wua mani has i kaij ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.” Neh, bash kaij ch hab hahawa kaij heg wui pi himithkam, “I g wamig k am beh'i g e-wahkus k hihm am uhpam.”
Tsh am ha hekaj i wami hegai o'othham k am bei g e-wahkus k gm hu uhpam hih ab si ihmch g Jiosh.
Tsh g hemajkam si has i elith k ab ihm g Jiosh hab kaijch, “Sha'i si s-kehg ha'ichu ach neith ith tashkaj.”
Sh hema d lial kowlanttham g kownal wehhejed ch hab chehgig Levi. Tsh g Jesus am cheh. Kush am thaha heg eda kih mo am chikpan. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Oi g i ni-oith.”
Tsh g Levi am ha hekaj i wuhshani k am wabsh i thagito wehs ha'ichu k gm hu i oi.

Am wa'i mia amjed, tsh g Levi am hab juh g ge'e gegosig am wehhejed g Jesus. Sh am ha'i oiopo g Palasi mash ihtham ha'i d chehanig ha mashchamtham. Sh eda mu'ijj hegam mash am ha wehm e gegosith d lial kowlanttham hab masma mo g Levi. Kush hegam Palasi am ha neith ch hekaj s-ha keh'ith g Jesus chuhchai hab ha ahgch, “Ih, shahchu am ahgch am ha wehm e gegosith ihtham pi ap hemajkam, chum hems am ha wehm g lial kowlanttham?”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ihtham pi ap hemajkam o s-e tho'ibiamk hab masma mat g kok'otham wo s-e thoajitham. Hegam mo hab e elith mo s-ap'e at pi wo tatchua g mahkai.
Pi ant hab ahgk ia jiwia manis wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo pi e tho'ibiamk.”

Sh ha'i g hemajkam hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, mu'ikko o pi e gegosith ch wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun hegam mo ab wecho e mashcham g John ch hegam mo ab ha wecho e mashcham g Palasi. Kuki wabshaba ahpi g m-wohochuththam pi hab e wua.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nat hig pi wo e gegos g wo ha hohntam naipijju mat eda heg am wo ha wehmajk?
T am wo i e ai mat pi am hu wo ha wehmajk. T am hahawa pi wo e gegos. Pegih, bat wo wa e juh ihtham ni-naipijju mant hekith pi ia hu wo ha wehmajk.”

Sh am hahawa chum ha tashogith g Jesus mat g mashchamaj pi ap wo wehnath g ha-himthag ash hab kaij, “Pi at hedai g wechij ikuskaj wo shohsho g hekiuchij lihwa mat wo s-e wia nat pi wo i thahiwua k ba'ich wo i wantsh g hekiuchij. T hab wa'ap pi wo ap'et g hekiuchij nat ge wo wepo mahsk g wechij ikus.
T pi hedai g wechij nawait am wo toa hekiuchij ha'ichu elithag kokstal ch ed. Tp hab wo sha e juh, t g wechij nawait wo wantsh g ha'ichu elithag. T g nawait wo iawua k g ha'ichu elithag wo e padch.
Neh, hemho wa at g wechij nawait am wo e toa wechij ha'ichu elithag kokstal ch ed.
“Pi o hedai tatchua mat wo ih g wechij nawait hekith ab i jehkiok g hekiuchij nawait nat pi hab wo chei mo ba'ich i s-ap hab kahk g hekiuchij.”
Sh am hu hebai hihim ihtham Jesus ha mihshmetha tash ed. Kush am eshas g pilkani wohg huhugith an. Sh hegam mash am wehmaj g Jesus ab ha wohni g pilkani ch i mohon g e-nohnhoikaj ch ko'a.
Sh ha'i g Palasi ha neith ch hab kaij, “Shahchu am ahgch hab wua hegai mo g t-chehanig pi t-hiwgith machs hab wo wuath mihshmetha tash ed?”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Bo wabsh masma hab e wua matsh wa g Davidbad. Pi amtki chegito matsh heg has e juh am i bihugimk. Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana

matsh am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ui g pahn k huh hegam ha wehm mash am wehmaj. Kush d hegai pahn mo am e to'aw k ch hegam d wa'i ha wuikam mo d papal. T eda hemho wa am hab e juh. K heg hekaj am wa s-ap'e mat huh.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Thani Jiosh si Kehsha ch gewkthag am thahm g mihshmetha tash.”
Sh am hu hebai d ep mihshmetha tash. Tsh am i wahp ihtham Jesus hema cheopi ch ed. Kush g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam. Sh am hema thaha g o'othham mash g s-apkojed nowij mahnikodag.
Sh am ha'i thadha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi ch an wa s-nen'oith nash pi ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk g Jesus ch hekaj an neith mas wo hi wa ha thoaj mihshmetha tash ch ed.
Sh g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am chegito ch ash hab kaij heg wui mahnikokam, “Kekiwuani k ab i hihm ia hu ha ba'ich g hemajkam.” Tsh ab i kekiwua.

Sh g Jesus ab hahawa ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elith mo pi hiwgithas mihshmetha tash ed mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth? Ab o em-ab mamt wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam k ep wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat am hu wo e ko'ij. Aha namt wabsh wo ha hiwigi mat wo e ko'ij?”
Neh, bash kaij ch an hahawa wehsijj i ha neith k hab hahawa kaij ab wui hegai o'othham, “Ab g si i shelin g e-nowi.” Kutsh am wabsh i chum shelin k am wa'i hekaj ap'et.
Tsh hegam haha'ichu wabsh woho'i babgat matsh ha thoaj ha mihshmetha tash ab k am ha hekaj i e wehm a'aga mas has wo juh g Jesus.
Tsh am wa'i mia amjed am hu hebai gm hu i chesh g Jesus kawulk thahm k ge chuhug oitham e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui.
Kut am i mahsi. Tsh ab hahawa i ha wai hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham k g gamai gohk am ha ui mat d wo si chuhchaij.
Hema hegam ash d Simon. Kutsh heg hab ep chehch Peter mo hab d ahga ‘Hothai.’ Kush hema d Andrew ch d si wehngaj g simon. Kush ha'i d James ch John ch Philip ch Bartholomew
ch Matthew ch Thomas. Sh hema d hegai James mash g ohgaj hab chehgig Alphias. Sh hema hab ep chehgig Simon ch d hema hegam mash tatchua mat g Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g e-kownaltalig.
Sh hema d hegai Judas mash g ohgaj hab chehgig James. Kush hema d Judas Iscariot ch d hegai matsh wa gagda g Jesus. Neh, ihtham gamai gohk ash am d hahawa si chuhchaij g Jesus.
tsh ab hahawa i huhud hegam Jesus. Sh mu'i am ep ha'ichug g hemajkam ab amjed g Judea chekshani ch Jerusalem kihhim ch ab amjed g ge shuhthagi hugithag an miabithch g Tyre ch Sidon kihhim.
Wehsijj ash s-kaimk g Jesus. Kush ab wui hihim g kok'otham ch hegam mash g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Sh g Jesus ha thothajith ch gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul.
Kush wehsijj ab chum s-tahtmamk g Jesus nash pi g gewkthaj ab wuhshani amjed ch wehs ha thoajith.
Tsh g Jesus ab i ha nei hegam mash ab si hiwig k hab kaij: “Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam ab e sho'igchuth Jiosh wui. Ab at wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.

Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam hemuch chum ha'ichu tatchua. B at wo wa em-mah g Jiosh mam haschu i tatchua. Mt wo chum si s-ap e tahtkkath ahpim mam shoani hemu no pi ab him g tash mamt wo wa si s-hehgigk.
T wo s-em-keh'ithath g hemajkam ch wo s-em-ohhoth ch wo s-ko'okam has em-ahgath ch hab wo chei mam d wabsh pi ap'ekam.

Mt wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkkath ch wo s-hehgigk ith hekaj. Bash wa masma e sho'igchuth hegam mash d kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hekaj bei g Jiosh mahkigdag. T g Jiosh hab wa'ap wo em-mah g ge'e s-ap'ekam mo em-wehhejed an nuhkuth e-kihthag ed.
T wabshaba wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo hemu d s-kakais no pi ab heki hu neith g s-e-hehgig.
T wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo pi ha'ichu tatchua hemuch. Ab o him g tash mat wo pi ha'ichu edgithath. T wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo s-e tahhathchuth hemuch. Ab o him g tash mat wo shoanith.
T wo si pi ap e tahtkkath hegam mo wehs hemajkam ab si has ha elith hemuch. Em-shohshon ash hab masma si s-ap has ha ahg hegam mash hab wabsh s-e junimk mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
“Nt wo em-ahgi mamt has wo masmak am ha wui. Ab g wabsh wo i si pihk e elithath ha wui g e-obga k wabsh g s-ap ha'ichu hab wo ha juni hegam mo s-em-keh'ith.
Ihtham atp hems wo pi kehg neneokath ab em-wui ch wo em-sho'igchuthath. Mt wabshaba wabsh wo si s-hemajimak am ha wui ch wo e ho'ige'ithahu am ha wehhejed.

Tp hems s-ko'okam has wo em-juh. Mt wabshaba ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Tp hems hema ab wo em-shonihi em-kahm ab. Kumt wabsh wo hiwigi mat aigojed ab ep wo em-shonihi. Tp hems hema wo em-wohppo'i g em-lihwa. Kumt g e-kotoni ep wo mah.
Tp hems hema ha'ichu wo i em-tai. Kumt wo mah. Kutp hems hema ha'ichu wo bei mo d em-eniga. Kumt pi uhpam wo tai.
Bamt wo ha juhkchith g hemajkam mam has i chum ha elith mat hab wo em-juhkchith.
“Pi at wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam g Jiosh mamtp hegam ab wo wa'i ha tatchuath mo ab uhpam em-tatchua. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam ab ha tatchua hegam mo ab uhpam ha tatchua.
Pi at wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam g Jiosh mamtp hegam wa'i ha wehhejed hab wo juh g s-ap ha'ichu mo s-ap ha'ichu hab em-junith. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam hab wa masma hab e wua.

Pi at wo em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam g Jiosh mamtp hegam wa'i ha'ichu wo ha hiwigi mam hab ha elith mat wo wa uhpam em-mah. Chum o hems g pi ap hemajkam hab wa'ap a'ai ha'ichu e hiwgith hab e elithch mat ab uhpam ep wo ui ha'akia mat he'ekia ha hiwigi.

“Neh, mt ab wo pihk e elithath ha wui g e-obga ch am hab wo ha junithath g s-ap ha'ichu ch wo ha'ichu ha mah mamt pi ab hu uhpam wo ge neithath. Bamt masma am wo e chehgi mam d a'aligaj g Jiosh. T heg mu'i s-kehg ha'ichu ab wo em-mah. Jiosh o hab wa masma s-ha ho'ige'ith g pi ap hemajkam ch hegam mo pi ab hu uhpam ho'ige'elith.
Am g hab wo juhkchith g ho'ige'ithadag hab masma mo g em-ohg Jiosh am hab juhkch.

“Pi g am hedai s-ko'okam has wo ahgath o ab wo ha mohto'ithath g pi ap'ekam. B at uhpam wo i e nodagi ab em-wui. Gam g hu wabsh wo pi chegito mat hema s-ko'okam has wo em-juh. Kut hab wa masma gm hu wabsh wo pi e chegito mamtp hems hema s-ko'okam has wo juh.

Ab g wo ha'ichu ha mahkath. T g Jiosh ab ha'ichu wo em-mahkath. Ab amt ba'ich i ge'e wo bei mamt he'es ab i ha mah no pi g Jiosh ba'ich i s-hemajima matp hems g hemajkam. Ab at wo i e nodagi em-wui mamt has i masma ab wo neithath hema.

“Pi at has masma wo em-wanimedath wohokam ch ed hegai mat hedai pi wo mahchk g wohokam. Heg at wo wa wepok matp hems hema g pi neatham ha'i ep wo i ha wanim g pi neneatham. Kutp hems wehsijj am wo i shul hiktani ch ed.

S-mahch am mat g ha mashchamtham ha ba'ich wo i chum s-mahchk hegai mo haschu i ha mashcham. E mashchamtham at am hugkam wo chum s-mahchk g e-mashchama am i s-ap nahtok mo hegai mat hedai i ha mashcha.

“Pi g am wo si s-nen'oithath g hema chu'ichig. Tp hems ba'ich i ge'ej g hejel em-chu'ichig. T heg wo wa wepok mam g chum ha'ichu ab i s-wuhshthamk wuhij ed mo eda ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu ab wo'o em-wuhi ed.

Tho iattogi mamtp hab wo chei mamt ab wo ha'ichu i wuhshath ha-wuhi ed mo eda ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu am wo'o em-wuhi ed. Hemho wa amt wehpeg wo i ap'ech g pi e-ap'ethag k haha wo e nako mamt ha'i ep wo i ha wehmt k wo i ap'ech g pi ha-ap'ethag.
“Mt wo s-mai mas hedai d s-ap'ekam o'othham hab wa masma mamt wo s-mai mas haschu d s-kehg uhs. S-kehg uhs at s-kehg wo bahithagt ch g pi kehg uhs pi kehg wo bahithagt.
Uhs o s-e mahch ab e-bahithag ab. Pi amt ab hu wo ui g suhna ho'i t ab o g uhdwis ab sha'i t ab.
K hab wa'ap masma g o'othham matp wo s-ap'ek ch s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo wuath o wo pi ap'ek ch pi kehg ha'ichu hab wo wuath. Matp has i masma ha'ichu chegito g o'othham, t hab masma wo neokath.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ha'ijj am chum hekith hab ni-a'aga ‘ni-kownalig’ ch eda pi am hu hab wua mani haschu em-ahgith.
Ab g wo ni-hiwgath ch ab wo s-wohog elithath g ha'ichu ni-ahga. T hab wo s-ap'ek g em-thoakag.

Ith at heg wo wa wepok matp hems hema wo s-wihnam shondath g e-kihta. T hab pi wo i gei mat hekith wo hewed k juh k wo s-gewkam mel g shuhthagi. Pegih, mt hab wa masma s-wihnam wo gegokkath mo ihtha kih mamtp ab wo s-ni-wohog elithath.

“T wabshaba pi wo ap'ek g em-thoakag mamtp pi ab hu wo wohog ni-elithath. Ith at heg wo wa wepok matp hems hema pi wihnam wo shondath g e-kihta. T ab wo mel g shuhthagi. T ha hekaj wo i gei g kihj k am wabsh wo i e padch. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo i e padch g em-thoakag mamtp pi ab hu wo wohog ni-elithath.”
Neh, tsh am i ha'asa ha'ichu ha mashcha g Jesus amai k gm hu hahawa hih Capernaum wui. Kutsh g chuhchaij am wehmaj hihi.

Kush amai am hema d shonthal ha-ge'ejig ch ab d ha-kehsha Rome t amjed ch kah ab amjed g Jesus. Sh ith pionag hema muhkhim. Kush ab si tatchua g e-pionag ch hekaj ab ha tahni g Tutuligo ha-ge'egedga mat ab wo i wai g Jesus. T wo thoaj g piongaj.
Tsh hegam am thatha k ab si e sho'igch Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Am g i wehmt ihtha o'othham.
Ab o si t-tatchua ahchim Tutuligo ch am hema i kei g cheopi t-wehhejed.”

Kutsh gm hu ha oi g Jesus k am i aihi g kihj hegai shonthal ha-ge'ejig. Tsh heg am ha'i ha ahgi g e-naipijju matsh am wo hihim k wo ha'ichu ahgi g Jesus. Kutsh am wui hihim k hab kaij, “Bo kaij g t-nawoj, ‘Pi ani am hu hugkam d ha'ichu maps am wo i wah ni-kih ed
o manis hejel am wo hih m-wui. Am apt hab wabsh wo chea. T wo thoa g ni-pionag.

S-amichuth ani g m-gewkthag no pi g ni-ge'ejig gewkthag am ni-thahm. Ni ahni hab wa'ap gewkthag am ha thahm g ni-shonthalig ch ni-pionag. T hab wo juh mant haschu ab wo i ha chea. Ni heg hekaj s-mahch mat am hab wo e juh mapt haschu am hab wabsh wo i chei.’ Neh, bo kaij.”

Tsh g Jesus ab si has i el ab kaiok ihtha. Sh mu'i hemajkam an oithahim. Kush ab ha wui hab kaij, “Pi ani koi hebai sha'i neith mas hema ha'as ge'e ab si ni-hiwig, chum hems am ha shahgith g Tutuligo,” k am hahawa ha chea hegam mat ab thatha mat g m hu uhpam wo hihi.
Tsh am uhpam thatha k chum nei. Kutsh thoa g piongaj g shonthal ha-ge'ejig.
Kush am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh gm hu hihi hegam Jesus heg wui kihhim mash d Nain. Kutsh mu'i hemajkam ha oi.

Tsh am wabsh i chum thatha mo ab kihjeg g kolhai an wehgaj g kihhim. Sh ab g muhki e u'a. Sh g je'ej g muhki d hejel wi'ikam. K ith d si hemako madaj. Kush mu'i ha wehmaj g hemajkam ab kihhim t amjed.
Kutsh am i nei g Jesus ihtha uwi k si pi ap e taht wehhejed k hab wabsh kaij ab wui, “Pi g am shoakath,”
k ch amjed am him k an taht hegai mo an ab wo'ichug g muhki. Tsh ha hekaj gegokiwua hegam mo u'a. Kush hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Wechij o'othham, ab g i wamigi.”
Tsh am ha hekaj i thahiwua ihtha o'othham k ab ha hekaj wabsh neok. Tsh g Jesus am wamgith k hab ah mat gm hu wo i oi g e-je'e.

Kutsh wehsijj si e totothsith k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Ia atki hema jiwia t-shahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam,” ch ha'i hab ep kaij, “Jiosh atki ia jiwia t-shahgith mat wo t-tho'ibia mattp hedai d hemajkamgaj.”
Kutsh ihtha mat haschu has e juh an wehsko e a'aga Judea chekshani oithk ch an wehgaj.
Sh eda gd hu e kuhpach hegai John mash am ha pahl wapkonahim g hemajkam. Kush am ahgith hegam mash ab si wecho e mashchamahim mash haschu has junihim g Jesus. Tsh heg gohk ab i ha waith
k am ha cheha mat am wo hihim k ab wo kakke g Jesus mas wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha aha nat ab hahawa hema wo i wuhsh mat d wo hegaik?
Tsh ihtham am thatha Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ab o t-chehani g John matt ab wo m-kakke maps woho d Jiosh si Kehsha aha nat ab hahawa hema wo i wuhsh mat d wo hegaik?”
Tsh g Jesus heg i tashkaj mu'i ha thothaj g kok'otham k mu'i ha wuwhas g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch k ha-nench g pi neneatham. Kush heg wehs neith ihtham John chuhchai.

Sh hab hahawa ha ahg g Jesus, “Am g uhpam wo hihim k wo ahgi g John mam haschu i neith ch haschu i kah. Ha ani thothajith g pi ha thothajitham kok'otham ch pi neneatham ch pi hihimithkam ch pi chechkaithkam ch ha chechegitoichuth g ko'i ch am ha ahgith g sho'igkam mat g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia.
T g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath mamtp hedai ab wabsh wo ni-hiwgath ch pi wo ni-thagito.”

Tsh am i gm hu hihi hegam John chuhchai. Sh g Jesus am ha'ichu ha ahgith g hemajkam ab amjed g John ch hab kaij, “Neh, am amt wa hihim k ab kaiha g John. K wa eda am oimmelhim pi apkokam jewed ch ed. Kumt pi woho am hu wo i wuwha wui matp d wabsh s-pehegi o'othham ch am gawul wo wuath g e-ne'oki. Pi o an a'ai e wanchkwua g John.
Kumt pi hema s-neitham mo s-kakaisim e enigadathch. Hegam mo hab masma e enigadathch o si s-kakaisim kih.
Neh, heg amt s-kaim Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam k heg wa woho kah. K g John am ba'ich ha'ichu k ed ep kehk

no pi d hegai mo ab amjed an o'ohanas mo g Jiosh hab ahg ch hab kaij: Am ant hema wo i maskogi mat am wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam am wehhejed g si ni-Kehsha jiwhiathag am jewed thahm. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.

“Kunt wo em-ahgi mo g John wehs hemajkam ha ba'ich d i si ha'ichu am hugkam mat am i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig ith thahm jewed. T hahawa chum hems g si pi ha'ichukam hemajkam am Jiosh kownaltalig ed ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk mo hegai John.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus. Kutsh wehs ab kaiha hegam mat ab s-wohog el g Jiosh k am e pahl wapko ab John wecho, chum hems hegam mo g lial ha kowlant g kownal wehhejed.
Tsh wabshaba pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh tatchui pi e pahl wapkonk hegam mo d Palasi ch hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham.
Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus, “Bo masma pi ta wepoma mo g a'al hegam mat pi ab hu wohog el g John k pi ab hu ni-bei.
Neh, tp hems am wo chichwith g a'al ch hab wo chei, ‘Am att em-gehgeth g e hohontam ha-piastakaj. Kumt pi e waila. Am att nei g muhki ne'i. Kumt pi sha'i shoshani.’
“Ith ani hab ahg mat g John ab i wuhshani k pi ih'e g nawait ch mu'ikko pi e gegosith ab e ho'ige'ithahunch Jiosh wui. K mu'ijj hab kaij mo g jiawul an u'ukch g chegitoithaj.

Nt ahni ia jiwia Jiosh si Kehsha k wabsh chum hedai ha wehm ni-gegosith. K mu'ijj hab kaij mani s-banma ch s-i'ithag ch d ha-nawoj g s-ta keke'ithamakam lial ha kowlanttham ch hegam mo pi ap oith g t-shohshon ha-chehanig. Neh, bo masma pi ta wepoma
ch im hu hab wabsh i juh g Jiosh amichuthadag. K wabshaba hegam mo ab s-wohochuth am chehgithch mo d wohokam.”
Tsh hema g Palasi ab i wai g Jesus mat am wo wehmaj e gegos. Tsh am hih g Jesus kihj wui k am i thahiwua mat wo e gegos.
Kush eda am hema d uwi heg eda kihhim ch si pi ap d hemajkam. Sh am thak ch e gegosith g Jesus.

Tsh ith am jiwia k am wehgaj i kekiwua am u'athch g s-ap uhw shuhthagi al s-toa hothai ha'a ch ed. Sh eda am e shelinch g Jesus mo hab masma thadhaiwup ch e gegosith. K si shoak ihtha uwi. Kush g oh'ogaj an iawua tahtadaj an. Kutsh an i thagio g che'echew e-mo'okaj k an si ha chintath k an hahawa iawua ga s-ap uhw shuhthagi tahtadaj ab.
Kush hab wabsh hejel e ahg hegai kihkam, “T wo chum s-mahchk mo si pi ap d uwi ihtha matp woho d wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk ch pi wo hiwigi mas an wo taht.”
Sh g Jesus wabsh s-mahch mo hab masma oithahim ch ab wui hab kaij, “Simon, ab ant wo ha'ichu m-ahgi.” Sh heg hab kaij, “Oi g ab ni-ahgith, ha mashchamtham.”
Kutsh g Jesus am ahgi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha e-ahga k hab kaij, “Matp hema ab wo e wulshch g hetasp siant pihsh heg ab mo g lial ha hiwgith ch hema ab ab wo e wulshch g hetaspo wehst-mahm pihsh
k pi wo e nako mat wo uhpam namkith. Kut im hu hab wo i juh g ha-wulshpadag. Neh, t hedai ihtham ba'ich ab wo i si tatchua?”
Sh hab kaij g Simon, “Na'as hegai mamt ba'ich i mu'i im hu hab i juh g wulshpadaj.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih,
ab g neith ihtha uwi. Ia ant jiwia m-kih am. Kupt pi ni-mah g shuhthagi mant wo i wapko g ni-tahtad. T wabshaba ihtha am i wapko g ni-tahtad g e-oh'ogkaj k am i ha thagio g che'echew e-mo'okaj.
Pi apt ab hu ni-chintath mant ia jiwia. K wabshaba ith g ni-tahtad chintath.
Pi apt ab hu i huhu g ni-mo'o. T wabshaba ith g uhw shuhthagi an iawua ni-tahtad an.

Neh, nt hab wo chei mat am ge'e chehgi mo ab si ni-tatchua. T heg am wohokamch mat g mu'i pi ap chu'ichigaj im hu hab i e juh. Hegai mam hedai pi sha'i ge'e im hu hab i wua g ha-chu'ichig o pi sha'i ge'e am hu chehgith g e-tatchuithag.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus heg wui uwi, “Im ant hu hab i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.”
K hegam ha'i mo ab thadha mihsa wui hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “K hedai e elith ihtha ch im hu hab i chum wua g pi ap ha-chu'ichig?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ith wui uwi, “Ab ap ni-hiwig ch hekaj e tho'ibia. Gamai g s-ap e tahtk hihm.”
Sh amjed am hu hebai, tsh g Jesus am hih ha oithk g kihhim k am ahgahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig. Kush hegam gamai gohk chuhchaij am wehmaj.
Kutsh mu'i am ha oi g u'uwi. Ihtham atsh wa ha thothaj g Jesus. Kush am ha'ichukaj i ha wehmt. Hema ihtham ash d Mary Magdalene. Ith atsh g Jesus ab amjed i ha wuwhas g wewa'ak jijawul.
Kush hema d Joanna. Sh g wehmaj kihkam ihtha hab chehgig Chusa ch d ha'ichu am kownal wecho. Kush hema ehp d Susanna. Tsh ihtham u'uwi wo em-nolawt hegai mash haschu i tatchua hegam Jesus.
Kutsh mu'i hemajkam ab hihi Jesus wui ga hu a'ai kihhim amjed. Tsh am ha ahgi g Jesus ihtha wepogitha ahga:
“Nt wo ha'ichu em-mashcha ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig wepogithch mat hema an ei g ha'ichu e-kaichka e-oithag ed. T ha'i gn hu wabsh shul wohg ch ed. T g hemajkam am keish k g u'uwhig am huh.
T ha'i gn hu shul mo pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. T ab i chum wuhsh g e'es k wabsh gaksh no pi pi wadag amai.
T ha'i gn hu shul g kaichkaj sha'i ch ed. T heg am wabsh wehnathk i ge'ege k ha koktha g esha.
T wabshaba hegam mat an s-ap shul moihuna ch ed an wuhshani k siant ab kait hehemako.” Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, am g wo i a'amichuth ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
Kush g Jesus chuhchai ab kakke mas has d ahga ihtha wepogitha ahga.

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo em-ahgi mo has d ahga no pi g Jiosh em-hiwgith mamt wo s-mai hegai mo haschu hemu am maskogith ab amjed g e-kownaltalig. Ni wabshaba heg wa'i ha ahgith ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuthamk. T hab pi wo amich ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as wo ha'ichu neith k wo ha'ichu kah.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, nt wo em-tashogi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ni-ahga. Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o wepogithas mo g ha'ichu kai ch am wo e gantad hemajkam ha-i'ibthag ed.
K eda ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-kawpk hab masma mo g wohg. K g Jiawul am wabsh s-pehegi ha wohppo'ith hegai mo haschu i kah. T hab pi ab hu wo wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k pi wo e tho'ibia.

“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai pi ge'ej g jewed ab waw t ab. T ihtham wo si s-hohho'i g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab kaiok k wabshaba pi wihnam ab hu wo bebhe k ch ab hi wa al he'es wo s-wohochuthath. T ab wabsh wo i chum hih g a'appema. T ha hekaj wabsh wo ta'i i shul.
“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag hab sha masma mo hebai s-sha'ig no pi e sha'ijithch heg hekaj kudutadag ch s-kaisthag ch s-tahhathkam. Kut pi ha'ichu hab wo juh am Jiosh wehhejed.
“K ha'i g ha-i'ibthag s-moik hab masma mo g moihuna. Kut ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo si i nuhkuth e-ihbthag ed k am wo e nako mat am hab ha'ichu wo juh Jiosh wehhejed.
“Wohokam o wepogithas mo g lahmpa tonlig. Namt hig wo ehsto g lahmpa ab mehithk aha namt an wo thai mat hebai wo em-tonlithch. Pegih, mt hab wa masma pi wo chum ehsto g wohokam.
Wehs at wo s-e mai matp haschu chum e ehstokch. T haschu wo i chum e ma'ishchith wo e chehg k am wo i e wuhshath.
“Am g wo s-amichuth mam haschu i kah. Hegam mat s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag at ba'ich ep wo i nei. T wabshaba hegam mat pi ap wo hekaj wabsh wo heb hu wua.”
Tsh am chum thatha g Jesus je'e ch wepngaj. Sh wabshaba si mu'ij g hemajkam an wehgaj. Kutsh pi e nako matsh ab wo miabi.
Sh hema hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “M-je'e ch m-wepnag o am gegok jeg ed s-m-neithamkch.”
Sh hab ahg g Jesus, “Neh, ihtham mo ab ni-kaiham ch ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o heg wa wepo mo d ni-je'e ch ni-wepnag.”
Sh am hu hebai hab ha ahg g Jesus g e-chuhchai, “Am att hu hig shuhthagi aigojed wo i chehchsh.” Tsh wa woho am thadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k am gahi i shul.

Sh am hebai him g wahlko shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh g Jesus am i wo'iwua k koi. Kutsh g hewel ab haha wabsh i meh. Tsh ab i to'otonkai g shuhthagi k am iawua wahlko ch ed mash s-ta ehbitham hab mahs ha wehhejed.

Kutsh g chuhchaij am wui thatha g Jesus k am wuhan k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, ttki wo t-ko'ij.” Tsh am i wami g Jesus k ab si cheha g hewel ch shuhthagi to'otonk. Tsh am i wehs ha'asa k gm hu wabsh i pi shahmuni.

Sh hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Ab g wabsh wo ni-hiwgath.” Kutsh eda si has i elith k si s-ehbeni k ash hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Kus hedai wud ihtha o'othham ch ab si chehani g hewel ch to'otonk mat wo ha'asa. K ab s-wohog elith.”
Tsh am hihim k gm hu thatha ga hu aigojed g Galilee shuhthagi heg maibithch kihhim mash d Geresa.
Kush am hema oimmed g cheoj jeg ed ch am chum kih heg eda kihhim. Sh wabshaba g jijawul an u'ukch g chegitoithaj. Kush gn hu wabsh kih mash an chehchog ch an e hihashp g ko'i. Kutsh ab i hud g Jesus.

Tsh ith am chehg k si s-kaitham hihnk ch ab i meh pi ha'ichu enigadathch mash hab wa chu'ig k ab wui i gehsh k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Jesus, alithaj g si uhgk Jiosh, gam g hu hihm k pi ko'okam has ni-juhni.”

Bash kaij nash pi g Jesus ab si ha chehani g jijawul mat ab wo i wuwha amjed. Kush wa eda g jijawul mu'ikko an bebhe ihtha. Kumsh gd hu chum si kukpathch ch g kakhioj ch nohnhoij g e hukshchim wapainomikaj gn hu si wupulshp. Kush wabsh ha wanikumiak g e hukshchim wapainomi. Tsh g jiawul gm hu wo i wushshath tohono jewed ch ed.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Shahp chehgig?” Sh hab kaij, “Bani chehgig Mu'ichu,” nash pi mu'i jijawul an u'ukch.
Tsh g jijawul ab si e sho'igch Jesus wui matsh pi am hu wo ha shul Jiawul kih ed.
Sh eda mu'i an oiopo g kokji kawulk bahsho ch e gegosith. Sh ihtham jijawul ab si tahni g Jesus matsh am wo ha thagito. Tsh am wo i wahp ha eda ihtham kokji. Tsh am ha hiwigi g Jesus.
Tsh ab i wuwha ab amjed g o'othham k am i wahp ha eda g kokji. Kutsh wehsijj ihtham kokji am agshp i wohp k gm hu shul shuhthagi ch ed k wachkk.
Tsh hegam mo am ha nuhkuth gm hu uhpam wohp k am ahgahim ihtha kihhim ch ed ch an ha oithk hegam mo an o'oithag.
Tsh g hemajkam am himto mat wo nei mat haschu has e juh. Kush ihtha o'othham am thaha Jesus wui ch ab e enigadathch ch wabsh si s-ap ha'ichu chegito. Kutsh wabsh woho'i e totoths.
Kush hegam mash neith am ha ahgith mat has masma e thoaj ihtha o'othham.
Kush wehsijj ihtham Geresa t am hemajkam ab ahgith g Jesus mat gm hu wo hih ab ha amjed natsh pi sha'i si s-ehbeni. Tsh wa woho hab e juh k an thahiwua wahlko ch ed mat gm hu wo hih.
Kutsh hegai o'othham matsh ab i wuwha g jijawul amjed ab si e sho'igch Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Nt wo m-oi.” K wabshaba g Jesus hab ahg,
“Uhpam g hihm k am wo i ha ahgithahi mat haschu hab juh g Jiosh m-wehhejed.” Tsh wa woho hab e juh k am i ahgahi kihhim oithk matsh haschu si ge'e hab juh g Jesus am wehhejed.
Tsh ga hu aigojed hahawa ep thatha hegam Jesus. Kush mu'i hemajkam am nenida ch si s-ap i e taht k ab i nei.

Tsh am hema jiwia g o'othham k hab chehgig Jairus ch wabsh d ha'ichu am cheopi ch ed. Sh ith chehiaga muhkhim ch d gamai gohk a'ahithag. Kutsh ab wecho si i gei g Jesus k ab ahgith matsh gm hu wo oi kihj wui. Tsh gm hu chum wehmaj hih g Jesus. Tsh g hemajkam am wabsh kawod him k gn hu wabsh i biha.
Kush eda am hema ha'ichug g uwi ch gamai gohk a'ahithag mumku heg hekaj mo g eh'edaj jegwoni. Tsh pi hedai e nako mas wo thoaj, chum as wehs hugio g e-lialiga ha namkithch g mamakai.
Kutsh ab i hih Jesus wehgaj k an taht g kahbaj hugithag. Kutsh am wabsh si ha'asa g eh'ed jegwoni.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thoht an ni-taht.” Tsh pi hedai am hu e ah. Sh hab hahawa kaij g Peter, “T-mashchamtham, an o m-bihagch g hemajkam ch ab m-shodbinch.”
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab at hema ni-taht. Ni s-mahch nat pi ab i wuhsh g gewkthag ab ni-amjed.”
Tsh am i nei hegai uwi mamt s-mai k ab hahawa i him k si gigiwek ch ab i gei Jesus wecho amai hemajkam ha tahgio k ash am ahgith g Jesus mat haschu ahgk ab taht k has masma ha hekaj thoa.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pegih, ni-uwiga, am apt wa thoa napt pi ab i ni-hiw. Gamai g s-ap e tahtk hihm k am wabsh s-thoakath.”
Kush hab wabsh kia kaij ihtha g Jesus. Tsh ab hema mel ab kihj amjed g Jairus k ash hab kaij, “Muh at g m-chehiaga. Kupt pi am hu ep wo kudu g ha mashchamtham.”
Kutsh kah g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui g Jairus, “Pi g am sha'i e tothsith. Ab g wabsh i ni-hiwig. Kut wabsh wo e chegito.”
Kutsh gd hu thatha kihj am. Tsh hegam wa'i ha ui g Jesus Peter ch James ch John ch hegam jehjij g chehia. Tsh am e wehm i wahp.
Kush eda wehsijj shoani ch pi ap e tahtk wehhejed g chehia. Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am wo shoanith. Heg o wa wepo ni-wehhejed mo wabsh kohsh g chehia.”
Kush wabsh has ahg hegam nash pi si s-mahch mat muh.
Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab bei nowij ab k ab si neok wui ch hab kaij, “I wamigi, chehia.”
Kutsh uhpam e chegito k ha hekaj i wami. Sh g Jesus am ha chehani mat wo ha'ichu mah. T wo huh.
Tsh hegam jehjij am wabsh e totoths matsh e chegito. Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith mat pi hedai wo ha ahgi mat haschu has e juh.
Am hu hebai, tsh am i ha wai g Jesus g e-chuhchai. Tsh am wui i e hemapai. Kutsh ab ha mah g gewkthag mat gm hu wo i ha wuwhas g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch k wo ha thothaj g kok'otham
k am hahawa ha cheha mat am wo i ahgahi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Pi atsh koi hihi, sh hab ha ahg, “Gm amt wabsh wo i hihim k pi ha'ichu wo u'uk, chum hems pi g cheowikud nih g limoshan kostal nih g ha'ichu hugi nih g lial nih chum hems hema ep lihwa.
Am amt wo thadkkath heg kih am mat hedai i si s-ap ab wo i em-nei am hugkam mamt hekith wo i hihi ab amjed hegai kihhim.
Kutp hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei g hemajkam, mt am wo thagito hegai kihhim k ab wo si shahmuth g e-shuhshk mamt wo ha chehgi mamt wo ha thagito k pi wo ha ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh.”
Tsh wa woho am hihi ihtham chuhchaij ha oithk g kihhim k am ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha thoajith g hemajkam wehsko.

Sh eda g Herod am wabsh kia d kownal Galilee ch ed ch am i kah wehs ihtha mash haschu has e wua. Am amsh wehsko a'aga mas hedai wud ihtha Jesus. Ha'ijj ash hab kaij, “Thoki hegai Johnbad mo wa ha pahl wapkonahim. Heg amt mua. Kutki wabshaba uhpam e chegito.”
Kush ha'ijj hab kaij, “Thoki Elijabad o hema ep hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.” Kutsh wa g Herod am i pi e amichuth
k hab kaij, “Am ant wa ha cheha mat an e hikuch g John mo'o. Kus hedai wud ihtha o'othham mani mu'i ha'ichu kah ab amjed?” bash kaij ch wabsh am chum i e nakog mat wo nei g Jesus.

Tsh am hu hebai am i uhpam thatha g Jesus chuhchai k am ahgith g Jesus wehs ha'ichu mat haschu has i juh. Tsh gm hu hahawa i ha ui matsh gm hu hejelko hasko hihi maibithch hegai kihhim mo hab chehgig Bethsaida.
Tsh am i kah g hemajkam k am i ha oi s-neithamk g Jesus. Tsh g Jesus si s-ap ab i ha neith k am ha ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig k ha thothaj g kok'otham.

Kutsh gm hu i juh. Tsh g chuhchaij am thatha wui k hab kaij, “Am g ha chehani g hemajkam mat am wo hihi kihhim wui o am hasko o'oithag wui k wo bei g ha'ichu hugi k an hasko wo kohk heg hekaj mo ia hu wabsh si heb hu iia.”

Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim amt wo ha'ichu ha mah mat wo huh.” Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Heg ach wa'i hetasp pahn ch gohk waptopi edgith. Aha nap tatchua matt am wo hihim k wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi ha wehhejed ihtham mu'i hemajkam?”
Kush eda sha'i mu'ij g hemajkam mash hetasp mihl d chechoj. Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Hab g wo ha ahgith g hemajkam mat wo thadhaiwua hehetaspo wepst-mahm e wehm.”
Tsh wa woho hab e juh g chuhchaij. Kutsh wehsijj am i thadhaiwua.
Tsh g Jesus am ha ui hegam hetasp pahn ch gohk waptopi k ab i nea thahm kahchim wui k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am hahawa hahain k ab ha mah g e-chuhchai. Tsh ihtham ab i ha mahkhi g hemajkam.
Tsh wehsijj e gegosith k kokwoth. Tsh g chuhchaij an i u'ihi g ha wihpi'ithag g hemajkam ahim matsh wo shuhshuth g gamai gohk hoha.
Sh am hu hebai am hejelko e ho'ige'ithahun g Jesus. Tsh am wui thatha g chuhchaij. Kutsh am ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Thoh'o ni-elith g hemajkam?”

Sh hab kaij hegam, “Ha'ijj o hab kaij map d ha-wapkontham, Johnbad. K ha'ijj hab kaij map d Elijabad. K ha'ijj hab ep kaij map d hema ehp hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch ia uhpam e chegito.”
