Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Kum ahpim hedai ni-elith?” Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Bach m-elith map d Jiosh si Kehsha!”
Sh hab kaij, “Thani ahni. Kumt wabshaba pi hedai wo sha'i ahgi hemu mani hedai wud.

Wehpeg at hemho wo wa ni-bei g ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig em-mashchamtham ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k mu'i wo ni-sho'igchuth k am wo i ni-thagito mant wo ni-muhkith. Nt wabshaba uhpam wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed heg eda waik tash amjed mamt wo ni-mua.”

Sh hab hahawa ep kaij ab wehsijj ha wui, “Mamtp am wo s-oitham g ni-himthag k hemho wa gm hu wo thagito g hejel e-tatchui k ahni ni-tatchui hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed e sho'igchuthch. Heg at wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
Pi amt wo heki wua g e-thoakag mamtp wo hekaj am ni-wehhejed. Heg at wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp hedai wo chum s-tha'ath.
“Pi at ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk matp g o'othham wehs wo bei hegai mo haschu i tatchua ith thahm jewed k wabshaba pi wo e tho'ibia.

Pi g am wo si e elithath ni-hekaj ahni Jiosh si Kehsha ch hekaj g ni-mashchamadag. Nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo si ni-elithath em-hekaj mant hekith ia ep wo jiwia. Ithani at si s-tondam ab wo e chehgi g ni-gewkthag ch ni-ohg gewkthag ch ha-gewkthag g s-ap'ekam anghil.
Neh, ia am ha'i ha'ichug mamt ho'ip kia nei g Jiosh kownaltalig k haha wo ko'ok. Am g wo s-chegitok mani ith am em-ahgith.”

Sh am hu d i hemako thomig amjed mash hab kaij ihtha. Kutsh g Jesus gn hu wo e ho'ige'ithahu uhgk tho'ag t ab k ab i ha wai hegam Peter ch John ch James matsh gn hu wehmaj wo i chehchsh. Kutsh gn hu thatha heg thahm tho'ag.
Tsh am i e ho'ige'ithahu g Jesus k atsh am gawul i e juh. Tsh g wehschugaj hab e juh mash si s-tondam s-tohta.
Tsh haha wabsh am wehmaj i e chehgi g Mosesbad ch Elijabad.

Kush g Jiosh gewkthag ab ha ab e chehgith hab masma mo g tonlig. Sh ihtham am wehmaj a'aga g Jesus matsh pi sha'i tash amjed am hab wo e juh hegai matsh haschu g Jiosh am ap'ech matsh wo muh am Jerusalem t am.
Sh eda hegam Peter sha'i si gewpkog ch s-kohksim ch wabshaba ab si i nehnea k nei g Jesus ch hegam gohk o'othham mash am wehmaj gegok.

Tsh gm hu wo hihi hegam gohk. Tsh g Peter wabsh kohsh k tha'iwuni k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, s-ap'e oki mach ia ha'ichug. Tt ia waik hab wo em-juni g al chechopi matt hekaj ab wo si has em-el ahpi ch Mosesbad ch Elijabad.”
Tsh g chewagi ab i wuhsh mash eda wabsh kia neok g Peter k ab ehka ha thahm. Kutsh si s-ehbeni hegam Peter matsh ab i hud g chewagi.
Tsh g Jiosh ne'oki ab kaitha chewagi t amjed k hab kaij, “Jesus o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag. Heg amt ab wo si kaihamath.”
Sh am hahawa hejel kehk g Jesus. Kush pi am hu ha'ichug hegam gohk. Sh hegam Peter pi hedai sha'i ha'ichu ahgith ia'i ithani hegai mash haschu i neith.
Sh am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh ab hahawa i huhud tho'ag t amjed. Kush sha'i mu'i hemajkam am nenida g Jesus ch ab nam.
Kush hema si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham, ith o d wa'i ni-alithag m ia kehk.
K g jiawul an bebhe ch am si hihnk ch am i wuhpa jewedo. K g totshagi i chechshshaj chinij ab. S-ko'okam o has wua g jiawul ch chum alo pi thathagitosh.
Kuni ab wa chum si ha ahgith g m-pionag mat gm hu hab wo i juh. T wabshaba pi e nako.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Sho'o wa'i pi ge'ej g em-wohochuthadag. M im hu hab wabsh i si e juhkch ab ni-amjed. Shahag wepo mant hemho wa tash ia wo em-wehmajkath ch ab wo em-nakogath mat hekaj wo i ge'etha.” Bash kaij ch am hahawa ahgi hegai o'othham, “Ab g i beka'i g e-alithag.”
Sh ab chum him g ali. Sh haha wabsh ep i wua hegai jiawul am jewedo. Kush am si banimmed. Tsh g Jesus ab si s-keh'el g jiawul k i wuhshath k am hahawa bei g al k ab i wanim ohgaj wui.
Kutsh wehsijj si e totoths g hemajkam mat g Jiosh hab masma am i chehgi g e-gewkthag k ab si has elith wehs hegai mo g Jesus hab junihim. Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui g e-chuhchai,
“Am g wo s-chegitok ihtha mant am wo em-ahgi. E o aihim mat g s-ni-keh'iththam an wo ni-bei ahni Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo ni-gagda ha wui g haha'ichu.”
Kush pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg ch wabshaba s-ehbith mas ab wo kakke.
Sh am hu hebai am e ne'owin hegam Jesus chuhchai mas hedai d wo si ha'ichuk.
Kush g Jesus s-ha amichuth mo haschu am chegito ch heg hekaj g al ali ab i kei e-hugith an

k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Hegai mat hedai am ni-wehhejed s-ap ab wo neithath g al ali ch hab wa'ap s-ap ab ni-neith. Kutp hedai s-ap ab wo ni-neithath ch hab wa'ap s-ap ab neith g Jiosh nani pi d Kehshaj. Hegai mo hedai i si pi e ha'ichuchuth am em-shahgith o d si ha'ichu.”

Sh am hu hebai g John hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, hema ach neith g o'othham. K heg am m-chehcheg ch gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch. Kuch hab ahg mat wo ha'asa no pi pi am hu t-wehmaj.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi g am wo sha'i shohbith. Tki wo i em-wehmt hegai matp hedai pi ab hu em-wui kehk.”
Kush s-mahch g Jesus mo e aihim mat g Jiosh am wo uhpam i bei e-kihthag wui ch heg hekaj am i e shelch mat am wo hih Jerusalem wui k am wo i e nako.
Sh am hihimath ch am hema miabith g kihhim Samaria chekshani ch ed. Kutsh g Jesus am ha'i ha cheha g e-chuhchai matsh ha ba'ich wo hihim k wo bei g koksikud ch ha'ichu hugi. Kutsh ihtham ha e juh.
Tsh wabshaba am i s-mai hegam hemajkam mash d gm hu himtham g Jesus Jerusalem wui k heg hekaj pi hohho'i mat am wo jiwia nash pi pi ha hohho'ith g Jerusalem t am hemajkam.
Kutsh hekith g James ch John am i s-mai mo pi hohho'ith k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, nap tatchua matt ab wo i tai g Jiosh. T ab wo i huduni g mei k wo ha koktha?”
Sh g Jesus si s-gewkam ha shohbith.
Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hihi hema ep kihhim wui.
Sh am hu hebai hihim. Kush hema g o'othham hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Ni-nahtokch ani ahni mant wo i m-oith k wo i m-wehmt.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt hig wo e nako? Neh, chum o hems g gagso ge wahpagga ch g u'uwhig ge koksh. Ni wabshaba ahni Jiosh si Kehsha pi sha'i ha kih ia jewed thahm. K heg hekaj s-hasig maps wo ni-oithath.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab hema wui g o'othham, “Oi g ni-oith.” Kush wabshaba hab kaij, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig. T ho'ipki hekith muh g ni-ohg. Nt wo hiashpok haha wo m-oi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g ha hiwgith hegam mo pi u'ukch g wechij thoakag mat wo ha hiash g ko'i. Pt ahpi hi am wo him k wo i ahgahi ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
Sh hema hab ep kaij g o'othham, “Ni-kownalig, am ant wo i m-oith k wabshaba wehpeg wo hih uhpam k an wehs wo i ha neithok g ni-hajuni.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, nat hig shelinim wo moihunath hegai mat hedai am uhpam wo nea amai mo hebaijed him? Pegih, t hab wa masma pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk am Jiosh kownaltalig ed hegai mat am uhpam wo nea.”
Tsh amjed g Jesus am ha'i ep i ha chuhcha wewa'akko gamai gohk matsh go'ogok e wehm wo ahgahi g ha'ichu ahgaj am ha oithch hegam kihhim matsh hebai ap'ech matsh am epai wo hih.

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, mu'ij o hegam mo e nahtokch mat wo e tho'ibia. Kuch eda pi mu'ij ahchim mach am ha ahgithahim g tho'ibiathag ahga. Ith o heg wa wepo mat hebai g ha-hihka wo si ge'ejk. T g ha-pionag pi wo mu'ijk. Ab g wo si tahnith g Jiosh mat mu'i wo i ha chuhcha mat am wo ha ahgithahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ch ab wo i ha ba'ihamath hegam mo e nahtokch.
“Neh, bat masma wo s-ta ehbithamak g hemajkam am em-wehhejed mat g shesh'e am ha wehhejed g kahwal mahmad.

Mt wabshaba pi ha'ichukaj wo e kudut k pi ha'ichu wo u'ath nih g ha'ichu eniga nih chum hems g lial. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh g hemajkam mat wo em-thagio'i. Am amt wo s-e hohtmagi kihhim wui k pi hedai wo hiwigi mas wo em-shohbi wohg ch ed.
“Kumt hebai wo thatha ha-kih am k am hab wo chei, ‘Jiosh o ab em-makiog g s-ap tahhathkam.’

Kut s-ap ab wo i em-nei matp ab wo s-em-wohoch k ab wo i em-wahpki mamt am wo thadkkath. Kumt pi has wo elith k am wo thadkkath ch wo e gegosithath ch an wo i ha ahgithahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh am hugkam mamt gm hu wo hihi ab amjed hegai kihhim. Chikpantham o ab d wuikam mat ab wo bei g e-nam-kithadag. K ihtham d ha wuikam mat am hab wo juh. Pi amt inhas wo wahpkith k am wo thadkkath am hugkam mamt ep wo ba'ich hihi.
Kut hebai g hemajkam s-ap ab wo i em-nei kihhim ch ed, mt wo huh mat haschu wo i em-gegos
k wo ha thoaj g kok'otham k wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat ab i ha miabi g Jiosh kownaltalig.
“Kut hebai pi ap ab hu wo i em-nei g hemajkam, mt am wo i wuwha kahya ch ed
k ab wo si i shahmuth g e-shuhshk k hab wo chei, ‘Ith att hekaj am wo em-chehgi matt wo em-thagito. Mt wabshaba wo s-chegitok mat ab i chum em-miabi g Jiosh kownaltalig.’

Neh, hegam si pi ap'ekam hemajkam mash wa am kihkahim Sodom kihhim ch ed at wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mat hekith wo e ai g ge'e lothaita tash. T wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-ko'okam e namkith hegam mat pi ab hu wo em-kaiha.

“Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu ant am hab juh Korasin ch Bethsaida kihhim ch ed. Kutki eda g hemajkam amai pi ab hu ni-wohoch. T heg hekaj ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag ge'e lothaita tash ch ed. Hegam mo am kih Tyre ch Sidon kihhim t am ch pi ge'e mahch ab amjed g Jiosh at pi am hu hugkam wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Tp hems ab wo i e sho'igchuth k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi matp wo nei ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu.
Capernaum t am hemajkam o ab si e haschuth. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha shul jiawul kih ed.”

Sh hab ep kaij ab e-chuhchai ha wui, “Heg o wa wepo mo ahni ab ni-kaiham hegai matp hedai ab wo em-kaiha. Kut ahni s-ni-ohhoth matp hedai wo s-em-ohhoth. Kutp hedai wo s-ni-ohhoth k hab wa'ap s-ohhoth g Jiosh nani pi d kehshaj.”

Tsh woho gm hu hihi hegam wewa'akko gamai gohk. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Tsh am i uhpam thatha k sha'i si s-hehgig ch hab kaij, “T-kownalig, chum hems g jijawul ab s-t-wohog elith mach am m-chechcheg ch ab si ha chehani mat gm hu hab wo i e juh.”
“Heu'u, nat pi hegai mo d ha-ge'ejig ch d Satan heb hu wua g e-gewkthag,” bash kaij g Jesus. “Neith ani mat ab i gei Jiosh kihthag amjed hab sha masma mat g wepgi.
Neh, ab ant em-mah g gewkthag mamt wo e nako mamt am wabsh wo ha keish g kohk'oi ch nanakshel ch wehs g gewkthag g ge Jiawul. Kut pi wo sha'i s-ko'okam em-juh.
Mt wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo s-hehgigk mo g jijawul ab s-em-wohog elith. Heg amt hekaj wo s-hehgigk mo gn hu o'ohanas g em-chechgig Jiosh kihthag an mam d e tho'ibiakam.”

Kutsh ia'i ithani g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab mah g Jesus g si ge'e s-hehgig. Kush am e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab kaij, “Ni-ohg Jiosh, thap kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. K hab d m-elitha mat pi hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo s-amich g ha'ichu m-ahga. E o ehstokch ab ha amjed g s-chu a'amichuththam. Kup wabshaba am ha chehgith ihtham mo ha'ichu s-mahchimk hab masma mo g a'al. Ni heg hekaj ab si m-ho'ige'ith.”

Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith g hemajkam, “Ni-ohg Jiosh at ab ni-mah wehs ha'ichu. Pi o hedai ni-mahch ch hegai wa'i ni-ohg s-ni-mahch. K pi hedai mahch g ni-ohg. Ni ahni wa'i s-mahch ch hegam ehp mani hedai i wui tashogith.”
Tsh am hahawa i e hejelko hegam Jesus. Kush hab ha ahg, “Tho si s-ap tahhathkam mam am neith ch kah ihtha mam haschu i neith ch kah.
Mu'ijj g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch kokownalbad o wa chum s-neithamk hegai mam haschu i neith ch chum s-kaimk mam haschu i kah.”
Tsh am hu hebai am hema jiwia g chehanig ha mashchamtham k wabsh chum heki s-himchutham g Jesus hab kaijch, “Ha mashchamtham, shahnt wo ni-juh. T hekaj ab wo i ni-wahki g Jiosh e-kihthag ed?”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Nap hig pi mahch mo has chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed heg amjed.”

Sh hab kaij hegai o'othham, “Heu'u. Bo chu'ig: Matt hemho wa ab wo si pihk t-elithath t-kownalig Jiosh wui wehs t-ihbthagkaj ch ith am wo chehgithch wehs t-thoakagkaj ch wehs t-gewkthagkaj ch wehs t-chegitoithagkaj. K hab ep chu'ig: Matt hemho wa ab wo si pihk t-elithath t-nawoj wui hab masma mach has i masma hejel t-wehhejed si pihk t-elith.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Heg o wud. Kut s-ap ab wo i m-wahki maptp heg am hab wo junihith.”
Kush ihtha o'othham s-mahch mo pi am hu hab junihim hegai chehanig ch wabshaba gm hu wabsh chum s-e oanamk ch ash ab kakke g Jesus, “K hedai d ni-nawoj?”

Sh g Jesus am ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, “Neh, matp hems am hema hih g t-wehm Tuhligo Jerusalem t amjed gm hu Jerico wui. T am haha wabsh g s-chu e'eskam am cheggia k ehs g ha'ichu enigaj k gewichkwua k chum alo mua.
K am wo'o. “T ab haha wabsh g pahl hema hih wohg oithch k nei mo am wo'o ihtha o'othham k gm hu wabsh mehk him k an bij.
T hab wa masma g papal ha wehm chikpantham ab hema him k am nei hegai o'othham mo am wo'o k gm hu wabsh bijim k gm hu hih.
T g hema Samaria t am o'othham am hahawa him k cheh ihtha o'othham. Kum ab a'ai s-e keh'ith g Samaria t am hemajkam ha wehm. T eda ihtha si s-ho'ige'ith
k ab i wako g eh'ed g nawaitkaj k ab i huhud k an i hobino g ikuskaj k an hahawa thai e-shoiga an k gm hu i bei kihhim wui mat am hebai wo ha nuhkuthach.

“K am ba'ich d i tash. T gm hu wo hih ihtha o'othham k wabshaba ab ha'i ha mah g lial mat wo nuhkuth k hab ha ah, ‘Am g wo nuhkuth. Kunt ia ep wo jiwia k wo wa em-namkith mamt haschu ba'ich wo i heki gei wehhejed.’
“Neh, kup hedai hab elith ihtham waik mo s-ap d nawojij hegai mamt gewichkwua?”
Sh hab kaij hegai chehanig ha mashchamtham, “Hegai mo s-ho'ige'ith.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, gamai g hihm k am hab e junihith hab masma.”
Sh amjed am hebai hihim ihtham Jesus ch am thatha hema kihhim t am. Sh am hema g uwi hab chehgig Martha ch ab i ha wahpki e-kih ed.
Kush am wehmaj thaha g wehngaj ch hab chehgig Mary ch ith ab i thahiwua Jesus wui k ab si kaiham g ha'ichu mashchamaj.

Sh eda g Martha si chikpan ch e kudut k am jiwia Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, nap pi sha'i has elith mat g ni-wehnag am wabsh i ni-thagito mant hejel hab wo juh g chikpan. Ab g ahgith mat ab wo i him k wo i ni-wehmt.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, Martha, mu'i ap ha'ichukaj e kudut.
K eda am d wa'i hemako ha'ichu mo d si ha'ichu. Ith at g Mary ab bei. Kut pi wo sha'i e wohppo'ithach.”

Sh am hu hebai e ho'ige'ithahun g Jesus ch am i kuhgit. Sh hema hab kaij g chuhchaij ab wui, “T-kownalig, oi g hig t-mashcham matt has masma wo t-ho'ige'ithahu hab masma mo wa g John ha mashcham hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ith amt hab wo chei am e ho'ige'ithahunch: Jiosh t-ohg, ab ach si has m-elith ch si ha'ichuchuth g m-chehgig ch tatchua mapt wo i ge'ethaj g e-kownaltalig ia t-shahgith.
Ab g i s-t-ho'ige'ith k ab wo t-mahkath g ha'ichu hugi wehs tashkaj.
Gam g hu hab i juhni g pi ap t-chu'ichig nach pi ahchim gm hu pi chechegitod g ha-chu'ichig hegam mat hedai i pi ap has chu'i ab t-wui. Pi g am hiwgith g Jiawul mas am wo t-shul pi ap'ekam ch ed.”

Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mo ab si wecho e mashcham, “Neh, tp hems hema pi am hu ge'e wo ha'ichu hugik. T am hema mehkjed wo jiwia hudunk ab mat ab i chehgim. Kut am wo hih g kihkam e-hugith am kihkam wui k ab wo ha'i tai g sismito mat wo gegos g e-nawoj.
“T hab haha wabsh wo chum chei g hugithaj am kihkam, ‘Pi g ia hu ni-kudut. Heki ant hu ab yahwidath g ni-kihjeg. Kutt heki hu wohpiwua g t-a'aliga ha wehm. Nt pi wo i wamig k wo m-mah ha'ichu.’
“T wabshaba pi has wo e elith k ab wabsh wo kia tahnith. T am haha wo i wamig k ab wo mah nat pi pi ha'asa ab wo tahnith.

“Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma pi ha'asa ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mam haschu i tatchua. T ab wo em-mah. Am g wo ha'ichu i e gahgithath. T wo em-chehgi. Ab g wo shontpag g kihjeg. T ab wo i e kuhpi'o em-wehhejed.
“Neh, s-mahch am mat pi hedai wabsh g wamad ab wo mah g e-alithag mat g watopi ab wo tai.
Kut pi wabsh g nakshel ab wo mah mat g chuchul nonha ab wo tai.

Mam has i masma pi ap'e ch wabshaba s-mahch mamt g s-kehg ha'ichu ab wo ha mah g e-a'aliga. No hig pi g em-ohg Jiosh ba'ich i e nahtokch mat ab wo ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam mat ab wo tai.”
Sh am hu hebai hema pi ha neok g cheoj nash pi g jiawul an u'ukch. Kutsh g Jesus gm hu hab i juh g jiawul. Tsh am ha hekaj i neo. Tsh g hemajkam si has i el.
Sh eda ha'i hab kaij, “Moki g jijawul ha-ge'ejig ab mahkch g gewkthag. K heg hekaj gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.”
Sh ha'ijj wabsh chum heki s-himchuthamk g Jesus ch ab chehani mat g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wo juh k hekaj am wo ha chehgi mo ab Jiosh t amjed.

Sh wabshaba g Jesus s-mahch mo haschu am chegito ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “S-mahch am mat g o'othham wo padch g hejel e-jewedga mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia. Kut g e-wehm kihkam hab wa'ap wo padch g hejel e-kihthag mat ab a'ai wo e cheggia.
Pegih, t has hig masma g Jiawul pi wo padch g hejel e-kownaltalig matp ab wo sha ni-mah g gewkthag mant am wo i ha wuwhas g piongaj?
Neh, em-pionag o hab wa'ap i ha wuwhasith g jijawul. Kum eda pi hab masma hab ha elith mo g Jiawul ab ha mahkch g gewkthag. Pegih, ihtham at wo em-ahgi mo pi woho hegai mam hab chum elith.
Jiosh gewkthagkaj ani gm hu hab i ha wua g jijawul. K ith am wohokamchuth mat heki hu in i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig em-shahgith.
“Nat hig pi wo e nahtokch g si s-gegoki kownal g e-cheggiakudkaj mat wo nuhkuth g e-kih. T hab pi hedai wo wohppo'i g ha'ichu enigaj.

Tp wabshaba g ba'ich i s-gegoki kownal wo cheggia k wo gewito k gm hu wo i ui hegai cheggiakudaj mo ab chum si hiwig k am wo a'ai i tahp g ha'ichu enigaj am ha wehhejed g e-shonthalig. Neh, bani wa masma cheggia g ge Jiawul.
K hegam mat hedai pi ab hu wo i ni-wehmajk ab ni-wui gegok ch wabsh ha gantan hegam mani s-ha tho'ibiamk.”

Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems g jiawul an wo hema u'ukch g o'othham ch wabsh wo thagito mat am hebai ep wo e ul. Kut hegai o'othham wo i chum kegch g e-thoakag. T wabshaba g jiawul pi hebai wo chehg k hekaj hab wo i e ah, ‘Mo hig woho d ni-kih hegai o'othham. Nt hig am uhpam wo hih wui.’
Kut wa woho am uhpam wo him k wo cheh mo am wabsh jeg ch si kegchuthas ch hehosimhunas.
T am haha wo him k wewa'ak ep wo ha u'apa g jijawul. T ihtham ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek ch am wehmaj wo i chiwia. Neh, t ihtha o'othham hahawa ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek mo wa ga hu i heki hu.”
Sh an wehgaj gegok g hemajkam. Kush hema g uwi hab kaij am wui g Jesus, “Tho si ge'e s-hehgig heg wehhejed uwi mat an m-mahsith k m-si'ichuthahim.”
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus, “Ba'ich at wo i s-hehgigk hegam mat ab wo kaihamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.”

Sh am i mu'ithahim g hemajkam. Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Mu'ijj o g ha-chegitoithag pi ap'e. K heg hekaj s-neithamk mant hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu k am wo wohokamch mani ab Jiosh amjed. Bant wa'i masma am wo ha chehgi mani d Jiosh si Kehsha matsh wa hab e juh hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash d Jonah.
Heg atsh wa am si has masma i e chehgi ha wui g Ninevah t am hemajkam. Nt ahni am si has masma wo i ni-chehgi am ha wui g hemajkam ia'i ithani.

“Hegam Ninevah t am hemajkam atsh gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi am i kahk g Jonabad k hab pi ab hu wo e chu'ichigch ge'e lothaita tash ch ed. Ni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g Jonabad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chu'ichig lothaita tash ch ed. (31) Mehkjed atsh ab i hih g uwi kownal ab wakolim tahgio amjed mat ab wo kaiha g Solomonbad ha'ichu mahchig. Ni ahni ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g Solomonbad. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch heg hekaj ab wo motoig g chu'ichig lothaita tash ed.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Wohokam o wepogithas mo g lahmpa. Kum s-mahch mo pi hab d ahga g lahmpa mas am wo e ehsto ha'ichu wecho. Mt an wo thai mat hebai wo ha tonlithath hegam mo ab i wahpk.
“Em-wuhpui at s-ap am wo i wahki g tonlig matp wo s-mamsk k wabshaba pi am hu wo i wahki matp pi wo mamsk. Kum heg hekaj s-ap ha nuhkuth.
Pegih, wahm amt wo si s-ap nuhkuthath g ha'ichu e-amichuthadag mat heg s-ap am wo i wahki g wohokam.
Bat wa'i masma ab wo i shuhthath g em-chegitoithag g wohokam.”
Tsh am i ha'asa neo g Jesus. Tsh am hema jiwia g Palasi k am waith mat wo wehmaj e gegos. Kutsh wa woho am i wahk k am i thahiwua matsh wo e gegos.
Tsh hegai Palasi si has i el neithok mat pi e wako hab masma mo d ha himthag.

Kush s-amichuth g Jesus ch hab kaij ab wui, “Neh, ahpim Palasi am si kegchuth g e-honshpadag. K wabshaba g em-chegitoi wabsh shuhthags g pi ap'ekamkaj. Heg o wa wepo mam an wa'i wehgaj si kegchuth g hohas-haha'a. K gd hu ha eda wabsh kia s-bibtagi.
Thamt wabsh wo totontok mamtp heg wo wa'i s-ap nuhkuth e-honshpadag. Jiosh at hab wa'ap nahto g em-thoakag. Kumt heg ep wo chum nuhkuth.
Am g wehs wo i thagito Jiosh wui k hab wo s-chechojimak ab sho'igkam ha wui ch wo nei mat wehs ha'ichu wo s-kehgajk am em-wehhejed.

“Neh, ahpim Palasi am ab mahk g Jiosh g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch g em-eniga, chum hems g nahnko mahs pi-mianthi ch ha'ichu tatk. T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo em-namkith nam pi pi ap'echuth hegai mam haschukaj ha sho'igchuth ha'i ch pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh.
Sha'am wa'i s-hohho'ith mamt si s-apko wo thadhaiwua am cheopi ch ed ch s-hohho'ith mat ab wo si has em-elithath g hemajkam mamt an wo i wuwha kahya ch ed.

Ih, sho'ig! Mt wo si s-ko'okam e namkithach. Neh, pi at wo mahsk g hiha'ini matp pi am hu wo tohnkthask. Kumtp hems am wabsh thahm wo oiopoth. Pegih, bat sha masma pi wo mahchk g hemajkam mam d pi ap'ekam nam pi ehstokch g pi ap e-chu'ichig.”
Kush hema hab kaij g chehanig ha mashchamtham ab wui, “Ha mashchamtham, ahchim ap hab wa'ap has t-ahg hab kaijch.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ab em-wui o hab wa'ap him g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag. Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu am ab ha chehani g hemajkam. K ith d s-wehch ha'ichu mohtoi am ha wehhejed. M eda ahpim pi ha'ichu hab sha'i wua mams hekaj ha wehm wo moht.
“Em-shohshon at mu'i ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kum ahpim ha wepo masma, chum ams ha hehosith g ha-hiha'iniga hegam mamt ha koktha. K heg hekaj ab em-wui him g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag.
Heki o hu hab kaij g Jiosh, ‘Ab ant wo i ha wuwhas g ha'ichu i tashogiththam ha shahgith g hemajkam. Kut ha'i wo ha-koktha k ha'i wo ha sho'igch.’
Neh, kum ha wepo chu'ichig mamtp ha wepo ha'ichu elith. Kut wepo masma wo em-ai g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag heg hekaj wehs mat hab juh ga hu i amjed mat in i e nahto g jewed.

Abelbad atsh wa wehpeg e muhkith. Tsh amjed mu'i ep e ko'ij. Tsh g Zecariabad ga hu si ha oithch e muhkith amai shahgith g iagchulithakud ch ge'e cheopi. Kum ahpim ha wepo chu'ichig hegam matsh wa ha koktha ch ha wepo masma wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamtp hedai ha wepo elith ha'ichu.

“Ahpim chehanig ha mashchamtham amt wo i chum ha amichuthach g hemajkam mat has masma wo s-mahchk g Jiosh. Kum eda ahpim pi mahch ch ep ha shohbithch hegam mo s-mahchimk. Heg o wa wepo mam ab yahwidath g kihjeg mat pi hedai am hu wo i wah. Jiosh at s-ko'okam wo em-namkith heg hekaj.”
Tsh am i wuhsh g Jesus k gm hu chum hih. Tsh hegam chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi ab hahawa si s-ta ke'itham has ahg k mu'i ha'ichu kakke
hab wabsh chum ahgch mat wo heki himch mat pi ap ha'ichu hab wo chei.

Kutsh sha'i si mu'i mihl hemajkam am i e hemapath k wabsh a'ai e keishshap. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Neh, hegam mo d Palasi o hab wabsh s-e junimk mo d s-ap'ekam. Mt wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi am hu ha oithk hab wo masmak.
Hegai mo chum e ma'ishch at wehs wo e ma'ishpi'o. Pej, wehs s-a'agi ha'ichu at wo s-e mai.
Wehs at wo mahsko e wua mamtp haschu chum s-a'agi hab kaij. Kut wehs am si s-kaitham wo e ahgath kih thahm amjed mamtp haschu i chum s-jupij hab kaij gd hu si e-kih ed.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Neh, ni-naipijju, pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam matp hedai wo chum s-em-kokthaim. Pi at wo e nako mas ba'ich s-ko'okam has wo i em-juh em-kokthak.
Heg at wa'i Jiosh wo e nako mat am wo em-tha'ich Jiawul kih ed mamtp pi am hu wo wohog elithath. Kumt heg ab wo wa'i si has elithath.

K wabshaba g Jiosh si s-hemajima ch pi tatchua mas wo s-ko'okam em-juh. Am g wo oithahim mo chum hems g al u'uwhig s-ap ha nuhkuth. K eda chum alo pi ha'ichu namkig ihtham. Kum ahpim wehs ha'ichu ba'ich d i ha'ichu am tahgio. Jiosh o wehs ha'ichu s-mahch ab em-ab. Mt heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath ab wui e thagitokch.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, am amt wo s-ni-mahch k ah hemajkam ha tahgio mani d em-tho'ibiakam. Kunt ahni hab wa'ap wo s-em-mahch k ah am ha tahgio g anghil ch am Jiosh tahgio.
Kutp wabshaba hedai pi wo ni-mahch k ah am ha tahgio g hemajkam, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo mahch k ah am ha tahgio g anghil ch am Jiosh tahgio.

“Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj hegai mat hedai wo wa chum has ni-ah matp gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig. T wabshaba pi gm hu hab wo i e juh g pi ap chu'ichigaj hegai mat hedai wo s-ko'okam has ah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
“Pi g wo sha'i kudut ab amjed mamt has masma e wehhejed wo neo mamtp hems am wo em-lothai chechopi ch ed o am ha tahgio g kokownal.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at wo em-ahgi mamt has wo chei.”
Sh am hema g o'othham hab kaij ab wui, “Ha mashchamtham, hab g ahgith g ni-nawoj mat am wo i ha ni-tahpani hegai mat g t-ohg an thagito t-wehhejed.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ant heg hekaj ia hu jiwia manis wo em-lothait k am wo i em-ap'echuthach g ha'ichu em-eniga am em-shahgith.”
Sh am ba'ich hab ep kaij ab wehs ha wui, “Am g wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi heg wo wa'i hu'uithath s-kaisthag. Pi amt d wo s-ap thoakamk heg hekaj mam haschu i eniga, chum ams d wo s-kaisk.”
Sh ith am hahawa chum ha tashogith ch hab kaij, “Tp hems hema d wo s-kaisk. K g e'eshaj si ge'e babhe.
K hab e ahg, ‘Pi o an hu wi'is mant hebai ep wo toa g ha'ichu bahithag. Shuhshuth at g ni-waptto.
Nt hig wo i ha shulig k am ba'ich i ge'eged ha'i wo i chuhcha k am wo ba'iha g ha'ichu bahithag ch wehs ha'ichu ni-eniga.
Si at ha'ichu s-ni-abam. Nt mu'i a'ahithag ab wo hekaj ihtha s-i'owi ha'ichu k wo ni-ulinihogithath ch wo ni-gegosithath ch wo ih'eth ch wo si s-hehgigk.’ Neh, bo e ahg ihtha s-kais.
“K wabshaba ab wui hab kaij g Jiosh, ‘Thap wabsh tohnto. Ith i s-chuhugam ab apt wo muh. Kut d wabsh wo hemak ch wo ui g ha'ichu m-eniga map hejel am chum e wi'ithch.’
Neh, bo wa chu'ig ch hab wa'ap wo wa chu'igk wehs ha wehhejed hegam mo hejel s-e kaischuthamk ch wabshaba pi am hu Jiosh wehhejed hekaj g s-e-kaisthag,” bo kaij g Jesus.
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Heg ani hekaj am em-ahgith ihtha mamt pi wo si e kudutath ab ha'ichu e-hugi ab o ab ha'ichu e-eniga ab.
Jiosh at ab em-mah g em-thoakag, pegih, k hab wa'ap ab wo em-mah mamt haschukaj wo e thagio'ithath.

“An g wo i ha neith g hahawani. Ihtham o pi ha'ichu e'eshath ch pi od g ha'ichu esha ch pi ha kihki o ha waptto mat am eda wo ba'iha. Jiosh o ha gegosith. Kum eda ahpim ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo g u'uwhig am tahgio g Jiosh. T heg s-ap wo em-thagio'ithath.
Pi amt wo e nako mams am ba'ich wo i himch g e-a'ahithagga am wabsh hekaj e kudutch.
Mamtp pi wo e nako mamt hab wo juh ihtha al ha'as chum ha'ichu, pegih, k haschu ahgk wo e kudutath g ba'ich i ge'eged ha'ichukaj?

“An g wo i ha neith hegam ha'ichu wuhshanig m an chuhch. Pi o chikpan ch pi shohshom g ha'ichu eniga. Kuki eda g ha-heosig ba'ich i s-kehgaj mo g ha'ichu enigaj hegai s-kais kownalbad mash hab chehgig Solomon.
Neh, tp hems s-hohtam wo gaksh hegai sha'i m an chuhch k wo hekaj e nantha. K eda heg wa wepo mo g Jiosh si s-kehg enigadathch g heosigkaj. Pegih, am g wo s-wohochuth mat ab s-ap wo em-enigadathch.
Pi g heg wa'i hekaj wo e kudutath mamt wo e gahgi g ha'ichu hugi.
Wehs hemajkam an jewed thahm o chum hekith ith an si e gahgith. K wabshaba g em-ohg Jiosh s-mahch mam tatchua ihtha.
Mt g Jiosh kownaltalig wehpeg am wo ul e-thoakag ed. T g Jiosh ab epai wo em-mah mam haschu i tatchua.
“Pi g am wo sha'i ha'ichu ehbithath ahpim mam al he'ekiajj ab ni-hiwig. Em-ohg Jiosh o ab si tatchua mat ab wo i em-mah g e-kownaltalig.

Wehs g wo gagda mam haschu i edgith k wo ha mah g namkigaj g sho'igkam k an haha wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg kaisthag Jiosh kihthag ed. T heg pi hekith wo huhug. T pi hedai wo em-ehs. T g hiopch pi hekith wo padch.
Kumt am wo s-hihimim no pi g em-tatchuithag am ulinig mo hebai ha'ichug hegai mam haschu hab elith mo d em-kaisthag.”

Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo si e nahtokch mat haschu has wo e juh hab sha masma mat g pion wo si e nahtokch mat g ha-ahmo wo uhpam jiwia. Ha-ahmo atp hems am wui wo hih g wo ha hohntam gegosig k pi oi wo uhpam jiwia. T wabshaba g piongaj ab wo s-ap e enigadathch ch ab wo mehithch g e-kanjel ch g e-ahmo ab wo nenida. T am wo i jiwia k wo si shontpa. T ab ha hekaj wo i kuhpi'o g kihjeg wehhejed.
T wo si s-hehgigk hegam pion mat g ha-ahmo wo ha cheh mo neneath ch e nahtokch. Neh, t heg ab hab wo juh g bahshothag k wo si s-ap ha thadsh k wo ha gegos.
T wo si s-hehgigk hegam mat wo e nahtokch mat wo jiwia, chum as hems eda wo i huh g s-chuhugam o i ba'iwichkim.
“Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekith hema wo i jiwia g s-chu ehskam. Kum heg hekaj chum hekith nuhkuth g e-kihthag.
Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ta machima em-wehhejed manis hekith wo uhpam jiwia jewed wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Mt heg hekaj wo si e nahtokchith chum hekith.”
Sh hab kaij g Peter, “T-kownalig, nap ahchim wa'i hab t-ahg aha nap wehs hab ha ahg?”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Chum amt hedai wo e nahtokch mamtp wo s-wapagimak ch wo s-chu a'amichuthath. S-mahch am mat g ha-ahmo hema wo e gahgi g hab mahs chikpantham k wo nuhkuthach g e-kihthag. T heg s-ap wo ha chikpanchuthath ch wo ha thagio'ithath g e-wehm pion mat eda pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g ha-ahmo.
T am ep wo jiwia k wo cheh mo ihtha s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan. Kut d wo si ge'e s-hehgigk heg wehhejed pion
nat pi g ahmoj am hahawa wehs thahm wo kei g e-kihthag.
“T wabshaba pi ap d wo ha-kehshak matp hedai wo i ha sho'igchuthath g e-wehm pion ch wo si e gegosithath ch wo nawmmukath hab e ahgch mat pi oi wo jiwia g ahmoj.
T haha wabsh wo jiwia k wo cheh mo pi ap hab wua g e-chikpan k wo si s-ko'okam namkith k gm hu hab wo i juh.
“T wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag hegai pion mat wo s-mahchk g e-ahmo tatchui ch eda pi am hu hab wo junihith.
T wabshaba pi am hu i si s-ko'okam wo bei g e-namkithadag hegai mo pi e mahch ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu amt uhpam wo s-behim ab amjed hegai mamt ba'ich ha'ichu nuhkuthach.”

Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia jewed thahm mant wo i ha chu'amu g hemajkam hab sha masma mant am wo si i nai ha-i'ibthag ed. T hab wo s-nenenashanik ab Jiosh wui. Mat hu'i heki hu hab wo e juh.
Am ant s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu gahi wo wuhshani k si ni-kudut heg hekaj.
Pi g hab wo e elithath mat wo thotholimat g hemajkam mant ia jiwia.
Ab at em-wui wo gegokiwua hegam mat pi wo ni-tatchuath, chum hems ha'akia em-wehm kihkam.
Cheoj atp hems wo s-keh'ithath g e-ohg o g e-alithag. T g uwi g e-je'e o g e-mad o g e-kahkma je'e wo s-keh'ithath.”

Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, mt wo s-mahchk mas wo juh o as wo tonih am neithk mas hebaijed hewed ch has mahs chewagi i wushke. M eda pi am hu i a'amichuth mo haschu has e junihog ia'i ithani neithch mani haschu hab wua. Shahag wepo mam pi mahchimk.
“E o aihim mat g Jiosh wo ha lothai g hemajkam. Am g wo a'amichuth mamt has wo chum masmak.

S-mahch am mamt hemho wa s-hohtam am wo i e ap'ech heg wehm mat ab wo ha'ichu i em-abch. Tp hems am wo i em-wahpki lothaita ch ed mamtp pi am hu wehmaj wo i e ap'ech. T g usagakam am wo i em-thagito chi-lihhi wui. T heg gd hu wo si em-kuh.
Kumt pi wo sha'i i e wuhshath am hugkam mamt hekith wo i wehs ha namkith mamt he'ekia i em-to'i.”
Kush ia'i ithani ha'i g o'othham am ahgith g Jesus matsh g kownal Pilate ha'i ha koktha g Galilee t am hemajkam mash eda ihtham am hab chum wua g iagchulitha Jiosh wui.
Sh g Jesus hab kaij am ha wui, “Kumtp hab elith mo ith am wohokamchuth mo ba'ich d i si pi ap'ekam mo hedai i Galilee t am kihkam namt pi hab masma ha koktha.
K eda pi woho. Wehsijj am hab masma d pi ap'ekam ch wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamt wo sha pi ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.

“Neh, am atsh i gei g uhgk kih Siloam wo'o t am Jerusalem ch ed. Kutsh gamai gigi'ik e ko'ij. Kum hab elith mo ith am wohokamchuth mo ihtham ba'ich d i si pi ap'ekam mo hedai i hegam mo am kih Jerusalem t am.
K eda pi woho. Wehsijj am hab masma d pi ap'ekam ch wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamt wo sha pi ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”
Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, “Neh, matp hema g o'othham ge suhnaga am uhdwis e-oithag ed ch am him k am s-u'im g suhna. K pi ab hu bahithag.
“K hab ahg g oithag nuhkuththam, ‘Neh, waik a'ahith ab ach am nenneith hegai suhna uhs ch pi koi ha'ichu sha'i bei ab amjed. Pt wo shonch. S haschu ahgk am hig wo kehkk oithag ch ed?’
“K wabshaba hab kaij g oithag nuhkuththam, ‘Am att hig wabsh wo thagito hemako ahithag ehp. Nt am wo si i moihun k am wo iawua g haiwani biht an wehgaj.
Kut am wo s-ap'ek matp ab wo bahithagt. Nt wabshaba am haha wo si shonch matp pi ab hu wo bahithagt.’ ”
Sh am hu hebai mihshmetha tash ch ed g Jesus am ha mashcham cheopi ch ed.
Sh am hema ha'ichug g uwi mash g jiawul an u'ukch. Kush gamai gigi'ik a'ahith ab wa'i mumku mash ab wabsh i e olatch ch pi e nako mat wo shel i kekiwua.
Tsh am i cheh g Jesus k ab si wai. Tsh ab i hih. Kush hab kaij, “Ahpi uwi, ia at wo i thoa g m-mumkithag,”
K ab hahawa taht. Kutsh ha hekaj shel i kekiwua k ab si ihm g Jiosh.

Kutsh ab si bagat hegai mash d ha-wanimedtham am cheopi ch ed matsh g Jesus ha thoaj ha-mihshmetha tash ed k ash hab ha ah g hemajkam, “Am o ha'ichug g chuhthp tash matt heg eda wo chikpanath. Kunt heg oitham tash ia wo thatha k wo e thoaj, hi wa pi t-mihshmetha tash ed mo g Jiosh am kehshch.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ih, pi ap sha'i woho ab hu has elith g Jiosh pi ab hu ho'ige'ithch ihtha uwi no pi d chum aligaj. S-mahch ap mat wabsh chum hedai g e-woiwisga o g e-wuhluga am wo wul'ok k am wo be k gd hu wo i'ich, chum hems e-mihshmetha tash ed.
Pegih, tt wahm wo i wehmt ihtha t-wehm o'othham. Jiawul o wa ab wulshch gamai gigi'ik ahith ab. Kutt hemho wa wo wul'o, chum hems mihshmetha tash ed.”
Kutsh si e el hegam mo s-keh'ith. Sh wabshaba g hemajkam si s-hehgig heg hekaj si s-kehg ha'ichu mat hab juh.
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ant he'es wo i em-tashogi g Jiosh kownaltalig

am wepogithch g ha'ichu kai. Neh, heg am e'esha mo al chumaj ch oi wa am wo wuhshani k ha'as wo i ge'etha mo g s-ehheg uhs. Tp hems g u'uwhig an ab wo koksht. Pegih, t hab wa masma wo ge'e i ge'etha g Jiosh kownaltalig, chum as al chum am wo shonwua.”

Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Jiosh kownaltalig o hab wa'ap wepogithas mo g jewajithakud. Heg amt wo be k am wo wah wehnathk g chu'i k am he'es wo i thai. T g jewajithakud wo chehmo g wahga mat wehs am wo i kopothka. Pegih, t g Jiosh kownaltalig hab wa masma wo chehmo g jewed.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus
Sh am hihimhim hegam Jesus ha oithk g kihhim. Sh g Jesus am ha'ichu ha mashcham g hemajkam ch am wabsh i si ha'ab e gewkathch Jerusalem wui.
Sh hema ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, nat pi sha'i mu'i wo e tho'ibia g hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui,
“Heu'u. Kumt heg hekaj am wo si e nakogath mamt am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed. Mu'ijj at am wo chum s-wahpkim k pi wo e nako. Heg o wa wepo mamt am wo i wahp al aj kihjeg t amjed.
Ith ant wo wepogi g kih enigakam mat am wo i ha wahpki g e-machiga k am haha wo si kuh g pualit. T ab ha'i ep wo i chum s-wahpkim. T hab wo ha ah, ‘Gam g hu wo hihim. Pi ani sha'i em-mahch.’
“Neh, bat wa masma mu'i am wo i chum s-wahpkim ni-kownaltalig ed hab kaijch, ‘M-wehm ach t-gegosithahim. Kup am ha mashcham t-kihhim am.’
“Kunt hab wo ha ah, ‘Pi ani sha'i em-mahch. Gam g hu wo hihim ab ni-amjed. Tham si pi ap hehemajkam.’

“T haha wo si shoanith ch ga hu wabsh wo i si e ki'ishch nat pi wo sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu nakogath. T eda am wo ha'ichugk g Abrahambad ch Isaacbad ch Jacobbad ch wehs g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
Kut g hemajkam ab wo i hihi si'al tahgio amjed ch huduni tahgio amjed ch ab juhpin tahgio amjed ch wakolim tahgio amjed k am wo thadhaiwua e wehm Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
Kut am d wo si haha'ichuk hegam mo hemuch d pi haha'ichu. T hegam mo hemuch d si haha'ichu d haha wo pi haha'ichuk.”
Tsh am ha hekaj ha'i thatha g Palasi k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Gam g hu hihm ia amjed nash pi s-m-mu'amk g Herod.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Herod o sha ban masma ch hab kaij. Him k ahgith mant ha'as tash am wabsh kia gm hu hab wo i ha junihith g jijawul ch wo ha thoajithath g kok'otham ch haha wo s-ap nahto g ni-chikpan.
Kunt pi wo sha'i ni-muhkith im hu haha wabsh i himathch. Am o wa'i Jerusalem t am e ko'ijith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.

“Ih, t wo si e sho'igch g Jerusalem t am hemajkam nat pi g Jiosh s-ap wo ha thagito. Ha-shohshon ash wa ha ma'ichshulig ch mu'i ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. T ihtham am ha oithk hab wo e juh. Mu'ikko ani hab chum si ni-tahtk mant wo si s-ap em-nuhkuth hab sha masma mat g chuchul g e-mahmad ab e wecho wo ha hemapai. M wabshaba pi ab hu tatchua manis hab wo em-juh.

K eda an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mamt ab wo chum ni-ihmath ch hab wo chech'eth mat g Jiosh am i ni-kehsh k si s-ni-ho'ige'ith. Kunt ia wo i s-ap em-thagito am hugkam mamt hab hahawa masma hab wo e juh.”
Sh hema d uhgchu ch d Palasi ch hebai hab juh g ge'e gegosig ha-mihshmetha tash ed k ash ab i wai g Jesus. Kutsh am jiwia.
Sh eda an hema ha'ichug g cheoj ch mahniko nash pi g kakhioj ch nohnhoij ge totskoni. Kumsh an si s-nen'oith g Jesus mas wo thoaj nash pi ab ha'ichu s-abchuthamk.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi, “Shahchu am ahgch hab elith mo pi t-hiwgith g t-chehanig machs wo ha thoaj t-mihshmetha tash ed?”
Sh pi hedai has sha'i kaij. Tsh g Jesus ab hahawa i wai ihtha o'othham k thoajith k am hahawa thagito. Kutsh gm hu hih.
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, namt hig pi woho ab ha hekaj wo i wuhshath g e-alithag o chum hems g e-woiwisga matp am wo sha gei wawhia ch ed, chum as d wo em-mihshmetha tashk?”
Kush pi hedai e nako mas has wo chei.
Kutsh ha'i hegam ha-waitha gn hu si wehpeg s-apko thadhaiwua. Kush am ha neith g Jesus ch hab kaij,
“Pi g am hu si s-apko wo thadhaiwua mamt hekith am wo hihi gegosig wui. Tp hems am hema wo jiwia mat am ba'ich d wo i s-has ha'ichuk.
Kut am haha wabsh wo jiwia hegai mat ab i em-wai k hab wo em-ah mamt wo hiwigi hegai s-has ha'ichu abai mamt ab chum thahiwua. Kumt wo si e el namt pi hahawa ga hu wabsh si ha oithk wo thahiwua.

“Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek mamt ga hu wabsh mehk wo thahiwua. Kut g kihkam ab wo i him k hab wo em-ah, ‘Ni-nawoj, oi g i hihm k ia hu s-apko ni-miabithch i thahiwua.’ Neh, t ith ab wo em-mah g si has elitha am ha tahgio hegam ha'i ha-waitha.
“Mt wo pi ha'ichuch hegai mat hedai wo chum si e ha'ichuch k ab wo si ha'ichuch hegai mat wo pi e ha'ichuch.”

Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab wui hegai mat ab i wai, “Pi g hegam ab wa'i ha waith e-naipijju o g e-wepnag o g e-hajuni o g s-kakais e-hugith an kihkam mapt hekith hab wo juh g gegosig. Ab at epai wo i m-wai ihtham. Kupt hab masma ab wo bei g e-namkithadag heg hekaj mapt ith hab juh.
Ab g i ha waith g sho'igkam ch mamaniko ch pi hihimithkam ch pi neneatham mapt hekith hab wo juh g gegosig.
Pi at wo e nako ihtham mat wo uhpam m-namkith. T g Jiosh ab wo m-mah g s-kehg m-mahkigdag mat hekith am wo i ha wuwhas g s-ap'ekam hemajkam ab muhkig amjed.”

Sh am hema thaha g o'othham ch kah ihtha. Tsh am i ha'asa neo g Jesus. Sh ith ab wui hab kaij, “Ttki wo si s-hehgigkath, am i wahpk Jiosh kihthag ed, heg wa wepo matt am wo thadhaiwua ge'e gegosig ch ed.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, mamtp woho am wo i wahp. Ith o wepo masma matp hems hema hab juh g ge'e gegosig k mu'i ab ha waith g hemajkam.
T am i e ai. Kut am hema cheha g e-pionag. T heg am him k ha-ahgi mo wehs ha'ichu e nahtokch.
“K wabshaba ihtham am ahgith mat pi wo e nako mat am wo hihi. “Neh, tp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Ha ant nolawt g oithag k heg s-neithamk ch hekaj pi am hu wo hih.’
“Kutp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Wehst-mahm woiwis ant am ha nolawt k hegam s-ha a'appemimk.’
“Kutp hems hema am wo ahgi, ‘Ha ant hohnt k hekaj pi am hu wo hih.’

“Neh, t am hahawa uhpam hih ihtha ha-pionag k am ahgi g e-ahmo. T g ahmoj wabsh woho i bagat k hab kaij ab e-pionag wui, ‘S-hohtam g am hihm kahya ch ed ch wohg ch ed k ab wo i ha ui g sho'igkam ch mamaniko ch pi neneatham ch pi hihimithkam.’
“Kut wa woho hab juh k am hahawa jiwia k hab kaij, ‘Bant juh g m-chehanig. K wabshaba am wabsh kia wi'is g kih.’
“K hab ep kaij g ahmoj, ‘Am g i wuhshani k an mehk hihm chu'uchum wopog oithch an sha'i ch ed k hab wo ha juh mat ab wo i hihi mat wo shuhth g ni-kih.
Pi at ab hu i hihi hegam mo d chum si ni-waitha. Kunt pi hema wo sha'i hiwigi mas wabsh wo i jeh g ni-gegosig.’ ”
Sh am hu hebai hihim hegam Jesus. Sh mu'i hemajkam am ha wehm hihim. Tsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui,
“Pi am ab hu sha'i ni-tatchua mamtp pi ba'ich ab wo i ni-tatchua mam hi g e-jehj ch e-wepnag ch e-wehm kihkam ch e-a'aliga.
Hemho wa amt gm hu wo thagito g hejel hab e-elitha k ahni hab ni-elitha hab wo junihith ch ni-wehhejed wo e sho'igchuthath. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mam ab mohto g kots ch ab ab wo e muhkith.
“Neh, nat hig pi am hu wo i a'amich hegai matp hedai am hema ge'e wo kiht mas am hi wa ahim lialiga mat wo nahto g e-kihta?
Mt wo ashath matp am hab wabsh wo juh g shondaj k pi wo e nako mas am hu wo i nahto g e-kihta.
Kut hab wo e chech'eth, ‘Ihtha o'othham at am chum hema i kei g kih k wabshaba pi e nako mat wo nahto.’ Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma wo i a'amich mams wo e nakog k ab wo ni-hiwgath.

“Neh, matp hems hema g kownal wo s-cheggiam g e-obga k eda al wehst-mahm mihl (10,000) wo shonthaligak. T g obgaj gokko wehst-mahm mihl (20,000) wo shonthaligak ch ab him. T hegai kownal am wo i chum a'amich mas hu hi wo wa e nako mat wo cheggia.
Tp hab wo mahsk matki pi wo e nako, t hemho wa am wo ha'i ha cheha mat ab wo nam hegai hema kownal mat ga hu wabsh kia mehk wo himath k wo s-mai mas he'ekia wo i namkith. T pi wo cheggia.
Neh, bo chu'ig. Kumt ahpim pi wo e nako mamt ab wo ni-hiwgath, heg hi wa mamt wehs ha'ichu wo thagito am ni-wehhejed.”
Sh hab ep kaij, “Mt ha'ichu wehhejed wo chum s-kehgajk hab masma mo g on.
Heg at gm hu wabsh wo s-e ohhoth mat wo sha kahko. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath namt pi wabsh wo s-e ohhoth mamtp pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk. Ab g wo i a'amichuth ahpim mam kah ihtha.”
Sh am hu i hebai, sh mu'i lial ha kowlanttham ch pi ap hemajkam ab i miabi g Jesus mat ab wo kaiha.
Tsh g Palasi ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ab i s-babgam neneok k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o wabsh s-ap ab ha neith g pi ap hemajkam ch ha wehm e gegosith.”
Tsh heg hekaj am ha ahgi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, hab kaijch:

“Ith o wepo masma mamtp hems hema ahpim siant wo kahwaligak. Kut hema wo heb hu hih. Namt hig pi am wo ha thagito hegam humukto gamai humukt kolhai ch ed k am wo i gahghi hegai hema am hugkam mamt wo chehg
k an haha wo kushwiot k hih uhpam
k ab wo i ha wai g e-naipijju. T am wo i e hemapai. Kumt hab wo ha ah, ‘Si g wo s-hehgigk ni-wehm. Cheh ant g ni-shoiga mat chum heb hu hih.’ Kut am em-wehm wo si s-hehgigk.

Pegih, t hab wa masma d wo si s-hehgigk an eda g Jiosh kihthag chum hems hemako em-wehhejed mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kum eda ha'i hejel hab chum e elith mam d s-ap'ekam hemajkam ch pi tatchua mams gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”

Kush ith am ep ha ahgith g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Matp hema g uwi wehst-mahm wo enigak g lial ch hema wo heb hu wua. Tp hems wo mehi g e-lahmpa k an wo i wosu g e-kih k an wo i gahghi am hugkam mat wo chehg
k ab haha wo i ha wai g e-naipijju. T am wo i e hemapai. T hab wo ha ah, ‘Si g wo s-hehgigk ni-wehm. Cheh ant g ni-lialiga mant chum heb hu wua.’ Kut am wehmaj wo si s-hehgigk.
Pegih, t hab wa masma wo si s-hehgigk g anghil chum hems hemako em-wehhejed mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Matp hems hema g o'othham gohk wihpiopga.
T g chumchu ab wui i him k hab kaij, ‘Ni-ohg, wapt wo i ni-mah hegai mat d wo chum ni-wuikamk.’ Kut wa woho am i gawulkai g e-eniga k ab ha mah g e-wihpiopga hegai mo haschu d ha-wuikam.
“T ihtha chumchu am ha hekaj gagda g e-eniga k bei g namkigaj k gm hu simnolt mehk jewed wui k am heki wua g e-lialiga am hab wuathch g pi ap'ekam.
T am i huhug g lialigaj. T am hahawa gei ge'e bihugig. K ihtha simnolttham pi ha'ichu edgith mas wo huh.
K am hahawa hema chikpanachuth e-oithag ed mat wo ha nuhkuth g kokji.
Kut chum hems heg s-hugim mo haschu g kokji ko'a. T pi hedai ha'ichu mah mas wo huh.
“T am hahawa ha'ichu kop mo'oj ed. K hab e ahg, Wehs g ni-ohg pionag o s-edgith g ha'ichu hugi. Kuni eda ahni d bihugimkam.
Nt hig wo uhpam hih ni-ohg wui k hab wo chei, ‘Ni-ohg, pi ant ap has chu'i ab m-wui ch ab Jiosh wui.
K hahawa pi d ni-wuikam mams hab wo ni-a'agath mani d m-alithag. Chum anis hems d wabsh wo m-pionagk.’
“Neh, t am ha hekaj i wuhshani k am wui hih g e-ohg. T heg cheh mo im hu wabsh kia him k ab si s-ho'ige'ith k ab wui med k gn hu kohm k ab chintath.
“K ab wui hab kaij g alithaj, ‘Ni-ohg, pi ant ap has chu'i am m-wui ch am Jiosh wui. K hahawa pi d ni-wuikam mams hab wo ni-a'agath mani d m-alithag…’
“T wabshaba g ohgaj hab wabsh ha ah g e-pionag, ‘Ab g wo i bek g s-kehg eniga k an wo wahkith k g anilo an wo sha'ich nowij an k g shuhshk ab ep wo cheka
k wo mua g s-gihg wisilo. Kutt hab wo juh g ge'e gegosig k wo si s-hehgigk.
Uhpam at ep jiwia ihtha ni-alithag mat gm hu mehk hih. Ith o heg wa wepo mat muh k ep e chegito.’ Neh, t wa woho hab e juh g si ge'e s-hehgig.
“K eda gm hu chikpan g ge'echu alithaj oithag ch ed ch pihhun k ab hih. K eda si s-hehgig ch ne'eth ch keihin.
Kut kah k ab hema kakke g pion mas has d ahga ihtha.
“K heg hab kaij, ‘M-wehnag at jiwia. Kumt mua g s-gihg wisilo k hab juh g ge'e gegosig nat pi s-ap jiwia.’
“Neh, t bagat ihtha ge'echu k pi am hu i wah. T am hahawa kah g ohgaj k am i wuhshani k am wabsh s-ap ab chum waith.

K wabshaba ab wui hab kaij, ‘Neh'e, ha'akia a'ahithag ani ab m-wecho ch chum hekith hab wua g m-tatchui. Kupt eda pi hekith chum hems g siwat mad ab ni-mah mant wo ni-gegosith k wo s-hehgigk am ha wehm g ni-naipijju.
T wabshaba ia jiwia ihtha m-alithag mat hedai heki wua g m-kihthag ha wehm g chechpa'awi. Kupt mu'ij g s-gihg wisilo.’
“K g ohgaj ab wui hab kaij, ‘Ni-alithag, ahpi ap chum hekith ni-wehmaj. K wehs hegai mo d ni-eniga d m-eniga.
K wabshaba hemu am wa s-ap'e matt wo si s-hehgigk nat pi uhpam ep jiwia ihtha m-wehnag mat am simnolt. Heg o wa wepo mat muh k ep e chegito,’ bo kaij g ohgaj.”
Sh am ep ha ahgith g Jesus ihtha wepogitha ahga ch hab kaij, “Tp hems am hu hebai hema d wo s-kais o'othhamk. K hegai mat am i kei mo d maliom wabsh heki wua g lialigaj.
T am i wai e wui k hab kaij, ‘Am ant ha'ichu sha naksh ab m-amjed k antki hekaj hab wo chei mapt am wo i kuint k am wo o'oha wehs map has i masma nuhkuth g ha'ichu ni-eniga nantki pi wo m-thagito.’
“T hab i e ah ihtha o'othham, ‘Tki wo i ni-wuhshath g ni-ahmo. Nis has wo ni-juh? Pi ant wo ni-nako manis wo waikkat k si ni-elith manis wo ha'ichu ha tahnith.
Neh, s-mahch ani mantki has wo ni-juh k mu'i wo naipijjuk. T ihtham ab wo i ni-wahki e-kihki ed mamt hekith wo i ni-wuhshath ith amjed ni-chikpan.’
Bo kaij ch am hahawa hehemako ha waith hegam mo ab ab e wulshch g ahmoj. Kut am hema jiwia. K g maliom ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nap s-mahch map he'ekia ab ab i e wulshch g t-ahmo?’

“K hab kaij ihtha, ‘Heu'u, hemako siant waplin g a-saithi ani ab ab ni-wulshch.’ “K hab kaij hegai maliom, ‘Ab ant wo i huduni. Pt am wa'i hetaspo wehst-mahm waplin ab ab wo e wulshch.’ “T gm hu hih hegai. Kut am hema ep jiwia.

“K g maliom ab wui hab kaij, ‘Nap s-mahch map he'ekia ab ab i e wulshch g t-ahmo?’ “K hab kaij ihtha, ‘Hemako mihl kokstal g pilkani.’ “K hab kaij hegai maliom, ‘Ab ant wo i huduni. Pt am wa'i gigi'ik siant kokstal ab ab wo e wulshch.’
“Neh, t g ahmoj si has i el am i kahk mat has e juh ihtha s-chu banmathamkam maliom nat pi si s-e mahch k hab e juh. Neh, hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o em-ba'ich i s-e mahch ch hab wua ha'ichu.
“Ith ani em-ahgith mamt wo s-ap hekaj g e-kaisthag am ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag. T g Jiosh s-ap am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed mamt hekith wo muh.

“Hegai matp hedai s-ap wo nuhkuth g al chu'uchum ha'ichu at hab wa'ap s-ap wo nuhkuth g ge'eged ha'ichu. Kutp hedai wo ha banmath g al chu'uchum ha'ichukaj k hab wa'ap wo ha banmath g ge'eged ha'ichukaj.
Am g wo s-ap nuhkuthath hegai mam haschu em-nuhkuthachuth ith thahm jewed. T g Jiosh am wo ha'ichu em-nuhkuthach e-kownaltalig ed. Heg o d s-wohom kaisthag
ch d wo em-enigak mamtp wo s-ap nuhkuth hegai mam haschu em-nuhkuthachuth ith thahm jewed.

“Pion at pi wo e nako mat gohk wo a'amok. Hema at ba'ich ab wo i tatchuath ch ba'ich i s-ap wo chikpanithath. Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap pi wo sha'i e nako mams wepo ab wo ha tatchuath g Jiosh ch ihtha jewed thahm s-kaistalig.”
Sh am ha'i kah g Palasi wehs ihtha. K eda g Palasi si pihk e elith g s-kaisthagkaj. Kush ihtham heg hekaj nahnko ahg g Jesus.

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim am hab chum e wua mam d s-ap'ekam am ha tahgio g hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh s-mahch g em-i'ibthag. Hegai mo haschu i g hemajkam hab chum elith mo d si ha'ichu o d wabsh pi ha'ichu am Jiosh nena ed.

“Mosesbad ch hegam ha'i kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at an o'oha mamt has wo chum masmak. Kumt ith wo chum hekaj am hugkam mat ab i wuhsh hegai John mo em-pahl wapkonahim. K am i amjed ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig am e ahgahim. K wabsh chum hedai am chum e nakog mat am wo i wah.
T wabshaba pi wabsh wo huhug hegai chehanig. Ba'ich at wo i pi hasigk mat g thahm kahchim ch jewed wo huhug.
“That wo pi ap chu'ijkamk hegai matp hedai wo s-ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam k hema ep wo bei. K hab wa'ap wua g pi ap'ekam hegai matp hedai an wo bei g ha-ohhotha.”
Sh ith am ep ha ahgith g Jesus: “Tp hems hema d sha'i si s-kais o'othham ch chum hekith g si s-namkig eniga ab wahpkch ch wehs tashkaj si s-kakaisim kihthag.
K am hema d si sho'igkam o'othham ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch wehsko hihiwog. Kum ab i bebhe ch ab thathsha s-kais o'othham kihjego.
hab elithch mat he'es ha'ichu wo al huh mo ab i shulig s-kais o'othham mihsa t ab. K g gogogs ab winikon g hihiwthaj.
“T am i muh ihtha sho'igkam o'othham. T g anghil am i be k an u'apa anai mam am ha nuhkuth g s-ap'ekam. “Kut g s-kais o'othham hab wa'ap muh. Kumt gd hu cheh.
T am i e chegito k oki am ha'ichug mo am kuhkpi g pi ap'ekam ch sha'i si s-ko'ok ha'ichu tahtk ch ab i nea e thahm. K g Lazarusbad ab wehmaj thaha g t-shohshon Abraham.

K ihtha s-kais o'othham ab si s-kaitham hab kaij, ‘Ni-shohshon, Abraham, ge'e s-ko'ok ani nakog ith eda mehi. Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k ab wo cheha g Lazarus mat am wo wahki g e-nowi shuhthagi ch ed k ab wo i him k ab wo iawua ni-nehni ab.’

“K wabshaba hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘Ni-hajuni, am g i chegito map wa in d thoakam ch wehs ha'ichu s-kehg edgith. K wa g Lazarus d wabsh si sho'igkam ch wabshaba hemuch ab si s-ap e tahtk iia. Kup ahpi g s-ko'ok tahtk.
Gamai wa ba'ich o an ge s'tadani ch s-juhk hiktani an t-tahgio. Kutt pi wo t-nako machs hedai am gahi wo i chesh em-wui o mamt ahpim ab gahi wo i chesh t-wui.’

“K hab kaij g s-kais o'othham, ‘Pegih, ni-shohshon, am ani hetasp wepnag. K ihtham am wabsh kia d thothakam ch am kih ni-ohgbad kih am. Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am wo cheha g Lazarus mat am wo him k am wo ha shohbi. T pi ia hu ha'ab wo thatha mo ia g s-ko'ok e tahtk.’
“K hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘M-wepnag o edgith g Moses o'ohana ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ha-o'ohana. T heg am wo ha shohbi matp ab wo kaiha.’
“K hab hahawa ep kaij g s-kais o'othham, ‘Ni-shohshon, Abraham, pi at woho ab wo kaiha. Pt wabshaba hema hab wo sha juh mat ep wo e chegito. T ab wo kaiham k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.’

“K hab kaij g Abrahambad, ‘Pi o ab hu kaiham g Moses o'ohana ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ha-o'ohana. K am wa tasho mat hab wa'ap pi ab hu wo wohoch hegai matp hems ep wo e chegito.’ Neh, bo kaij ch am thagito.”

Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mash ab hiwig, “Chum o hekith ha'ichu hab e wua mamtp hems heg hekaj am wo i shul pi ap'ekam ch ed. T wabshaba s-ko'okam wo e namkith hegai mat hab wo em-juh mamt am wo i shul.
Ba'ich at wo i s-ap'ek wehhejed matp hems wo e wachumchuth k wo e mua. T hab pi am hu wo ha shul g al ni-wohochuththam pi ap'ekam ch ed.
Am g wo s-e nen'oithath! “Mt wo ahgi g e-wehm wohochuththam matp pi ap wo chu'i ab em-wui. Kutp hems ab s-ap wo em-kaiham k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kumt ab wo i s-ho'ige'el.
Tp hems mu'ikko hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam ab em-wui hemako tash ed. Mt wabshaba chum hekith ab wo i s-ho'ige'el mat hekith gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo em-tai g ho'ige'elig.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus chuhchai ab wui, “T-kownalig, ab g i ge'ethajith g t-wohochuthadag.”

Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am tatchua g ge'e wohochuthadag. Wehs at hab wo e juh hegai mamt hab wo che'e k wo s-wohoch mat hab wo e juh. Mtp hems am wo ahgi ihtha gohi uhs mat wo e huhpshan k gd hu wo e ei ge shuhthagi ch ed. Kut wa woho hab wo e juh.”
Sh g Jesus am ha'ichu ha wepogith ch hab kaij, “Pi o ab hu sha'i ab g ha-ahmo mas wo ha hihithol g e-pionag, chum as hegam ge tash oitham am chikpan oithag ch ed.
Pion at wo hihithol g e-ahmo k wo gegosith k hahawa hejel wo e gegos.
Ab o ha ab mat am hab wo wa juh hegai mo haschu am hab i ha chehani. Kut pi hab wo chum el mas ab wo ha ho'ige'el.
Pegih, bo wa masma am em-wehhejed. Wehs amt ha'ichu am hab wo juh mo haschu ab i em-chehani g Jiosh k hab wabsh wo e ahgath mam d wabsh pion ch am hab wabsh juh g e-chikpan.”
Sh am wabsh kia hihim hegam Jesus Jerusalem wui ch am hihi ha shahgith g Samaria chekshani ch Galilee chekshani.

Sh am hema d al kihhim. Kush am ha'i thadha jeg ed nash pi kok'o heg hekaj mo g ha chuhkug muhkhim ch chum pi ha thoajig. Tsh am i chum wahp hegam Jesus mash em kihjeg g kolhai. Tsh ihtham kok'otham am cheh g Jesus k i wahpamig k d wehst-mahm ch am nam k ga hu wabsh mehk gegok
ch amjed s-kaitham hab kaij, “Jesus, t-kownalig, ab g i s-t-ho'ige'ith.”
Sh ab ha neith g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Gamai g wo hihim k ab wo e-chehgi papal ha wui.” Tsh am he'es i hihim k s-mai matki ha thotha.
Kutsh hema ab uhpam i hih am i s-mahchk mat thoa k ab si ihm g Jiosh si s-kaitham
k atsh am si gei jewed thahm ab Jesus wecho k ab si ho'ige'el. Kush eda ihtha pi d Tuhligo ch d wabsh Samaria t am o'othham.
Kush hab kaij g Jesus, “A nant pi woho wehst-mahm o'othham ha thothaj.
T eda al hemako ia uhpam jiwia k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k d wabsh go'ol o'othham.
Kekiwuani k gamai hihm. Ab ap ni-hiwig ch heg hekaj thoa.”
Sh ha'i g Palasi hab si kaij ab wui g Jesus, “A pt hekith hig am wo i t-chehgi ihtha Jiosh kownaltalig map an ahgachug?” Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amt g e-wuhpuikaj wo nei g Jiosh kownaltalig
mams hab wo chei, ‘Ia o ha'ichug’ o ‘Gd o hu ha'ab ha'ichug.’ K eda am em-shahgith.”

Sh amjed hab kaij hegam ha wui mash ab si wecho e mashcham, “Ab o him g tash mamt wo chum tatchuath mant ia wo em-wehmajk chum hems hemako tash ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Nt wabshaba pi ia hu wo ha'ichugk.
Ha'i at hab wo kaijjith ‘Gad g hu wo neith g Jiosh si Kehsha’ o ‘Ia g hu wo neith.’ Mt wabshaba pi am hu wo i ni-gahghi.
Wehsko ant wo ni-chehgi mant hekith ep wo jiwia jewed thahm hab sha masma mat g wepgi s-masma an gahi wo kekiwua chewagi ch ed.
Nt wabshaba hemu mu'i wo ni-sho'igch. T pi ab hu wo ni-tatchua ihtham hemajkam ai'i ithani.”
Kush hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Bat wo masmak mant hekith ep wo jiwia mash wa hab chu'ig eda mash g Noahbad in d thoakam.

Hemajkam ash wa gm ha wabsh i si neneath ch e gegosith ch ih'eth ch e hohont ch gm hu wabsh i pi chegito g Jiosh. T haha wabsh e ai g tash mat hegam Noahbad am i wahp ge'e wahlko ch ed. Kut mel g shuhthagi k ha wi'in k wehs ha koktha.
“Bat ep wo masmak mash wa hab masma mash wa g Lotbad in d thoakam. Wehsijj ash gm hu wabsh i si neneath ch e gegosith ch ih'eth ch ha'ichu ha nolawt ch ha'ichu gagda ch ha'ichu e'esha ch kihkit.
Kutsh wa g Lotbad ab i wuhsh Sodom kihhim t amjed. Tsh g mei ch ha'ichu s-mehithkam ab ha thahmjed i e iawua hab sha masma mo g juhki. Kutsh wehs e koktha.
“Bat wo wa masmak heg i tash mant am wo i ni-maskogi.
Kut pi hedai am hu wo sha'i chum i wah e-kih ed mat am wo ha'ichu ui, chum as hems imhab wo wa'i oimmedath e-kih wehgaj o am wo chikpanath oithag ch ed.
Pi at chum hems wo s-huwi g e-kihthag. Batsh wa e juh g Lotbad hohnigbad k hekaj e muhkith.
Bat wa masma wo heb hu wua g e-thoakag hegai matp hedai wo chum s-huwithath g e-thoakag hejel e wehhejed. T wabshaba wo tho'ibia g e-thoakag hegai matp hedai wo hekaj ni-wehhejed.
Tp hems gohk am wo kohkshath e-kih ed ch hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo wih mant hekith ep wo jiwia.
Gohk u'uwi atp hems am e wehm wo chu'ath g pilkani. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo e wuiok. [
Gohk o'othham at am wo oiopoth oithag ch ed. T hema gm hu wo i e be k hema am wo e wuiok.]”

Sh hab kaij g chuhchaij ab wui, “A t hebai hab wo i e juh ihtha?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am at wo tashok mat hebai hab e juh. Namt hig pi wo mahchk mat hebai wo kahchk g muhki am neithch mo am e hemapathch g nunuwi? Pegih, mt hab wa'ap wo s-ap s-mahchk mat hebai hab wo i e juh ihtha mani em-ahgith.
“Chum amt hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath am Jiosh wui ch pi hekith wo thagito,” bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga:
“Tp hems am hebai hema d usagakam ch wabshaba pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ch pi ab hu ha ha'ichuchuth g hemajkam.

T am wui hema jiwia g hejel wi'ikam uwi k ab tai mat am wo i wehmt namsh pi s-lothaitamk. T pi ab hu wohog el. K wabshaba ith chum hekith ab wui jijiwhia. “Kut hab i e ah g usagakam, ‘Chum ani hi wa pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ch pi ab hu ha ha'ichuchuth g hemajkam.
K wabshaba sha'i si ni-kudut ihtha uwi ch wo am hu ni-gewkoch pi ni-thagitok. Nt heg hekaj am hab wo juni hegai mo ab ni-chehani.’ ”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Neh, bat wo ha juni g pi ap'ekam usagakam hegai mo haschu chum hekith ab tahni.
Pegih, bamt wa masma chum hekith ab wo tahnith g Jiosh g i wehmtadag.
Kut s-hohtam am wo i ap'ech ha'ichu am em-wehhejed. T eda mu'i am wo e chehgi mo pi woho ab hu ni-hiwig mant hekith ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm.”
Ha'i ash hab e elith g hemajkam mo d s-ap'ekam ch eda hab ha elith ha'i ehp mo d pi ap'ekam. Sh g Jesus am ha ahgith ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga:
“Neh, gohk o'othham at am hihi ge'e cheopi wui mat wo e ho'ige'ithahu. K hema d Palasi

ch am hejelko kehk ch am e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab kaij, ‘Ab ani si m-ho'ige'ith, Jiosh, mani pi s-banma ch pi hekith ha'ichu ha iattogith ch pi am hu hab junihim g s-uam ha'ichu hab masma mo chum hedai hab e junihim. Ab ani m-ho'ige'ith mani pi hab masma mo hegai pi ap ha kowlanttham m an kehk.
Gohk tash ani ni-ho'ige'ithahun ch pi ha'ichu ko'a thomig ed ch ab m-mahk g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch mani he'es ha'ichu ab i neith.’ Neh, bo wa masma e haschuth g Palasi.

“K wabshaba hegai hema ga hu wabsh mehk kehk ch pi e nako mas ab wo uhgk i nea thahm kahchim wui no pi si e sho'igchuth. Ith o hab kaij, ‘Jiosh, ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith ahni pi ap'ekam hemajkam.’ Neh, bo kaij hegai hema.

“Kunt wo em-ahgi mat ith am i ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio. T s-ap e taht k hih uhpam. T g Jiosh pi am hu i ap'ech hegai Palasi. Tho wohokam mat g Jiosh wo ha'ichuch hegai mat hedai hejel pi wo e ha'ichuch k wo pi ha'ichuch hegai mat hejel wo chum e-ha'ichuch.”
Sh ha'i g o'othham am ha u'apa g al chu'uchum a'al Jesus wui mat ab wo ha taht. Kush g chuhchaij ha neith ch chum s-ha keh'ith mo hab e wua.

Tsh wabshaba g Jesus ab i ha wai g a'al k hab kaij ab ha wui g e-chuhchai, “Ab g wabsh wo i ha hiwgith g a'al mat ab wo i hihi ni-wui k pi an hu wo sha'i ha shohbi. Am at wabsh s-moimam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed ab ni-hiwigch.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mamt hab wa'i masma wo i wahp.”
Kush hema g Tutuligo ha wanimedtham ab kakke g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ha mashchamtham map d s-ap'ekam, shahchu ant am hab wo juh mant ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ap mahch map haschu ahgch hab ni-a'aga mani d s-ap'ekam. Heg o wa'i Jiosh d s-ap'ekam. Kup pi woho mahch mani hedai wud.

S-ha ap mahch ihtham chehanig mo hab chu'ig: Pi g am hu ha ehsithath g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g am hu ha mua'i g o'othham. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha ehsithath. Pi g am hu ha'ichu ha iattogithath. Ab g si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Sh hab kaij ihtha o'othham, “Wehs ihtha ani hab junihim gd hu i ni-alijk amjed.”

Tsh am i kah g Jesus ihtha k hab kaij ab wui, “Hemako ha'ichu o am wi'is mapt am hab wo juh. Wehs apt wo gagda map haschu i edgith k wo ha mah g namkigaj g sho'igkam k ab wo i ni-oith k am wo ni-wehmajk. Bapt masma wo edgithath g s-kaistalig an thahm kahchim ch ed.”
Tsh si pi ap e taht ihtha o'othham am i kaiok nash pi d sha'i si s-kais ch si s-huwith g s-e-kaisthag.
Tsh am i nei g Jesus mo pi ap e tahtk k hab kaij, “Sha'at wa'i si s-kawkam wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed hegam mo d s-kakais.
Nam hig hab elith mat wo e nako g ka-mihyo mas am wo gahi wuhsh ho'ipad jeg ed. Pegih, t hab wa masma pi wo e nako hegam mo hiwig g ha'ichu e-eniga mas am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.”
Sh hab kaij ihtham, “A t hedai wo e nako mat wo e tho'ibia.”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi at hedai wo e nako mas hejel wo e tho'ibia. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo e nako mat wo ha tho'ibia.”
Sh g Peter hab kaij, “Neh, ahchim att am i thagito g t-kihthag matt wo i m-oi.”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Woho amt hab e juh. Kunt am wo em-ahgi mat g Jiosh ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu ab wo em-mah ia jewed thahm ahpim mamt hedai wo thagito g e-kihthag o g e-wehm kihkam o g e-wepnag o g e-jehj o g e-a'aliga wehhejed g Jiosh kownaltalig. T am i thahm g pi ha huhugetham ap'ethag ab wo em-mah e-kihthag ed.”

Kutsh am hejelko i ha ui hegam gamai gohk e-chuhchai k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, am att wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T am hab wo e juh am ni-tahgio hegai mo wa g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'ohan ab ni-amjed.
Am amt wo i ni-thagito ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. T hegam wo nahnko ni-ahgath ch ab wo ni-siswuimath
ch wo ni-gewittan k hahawa wo ni-mua. Nt wabshaba ep wo ni-chegito mat d wo i waik tashk amjed.”
Kush wabshaba pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg g Jesus. Heg o wa wepo mo e e'estokch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
Sh am hihim hegam Jesus miabithch g Jerico. Sh g pi neatham am hema thaha wohg hugith an ch ha'ichu ha nead.
Kutsh an bihbij. Sh ith ha kah ch ab ha kakke mas haschu an has e wua.
Kumsh hab ahgith, “An o him hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed.”
Sh am si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Jesus, ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, ahpi map d t-kownaligbad David amjedkam.”
Sh hegam mash am ba'ich hihim g Jesus si s-keh'ith ch hab ahg mat wo pi shahmuni. Kush wabshaba haha wabsh ba'ich i s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith, ahpi Davidbad amjedkam.”
Tsh am hahawa i kekiwua g Jesus k ha chehani mat ab wo i e bek g pi neatham o'othham. Tsh am i jiwia. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui,
“Shahchu ant hab wo m-juni?” Sh hab kaij ihtha, “Ni-kownalig, chum ani tatchua mant ep wo ha'ichu neithath.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ha'ichu g neith. Thoa apt nap pi ab ni-hiwig.”
Tsh am ha hekaj wabsh s-ap ha'ichu neith k ab si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh k gm hu i oi g Jesus. Tsh am i nei g mu'i hemajkam ihtha k wehsijj ab si ihm g Jiosh.
Tsh am thatha hegam Jesus Jerico t am k am wabsh gahi wo wuwha.
Sh am hema chum si s-neithamk g Jesus ch d uhgchu lial kowlanttham ch d si s-kais ch ash hab chehgig Zackias.
Sh wabshaba sha'i mu'ij g hemajkam. Kush eda al shopolk ihtha ch pi ap neith
ch hekaj gm hu ha ba'ich meh g hemajkam k an i chesh uhs t an.
Tsh am i ai g Jesus mo an tha k ash an uhgk i neith k hab kaij ab wui, “S-hohtam g ab i huduni, Zackias. Ab ant wo jiwia m-kih am.”
Kutsh ha hekaj ab i hud g Zackias k si s-hehgig ch ab i wahki e-kih ed.
Kush wehsijj g hemajkam si s-ju'ujpij neneok ch hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham atki am wo i thahiwua heg kih am mo d wabsh pi ap hemajkam.”
Tsh am i kekiwua g Zackias k hab kaij ab Jesus wui. “Neh'e, eda hugkam ant wo ha mah g sho'igkam g ha'ichu ni-eniga k uhpam ep wo ha namkith gi'ikko e thahm mantp he'es i ha banmath.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ith o am chehgithch map wepo wohochuthadag mo g t-shohshon Abraham ch hekaj e tho'ibia ith i tash ab.
Ith ant hekaj ia jiwia jewed thahm ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mant an wo i ha gahghim k wo ha tho'ibia g pi ap chu'ijkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.

Pi ash sha'i tash matsh gm hu wo thatha ihtham Jesus Jerusalem t am. Kush hab e ahg g hemajkam mat si e ai mat am wo i wuhsh g Jiosh kownaltalig. Tsh heg hekaj am ha ahgi g Jesus ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga
k hab kaij: “Hema o d sha s-has ha'ichu ith eda ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kum am waith mehk jewed amjed mamt wo kownalch.
T pi koi him k ab i ha wai g wehst-mahm e-pionag k wehsijj g hemako ohla lial ab i ha mahkhi mat wo hekaj k am wo i mu'ithaj mat am wo i hih.
K eda mu'ijj pi hohho'ith g wehmaj o'othham ch am ha'i i e chuhcha mat am wo hihim k hab wo chei mo pi hohho'ith mat d wo ha-kownaligk ihtha o'othham.

“Kumt wa woho hab juh hegai s-has ha'ichu o'othham mamt kownalch. T am i uhpam jiwia k am ha hekaj ha wai hegam e-pionag mat am wo thatha k am wo e ah mat he'ekia i thahm nahto g lial heg amjed mat wa ab ha mah.
“K g wehpegkam hab kaij am jiwiak, ‘Ni-kownalig, wehst-mahm lial ant nahto am thahm hegai hemako mapt ni-mah.’
“K hab kaij g ahmoj, ‘S-ap apt hab e juh k d si s-wagimakam ni-pionag. Bant wo m-juh mapt wehst-mahm kihhim wo nuhkuth napt pi s-ap nuhkuth g al chu'uchum ha'ichu.’
“K hema ep hab epai kaij am jiwiak. ‘Ni-kownalig, hetasp lial ant nahto am thahm hegai hemako mapt ni-mah.’
“K ith hab ahg g ahmoj, ‘Bant wo m-juh mapt hetasp kihhim wo nuhkuth.’
“K hema ep hab epai kaij am jiwiak. ‘Ni-kownalig, m ia kahch g m-lialiga. Gd ant hu si wuh pa-nihtha ch ed k gd hu si ehsto.
S-m-ehbith ani heg hekaj map s-ta ke'ithama. Am ap wabsh u'u hegai map haschu pi chikpan ch am bahbhiam hegai ha'ichu bahithag mo pi d m-esha.’

“K hab kaij g ahmoj ab wui, ‘Hegai map has i kaij ant hab masma wo m-mohto'i g chu'ichig, ahpi s-padmakam pion. S-mahch apki mani s-ta ke'ithama ch wabsh u'u hegai mani haschu pi chikpan ch ab i bahbhiam hegai ha'ichu bahithag mo pi d ni-esha.
Pegih neh, pt haschu ahgk pi am hu cheh g ni-lialiga wahnko ch ed mant ab uhpam wo ui wehnadk hegai mat haschu ab mahmadt.’
k hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui hegam mo am gegok, ‘Gam g wo si wohppo'ith hegai lial k heg wo mah mat g wehst-mahm lial nahto.’
“K hab kaij ihtham ab wui, ‘T-kownalig, heki o hu wehst-mahm lialiga.’

“Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, ‘Pi at has e juh nat pi ba'ich ha'ichu ab ep wo i nei hegai mat s-ap wo nuhkuth g e-nuhkutha. T wabshaba wo e wohppo'ithach mo he'es al i chum nuhkuth hegai mat pi ap wo nuhkuth.
Kumt ab wo i ha u'u k wo ha koktha am ni-tahgio hegam ni-obga mo chum pi tatchua mant d wo ha-kownaligk,’ bo kaij g ha-ahmo ith eda ha'ichu ni-ahga.”
Kutsh gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Jesus Jerusalem wui. Sh g Jesus am ha ba'ich him.
Kush gohk al kihhimag ch hab chehgig Bethphage ch Bethany ch ab hugithaj ab g Olive U'us Kawulk. Tsh gohk am ha cheha g e-chuhchai
k hab ha ahg, “Am g wo hihim heg wui kihhim m am mia kehk k am wo i wahp. T am wo hema e wulshch g wechij wuhlu mat koi sha'i e chesh. Ith amt wo wul'ok k ab wo i wanim.
Kutp hema wo sha em-kakke mams haschu ahgk wul'o, mt hab wo ah mani ahni em-mashchamtham tatchua.”
Kutsh wa woho am hihi hegam gohk. Kutsh hab masma hab e juh mash hab ha ahgith g Jesus.
Kush am wupul'ok hegai wuhlu. Sh hab kaij g enigakam mas haschu ahgk am wul'o.
Sh hab kaij hegam, “T-mashchamtham o tatchua.” Kutsh ha hiwigi.
Tsh gm hu i wanim g wuhlu Jesus wui k an toa g e-liliwa wuhlu thahm k an i cheshaj g Jesus.
Kush am him cheshajch. Sh ihtham g e-liliwa am i to'ahim wohg oithk.

Sh am i aihim g Jerusalem. K g wohg am agshp i huduni ab amjed g Olive U'us Kawulk. Sh mu'i hemajkam an ha wehgaj ch ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab si ihm si s-kaitham heg hekaj si ge'e ha'ichu mo neithchkahim ch hab kaij:
“Jiosh at wo s-m-ho'ige'el ahpi mapt ia jiwia wehhejed.
Sh am ha'i gegok g Palasi ch hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Ha mashchamtham, ha g chehani mat wo ha'asa hab chei.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, matp ihtham wo ha'asa hab chei, kut chum hems g hohothai si s-kaitham ab wo ihmath g Jiosh ni-hekaj.”
Sh am i aihi g Jerusalem. Kutsh shosha g Jesus
k hab kaij, “Mat hu wo i s-mahchk g Jerusalem t am hemajkam ith i tashkaj mat has wo e juh k wo e tho'ibia.
Ab o him g tash mat wo ha biha g ha-obga k wo ka kuh
k s-ap wo ha hugio wehsijj hegam mat am wo ha'ichugk k wehs wo wuahawua g kihhim. K pi sha'i mahch mat ithani wo chum ha tho'ibia g Jiosh.”
Kutsh am hahawa hih g Jesus k gd hu jiwia ge'e cheopi t am. Sh eda am ha'i thadha ge'e cheopi wehgaj ch am ha'ichu gagda. Kutsh gm hu si i ha wuwhas

hab kaijch ab ha wui, “Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mo hab kaij g Jiosh: ‘Ahni o d ni-wehhejedkam ihtha ge'e cheopi. T ab wui wo hihimath g hemajkam ch ab wo si has ni-elithath.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh. Kumt eda an be k am eda hab wabsh wua g hejel e-tatchui ch chum hems ha'ichu s-a'agi ha ehsith ab ha wui ha'ichu gagdach.”
Kush wehs tashkaj am ha mashcham g Jesus ge'e cheopi ch ed. Sh hegam u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ch ha wanimedtham g hemajkam chum s-mu'amk.
Sh wabshaba g hemajkam chum hekith ab si kaiham. Kush heg hekaj pi e nakog hegam mash chum s-mu'amk.
Sh am hu hebai g Jesus am ha mashcham g hemajkam ge'e cheopi ch ed ch am ha ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kutsh am thatha g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham ha wehm g ge'eged
k hab kaij ab wui, “Thohp hab chum elith map ab amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag ch am hab ha'ichu wua. Oi g am t-ahgith.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni wehpeg ab epai ha'ichu wo em-kakke. Am g wo ni-ahgith
mams hedai hab elith mat ab mah g Johnbad g gewkthag mat wo ha pahl wapko. Nat g Jiosh ab mah aha nat wabsh g o'othham?”
Kush ihtham am wabsh hejel si a'aga ch hab kaij, “Shahtt hig wo chei? T ab wo t-kakke matt haschu ahgk pi ab hu wohoch mattp hab wo chei mo ab Jiosh amjed u'ukch g gewkthag.
T g hemajkam wo t-ma'ichshul mattp hab wo chei mo ab wabsh o'othham amjed u'ukch. Mu'ijj o hab elith mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa uhpam i e nohnogi Jesus wui k hab kaij, “Pi ach sha'i mahch mas hedai amjed ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo em-ahgi mani hedai amjed u'ukch g ni-gewkthag ch hab wua wehs ihtha.”

Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch am hahawa ha ahgith g hemajkam ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga hab kaijch: “Neh, matp hems hema am ei g uhdwis e-oith ed k hab hahawa i e ah mat gm hu hasko mehk wo him k pi oi wo jiwia. Kut ha'i wo nuhkuthath g oithaj ch wo namkith hegai mo haschu ab d i chum wuikamaj. Pegih, t am ha shulig k gm hu hih.
Kut am i e ai mat wo bai g uhdwis. T am hema cheha g e-pionag mat am wo him k ab wo i u'ithk g wuikamaj. T wabshaba g nuhkuththam gewichkwua g piongaj k pi ha'ichu sha'i mah. Kut gm hu uhpam hih.
“T g enigakam hema ep cheha g e-pionag mat am wo hih. T ith ep gewichkwua g nuhkuththam k si s-ta edam sho'igchuth k pi ha'ichu sha'i mah. T gm hu uhpam hih.
“T g enigakam hema ep cheha mat am wo hih. T hab wa'ap s-ko'okam has juh k gm hu si wuhshath.
“K hab hahawa kaij g uhdwis oithag enigakam, ‘Neh, si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ant wo cheha mat am wo hih. Heg at hemho ab wo wa has el.’
“T heg gn hu hih. T wabshaba ab i nei hegam nuhkuththam k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, ‘Ith o d enigakam alithag. Tt hig wo mua. T d wo t-enigak g uhdwis oithag.’
T wa woho hab e juh k gm hu si i wuhshath ab amjed g uhdwis oithag k am i mua.” K hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus,
“Neh, nat hig pi woho wo ha koktha g oithag enigakam k am ha'i ep wo ha hiwigi mat wo nuhkuth.” Tsh am i kah ihtha g hemajkam k hab kaij, “Ih, pi at woho hab wo e juh hegai map am t-ahgith.”

Kush ab si ha neith g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Woho at hab wo e juh. K g Jiosh o'ohana am tashogith mamt hab wa masma wo s-ni-ohhoth. Ith o hab ahgch hab chu'ig g wepogitha ahga Jiosh o'ohana ed: Kihttham at wo chum hema s-ohhotham g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana.

Kut wo e sho'igch hegam mat pi wo ni-amich. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e keiko hothai t ab. Kut wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag hegam mat wo s-ni-ohhoth. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat g hothai ab ha ab wo gehsh k am wabsh wo s-ha wia.”

Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch hegam hab ha ahg chehanig ha mashchamtham ch u'ugchu papal. Kutsh hegam heg hekaj wabsh chum si s-behim. Sh wabshaba mu'ijj g hemajkam ab si has elith g Jesus. Sh ihtham ha mashchamtham ch papal s-ha ehbith ch pi am hu be

k wabsh am s-nen'oith mat am wo ha ap'et. Tp hems ha'ichu hab wo chei mat heg ab wo abchuth k an wo be k am wo i thagito kownal wui. Tsh heg hekaj ha'i ha namkith mat am wui wo hihim k ab wo ha'ichu kakke k wo heki himch.
Sh hab kaij ihtham ab wui, “Ha mashchamtham, s-mahch ach map wabsh chum hedai ha mashcham g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh himthag, chum as has wo chei hedai i.
Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi maps has elith g ge'e kownal kowlanta. No hig t-hiwgith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo matt wo ha namkith aha no pi t-hiwgith?”
Sh wabshaba g Jesus s-ha amichuth mo g pi ap'ekam hab elith ch hab ha ahg,

“Ab g wo hema ni-chehgith hegai lial mam hekaj ha namkith.” Kumtsh ab hema chehgi. Kush hab ha ahg. “Am g wo ni-ahgith mo hedai wuhiosha ch hedai chehgig ab o'ohadag ith ab lial?” Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai mo d uhgchu t-kownalig.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, ab g wo i thagito kownal wui hegai matp d enigaj k am epai wo i thagito Jiosh wui mo haschu d epai enigaj.”
Kutsh pi e nako ihtham mas wo heki himch am ha tahgio g hemajkam k oi wa am wabsh i pi has kaij ch si has i el mat has masma ab i nodagi g ha-kakkei.
Tsh am ha'i thatha Jesus wui hegam mash hab e a'aga Sajusi. Ihtham o d ha wohochuthadag mat g Jiosh pi ep wo ha chegitoich g ko'i. Sh ab kakke ihtham ch hab kaij,

“Ha mashchamtham, an o hab chu'ig ihtha chehanigaj g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed ch hab chu'ig matsh g oithchkam wehngaj hegai mat wo muh pi ha a'aligak hemho wo wa bei g hohnigaj g e-wehnagbad. Tsh g a'aligaj hab masma wo e kuint mat d wo a'aligajk hegai mat muh.
Pegih, k am hu hebai wewa'ak d e-wepngam. Kut g si ge'echu ge hohnt k pi ha a'alithtok am i muh.
T g oithchkam an bei ihtha uwi k hab wa'ap muh.
T amjed g waikkokam an be k hab wa'ap muh. T wehsijj hab e juh ihtham wewa'ak mat pi ha a'alithtok ko'o k huhug.
T gm hu si ha oithk heg ep muh uwi.
Pegih, k ihtham wehsijj hohnigkahim. Kut hedai d wo hohnigk matp g ko'i ep wo i wuwha?”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ia o wa'i e hohont g hemajkam jewed thahm.

K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig an Jiosh kihthag ed. Jiosh at uhpam wo ha chegitoich g e-tho'ibiakam k am wo i ha wahpki e-kihthag ed. T hahawa pi wo e hohontath ch pi wo ko'oth hab masma mo g anghil hab chu'ig.

Mosesbad atki wa an o'oha mash wa g Jiosh am e chehgith wui heg hekaj sha'i mash meihith ch pi meitto. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh: Ahni ani d ha-Jioshga hegam Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Neh, ith o hab kaij g Jiosh, chum as heki hu koi, no pi am e wehm ha nuhkuth ch ab uhpam wo i ha wuwhas muhkig amjed.
Pi amt wabsh woho wo i huhug am i ko'ok matp g Jiosh d em-Jioshga.” Neh, bash kaij g Jesus.
Kush ha'i hegam mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham ab neneok ch hab kaij, “S-ap apt hab chei, ha mashchamtham.”
Tsh amjed pi hedai e nako mas ab ha'ichu ep wo kakke.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Am g wo oithahim mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Bo e a'aga matsh d wo amjedkamk hegai t-kownaligbad mash hab chehgig David.
Kush wa eda g Davidbad hab a'aga ‘ni-kownalig’ natsh o'oha ihtha mo an hab chu'ig ne'i ed heg eda Jiosh heki hu o'ohana: Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-kownalig wui: In g thahiwua s-apkojed ni-hugith an.
Kunt wo ha gewito g m-obga mat ab wabsh s-ap wo m-wechok.
Neh, namt hig s-ap wo ah mat has masma d wo Davidbad amjedkamk ihtha mash d kownaligaj?”
Kush wehsijj ab si kaiham g Jesus hegam mu'i hemajkam. Kush ab ha ahgith g e-chuhchai ch hab kaij,

“Hegam mo d chum chehanig em-mashchamtham o am si s-apko thadhaiwup cheopi ch ed ch ge'e gegosig ch ed. Si o s-kehg e enigadath ch an oiopo no pi tatchua mamt ab wo si has ha elithath. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi hab wo masmak mo hegam.

Chum as si chew e ho'ige'ithahun am em-tahgio ch eda ha'ichu s-a'agi ha wohppo'ith hegam mo d hehe'ejel wi'ikam. T g Jiosh ba'ich i s-ko'okam wo ha namkith heg hekaj pi ap ha-chu'ichig no pi wabsh pehegia e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab wua ihtha pi ap'ekam.”
Sh am hu hebai thadha ihtham Jesus mash am e shulig g ha-mahkigdag am wehhejed g ge'e cheopi. Kush g s-kakais mu'i am shulig g lial.
Tsh am hema jiwia g al sho'igkam oks mash d hejel wi'ikam k atsh gohk s-o'amchu am shul. Kush am neith g Jesus
ch hab ha ahg g e-chuhchai, “Neh, ihtha al sho'igkam oks at ba'ich i ge'e mahkigdag hab juh mo hegam s-kakais.
Hegam o ab wabsh mahk hegai mo haschu i pi tatchua no pi wabsh s-lialiga. T wabshaba ihtha al oks wehs mah mo haschu al i edgith mat hekaj wo chum kihthagk.”
Kush am ha'i neneok ab amjed g ge'e cheopi ch am a'aga mo si s-kehg hab mahs ch si s-kehg hohothaikaj hab junis ch si s-kehg mahkigdagkaj e heosith. Sh hab kaij g Jesus,
“Heu'u. Nt wabshaba wo si shel em-ahgi mo e aihim mat wehs wo i e shul ihtha mam neith.”
Sh g chuhchaij ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Hekith at hab wo i e juh ihtha? Kut haschu d wo chehgithak matt heg ab wo s-mahchk mo e aihim matki am hab wo e juh?”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo s-e nen'oithath ch pi am hu wo e iattogi. Mu'i at an wo i wuwha a'ahithag oitham k ni-wepo wo e chehcheg hab kaijch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha ch hab wo chei mat e ai g tash. Pi g am hu wo i ha oith ihtham.

An at wo kaitha mo am hahasko a'ai e cheggia g jejewed. Kumt wabshaba pi heg hekaj wo e kudutath, chum as hems wo wohok. Hemho wa at hab wo mahsk ha'ichu wehpeg. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat e ai mat wo huhug g jewed.
Jejewed at ab a'ai wo i e cheggia.
T an a'ai hab wo e juh mat g jewed sha'i s-ta ehbitham wo u'ugij. T g bihugig wo gehsh k g s-cheawagig ab wo i hih. S-ta ehbitham ha'ichu at am wo i e chehgi ab thahm kahchim t amjed.
“Mat koi hab wo e juh ihtha, kumt an wo em-u'u k wo em-sho'igchuth k am wo em-u'apa chechopi ha wui k wo em-kuh. Kumt wo e lothai am ha tahgio g kokownal nam pi ab s-ni-wohochuth.
Ith at am wo em-ap'et mamt am wo ah g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
Pi g am heki hu wo e kudutath heg hekaj mamt has wo chei hejel e wehhejed.
Ab ant wo em-mah g ne'oki ch amichuthadag. Kut pi wo e nako g em-obga mas ab wo wui kekiwua mamt has wo chei.
Em-jehj ch em-wepnag ch em-hajuni ch em-naipijju at am wo i em-thagito ha wui g haha'ichu. Kumt ha'ijj wo e ko'ij.
Mu'ijj at wo s-em-keh'el nam pi ab ni-hiwig.
Mt wabshaba s-ap am wo gahi wuwha mamtp has wo i em-juh
k wabsh wo s-ha bahbgi. T g Jiosh wo em-tho'ibia.
“Shonthal at an wo biha g Jerusalem. Kumt hab wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mat oi wo e padch g kihhim.

Hemho wa at am wo ahhio thohtha'ag wui hegam mat am wo ha'ichugk Judea chekshani ch ed. T hegam mo am ha'ichug Jerusalem kihhim t am hemho wa wo ahhio ab amjed. Kut hegam mo gm hu wabsh jegko kih pi am hu wo i wahp kihhim ch ed
nat pi wo e ai mat wo s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jiosh k am wo wohokamch wehs hegai mo an o'ohanas o'ohanaj ed.

Ih sho'ig! S-ta at ehbitham wo mahsk am ha wehhejed hegam mat wo chu'uchum mahmadk ch hegam mat wabsh wo kia wo'ok g ali. Ab at wo i hih g ge'e sho'igthag ith thahm jewed. T g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag ab wo gei ha ab ihtham hemajkam heg hekaj ha-chu'ichig.

Mt wo ha'i ha koktha k wo ha'i ha lilsochuth k gm hu wo i ha ui mehk jewed wui. Kut g gawul mahs hemajkam an wo bei ihtha Jerusalem k ia wo i e chiwiadath am hugkam mat wo kuhgit g ha-ap'ethag g gawul mahs hemajkam.

“T wo e u'ugij mo haschu an hab chu'ig t-thahm. Kut s-ta ehbitham hab wo e juh g tash ch mashath ch huhu'u k wo thagito g e-wopogga. Kut g ge shuhthagi an wo wewgath ch an wo to'otonkath. T ith wehs wo chehgi mat ge'e ha'ichu hab wo e juh wehsko jewed thahm. T g hemajkam wo si s-ehbithath wehs jejewed ch ed ch wo s-e chuhug nat ge wo mahchk mat haschu has wo e juh.
Kunt ab hahawa si s-masma wo i hud chewagi ch ed ab Jiosh kihthag amjed ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut am wo e maskogi g ni-gewkthag.
