Bat masma wo e chehgi mo ab e aihim g ha-tho'ibiathag hegam mat ab wo ni-hiwgath. Kut heg hekaj wo chum si s-ap e taht mat hekith wo i shonwua ihtha mani em-ahgith.”
Tsh amjed g Jesus am ha ahgi ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha ahga, “Neh, mt wo s-mahchk mo g toniabkam e aihim mamt wo nei mat g suhna je'e ch nahnko mahs u'us ab wo i i'iwgi.
K hab wa masma hab mahs mamt wo nei mat hab wo e juh ihtham mani am heki hu em-ahgith k wo s-mahchk mo e aihim mant ep wo jiwia.
“Neh, hegam mat wo nei ihtha mani em-ahgith at d wabsh wo kia thothakamk jewed thahm mat hekith wehs am hab wo e juh.
Wehs am gm hu hab wo i e juh ihtha Jiosh nahtoi mam in neith. T wabshaba g ni-ne'oki pi hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh.

“Si g wo s-e nen'oithath mat haha wabsh wo em-ai hegai tash. Mt am hu pi wo mahchk. Pi g am wo sha'i e hiwgith mamt wabsh si mu'i ha'ichu k ed wo e nakogath ch wo si e gegosithath ch wo nawkko'oth ch g e-kihthagkaj wo e kudutath.
Hegai tash at am hab haha wabsh wo si e juh wehs hemajkam ha tahgio.

Mt wo si s-e nen'oithath ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath chum hekith mamt ab wo u'ukch g gewkthag ch s-ap am gahi wo wuhsh wehs ihtha mat am hab wo e juh. Nt pi an hu ha'ichu wo em-abch ahni Jiosh si Kehsha mamt hekith wo ha lothai g hemajkam.”

Sh g Jesus wehs tashkaj am ha mashcham ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kush mu'ijj am wui thaiw wabsh i sisi'alimath mat ab wo kaiha. Sh am i huhuduk, sh gm hu hihhim ihtham Jesus Olive U'us Kawulk wui ch am koksho.
Sh am i e aihim mash eda e wushshath matsh wa g Jiosh ha tho'ibia g ha-shohshonbad. Sh heg eda pi e ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas.
Sh g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham am wabsh s-a'agi e nakog matsh wo mua g Jesus ch wabshaba s-ha ehbith g hemajkam.
Kutsh g ge Jiawul Satan an bei g Judas Iscariot.
Tsh ith am i ha thagito hegam Jesus k am him k am ha wehm a'aga g u'ugchu papal ch ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam ha-ge'ege'ejig mat has masma am wo i thagito g Jesus ha wui.
Tsh si s-hohho'i ihtham k ab si ahgi mat wo namkith.
Tsh amjed am i e nako g Judas mat am wo neithath mat s-a'agi wo gagda g Jesus ab ha wui. T pi wo mahchk g hemajkam ab amjed.
Tsh am hahawa s-ap i e ai hegai ha-shohshonbad ha-tho'ibiathag piast. Kush d wehpeg tash matsh eda wo e koktha g kahwal mahmad.
Sh g Jesus hab ha ahg g Peter ch John. “Am g wo hihim k am wo i ap'ech g t-gegosig matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.”
Kush hab kaij hegam, “Bahtt hab wo juh g t-gegosig?”
Sh hab kaij, “Neh, am amt wo hihi Jerusalem wui. T ab hema wo himath g cheoj ch wo wa'igchugath ab ha'a t ab. Kumt am wo i oi. Kut am hu hebai wo him k am wo i wah hema kih ed.
Kumt hab wo chei ab wui g kihkam, ‘Neh, s-mahchimk o g t-mashchamtham mas an hebai i ha wi'is matt wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.’
Kut am wo hema em-chehgi g kih. T ith gn hu ha-kih thahm hab wo chu'igk ch wo ge'ejk ch am wo apchuthask. Kumt an ha'ab wo i ap'ech g t-gegosig”
Kutsh wa woho am hihi ihtham kihhim wui. Tsh wa woho s-ap am hab e juh mash has i ha ahg. Kutsh am i ap'ech g gegosig.
Tsh am i hud. Kutsh am hahawa thatha hegam ha'i. Tsh g Jesus am i thahiwua mihsa wui. Tsh g chuhchaij am ep thadhaiwua.
Kush hab kaij ab ha wui, “Si ani tatchua mant wo em-wehm huh ihtha gegosig mant koi wo ni-muhkith
nant pi pi hekith ia hu em-wehm ep wo huh ihtha hab mahs gegosig. T wabshaba ab wo e ai mat wo s-ap e nahto g em-tho'ibiathag. Kumt an wo ni-wehmajk thahm kahchim ch ed.”
Mtsh ab hahawa mah g nawait am tahsa ch ed. Kutsh ab i ho'ige'el g Jiosh k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ab g wo beh'i ihtha k wehsijj ab wo ha ih.
Neh, ahni ant pi hekith ab hu ep wo ih ihtha uhdwis wadag k ab wo ai mat wo e nahto g Jiosh kownaltalig.”

Neh, bash kaij ch am hahawa bei g chemait k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k am i hahain k hab kaij, “Tho ni-honshpadag ihtha mant am i em-hahaini. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith am em-wehhejed. Ab g wo huhgi ihtha hahainig k ith chum hekith am hab wo junihith mamt hekaj wo s-ni-chegitok.”

Tsh ab hahawa ep ha mah g wasib k hab kaij, “Tho ni-eh'ed ihtha nawait. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua mat hekaj am hab wo e juh hegai mo wa g Jiosh hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni.
“Neh, hegai mat wo ni-gagda o ia ni-wehm thaha mihsa wui.
Bant wa masma wo ni-muhkith mat has masma g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat g si Kehshaj wo e muhkith. T wabshaba wo si s-ko'okam e namkith hegai mat wo ni-gagda.”
Tsh ab ha hekaj a'ai i e kakke mas hedai wud wok ch hab wo e juh.
Kush am e ne'owin hegam Jesus chuhchai am a'agathch mas hedai d wo si ha'ichuk am ha shahgith.

Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, ab am si e ha'ichuchuth hab sha masma mo g kokownal. S-mahch am mo hegam si s-gewkam an ha u'ukch g e-hemajkamga. Kut hemho wa am hab wo junihith mo haschu ab ha chehani. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma am wo ha thahmkath g e-wehm wohochuththam. Si amt s-hemajim am wo i ha wehmtath. Hegam kokownal o tatchua mat g hemajkam hab wo ha elithath mo ge'e ha'ichu hab ha junith. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma hab wo e elithath mam ge'e ha'ichu hab ha junith g hemajkam.
Aha nam hig hab chum e elith mam d ha-a'amo ch am wo thadhaiwua mat g em-pionag wo em-gegos? Ni eda ahni pi hab masma hab ni-wua, chum anis d em-kownalig ch wabshaba heg ni-wepogith mani d em-pionag.
“Ahpim amt pi hekith sha'i ni-thagito am oitham g ha'ichu ni-nakogig,
Kunt heg hekaj wo em-kokownalch hab masma mat g ni-ohg Jiosh ni-kownalch.
Mt am ni-wehm wo e gegosithath ni-kownaltalig ed. Kunt hab wo em-juh mamt d wo u'usagakamk am ha thahm hegam gamai gohk kawod thakam Tutuligo hemajkam.”

Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui, “Ih, Simon, Jiosh at wo hiwigi g ge Jiawul mat wehsijj wo em-a'appe hab sha masma mat g pilkani hihktham wo nehnich g e-hihka k gm hu wo i gawulkai g mohgaj. Jiawul o hab chum e ahg mat gm hu hab wo i em-juh hab masma mo g mohg.
Nt wabshaba ab i tai g Jiosh mat wo i gewkaj g m-wohochuthadag, Simon. Kupt am wo i ha gewkemhu g e-wehm wohochuththam mapt hekith ab uhpam wo i e nodagi ni-wui.”
Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Ni-kownalig, ni-nahtokch ani mant wo ni-kuhpachuth k wo ni-muhkith m-wehm.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, Peter, pi at koi am hu wo kuhu g keli chuchul ith i chuhug ab, kupt waikko hab wo chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch.”
Sh hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Neh, namd ha'ichu i pi edagi mam wa ahgachug g ha'ichu ni-ahga pi u'uk g e-lial kokstal o g limoshana kokstal o g shuhshk?” Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi ha'ichu.”
Sh hab hahawa ha ahg, “Mt wabshaba hemu an wo u'ath g e-lial kih ch e-is-pahyo chum ams hems wo gagda g e-lihwa k hekaj wo hema ha nolawt g is-pahyo.
Hemho wa at am hab wo e juh ihtha mo ab ni-amjed o'ohanas ch hab chu'ig: Bamt masma ab wo mohto'i g chu'ichig g Jiosh si Kehsha mamt g pi ap hemajkam.”
Sh hab kaij hegam chuhchaij, “Pegih, t-kownalig, m ia gohk wehch g i'is-papayo.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Neh, e at ai matt wo hihi.”
Tsh amjed gm hu hih g Jesus Olive U'us Kawulk t ab mash hab wa e wua. Kutsh oi hegam chuhchaij.
Tsh am i thatha amai. Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am g wo e ho'ige'ithahun mamt s-ap wo nako g e-a'appema.”
Neh, tsh am hahawa ha thagito k am ba'ich sha'i him k am tonwua k e ho'ige'ithahun
hab kaijch, “Ni-ohg, matp am wo s-ap'ek, pt gm hu hab hig wo i juh hegai si s-ko'ok sho'igthag mo ab ni-wui him. Kuni eda tatchua mat ahpi g m-tatchui hab wo e juh.” [
Tsh am haha wabsh hema jiwia g anghil ab wui k ab si i gewkaj.
Kutsh si e kudut k am ba'ich haha wabsh si e ho'ige'ithahu. Kush g wahudthaj am e iawua jewed thahm k d wabsh eh'ed.]
Tsh am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun k am hih mash am thadha hegam chuhchaij. Kush am kohksh nash pi wabsh i ha ba'iwich g pi ap tahhathkam.
Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Shahchu am ahgch kohksh? Ab g wo nehnen k wo e ho'ige'ithahu mamt s-ap wo nako g e-a'appema.”
Sh am wabsh kia neok. Sh ab ha'i ge hihim g hemajkam. Kush heg ha wanimed Judas mash d chum hema kehshaj g Jesus ch ab wui i hih matsh ab wo chintath.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Ih, Judas, pt wo ni-gagda ab ni-chintathk ahni Jiosh si Kehsha!”
Tsh am i nei hegam ha'i Jesus chuhchai mo haschu has e wua k hab kaij, “T-kownalig, natt wo ha cheggia g i'is-papayokaj?”
Kutsh hema ab si i widu g is-pahyo k g uhgchu pahl neholiga nahk an si hikuch.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g wo wa i ha'asa,” k an taht ihtha cheoj nahk k thoaj.

Tsh am wui thatha g u'ugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuththam ha-ge'ege'ejig ch g ge'eged mat an wo bei. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Bamki ni-elith mani d s-chu ehskam ch hab ia thatha u'ukch g i'is-papayo ch u'us.
Am ani em-wehm ha'ichug cheopi t am wehs tashkaj. Kumt pi an hu ni-bei. T wabshaba hemu am i em-ap'et. Pi ap'ekam at s-ap am hab wo e juh s-chuhugam k ed.”
Tsh an bei g Jesus k gm hu i bei uhgchu pahl kih wui. Sh g Peter ga hu wabsh mehkjed ha oith.
Kutsh eda am ge e nai kolhai ch ed. Kutsh am i jiwia g Peter k am ha wehm thahiwua hegam mo am thadha.
Kutsh am hema jiwia g chehia pion k am nei g Peter k ab si i neith k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o wa an wehmaj hegai mamt an bei.”
Tsh wabshaba pi mahch k e ah g Peter hab kaijch, “Pi ani sha'i mahch hegai.”
Sh am sha'i ha'as. Kutsh am hema ep cheh g Peter k hab kaij, “Ahpi ap d hema hegam Jesus.” Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Peter, “Ih, pi o woho.”
Sh am hu d i hemako ohla amjed. Kush hema o'othham am si e gewkaj ch hab kaij, “Woho o wa mo ihtha o'othham hab d wa'ap ha wehm o'othham noki pi ab d kihkam Galilee chekshani ch ed.”
Sh hab kaij, “Pi ani sha'i mahch maps haschu hab ahg.” Neh, sh am wabsh kia neok. Tsh g keli chuchul am si ku.
Kutsh ab si e sikolkai g Jesus k ab si i nei g Peter. Tsh am wabsh si chegito g Peter g jesus ne'oki mo wa hab kaij, “Koi at wo kuhu g keli chuchul, kupt waikko hab wo wa'i chei map pi ni-mahch.”
Tsh gm hu hahawa i wuhsh g Peter k si pi ap e tahtk ch shoak.
Sh hegam mash am nuhkuth g jesus nahnko ahg ch an si ma'ish k wuh g wuhpuij
k ab si shonikkash ch hab ahg, “Am g hig t-ahgith mas hedai ab m-shonikka.”
Kush mu'i nahnko ep s-ko'okam ahg.
Tsh am i mahsi. Kutsh am e nam hegam ge'eged ch u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham mash d e jehnigiththam. Kumtsh am ha wui u'apa g Jesus.
Sh ihtham hab kaij, “Am g t-ahgith maps d Jiosh si Kehsha.” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt woho ab hu wo ni-wohoch mantp am wo em-ahgi mani hedai wud.
Kumt pi woho ab hu wo i nodagi hegai mantp haschu wo em-kakke.
Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mant i'ajed an s-apkojed hugithaj an wo thak g Jiosh ahni si Kehshaj.”
Kush wehsijj hab kaij, “A kuptp d Jiosh alithag?” Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Thani ahni.”
Sh hab kaij hegam, “Neh, pi ach sha'i hema tatchua mat wo si s-mahch k ah. Ahchim ach hejel kah mo si pi ap neok ab Jiosh t amjed ch hekaj wo chum e muhkith.”
Kutsh wehsijj hegam haha'ichu ab si e wehmt k am i bei g Jesus heg wui mash d kownal am Judea chekshani ch ed ch hab chehgig Pilate.

Sh ab ha kaiham. Kush ab wui ab ha'ichu abchuthahim g Jesus hab kaijch, “Neh, ihtha o'othham o im hu hab wabsh i ha wawan g t-hemajkamga hab ha ahgch mat pi wo namkith g ge'e kownal. Kuch kah mo hab hejel e ahg mo d jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhg kownal. Kupt hemho wa wo mua.”
Kush ab kakke g Pilate g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Nap d ha-kownalig g Tutuligo hemajkam?” Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni.”

Tsh g Pilate am i mamche hegai mam ab abchuth. Sh eda mu'i an oiopo g hemajkam s-neithamk mo has e wua. Tsh g Pilate am ha kaichuthk hab ha ah g u'ugchu papal, “Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas pi ap hab juh ihtha o'othham mat heg hekaj wo e muhkith.”
Kush wabshaba ba'ich i e gewpkath ch hab kaij, “Am o ha chu'amun g t-wehm o'othham ha'ichu ha mashchamch wehsko ga hu Galilee t amjed ch ia Judea ch ed ch chum hems iia Jerusalem ch ed.”
Tsh am i kah g Pilate ihtha k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Kutp ab Galilee chekshani ch ed d kihkam ihtha o'othham?”
Kumsh am ahgith mash am ha'ab d kihkam. Sh g Herod am d ha-kownalig Galilee chekshani ch ed ch ia'i ithani am hab wa'ap ha'ichug Jerusalem t am. Kumtsh heg hekaj am wui u'apa g Jesus.
Kush si s-hehgig g Herod nash pi tash wa'i chum s-neithamk hab chum e ahgch matp hems am tahgio hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu.
Kumtsh am kei tahgio. Kush mu'i ha'ichu kakke. Sh wabshaba pi has sha'i kaij g Jesus.
Kush g u'ugchu papal ch chehanig ha mashchamtham am gegok ch si s-gewkam ab ha'ichu abchuth g Jesus.
Sh g Herod g e-shonthalig ha wehm haha wabsh nahnko ahg g Jesus ch si ash k ash g si s-kehg kahba ab wahki. Tsh ab hahawa ha cheha g Herod mat wo uhpam bei am Pilate wui.
Kutsh heg i tash ab g Pilate ch Herod ab hahawa e nawojt k ash eda chum s-e keh'ith.
Tsh g Pilate am i ha hemapai g u'ugchu papal ch ha wanimedtham g hemajkam

k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ia amt u'apa ihtha o'othham ni-wui hab kaijch mo go'olko ha wanimed g hemajkam. Kunt hemuch ia em-kaichuthk am i mamche hegai mam ab abchuth k pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas pi ap hab junihim.
Kutsh Herod hab wa'ap pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh. T g shonthaligaj ab uhpam i u'apa t-wui. Pi atki ha'ichu hab juh ihtha mas heg hekaj wo e muhkith.
Kunt wabsh wo ha cheha mat wo gewittan k wo thagito.” [
Neh, bash kaij nash pi am hema i thathagitosh g lihso ha wehhejed wehs ahith ab mo eda hab e wua hegai ge'e gegosig.]
Kush wehsijj hegam mu'i hemajkam mo am ha'ichug si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Pi ach tatchua ihtha. Barabbas apt wo i thagito t-wehhejed.”
Sh eda ihtha Barabbas am e kuhpch nash pi chum ha'i ha wehm cheggia g kownal ch ha'i ha koktha.
Sh am ep chum ha wehm neok g Pilate nash pi chum s-thagitoimk g jesus.
Sh wabshaba am ep si s-kaitham hab ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!”
Sh hab ep chum kaij g Pilate, “A t haschu pi ap hab juh. Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas heg hekaj wo e muhkith. Ab ant wo ha cheha mat wo gewittan k wo thagito.”
Sh wabshaba am wabsh si s-kaitham hab kaij matsh ab wo naggia kots t ab. Neh, tsh g ha-hihinki gewito g Pilate.
Tsh am i ap'ech mat am hab wo e juh g ha-tatchui.
Kumtsh gm hu i wuhshath hegai mash d ha cheggiadkam ch d ha mu'akam k amtsh g Jesus am i thagito ha wui mat am hab wo juh mo has i elith.

Kumtsh gm hu i bei g Jesus ab kushwiotachuthk g kots. Kush am hu hebai hihim. Tsh ab hema i ha nam g o'othham mash ab him Jerusalem wui. Ith ash hab chehgig Simon ch ab d kihkam mash am d Cyrene ch ash ab him ga hu o'oithag amjed. Kumtsh am wabsh si be k ab kushwiotach g kots k atsh hab juh mat ab oithk wo himath g Jesus.
Kush mu'i hemajkam ab oithch hihim. Sh g u'uwi si shoanihim wehhejed.
Tsh ab i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g am ni-wehhejed wo shoanith, ahpim Jerusalem t am kihkam, ch wabshaba hejel e wehhejed ch e-a'aliga ha wehhejed.
Ab o him g tash mat hab wo chei g hemajkam mo si ha'ichu s-ha abamk hegam u'uwi mat pi hekith sha'i mahmadt.

Woho o wa mat s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu hab wo e juh am ni-tahgio. T wabshaba ba'ich i s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu hab haha wo juh am ha tahgio hegam mo d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ab hu ni-wui e nohnogimk. (30) Hegam at pi wo e nako mas heg wo nako k heg hekaj wo chum tatchua mat g thohtha'ag am ha thahm wo i shulig k wo ha ehsto.”
Kumsh gohk ep ha u'a mamtsh am wehmaj wo ha koktha. Sh ihtham d pi ap hehemajkam.
Kumtsh an thatha anai mash am hab e a'aga Koshwak. Tsh g shonthal ab hahawa sisish g Jesus kots t ab k am i kei g kots wag ch ed k gn hu a'ai hab wa'ap ha nahngia hegam pi ap hehemajkam kokots t ab.

Tsh ab hahawa e ho'ige'ithahu g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg Jiosh, ab g wabsh si i s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam mat ab ni-naggia. Pi o sha'i mahch mani d si m-Kehsha ch d s-ap'ekam.” Kutsh g shonthal am e chichwi k g wehschugaj e to'i.
Sh g hemajkam am gegok ch neith wehs ihtha. Sh g ha wanimedtham nahnko ahg g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Ha at tho'ibia ha'i, pegih, k hejel wo e tho'ibia matp d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kush g shonthal hab wa'ap nahnko wua ch hab wabsh s-junim k ab chum mah g nawait
ch wabsh nahnko ahg hab kaijch, “Oi g hejel e tho'ibiad napsh pi d ge kownal.”
Sh am thahm o'ohadag ihtha, “Ith o d Tutuligo hemajkam ha-kownalig.”

Kush hema hegam pi ap hehemajkam mash ab hab wa'ap naggia kots t ab ab si s-ko'okam has ahg g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Neh, kuptp d ge Jiosh si Kehsha, pegih, k wo hejel e tho'ibia k ahchim ep wo t-tho'ibia.”
Kush g hema ab si s-keh'ith ihtha ch hab kaij, “Aha nap pi ehbith g Jiosh. Ia ach t-wehm nahngia ch ab t-wepo mohto'ithas g chu'ichig.
Kuch ahchim s-ap ab mohto'ithas nach pi wa woho d pi ap chu'ijkam. Kutsh eda ihtha pi hab sha'i juh g pi ap'ekam.”
Neh, bash kaij ihtha hema ch ab Jesus wui hab hahawa ep kaij, “Jesus, ab apt wo wa al s-ni-chegitok hekith ab bek g e-kownaltalig.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, ni ab si m-ahgith mapt ith i tashkaj wo ni-wehmajk an Jiosh kihthag ed.”
Kutsh am i thahm juh. Tsh muh g tash k wehsko s-chuhugam ch ab ai g waik ohla.
Kutsh am ge'e cheopi ch ed g s-kowk ikus kuhpadag ab si shel e wantsh.
Kush am si s-kaitham e ho'ige'ithahun g Jesus Jiosh wui ch hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ab ant i m-mah g ni-thoakag.” Neh, bash che'iok am i muh.
Kutsh am i nei g shonthal ha-ge'ejig matsh haschu has e juh k ab si ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Woho oki d s-ap'ekam o'othham ihtha.”
Tsh amjed mu'ijj gm hu uhpam hihi hegam mash ab neith ab wabsh e wecho wahpkch nash pi oi wa si ap e tatat.
Kush wehsijj hegam mo si s-mahch g Jesus ga hu wabsh mehk gegok ch ab neith wehs ihtha. Ha'i ihtham ash d hegam u'uwi mash ga hu Galilee t amjed an wehmajkahim g Jesus.

Sh eda wa hema hegam e jehnigiththam chum pi hohho'ith matsh g wehmaj e jehnigiththam s-mu'am k ah g Jesus. Ith ash hab chehgig Joseph ch ab d kihkam mash am d Arimathea ch s-ap d o'othham ch ab nenida g Jiosh kownaltalig.
Tsh hekith am i muh g Jesus, tsh ha hekaj am wui hih g Pilate k ab si e sho'igchuth k tahni g honshpadaj. Tsh am wa ap'ech matsh wo bei.

Tsh gm hu ep him k ab i huduni. Sh am mia hab chu'ig g hiha'ini ch ab heki hu cheotas hothai ch ed ch pi koi e hekaj. Tsh g Joseph am i bei g honshpadag k gd hu heg eda cheh am i hobinodk g s-kehg ikuskaj.

Tsh hegam u'uwi mo wehmajkahim g Jesus ab Galilee t amjed gm hu oi g Joseph k ash neith mat hebai e cheh g Jesus k has masma ab e woi. (54) Kush d wialos. Sh g hemajkam chum e nakog no pi g shahwai d ha-mihshmetha tash.

Kutsh gm hu uhpam hihi ihtham u'uwi mash hebai thadha k am i ap'ech ha'ichu mat hekaj wo s-ap hab juh mo hab masma hab ha wua g e-ko'ithag k ash am hahawa e ulinihogi mihshmetha tash ch ed mo hab masma d ha-chehanig.
Sh am e aihim g thomig tash. Tsh am hihi ihtham u'uwi hiha'ini wui k ash u'a hegai matsh am nahto matsh hekaj wo i ap'ech g muhki.
Kush gm hu e melchuthas hegai ge'e hothai mash ab hekaj e kuhpch g hiha'ini.
Tsh am i wahp k pi sha'i edagi g muhki
k am wabsh i gegok pi amichuthch ihtha. Tsh am haha wabsh gohk i e chehgi ha wui mo hab sha mahs mo g o'othham. Kush wabsh si tonod g ha'ichu ha-eniga.
Kutsh si e totoths ihtham u'uwi k ab si i shul jewedo. Sh hab kaij ihtham gohk ab ha wui, “Shahchu am ahgch ia gahg hiha'ini t am hegai mo d thoakam?
Pi o ia hu ha'ichug g Jesus nat pi i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Am g wo i chegito mo wa has kaij ab em-wui. Am am wa wabsh kia ha'ichug Galilee t am.

K wa hab kaij, ‘Hemho ant am wo wa i ni-thagito pi ap'ekam hemajkam ha wui ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. T hegam ab wo ni-naggia kots t ab mat wo ni-mua. Nt wabshaba wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed am heg eda waik tash amjed.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jesus ab em-wui.”
Kutsh ihtham u'uwi am i chegito mash wa hab kaij g Jesus
k ga hu uhpam hihim k ash am ha ahgith hegam gamai hemako Jesus chuhchai ch wehs g ha'i mat has e juh.
Ha'i ihtham u'uwi mash am ha ahgith ash d Mary Magdalene ch Joanna ch hegai Mary mash g madaj hab chehgig James.
Kush hegam Jesus chuhchai pi ab hu ha wohochuth nash pi hab ha elith mo wabsh pi e mahch ch hab kaij.

Tsh wabshaba g Peter am i e nakog k am meh hiha'ini wui k gd hu meliw k am i koachsh. Kush heg am wa'i kahch s-kehg ikus mash heg hekaj chum e hobinodch. Tsh amjed gm hu uhpam hih am wabsh i pi amichuthch matsh haschu has e juh.
Kush heg wa'i tash gohkajj am hihim Emmaus kihhim wui. Ith amt ab wo ai kihhim am hu i gohk ohla ab am hihimathch Jerusalem t amjed.
Sh ihtham am hihimath ch neneok ab amjed hegai matsh haschu has e juh am tahgio g Jesus.
Tsh g Jesus am ha a'a k am ha wehm hih.
Kush hi wa chum neith ch wabsh pi amichuth.
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Shahchu am am si a'agath ch ia hihim?” Tsh am wabsh i gegokiwua k si pi ap e tahtkam mahs.
Sh hema ihtham hab chehgig Cleopas ch ith hab kaij ab wui, “Aha nap ahpi wa'i hejel pi mahch mat haschu has e juh hemuch hu'i ch eda am thaha Jerusalem t am?”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Shahchu ap hab ahg?” Kush hab kaij ihtha, “Hegai mat hab e juh am tahgio hegai mo hab chehgig Jesus ch ab d kihkam Nazareth t ab. Heg oki d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K wehsijj ab si has elith mo haschu hab junihim ch has i kaij.
Kut g u'ugchu papal ch t-wanimedtham am i thagito kownal wui mat wo mua. Kumt ab sisish kots t ab k mua.
Kuch eda ith hab chum si elith mo d hegai matsh wa wo t-tho'ibia ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam. K hemuch d i waik tash amjed mat hab e juh.
Kut am ha'i hihi g u'uwi t-wehm wohochuththam wabsh i si'alim
k atsh pi cheh g muhki k uhpam thatha k t-toths am t-ahgithch matsh am ha'i i e chehgi g anghil ha wui. Sh ihtham hab ha ahgith mo d thoakam g Jesus.
T am ha'i hihi g chechoj hiha'ini wui k am s-mai mash wa woho pi am hu ha'ichug g muhki mo hab chum kaij hegam u'uwi.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “S-wohom am hig pi ha'ichu a'amichuth ch pi wohochuth hegai mo wa g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am ahg.
No hig pi hab wa mahs mat hab masma wo e sho'igch g Jiosh si Kehsha k am wo i wah si s-kehg e-ap'ethag ed.”
Neh, bash kaij g Jesus ch amjed am i wuhshath k am tashogi wehs hegai matki g Mosesbad ch wehs hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha ab amjed.
Kutsh am hihim k am i aihi hegai al kihhim mo am wui d hihimtham. Sh gm hu wabsh i si him g Jesus.
Kush wabshaba an shoshobith ch hab kaij, “Ia apt wo wa'i jiwia t-wehm. Hudunihim o k ch ab i s-chuhugamhi.” Kutsh wa woho am ha wehm i jiwia.
Tsh am wo i gegos. Tsh am bei g chemait k am e ho'ige'ithahun k am hahawa hahain k ab ha mah.
Kutsh am hahawa i amich. Tsh wabshaba am wabsh i pi'ata.
Sh hab hahawa kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Neh, ab at wa si i t-shuhthath g s-ap tahhathkam mo wa ab t-wehm neokhim ch am tashogith g Jiosh o'ohana mach ab hihim wohg oithch.”
Tsh am ha hekaj i e nakog k gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui. Kush am e hemapathch hegam gamai hemako Jesus chuhchai ha'i ha wehm g e-wehm wohochuththam. Tsh am thatha ihtham gohk.
Kush hegam am ha ahgith ch hab kaij, “Neh, woho atki i wuhsh g t-kownalig Jesus ab muhkig amjed. Kutsh g Simon nei.”
Kush ihtham gohk am hahawa epai ha ahgith matsh haschu has e juh am wohg ch ed ch heg ehp matsh amich g Jesus matsh am hahai g chemait.
Sh am wabsh kia a'aga ihtha. Sh am haha wabsh kehk ha shahgith g Jesus ch ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am g wo s-ap e tahtkkath.”
Kutsh sha'i si e totoths hab em-ahgch mo d wabsh kok'oi.
Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi g wo sha'i e kudut k ab wabsh wo s-ni-wohochuthath.
Ab g wo i neith g ni-nohnhoi ch ni-tahtad k wo s-mai mani d ahni. Ab g wo ni-tahtam k wo nei mani pi d kok'oi. Kok'oi o pi ha chuhkug ch pi ha oh'o mani ahni hemuch imhab chu'ig.”
Kush hab che'iok ab ha chehgi g e-nohnhoi ch e-tahtad.
Kush chum si s-ap e tahtk ch wabshaba wabsh i haha'athka natsh pi wabsh i pi mai mat has wo el. Kush heg hekaj ab ha kakke mas am ha'ichu chekch mat wo hu.
Kutsh ab ge mah g watopi ga'i.
Kutsh ab be k huh. Sh ith wehsijj neith.

Kush hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Wehs ani am em-ahgith ihtha heki hu. Wehs ha'ichu at hemho wa am hab wo e juh mo an o'ohanas ab ni-amjed ha-o'ohana ed g Mosesbad ch hegam ha'i kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch heg eda nen'ei o'ohana mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed.”
Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa i ha mah g amichuthadag mat wo s-amich g Jiosh o'ohana

k ash hab kaij ab ha wui, “Bant masma hab ni-juh mo wa hab chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mant hab wo wa ni-juh. An o o'ohanas mantsh wo ni-sho'igchuth k wo ni-muhkith. Kutsh d wo i waik tashk amjed. Ntsh ep wo ni-chegito. Neh, heg ant hab juh.
Kut ia Jerusalem t amjed am a'ai wo i e ahgahi gm hu wehsko jejewed ha thahm mat g hemajkam ab wo i ni-hiwig k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. T g Jiosh im hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
Ahpim amt am wo ahgahith ihtha si s-has ha'ichu mam neith ch kah.

T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mah g gewkthag mamt hab wo junihith. Heg ant am wo cheha mat wo em-wehmajkath hab masma mo g ni-ohg Jiosh hab kaij mat hab wo e juh. Mt heg hekaj ia wo thadkath Jerusalem t ab ch ab wo ai mamt ab wo bei hegai gewkthag.”
Tsh am hahawa i ha wanim amai mash am miabithch g Bethany. Tsh am hu hebai i thatha. Kutsh am uhgk ul g e-nohnhoi ha thahm k ab ha ho'ige'elith,
Tsh g Jiosh gm hu i bei thahm kahchim wui.
Sh ihtham ab si has elith ch gm hu hahawa hihi Jerusalem wui s-hehgigch
k amjed chum hekith am hihhim ge'e cheopi wui ch ab ho'ige'elith g Jiosh.
Gd hu i si wehpeg ash d thoakam hegai mach hab a'aga Jiosh Ne'oki. Ith ash d Jiosh ch am wehmaj g e-ohg Jiosh.
Jiosh ash am e wehm thahshch mash eda pi koi ha'ichu sha'i nahtois
ch am i kei matsh wehs ha'ichu wo nahto. Kutsh wa woho wehs ha'ichu nahto
k an u'ukch g gewkthag ch wehs ha mah g ha'ichu thoakam g thoakag. K ihtha thoakag am tonlithch g hemajkam chegitoithag.
K wabshaba g hemajkam pi e nakog hejel mas wo s-amich mo haschu chum ha tashogith.
Am ad hema i kei g Jiosh g o'othham mat wo t-mihshmath. D ith hab chehgig John.
D g mihshmethaj hab chu'ig matsh in wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo ab t-mahkch g t-thoakag. K hab d elithaj g Jiosh mat wehs hemajkam wo kah ihtha ha'ichu ahga k ab wo hiwgath hegai mat in i wuhsh.
Pi ad hejel hab e ahg g John ch wabsh heg an ahgachug mad in i wuhsh.
Ith o d wohokam tonlig ch am tonlithch g wehs hemajkam ha-chegitoithag.
Pegih, d ia ha'ichug g Jiosh Ne'oki jewed e-nahtoi thahm. D wabshaba hemajkam nahtoij pi amichuth.
Ia adki mahsi k d t-wehm o'othham. D eda mu'ijj g Tutuligo pi amichuth ch pi ab hu hiwig.
Kuchd wabshaba ha'ijj ab i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha k ab hiwig. Kud heg hekaj ab t-mah g ap'ethag matt d haha wo a'aligajk g Jiosh.

Pi ach heg wabsh hekaj d Jiosh a'aliga matt in mamsi o heg wabsh hekaj mo g t-jehj ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh o heg wabsh hekaj mach hab t-elith machs d a'aligaj. Jiosh at hab t-juh mach d hahawa a'aligaj.

Hegai mo d Jiosh Ne'oki ad e wepogi g hemajkam k woho t-wepo chu'ig ch ia t-shahgith d thoakam. D g John an a'aga k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ith o d hegai mani hab ahg ch am em-ahgith mat ab hema wabsh ni-oithk wo i e maskogith k eda woho d si s-has ha'ichu nash pi chum hekith an ha'ichug.” Neh, bo kaij g John. Kuchd heg amjed s-mahch g Jesus Christ ch am hahawa s-mai moki d Jiosh alithag ch si s-hemajima ch heg wa'i ahg wohokam ch woho ab si s-t-ho'ige'ith.
Thash Mosesbad matsh wa an o'oha g Jiosh chehanig am ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba d Jesus Christ mad ia u'apa g Jiosh hemajimatalig ch wohokam.
Pi oki hekith hedai sha'i e-wuhpuikaj neith g Jiosh. K wabshaba g alithaj am wehmaj d hemako ch ab t-wui mahsko wua.

Am ad t-mihshmath ihtha John tohono jewed ch ed. K eda am Jerusalem kihhim t am thadha g t-ge'egedga ahchim Tutuligo. Tsh am i ha ai g ha'ichu kaitha ab amjed g John. Kutsh am ha'i ha cheha g papal ch hegam mo d papal ha wehm chikpantham matsh wo s-mai mas hedai wud hegai John. Tsh ihtham am hihim k am thatha k ab s-mahchim mas hedai chum e elith ab wui hab kaijch, “Nap hab chum e elith map d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D ab wabsh si ha wehm neok g John ch am si tasho ha ahgith mo pi d hegai.

D ab ep kakke, “Aha nap d hegai Elijabad ch ia uhpam jiwia?” D g John hab kaij, “Pia'a, pi ani d hegai.” D ab ep kakke, “Nap d hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam matsh in wo i wuhsh?” D hab ep kaij, “Pia'a, pi ani d hegai.”
D hab hahawa kaij, “Pegih, k am wo t-ahgi map hedai wud. Hemho wa att am wo ha ahgi g t-ge'egedga map has e a'aga.”

D g John hab hahawa kaij, “Ahni ani wud mo hab ni-ahg ch an o'ohanas: Hema atsh gm hu jeg ed wo ha mihshmath g hemajkam hab kaijch, ‘Neh, in atsh wo i wuhsh jewed thahm hegai mo d ge kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kumt heg wehhejed wo i e nako am thagitok g pi ap e-chu'ichig.’ Neh, ith o d ne'okij hegai kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab chehgig Isaiah,” bad kaij g John.
Ihtham mad ab ha'ichu kakke g John o d ha'i hegam mo hab e a'aga Palasi. K hegam Palasi chum si nuhkuth g t-himthag.

D heg hekaj hab ep kaij ihtham ab John wui, “Pegih, p haschu ahgch ha pahl wapkon ch eda wa chum pi d Jiosh si Kehsha ch pi d Elijabad ch pi d hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam matsh in wo i wuhsh?”
D hab hahawa kaij ab ha wui, “Ha ani pahl wapkon mat wo i e nako. Hemu at in wo i wuhsh hegai mo hig woho d si s-has ha'ichu, pej hemu ia ha'ichug em-shahgith. Kum pi amichuth.
Pi g hab wo ni-elithath manis ahni d si ha'ichu. Ihtha mat am ni-oithk wo i wuhsh at wehs ha ba'ich d wo i si ha'ichuk.”
Neh, wehs ihtha ad hab e juh gn hu aigojed g Jordan akimel mo am d wahlko kih.
Am ba'ich d i tash, d am jiwia g Jesus John wui. D heg an a'aga ch hab kaij, “Neh, ith o d hegai mat wo e wepogi g kahwal mad k ab wo e iagchul Jiosh wui mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
Ith ani hab ahg mani wa hab em-ahgith mat ab wabsh ni-oithk wo i wuhshani k wabshaba wehs ha ba'ich d i si ha'ichu no pi chum hekith an ha'ichug.

Pi ani hab wa sha'i mahch mas hedai d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. K wabshaba g Jiosh am ni-chehani mant wo ha pahl wapko g hemajkam. T hab wa masma am wo tashogi g si e-Kehsha am t-wui ahchim Tutuligo.” Neh, bad kaij g John.

D am hebai i cheka, d si s-mahch ch ahg g John hab kaijch, “Bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-wui, ‘Ab at wo i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k ab wo e ul si ni-Kehsha ab. Kupt hab wo s-mahchk mo d ihtha mat wo ha mah g hemajkam g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ab ni-wui. Kut wa woho si s-hemajim ab i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k ab e ul ith ab Jesus hab masma mat g hohhi an hasko wo i thahiwua ab i hudunik.
Kunt wa neith k heg hekaj si s-mahch mo ihtha Jesus d Jiosh alithag.”
Am ba'ich d i tash, d am ep ha'ichug g John. Kuchd gohkajj an wehmaj ahchim mach ab si wecho t-mashcham.
D ab him g Jesus. Kud g John neidok hab kaij, “Neh, m ia him hegai matsh kahwal mad wepo wo e iagchul am t-wehhejed.”
Kuchd am i kah ahchim gohk k gm hu i oi g Jesus.
D ab ha'ab i e wua k ab i t-neith k hab kaij, “Shahchu am tatchua?” Ch hab kaij, “Bahp thak ch amjed ha mashcham?”
D hab kaij, “Oi g wo ni-oith k wo nei mani hebai tha.” Kuchd gm hu oith k am wehmajkahim im hu i juhk amjed ch ga hu si ai g s-chuhugam.
Hegai mad ni-wehm kah g John ch am i oi g Jesus o hab chehgig Andrew. K g wehngaj ihtha hab chehgig Simon.
K g Andrew d wehpegkam mat am i gahghi g e-wehnag k hekith am i chehg k hab ahgith, “Cheh att hegai moki d Christ.” (Ith o hab d ahga ‘Jiosh si Kehsha.’)

D g Andrew am hahawa u'apa Jesus wui. T ab si shel i nei g Jesus k hab kaij, “S-mahch ahni map d Simon ch d alithaj hegai mo hab chehgig Jonas. I'ajed apt hab wo chehgigk Peter.” (Ith o hab d ahga ‘Hothai.’)

Am ba'ich d i tash, d hab i e ah g Jesus mat gm hu wo hih Galilee chekshani wui. K eda an oimmed hegai mo hab chehgig Philip ch am d kihkam Bethsaida t am. (Ahchim g Andrew ch Peter ha wehm ach am hab wa'ap d kihkam Bethsaida t am.) Jesus ad am cheh g Philip k hab kaij ab wui, “Ab g i ni-oith k wo ni-wehmajk.”

D g Philip gm hu i gahghi g Nathanael k am i chehgiok hab kaij, “Cheh att hegai matki wa ab amjed an o'oha hegam Mosesbad ch kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Heg oki wud mash d Jesus ch heg d alithag mash d Josephbad ch ab Nazareth kihhim t ab d kihkam.”
D ab wabsh ge i nen k hab kaij, “Ih, nat hig woho ha'ichu s-ap'ekam wo i wuhsh ab Nazareth t amjed?” D g Philip hab kaij, “Pegih, k ab wo i him k hejel e-wuhpuikaj wo nei.”
D ga hu haha wabsh i hihim. D g Jesus neith k hab kaij, “Neh, ith o d si o'othham m ab him.”
D g Nathanael hab kaij, “P has masma s-ni-mahch?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “M ani wabsh tonlith ch m-neith map am tha suhna wecho mat eda koi m-cheh g Philip.”
D hab kaij g Nathanael, “Ih, neh, kupki d Jiosh alithag ch d t-kownalig ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ap ni-hiwig nani pi am wabsh tonlith ch m-neith. Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mapt ba'ich i s-ta neithamam ha'ichu wo nei imhab i ba'ich.
Thani Jiosh si Kehsha ch am wo kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim am em-wehhejed. Kumt wo nei mat am wui wo i chehchsh g anghil ab ni-amjed k ab ni-wui ep wo i huhud.”
Am gohk d i tash amjed, tsh am ha'i wo e hohont Cana kihhim t am. Ihtha Cana o am Galilee chekchani ch ed. K am ha'ichug g Jesus je'e.
Kumd ahchim ab i t-wai. Chd am hihi g Jesus wehm k am ha'ichug. Kumd am hahawa hab juh g gegosig.
D wabshaba am i huh g nawait. D g Jesus je'e ab wui hab kaij, “Huh at g ha-nawait.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi o ab hu ha'ichu ni-him heg amjed. Pi at koi chum e ai mant am wo i ni-maskogi.”
D wabshaba g je'ej hab ha ahg g pion, “Am g hab wo juhni matp haschu wo i em-ahgi mamt am hab wo juh.”

K eda d t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo mach mu'i ha'ichu has masma wapkon. D g hohothai haha'a chuhthp am thadha mamt ab wo chum wa'ig k am hab wo junihith g t-himthag. D ihtham haha'a hemako am hu i waikko wehst-mahm walohn shuhthagi am wo e toa.
D hab kaij g Jesus am ha wui g pion, “Am g wo i ha shuhshuth g shuhthagikaj.” D wa woho am si i ha shuhshuth.
D hab hahawa ep ha ahg, “Am g wo wassibi k wo mah hegai mo nuhkuth g e-hohontam piast.” D wa woho hab e juh k am i wassibi k gd hu ha mah.
D ab jeh mo d si s-kehg nawait k eda pi mahch mas hebai wa'i. Hegam o hi wa s-mahch pion mat hebai wa'i.

D am i cheh g ha-hohntam am i jehk g nawait k hab kaij ab wui, “Sha'i s-ap ab kahk ihtha nawait. Ha'i at an hi wo wa i ha wassibi g s-kehg nawait ga hu i wehpeg k wabsh g pi kehg nawait wo ha wassibi im hu i oithch. Kuptki eda ahpi im hu i oithch g si s-kehg nawait ha wassibi.”
Neh, k ith d si wehpeg s-hasig ha'ichu hab junij g Jesus. D am mahsko wua g e-gewkthag. Kuchd ab si s-wohochuth mo woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
D am hahawa hab i e ah g Jesus matt am wo hihi Capernaum kihhim wui. D g je'ej ch wepngaj ep t-oi. Ch am ha'ichugkahim he'ekia tash.
Wehs ahith ab o am e wushshath Jerusalem t am matsh wa g Jiosh ha tho'ibia g t-shohshon. Kud am i e ai. Kuchd gm hu hihim
k gd hu thatha ge'e cheopi t am. D eda am ha'i ha gagda g haiwani ch kahwal ch hohohi ch am ha'i kammialt g lial heg wehhejed.

Kud si pi hohho'i g Jesus mo ith am hab e wua ge'e cheopi t am k hekaj hema gewikudt g wijinakaj k gm hu wehs si ha shahmuth g haiwani ch kahwal k am gai ha shul g ha-mimsa hegam mo g lial kammialt k gm hu si gantad g ha-lialiga
k hab ha ahg hegam mo g hohohi ha gagda mat gm hu wo i ha wuwhas hab kaijch, “Pi g hab wo sha'i juhni g ni-ohg kih mat d wabsh wo ha'ichu gagdakudk.”
Kuchd am hahawa i chegito mo g Jiosh heki o'ohana hab chu'ig: Jiosh si Kehsha at ab wo si has elithath g ge'e cheopi.
D ab si chehmo g haha'ichu k hab ahg, “Shahchu ap ahgch hab wua ihtha? Am g hig t-chehgith g s-hasig ha'ichu. Kutt hab wo s-mahchk map u'ukch g e-gewkthag ab amjed g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih oig, m ant wo wa em-chehgi g s-hasig ha'ichu. Mt wo padch ihtha mo g Jiosh am eda kih. Kunt ahni ep wo i kegch mat d wo i waik tashk.”
D ihtham si e sho'oshodkath k hab kaij, “Gi'ikko gamai chuhthp (46) a'ahith ab at hahawa i e nahto ihtha ge'e cheopi. Kuptp eda ahpi waik tash ab ia wo i kei.”
K eda g Jesus hejel hab e ahg mat wo e muhkith k uhpam ep wo e chegito.
Kutt s-chegito g ne'okij mat hekith uhpam e chegito am e muhkithk. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mat uhpam wo e chegito g Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutt hahawa s-amichuth k ab s-wohoch.

Am achd ha'ichugkahim Jerusalem t am wehs oitham g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag wuhshtha. Kud mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g Jesus. D wabshaba pi am hu i e tashogi ha wui mas hedai wud no pi s-mahch mo heg wabsh hekaj ab s-wohochuth mo am neith mo hab juni him g s-hasig ha'ichu.
Pi o hedai ab hu hiwig g Jesus mas am wo ahgi g hemajkam ha-chegitoi no pi heki hu s-mahch.
Am ad hema d si s-has ha'ichu am t-himthag ed ch d ge Palasi ch hab chehgig Nicodemas.

Kuchd am hu hebai thadha chuhug ch ed. D ith am i chehgim g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “S-mahch ach mat am i m-kei g Jiosh mapt wo t-mashcha. Pi at hedai wo e nako mas hejel hab wo juh hegai s-hasig ha'ichu map hab junihim. Jiosh oki ab m-mahkch g gewkthag.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mat hegam d wo wa'i Jiosh hemajkamgak mat hedai gokko wo mamsi. Bo wa chu'ig g Jiosh kownaltalig.”
D hab kaij g Nicodemas, “Tt has hig masma ep wo mahsi heki hu kelitk. Aha natt am ep wo i wah t-je'e ed k ep wo mahsi?”

D g Jesus hab kaij, “Pia'a. Tham wabsh ha-a'aliga ab ha ab mamsik. Bani m-ahgith ab amjed g wechij thoakag. Ith at g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mah mamt wo e chehgi g pahl wakonakaj mamt thagito g pi ap e-chu'ichig. Mt hab s-ap am wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed.
Pi g am e tothsith mani hab kaij mamt hemho wa ep wo mamsi.

Neh, kah ap g hewel m an hewelhog. Nap hig s-mahch mas hebai amjed med ch hebai wo meh? Pegih, k hab wa masma pi ta machima hab e junihim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch an ha wechij mamsith mo hedai hab i elith.”
D g Nicodemas hab kaij, “A, kus has masma hab chu'ig?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Aha, nap pi amichuth ch eda d wa chum ge uhgk ha mashchamtham g Tutuligo?
Tho si wohokam ihtha mani m-ahgith. M ach ahgachug mach haschu s-ap s-mahch ch am em-ahgith mach haschu neith. M eda pi wohochuth g ha'ichu t-ahga.
Ihtha mani em-ahgith o in hab wa'i e junihim jewed thahm. M eda pi ni-wohochuth ch hab pi wo e nako mams wo s-ni-wohoch mant am wo em-ahgi mo haschu has e junihim an thahm kahchim ch ed.
An ani wa kih thahm kahchim ch ed ch d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kut pi hedai ep wo e nako mas hab masma wo em-ahgi ab amjed mant ahni.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh wa g t-shohshonbad mu'i e ke'ij g kohk'oikaj mash eda am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed. Kutsh wa g Mosesbad am hema hab juh g ko'oi g kohwlikaj k ab uhgk ul uhs t ab. T hedai ab i neith k thoa. Pegih, kumt ahni hab wa'ap uhgk wo i ni-ul uhs t ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.
Kutp hedai ab wo ni-hiwig k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap e-chu'ichig.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.

Pegih neh, ab o si t-tatchua g Jiosh ch hiwigi g e-alithag mat am i e thagito k e muhkith am t-wehhejed mach d pi ap chu'ijkam. Kut pi wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag matp hedai ab wo hiwig k wabshaba g pi ha huhugetham thoakag wo bei.
Jiosh at am cheha g e-alithag mat in wo i wuhsh jewed thahm k wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam. Kut pi heg hekaj in i wuhsh mas ab wo ha'ichu t-mohto'i.
Pi o ab hu ha'ichu mohto'is hegam mo ab hiwig g Jiosh alithag. Hegam o ab heki hu ha'ichu mohto'is mo pi ab hu hiwig.

Ia at jiwia jewed thahm hegai mo woho tonlithch g t-chegitoithag. K wabshaba hegam mo hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam pi tatchua g tonlig nat pi wo mahsko wua g pi ap ha'ichu hab ha-juni. K oi wa ab him g lothaita heg hekaj pi ap'ekam.
Hegam mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam o tatchua g tonlig mat wo mahsko e wua mo hab wua g Jiosh tatchui.
Am i thahm, kuchd am i wuwha Jerusalem kihhim t amjed k am oiopohim Judea chekshani ch ed ch ha pahl wapkon g hemajkam.
Md eda wenog koi kuh hegai John mad ha pahl wapkon. Sh am oimmed ch ha pahl wapkon Aenon t am miabithch g Salim kihhim no pi am ge shohshon ch s-shuhthagig.
Sh am ha'ichug hegam mash ab si wecho e mashcham. Kutsh am hema jiwia g t-wehm o'othham k ha wehm ne'owi ab amjed g pahl wakona.

Tsh ihtham am hahawa hihi John wui k hab kaij, “T-mashchamtham, hema at wa am m-wui jiwia map wa am ha pahl wapkon gm hu aigojed g Jordan akimel. Kup wa am si s-mahch ch ahg mo hig woho d si s-has ha'ichu. Pegih, heg ash hab wa'ap ha pahl wapkon. Kush wehsijj gm hu ha'ab him wui.”
Sh hab kaij g John, “Heg ach ab wa'i bekch mo haschu g Jiosh ab t-mahkch.
Bani wa kaij mani pi d Jiosh si Kehsha ch wabsh am ha'ichu i ap'echuth g ia jiwhiathaj wehhejed. Am am wa kah mani wa hab kaij.

Jiosh si Kehsha o heg wepogithas mo g wo ha hohntam. K g hemajkam heg wepogithas mo g wo ha hohnta. T g nawojij wo si s-hehgigk mat hekith s-ap wo e hohont. Bani wa masma si s-hehgig mo ab wui him g hemajkam nani pi d nawojij.
Heg at am wo e maskogi mo hig woho d si s-has ha'ichu. Kunt ahni im hu hab wabsh wo i ni-junihi.” Neh, bash kaij g John.

Nt ahni hab wo chei mo g John d wabsh o'othham ch am t-ahgith mo haschu i neith ch ep kah ia jewed thahm. T wabshaba g Jiosh alithag ia jiwia ab thahm kahchim t amjed k d si s-has ha'ichu wehs ha'ichu thahm
ch am t-ahgith mash haschu i neith ch ep kah an thahm kahchim ch ed. K wabshaba pi sha'i mu'ijj ab wohochuth g ahgaj.

Jiosh at am cheha g e-alithag mat ia wo jiwia jewed thahm k s-ba'ama ab mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K g alithaj heg hekaj ahg g ne'okij. (33) Pegih, kuch heg hekaj s-ap ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ne'oki ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g alithaj ahga.
Jiosh o si pihk e elith ab e-alithag wui ch wehs ha'ichu ab mah.

Kuch wehsijj u'ukch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag ahchim mach ab hiwig g alithaj. T hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog el pi wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k wabshaba g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag wo edagi. T heg hab wa'ap pi hekith wo huhug.
D ba'ich i mu'i hemajkam ab him Jesus wui mo ab wui g John kch ab wecho e mashcham. Kuchd ahchim ha pahl wapkon mach ab si wecho t-mashcham. D am i kah hegam Palasi ihtha k an si i neneo.
D hekaj g Jesus hab i e ah matt wo i wuwha ab Judea chekshani t amjed k gm hu uhpam wo hihi Galilee chekshani wui.
K eda ihtham ha shahgith chechkshani am hab chu'ig g Samaria chekshani.
Kuchd heg am gai hihimath ch gm hu ai g Sychar kihhim mat am thahm juh. K am wawhiag miabithch g kihhim. D am thahiwua g Jesus gewkok natt pi mehk wa'i hihi.

Kuchd ahchim gm hu hihi kihhim wui matt wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi. D an hema i t-bij g uwi wa'igamedam k atsh am jiwia mo am thaha g Jesus. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab g i ha ni-wasbith g shuhthagi.”
Sh hab kaij g uwi, “Neh, thapki Tuhligo. Ni ahni d Samaria t am o'othham. P haschu ahgch ab ni-tahni g wasib?” Neh, bash kaij nach pi s-ha uhwaith ch chum hems g ha'u pi ha wehm wo ha hekaj.

Sh g Jesus hab epai kaij ab wui, “Ahpi apt aigo ab wo ha'ichu ni-tai maptp wo s-mahchk mani hedai wud ch haschu i m-makiog. Hegai mani m-makiog o ab Jiosh d amjedkam ch heg wepogithas mo g shonkam shuhthagi.”
Sh hab ep kaij g uwi, “Pt has hig masma wo wa'i map pi ha kuhwo? K eda s-juhk g wawhia.
Aha nap ba'ich i gewkthag mo g t-shohshon Jacobbad. Heg at ia wawhiat e-oith ed k ia ih'ehim g e-a'aliga ha wehm ch ha'ichu e-shoshoiga.”
Sh g Jesus hab kaij, “Huhume o g shuhthagi m-wa'igi. Kup ep tonommek.
T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai mani ahni m-makiog. Heg at am wo m-edak ch hab wo masmak mo g shonkam ch ab wo m-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”
Sh hab kaij g uwi, “Ih, pegih, si g s-ni-ho'ige'ith k ab i ni-mahki ihtha shuhthagi mant pi hekith ep wo tonom k pi wo ge i wa'igammedath.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, k ab wo i wai g e-kun.”
Sh g uwi hab kaij, “Pi ani ha kun.” Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Wohokam ap ahg map hab kaij map pi ha kun.
Hetasp ap wa'i ha kuhkunkahim. K hegai map hemuch an wehm kih pi d m-kun.”
Tsh ab wabsh ge nen k kekiwua g uwi k hab kaij, “Ih, thapki ge Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam!

Pegih neh, am g ni-ahgith mam haschu ahgch ahpim Tutuligo hab chech'e mo g Jerusalem d wa'i amai mat am wo e ihmath g Jiosh. Ch eda ahchim Samaria t am kihkam ia ha'ab ihm mo hebai g t-shohshon ihmahim ith ab tho'ag.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus. “Nt wo si shel m-ahgi mo ab him g tash mat wabsh chum hebai wo e ihm g em-ohg Jiosh, pi iia wa'i ith ab tho'ag o am Jerusalem t am.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo mat am gai t-wuhshanim wo e maskogi am ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. M ahpim Samaria t am o'othham pi koi am hu i si s-mahch g Jiosh.
E at ai g tash mat g hemajkam si e-ihbthag amjed woho ab wo ihmath g e-ohg Jiosh. Bo masma hab ha elith g Jiosh mat hab masma ab wo ihmath.
Tho wabsh thoakag g Jiosh ch pi ha honshpadag mams am hebai wo kihchuth k heg wa'i eda wo ihmath. Pegih, mt wabsh chum hebai wo ihmath ch wehs e-ihbthag amjed.”
Sh am wabsh sha'i pi amichuth g uwi ch hab kaij ab wui, “Heg ani hi wa s-mahch mat wo jiwia hegai mo d Jiosh si Kehsha ch hab e a'aga Christ k wehs ha'ichu wo t-ahgi.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kuchd edapk i thatha. D am wabsh kia wehmaj neok hegai uwi. Kuchd si has i t-elith k wabshaba pi has sha'i kaij.
D ihtha uwi am wabsh i thagito g e-ha'a k gm hu si s-hohtam uhpam hih kihhim wui k ash am ha ahgith k hab kaij,
“Oi g ab wo i hihim k wo nei hegai mo am wehs ni-ahgith mani has i ni-wua. Kutp hu d i Jiosh si Kehsha.”
Kudki ab ha hekaj i hihi g hemajkam s-neithamk g Jesus.
D koi e chehm g hemajkam, kuchd ab chum si ahgith g Jesus mat wo ha'ichu huh.
D wabshaba hab kaij, “Am o ha'ichug g hab mahs gegosig mam ahpim pi sha'i mahch.”
Chd hab kaij ab a'ai t-wui, “A nat ia heki hu hema gegos?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Ni-gegosig o d ihtha mant hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui k wo nahto hegai chikpan mo ab ni-mohto'ith.
Neh, bo e chech'e mat g ha-esha wo i e ba'iha mat d wo gi'ik i mashathk. Nt wabshaba wo em-chehgi mat hemu si s-hohtam wo e ba'iha ha'ichu.
Ahni ant am ei g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kumt ahpim wo ha ba'iha hegam mat wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Kutt hekaj t-wehm wo s-hehgigk.
Ith o heg wepogithas hab che'ithag mo hab chu'ig, ‘Hema o'othham at am wo ha'ichu ei. T d wabsh wo hemak ch am wo hih g esha.’
Ab g wo neith hegam mo ab hihim. Pi amt ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba wo ha ba'iha hegam mat wo e tho'ibia.”
Kud wa mu'ijj hegam kihkam ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha heg hekaj mo hab kaij hegai uwi, “Heg o wehs ni-ahgith mani has i ni-wua.”
D heg hekaj ab si ahgith g Jesus am wui thathak mat wo si s-ha ho'ige'ith k am wo kia ha wehmajkahim he'ekia tash. Kuchd wa woho am ha wehmajkahim gohk tash.
D mu'ijj ab ep i s-wohoch ab i kaiok g ahgaj
k hab hahawa kaij ihtham heg wui uwi, “B att hahawa si hejel kah k ab s-wohochuth k s-mahch moki woho d wehs hemajkam t-tho'ibiakam ith thahm jewed.”
Kuchd amjed gm hu hahawa ha'ab hihi Galilee chekshani wui
no pi hab kaij g Jesus, “No hu d wabsh i neitha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam amai mo hebai d si kihj am jewed.”

D wabshaba mu'ijj g hemajkam amai ab ha'ichugkahim Jerusalem t ab ch wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag ch am neith g Jesus. Kud wa am hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu. D ihtham si s-hehgig ch ab neith g Jesus matt gd hu thatha.

Kuchd oi wa gm hu ha'ab hihi Cana kihhim wui mat wa am si wehpeg hab juh g si s-hasig ha'ichu mat wa wabsh g shuhthagi nawaitt. D am hema jiwia g kownal pionag ab Capernaum kihhim t amjed am i kaiok mo am ha'ichug g Jesus. Sh ith alithag muhkhim. D hab kaij ihtha ab wui g Jesus mat am wo hih Capernaum wui k wo thoaj g alithaj.
D hab wabsh kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Aha, namt pi hedai ab hu wo i s-ni-wohoch, mt hekith wo ipki nei mant hab wo juh g si s-hasig ha'ichu?”
D am hab wa'ap kaij g s-has ha'ichu, “Ab g si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k wo ni-oi am ni-kih wui mat koi wo muh g ni-aliga.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Gamai g s-ap e tahtk hihm. T wo thoa g m-aliga.” D si i ihbheiwua ihtha s-wohochuthk k gm hu hahawa hih uhpam.
Sh am himath ch ab ha'i ha nam g e-pionag mash si s-hehgig ch hab kaij, “Tki wo thoa g m-aliga.”
Sh am hahawa ha kakke, “He'ekia ohla k ed at ab i ap'etahi.” Sh hab kaij g piongaj, “Tho i hemako ohla tako mat jumal gei g s-tonjig ab ab.”

Sh am ha hekaj i chegito g ohgaj mo am d wabsh i si hegai ohla mo hab ahgith g Jesus, “T wo thoa g m-aliga.” Tsh gd hu jiwia e-kih am k am si a'aga ihtha g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm. Tsh wehsijj ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
Neh, ith o d i gokkokam s-hasig ha'ichu mat hab juh g Jesus ia Galilee chekshani ch ed.
D am hahawa hema i e aihi g t-mihshmetha piast. Kuchd hekaj gm hu hihi Jerusalem wui.
Am o hema wo'og kihhim ch ed ch hab e a'aga Bethsatha ch an miabithch hegai kolhai kihjeg mam an ha gagda g kahwal. K an hetasp wapttog heg wehgaj wo'o.
K ihtham ha wecho sha'i mu'i nahnko mahs kok'otham an wo'owop ch ha'i d pi neneatham ch ha'i d pi hihimithkam ch ha'i ab wabsh i s-momoik. [Kush ihtham nenida g shuhthagi matsh am wo i hoi

no pi hab elith mash hab hu g anghil am i huhuduk shuhthagi ch ed ch am i nonoig g shuhthagi. T hedai si wehpeg am wo hud shuhthagi ch ed mat am wabsh wo chum i nonoi k ash hab hu wo s-thoajima ab e-mumkithag amjed.]
D am hema wo'o g o'othham ch waikko wehst-mahm gamai gigi'ik (34) a'ahith ab wa'i mumku.
D g Jesus am neith ch s-mahch mo tash am wa'i wo'o ch hab kaij ab wui, “Nap tatchua mapt wo thoa?”

D hab kaij g mumkutham, “Ni-nawoj, pi o an hu hedaig mas am wo i ni-huduni shuhthagi ch ed mo hekith am i hoike. Ni im hu haha wabsh i ni-nakog mant am wo i hud, k gm hu heki hu hema ni-ba'iwichchek.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “I wuhshani k am beh'i g e-wahkus k hihm!”
Neh, d ha hekaj thoa k am bei g e-wahkus k s-ap hih. Ith ad hab e juh chum t-mihshmetha tash ed ahchim Tutuligo.
D ha'i neith g t-wehm o'othham ch hab ahg, “Neh, ahpi, melchkwua ap g t-chehanig map kushwiotch g e-wahkus. A nap pi mahch mo d mihshmetha tash?”
D hab hahawa kaij hegai mo wa mumkuhim, “Hegai mat ni-thoaj o hab ni-ahg mant am wo bei g ni-wahkus k wo hih.”
D ab hahawa kakke mas hedai wud hegai mo hab ahg mat wo kushwiotk hih g e-wahkus.
D wabshaba am wabsh i pi e amich nad pi g Jesus im hu pi e mahsith hemajkam ha shahgith no pi sha'i mu'ijj g hemajkam amai.

D am hahawa g Jesus s-neitham k am cheh ge'e cheopi ch ed k hab ahg, “Neh, thoa apt. Pi g am hu hab i ep junihim g pi ap'ekam nat pi ha'ichu ba'ich i pi ap hab wo e juh am m-tahgio mapt am hab ep wo i junihi g pi ap'ekam.”
D am i wuhshani k gm hu him k am ha ahgi moki d Jesus mat thoaj.
D am i s-mai ihtham mash d Jesus mat hab juh ihtha mihshmetha tash ed k heg hekaj am i kudu ab ne'owinch.
D g Jesus hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ni-ohg Jiosh o chum hekith g s-ap'ekam chikpan. Ni ahni hab wa'ap chum hekith hab ni-wua.”
D am hahawa i si e gewpkai mat wo mua nad pi am i kah mo hab masma ihm g Jiosh ch heg hekaj e wepogith g Jiosh.
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mani pi ha'ichu hejel hab wua ch wabshaba hab wua mo haschu g ni-ohg Jiosh ni-chehani.
Ni-ohg o ab si pihk ni-elith ch am ni-chehgith mant has wo chum juni. T ab wo ni-mah g gewkthag mant ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab wo juh mo ihtha. Mt ab wabsh wo i haha'athka.
Ni-ohg o i ha wuwhasith g ko'i ab muhkig amjed ch ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant s-ap hab wo juh. Nt hekaj ab wo i ha wuwhas mani hedai hab i elith.
K g ni-ohg pi hedai ha lothait ch wabshaba ahni ab ni-mah hegai ap'ethag mant wo ha lothai
no pi hab elith mat wehsijj ab wo si has i ni-el hab masma mo ab si has i elith g ni-ohg. Am at i ni-kei g Jiosh. T hedai pi ab hu has wo ni-elithath ch hab wa masma pi ab hu has elith g ni-ohg.

“Tho si wohokam ihtha mant hab wo chei. T wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k am wo wehmajk g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo kaihamath g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch ab wo hiwgath g Jiosh. Pi ant ab hu wo ha mohto'i g ha-chu'ichig mas hekaj gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mo ab him g tash, pej heki hu e ai, mant ab wo i ha wai g ko'i ahni Jiosh alithag. T hegam mat ab i kaiha g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab wo i wuwha.
Ni-ohg o d hegai mo ab ha mahkch g thoakag ch ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant hab wa'ap wo ha mah g thoakag.
T ab ni-mah g gewkthag mant ahni hab wo juh g lothaita nani pi d si Kehshaj.
“Pi g am wo e totothsith ith hekaj mani has i kaij. Ab o him g tash mat wehs g ko'i s-ap wo ni-kah k ab wo i wuwha.
Hegam mo hab junihim g s-ap'ekam at ab wo i e wamgith k ab wo bei g e-ap'ethag. T hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ab wo i e wamgith k ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant wo sha'i ni-nako mant hejel ha'ichu hab wo juh k wabshaba am si ni-ohg oithk hab masma wo ha lothai. K hekaj hab s-ap'e g ni-lothaita.
“Pi amt wo mahchk manis am ahg g wohokam mantp wabsh hejel wo ni-wohokamch.
K heg hekaj am wa ni-wehhejed neok g ni-ohg Jiosh. Kuni s-mahch mo d wohokam mo am ahg ab ni-amjed.
“Neh, am amt wa ha'i hihi heg wui John mo wa em-pahl wapkonahim. K wa am em-ahgith g wohokam.

Ith ani hab wabsh kaij mamt hekaj wo e tho'ibia nam pi ahpim heg tatchua mat g o'othham am wo i wohokamch ha'ichu mamt ab haha wo i s-wohoch. Ni ahni hi heki hu s-mahch mani hedai wud ch pi sha'i tatchua mas am hema wo ge i ni-wohokamch.
John o wa ahgachug g wohokam ch hekaj em-tonlithch. Kumt wa ha'ijj ahpim he'es ab si s-hohho'i g ha'ichu ahgaj k an e hehemapaith wehgaj hab masma mat g hu'ul nahgi wo s-hohho'i g tonlig.
“John o s-ap ni-wohokamchuth. K wabshaba ahni ab ni-mahkch g Jiosh mani g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua. K ith ba'ich i s-ap ni-wohokamchuth mani d ni-ohg kehsha.
Pi am hekith neith g Jiosh. K pi hekith ab hu em-wuhiosha neith ch neok ch wabshaba am ni-wohokamchuth mani d kehshaj.
Am o ni-wohokamchuth g Jiosh mani d si Kehshaj. Kum eda pi ab hu ni-tatchua nam ge wohochuth.
Am am si hoan g Jiosh o'ohana nam pi tatchua mamt wo e tho'ibia k wo edgithath g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. K g Jiosh o'ohana am ni-wohokamchuth
mani ahni d em-tho'ibiakam. M eda pi ab hu ni-hiwig.
“Neh, pi ani heg nen'oith mas g hemajkam ab wo si ni-ha'ichuch. Jiosh at ab wo si ni-ha'ichuch.
Kuni s-em-amichuth ch s-mahch mam pi ab hu sha'i tatchua g Jiosh.
Ia ant jiwia g ni-ohg si wehhejed. Kum pi ab hu has ni-elith. Hegam at ab has d wo em-elithak matp hedam wabsh hejel e wehhejed ab wo i wuwha.
Pi amt has masma ab hu wo s-wohoch g Jiosh nam pi heg am wa'i s-nen'oith mamt ab a'ai wo si has i e el. K eda d chum Jiosh mamt ab wo chum hehgchul.
Ni wabshaba pi d ahni manis ab wo ha'ichu em-abch am ni-ohg wui. Mosesbad chehanig am ab hiwig. K d hegai mat am wo tashogi g pi ap em-chu'ichig.
Mosesbad at ha'ichu o'oha ab ni-amjed. Kumt ab wo s-ni-wohoch mamt hems woho ab wo s-wohochuthath g Mosesbad o'ohana.
Pi amt has masma ab hu wo s-wohoch g ni-ahga namki pi woho wohochuth mat haschu an o'oha g Mosesbad.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus am ha mihshmathch. Am i amjed, tt gm hu hahawa hihi Jerusalem t amjed.
Am hu hebai ep amjed machd an oiopohim Galilee Kahchki hugith an ch gm hu hahawa i chehchsh ha'abjed k am thatha.
D eda mu'i hemajkam chum hekith an oithahim g Jesus neithok mo g s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua ha thoajithch g kok'otham.
D ab i chesh g Jesus kawulk t ab. Kuchd ahchim wa'i mach ab si wecho t-mashcham am i oith k am wehmaj thadhaiwua.
D eda e aihim mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag.
Kud mu'i hegam mad gm hu wo piasto ab i hihi s-kaimkch g Jesus. D am i ha nei g Jesus k hab kaij ab Philip wui, “Neh, Philip, chs hebai hig wo ui g ha'ichu hugi matt wo ha gegos ha'akia i hemajkam?”
Bo kaij ch wabsh s-a'appemamk g Philip no pi wa chum s-mahch mat has masma hab wo juh.
D hab kaij g Philip, “Pi att wo sha'i t-nako. Chum achs hems gohk siant pihshkaj wo ui g pahn, t eda pi wo ha ai g ha'akia hemajkam.”
D hegai mo d Simon Peter nawoj ch hab chehgig Andrew hab kaij,
“Ia o hema ha'ichug g ali ch hi wa hetasp sismito ch gohk waptopi u'a. T wabshaba pi ha'ichu ab hu wo sha'i ha nako ha'akia hemajkam ha wehhejed” .
D ab hahawa t-ahgith g Jesus matt wo ha cheha g hemajkam mat wo thadhaiwua no pi an s-washaig. D am i wehsijj thadhaiwua g hemajkam k d hetasp mihl chechoj ch mu'i ehp g u'uwi ch a'al.
D g Jesus am ui g sismito k ab ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab t-mah. Kuchd ahchim an hahawa i ha mahkhi g hemajkam. D hab wa'ap juh hegam gohk waptopi. Kuchd wehsijj hug k si s-kokwoth.
D hab hahawa t-ahg g Jesus. “An g wo i u'ihim g ha-wi'a. Kutt pi ha'ichu wo sha'i heki wua.”
Kuchd an i u'ihim k gamai gohk wapshomi ha shuhshuth heg hekaj wihpi'ithag.
Neh, d am i nei g hemajkam mat si s-hasig ha'ichu hab juh g Jesus k hab kaij, “Neh, mo d wabsh i si shel moki ith d hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mach nenida matsh ia wo jiwia ith thahm jewed.”
D g Jesus ha amich mat an wabsh wo si be k wo ge'e kownalch k hekaj gm hu hejel ba'ich i chesh tho'ag t ab.
Hudunihim o g tash. Kuchd gm hu i huhud
k am chum i chehchsh g wahlkokaj Capernaum wui nad pi hab t-ah g Jesus k hab kaij matsh pi oi gm hu wo hih. D am i s-chuk.
D g s-gewk hewel ab i med k ab i kudu g shuhthagi.
Kuchd am himchuth g wahlko am hu i gi'ik mihya. D ab haha wabsh hema him t-wui an wabsh shuhthagi thahm. Kuchd hab i neithok si t-totoths.
D ab hahawa t-wui neo k oki d Jesus ch hab kaij, “Pi g am wo e totothsith. Ahni ani wud” .
Kuchd si s-ap i t-taht k gn hu i cheshajch wahlko ch ed. Neh chd am wa'i hekaj gn hu aigo thatha mach am ha'ab t-tatchua.
Ba'ich i si'alim, d hegam hemajkam mad ab wih s-mahch mad pi i t-oi g Jesus no wa pi neith mo d hemako g wahlko. Kuchd ahchim wa'i heg ab an thadhaiwua k i hihi.

D ihtham an chum gagahim ch pi cheh g Jesus k nei matt pi am hu ep thatha. D oi wa am i ha'i thatha g wapalko ab Tiberias kihhim t amjed miabithk mat am ha gegos g Jesus hegam mu'i hemajkam. D ihtham hemajkam an e ba'iham k gm hu i gahgio Capernaum wui
K hekith am i chehg k hab kaij ab wui, “T-mashchamtham, hekith apt ia i jiwia?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ani woho ni-chehgithch em-wui heg hekaj s-hasig ha'ichu mani hab wua. M wabshaba pi heg hekaj ab s-ni-wohochuthamk. Neh am ant em-gegos. Kumt kokwoth k heg wai hekaj ni-gahg.

Pi g am wo si e kudutath wabsh g ha'ichu hugikaj ch wabshaba heg wo chum s-behim mo d pi ha huhugetham. Ahni ani em-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Heg at hekaj am i ni-kei g Jiosh k am ni-wohokamch.”
D hab kaij g hemajkam, “Tt has wo t-juh k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag?”
D g Jesus hab ha ahg, “Ihtha wa'i mamt ab wo ni-hiwgath ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.”
D hab ep kaij g hemajkam, “Am g hig hab juhni g s-hasig ha'ichu. T heg am wo t-chehgi map woho d Jiosh si Kehsha. Tt ab wo s-m-wohoch.

Neh, ab ash gegshshe thahm kahchim t amjed hegai ha'ichu hugi mash hab e a'aga ‘manna’. Kush heg ko'a g t-shohshon mash am jeg ed oiopo. Bo chu'ig g Mosesbad o'ohana: Ab o ha mahk hegai ha'ichu hugi mo am gegshe ab thahm kahchim t amjed. Pegih, pt ahpi has hig wo juh?”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi o d Mosesbad mo wa ab ha mahk hegai ha'ichu hugi. Tho ni-ohg mo wa hab wua. K heg d wabsh ha'ichu hugi mo wa heg hekaj d thothakam jewed thahm. K g ni-ohg ba'ich i s-kehg ha'ichu ab em-makiog
mamt heg hekaj d wo thothakamk chum hekith. Ith o heg wa wepo mo d s-kehg ha'ichu hugi. Kumt wo be k heg ab wo bei g s-kehg thoakag.”
D ab si tahni ch hab kaij ihtham, “Ih, pegih, ab g chum hekith t-mahkath ihtha map hab ahg.”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud mo g ni-ohg ab em-makiog. Ab g wo ni-hiwig. Nt wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g hab mahs ha'ichu mamt chum hekith d wo thothakamk ch pi hekith ep wo bihugk.
Neh'e mani wa hab wa heki hu kaij mam wa chum ni-neith ch eda pi ab hu ni-wui e thagitokch.
T wabshaba wehs ab ni-wui wo i e thagito hegam mat g ni-ohg am ha eda wo i chikp. Nt pi hedai wo sha'i ohhoth mat ab wo i e thagito ni-wui.

Tho ni-ohg tatchui mamt ab ni-wui wo i e thagito ch hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Nt wo si em-nuhkuthath mamt pi hedai wo heb hu wua g e-tho'ibiathag. Kunt ab wo i em-wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekith wo huhug ihtha jewed. Ith o d ni-ohg tatchui. Kunt heg hekaj ia jiwia ab thahm kahchim t amjed.”
D g haha'ichu si gahghai e mohmgith ch s-babgam neneok
ch hab kaij, “K haschu ahgch hab kaij mat ia jiwia ab thahm kahchim t amjed? S-mahch ach ch ep s-ha mahch g jehj. Tho wabsh Jesus ch d alithaj g Josephbad.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am wo gahghai e mohmgith k s-babgam neneok.

Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas ab wabsh hejel wo i e thagito ni-wui. Jiosh ni-ohg at am wo i chikp ha eda. T hekaj ab ni-wui wo i e thagito. T ab wo i e ai g si oithchkam tash. Nt ab wo i ha wuwhas muhkig t amjed.
Kekelibad Jiosh Ha'ichu i tashogiththam atki wa an o'oha: Wehsijj at wo ha mashcha g Jiosh g hemajkam. Neh, t ab ni-wui wo i e thagito matp hedai ab wo kaiha g Jiosh ni-ohg k ab wo mai g mashchamaj.
Pi am hedai g e-wuhpuikaj neith g ni-ohg. Ahni ani wa'i neith nant pi ab amjed ia jiwia.
“Neh, hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohochuth k wo ni-bei at hekaj wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
T-shohshon ash wa ko'a hegai manna ch wabshaba pi heg hekaj edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Mt wo edagi hegai pi ha huhugetham thoakag ab ni-bek. Ith o heg wa wepo mani d ha'ichu hugi em-wehhejed.
Ba'ich ani d i s-kehg ha'ichu hugi mo hi hegai manna namt pi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag wo edagi ab ni-bek.

I atsh gei g manna ab thahm kahchim t amjed k ab ha mahkch g thoakag. Ni wabshaba d ahni mant woho ia jiwia ab Jiosh kihthag amjed k ia u'apa g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Nt wo thagito g ni-chuhkug mant wo ni-muhkith k hab wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam.”
D ith kaiok am si s-babgam e ne'owi g haha'ichu hab kaijch, “Pi at has sha'i masma wo t-mah g e-chuhkug machs wo huh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag pi ab hu ni-bek ahni Jiosh si Kehsha.

Ab amt wo i s-wohoch mant wo iawua g ni-eh'ed k wo muh em-wehhejed k hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g ni-chuhkug k wo ih g ni-eh'ed. Kunt ab wo i em-wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekith wo kuhgit g jewed.
Ihtha ni-chuhkug ch ni-eh'ed o heg wa wepo mo d ha'ichu hugi ch ha'ichu i'ithag.
T wo edagi g wechij thoakag hegam mat ab wo ni-bei. Am ant ha eda wo ul g ni-thoakag.

Ni-ohg at wa am ni-cheha mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kuni d pi ha huhugetham thoakam no pi g ni-ohg d pi ha huhugetham thoakam. T hab wa'ap d wo pi ha huhugetham thoakamk matp hedam ab wo ni-bei nant pi am ha eda wo ni-ulinith chum hekith.
Heg ani hekaj pi hab masma mo hegai manna. Hegam mash wa ko'a hegai at pi heg hekaj edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T wabshaba wo edagi matp hedam ab wo ni-bei.”
Neh, bad kaij g Jesus mad eda am ha mashcham g hemajkam ha-cheopi ed amai Capernaum t am.
D mu'ijj hegam mo am t-wehm oith g Jesus hab hahawa kaij, “Sho'oki wa'i si s-hasig ihtha mashchamaj ch pi ab hu ta kaihama.”
D g Jesus wabsh ha amich mo has kaij an s-ju'ujpij neneokch k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pi amki hohho'ith g ni-mashchama
ch eda wo nei mant am uhpam ep wo hih thahm kahchim wui ahni Jiosh si kehsha.

Pi amt wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag ab amjed g ha'ichu hugi k wabshaba ab wo s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kunt ab wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am em-eda wo i e ulin k wo em-mahkath g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Kum eda ha'ijj pi ab hu ni-wohochuth.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus no pi s-mahch mat hedam pi ab hu wo wohoch ch ep s-mahch mat hedai wo gagda mat wo e muhkith.
D hab ep kaij, “Pi amt hedai wo e nako mams ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k wo ni-bei, heg hi wa mat g ni-ohg am wo i chikp em-eda.”
D mu'ijj hegam mo am t-wehm oith g Jesus thagito am i kaiok g s-hasig ha'ichu ahgaj k pi thahm an hu hahawa ep wehmaj.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui ahchim gamai gohk, “Mt ahpim has wo e juh? Namt hab wa'ap wo ni-thagito?”
D g Simon Peter hab kaij ab wui, “T-kownalig, pi o an hu hedai ehp machs heg wui wo hihi. Ahpi ap wa'i am ahgachug hegai matt hekaj wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Ch hahawa s-wohochuth ch s-mahch map ahpi d hekia s-ap'ekam ch ab amjed i hih g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heu'u, woho o wa. Kunt am i em-chuhcha ahpim gamai gohk mamt ith an wo ahgachugath. M wabshaba hema d wabsh sha jiawul.
Pi achd mahch mas hedai hab ahg. Kuki eda heg hab ahg Judas mo d alithaj g Simon Iscariot ch d hema ahchim gamai gohk ch atki wo gagda g Jesus.
Am amsh chum s-mu'amk g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed. D hekaj pi am hu himimk. Kuchd an oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed.
D eda e aihim hegai piast mach ab ihm g Jiosh mo babhaijith g t-e'es.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus wepnag ab wui. “Pt hems gm hu wo hih i'ajed Judea wui. T wo nei g s-hasig m-chikpan hegam mo wa an m-oithahim Judea ch ed.
Pi apt wo ge ehstoth hegai map hab junihim maptp wo tatchuath mat ab wo i m-mai g hemajkam. Am g ha chehgith g hemajkam map hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu.”
Neh, bad kaij noki pi koi wohochuth mo d Jiosh si Kehsha.

D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Pi ant am hu wo em-oi ith wui gegosig nat pi koi e ai mant am wo si s-ap i ni-maskogi. Mt gamai wo hihi namt pi ahpim hi wa wabsh chum hekith am wo e chehgi. Pi o am hu ha'ichug mas heg hekaj wo s-em-keh'ithath g hemajkam. K wabshaba ahni s-ni-keh'ith nani pi chum hekith ab ha ahgith mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.”
Neh, bad kaij ab ha wui ch am wabsh i wih Galilee ch ed.
Heg i thahm mad gm hu hihi g Jesus wepnag, d am hahawa epai him k wabshaba wabsh s-a'agi. Kuchd ahchim gm hu i oi.
Sh hegam mo d haha'ichu am Judea ch ed an gahg ch an kaiam mas hebai has chu'ig.
D eda an s-ju'ujpij neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Tho si s-ap o'othham.” D ha'i hab ep kaij, “Pi o ap d o'othham no pi t-iattogith.”
K wabshaba s-a'agi an a'aga no pi s-ha ehbith g haha'ichu.
Kud eda hugkam wa'i hih g piast. D am hih g Jesus ge'e cheopi wui k am i ha mashcha.
D hegam haha'ichu si has i elith k hab kaij, “S has hig masma ge'e ha'ichu s-mahch ihtha o'othham mat eda pi sha'i e mashcha g papal ha-mashchama?”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Jiosh at ab ni-cheha mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm. K d Jiosh mashchamadag ihtha mani i ha mashcham.
Tp hedai wo i tatchuath mat am hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui wo chum s-mahchk mas wa woho d Jiosh amjedkam ihtha mani i ha mashcham.
Hegai mat wo ah g hejel e-mahchig at wabsh wo chum si e haschuth k atp hems d s-chu iattomkam. Nt wabshaba ahni ab ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ch am ahg g wohokam.
Bam chum e wua mam am hab si junihim hegai chehanig mat wa g Jiosh ab mah g Moses am em-wehhejed. M wabshaba pi woho hab junihim nam pi s-ni-mu'amk.”
D ab si neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “P haschu ahgch hab kaij mam s-m-mu'amk? Jiawul o an u'ukch g m-chegitoithag.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Woho am s-ni-mu'amk. Ha ant thothaj mihshmetha tash ed. Kum heg hekaj s-ni-mu'amk.

Neh, nt am wo em-chehgi mam ahpim hab wa'ap wua g chikpan mihshmetha tash ed. Mosesbad atki wa an o'oha mat haschu g Jiosh heki hu ab ha cheha g t-shohshon mamt wo ha pahl hikuch g e-chechoj a'aliga mat d wo i gigi'ik tashk ab ha-mahsithag amjed. Kum heg hab wua chum as hems d wo mihshmetha tashk
mamt pi wo mul hegai chehanig matki g Mosesbad an o'oha. Pegih, mt haschu ahgk babgat mant hema s-ap thoaj am mihshmetha tash ed?
Am g wo si i a'amichuth mamt s-ap wo s-mahchk ha'ichu.”
D ha'ijj hab kaij g Jerusalem t am kihkam, “Aha no hig pi woho d ihtha mam chum s-mu'amk.
K eda haschu ahgch pi hedai has ahg? K ia t-jehnigith. Aha no hab elith g haha'ichu mo wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha?
S has hig masma d wo hegaik mach eda s-mahch mo hedai d amjedkam ch hebai d kihkam. Kutsh wa eda g Jiosh si Kehsha pi hedai wo mahchk mat hebaijed ia wo jiwia.”

D si s-kaitham hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, s-mahch am mani hedai wud ch hebaijed him. Nt wabshaba pi wabsh hejel ni-wehhejed i hih. Jiosh o ab ni-chehani mant ia wo i wuhsh jewed thahm. Kum pi mahch g Jiosh ch hekaj pi woho ni-mahch. Ahni ani hi s-mahch ch ep s-mahch mo d wohokam nant pi ab amjed i hih.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus am ha mashchamch ge'e cheopi ch ed.
Kumd am hahawa chum bei. T wabshaba pi koi e ai g tashgaj. D pi e nako ihtham.
Kud mu'i ab i s-wohochuth k wabsh s-ju'ujpij hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Na'as woho d Jiosh si Kehsha nat pi pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas hab wo juh hegai hab mahs s-hasig ha'ichu mo ihtha hab wua.”
D am ha'i oiopo g Palasi ch am i kah hegai mo hab e kaij k am hihim k atsh am ha ahgi g u'ugchu papal. Tsh hegam am ha cheha g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat an wo bei g Jesus.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ant sha'i tash ia hu wo em-wehmajkahim ch gm hu hahawa uhpam wo hih heg wui mat ia i ni-ah'ath.
Kumt wo chum ni-gahgath ch wabshaba pi wo ni-edgith k pi wo e nako mams am wo hihi mant hebai wo ha'ichugk.”

D am wabsh i pi amich g hemajkam k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “A t hebai wo hih, chs hab pi wo edagi?” D ha'i hab ep kaij, “Na'as gm hu wo hih go'ol hemajkam ha-kihhim wui mo am ha'ichug g t-wehm o'othham k wo ha mashcha g go'ol hemajkam.
A shah'o d ahga mo hab kaij matt wo chum gahgath ch wabshaba pi wo edgith k pi wo t-nako machs am wo hihi mat hebai wo ha'ichugk.”

D am i e ai g si oithchkam tash mo ba'iwechkim d si ge'e tash heg eda piast. D am e hemapathch g hemajkam. Kud g Jesus am si amog ch hab kaij, “Ab g wo i e thagito ni-wui k ab wo bei g wechij thoakag hab masma mamt hemho wa wo ih am i tonomk.
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mamtp hedai ab ni-wui wo i e thagito k heg wa wepo mamt wo edgithath g shonkam shuhthagi am e-ihbthag ed. T heg chum hekith ab wo tha'iwunith.”

Bo kaij g Jesus ch hab ahg matt ab wui wo i t-thagito k hekaj wo bei g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K eda wenog koi ab hu t-mahks g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag nat pi koi gahi wuhsh g muhkig g Jesus k koi bei g e-kownaltalig.
D mu'i hab kaij am i kaiok, “Ihtha o'othham oki d wa woho hegai Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mach nenida.”
D hai hab ep kaij, “Thoki Jiosh si Kehsha.” D wabshaba ha'ijj hab epai kaij, “Pi oki d sha'i hegai no pi d Galilee t am o'othham.
K eda an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh g Jiosh si Kehsha ab d wo t-kownaligbad David amjedkamk ch ab wo amjedk g Bethlehem kihhim. Am ash d kihkam g Davidbad Bethlehem t am.”
D heg hekaj ab a'ai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam.
Ha'ijj o chum s-kuhpamk. D wabshaba pi hedai sha'i e nako mas hab juh.
D am uhpam hihi g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam am ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi. D ihtham ab ha kakke ch hab kaij, “Shahchu amt ahgk pi an hu bei?”
D hab kaij g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam, “Pi o hekith hedai hab sha'i kaitham neok mo ihtha.”
D hab kaij hegam Palasi ab ha wui, “Aha nat hab wa'ap em-iattogi?
Pi ach hedai ab hu s-wohochuth ahchim Palasi o hegam mo d t-wanimedtham mas d Jiosh si Kehsha ihtha.
Ihtham pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam hemajkam o ab s-wohochuth no pi pi mahch g Mosesbad chehanig. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith.”
D am ha wehmaj hegai mat wa am hu hebai chuhug ch ed am i chehgim g Jesus k hab chehgig Nicodemas. Ith o hab wa'ap d Palasi ch hab kaij ab ha wui,
“Bo chu'ig g t-chehanig matt pi hedai ab hu wo sha'i ha'ichu ha abch k ho'ipki am i mamche am lothaitk mas wa woho pi ap ha'ichu hab juh.”

D hab kaij ihtham, “Pegih, pki ahpi ab ep si ha wehmaj ihtham mo ab wabsh al Galilee t amjed. Am g i hoan g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo s-mai mo pi hema g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ab hu sha'i Galilee t amjed.”
[D amjed gm hu a'ai himto g hemajkam.
Kuchd ahchim gm hu hihim k an kohksh Olive U'us Kawulk t an.
D ab i chesh g tash. Kuchd gd hu uhpam thatha ge'e cheopi wui. D mu'i am e chehm g hemajkam Jesus wui k gn hu biha. D am thahiwua k ha mashcha.
D ab wui ha'i thatha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi am hema u'apathch g uwi. Ith atsh ha ehs g ha-kun. Kud am t-shahgith i kehsh
K hab kaij ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, ahpi map ia ha mashcham, ihtha uwi att s-ap cheh mat ha ehs g ha-kun.
K eda hab chu'ig g t-chehanig matt hemho wo wa ma'ichkwua k wo mua g uwi mat hab wo sha e juh. Pt ahpi has wo chei?”
Neh, bo kaij no pi wabsh ha'ichu s-kaimk ch s-abchuthamk g Jesus. D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu sha'i ha hudawog k am wabsh Ha'ichu o'oha jewedo g e-nowikaj.
D oi wa ihtham pi thagito k ab ep kakke. D ab hahawa i e shel g Jesus k hab kaij ab ha wui, “Pegih, mt ahpim wehpeg ab wo ma'ihi g uwi mamt hedai pi hekith hab sha'i juh g pi ap'ekam.”
Bo kaij ch am hahawa i e jumalkath k am ep o'oha jewedo.
D am i kah ihtha g chehanig ha mashchamtham ch Palasi k wabsh sha hehemako gm hu a'ai hihi si e elithch. D hegam mo d ge'eged wehpegat k wehsijj himto. K heg am wa'i wih uwi Jesus wehm.
D ab i e shel g Jesus k ab wui hab kaij, “Baht hihi hegam mo ab ha'ichu m-abchuth? Nat pi ia hu hema wih mat ab wo m-ma'ihi?”
D hab kaij g uwi, “Pi at ia hu hema wih, ni-kownalig.” D hab hahawa ep kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani hab wa'ap pi ab hu ha'ichu m-abchuth. Gamai g hihm k pi hab ep juhni g pi ap'ekam.”]

D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam, “Thani ge'e tonlig am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. Kut s-ap am wo himath Jiosh ap'ethag ed ch pi hekith ha'ichukaj wo pi e amich hegam mat hedai ab ni-wui wo e thagitokchith.”
D eda am ha'i gegok g Palasi ch ab wui hab si kaij, “Ih, p wabsh chum hejel e wohokamchuth ch aptp hems wabsh t-iattogith.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi ani em-iattogith chum anis am hi wa hejel ni-wohokamchuth. Tho wohokam mani has i kaij. S-mahch ani mant hebaijed ia jiwia k hebai wo hih. Ahpim am hi pi mahch ihtha.
Am am chum ahg mani has chu'ig ab wabsh ni-neithch ch eda pi woho ni-mahch. Ni ahni hemu pi hedai em-lothait.
Kut wabshaba d wo wohokamk g ni-ahga mant hekith wo ah mam has chu'ig nat pi g Jiosh am ni-wehm wo em-a'appe.
Neh, an o o'ohanas em-chehanig ed mamt wo s-ha wohoch matp gohkajj am ha'ichu wo wohokamch.
Pegih, ni ahni hejel ni-wohokamchuth. K g ni-ohg am hab wa'ap ni-wohokamchuth.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
D ab kakke ihtham, “A k hebai has chu'ig g m-ohg?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi am sha'i ni-mahch ch ep pi mahch g ni-ohg. Mt hems wo s-ap s-ni-mahchk ch hab wa'ap wo s-mahchk g ni-ohg.”
Neh, ith ad wehs hab kaij g Jesus am ge'e cheopi t am heg eda kih mo g hemajkam am shulig g e-mahkigdag g ge'e cheopi wehhejed. T pi hedai e nako mas an wo bei nat ge koi e ai g tashgaj.
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Am ant hu wo hih. Kumt an haha wo i chum ni-gahghim k wabshaba wo koi pi e tho'ibiak. Pi amt wo e nako mamt am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih.”
D heg hekaj hab kaij hegam haha'ichu, “Shah'o ahgch hab kaij matt pi wo t-nako matt am wo hihi mat hebai wo i hih. Aha nat wabsh hejel wo e mua.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ia am wa'i amjed ith thahm jewed. Ni ahni hi ab thahm kahchim amjed.
Kum eda pi ni-wohochuth mani d ge ahni. Ni heg hekaj am em-ahgith mamt wo koi pi e tho'ibiak.”
D ab kakke, “Kup hedai wud higi?” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud mani ga hu i wehpeg hab kaij mani hedai wud.
Mu'ijj o g em-chu'ichig. Kunt heg wo ah. K g ni-ahga d wohokam nani pi heg wa'i ahg mo haschu ni-ahgith hegai mat am i ni-kei. K heg chum hekith ahg g wohokam.”
D ihtham pi amichuth mo g Jiosh hab ahg.

D heg hekaj hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo mai mani d ge ahni mamt hekith ab uhgk wo ni-ul mamt wo ni-mua ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Am amt haha wo mai mani pi hab wua g hejel ni-tatchui ch wabshaba hegai wa'i ni-ohg tatchui hab wua ch g mashchamaj ahgachug.
Chum ani hekith ab s-wohog elith. K heg hekaj ni-wehmaj.” Neh, bo kaij g Jesus.
T muijj hegam mat ab kah ihtha ab i s-wohoch.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mat ab i chum s-wohoch, “Mtki woho ab i e thagito ni-wui mamtp am hab wo i junihi g ni-mashchama.
Mt haha wo mai g wohokam. T heg hab wo em-juh mamt hahawa pi d wo neneholk.”
D ha'i hab kaij, “Pi ach hekith hedai d sha'i neneholiga nach pi d Abrahambad amjedkam. P haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij matt hahawa pi d wo neneholk?”
D g Jesus hab kaij, “Wehs am d nenehol mamtp hedai hab i junihim g pi ap'ekam nam pi heg hekaj e wulshch.
Pi o am hu ha wehm d si kihkam g nehol mo hig g ha-aliga.
Nt ahni woho wo i em-wul'o mamtp ab wo i e thagito ni-wui. Kumt hahawa pi d wo neneholk namt pi d wo a'aligajk g ni-ohg Jiosh.
S-mahch ani mam d Abrahambad amjedkam. M eda s-ni-mu'amk nam pi pi ab hu ap wohochuth g ni-mashchama.
Heg ani am ahgahim mo haschu g ni-ohg ab ni-chehgith. M ahpim hi heg wa wepo mam d ge Jiawul amjedkam nam pi hab wua g tatchuij.”

D hab kaij ab wui, “Pi ach d ge Jiawul amjedkam. Abrahambad o d t-shohshon.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pegih, m haschu ahgch pi hab masma hab e wua mo g Abrahambad no pi heg chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam.
M eda am e nakog mamt wo ni-mua ahni mani heg wa'i em-ahgith wohokam mo g Jiosh ab ni-ahgith.
Heg am d wabsh amjedkam mam am oithch hab e junihim.” D hab kaij, “Ahchim ach hi pi d sha'i sha'i ch ed ha-a'aliga. Jiosh o d si t-ohg.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia ab amjed g Jiosh. Kumt heg hekaj ab wo si ni-tatchuath mamtp woho d wo a'aligajk. Pi ant wabsh hejel hab i ni-ah mant ab wo i hih. Jiosh at ab ni-chea.
Pi am amichuth mani has i kaij nam pi s-ko'okoth g ha'ichu ni-ahga.

Tham wabsh ge jiawul amjedkam ch s-hohho'ith mamt am hab wo wuath g tatchuij. Heg o d ha mu'akam gd hu i si wehpeg amjed ch d ep s-chu iattomkam ch pi has sha'i elith ha'ichu ha iattogithch no pi wehs g iattogig ab d amjedkamaj.
Kuni ahni g wohokam ahg. Kum heg hekaj pi ni-wohochuth.
Neh, namt hig wo e nako mamt am wo wohokamch mas haschu d i pi ap ni-chu'ichig? Pegih, ab o em-ab mamt ab wo s-ni-wohoch nani pi em-ahgith g wohokam.
Hegai mo ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh o ab kaiham g Jiosh ne'oki. Kum pi ab hu kaiham nam pi pi ab hu d amjedkamaj.
D g haha'ichu ab hahawa si chehmo g Jesus ch hab kaij, “Thapki wabsh t-obga ch d wabsh sha jiawul.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi o woho mam has i kaij. Pi ani d sha'i jiawul. Ab ani si ha'ichuchuth g ni-ohg. M wabshaba ahpim wabsh pi ni-ha'ichuchuth.
Pi ani heg am hu neithahim mas hedai ab wo si has ni-elithath. K wabshaba am hema d hegai mo am ni-gahgith g ab has elithadag ch wo ha lothai hegam mo pi ab hu has ni-elith.
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat pi hekith wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g ha'ichu ni-ahga.”

D hab kaij ab wui, “Si att hahawa s-ap s-mai mapki d wabsh sha jiawul. Neh, muh at g Abrahambad. T g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam hab wa'ap ko'ok k huhug. P eda hab kaij mat pi hekith wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g ha'ichu m-ahga.

Chum apki si e ha'ichuchuth ch hab kaij ihtha. Abrahambad atki muh. Nap hab e elith map gm hu ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hegai? T g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththambad hab wa'ap ko'ok k huhug. Thohp hab chum e elith?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wabsh wo pehegi neokath mantp ab hejel wo chum si ni-haschuthath. Heg o ab si has ni-elith ni-ohg mam e-Jioshga ahg.
Pi am hekith sha'i woho mahch hegai. Ni wabshaba ahni s-mahch. Kuntp hab wo chei mani pi mahch k d wabsh wo s-chu iattomkamk mam hab chu'ig ahpim. S-mahch ani ch ab si u'ukch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
Em-shohshon Abrahambad o si s-ap e tahtk mat wo nei mant an wo i wuhsh. T hekith i neithok si s-hehgig.”
D si has i el ihtham k hab kaij. “Ih, heki at hu wa'i muh. Aha nap neith ch eda pi koi ai g hetaspo wehst-mahm ahithag?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mani an ha'ichug ni-ohg kih ed mat eda koi mahsi g Abrahambad.”
Neh, d gn hu i u'ihi g hohothai mat hekaj wo ma'ichkwua g Jesus. D wabshaba wabsh s-a'agi am ha shahgith him k gm hu i wuhsh ge'e cheopi amjed.
Kuchd am hihim. D ab haha wabsh hema thaha g o'othham ch e-mahsithag amjed pi nea.
Kuchd ab kakke g Jesus, “Neh, t-mashchamtham, thoh'o d chu'ichig mo d pi neatham ihtha o'othham? No d hejel chu'ichigaj aha no d ge'egedgaj ha-chu'ichig?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ith o pi hab d sha'i ahga mas d ha-chu'ichig. Heg o hekaj pi nea mat g Jiosh am wo chehgi g e-gewkthag ab amjed.
Am att hab wo junihith g chikpanaj hegai mat ia i ni-ah'ath mo ithani am kia wi'is g tash no pi ab him mamt hahawa pi wo e nako.
Thani tonlig am em-wehhejed mani ia em-wehmaj.”
D hab che'iok g Jesus k am siswua jewed thahm k am hab juh g bith k hekaj ab bithsh g wuhpuij hegai pi neatham

k hab ahg, “Am g him k ab i wakon g e-wuhiosha heg eda wo'o mo hab e a'aga Siloam.” (K hab d ahga ihtha “I Ah'ath.”) T wa woho am hih ihtha pi neatham k am wako g e-wuhiosha k am i uhpam jiwia s-ap ha'ichu neithch.
Hegam mo s-mahch ch hegam mo si neith mo wabsh ha'ichu ha tahni ad am i neithok hab kaij, “Aha no pi woho d hegai mo am thahiwup ch ha'ichu ha tahni?”
D ha'i hab kaij mo d hegai. D ha'i hab ep kaij, “Pi o d hegai. Ho o wabsh si wepo mahs.” D hekaj hab kaij ihtha mo wa pi neakahim, “Thani ahni.”
Kumd ab ep kakke, “Shahpt masma nent?”

D hab kaij, “Hegai mash d Jesus at ab bithsh g ni-wuhpui am jewedo siswuak k hab ni-ahg mant wo him k wo wako g ni-wuhiosha am Siloam wo'o ch ed. Kunt am him k hab wabsh chum ni-wakon k ha hekaj s-ap ha'ichu neith.”
D hab kaij ihtham, “T hebai hih?” Kud hab hahawa kaij mo pi mahch mas hebai hih.
D am wa ha'i bei ihtha o'othham mo wa pi nea am Palasi ha wui.
K d t-mihshmetha tash mad eda g Jesus hab juh ihtha.
D g Palasi ab hahawa kakke mas has masma nent. D hab kaij, “Hegai Jesus at ab bithsh g ni-wuhpui am siswuak jewedo. Nt ab i wako g ni-wuhiosha k hahawa s-ap ha'ichu neith.”

D ha'i hab kaij hegam Palasi, “Neh, pi o ab hu sha'i Jiosh amjed nat pi melchkwua g t-chehanig hab juhk ihtha t-mihshmetha tash ed.” D am a'ai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam nad pi ha'ijj hab epai kaij, “Pi at wo e nako g pi ap chu'ijkam mas hab mahs s-hasig ha'ichu hab wo juh.”
