D heg hekaj ab ep si kakke hegam Palasi, “Shahp i elith hegai o'othham map hab kaij mat m-nench.” D hab kaij, “Bani elith mo d ge Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
D wabshaba pi wohochuth ihtham haha'ichu mas wa woho d pi neatham ch am ha waith g ge'egedgaj
ch mu'i ha'ichu ha kakke mas d ha-aliga ihtha ch ga hu i e-mahsithag amjed pi nea, kch ehp mas has masma hahawa ha'ichu neith.
D hab hahawa kaij g ge'egedgaj mo d ha-aliga ch ga hu e-mahsithag amjed pi nea
ch wabshaba pi mahch mas has masma s-ap ha'ichu neith ch ep pi mahch mas hedai thoaj ch ab ha ahgith mat wo kakke no pi d ge'e k ch hejel am wo e ah.

Hegam haha'ichu ad wa am heki hu ap'ech mat pi wo ha hiwigi mat am hu ep wo i wahp cheopi ch ed hegam mat hedam hab wo chei mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. D heg hekaj s-ha ehbith g ge'egedgaj ch hab kaij mat ab wo kakke, t hejel am wo e ah.
D ab ep i wai g Palasi ihtha mat bei g e-nenthag k hab ahg, “Am g t-ahgith g wohokam mapt ab wo hehgchul g Jiosh. S-mahch ach mo ihtha has chehgi d pi ap chu'ijkam.”
D hab kaij ihtha mat bei g e-nenthag: “Pi ani sha'i mahch mas d pi ap chu'ijkam ch wabshaba ith s-ap s-mahch mani pi neakahim ch hemuch haha wabsh si s-nea.”
D ihtham ab hahawa ep kakke, “T has m-juh k m-nench?”
D hab kaij, “M ani wa heki hu em-ahgith. Mt pi ab hu ni-kaiha. A m haschu ahgch ab ep ni-kakke? Aha namt ahpim hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D ihtham ab si s-keh'ith ch hab kaij, “Ahpi apt ab i s-wohoch hegai hemajkam. Ahchim ach hi g Mosesbad ab s-wohochuth.
S-mahch ach mo g Jiosh g Mosesbad ab ha'ichu ahgith. Kuch pi sha'i mahch mas hebai amjed him hegai.”
D hab kaij ihtha, “M haschu ahgch pi mahch mas hebai amjed him. T eda ab i ni-nench.
S-mahch ach mo g Jiosh pi ab hu kaiham g pi ap chu'ijkam ch wabshaba ab ha kaiham hegam mo ab si has elith ch am hab junihim g tatchuij.
Pi ach hekith sha'i kah mas hedai i nench hegai mo e-mahsithag amjed pi nea.
T hi wo wa e nako hema mat hab wo juh ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu matp ab Jiosh amjed wo himath.”

D ab si s-ko'okam has ahg ch hab kaij, “Thap wabsh si hekia pi ap'ekam ga hu'i e-mahsithag amjed ch eda chum ha'ichu t-mashcham.” D amjed gm hu si i wuhshath cheopi t amjed k pi hiwigi mas am ep wo i wah.
D kah g Jesus mamt i wuhshath k am i gahghim k hab kaij am i chehgiok, “Nap ab si hiwig g Jiosh si Kehsha?”
D hab kaij ihtha o'othham, “A k hedai wud. Am g ni-ahgith. Nt ab wo si i hiw.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Thani ahni map hahawa s-ap ni-neith mant wa m-nench.”
D ab si i gei wui k hab kaij, “Ab ani si m-hiwig, s-ap'ekam ni-kownalig.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Ia ant jiwia jewed thahm mant wo mahsko wua mo hedai pi nea ch hedai s-nea ith eda Jiosh ap'ethag.”
D ha'i am gegok g Palasi ch si has i elith k hab kaij, “Nap ahchim hab ep chum t-ahg mach hab wa'ap pi nenea.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi amt ab hu wo em-abch mamtp wo wohokamch mam pi nenea am Jiosh ap'ethag ed. M wabshaba hab chum kaij mam s-nenea.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “No hig pi woho mat g s-chu ehskam wabsh s-a'agi haskojed ab wo i wah heg eda kolhai mam am ha nuhkuth g kahwal k wo s-ha ehsitham?
T wabshaba g si ha nuhkuththam ab wo i wah kihjeg amjed.
T g kihjeg nuhkuththam ab wo i kuhpi'oki. K g ha nuhkuththam am si ha chehcheg ch gm hu i ha wanimed.
T am wo i wuwhag k gm hu wo i oi no pi s-mahch g ne'okij. T am ha ba'ich wo himath.
Pi at hedai ep wo i oi no pi pi mahch g ha-ne'oki k wabsh wo e gantad.”
Neh, ith ad hekaj am chum ha'ichu ha mashcham g Jesus. D wabshaba pi sha'i amichuth mo haschu hab ahg.
D heg hekaj hab ep kaij, “Ahni ani hab ni-ahg ch ni-wepogith g kolhai kihjeg.
Hegam mo hab e a'aga mo d em-wanimedtham ch eda pi ab hu ni-wohochuth o d s-chu e'eskam ch d ha mu'akam. K wabshaba g ni-wohochuththam pi ab hu ha kaiham.

Heg ani wepo mo g kihjeg. Kahwal o am wapke kolhai ch ed. K pi ha'ichu has e wua am ha tahgio. Kumt ahpim ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k hab wa'ap wo e tho'ibia. Kahwal o ab mahks g s-kehg ha'ichu hugi. Kum ahpim ab ep mahks mam haschu i tatchua.
S-chu ehskam at wo jiwia mat wo ha u'u k wo ha koktha. Nt ahni ia jiwia mant s-ba'ama ab wo i em-mah g thoakag
nani pi s-wohom d em-nuhkuththam. “Neh, kahwal ha nuhkuththam at chum hems ha wehhejed wo e muhkith.
Hegai mo d wabsh ha-pionag at am wabsh wo i ha thagito k wo meh mat am wo jiwia g sheh'e. T g sheh'e am wo wahk k wo mu'a k wo ha gantad.
Pion at wo heb hu meh no pi pi ha tatchua g ha-shoshoiga.

“Nt eda ahni wo i nako g sho'igthag am ha wehhejed g ni-wohochuththam hab masma mo g si ha nuhkuththam g kahwal chum anis wo ni-muhkith am ha wehhejed. Kahwal ch ha nuhkuththam o ab a'ai s-e mahch. Kuch g ni-wohochuththam ch ahni ab hab wa'ap a'ai s-t-mahch. Ch ahchim g ni-ohg wehm hab wa masma ab a'ai s-t-mahch.
Ha nuhkuththam at wehs ab wo i ha hemapai g e-kahwaliga. Nt ahni hab wa masma ab wo i ha hemapai wehs hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohoch, chum hems g gawul mahs hemajkam.
“Am ant wabsh wo i ni-thagito muhkig wui. K g ni-ohg heg hekaj si ni-tatchua. Nt ab uhpam ep wo i ni-chegito.

Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wabsh hejel wo e elith k wo ni-mua. U'ukch ani g ni-ap'ethag mant am wo i ni-thagito muhkig wui k ab uhpam ep wo i ni-chegito. Ab o ni-chehani g ni-ohg mant ith am hab wo juh.”
D am ep a'ai e ne'owi g hemajkam heg hekaj mo has i kaij.
Kud mu'ijj hab nahnko kaij babgatk, “Thoki wabsh jiawul. Pi o wehsig. Shahchu am ahgch ab kaiham?”
D wabshaba ha'ijj hab epai kaij, “Pi at wo e nako hegai mo d wabsh sha jiawul mas hab kaitham s-kehg wo neokath ch wo nench g pi neatham.”
D am i e ai g ge'e cheopi wakonadag tash. D eda d s-hehpich'edkam.
Kuchd am oiopo anai mo hab e a'aga Solomonbad watto am ge'e cheopi t am.
D am i e chehm g haha'ichu k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Tt he'es i tash wo m-nenida mapt wo t-ahgi maps wa woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heki ani hu am em-ahgith. M eda pi ni-wohochuth. Ni-ohg o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu. K heg am chum em-tashogith mani hedai wud.
M wabshaba pi ab hu ni-wohochuth nam d ge ni-hemajkamga.
Neh, am o oith g e-nuhkuththam g kahwal no pi s-mahch am i s-amichuthk g ne'okij. K hab wa'ap ni-oith g ni-wohochuththam no pi s-ni-mahch. Ni ahni ep s-ha mahch.
Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T hegam pi hekith wo huhug. T pi hedai wo sha'i ni-wohppo'i.
Ni-ohg o wehs ha'ichu thahm s-gewkthag ch si s-wihnam an ha u'ukch hegam mo ab ni-mahkch. T pi hedai wo wohppo'i.
Ahni g ni-ohg wehm ach d hemako.” Neh, ith ad hab wabsh chum chei g Jesus.
D g hemajkam am ep u'ihi g hohothai mat wo ma'ichkwua.
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Mu'i ant ha'ichu hab juh g s-ap'ekam nat pi ab ni-mah g ni-ohg g gewkthag. K haschu d hegai mamt heg hekaj wo ni-ma'ichkwua?”

D hab kaij g hemajkam, “Pi ach heg hekaj s-m-ma'ichkwuimk s-ap'ekam ch wabshaba heg hekaj map pad neok. Thap wabsh o'othham ch eda hab chum a'aga g Jiosh mo d si m-ohg ch hab ab chum e wepogith g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “An o o'ohanas em-chehanig ed mo g Jiosh hab ha a'aga jijosh hegam mo u'achug g ha'ichu ahgaj, chum as d wabsh hemajkam.
T wahm ahni hig woho am si i ni-kehsh k ia i ni-ah'ath ith thahm jewed. M eda haschu ahgch hab ni-ahg mani pad neok mani hab kaij mani d Jiosh alithag?
Mantp wa woho pi am hu hab wo junihith g ni-ohg chikpan, mt s-ap pi wo ni-wohoch.
Ni wabshaba am hab junihim. Mt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm.”
D g haha'ichu am hahawa ep chum cheha g cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo hihim k wo bei. D wabshaba ep e tho'ibia ab ha amjed.
Kuchd gm hu hahawa hihim k gm hu ai g Jordan Akimel k am aigo i chehchsh k am thatha mo wa g Johnbad am ha pahl wapkon k am thadha.
D mu'i hemajkam am wui thatha hab kaijch, “Pi at wa ha'ichu s-hasigam hab juh g John. Kuki wabshaba d wohokam mo haschu i t-ahgith ith amjed o'othham.”
D mu'i hemajkam ab i s-wohoch g Jesus amai.
Am ad wa hema kih Bethany kihhim t am ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch am hu hebai haha wabsh mumku. Lazarusbad u'uwiga ad d Martha ch Mary.
(Ihtha Mary o wa d hegai mad wa g uhw shuhthagi an iawua Jesus tahtad an k an i thagio wabsh g e-che'echew mo'okaj.)
Kudki ihtham u'uwigaj am hema cheha mad am wo him k wo ahgi g Jesus, “S-ap'ekam t-kownalig, si m-nawoj at mumku.”
D am i kah g ha-ahga g Jesus k am t-ahgith, “Lazarus ash mumku. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat gm hu hab wo i e juh. Nt wo tho'ibia mamt hekaj ab wo ihm g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab epai wo ni-ihm.”
Jesus ad wa ab wa chum si pihk e elith ha wui ihtham Martha ch Mary ch Lazarus
ch wabshaba pi am hu wa hekaj i hih mo ab waith. K am d i gohk tash amjed.
D hab kaij ab t-wui, “M att hig ep wo uhpam hihi Judea chekshani wui.”
Kuchd ahchim chum pi hohho'ith ch hab kaij ab wui, “T-mashchamtham, pi o koi d sha'i tash mo wa am chum s-m-ma'ichkwuimk g hemajkam. Ttp eda am ep wo hihi!”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “T am wabsh s-ap wo himath g o'othham tash ch ed ch wabshaba wo e huchwua s-chuhugam k ed. Pegih, pi at has wo e juh mo eda ni-ap'echuthch g Jiosh mant hab wo junihith g chikpanaj.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Koi at g t-nawoj Lazarus. Nt wabshaba am wo uhpam him k wo wuha.”
Kuchd hab kaij, “Kohsig o s-kehgaj wehhejed. T wo wa hejel ap'et.”
D eda g Jesus heg hab ahg mat muh g Lazarus
ch heg hekaj hab kaij, “Neh, muh at g Lazarus.
Ni wabshaba wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mani pi am hu wehmaj namt pi haha wo nei mant has wo ni-juh k ab ba'ich wo i s-ni-wohoch. Tt oi wo hihim k wo nei.”
D ihtha Thomas mam hab a'aga Kuathi hab kaij ab t-wui, “Pegih, ttp wo oi g t-mashchamtham k wehmaj wo t-ko'ij.”
Kuchd gd hu thatha Bethany t am k s-mai mash d wa'i gi'ik tash matsh gd hu e cheh g Lazarus.
Tki eda mu'ijj am thatha g hemajkam ab Jerusalem t amjed mat am wo i ha gewkemhu g Martha ch Mary no pi d wa'i gohk mihya.
D ga hu t-nam g Martha nash pi kah mo ab him g Jesus. Tki g Mary ga hu wa'i wih ha-kih ab.
D hab kaij g Martha ab wui g Jesus, “Neh, ni-kownalig, mapt hems s-hohtam wo jiwia, t chum pi wo muh g t-wehnag.
Ni wabshaba s-mahch mat g Jiosh ab wo m-mah mapt haschu ab wo i tai, chum hems hemuch mat i ge'etha g ha'ichu pi t-ap'ethag.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “T wo uhpam e chegito g em-wehnag.”
Kud hab ep kaij g Martha, “S-mahch ani mat uhpam wo e chegito mat hekith wo i huhug g jewed.”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ia ani ha'ichug ahni mant wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i ab amjed g muhkig k ab wo i ha mah g thoakag. Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mo ab ni-hiwig. T wo uhpam e chechegito am i ko'ok. Nap s-wohochuth ihtha?”
Kud hab kaij g Martha, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig, s-wohochuth ani map d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d Jiosh alithag. An o o'ohadag Jiosh o'ohana ed maptsh ia wo jiwia jewed thahm.”
Kud gm hu hahawa uhpam hih g Martha k atsh am wabsh s-a'agi wai g Mary ash hab kaijch mo ab him g ha mashchamtham ch ab waith.
D am ha hekaj s-hohtam hih g Mary k gd hu jiwia mat am t-nam g Martha natt ge koi ai g kihhim.
Kud mu'ijj i oi g Mary hegam moki am ha wehm shoani ash hab em-ahgch mat gm hu uhpam ep wo hih hiha'ini wui mat am wo shoakath.
D am i cheh g Mary g Jesus k ab i gei wecho k hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, mapt hems s-hohtam wo jiwia, t chum pi wo muh g t-wehnag.”
D am i nei g Jesus mo shoak g Mary. D hegam ep shoani mo wehmaj. D gd hu si ai g ihbthaj. D si has e tahtk
k ab ha kakke mas hebai ehsto g chuhkugaj. D hab kaij ihtham, “Oi g t-oith k am wo nei matt am ehsto.” Kuchd am hahawa hihim k am thatha k am nei mat am ehsto.
D am i shosha g Jesus.
D heg hekaj hab kaij g hemajkam, “Neh, kuki ab si pihk e elith wui.”
D wabshaba ha'ijj hab ep kaij, “Neh, t wa g pi neatham thoaj. T haschu ahgk pi thoaj g Lazarus mat pi wo muh?”
D am ep si has i e taht g Jesus k am i miabi g hiha'ini. Ith o ab cheho ch ed hab chu'ig ch g hothaikaj ab kuhpi.
D hab ha ahg g Jesus mat gm hu wo i nu'ichkwua g hothai. D g Martha hab kaij, “T-kownalig, heki at hu padt no pi d wa'i gi'ik tash mat am e cheh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Napt pi chegito mani wa m-ahgith mapt wo nei g s-hasig ha'ichu k wo taht g Jiosh gewkthag maptp ab wo s-ni-wohoch.”
D gm hu hab i e nu'ichkwua g hothai. D am e thahm i nea g Jesus k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ab ani i m-ho'ige'elith map ab ni-kaiham.
S-mahch ani map chum hekith ab ni-kaiham ch wabshaba hab kaij ihtha ihtham ha wehhejed hemajkam. T hab wo s-wohoch mapt ahpi ia i ni-ah'ath,”
k am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahun k am hahawa si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Lazarus, ab g i wuhshani!”

D ab i wuhsh g Lazarus k an wabsh kia bihiwigs g i'ikuskaj mach hekaj ha bihiwig g t-ko'i ch ab wabsh kia ma'ishp g wuhioshaj g ikuskaj. D hab ha ahg g Jesus, “Gam g hu wo padch g i'ikus k wo hiwigi mat wo hih uhpam.” Neh, d wa woho hab e juh.
Mu'ijj hegam mad am i ha chehgio g Martha ch Mary ad ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha am i neithok mad haschu hab juh.
Tki wabshaba ha'i ehp gm hu hihi Palasi ha wui k am ha ahgi mat haschu hab juh.
Kutsh am e nam g Palasi ch u'ugchu papal ha wehm g ge'e e jehnigiththam k am a'aga mas has wo juh ihtha s-hasig ha'ichu hab wuatham.
“Wehsijj at ab wo i s-wohoch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha mattp am wabsh wo neithath. T g Rome kokownal am wo i e nakog k wo i wua g ge'e t-cheopi k wo wehs t-koktha,” bad kaij ihtham am a'agathch.
Sh am ha'ichug hegai mad d si uhgchu pahl ch hab chehgig Caiaphas ch si s-gewkam hab ha ahg, “Kaij, ahpim am sha'i pi ha'ichu a'amichuth
ch pi mahch mo ba'ich i s-ap'e mat hemako o'othham wo muh wehs t-wehhejed kih hegai mattp wehsijj wo t-ko'ij.”
Neh, bad kaij ch eda pi mahch mo g Jiosh am tashogith heg hekaj ne'okij mo e aihim mat g Jesus wo e muhkith ha wehhejed g Tutuligo
ch wehs ha wehhejed g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T ihtham ha'i ab wo i s-wohoch g Jesus k ab wo i e hemakoj e wehm.
Neh, ia'i amjed ad g haha'ichu am i e nako mat wo mua g Jesus.
D heg hekaj hahawa pi an hu s-masma oimmed g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed am i thagitok g Bethany. Chd gm hu hihim k am ha'ichugkahim mo am d Ephraim kihhim mo am miabithch g tohono jewed.
Kud eda e aihim mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. K mu'ijj am hihim gm hu a'aijed Jerusalem kihhim wui mat am wo i e nako heg wehhejed.
D chum hedai an chum neith g Jesus am i e hemapathk ge'e cheopi t am ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Pi atp hems ia hu wo sha'i jiwia. Shahm i elith.”
Kuki eda g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi am i ha chehani g hemajkam mat hemho wa wo ha ahgi sha s-mahchk mo hebai ha'ichug g Jesus. T an wo bei.
Chuhthp tash o wa am wi'is mat wo e ai g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag wuhshtha.
Kud wa am hab e juh g ge'e gegosig Bethany t am wehhejed g Jesus. Kuchd gm hu hihim k am ha wehm t-gegosith. D g Lazarus am ep t-wehmaj. Martha ad am ha wehmaj hegam mad am hihithod ch an t-to'ith.

D g Mary gd hu jiwia Jesus wui k g si s-namkig uhw shuhthagi u'a ch an iawua Jesus tahtad an. K eda d hemako s-wehch. D an i thagio wabsh g e-che'echew mo'okaj. D wehsko uhwa ihtha uhw shuhthagi am kih ch ed.
D hab kaij hegai t-wehm kehshaj g Jesus mo hab chehgig Judas Iscariot,
“T haschu ahgk pi e gagda ihtha uhw shuhthagi matt wo ha mah g sho'igkam, natt pi ahim g waik siant pihsh namkigdag ab wo i nei g lial heg amjed.”
D eda pi woho s-ha ho'ige'ith g sho'igkam ch wabshaba s-behimk g lial nadki pi s-chu ehsk ch chum nuhkuth g t-lialiga ch wabsh hejel hekaj.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Thagitoni. T-himthag oithk at hab juh g ni-muhkig wehhejed.
Chum o hekith ia em-shahgith g sho'igkam. Nt wabshaba ahni hi pi wabsh chum hekith ia wo em-shahgithk.”
D eda wehsko kaithag mad g Jesus ab i wuhshath g Lazarus muhkig amjed. Kud mu'i am thatha g Judea t am hemajkam s-ha neithamk.
Kud mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha k am i ha thagito g e-wanimedtham am i neithok g Lazarus. D am i s-mai g u'ugchu papal k am i e nako mat g Lazarus hab wa'ap wo mua.

D am ba'ich i mahsi. Kuchd am i t-nakog k gm hu hihi Jerusalem wui. D eda mu'i am e hemapathch g hemajkam kihhim ch ed mat wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Chd am hihim wohg ch ed. D mu'ijj ga hu t-nam am i kaiok mat am wo jiwia g Jesus.
Ihtham ad ha uh'ukch g chukud shosha u'us i'ibhonig ch ab si has elith g Jesus si s-kaitham hab kaijch, “Ith o d s-ap'ekam t-kownalig ch ia jiwia am wehhejed g Jiosh. K g Jiosh si s-ho'ige'ith.”
D g Jesus am hema ha tai g wechij wuhlu k heg cheshathk.
Heki o hu an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh ith hab wo e juh ch hab chu'ig: Pi g am wo e totothsith, ahpim Tutuligo! Ithani at ia wo jiwia g ge'e em-kownalig an thaichugch wechij wuhlu t an.

Kuchd pi sha'i amichuth wehs ihtha. Kut wa wabshaba hekith ab uhgk i e bei g Jesus thahm kahchim wui, tt am hahawa i chegito mo an o'ohanas ihtha Jiosh o'ohana ed. Kutki heg hekaj hab e juh am wehhejed.
Ihtham mu'i hemajkam ad wa am nam g Jesus nash pi kah mat ab i wuhshath g Lazarus muhkig amjed. Hegam mo wa am neith ash am ha ahgith.
D hab kaij g Palasi ab a'ai e wui am i ha neithok, “Ha g wo neith matki wehsijj am i oi. Pi attki wo t-nako matt wo keshwua.”
D am ha'i thatha g Greek hemajkam Jerusalem t am mat ab wo has el g Jiosh heg eda tho'ibiathag wuhshtha piast.
Kuchd am oiopo. D ihtham am thatha k am cheh g Philip k am ahgi mo s-neithamk g Jesus.
D g Philip am ahgi g Andrew. (Ihtham ad am d chum kihkam Bethsaida t am am Galilee chekshani ch ed.) Kud am hahawa e wehm hihim k am ahgi g Jesus.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ithani at e ai g ni-tashga mat g ni-ohg wo ni-maskogi mani d si Kehshaj.

T wabshaba wehpeg ha'ichu hab wo e juh am ni-tahgio. Neh, nat hig am wo i wuhshani k ab wo mu'itha g pilkani pi am hu e eshk? Hemho wa at am wo e ei jewed wecho k wo muh k hab wa'i masma wo i wuhshani k ab wo mu'itha.
Ith ani hab ahg mat g o'othham wo heki wua g e-thoakag matp wo s-huwithath hejel e wehhejed k wabshaba wo edgithath g pi ha huhugetham thoakag matp wo hugio g e-thoakag am ni-wehhejed.

Bat wo junihith g ni-tatchui hegai matp hedai hab e elith mat d wo ni-pionagk. Kunt hab wo juh mat an wo ni-wehmajk mant hebai wo i ha'ichugk. Ni-ohg at ab wo si has i ha el hegam mo hab junihim g ni-tatchui.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Ni-ihbthag at ab si i e kudu. Ni hab chum ni-tahtk mant hab wo chei, ‘Ni-ohg, pi g hiwgith mas hab wo e juh ihtha am ni-tahgio.’ Nt eda heg hekaj ia jiwia mant am wo gahi wuhsh hegai s-ko'ok ha'ichu.
Pegih, ni-ohg, am g maskogith g e-gewkthag am gahi ni-wuhshanim.” D ab neo g Jiosh thahm kahchim t amjed k hab kaij, “Am ant heki hu i maskogith k am hab ep wo juh.”
Mu'i o wa am gegok g hemajkam ch kah hegai mo ab neok. Ha'ijj o hab kaij, “Ab o kaithaghim g tataniki.” Kud ha'ijj hab kaij, “Anghil at ab wui neo.”
D Wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ahpim at em-wehhejed ab s-kaitham neo, ch pi ahni ni-wehhejed.
E at ai mat ge'e wo bei g chu'ichig g hemajkam. Jijawul ha-ge'ejig o chum e kownalchuth ith thahm jewed. Nt wabshaba oi wo gewito.
Ab amt wo ni-naggia uhs t ab ahni Jiosh si Kehsha. Kunt ab haha wo i ha wanchshul g hemajkam ni-wui.”
Neh, bo wa kaij g Jesus ch oki heg hab ahg mat has masma wo muh.
D hab kaij g hemajkam, “An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat g Jiosh si Kehsha pi hekith wo muh. P haschu ahgch hab kaij mapt ab wo e naggia uhs t ab maptp woho d Jiosh si Kehsha?”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Ia ant he'es i tash wo ha'ichugk em-shahgith ch heg wa wepo mani d tonlig em-wehhejed. Am g s-ap wo hihimath tonlig oithch. T hab pi wo em-ma'ish g s-chuhugam. Hegai matp hedai am wo himath s-chuhugam k ed o pi mahch mas hebai him.
Ab g wo i s-ni-wohochuth mani eda ia wabsh kia ha'ichug k hab masma tonlig ch ed wo hihimath.” Neh, bad kaij ch gm hu hahawa i e mehkoth ab ha amjed.
Mu'ikko ad wa hab juh g s-hasig ha'ichu g Jesus am ha-nena ed ihtham hemajkam. Kud wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu wohochuth mo d Jiosh si Kehsha.

Neh, d hab wa masma hab e juh hegai matki g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Isaiah an o'oha. An o hab chu'ig: Pi o mu'i ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu t-ahga ab m-amjed. K g m-gewkthag pi tasho am ha-wehhejed.

Tki an ep o'oha g Isaiabad: Jiosh at hab ha juh mo pi ap ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu amichuth mat pi ab hu wui wo i e nohnogith k pi wo e tho'ibia ab pi ap'ekam t amjed. Isaiabad o wa ab amjed neok g Jesus gewkthag natsh pi Jiosh am tashogi. Kut ihtham hemajkam wa woho pi e nako mas ab wo s-wohoch g Jesus.
Kud mu'i ab hi wa chum s-wohoch g haha'ichu. Tsh wabshaba g Palasi gm hu wo i ha wuwhas matp wo s-mai mat ab s-wohoch. D heg hekaj pi am hu tasho e ahg
no pi s-hohho'ith g ab has ha-elitha g hemajkam ch g Jiosh ab has elitha wabsh pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth.
Jesus ad am ep ha jehnigith ch si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Matp hedai ab wo i s-ni-wohochuth k hab wa'ap s-wohochuth g ni-ohg Jiosh.
K hedai i ni-neith ch hab wa'ap neith.
Ia ant jiwia ith thahm jewed k hab sha masma mo g tonlig am em-wehhejed nani pi am tashogith g wohokam himthag. Kumt s-ap wo himath g e-thoakag hab masma mam am tonlig ch ed mamtp ab wo ni-hiwgath.
Mu'ijj o pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch pi ab hu ni-hiwig. Nt wabshaba pi heg hekaj ia jiwia manis wo ha lothai. S-ha ani tho'ibiamk.
T wo e lothai g ni-ne'okikaj mat hekith wo i huhug g jewed.
Ni-ohg o ab ni-chehani mant haschu hab wo chei. Ni pi g hejel ni-ne'oki hab kaij.
Kumt heg hekaj ab wo kaiham k hab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Heg ani wa'i hab kaij mo g Jiosh ab ni-chehani.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.

D am him k am i e ai matt ba'ich tash wo mua g kahwal mad k wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Kuki s-mahch g Jesus mat am wa e ai matki ia wo thagito ihtha jewed k wo hih am e-ohg wui. D eda si pihk e elith wehs e-thoakagkaj ab ha wui hegam mat ab i s-wohoch.
D am e ap'ech matt am wo t-gegos hema kih am gm hu i juhk. D wa eda heki hu ab i kaiha g Judas Iscariot g ge Jiawul k am i e shelch mat wo gagda g Jesus.
Ab atsh Jiosh amjed ia jiwia g Jesus k ab wui ep wo i e nodagi. Kush g Jiosh ab wehs mahkch g gewkthag. D ith s-mahch g Jesus
ch wabshaba am i kekiwua k am wuahawua g e-lihwa k g tuayakaj ab e bahshodath
k am ge was wakonakud ch ed k ab i wapkonahi g t-tahtad k heg hekaj ha thagio tuaya mat ab e bahshodath.
D ab i ai g Simon Peter. D heg si has e tahtk ch hab kaij, “Ih, napt wo wapko g ni-tahtad k eda d ge ni-kownalig!”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Pi ap hi wa amichuth hemuch mani haschu chum em-tashogith ith hekaj ch wabshaba wo wa amich imhab i ba'ich.”
Kud hab hahawa kaij g Peter, “Pi apt hekith wo sha'i wapko g ni-tahtad.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi apt d wo i ni-wehmtthamk mant wo sha pi wapko g m-tahtad.”
Kud hahawa si s-hohtam hab kaij g Peter, “Ni-kownalig, pi g heg wa'i ni-tahtad wapkon k wabshaba g ni-nohnhoi ch ni-wuhiosha ehp.”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Heki apt hu e wako wehsko koi jiwiak. Heg at wa'i e-tahtad wo wapko hegai mat hedai heki hu wehsko e wako mat koi am hu wo jiwia kih t am. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g em-thothakag wehs i e kegch, heg hi wa i hemako mat pi i e kegch.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus no pi s-mahch mat hedai wo gagda.
T am i ha wapko g ha-tahtad k ab uhpam wah g e-lihwa k ga hu hahawa ep thahiwua mihsa wui k ab ha kakke, “Nam s-amichuth mant haschu ahgk hab em-juni ihtha?
Neh, bam ni-a'aga mani d em-kownalig ch d em-mashchamtham. K am wa s-ap'e no pi woho ihtha.
Thani wa chum em-kownalig ch d em-mashchamtham ch eda am i ni-jumalkath k heg ni-wepogi mani d wabsh em-pionag. Pegih, mt ahpim hab wa masma ab a'ai wo e neithath
mant am em-chehgi ch ab a'ai wo i e wehmtath
nam pi d ni-pionag. Kut pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elithath mas ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mo hi g ahmoj.
M hahawa s-mahch mamt has wo chum masmak. Kut d wo s-ap tahhathkamk am em-wehhejed mamtp woho hab wo masmak.

“Mt wabshaba pi wehsijj ab hu wo bei ihtha no pi an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mamt hema ab ni-wui wo kekiwua ahpim mam ni-wehm e gegosith. Kuni s-mahch mat hedai hab wo e juh nani pi wehs s-em-mahch ahpim mant ab i em-gawulkai.
Kuni heki hu ab em-ahgith mat koi hab e juh. Kut hekith hab wo i e juh, mt ab haha wo s-wohoch mani woho d Jiosh si Kehsha.
Jiosh o ab ni-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga. Kuni ab epai em-mahk. K heg hekaj ab s-ap ni-neith ch ab s-ap neith g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo s-ap em-neithath.”
D am hahawa si e kudu g Jesus k hab t-ahg, “Pi ant ap ni-taht k wo em-ahgi mamt hema ahpim wo ni-gagda.”
Kuchd si has i t-taht k ab wabsh a'ai si t-neith pi sha'i amichuthch mas hedai hab ahg.
Kunid eda an hugithaj an thaha g Jesus ahni mo ni-hekaj si pihk e elith.
D hekaj g Simon Peter wabsh s-a'agi ab ni-ahgith mant wo kakke mas hedai hab ahg.
Kunid wabsh s-a'agi ab epai kakke g Jesus mas hedai hab ahg.
D hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Hegai mant wehpeg ab wo bih o d hegai.” Kud wa woho am ge bia g hithod k ab mah g Judas Iscariot.
D am wabsh i chum huh g e-bih. D g ge Jiawul am ba'ich i chikp eda. D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “S-hohtam g am hab juhni hegai mapt hab wo juh.”
Kuchd pi sha'i amichuth mas haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij ihtha.
D eda nuhkuth g t-lialiga hegai Judas. Kuchd heg hekaj ha'i hab t-ahg mo hab ahg mat ep wo ha nolawt g ha'ichu hugi heg wehhejed ge'e gegosig o ha'ichu wo ha mah g sho'igkam.
D ha hekaj i wuhsh g Judas gm hu jeg ed. Kuki eda ab wabsh i si s-chuhugam.
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Neh, hemu at wehs wo e nahto hegai mat g Jiosh am i ni-kei mant hab wo juh ia jewed thahm. Am ani wa chehgith g Jiosh gewkthag.
T g Jiosh heg hekaj am wo tashogi g ni-gewkthag hemu s-hohtam.

“Pegih neh, ahpim mani ab si em-tatchua, pi ant sha'i tash ia hu wo e-wehmajk nant pi gm hu wo hih. Kumt pi wo e nako mams wo ni-cheh. Am ant hab ep wo chei em-wui mani wa haschu ha ahgith g hemajkam mamt pi wo e nako mamt hejel am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih.
“Hemu ant ab wo em-mah g wechij chehanig. K d ihtha mamt ab a'ai wo si pihk e elithath hab masma mani ahni hab em-juhkch.
Wehsijj at wo s-mahchk mam ab i e thagitokch ni-wui mamtp ab a'ai wo si pihk e elithath.”
D hab kaij g Simon Peter, “A pt hebai wo hih, ni-kownalig?” Kud g Jesus hab kaij, “Pi apt wo e nako mapt wo ni-oi hemu amai mant am wo hih. K wabshaba ab him g tash mapt am haha wo i ni-oi.”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Nt haschu ahgk pi wo ni-nako mant wo m-oi hemuch? Ni-nahtokch ani mant wo m-wehhejed muh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ab ant wo si shel m-ahgi map pi woho e nahtokch mapt wo muh ni-wehhejed. Neh, waikko apt hab wo wa'i chei map pi sha'i ni-mahch mat koi wo kuhu g keli chuchul.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi g wo sha'i e kudut. Ab g wabsh i s-wohochuth mo an ha'ichug g Jiosh k ahni ab ep wo i s-ni-wohoch mani d si Kehshaj.
Am o wi'is ni-ohg kihthag ed am wehs ha wehhejed g ni-wohochuththam. Nt wo wa chum em-ahgi matp pi am hu wo wi'isk. Nt am wo him k am wo i ap'ech em-wehhejed
k ia ep wo jiwia k ia wo em-ui mamt an wo ni-wehmajk.
S-mahch am mamt has masma am wo hihi amai mant am wo hih.”
D hab kaij g Thomas ab wui, “Ih, ni-kownalig, pi ach sha'i mahch maps hebai wo hih ch hab pi mahch machs has masma wo thatha.”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab amt wo ni-hiwgath. Nt ahni an wo wa'i em-u'apa anai ni-ohg kihthag ed. Ith o heg wa wepo mani d am wui himtham wohg em-wehhejed ch d Jiosh wohokam ch d m-wechij thoakag.
Matp hedai woho s-ap wo s-ni-mahchk ch hab wa masma wo s-mahchk g ni-ohg. Neith am g ni-ohg nam pi ni-neith.”
D hab kaij g Philip ab wui, “Pegih, t-kownalig, am g t-chehgith g e-ohg. Heg ach wa'i tatchua.”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Tash ani ia em-wehmaj. Kupki eda pi woho ap ni-mahch, ahpi Philip. Hegai mo hedai i ni-neith ch hab masma ep neith g ni-ohg. P haschu ahgch ab ni-tahni mant wo em-chehgi g ni-ohg?
Ahni kch ni-ohg ach d hemako. Kupki pi koi ab hu s-wohochuth ihtha.” D hab ep kaij ab wehs t-wui, “Ni-ohg o ab ni-ahgith mant has wo che'e k has wo ni-juh.
Ab g wo s-wohochuth mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm heg wabsh hekaj mani am em-ahgith, o amtp pi wo e nako hab masma k wo s-wohoch mach d hemako heg hekaj s-hasig ha'ichu mani hab junihim.

Nt wo si shel em-ahgi matp hedai ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k wo e nako mat hab wo junihith g s-hasig ha'ichu hab masma mani ahni, pej ba'ich i ge'e hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu nant pi ahni hi wo hih am ni-ohg wui.
Kunt am hab wo em-juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegk. T heg hekaj g hemajkam ab wo si hehgchul g ni-ohg Jiosh.
Pegih, mt haschu ab wo i tai g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegk, nt ahni hab wo juh.
“Am g hab wo junihith g ni-chehanig mamtp woho ab wo si ni-tatchuath.
Nt ab wo tai g ni-ohg mat ab wo em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T heg chum hekith wo em-wehmajk ch am wo i em-tashogithath g wohokam.
Pi o ta neithagma g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. T heg hekaj pi wo sha'i e nako mas wo s-mahchk hegam mo pi ni-mahch. M wabshaba ahpim hi s-mahch no pi em-wehmaj hemu ch am wo e ul em-thoakag ed.
“Pi ant ia hu hejel wo em-thagito k wabshaba ia wo wa em-wehm ha'ichugk am i thahm mant im hu wo uhpam hih.

Kumt wo s-mahchk mant ia wo em-wehmajk. T wabshaba hegam mo pi ab hu ni-wohochuth pi wo mahchk mani ia ha'ichug nat pi pi wo ni-neithath. Kumt d wo wechij thothakamk ab ni-amjed heg wa'i hekaj mant ab wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed k d ep wo thoakamk.
Ia'i amjed amt wo s-mahchk mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm k ch ep wo s-mahchk mamt ahpim ab i e hemakoj ni-wehm.
“Am o e chehgith mo ab si ni-tatchua hegam matp hedai ab wo bei g ni-chehanig k hab wo junihith. Kunt ab ha wui wo si pihk ni-elithath g ni-ohg wehm ch ab ha wui wo i ni-tashogi.”
D hab kaij g Judas, hi wa pi hegai Judas Iscariot, “T-kownalig, pt has masma ahchim wa'i t-wui wo i e tashogith k pi ab hu wehs hemajkam ha wui?”

D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Hegai mo hedai ab si ni-tatchua at wo wohog el g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kut hahawa ab wui wo si pihk e elithath g ni-ohg. Kutt g ni-ohg wehm am haha wo i t-maskogi wui k am wo wehmajkath.
Pi at ab hu wo wohog el g ha'ichu ni-ahga hegai mat pi ab hu wo ni-tatchua. K eda g ni-ohg d amjedkam ihtha ha'ichu ni-ahga.
“Ith ani hi wa em-ahgith hemuch mani ia em-wehmaj.

T g ni-ohg ab haha wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat heg am wo i em-wehmajk am ni-wehhejed ch wo em-gewkemhunath ch wo em-mashcha mani haschu i s-em-mashchamamk ch hab wo em-juh mamt wehs ha'ichu wo s-chegitok mani haschu i em-ahgith.

“Am g wabsh wo i s-ap e tahtkkath. Ab ant wo i em-mah hegai hab mahs s-ap tahhathkam mani ahni edgith. Pi at hedai wo e nako mat hab mahs s-ap tahhathkam wo em-mah. Pi g wo sha'i e kudutath ch pi ha'ichu wo ehbithath.

“Am am wa ni-kah mani wa hab kaij mant gm hu wo hih ab em-amjed k wabshaba ia wo wa ep em-wehmajk. Ni-ohg o ba'ich i s-gewkthag mani ahni. Kumt heg hekaj wo chum si s-hehgigkath mant im hu uhpam wo hih wui mamt hems g wehs e-ihbthagkaj ab wo ni-tatchuath.
Ith ani em-ahgith mat koi hab e juh. Mt hab ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga mat hekith hab wo i e juh.

“Hemu at am ge'e wo chehgi g e-gewkthag g jijawul ha-ge'ejig no pi chum e kownalchuth ia jewed thahm. K heg hekaj pi am hu ge'e s-ni-ap'e mant tash am ha'ichukaj wo em-wehm neo. K eda pi u'ukch g gewkthag mas hab wo ni-juh manis ab wecho wo i ni-ul.
Wehs ani hab junihim mo haschu ab i ni-chehani g ni-ohg. K hab masma s-mahch g hemajkam mani ab si tatchua g ni-ohg. “Pegih neh, oi g wo, am att wo i t-nakog k wo hihi.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Thach wa'i hemako hab masma mo g uhdwis je'e d hemako g e-i'ibhonig wehm. Ahni ani heg wepogithas mo g uhdwis shon wa'ug. M ahpim heg wepogithas i'ibhonigaj. K g ni-ohg t-nuhkuth.

Hegai i'ibhonigaj at ab wo chum bahithagt. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo chum junithahith g Jiosh. E'es nuhkuththam at an wo si hikkumia hegai i'ibhonig mat pi ab hu wo bahithagt k wo i kegch hegai mat ab wo bahithagt. T hab ba'ich i mu'i ab wo bahithagt.
“Heki am hu kegchuthas ahpim mam ab kaiham ch ab s-wohog elith g ha'ichu ni-ahga.

Pi g gm hu hab wo sha'i i e juhni ab ni-amjed. Nt ahni hab wa masma pi gm hu hab wo i ni-juh ab em-amjed. Mt hab s-ap hab wo juh ha'ichu k s-ap hab wo masmak hab masma mo hegai i'ibhonig mat s-ap ab wo bahithagt ab gi'ikch e-wa'ug ab.
“Pi at ab hu wo bahithagt g i'ibhonig pi ab hu gi'ikch e-wa'ug ab. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap pi wo e nako mamt ha'ichu s-kehg hab wo juh mamt gm hu hab wo i e juh ab ni-amjed.

Hegai i'ibhonig mat wo e hikkumia at am wo i e hemapath k wo e mei. Neh, ith o hab mahs matp hedai gm hu hab wo i e juh ab ni-amjed k ab wo e ahijithach mat hahawa pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk am Jiosh wehhejed.
Ab ant wo i em-mah mamt haschu ab wo i ni-tai mamtp ab wo s-wohog elithath g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch ab wo ni-hiwgath.
Hegam matp hedai woho ab i e thagitokch ni-wui at mu'i ha'ichu hab wo junihith ni-wehhejed. T heg hekaj ab wo hehgchul g hemajkam g ni-ohg Jiosh.

“Bani masma si em-tatchua ch si pihk em-elith mo hab masma si ni-tatchua g ni-ohg. Ab ani si s-wohog elith g ni-ohg. Ch ab a'ai si pihk t-elith. Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap ab wo s-ni-wohog elithath. Tt ab a'ai wo si pihk t-elithath.
Ith ani em-ahgith mamt wo bei g s-hehgig am hab junihithch g ni-chehanig hab masma mani ahni s-hehgig am hab junihithch g ni-ohg chehanig.
Ab ani em-chehani mamt ab a'ai wo pihk e elithath hab masma mani ahni has i masma si pihk em-elith.
Hegai matp hedai wo e muhkith ha wehhejed g e-naipijju o d hegai mo woho si pihk e elith ha hekaj.
Ahpim am d ni-naipijju mamtp hab wo junihith g ni-chehanig.

Kuni hahawa pi hab em-a'aga mam d wabsh ni-pionag ch wabshaba hab em-a'aga mam d ni-naipijju nani pi ab em-ahgith wehs ha'ichu mani ab kah ni-ohg amjed. Neh, mo hema d wabsh pionag ch pi mahch mo haschu am hab i wua g ahmo.

Pi amt hejel e elith k am wo i gegokiwua ni-wehhejed. Ahni ant am i em-chuhcha mamt am wo hihim k hab wo juh g ge'e chikpan. Kut pi hekith wo huhug hegai mamt hab wo juh. T g ni-ohg am hab wo em-juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai am ni-chehchegch.
Pegih, ith ani ab em-chehani mamt ab a'ai wo pihk e elithath.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Mt wo s-chegitok mo ahni wehpeg s-ni-keh'ith hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh ch hab wa'ap wo s-em-keh'ithath.
Ab at wo em-tatchua mamtp hems pi ab hu wo tatchua g Jiosh. Nt wabshaba ab si em-gawulkai ab ha amjed. Kum pi ha wepo chegito ha'ichu. K hekaj hab s-em-keh'ith.

Mt wo s-chegitok mani wa hab em-ahgith mat pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elithath mas ba'ich d i ge ha'ichu mo g e-ahmo. T wo em-sho'igch hegam mo ni-sho'igchuth. Kut ab wo s-em-wohog el hegam mo ab s-ni-wohog elith. Hegam mo pi mahch g ni-ohg o ni-sho'igchuth ch hab wa'ap wo em-sho'igchuthath nam pi ab ni-wui e thagitokch.

Ia ant jiwia ha wui k am ha ahgi ab amjed g ni-ohg k am ha chehgi g s-hasig chikpan mat pi hedai hekith hab juh. K wabshaba s-ni-keh'ith. K heg hekaj tasho mo s-keh'ith g ni-ohg. Kut hab masma mahsko wua g pi ap e-chu'ichig.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat wo s-ni-keh'ithath pi haschu sha'i ahgk. Kut wa woho hab e juh.

“Ab ant wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am wo em-wehmajk. Heg o am wehmaj g Jiosh ch ab em-wui wo him k wo em-wehmajkath ch am wo i em-gewkemhunath ch am wo ha'ichu em-tashogithath ab ni-amjed.
Kumt ahpim wo i ahgahi ab ni-amjed nam pi ni-wehmajkahim ga hu i amjed mant am i shonwuich g ni-chikpan.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ani em-ahgith ihtha mamt heg hekaj pi wo ni-thagito.
T wo i em-wuwhas ab amjed g cheopi. K ab him g tash mamt wo em-mu'a k hab wo e ahgath mat wehhejed hab juh g Jiosh.
Ith amt hab wo em-juh heg hekaj mo pi ni-mahch ch ep pi mahch g ni-ohg.
Mt wabshaba wo s-chegitok mani ith am em-ahgith mat hekith hab wo i e juh.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Pi ani em-ahgith ihtha ga hu i wehpeg heg hekaj mani ia em-wehmaj.
K wabshaba hemu e aihim mant uhpam wo hih am ni-ohg wui. M eda pi ab hu sha'i s-ni-kakkeimk manis hebai wo hih
ch wabsh pi ap e tahtk s-mahchok mant gm hu wo hih.
T eda pi ab hu wo i hih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag em-wui nt ho'ip gm hu hih. K heg hekaj ba'ich i s-ap'e mant gm hu wo hih.
T ab haha wo i hih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k am wo i ha tashogi g hemajkam g s-ap'ekam ch pi ap'ekam ch Jiosh lothaita.

Ni-ohg at ab wo ni-ha'ichuch mant am wui wo him k pi ia hu wo ha'ichugk. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag heg hekaj wo wohokamch am ha wui g hemajkam mani d s-ap'ekam am Jiosh nena ed k ep wo wohokamch mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam mo eda pi ab hu ni-wohochuth
k ep wo wohokamch mat wo e lothai hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam nat pi am wa e ai mat g Jiosh wo lothai g ge Jiawul.
“Mu'i ani ha'ichu ep s-em-ahgithamk. Mt wabshaba pi wo e nako mamt wo s-amich mant wo chum em-ahgi hemuch.

Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at am wo i em-tashogi g wohokam k am ep wo i em-ahgi mat haschu has wo e juh imhab em-ba'ich. Nt am wo ahgi mat has wo chei. Kut am wo em-tashogith k hab ab wo si ni-ha'ichuch.
Wehs g ni-ohg gewkthag o d ep ni-gewkthag. Ni hekaj hab kaij mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wo i em-tashogi mani haschu ab i ahgith.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Tho sha'i ha'as, mt pi an hu wo ni-neithath, ch am ep wo sha'i ha'as, mt hahawa ep wo ni-neithath.”
Kuchd hab kaij ab a'ai t-wui, “Shahchu o hab ahg ch hab kaij mas wo sha'i ha'as, tt pi an hu wo neithath, ch am ep wo sha'i ha'as, tt ep wo neithath. K wa hab ep kaij mat wo hih am e-ohg wui.
Pi ach sha'i amichuth mo haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij.”
D s-mahch g Jesus machd ab s-kakkeimk ch hekaj hab kaij, “Pi am sha'i amichuth mani haschu hab ahg ch hab kaij mat wo sha'i ha'as, mt pi wo ni-neithath, ch am ep wo sha'i ha'as, mt ep wo ni-neithath.

Pegih, nt wo ha'ichu em-ahgi mat woho hab wo e juh. Mt wo si pi ap e taht k wo si shoanith. T g s-ni-keh'iththam wabsh wo si s-hehgigk. T amjed ha'ichu hab wo e juh mat ab wo em-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig.

Neh, s-mahch am mat has wo e juh mat hekith wo e ai mat wo mahmadho g uwi. T wo pi ap e taht mat wo nako g s-ko'ok. T wabshaba am wo i mahsi g ali. T am wabsh wo i pi chegito g s-ko'ok heg hekaj mo si s-hehgig mat an i e mahsith g ali.
Bo wa masma am em-tahgio mam hemuch pi ap e taht. Nt wabshaba ab ep wo ni-chehgi em-wui. Kumt haha wo si s-hehgigk. T pi hedai wo sha'i padch hegai hab mahs s-hehgig em-wehhejed.
“Mt hahawa pi ab hu wo ge ni-kaiamath ha'ichu ch wabshaba ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab wo kakke g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegch. T wa woho wo em-mah.
Pi am koi hekith ni-chehcheg am e ho'ige'ithahunch. Am g hab wo i e juhni. T g ni-ohg am hab wo em-juni. T ab wo si e shuhthath g em-thoakag g s-hehgigkaj.”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am ani ha'ichu i chum em-tashogith g ha'ichu wepogitha ahgakaj. Ab o him g tash mant hahawa si tasho wo em-ahgi ab amjed g ni-ohg.
T ab haha wo em-abk mamt ab wo i e ho'ige'ithahunath ni-ohg wui am ni-chehchegch. Pi amt heg wo wa'i hiwgath manis ahni am wo wa'i ni-ho'ige'ithahunath em-wehhejed.
Ni-ohg o ab si em-tatchua nam pi ab si ni-tatchua ch ab s-wohochuth mant ia jiwia ab amjed g Jiosh.
Ia ant woho jiwia ab amjed g ni-ohg ith thahm jewed. T e ai mant uhpam ep wo hih am ni-ohg wui.”
Kuchd ab wui hab kaij, “Neh'e, hemuch ap si tasho am ahg ha'ichu ch pi hekaj g wepogitha ha'ichu ahga.
Ch hahawa s-mahch map wehs ha'ichu s-mahch. Pi o hab hahawa mahs machs hedai ab wo ge ha'ichu m-kakke. Ch hekaj hahawa s-wohochuth map ab amjed g Jiosh.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nam hig hab elith mam ith woho s-wohochuth?
Ab o e aihim mamt gm hu a'ai wo si e gantad k gm hu uhpam wo hihi e-kihki wui ia hejel ni-thagitok. Ni wabshaba pi hejelig. Ni-ohg o chum hekith ni-wehmaj.
“Wehs ani em-ahgith ihtha mamt heg hekaj wo si s-ap e tahtkkath. T wo em-sho'igch hegam mo pi ab hu tatchua g Jiosh. Mt wabshaba am wo si e gewpkai nant pi heki hu s-ap wo em-gewitojel g pi ap'ekam.”

D am i kuhgi g Jesus g ha'ichu e-ahga k am i nea thahm kahchim wui k am e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Ni-ohg, ia at i e ai g ni-tashga. Ab g uhpam ni-mahki hegai ni-gewkthag mani wa an u'ukch m-hugith an. Nt ab haha wo si has m-elith k wo mahsko wua g m-gewkthag.
Ab apt i ni-mah g gewkthag am wehs ha thahm g hemajkam. Kut ha'i ab ni-wui e thagito no pi d m-hemajkamga. K hab d m-elitha mant wo ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Thap wohokam Jiosh ch am i ni-kei mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm. Kut wehs wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat wo s-t-mahchk.
Ia ant ha chehgi g hemajkam g m-gewkthag k nahto hegai chikpan mapt ab i ni-cheha mant hab wo juh.
Pegih, ni-ohg, ab g uhpam ni-be k ep wo ni-mah hegai ni-gewkthag mani wa edgith an m-hugith an matt eda koi an hu nahto g jewed.
“Ab apt ni-wui i ha gawulkai ihtham chechoj mo ia ni-wehmaj. K d m-hemajkamga. Am ani i m-mahtchulith ha wui ch ha ahgith g ha'ichu m-ahga. Kut ab s-wohog elith
k hahawa s-mahch mo wehs g ni-mahchig ab d m-amjedkam.
Ab ap ni-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga. Kuni am ha ahgith. T ab i s-wohochuth k heg hekaj s-mahch mani ab d m-amjedkam.
“Ihtham o d m-hemajkamga. Kuni heg hekaj am ha wehhejed ni-ho'ige'ithahun ch pi ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo m-tatchua.
Hegam o d wa'i m-hemajkamga mat ab wo ni-hiw mant wo ha tho'ibia. T g ni-gewkthag ab wo e chehgi ha ab.

T hemuch e ai mant wo hih am m-wui k pi ia hu haha wo ha'ichugk ith thahm jewed. T wabshaba ihtham ia hu wo ha'ichugk. Kuni ab m-tahni mapt wo ha nuhkuthath, ni-ohg. Thap hekia s-ap'ekam. Kut ab wo m-ihmath ch hab d wo hemakok hab masma mach ahchim d hemako.
Ia ani ha nuhkuthahim mat ab wo m-ihmath. Kut heg wa'i pi e tho'ibia mo an o'ohanas matki hab wo e juh.
“Ith ani hab kaij mani ia wabsh kia ha wehmaj ch koi ab hu m-wui hih mant hekaj ab wo si ha mah g s-ap tahhathkam.
Ab ant ha ahgi g ha'ichu m-ahga. T ab i s-ni-wohochuth k ab ni-hiwig ch ab i e gawulkai ha amjed hegam mo pi ab hu m-tatchua. K hegam heg hekaj s-ha keh'ith.
Pi ani heg hab ahg maps ia wo i ha wuwhas ab amjed g jewed ch wabshaba hab ahg mapt wo ha nuhkuthath. T hab pi gm hu wo i ha nu'ichshul g ge Jiawul.
Ab o gawulkthas ihtham pi ap'ekam t amjed hab masma mani ahni.
Ab g i ha gawulkath e wehhejed heg hekaj ha'ichu e-ahga. Ha'ichu m-ahga o d wohokam.
Am apt i ni-kei mant ia wo ahgath g ha'ichu m-ahga jewed thahm. Kunt hab wa masma am i ha chuhcha.
Ab ant si i ni-thagito m-wui mat ihtham wo s-mahchk g wohokam ch hekaj ab hab wa'ap wo i e thagito m-wui.
“Pi ani ihtham wa'i ha wehhejed ni-ho'ige'ithahun ch wabshaba hegam ehp mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga k ab wo i e thagito ni-wui.
Ith o d ha'ichu ni-tahnig mat wehs am wo i e hemakoch hab masma mach ahchim d hemako. Kut hab wo s-mai g hemajkam map d ahpi ch am i ni-kei mant ia wo jiwia.
M-gewkthag o d ep ni-gewkthag nach pi d hemako. Kuni ab ha mahkch g t-gewkthag mat t-wehm d wo hemakok.

Thani hemako ha wehm hab masma mach ahchim d hemako. T hab wehs s-ap d wo hemakok ihtham. T heg hekaj wo s-mai g hemajkam mapt am i ni-kei mant ia wo jiwia jewed thahm k ep wo s-mai map ab si ha tatchua ihtham hab masma map ahni.

“Ni-ohg, ab apt i ni-mah ihtham mo ab si ni-tatchua. Kuni si tatchua mat am wo ni-wehmajk anai mant anai wok. An apt ni-mah g si s-kehg ap'ethag nap pi si ni-tatchua mat eda koi e nahto g jewed. Kuni ab m-tahni mat ihtham am wo ni-wehmajk ch heg wo neithath map haschu ab ni-mahkch.
Thap hekia s-ap'ekam, ni-ohg. K pi hi wa chum m-mahch hegam mo pi ab hu m-tatchua. Ni wabshaba ahni s-m-mahch. K ihtham ep s-mahch mapt am i ni-kei.
Am ant m-mahtchul ha wui k am ba'ich wo i m-mahtchul ha wui. T hab wo si pihk e elithath ni-hekaj hab masma map ahpi. Nt ahni am wo i ni-hemakoch ha wehm.”
D am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahu g Jesus. Kuchd gm hu aigo i chehchsh hegai aki mo hab e a'aga Kidron k am thatha mo am eshas g u'us.

D eda pi an hu t-wehmaj g Judas nadki pi gm hu him k am si gagda g Jesus ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch Palasi. Kudki ihtham ab mu'i ha cheha g shonthal ch cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo oi g Judas. Dki heg ab i ha wanim no pi s-mahch matt hebai wo ha'ichugk no pi mu'ikko am t-wehm thahiwup amai. D ihtham ha'ijj ge i'is-papayo ch ha'ijj ge lalamba ch ha'ijj wabsh kuhthch.
D eda wa chum wehs s-mahch g Jesus mat haschu has wo e juh am tahgio ch wabshaba am i hih ha wui k hab kaij, “Thohm in gahg?”
D hab kaij ihtham, “Hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam.” Kud hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ani wud.”
D haha wabsh e totoths hegam k ab ta'i si i gegokiwua k wabsh i shul.
D ab ep ha kakke g Jesus, “A m hedai in gahg?” D hab ep kaij, “Hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t ab d kihkam.”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am ani wa heki hu em-ahgith mani d ahni. Mtp ahni in wo ni-gahghith ch pi has wo ha juh ihtham.”
Neh, bo kaij no pi s-t-tho'ibiamk. Kud hab masma hab e juh g ne'okij mo wa hab kaij matt wehsijj wo t-tho'ibia.
D g Simon Peter ge is-pahyo ch ab i huhpan k ab hu wabsh si i widut k higshp an si hikuch g s-apkojed nahkaj hegai mo d uhgchu pahl neholiga ch hab chehgig Malcus.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab Peter wui, “Ga g hu uhpam hab juhni g e-is-pahyo. Pi apt wo e nako mapt wo ha shohbi nant pi hemho wa wo nako mo haschu g ni-ohg ap'echuthch am ni-wehhejed.”
D ab ha cheha g shonthal g ha-ge'ejig mat am wo i ha wehmt g cheopi nuhkuththam. D am bei g Jesus k gn hu si wulsh g nohnhoij k gm hu i wanim Jerusalem wui.
Am ad kih g u'ugchu papal. Kud gn hu wehpeg i bei heg wui mo hab chehgig Annas. Ihtha Annas o d ba'amad ohgaj hegai mo d si uhgchu pahl ch hab chehgig Caiaphas.
K d ihtha Caiaphas mad wa am ha shelinith g haha'ichu mat hemako wo muh g o'othham wehs ha wehhejed.
Kuchd gohkajj g Simon Peter wehm am i ha oi mo am bebhehim g Jesus. K eda g uhgchu pahl s-ni-mahch. Nid hekaj am i wah kolhai ch ed.
D g Peter ga hu wa'i kehk jeg ed ab kihjeg t ab. Nid am hahawa him k ab ahgith hegai chehia mad ab nuhkuth g kihjeg mat ab wo i wahki g Peter.
D hab kaij ihtha chehia ab wui g Peter, “Nap hig pi ahpi an ep wehmaj hegai mamt an bei?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Pi ani an hu sha'i wehmaj.”
D eda s-hehpith. D hekaj am ge nahthch g pion ch cheopi nuhkuththam ch am gegok ch e huhkalith. D g Peter am him k am ha wehm i kekiwua k e huhkal.
D g uhgchu pahl ab kakke g Jesus mas haschu ahgk ab ha'i i ha gawulkath k haschu ha mashcham.

D hab kaij g Jesus, “P haschu ahgch ahni ab ni-kakke? Pi ani hekith s-a'agi ha'ichu ahg ch wabshaba wehs hemajkam wui hab kaij ch am ha mashcham ha-cheopi ed ch ge'e cheopi ch ed mach am wehs t-hehemapath. Pegih, ab g hig ha kakke mani haschu i ha mashcham. S-mahch o mani haschu ha ahgith.”
D hab wabsh chum chei. D ab si shonikka g cheopi nuhkuththam k hab ahg, “Pi apt hab sha'i kaitham wo neokath ab uhgchu pahl wui.”
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Am g hig wehs wo ha ahgi manis ha'ichu pi ap hab kaij. Wohokam ani em-ahgith. Pt haschu ahgk ab ni-shonikka?”
D g Annas am hahawa ha cheha mat am wo u'apa Caiaphas wui. Kud an wabsh kia wulshch g Jesus.

D eda g Peter am wabsh kia e huhkalith ha-nahtha wui. D hab kaij hegam mad am wehmaj, “Nap hig pi ahpi an ep wehmaj hegai mamt an bei?” D wabshaba g Peter pi mahch k e ah hab kaijch, “Pi ani an hu sha'i wehmaj.”
D am hema kehk g neholigaj g uhgchu pahl ch d hajunij hegai mat g Peter hikuch g nahkaj ch hab kaij ab wui g Peter, “Nani pi woho m-neith amai matt am bei ihtha?”
D hab kaij g Peter, “Ih, pia'a.” D edapk am i kuhu g keli chuchul.

Wabsh i si'alim mad koi i chesh g tash, md gm hu i bei g Jesus kownal kih wui. D hab chehgig hegai Pilate. D pi am hu i wahp g Tutuligo kownal kih ed no pi g t-himthag hab chu'ig matt wo t-uamhu mattp am wo i wahp gawul hemajkam ha-kih ed. Kut pi wo ap'ethagk mat wo huh g kahwal mad iagchulig gegosig imhab i juhk matp am wo i wahp.
D heg hekaj gm hu i wuhsh g Pilate k am ha nam k hab kaij, “Shahchu am ab abchuth ihtha o'othham?”
D hab kaij ab wui, “Pi att woho ia wo u'apa ahpi m-wui hegai matt pi koi wo s-mai mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.”

D hab kaij g Pilate, “Pegih, mt ahpim wo be k ab wo mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag mo has i mahs g em-himthag chehanig.” D hab kaij g Tutuligo, “Pegih, bo mahs g t-himthag chehanig mat wo e mua heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig. K eda pi t-hiwgith g ge'e kownal ab Rome t ab machs hab wo juh. Tt heg hekaj ia u'apa mapt ahpi am hab wo juh.”
Ith ad wa hab e juh mat hab masma wo e muhkith g Jesus mo wa hab kaij no pi g kownal hab masma ha muhkith.
D g Pilate gm hu uhpam wah e-kih ed k ab i wai g Jesus k hab kaij ab wui, “Neh, nap hab e elith map d ha-kownalig g Tutuligo?”
D hab kaij g Jesus, “Nap ab ni-kakke ihtha ab hejel e amjed, aha no ha'ijj ab ha'ichu i m-ahgith ab ni-amjed?”
Kud hab kaij g Pilate, “Pi ani d sha'i Tuhligo manis wo s-mahchk ihtha. M-wehm hemajkam ha wehm g e-papalig at ia m-u'apa. Pt haschu has juh?”

D hab kaij g Jesus, “Ni-kownaltalig o pi hab chu'ig mo g ith thahm jewed kokownaltalig, Tp hems hab wo chu'igk, t wo ha cheggia hegam mo ab si ni-wecho e mashcham mamt pi am hu wo i ni-thagito haha'ichu ha wui. Pi o hab mahs g ni-kownaltalig.” Neh, bad kaij g Jesus.

D heg hekaj hab ep kaij g Pilate, “Kupki woho hab kaij map d kownal!” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Heu'u, thani kownal ch ia jiwia jewed thahm k ia mahsi mant wo ha ahgi g wohokam. Matp hedai ab wo tatchuath g wohokam at ab wo ni-kaiha.”
D gm hu hab si e widu g Pilate k hab kaij, “Mas haschu d i wohokam.” D am hahawa uhpam i wuhsh ha wui g hemajkam k hab ha ahg, “Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i cheh manis ab wo abch ihtha.
K eda wehs ahith ab am hema i e thathagitod g lihso em-wehhejed ia'i ithani mam wushshath g e-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. Pegih, nam tatchua mant ith wo thagito mash d em-kownalig ahpim Tutuligo?”
D si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi hegai. Barabbas ach tatchua.” D eda d s-chu ehskam ch d ha mu'akam ihtha Barabbas.
D am hahawa ha cheha g Pilate g shonthal mat wo s-ko'okam gewitta g Jesus. Kud wa woho hab e juh
k am hahawa ge ho'i gihkot k ab wahki mo'oj ab k ab wahki g kownal kahba
k wabsh has ahg ch hab kaij, “Wapt wo si tash d Tutuligo ha-kownaligk,” ch ab hahawa si shonikkash.
D am ep i wuhsh g Pilate k hab kaij am ha wui g hemajkam, “Neh'e, ab ant ep wo i wuhshath k wo em-chehgi mant pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh g pi ap chu'ichig mas hekaj wo e muhkith.”
Md am hahawa i wuhshath k ab wabsh kia wahkch g ho'i gihko ch hegai kownal kahba. D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Ab g wo i neith mo d wabsh si sho'ig o'othham.”

D am i nei g u'ugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuththam k si s-kaitham hab wabsh ge kaij mu'ikko, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!” D g Pilate hab kaij, “Pegih, k wo be k ahpim ab wo mua kots t ab. Ahni ant hi pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas melchkwua g kownal chehanig mat wo e muhkith.”
D hab kaij hegam Tutuligo, “Ahchim at hi melchkwua g t-chehanig am hugkam mat hemho wa wo e muhkith no pi hab e a'aga mo d Jiosh alithag.”
Neh, d am i ha kah g Pilate mad hab kaij ihtham k ba'ich i e ebkioth
k gm hu uhpam i wah k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Bahp amjed him?” D wabshaba g Jesus pi ab hu has sha'i chei.
D hab ep kaij g Pilate ab wui, “Aha, napt pi has wo chei ab ni-wui k eda s-mahch mani gewkthag mant wo m-thagito o ab wo m-mua kots t ab!”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Jiosh at ab m-mah hegai gewkthag. K heg hekaj si pi ap hab e wua ihtham Caiaphas mo m-pi'ichuth mapt pi ap wo hekaj g e-gewkthag.”

D am i kah g Pilate ihtha k am ep i wuhsh ha wui k am chum si e nako mat wo thagito. D wabshaba si s-babgam hihnk hegam haha'ichu ch hab kaij, “Neh'e, ihtha hemajkam o hab e ahg mo d si ge'e kownal ch heg hekaj ab wui kehk hegai mo d si ge'e kownal ch ab Rome t ab. Kupki ahpi hab wa'ap ab wui kehk g si ge'e kownal mapt wo sha thagito ihtha.”
D am i kah g Pilate ihtha k am hahawa i wuhshath g Jesus k heg ga hu i thahiwua usagakam thaikud ed amai mach hab a'aga Gabbatha mo an sha uhgk i hothaitas.
D eda e aihim g thahm juhk. Kud wo e koktha g kahwal mahmad imhab i juhk mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag. D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui g haha'ichu, “Ia g hu wo neith g e-kownalig.”

D ab ep si s-babgam hihnk ch hab kaij, “Mu'ani! Mu'ani ab kots t ab!” D hab kaij g Pilate, “Aha nam tatchua mant wo mua g si uhgk em-kownalig ab kots t ab?” D hab kaij g u'ugchu papal, “Heg o d wa'i si uhgk t-kownalig mo ab thaha Rome t ab.”
D am hahawa i thagito g Pilate g Jesus mamt ab wo mua kots t ab. D am hab hahawa e juh g ha-tatchui mamt ab ha mah g Jesus. D gm hu i wanim.
D g Jesus am kushwiot g hejel e-kots. Kuchd am thatha amai mo am e koktha. Bach a'aga amai Golgotha mo hab d ahga Koshwak.
Kumt gam si wuahawua g wehschugaj k ab sisish kots t ab k ab uhgk i bei. D eda gohk d ep lilso. Kumd ihtham hab wa'ap ab ha sisish kokots t ab k gn hu a'aijed ha chuhcha Jesus hugith an.
D an sisishp g tapial Jesus kots t ab. K an ab hab chu'ig: “Ith o d Jesus ch d ha-kownalig g Tutuligo.”

K eda pi mehk ab kihhim t amjed amai mam am ha koktha. D heg hekaj mu'ijj g t-wehm o'othham ab ne'okchul hegai mo haschu an o'ohanas. K an o'ohanas g t-ne'okikaj ch g Rome ne'okikaj ch g Greek ne'okikaj.
D gm hu uhpam ep hihi g u'ugchu papal Pilate wui am i ne'okchulithk ihtha k hab ahg, “Pi g hab masma an o'ohan mo d t-kownalig k wabshaba an o'ohan mo heg hejel hab kaij mo d t-kownalig.”
D hab kaij g Pilate ab ha wui, “Mant haschu an i o'oha, t heg an wo o'ohadagk.”
D hegam shonthal mad am naggia g Jesus d gi'ik ch hekaj am gi'ikpa e tahpath g Jesus wepschuga. K am hema d si s-namkig ha'ichu eniga ch pi hebai ha shohmas.

D ith hab ahg g shonthal ch hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Pi att am hu a'ai wo t-wanchith ihtha k am wabsh wo t-chichwi matt hedai wo t-gehg k heg wo bei.” Neh, bad kaij ch woho am hab e juh. Kud hab masma am e wohokamch g Jiosh o'ohana mo an o'ohanas hab masma: T am a'ai wo e tahpani g wehschugaj g Jiosh si Kehsha k am wabsh wo e chichwi k wo s-mai mat hedai wo bei g s-namkig ha'ichu enigaj.
D am gegok g je'ej ch jiskaj g Jesus miabithch amai mo am naggia. Kud gohk am ep ha wehmaj mo hema d hegai Mary mo g wehmaj kihkam d Clopas ch hema d ep Mary Magdalene.
Nid ahni am ha wehm kehk mo ni-hekaj si pihk e elith g Jesus. Kud g Jesus an ni-a'aga ch hab ahg g e-je'e, “Neh, ith at d haha wo m-madk m in kehk,”
ch hab ep ni-ahg, “Ith at d haha wo m-je'ek.” Neh, nid am i amjed bei g je'ej. Kud heg am t-wehm kih.
D hahawa s-mahch g Jesus mat wehs hab juh mat haschu hab wo chum juh mat koi wo muh ch hab kaij, “Tonom ant.”

D an hema thaha g ha'a mad am shuhthagi g pad nawait. D am hema g shonthal ha'ichu wakch pad nawait ch ed k an ha'ichu k an uskon k ab uhgk i be k ab kams hab masma mo an o'ohadag Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed.
D ab i winiun k hab hahawa kaij, “Ia ant i wehs ha'ichu nahto.” Neh, bad kaij ch am hahawa jumal i mo'owua k am i muh.

D am e nakog g hemajkam mat wo e mihshmath nat pi g ba'ich tash d wo shahwaik ch d wo ge'e tashk. Kutsh g haha'ichu ab kakke g Pilate mat wo e ohmi g ha-kakhio hegam mad am nahngia. T hab wo e oiwigi g ha-muhkig mat gm hu wo i e u'u k pi ab wabsh wo kia nahngiak t-mihshmetha tash ed, wahm mat ith d wo si ge'e t-tashgak.
D ab ha chehani g Pilate g shonthal mat wo ha ohmi g ha-kakhio. Kud hab ha juh hegam gohk mo ab hugithaj ab nahngia g Jesus.
D wabshaba g Jesus heki hu muh. Kud pi ohmi g kakhioj.
D hema g shonthal g e-is-pahyokaj chu'akad g Jesus ab hudaj ab. Kud ab ha hekaj si e iawua g eh'ed ch shuhthagi.
Ith anid neith ch s-mahch mat woho muh. Kuni hab masma am em-ahgithahim mamt ahpim hab wa'ap wo s-mahch mat woho muh.
Jiosh o'ohana o hab chu'ig: Pi at hema wo sha'i e mul g oh'oj. Kut wa woho hab masma hab e juh.
K an ep o'ohanas ch hab chu'ig: Hemajkam at ab wo neithath hegai mamt ab chu'akad.

K hema d Joseph ch ab Arimathea t amjed ch s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch wabshaba s-ha gihug hegam mo pi hohho'ith. D wabshaba hekith am i muh g Jesus, d ith am hih Pilate wui k ab e sho'igchuth k ab tahni g honshpadaj. D am i hiwigi. D ga hu ep jiwia k ab i huduni g muhki k gm hu i bei.

D heg am ep ha'ichug Nicodemus mat wa gd hu i wehpeg chehgim g Jesus chuhug ch ed. Ihtham atsh s-ap wo juh g muhki. D g Nicodemus heg hekaj u'a g siant s-wehch hegai mo d s-ap uhw ha'ichu ch d myrrh ch aloes.

S-e ad hohtkith nad pi hudunihim. D ba'ich tash d t-mihshmetha tash. K eda an mia cheotas hothai ch ed mamt am hab juh g hiha'ini k wabshaba koi sha'i hekaj. K an wehgaj eshas g u'us. Kumd am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g s-kehg ikuskaj heg wehnathk s-ap uhw ha'ichu mach hab masma hab ha wua g ko'i k am cheh heg eda hiha'ini k gm hu hihi.
Thomig wabsh i si'alim mad wabsh kia s-chuhugam, tsh gm hu hihi hegam Mary Magdalene k am thatha cheo t am. Kutsh heki hu gm hu i e nu'ichkwua g hothai mad hekaj ab chum kuhpi.

Tsh am chum neith k am hahawa uhpam meh kihhim wui k ad gd hu t-wui mel ahni John ch Simon Peter k am t-ahgith ch hab kaij, “Am atki i e wuhshath g t-kownaligbad hon heg amjed hiha'ini mat am e cheh. Kuch pi sha'i mahch mas hebai has e juh.”
Kuchd g Peter wehm am ha hekaj wohp.
Nid ahni wehpeg gd hu mel nanid pi ahni ba'ich i s-hohtam meh mad g Peter.
Nid am i koachsh k nei mo am wehch hegai s-kehg ikus k wabshaba pi am hu i wah.
D am hahawa mel g Peter k am wabsh si i wah k cheh hegai ikus
ch heg ehp mat hekaj e hobino g Jesus mo'o. D ith gd hu hab wabsh hejelko holiwek ch kahch.
Kunid ahni am hahawa epai i wah k am i neithok ab hahawa i s-wohoch mat woho i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
Kuchd eda pi koi s-amichuth hegai Jiosh o'ohana mo hab chu'ig mat hemho wa wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.
Kuchd gm hu hahawa hihi uhpam.
Sh am ep oimmed g Mary cheo kihjego ch shoak ch atsh am i e jumalkath k am i koachsh hiha'ini ch ed
ch ash gohk ha neith g anghil. Ihtham ash s-tohtam e enigadathch ch ga hu a'ai thadha, hema ab mo'oshko ch hema ga hu aigo
ch hab kaij, “Uwi, shahchu ap ahgch shoak?” Sh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Heg hekaj matki gm hu i e bei g ni-kownalig muhki. Kuni pi mahch mas hebai e cheh.”
Tsh hab che'iok ab sikol i kekiwua k ash neith mash ab hema kehk ch ash wabshaba pi sha'i mahch mo hedai wud.

Sh eda d Jesus ch ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Uwi shahchu ap ahgch shoak? Thohp in gahg?” Kush hab e ahg mo d e'es nuhkuththam ch hab kaij ab wui, “Ab g si s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am ni-ahgith mapt hebai hab cheh. Nt am wo him k am wo bei.”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Mary.” Tsh ab hahawa ep i neith k hab kaij e-ne'oki ed, “Raboni!” mo hab d ahga “Ni-mashchamtham!”

Sh hab kaij g Jesus, “Pi g am hu ni-shohbith. Koi ant am hu hih ni-ohg wui. Pt wabshaba am wo him k am wo ha ahgi g ni-naipijju mant wo uhpam i ni-nodagi heg wui mo d ni-ohg ch ahpim d ep em-ohg. Heg o d ni-Jioshga ch ahpim d ep em-Jioshga.”
D wa woho am uhpam hih g Mary Magdalene k am t-ahgi mo neith g t-kownalig Jesus. K heg am ahgith ihtha.

D gm hu si i juh thomig hudunk. Kuchd am t-nam hema kih am. D ga hu si yahwidag g kihkjeg nachd pi s-ha ehbith g haha'ichu. D wabshaba am haha wabsh jiwia g Jesus t-wui k hab kaij, “Am g wabsh wo s-ap e tahtk,”
ch ab hahawa t-chehgith g e-nohnhoi ch e-huda. Kuchd si s-hehgig ab i neithok.
D hab ep kaij ab t-wui, “Am g wabsh wo s-ap e tahtk. Am ant i em-chuhcha hab masma mat g ni-ohg am i ni-kei. Kumt hab wa'ap am wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj.”
T hab chei ihtha k ab t-thahm ihbheiwua k hab kaij, “Ab g wo i beh'i g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Kumt wo s-mahch k ah mas hedai g pi ap chu'ichigaj gm hu hab i juni g Jiosh ch hedai pi gm hu hab i juni.” Neh, bad kaij ch am hahawa i pi'ata.
D g Thomas pi am hu t-wehmaj mad wa am jiwia g Jesus.

Kuchd am hahawa chum ahgith matt nei g t-kownalig. D hab kaij g Thomas, “Bant wa'i masma wo s-wohoch mat uhpam i wuhsh mant wo nei g nohnhoij mat ab wo s-babaliwanik mamt ab sisish k ab wo taht abai k ab ep wo taht hudaj ab.”

Hemako thomig amjed, chd am ep i t-hemapai kih ch ed. D am hahawa t-wehmaj g Thomas. Chd ab ep si yahwidathch g kihkjeg. D wabshaba ab i wah g Jesus k am jiwia t-wui k hab kaij, “Am g wabsh wo si s-ap e tahtk.”
D hab hahawa kaij ab Thomas wui, “Ab g i ni-neith k ab tahtam g ni-nohnhoi ch ni-huda k ab wo s-ni-wohochuthath.”
D hab hahawa chei g Thomas, “Ni-kownalig ch ni-Jioshga!”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Ab apt i s-ni-wohoch nap pi ni-neith. Ba'ich at wo i s-hehgigk hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohoch wa chum pi g e-wuhpuikaj ni-neithch.”
Mu'i s-hasig ha'ichu ad hab ep juh g Jesus am t-nena ed mant pi o'oha ith eda o'ohana.
Nt ith in hi wa ha o'oha mamt ab amjed wo s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d alithaj k hab masma ab wo bei g wechij thoakag.
Am wa'i hebai amjed, d am ep i e chehgi g Jesus t-wui amai al kahchki am am Galilee jewed ch ed.
Am achd wa oiopo g ni-nawoj James wehm. K g Simon Peter ch Thomas Kuathi ch Nathanael ch gohk ep g t-wehm e mashchamtham am t-wehmaj.

D hab kaij g Simon Peter ab t-wui, “Ih, nt hi wo sha ha u'im g waptopi.” Kuchd hab kaij, “Pegih, tt wo m-oi.” Chd am hahawa thadhaiwua wahlko ch ed k am i himch shuhthagi oithch k ge chuhug oitham am wuakch g t-chuagia shuhthagi ch ed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i bei.
D ab i chesh g tash. D ab hema kehk shuhthagi hugithgo. Kuchd pi sha'i mahch mo hedai wud.
D hab kaij, “Wihpiop, namt pi ha'ichu sha'i bei?” Chd hab kaij, “Pi ha'ichu.”

D hab hahawa kaij, “An g wo tha'ichuth g e-chuagia inhab s-apkojed g e-wahlko k wo ha'i ha ui.” Kuchd wa woho hab t-juh k pi t-nako machs ab uhpam wo i cheshaj nad pi sha'i si mu'i am e ba'iha g waptopi.
Nid hab hahawa kaij ab Peter wui, “Thoki t-kownalig Jesus!” D am i kah g Simon Peter moki d Jesus k ab wah g e-eniga mat wuahawua k am i thah shuhthagi ch ed k am i e wachwihim k ga hu jiwia wui.
Chd ahchim ha'i ab hahawa i himch g wahlko ab chewaimedch g chuagia waptopi shuhthch nachd pi am wa'i waik siant keishpa ab amjed mo an i hug g shuhthagi.
Kuchd an i huhud shuhthagi koa an k nei mo g chuhthagi am wehch. D am thahm kahch g watopi. D g pahn am ep wehch.
D hab kaij g Jesus ab t-wui, “Ab g wo ha'i u'uk g waptopi em-u'i.”
Ab ad wabsh i si shuhthags g chuagia g ge'eged waptopikaj. Kud g Simon Peter gn hu i chesh wahlko ch ed k ab i chewaim. Kud d siant hetaspo wehst-mahm gamai waik (153). D eda pi e wantsh g chuagia.
D hab t-ahg g Jesus, “Oi g wo i hihim k e gegosith.” Kuchd pi hedai ab kakke mo hedai wud nach pi wa chum s-mahch mo d Jesus.
D am hih g Jesus k am bei g pahn k an i t-hainithahim k g watopi am ep be k an i ha t-mahkhi.
Ith o d wa'i waikkokam mad am i e chehgi g Jesus t-wui amjed mad ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed.

Kuchd am i t-nahto t-gegosithk. D hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui, “Simon map d Jonas alithag, nap ba'ich i si pihk e elith ni-hekaj mo hi ihtham?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig, s-mahch ap mani ab si m-tatchua.” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Am g i ha nuhkuth g wechij ni-wohochuththam no pi hab wa'i masma mo g kahwal mahmad.”

D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Simon, nap woho si pihk e elith ni-hekaj?” D hab kaij g Peter, “Heu'u, ni-kownalig, s-mahch ap mani ab si m-tatchua.” D hab ep kaij g Jesus, “Am g i ha nuhkuth g ni-wohochuththam.”

D ith d i waikko mad hab kaij g Jesus, “Simon, nap ab si ni-tatchua?” D si pi ap e tahtk g Peter mat waikko ab wa'i kakke ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, wehs ap ha'ichu s-mahch ch s-mahch mani ab si m-tatchua.” D hab kaij g Jesus, “Am g i ha nuhkuth g ni-wohochuththam.

Neh, s-mahch ap map hejel s-ap an has i e wua ch am hab e junihim map has i tatchua. Nt wabshaba wo si shel m-ahgi mapt am wo i si kelit k ab haha wo uhgk i uh'ul g e-nohnhoi. T wabsh hema ab wo m-enigadath k am wo i m-bei map hebai chum pi am hu himimk.”
Kudki heg hab ahg matki has masma wo e muhkith g Peter. T hab wo s-mai g hemajkam g Jiosh gewkthag. Kud g Jesus hab hahawa ahg g Peter mat gm hu hasko wo oi.
D am wehmaj i hih g Peter. Nid ab i ha oi. Kud g Peter ab uhpam i nea k ni-neith
k hab kaij ab Jesus wui, “Ni-kownalig, kut haschu am hab wo e juh am tahgio ihtha John.”
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Neh, mantp wo tatchuithath g John mat pi wo ha muh k ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia, k pi ab hu ha'ichu m-him heg amjed. Am apt wabsh wo ni-oithath.”

Kudki an i e ahgithahi am ha shahgith g Jesus wohochuththam mantsh pi wo ha muh. D eda pi hab kaij g Jesus manis pi wo ha muh ch hab kaij, “Mantp wo tatchuithath mat pi wo ha muh k ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia, k pi ab hu ha'ichu m-him heg amjed.”
Ahni ani wud manid neith ch kah ch ia o'oha. Kuni si s-mahch mo d wohokam.
Neh, mu'i ad ha'ichu hab ep juh g Jesus. Tp hems am wo i e o'ohanahi wehs k wabsh wo shuhth g jewed.

Ni-nawoj map ab si tatchua g Jiosh: Am ant ep wo i em-o'ohani ahni Luke mant wa heki hu m-o'ohani hegai mash wa haschu hab junihim ihtha Jesus ch haschu ha mashcham eda mash am oimmelhim ha shahgith g Tutuligo hemajkam.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ash wa ab mahkch g Jesus g gewkthag. Kutsh heg am ha'i i ha chuhcha k am ha mashcha g e-chehanig.

Mtsh am hahawa sho'igchuth k mua. Tsh wabshaba uhpam ep e chegito k am e chehgith ha wui g e-chuhchai ch nahnko masma wohokamchuth mo d thoakam. Kush ihtham mu'ikko neith am oitham g gi'ikko wehst-mahm tash matsh eda koi im hu i e bei thahm kahchim wui. Sh g Jesus mu'i ha'ichu ha mashcham ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.

Sh wa am hu hebai am e hemapathch. Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Mat ab i em-mah g John g pahl wakona. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g si ge'e gewkthag ab wo i em-mah pi sha'i mu'i tash i'ajed. Ni am wa heki hu em-ahgith mo hab kaij g Jiosh matsh ith am hab wo em-juni. Kumt ia wabsh wo ha'ichugk Jerusalem kihhim t am k ab wo ai mat hab wo e juh.”

Sh am hema ep d tash. Tsh am ep i e hemapai g chuhchaij wehmaj g Jesus k ab kakke, “T-kownalig, napt ab hahawa ep wo t-mah ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam g ap'ethag matt hejel am wo i himch g t-kownaltalig?”
Sh hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui, “Heki at hu i ap'ech g Jiosh mat hekith am hab wo i e juh hegai mam haschu ab ni-kakke. K pi d em-wuikam mams wo s-ap s-mahchk ia'i ithani mas hekith wo i k.

Kumt wabshaba am wo i ahgahith mam haschu i s-ap s-mahch ab ni-amjed. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab wo i em-mah g si ge'e gewkthag mamt hab wo junihith. Kumt wehpeg am wo i ahgahi Jerusalem kihhim ch ed k amjed wehsko am Judea chekshani ch ed k amjed gm hu Samaria chekshani ch ed. T amjed gm hu wehsko wo i e ahgahi a'ai jewed thahm.”
Neh, bash kaij ch amjed im hu hahawa i e bei thahm kahchim wui k gm hu pi e mahsith chewagi ch ed.
Sh am wabsh kia gegok ch am uhgk si nenea ihtham. Tsh am haha wabsh gohk i e chehgi g anghil k si s-tohtam e enigadathch
ch hab kaij, “Pi g ia hu wabsh wo gegokk ch am uhgk neneath mat hebai hih g Jesus. Hema tash at wo wa uhpam jiwia hab masma mam hemuch am neith mat has i masma gm hu hih.”
Ith atsh hab e juh Olive U'us Kawulk t ab. Sh heg d al eda hugkam mihya ab amjed g Jerusalem. Tsh ab hahawa i huhud hegam Jesus chuhchai kawulk amjed k am hihim

k gn hu thatha mo an thadha k d ihtham Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, ch hegai James mash g ohgaj hab chehgig Alphias, ch hegai Simon mash d hema hegam mash tatchua mat g Tutuligo hejel wo himchuthath g e-kownaltalig, ch hegai Judas mash g ohgaj hab chehgig James.
Sh g Jesus je'e ch wepnag ch ha'i ehp g u'uwi am ha wehm e hehemapath ch am e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui.
Sh am he'ekia d i tash matsh am ep i e hemapath k d siant gokko wehst-mahm (120) hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus e tho'ibiakch. Kutsh am hahawa i kekiwua g Peter k ash hab kaij,

“Ni-wepnag, Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag atsh am i tashogi g t-kownaligbad David matsh has wo e juh hegai Judasbad mo chum t-wehmaj. Kut hemho wa hab e juh mash has i kaij. Judas at am i ha wanim hegam mat am bei g Jesus,
chum as d ep chum kehshaj mat am wo ahgahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.” Bash kaij g Peter.

Kumtsh wa chum namkith g Judasbad matsh gagda. Tsh wabshaba hema e nolawt g oithag heg hekaj namkithadaj. Kutsh g Judasbad am him k am e naggia heg eda k ab si wantsh g e-wohk. Tsh g hihij gm hu si e iawua.
Sh heg hekaj hab e a'aga Eh'ed Oithag.

Kush g Peter heg hekaj hab ep kaij, “An o hab chu'ig heg eda nen'ei o'ohana mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Pi at am hu wo ha'ichugk e-kih ed nat pi wo muh. K an ep o'ohanas: Am at kehkud ed hema ep wo i kekiwua.

“Kut ith hekaj hemho wa am hema wo i kekiwua t-wehm mat hab wa'ap wo wohokamch mat uhpam e chegito g t-kownalig Jesus. T hemho wa d wo hema t-ahchimk mach ga hujed i wehmajkahim g Jesus am i amjed mat g John pahl wako am hugkam mat im hu hih thahm kahchim ch ed.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter ch am i ha'asa neo.
Tsh am hahawa gohk i ha wuwhas. K hema hab chehgig ihtham Mattias. K hema d ep Joseph Justus ch hab ep e chechcheg Barsabas.

Tsh am hahawa e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “Ge t-kownalig, t am i thagito g Judas ihtha chikpan k atki am ai g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Kuch ahchim pi sha'i mahch mo has e tatatk g hemajkam. Pt heg hekaj am wo si i t-tashogi mapt hedai am wo i ha kei ihtham gohk
mat d wo si m-kehshak ch am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu m-ahga am kehkud ed g Judas.”
Tsh am hahawa i ha tashogi mat d wo Mattiask ch d wo si kehshajk.
Tsh am i e ai matsh g Tutuligo hemajkam wo e nam k am hab wo juh g hehgchulitha Jiosh wui heg hekaj ha'ichu e-bahijitha. Kutsh am wehs i e hemapai hema kih ch ed hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus.
Tsh haha wabsh ab thahm kahchim t amjed ha'ichu hab kaitha mo g s-gewk hewel wabsh shashawuk heg eda kih.
Sh hahawa ha'ichu ep neith mash hab mahs mo g mei. Tsh ith ab a'ai i e gantad k ab i thahiwuhi wehsijj ha ab.
Kutsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab i ha mah g si ge'e gewkthag. Tsh hekaj haha wabsh nahnko mahs ne'okikaj neneo matsh eda chum pi hebai mai.
Sh eda mu'ijj ab thadha Jerusalem t ab hegam mash d Tutuligo ch ab a'ai i hihi mu'ikpa jejewed amjed matsh ab wo ihm g Jiosh.

Tsh an wehsko i kaitha hegai mash hab kaithag mo g s-gewk hewel. Kutsh ihtham am i kah k am e chehm mash hebai i kaithag. Sh ihtham Jesus ihmtham haha wabsh am neneok g ha-ne'okikaj mash hedai haschu i ne'okikaj neok.
Kutsh si e totoths ihtham k hab kaij, “Hab kaitham neneok ch eda d wabsh Galilee t am o'othham.
Kus has masma hab chu'ig mach wehsijj s-ha amichuth g hehe'ejel t-ne'okikaj?
Kuch eda mu'ikpa jejewed amjed, ha'i ab Parthia t amjed ch ha'i ab Media t amjed ch ab amjed g Elam ch Mesopotamia ch Judea ch Cappadocia ch Pontus ch Asia

ch Phrygia ch Pamphylia ch Egypt ch Crete ch Arabia ch gm hu Cyrene kihhim wehgaj am Libya jewed ch ed ch ab Rome kihhim t amjed. K ia ha'i t-wehmaj g gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i wahp t-himthag ed. Kuch wehsijj kah g hehe'ejel t-ne'okikaj heg amjed mat haschu si s-hasigam hab juh g Jiosh.
A t haschu ahgk hab ha'ichu e juh?” Bash kaij nash pi si has elith.
Sh wabshaba ha'ijj wabsh nahnko ha ahg ch hab kaij, “Tki wabsh nawkk ihtham.”
Tsh ab hahawa i gegokiwua g Jesus chuhchai. Sh g Peter am amog, “Ni-hajuni ch ahpim mam ia wabsh sha kih Jerusalem t am, ab g wo si i ni-kaiham k am wo i oithahi mant haschu wo i em-ahgi.
Pi ach d nawkkoi.
Ihtha mat haschu has i e juh o d hegai matsh g Joelbad an o'oha. Heg ash wa d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch an o'oha hab masma:

Bo kaij g Jiosh: T ab wo i e aihi g si oithchkam tash. Kunt wo cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am wo ha wehmajk g hemajkam ch ab wo ha mahkath g si ge'e i wehmtadag. Kut g em-wihpiopga ch g em-chetchaga wo ah g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Nt wo i ha tashogi g kekel am ha-chehchki ed mat haschu has wo e juh imhab i thahm. T ith hab wa'ap am wo e chehgi ha-nena ed g wechij o'othham.
Ab ant wehs wo ha mah g ni-pionag g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag, chum hems g u'uwi ni-pionag, mat am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
Nt wo ha chehgi g s-hasigam ha'ichu gn hu uhgk ha thahm ch an jewed thahm. Eh'ed at wo e iawua. T g mei ch kuhbs wo i wuhsh.
T g tash pi wo ton k g mashath wo ge wegiumih hab masma mo g eh'ed. K ith wehs hab d ahga mo e aihim hegai si ge'e tash mant heg eda wo ha lothai g hemajkam.
Kut hedai ab wo i gei ni-wui k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap e-namkithadag. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.

“Kumt ab wo i ni-kaiha, ni-hajuni. Ihtha Jesus mo ab d kihkam Nazareth t ab at hab juh g s-hasigam ha'ichu mat pi hedai hejel wo sha'i e nako mat hab wo juh. T ith hekaj am i t-tashogi g Jiosh mo ith am d si Kehshaj. Kum ihtha am wa hejel s-mahch heg hekaj mat wehs am hab e juh em-shahgith.

Jiosh atsh heki hu i ap'ech matsh has masma wo e muhkith g alithaj k heg hekaj am i thagito em-wui. Kumt an be k ha mah hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh chehanig nam pi s-mu'amk. Kut ihtham mua ab kots t ab naggiak.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i wuhshath ab amjed g s-ko'ok muhkig nat pi am hab wa'ap i ap'ech mat ep wo e chegito. Kut hemho wa am hab wo e juh.
“T an wa o'oha g t-kownaligbad David mat hab wo chei g Jiosh si Kehsha: Chum ap hekith ni-wehmaj, ni-Jioshga! Ni heg hekaj pi sha'i ha'ichukaj ni-kudut
ch wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch s-hehgigam ha'ichu ahg. Ab o e aihim mant wo muh. Nt wabshaba wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch wo m-nenida.
Pi apt am hu wo sha'i ni-thagito amai mo hebai ha'ichug g ko'i k pi wo sha'i hiwigi mas wo padt g ni-chuhkug nani pi d hekia s-ap'ekam m-alithag.
Am apt i ni-chehgi mant has masma uhpam ep wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Chum apt hekith wo ni-wehmajk. Nt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigkath.
“Neh, ni-naipijju, batki masma an o'oha g Davidbad. K wabshaba si tasho mo pi hejel hab e ahg mat pi wo padt no pi g oh'oj am wabsh kia wehch hiha'inij ed ith i tashkaj.

Davidbad ash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch heg hab ahg Jiosh si Kehsha matsh pi wo padt k wo uhpam i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Jiosh ash wa heki hu ahgith g Davidbad mat am wo hema i kei g amjedkam am kehkud ed mat d wo ge'e kownalk.
Davidbad oki s-mahch ihtha ch heg hab ahg ch hab kaij mat pi am hu wo sha'i thagito amai mo hebai ha'ichug g ko'i k pi wo sha'i hiwigi mat wo padt g chuhkugaj.
Pegih, k d hegai Jesus mat g Jiosh ab i wamigi muhkig amjed. Kuch ahchim g t-wuhpuikaj neith mach haschu ia em-ahgith.

Jiosh at am i wahkith k an kei si e-hugith an. Kut ab bei g ap'ethag k cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat ab t-wui wo hih. Heki ash hu hab kaij g Jiosh mat hab wo e juh. K d ihtha mam am neith ch kah hemuch mat hab t-juni.

Pi o hejel hab e ahg g Davidbad ch wabshaba heg hab ahg Jiosh si Kehsha mat pi wo padt k wo uhpam hih am thahm kahchim wui nat pi an ep o'oha: Jiosh o hab kaij ab ge ni-Kownalig wui: In g thahiwua si ni-hugith an
k ab wo ai mant wo ha gewito g m-obga.
“Pegih, ihtha Jesus mamt ab naggia kots t ab o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d wo t-tho'ibiakam kownalk. Kutt ith wo chum si s-ap s-mahchk wehsijj ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
Kush si s-ko'okam pi ap e tahtk g hemajkam am i kaiok ch hab kaij ab ha wui hegam Peter, “Ih, tt has wo t-juh, t-naipijju?”

Sh hab kaij g Peter ab ha wui, “Hehe'ejel g gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl-wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus Christ. Kut gm hu hab wo i juh g Jiosh g pi ap em-chu'ichig. T amjed wo si em-wehmajkath g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag
nash pi g Jiosh hab kaij mat ab wehsijj wo ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam mat ab wo i ha wai e wui.”
Sh tash am neok g Peter ch am chum ha ahgith ch hab kaij, “Am g wo e tho'ibia. Si s-ko'ok namkithadag o ab ha aihim hegam t-wehm hemajkam mat pi gm hu wo ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig.”
Kutsh waik mihl ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj heg i tashkaj k e pahl-wapkon k ab i e hemakoj ha wehm.
Sh g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa ha mashcham. Kush am ha wehm e mihshmath ch e ho'ige'ithahun ch ha wehm huhuga g chemait.
Kush mu'i ha'ichu s-hasigam hab junihim ihtham Jesus chuhchai g Jiosh gewkthagkaj. Tsh heg hekaj mu'ijj ehp ab si has i el mat haschu hab juh g Jiosh.
Sh wehsijj g Jesus ihmtham ab si e hajunit ch wehs ha'ichu ab i a'ai e mahk mash hedai haschu i pi edgith,
chum as hems wo gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga mat heg hekaj lial am wo i ha wehmt hegam mo ha'ichu i pi edgith.
Sh wehs tashkaj am e nanmek ge'e cheopi ch ed ch am ep e wehm e gegosith a'ai e-kihki ed si s-ap e tatatk ch ab wabsh i e sho'igchuthch Jiosh wui
ch ab si hehgchulith g Jiosh. Kush wehsijj g hemajkam si s-ha ho'ige'elith. Sh g Jiosh ab i ha wahpkith ha shahgith wehs tash ab hegam mat hab wa'ap e tho'ibia.
Kush am wa'i hebai amjed, tsh am thatha g Peter g John wehm ge'e cheopi t am. Kush d i waik ohla gm hu i juhk mo eda e a'ahe mat wo e ho'ige'ithahu.

Sh ab hema thaha g sho'igkam hemajkam heg bahsho kolhai kihjeg mash hab e a'aga Si S-kehg Kihjeg. Kush ihtha o'othham ga hu e-alijk amjed pi himthag. Kumsh wehs tashkaj am wabsh i bebhe ch ab thathsha ab kolhai kihjego. Kush wabsh ha'ichu ha tahni hegam mo am thaiw.
Tsh eda am wo i wahp ihtham Peter ch John. Sh ab ha'ichu chum ha tahni.
Tsh ab si i nei ihtham Peter k hab kaij, “Ab g si i t-neith.”
Kutsh wa woho ab si i ha nei hab e ahgch mat wo ha'ichu mah.

Sh oi wa hab wabsh kaij g Peter, “Neh, ni-nawoj, pi ani ha lialiga ch wabshaba ha'ichu wo m-mah mat heg ba'ich wo i m-wehmt. K d ihtha mant hab wo m-ah mapt ab wo i hiw g Jesus Christ k wo kekiwua k wo hih.”
Bash kaij ch ab hahawa bei g nowij k ab i wuhshath. Kutsh am wa i hekaj ab gewpka g kakhioj.
Tsh am si uhgk tha'a k kekiwua k am wa i hekaj s-ap hih. Kutsh ihtham Peter im hu i wahp cheopi kolhai ch ed. Tsh heg ha wehm i wah k si chehk thath'ehim ch ab si hehgchulith g Jiosh.
Kutsh si has i el g hemajkam am i neithok mo d hegai pi himithkam mo ab thahiwup kolhai kihjego.

Batsh e juh ihtha anai mash hab e a'aga Solomonbad Watto. Kush ihtha pi himithkam gn hu wabsh i si e u'ukch ab ha ab g Peter ch John mat pi wo i e gawulkai ab ha amjed. Tsh ab hahawa a'aijed i wohp g hemajkam k gn hu ha biha si has i elithk mat e thoaj.
Tsh am wabsh ap'et g Peter mat am ha mihshmath k hab kaij: “Ni-wehm o'othham, pi g am wo si e totothsith. Pi att g hejel t-gewpkthagkaj thoaj ihtha o'othham,

Jiosh si Kehsha at hab t-juni nach pi ab hiwig. K d hegai Jesus mam ahpim s-mu'amk ch ab mah g kownal Pilate. K eda g Jiosh d pionag g Jesus ch d hekia s-ap'ekam ch pi ha chu'ichig. T ha chum wo thagito g Pilate. M wabshaba ahpim hab ahg mat wo mu'a k heg wo thagito mo d ha mu'akam. K heg hekaj d em-chu'ichig mat e muhkith. K eda d hegai mo ab t-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab si ha'ichuchuth k uhpam i wuhshath ab amjed g muhkig k am i bei thahm kahchim wui. Hegam t-shohshonbad mash d Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob ash ab si has i elith g Jiosh. Kum eda ab wui gegok g Jiosh si Kehsha.
“Pegih, ni-wepnag, mtp hems heg hekaj s-mu'am g Jesus mam pi mahch mo heg am d si Kehshaj g Jiosh mat wo t-tho'ibia.
T eda heki hu wa'i amjed an o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mat g si Kehshaj wo e sho'igch. T ithani woho am hab e juh.
Pegih, oi g gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. T heg wo s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig k ab wo si i wechijith g em-thothakag.
T ab em-wui wo i hih g si Kehshaj Jesus.
K hab mahs mat an wo ha'ichugk ihtha Jesus thahm kahchim ch ed am hugkam mat hab wo e juh hegai mo haschu i t-tashogith g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.

“Neh, bash wa kaij g Mosesbad am t-shohshon ha wui: Em-kownalig Jiosh at ab wo hema i kei g ha'ichu i tashogiththam hab masma mat ahni am i ni-kei. Kut ihtha d wo em-wepo o'othhamk. Wehs ha'ichu amt ab wo kaiha mat haschu ab wo i em-ahgi.
Kut wo e ko'ij matp hedai pi ab hu wo kaihamath. Neh, bash kaij g Mosesbad.
K wehsijj ahgachug g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam hegai mo haschu am hab i e junihim ithani. Samuelbad ash d hema hegam.

Jiosh ash wa am ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad matsh haschu hab wo t-juni. K heg d ep t-wuikam ahchim mach d ha amjedkam. “Bash kaij g Jiosh am wui g Abrahambad: Am ant wo hema i kei g m-amjedkam mant heg hekaj ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam ith thahm jewed.
“Neh, t wa woho hab e juh mat am i kei g e-alithag Jesus. T heg wehpeg ab i s-t-ho'ige'el ahchim Tutuligo k ab t-wui him k ab i t-mah g ap'ethag matt ab wo i t-nohnogi ab amjed g pi ap'ekam.”
Sh am wabsh kia ha mihshmath g Peter ch John. Kutsh am haha wabsh ha'i thatha g papal ch ha-ge'ejig g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam ch ha'i ehp mash am oith g Sajusi himthag.
Sh eda wa ihtham Peter ch John am ha mashcham g hemajkam mat ab i wuhsh g Jesus e-muhkig amjed. Sh ihtham Sajusi pi hohho'ith nash pi pi wohochuth mat ep wo e chegito g ko'i.
Sh eda e aihim mat wo s-chukk. T heg hekaj gd hu ha kuh mat wo ha lothai ba'ich tash.
Tsh wabshaba mu'ijj hegam matsh kah g Peter ch John ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tsh am i mu'itha hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Kush hegam mash d chechoj d hahawa hetasp mihl.
Sh am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh am e hemapai g hemajkam ha wanimedtham ch ge'eged ch chehanig ha mashchamtham.
Kush am ha wehmaj hegai uhgchu pahl mash hab chehgig Annas. Sh g hajunij am hab wa'ap ha'ichug mash ha'i d Caiaphas ch John ch Alexander.

Tsh ab hahawa i ha wuwhas ihtham Peter kukpaikud amjed k ga hu i ha chuhcha k ab ha kakke, “Shahchu am e wepogith ch hab ha'ichu wua? Thohm hab elith mamt heg ab bei g e-gewkthag k thoaj ihtha pi himithkam?”
Tsh ab ba'ich i gewkai g Peter g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Sh hab kaij: “Bamki e elith ahpim t-wanimedtham ch ge'eged
matt hemho wo wa bei g ap'ethag matt hab wo juh g s-ap'ekam.

Pegih, nt wo em-ahgi mat g Jesus Christ ab i t-mah hegai gewkthag matt hekaj thoaj ihtha o'othham. Ahpim amt hab juh hegai Jesus Christ mat ab e naggia kots t ab. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
