Ith o hab ahg Jesus g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch an o'oha ihtha ha'ichu wepogitha mo hab chu'ig: Kihttham at wo hema chum s-ohhotham g hothai. T wabshaba ith d wo si s-has ha'ichu hothaik am ha-kihta wehhejed.
Hegai wa'i Jesus at wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam. Tho Jiosh si Kehsha mat ab wo t-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Kut pi hedai ep hab wo sha'i juh g tho'ibiathag.”

Sh si s-e mahch ch neneok ihtham Peter. Tsh hekaj si has i ha el ihtham haha'ichu, wahm mat am i s-mai am i ha kahkch mo d wabsh si o'othham ch pi hasko sha'i uhgk e mashchamahim. Tsh am hahawa i amich moki an wehmajkahim g Jesus.
Kush am ha wehm kehk hegai mamt thoaj. Sh pi e nakog hegam haha'ichu mas has wo chei nash pi g e-wuhpuikaj neith mat woho e thoaj hegai.
Kumtsh gm hu hahawa i ha wuwhas hegam Peter matsh g haha'ichu am wo i a'aga.
Kush hab kaij, “Shahtt wo ha juh. Wehsijj o s-mahch g Jerusalem t am kihkam mat thoaj g pi himithkam. K ith d si s-hasig ha'ichu. Kutt pi wo sha'i t-nako machs hab wo chei mas pi woho hab juh.”
Sh hab hahawa ep kaij, “Matt wo keshwua ihtha ha-ahga mat pi hekith am hu ep wo sha'i a'agath ihtha Jesus am hema i wui.”
Kumtsh ab hahawa ep i ha wahpki. Sh hab ha ahg, “Chum as has wo chu'igk ha'ichu, mt pi am hu wo sha'i a'agath ihtha Jesus.”
Sh hab hahawa si kaij hegam Peter, “Am g wo i a'amichuth machs ahpim ab wo em-wohoch aha natt g Jiosh.
Tt ahchim hi hemho am wo wa ahgahith mat haschu i si s-kehg hab juh k haschu i si s-kehg hab kaij g Jesus mach si neith ch kah.”

Kush wa eda hegai pi himithkam i ba'iwchkim g gi'ikko wehst-mahm a'ahithag. Sh g hemajkam wehs ab si i hehgchulith g Jiosh mat thoaj. Kutsh heg hekaj pi sha'i e nako g ha wanimedtham mas has masma s-ko'okam wo ha namkith k am wabsh si ha ebkiod k chum ha keshwua k hahawa ha thagito.
Tsh am wa i hekaj gd hu uhpam thatha e-naipijju ha wui k am ha ahgith mo has i ha ahg g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged.
Tsh am i kaiok am ha hekaj e ho'ige'ithahun k hab kaij, “T-kownalig Jiosh, wehs ap u'ukch g gewkthag ch nahtokch g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch ge kahchki ch wehs ha'ichu mo haschu am i ha eda.

Ab aptki cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo amichuthach g m-pionagbad David. K hekaj hab kaij: Sho'o wa'i si s-babga g nahnko thakam hemajkam ch am chum e nakog mat am hab wo juh hegai mo g Jiosh pi ha hiwgith.
T am i e nako g kokownal k am i e wehmt mat ab wui wo gegokiwua g Jiosh si Kehsha.
“Neh, Jiosh t-ohg, t wa woho am e hemapai g t-wehm o'othham ha wehm g gawul mahs hemajkam ch hegam kokownal mo d Herod ch Pilate. Wehsijj at ab wui gegokiwua g hekia s-ap'ekam m-Kehsha, Jesus.
Heki apt hu am i ap'ech mapt wo ha hiwigi mat wo mua g si m-Kehsha. Kut ihtham mat ab chum m-wui gegokiwua hab wabsh juh mapt haschu heki hu i ap'ech.

Pegih, t-ohg Jiosh, am g i ha neith mo ab si t-ebkioth k ab wo i t-mah g gewkthag matt s-gewkam wo a'agath g ha'ichu m-ahga ch wo ha thothaj g kok'otham ch si s-hasigam ha'ichu hab wo juh g gewkthajkaj g hekia s-ap'ekam m-Kehsha, Jesus.”
Tsh am i ha'asa e ho'ige'ithahu. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si u'ugij hegai kih mo am e hemapathch k ab si i ha mah g gewkthag. Tsh am hahawa ba'ich i si s-gewkam ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Wehsijj ash ab a'ai si e tatchua g Jesus ihmtham ch ab si i hemakoch g e-chegitoi k pi hedai sha'i s-tha'a g ha'ichu e-eniga ab a'ai e wui.
Sh ihtham Jesus chuhchai si s-gewkam am ahgachug mat uhpam i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig t amjed k d wehs ha-kownalig. Kush g Jiosh am si i ha wehmt.
Sh ha'i am ha gagda g e-o'oithag ch e-kihki ch ab i u'u g lial
ch ab ha mamka g Jesus chuhchai mash hekith i e tatchua. Sh am hahawa a'ai ha mamka hegam mash pi ha'ichu edgith. Sh hekaj pi hedai ha'ichu pi edgith.

Sh hema d Joseph ch ab Cyprus jewed t ab d kihkam ch d chum papal ha wehm chikpantham nash pi ab d Levibad amjedkam. Sh ith hab ep chechcheg g Jesus chuhchai Barnabas mo hab d ahga I ha Gewkemhuntham.
Ith atsh gagda g e-oithag k ab i ui g namkigaj k wehs ha mah g Jesus chuhchai.
Sh am hema d Jesus ihmtham ch hab chehgig Ananias. Kush g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Sapphira ch hab wa'ap d Jesus ihmtham. Kutsh ihtha Ananias epai gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga
k hab masma hab chum e juh mat wehs ha mah g namkigaj g Jesus chuhchai k wabshaba gd hu ha'i si toa e-wohshag ed.

Sh hab kaij g Peter ab wui, “Shahchu apt ahgk hiwigi g Jiawul mat am pad ha'ichu hab juh m-ihbthag ed. Pt heg hekaj iattogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mapt heg wepogi mo ith d wehs g ha'ichu m-eniga namkig.

Hegai ha'ichu m-eniga o d m-eniga mapt koi gagda. Pt am i gagda. K hegai namkigaj d m-lialiga. Pt eda hab juh ihtha si ge'e pi ap'ekam. Pi apt ahchim wa'i chum t-iattogi mach d wabsh o'othham. Jiosh apt ep chum iattogi.”
T am wabsh i chum kaiok ihtha g Ananias k muhk k i gei.
Tsh ab hahawa i wahp g wechij o'othham k am i ap'ech g chuhkugaj k gd hu cheh.
Sh am ep s-mahch g wehmaj kihkam g muhki matsh hab masma wo chum ha iattogi. Sh am d i waik ohla. Kutsh eda pi koi kah mat has e juh k hekaj am jiwia mo am thaha g Peter.
Kush heg ab wui hab kaij, “Namt ha'akia ui g lial mamt gagda g ha'ichu e-eniga?” Sh hab kaij, “Heu'u, ha'akia att ui.”

Sh hab kaij g Peter, “Ms haschu ahgk hig ahpi g e-wehm kihkam wehm hab chum i e taht mamt wabsh wo pi'ich g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag? Thatha at hegam mat gd hu cheh g m-wehm kihkam. Pegih, t hab wa'ap masma hab wo m-juh.”
Tsh am ha hekaj muhk k i gei wecho. Tsh ab i wahp g wechij o'othham k am nei matki muh k gm hu i be k gd hu cheh hugithaj an g wehmaj kihkam.
Tsh wehsijj ab si s-ehbeni g Jesus ihmtham ch hegam ehp mo hedai i kah ihtha.
Kush s-hasig ha'ichu s-ta neithamam hab junihim g Jesus chuhchai am ha shahgith g hemajkam. Sh wehsijj si s-ap e hehemapath hegam Jesus ihmtham heg wecho Solomonbad watto.
Sh g hemajkam ab si has ha elith ch wabshaba si s-e gihug mat ab wo i ha wehmt.
Tsh oi wa mu'i ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ab i ha wehmt. Ha'i d chechoj ch ha'i d u'uwi.
Kumtsh am i ha wuwhas g kok'otham am i neithok mo haschu has junihim g Jesus chuhchai k an kahya oithk ha wahpakusch hab elithch mat chum hems g Peter ehkathag ab hab wo e juh ha ab mat wo e thothaj.
Mu'ijj atsh ab a'aijed i hihi Jerusalem wui ab i ha u'uk g e-kok'othamga ch hegam mo g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Kutsh wehs ha thothaj.
Tsh g uhgchu pahl ch hegam mash hab wa'ap am oith g Sajusi himthag si s-ko'okam s-ha hehgam g Jesus chuhchai
k am i ha cheha g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat wo ha kuh. Tsh wa woho am ha kuh.
Tsh wabshaba heg i s-chuhugam ab g anghil am si kuhpi'o g kukpaikud k ab i ha wuwhas g Jesus chuhchai k hab ha ahg,
“Am g wo uhpam hihim k am wo i gegokiwua ge'e cheopi ch ed k wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat has masma wo bei ihtha pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”

Kutsh ab wohog elith k am hihim k am i wahp ge'e cheopi ch ed mat wabsh i chum mahsi k am ha hekaj i ha mashcha g hemajkam. Tsh eda heg wa'i si'alim g uhgchu pahl ch hegam Sajusi am i ha hemapai g e jehnigiththam. Sh ihtham pi mahch mat haschu has e juh ch atsh am ha cheha g nuhkuththam mat ab wo i ha ui g ha-lilsoga.
Kutsh am chum hihi g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat wo ha ui. Kush pi am hu ha'ichug. Tsh ab wabsh uhpam hihim k am ha ahgith ch hab kaij,
“M att thatha kukpaikud am k am chum nei. K ab wabsh kia yahwidag. K g lilso ha nuhkuththam ab ep gegok kihjeg t ab. Tt wabshaba am i chum kuhpi'o g kihjeg. K pi am hu hedai ha'ichug.”
Tsh am i ha kaiok am wabsh i pi amich mas hebai has e juh g ha-lilsoga.
Tsh am hahawa hema i wahk k hab kaij, “Neh'e! Ithani o gd hu ha mashcham g hemajkam ge'e cheopi ch ed hegam mamt wa ha kuh.”
Tsh am hahawa hihi g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam k ab uhpam wabsh s-ap i ha ui nat pi am hu wo ha ma'ichshul g hemajkam
k am ha u'apa ha wui g e jehnigiththam. Sh hab ha ahg g uhgchu pahl,
“Chum ach s-gewkam pi em-hiwgith mams an hu wo a'agath hegai Jesusbad. T eda g em-mashchamadag ab amjed heki hu wehsko chehmo g Jerusalem. Kum ahpim ab chum t-abchuth g muhkigaj.”

Sh hab kaij hegam Peter, “K wabshaba g Jiosh am t-ahgith matt am wo wa ahgahith ihtha mach haschu i si t-wuhpuikaj neith. Kutt hemho wo wa i hehgch g Jiosh, pi wabsh g o'othham. Ahpim amt bei g Jesus k hab juh mat ab e naggia kots t ab k e muhkith. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed k am i wahki thahm kahchim ch ed k an i kei si e-hugith an k ab i mah g gewkthag mat wo t-tho'ibia k wo t-wanimedath. Kut heg ab i t-mah g ap'ethag ahchim Tutuligo hemajkam matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi. T hekaj g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Jiosh at ab cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wehs wo t-wehmajk ahchim mach ab s-wohog elith ch am t-gahi wuhshanim wo wohokamch g Jesus.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
Tsh wabsh woho'i babgat hegam e jehnigiththam k wabsh chum s-ha kokthaimk.

Sh wabshaba am tha hegai mash d Gamaliel ch d chehanig ha mashchamtham ch am oith g Palasi himthag. Sh wehsijj ab si has elith g hemajkam. Kutsh am i kekiwua k am ha ahgi mat gm hu wo sha'i i ha wuwhas g e-lilsoga. Tsh wa woho hab ha juh.
Sh hab hahawa kaij ihtha ab ha wui g e jehnigiththam, “Ni-hajuni, am g wo s-e nen'oithk mamt has wo ha juh ihtham o'othham.

Hekith o hu i mat am hema i e maskogith k hab chehgig Theudas ch hab kaij mo d ge ha'ichu s-mahchim. Kut am hu i gi'ik siant chechoj ab i wehmt. T wabshaba e muhkith ihtha. T wehsijj e gantad hegam mat wa ab wehmt. T am wa'i huhug g ahgaj.

T amjed am hema ep i e maskogi eda mat g hemajkam e kuint k hab chehgig Judas ch am Galilee t am d o'othham. T ihtha hab wa'ap mu'i o'othham am i oi. T wabshaba hab wa'ap e muhkith hegai Judas. T hab wa'ap a'ai e gantad hegam mat wa ab wehmt.

“Pegih, k hemuch hab wa mahs ha'ichu. Pi g am hu has wo sha'i ha juhni ihtham o'othham. Ha g wo thagito. Hemu at wo huhug ihtha ha'ichu hab ha-juni matp d wabsh wo o'othham hab ha-elithak. Tp d wo sha Jiosh ha'ichu hab junik, mt pi wo sha'i e nako mams wo keshwua.
Mtp hems heg wabsh wo e wepogi mam g Jiosh wabsh cheggia.” Tsh oi wa ab i s-wohog el g Gamaliel ihtham e jehnigiththam
k hab ha ahg g ge'e cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo i ha wahpki g lilso k wo ha gewitta. Tsh wa woho hab e juh. Kutsh ab ep si ha ahgi mat pi am hu wo sha'i a'agath g Jesus k hahawa ha thagito.
Kush wabsh si s-hehgig ihtham Jesus chuhchai am i wuwhak natsh pi ab si has i ha el g Jiosh k ab i ha mah g ap'ethag matsh si e sho'igch wehhejed g Jesus.
Pi atsh sha'i ha'asa a'aga g Jesus k wabshaba wehs tashkaj am wabsh i ha mashcham g hemajkam ge'e cheopi ch ed ch am ha-kihki ed mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.

Kush am i mu'ithahim hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag. Sh am ha'i neneok g Greek hemajkam ha-ne'okikaj nash pi tash gm hu kihkahim ha-jewedga ed. Kush ihtham hab kaij mash pi ap ha thagio'ith hegam hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi mash d ha-hajuni. Kush heg hekaj am a'ai pi e ap'et ihtham Greek neneoktham ha wehm hegam mo g hejel e-ne'okikaj neneok.
Tsh am i kah g Jesus chuhchai k am wehs i ha hemapath k hab kaij, “T-wepnag, pi o ap'e machs wabsh wo thagito g mihshmetha ab amjed g Jiosh k im hu g lial wo hudawogath.

Ab oki ha'i ep em-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag ch amichuthadag mamt am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan. Pegih, mt am wewa'ak wo i ha gawulkai hegam mam s-ha mahch mo woho hab masma. Kutt ihtham am wo i ha chuhcha mat wo nuhkuth ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu.
Tt ahchim Jesus chuhchai am hab wo si i juh matt wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath ch wo si ha mihshmethath g hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij.

Kumtsh ab si i s-hohho'i mo has kaij k am wewa'ak i ha chuhcha. Hema ihtham ash hab chehgig Steven ch ab si s-gewkam hiwig g Jesus. Sh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si mahkch g gewkthag. Kush hegam ha'i ehp hab chechgig Philip ch Prochorus ch Nicanor ch Timon ch Parmenas ch Nicolaus. Ihtha Nicolaus ash ab d amjedkam g Antiok kihhim ch d gawul mahs o'othham ch ab i s-wohoch g Tutuligo ha-himthag eda mat koi s-mai ab amjed g Jesus.
Tsh ihtham ab hahawa i ha ui g hemajkam ha wui g Jesus chuhchai. Kutsh ihtham am e ho'ige'ithahun k ab ha taht mat heg hekaj wo s-e mahchk mo d si ha-chuhchai.
Tsh am si i ge'etha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Jerusalem t am. Kutsh ba'ich i mu'itha hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag. Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch hegam mo d papal Tutuligo ha-himthag ed.
Ab ash si s-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh g Steven ch ab si i mahkch g e-gewkthag. Kush s-hasigam ha'ichu hab wua.

Tsh wabshaba ha'i ab wui gegokiwua mash am hebai e wehm e mihshmath g Tuhligo e-himthag. Ha'i ihtham ash d neneholkahim Cyrene ch Alexandria kihhim t am. Tsh am ha'i i ha wehmt ab Cilicia jewed t amjed ch ha'i ab Asia jewed t amjed. Sh ihtham ab kam'on g Steven
Sh wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si mahkch g Steven g amichuthadag. Kutsh pi sha'i e nako hegam mas ab uhpam wo i nodagi g ne'okij.
k heg hekaj am hahawa ha'i ha namkith k am ha ahgith mat hab wo chei, “Kah ach ihtha mo si has ahg hegai mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed.”
Kush wa woho hab kaij ihtham ch hekaj i ha kudu g hemajkam ch ge'eged ch chehanig ha mashchamtham. Tsh ihtham wabsh woho i babgat k am hihim k an bei g Steven k gd hu u'apa ha wui g e jehnigiththam.

Mtsh am hahawa ha'i i ha wahpki g o'othham matsh am ha'ichu wo ha iattogi ab amjed. Sh hab kaij ihtham, “Ihtha o'othham o chum hekith has ahg g hekia s-ap'ekam ge'e cheopi ch hegai mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed.
Kah ach mo hab kaij mat hegai Jesusbad wo i wua g ge'e cheopi k wo gawul juh g t-himthag mach ga hu hebai amjed hab i junihim mat g Mosesbad an o'oha.”
Kush wehsijj ab si neith g Steven. Sh g wuhioshaj hab haha wabsh mahs matp hems g anghil wuhiosha nash pi si tonod.
Kush hab kaij g uhgchu pahl ab wui g Steven. “No am wa woho map hab junihim hegai mo haschu ab m-abchuth?”
Kush hab kaij g Steven: “Ni-ge'egedga ch ni-hajuni, ab g wo si i ni-kaiham. An o o'ohadag matsh g Jiosh ab wui e chehgi g t-shohshonbad Abraham. Kush eda am wabsh kia kih Mesopotamia jewed ch ed.
“Sh hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Ia g wo ha thagito g e-hajuni ch e-jewedga k ab wo hihi heg wui jewed mant am wo m-chehgi.

“Tsh wa woho am thagito g Mesopotamia jewed mash am kih g Caldea hemajkam k am chihpia Haran kihhim wui. Kutsh am i muh g Abrahambad ohgbad. Tsh ab hahawa ep cheha g Jiosh mat ia wo chihpia Canaan jewed wui. Kutsh ia i chiwia mach hemuch ia kih.

Tsh eda koi ab hu he'es sha'i mah ihtha jewed k wabshaba am hi wa ahgith mat wo mah. T d wo ha-enigak g amjedkamaj mat he'ekiajj ab wo i oi. Kush eda pi koi ha a'aliga g Abrahambad mash eda hab ahg g Jiosh.
“Kush hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: M at hu wabsh heb hu jewed ch ed wo kihk g m-amjedkam ch d wabsh wo ha-pionagk. Kumt wo ha sho'igch gi'ik siant a'ahith ab.
Nt wabshaba wo ha kastigal hegam hemajkam mat an wo ha u'ukchith. T ab haha wo i wuwha heg amjed jewed k ab wo si has i ni-elith k wo ni-ihm iia. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh

ch ab mah g Abrahambad hegai himthag mat am wa has masma wo ha o'oha an ha hikuchk g chechoj e-a'aliga. Tsh hab masma wo s-mahchk mash hab wa'ap d ha-wuikam hegai matsh g Jiosh am ahgi g Abrahambad. Tsh wa woho hab e juh g Abrahambad k an pahl hikuch g e-alithag Isaacbad mo d i gigi'ik tash amjed mat mahsi. Tsh g Isaacbad hab wa'ap juh g e-alithag Jacobbad. Tsh g Jacobbad hab wa'ap ha juh hegam gamai gohk e-a'alithag mach ab d ha amjedkam.
“Tsh ihtham wa s-hehgam g e-wehnag Josephbad k ab ha'i ha wui gagda mat d wo ha neholigak am Egypt jewed ch ed. Sh wabshaba g Jiosh am nuhkuth

ch ab s-ap i wuhshath wehs ha'ichu sho'igthaj amjed k ab i mah g si o'othhamthag ch amichuthadag. Tsh am i nei g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam k am i uhgkajith k am kownalch am thahm g e-kownaltalig ch ha'ichu e-eniga.
“Tsh wa haha wabsh gei g bihugig k ha sho'igch g hemajkam wehsko Egypt jewed thahm ch iia Canaan jewed thahm. Tsh pi sha'i e amich hegam Abrahambad mat hebai wo bei g ha'ichu hugi.
Kush eda am s-ha'ichu hugig Egypt jewed ch ed. Kutsh am i kah g Jacobbad k am ha cheha g e-a'alithag matsh am wo hunio. Kutsh hab e juh.
“Tsh am ep i huhug g ha'ichu ha-hugi. Kutsh am ep hunio. Tsh g Josephbad am hahawa ha ahgi mo d ha-wehnag nash pi pi amichuth. Tsh g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam ab s-ha mai g Josephbad hajuni.
Tsh g Josephbad am hahawa wai g e-ohgbad mat wehsijj ab wo i chihpia Egypt wui. Kush eda d wewa'akko gamai hetasp (75) hemajkam.
Tsh wa woho am i chihpia hegam Jacobbad Egypt wui k am kihkahim ch am koi.
Tsh am uhpam i e ui g ha-oh'o g Abrahambad ch Josephbad Shekem kihhim wui. Abrahambad atsh wa am he'es ha nolawt g jewed hegam mash d Hamor amjedkam matsh am wo e toa g ha-ko'ithag.
“Sh amjed mu'i a'ahithag wehgaj. Sh e aihim matsh am hab wo juh g Jiosh mash haschu i heki hu ahgith g Abrahambad. Tsh eda am i si mu'itha g t-shohshonbad amai Egypt ch ed.
Kutsh am hema i wuhsh g kownal mash pi sha'i mahch matsh wa has masma am si i ha wehmt g Josephbad amai Egypt ch ed.
Kush ihtha nahnko ha wua hegam t-shohshon ch ha sho'igchuth ch hab ha ahg mat gm hu wo ha shul g chu'uchum e-a'aliga hab ahgch mat wo koi.
Kutsh eda mahsi g Mosesbad k si s-kehg d ali. Kutsh am i nuhkuth g jehjij waik mashath ab
k gm hu hahawa i wuhshath. T g kownal uwi alithag am chehg k ab i bei hab masma mo d madaj.
Kumtsh wehs ha'ichu mashcha mo haschu d i si s-hasig ha'ichu am Egypt ch ed. Tsh ab si i mai ihtha wehs k d si s-has ha'ichu am heg eda mo haschu hab i kaij ch haschu hab i junihim.
“Batsh wa masma am i ge'etha g Mosesbad k am i ai g gi'ikko wehst-mahm (40) a'ahithag. Tsh am hu hebai hab i e ah mat am wo i ha chehgim g e-hahajuni.
Kush hema g Egypt t am o'othham am hema sho'igchuth g Tuhligo. Tsh g Mosesbad am i wehmt g e-hajuni k mua ihtha Egypt t am o'othham mat wo agwua
k hab e ahg mat g hajunij wo chum s-mahchk mat g Jiosh wo hekaj k wo ha tho'ibia. Sh wabshaba g hajunij pi hab masma hab elith ha'ichu.
Sh am ba'ich d i tash, sh am ha'i e cheggia g Tutuligo. Tsh am ha neith k chum s-ha tha'ith k hab kaij, ‘Kia, ahpim! Tham e-wepngam ch eda haschu ahgch e cheggia?’
“Kut hegai mo ha cheggia ab si nu'ichkwua g Mosesbad k hab kaij: Shahchu ap ahgch hab chum e wua maps am t-thahm. Pi o ab hu sha'i m-ab maps ahpi am ha'ichu wo i ap'echuthath am t-shahgith.
Napt hab wa'ap wo chum ni-mua mapt wa hab juh g Egypt t am o'othham tako?
“Tsh am i kah g Mosesbad ihtha k ha hekaj gm hu i e mehkoth ab Egypt amjed k gm hu i jiwia mash am d Midian jewed. Sh am ha'i o'othhamag. Kutsh am ha hohnt k gohk chechoj a'alitht

“Sh am him k am d i gi'ikko wehst-mahm a'ahithag. Sh am hu hebai ha nuhkuth g kahwal g Mosesbad am miabithch hegai tho'ag mo hab e a'aga Sinai. Tsh ab wui haha wabsh hema i e chehgi g anghil hab masma mo am meihim g sha'i ch eda pi meitto.
Tsh ab i miabi g Mosesbad mat ab si s-ap wo i nei nash pi pi amichuth matsh wa pi sha'i meitto g sha'i. Sh g Jiosh ab wui hab kaij am gahi wuhshanim g anghil:
Ahni ani d Jiosh. K wa ab has ni-elith hegam m-shohshon mo d Abraham ch Isaac ch Jacob. Tsh hahawa si gigiwuk g Mosesbad k si s-ehbeni mat am wo i nei.
“Sh hab ep kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Ab g has i ni-elith k wuashulig g e-kaikia shuhshk nap pi ia kehk ni-wui.

S-mahch ani mam has i masma ha sho'igchuth g m-hajuni amai Egypt t am. Tho ni-hemajkamga. Kuni kah g ha-shoshaki ch heg hekaj am i ni-maskogi ab m-wui mapt ahpi wo ha tho'ibia. Pt oi am wo i e nako mapt am wo hih Egypt wui. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.

Kuni hab ep s-che'imk mo ihtha Mosesbad d hegai matsh wa g hajunij pi ab hu tatchua ch hab kaij: Shahchu ap ahgch hab chum e wua maps am t-thahm? Pi o ab hu sha'i m-ab maps ahpi am ha'ichu wo i ap'echuthath am t-shahgith. Tho wa ihtha Mosesbad matsh g Jiosh am i kei ha thahm g hajunij matsh wo ha wanimed k wo ha tho'ibia. Kutsh hegai anghil mash ab neok mei ch ed am u'apa g Jiosh ne'oki Mosesbad wui.

Kutsh g Mosesbad am uhpam hih Egypt wui k am hab juh g s-hasig ha'ichu chehgitha k am i ha wanim g e-hajuni mat ab i wuwha Egypt amjed. Kutsh wa am i e tahp hegai mash hab e a'aga Al S-wegi Kahchki. Tsh am gahi i shul ihtham Mosesbad k am chipiahim gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahithag oitham tohono jewed ch ed. “Sh g Mosesbad heg oitham s-hasigam ha'ichu am hab junihim
ch am ha ahgith ch hab kaij: Jiosh atsh am hema ep wo i kei g t-hajuni hab masma mat ahni am i ni-kei. Kut heg d ep wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk. Neh, bash kaij g Mosesbad.
Tsh g Jiosh ab mah g e-ne'oki tho'ag t ab am gahi wuhshanim g anghil. K d t-himthag ihtha ne'oki matsh ab bei.
Tsh pi oi jiwia g Mosesbad ab tho'ag t amjed. Tsh g t-shohshonbad pi ab hu wohog elith k im hu hab wabsh i s-junimk g Mosesbad ch uhpam s-hihimimk am Egypt wui
Sh g ha-uhgchu pahlig d Aaronbad. Sh ihtham ab wui hab kaij: Pi ach mahch mas has e juh ihtha Moses mat ab i t-wuwhas Egypt amjed. Am g wabsh ha'i ha nahto g jijosh mat hegam am wo t-wanimedath.
“Kush wa am hema wisilot g ohlakaj k ab wui iagchul heg wepogithch mo d ha-jioshga k am ep piast mat heg hekaj ab wo si i ha'ichuch hegai e-jioshta.

Kutsh heg hekaj im hu hab i e juh g Jiosh ab ha amjed k am wabsh ha hiwigi mat wabsh g hejel hab e-elitha am hab wo junihith. Kush wabsh g huhu'u ab ha ihm mat hab masma an o'oha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab ani ha chehani g Tutuligo hemajkam mat wo mum'a g e-shoshoiga k ab ni-wui wo iagchul am wehhejed g pi ap e-chu'ichig. K wabshaba pi woho ab hu ni-ihm mo eda am ha'ichug tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahithag oitham.
Tho hejel ha-nahtoi jijosh mo ab ha ihm. Bo ha a'aga Molok ch Rephan ch hab ha elith mo an kih huhu'u t an. Nt heg hekaj gm hu mehk wo em-shul Babylon jewed t am. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.
“Kuni hab ep s-che'imk mash hegam an u'ahim hegai cheopi mash heg hekaj am ha tashogith g Jiosh mash am ha wehmaj. Sh heg d wabsh hogi ch hab masma e nahto matsh wa g Jiosh am chehgi g Mosesbad.

Sh g ha-amjedkam an ep u'ahim hegai cheopi matsh hekith g Joshuabad am i e kei matsh wo i ha wanim. Kutsh g Jiosh ia i ha wahpki ith eda jewed k am ha wehhejed gm hu i ha wuwhas hegam nahnko mahs hemajkam mo ia d chum kihkam. Kush am ha'ichugkahim ihtha cheopi ch ab ai mash eda g Davidbad d ha-kownalig.
Sh ihtha Davidbad d si Jiosh tatchui ch ab ahgith mat wo hiwigi mat hema wo kihch. Tsh heg eda am hab wo e junihith g ho'ige'ithahuna Jiosh wui.
Kutsh g Jiosh hiwigi g alithaj Solomonbad. Tsh heg am i kei g kih am wehhejed g Jiosh.

“K eda g Jiosh ba'ich i ge'ej mo haschu i mo an hab chu'ig t-wehgaj. T pi wo sha'i e nako g o'othham mas wo kihch. Batsh wa masma an o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash hab kaij g Jiosh:
Ahni ani d Jiosh ch ab thahm kahchim t amjed ia nuhkuth g jewed kahchim. Pi amt wo sha'i e nako mamt wo ni-kihch mamt heg eda am wo ni-thai
nant pi ahni wehs ha'ichu nahto. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.

“Kush wabshaba g t-shohshonbad si e sheshemachuth ch pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh ash am i ha wuwhasith g ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kush wa g t-shohshonbad ha sho'igchuth ch ha'i ha koktha. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap chu'ig ch ab wabsh wui gegok g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ash am ahgachug mat wo jiwia g Jiosh si pionag k d wo si wehs s-ap'ekamk. Kut wa woho jiwia. Kumt wa gagda mat wo e muhkith.
Ahpim amt ab em-mah g Jiosh chehanig mat wa g anghil ia u'apa. Mt eda am wa pi wohoch.” Neh, bash kaij g Steven.
Tsh am i kah g e jehnigiththam mash has ha ahg g Steven k wabsh woho'i babgat k si kuhm g e-tahtami.

Sh wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ba'ich i si mahkch g Steven g gewkthag. Tsh am i nea thahm kahchim wui k nei mo si s-masma tonod g Jiosh gewkthag. Kush g Jesus an si hugithaj an kehk g Jiosh.
Kush hab kaij g Steven, “Neitho! B at e kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim. K ab kehk g Jiosh si Kehsha an si s-apko hugithaj an g Jiosh.”
Tsh si hihinkiath k am si kuhkp g e-nahnk k ab hahawa si wui i wohp
k an be k gm hu i wuhshath kihhim t amjed mat wo ma'ichkwua. Sh am hema ha wehmaj g wechij o'othham ch hab chehgig Saul. Kutsh heg nuhkuthach g e-liliwa hegam matsh wo ma'ichkwua g Steven.
Kush g Steven ab si ihm g e-tho'ibiakam ch hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig Jesus, ia g beh'i ni-thoakag.” Sh eda heg oithch ab ma'ikkash g s-keh'iththam.
Tsh am hahawa tohtonwua g Steven k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ni-kownalig, pi g ab hu ha abchuth ihtha chu'ichig mat ihab e juh.” Bash kaij ch am i muh.

Sh g Saul am wabsh ap'echuth mamt mua. Sh amai i amjed mamtsh ab si s-gewkam i ha sho'igch g Jesus ihmtham amai Jerusalem t am. Kutsh a'ai ahhio g e sho'igchuththam amai Judea ch Samaria chechkshani ch ed. Tsh wabshaba hegam Jesus chuhchai pi hasko ahhio.
Tsh ha'i hegam mo ab d si ihmtham g Jiosh gd hu cheh g Steven k si s-kaitham shoani wehhejed.
Kush g Saul chum s-padchuthamk g ha-mihshmetha g Jesus ihmtham ch hekaj an wahkhim ha-kihki oithch ch ab i ha chewaimed ch gd hu si ha kuhpahim, chum wa g u'uwi.
Kush wa an wehsko ahgahim g Jesus hegam matsh wa e gantad.
Hegai Philip mash wa am d ha-kehsha atsh am hih Samaria kihhim wui k am ha mihshmath ch am ha ahgith mat heki hu an i wuhsh g Jiosh si Kehsha.
Kush ab si kaiham hegam hemajkam mo haschu i ha ahgith ch am neith mo s-hasigam ha'ichu hab junihim g Jiosh gewkthagkaj.
Mu'ijj ash e thothajith hegam mash g jijawul an ha u'ukch. Kush si hihnk g jijawul gm hu hihimathch. Kush mu'ijj ha thothajith hegam mo pi hihimthag ch hegam mo pi ab hu gewpk.
Sh si s-hehgig g hemajkam amai.
Sh am hema kih g o'othham mash hab chehgig Simon ch heki hu wa'i amjed am hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu ch hab chum e wua mo d ge mahkai.
Kush wehs g hemajkam am si neithachug ch ab si has elith, chum wa hegam mo d s-chu a'amichuththam. Kush wehsijj hab kaij, “Heg oki d ge mahkai ch ab u'ukch g e-gewkthag Jiosh t amjed.”
Bash kaij ch ab si kaiham nash pi heki hu wa'i amjed hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu.
Tsh wabshaba am hahawa ha mihshmath g Philip ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig ch ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kutsh ab i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko.
Tsh hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g Simon k e pahl wakon k amjed pi hebai thagito g Philip k ab si has elith am i neithok mo hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu.
Tsh am i ha ai hegam Jesus chuhchai ab Jerusalem t ab matsh ihtham Samaria t am o'othham ab bei g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kush am ha chehani g Peter ch John matsh am wo ha mihshmetho.

Tsh am hihi ihtham k gd hu thatha k am ha wehm e hemapai. Kutsh eda pi koi bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam matsh e pahl wapko. Kutsh am e ho'ige'ithahun k ab tai g Jiosh mat hab wo wa e juh am ha tahgio
k amjed an i ha tahtamahi ab ihmch g Jiosh. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab hahawa ha mah g gewkthag.
Tsh g Simon am i nei ihtha k chum s-ha namkitham
k hab kaij, “Ab g i ni-mahki ihtha gewkthag mant hedai ab wo i taht, t wo bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.”
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Peter ab wui. “T wabsh wo huhug g s-m-kaischutha hab wa masma mapt ahpi wo huhug. Pi o hab chum chu'ig mapt hekaj wo nolawt g Jiosh mahkigdag.
Pi o sha'i ap'e g m-chegitoi am Jiosh tahgio. K heg hekaj pi ab hu d sha'i m-wuikam ihtha chikpan.
Gan o hu wabsh i si m-u'ukch g pi ap'ekam napki pi s-chu hehgamk. Pt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. Tp hems gm hu hab wo i juh g m-chu'ichig.”
Sh hab kaij g Simon ab ha wui. “Ab g wo si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui ni-wehhejed mat pi gm hu hab wo ni-juh.”

Tsh am hahawa ha mihshmath g Peter ch John ab amjed g Jesus k am ha ahgi mo haschu g e-wuhpuikaj neith. Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kutsh gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh am a'ai kihhim ch ed heg eda Samaria chekshani.
Kush g anghil am hema neok ch hab kaij ab Philip wui, “Am g i e nakog k gm hu hihm k am wo i ai hegai wohg m an hims tohono jewed ch ed am ha shahgith g Jerusalem ch Gaza.”

Tsh wa woho am i e nako g Philip k gm hu hih. Sh eda am hema med g e-kalitkaj ch d Ethiopia jewed t am o'othham. Ith ash g kownaligaj am kehshch mash d lial nuhkuththam. Kush am e mihshmethahim Jerusalem t am ch hemu am uhpam ep wo chihpia Ethiopia wui.
Kush hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wui g Philip, “An g i miabith hegai kalit k gn hu hugithaj an wo i hih.”
Tsh am hahawa si meh g Philip k an i miabi g kalit. Kush ihtha am ne'okchulith hegai matsh g Isaiabad an o'oha. Kush am kah g Philip ch ab kakke, “Nap s-amichuth hegai map an ne'okchulith?”
Sh hab kaij ihtha s-has ha'ichu, “Pi ant has masma wo s-amich, heg hi wa matp am hema wo i ni-tashogi,” ch amjed ab i wai g Philip mat gn hu wehmaj wo thahiwua kalit ch ed. T wa woho an i chesh.

Kush eda ith an ne'okchulith mo hab chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: T am hema wo i wuhsh g o'othham mat wo e wepogi g kahwal. Neh, pi at wo shosha g kahwal mamt hekith wo sho'igchuth k wo mua. Pegih, t hab wa masma pi has wo sha'i chei ihtha o'othham
mamt hekith pi ap wo lothait k wo mua. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas wo ah Mamt he'es i ge'e pi ap'ekam hab juh ab wui.
Sh hab kaij g s-has ha'ichu ab Philip wui, “Am g ni-ahgith. Thoh'o hab ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam? No hejel hab e ahg aha no wabsh hema hab ahg?”
Tsh g Philip amjed am i shonch ith ab mash am ne'okchulith k am ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
Sh am wabsh kia wohpo wohg oithch ch am hu hebai ne'ibij mash am ge shuhthagi. Sh hab kaij g s-has ha'ichu, “Neh, m ia ge shuhthagi. No am hig ha'ichu ehp manis heg hekaj pi wo ni-pahl wako?”
[Sh am hahawa ahgith g Philip, “Bapt wa'i masma wo e pahl wako mapt wehskaj am wo i e thagito Jesus wui.” Sh hab kaij, “Heu'u, wehskaj ant am wo i ni-thagito wui.”]
Sh am hahawa i ahgith hegai e-pionag mo melchuthahim g kalit mat wo keshwua. Tsh am huhud ab kalit t ab k am i huhud shuhthagi ch ed. Tsh am pahl wako g Philip ihtha o'othham.
Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu wa hekaj i bei g Philip. Sh amjed si s-hehgig ihtha s-has ha'ichuch gm hu uhpam meh pi hekith ep sha'i neithk g Philip.
Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu u'apa g Philip Ashdod kihhim t am. Tsh am i ahgahi g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ga hu ai g Cesaria kihhim.
Kush eda ith oitham g Saul wabsh kia ha oith hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag ch s-gewkam ha ebkioth ch s-ha kokthaimk. Sh am hu hebai i, sh ab si tahni g uhgchu pahl

matsh am wo ha o'ohani g papal am Damascus kihhim t am. Kutsh heg wo be k am wo him k wo ha chehgi. Tsh hegam wo s-mahchk mo u'ukch g e-ap'ethag. Kutsh wo ha ui hegam mo am oith g Jesus himthag k am wo uhpam i ha ui Jerusalem wui, chum wa g u'uwi. Tsh wa woho hab e juh g uhgchu pahl.
Tsh am hih g Saul ha'i ha wehm g chechoj k gm hu i aihim g Damascus kihhim. Tsh haha wabsh ha'ichu si ton ab thahm kahchim t amjed an wehgaj.
Tsh am i gei g Saul jewedo. Sh ab hema si neok ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Saul, s-wohom ap hig ni-sho'igchuth.”
Sh si has elith g Saul ch hab kaij, “Thohp wud ch ab neok?” Kush hab kaij hegai mo ab neok, “Thani ahni Jesus. Kup ha sho'igchuth hegam mo am oith g ni-himthag.
Ab g i wamig k am hihm k am wo i wah Damascus ch ed. T am haha wo hema m-ahgi mapt haschu am hab wo chum juh.”
Tsh hegam mo am wehmaj ab wabsh i gewpka k pi has sha'i kaij ch ash hi wa kah g ne'oki ch wabshaba pi sha'i neith mas hedai ab neok.
Tsh am hahawa i wami g Saul k ab chum si i nea. Tsh wabshaba pi ab hu mamsi g wuhpuij. Kumtsh am haha wabsh i wanimed k gd hu u'apa Damascus ch ed.
Kush waik tashkaj pi ha'ichu sha'i neith ch ep pi ha'ichu sha'i ko'a ch pi ha'ichu ih'e.

Kush eda am hema d Jesus ihmtham amai ch ash hab chehgig Ananias. Tsh g Jiosh am ha'ichu hab juh nenaj tahgio mash heg eda g Jesus am chehcheg. Sh g Ananias hab kaij, “Shahchu ap tatchua, ni-Jioshga?”
Kush hab hahawa kaij g Jesus, “Am g i e nakog k am hihm heg kih wui Judas mo am kih Shelini Kahya oithch. Amai o hema thak ch e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab chehgig Saul ch ab d kihkam Tarsus kihhim t ab.
Kunt am nenaj tahgio ha'ichu hab juh mapt am wo jiwia wui ahpi Ananias ch ab wo taht mat ep wo mamsi g wuhpuij.”
Sh hab kaij g Ananias, “Ni-kownalig, ihtha o'othham atsh mu'i ha sho'igch g m-hemajkamga am Jerusalem ch ed. Mu'ijj o hab ni-ahgith ab amjed.
Kutsh heg hekaj ia jiwia mash u'ukch g ap'ethag ab ha amjed g u'ugchu papal mat wo uhpam i ha ui hegam mo ab m-ihm.”
Kush hab kaij g Jesus ab wui, “Am apt wo wa hih nant pi ith am si i kei mat am ni-wehhejed wo chikp am i ahgahimk g ni-himthag ha wui g Tutuligo ch am ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch kokownal.
Nt ahni am wo wa chehgi ihtha Saul mat has i masma wo e sho'igch am ni-wehhejed.”

Tsh wa woho am hih g Ananias heg wui kih k ab si i s-ha ho'ige'el g kihkam. Tsh ab i wahki. Tsh ab hahawa e mahtchul g Ananias Saul wui k hab kaij, “Ni-nawoj, Saul, am apsh neith g ge'echu t-kownalig Jesus ab himathch wohg oithch. T heg ab ni-cheha mantsh ab wo i him k ab wo m-taht. Tsh ep wo mamsi g m-wuhpui. Kutsh ab wo m-mah g gewkthaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.” Neh, bash kaij ch ab hahawa taht.
Tsh ab ha hekaj i mamsi g wuhpuij. Tsh hahawa ep s-ap ha'ichu neith k am ha hekaj i e nakog k e pahl wakon
k ep ha'ichu hug k ab uhpam ep i gewka. Sh g Saul am he'ekia i tash ha wehmajkahim g Jesus ihmtham amai Damascus t am.
Kush am ha'i chechopi g Tutuligo. Sh g Saul am ha mihshmath g e-wehm o'othham ab amjed g Jesus am ah ahgithch mo d Jiosh alithag.

Tsh si has i el hegam mo hedai i kah k hab kaij, “Aha no pi d ihtha mash an ha kokthahim hegam mash am oith hegai himthag Jerusalem t ab ch heg hekaj ia jiwia mat in wo i ha u'ihim k am uhpam wo i ha ui u'ugchu papal ha wui.”
Tsh g Saul mihshmetha am i si e gewkai. Kutsh wa wohokamch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. Tsh hekaj pi e nako g wehmaj o'othham mat ab hu has wo ah.

Sh am hu i hebai amjed, tsh g Tutuligo am i e nako matsh wo mua g Saul. K eda si uhgk kolhaitas g kihhim. Kumsh si nuhkuth g kihjegaj tash oitham ch s-chuhugam oitham. Tsh wabshaba s-mai g Saul mam s-mu'amk.
Tsh hegam mat ab i s-wohoch g Saul ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus am thai washomi ch ed k ab i huduni chuhug ch ed g wijinakaj ab amjed mash ab hebai ge wintani kolhai t ab.
Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih Jerusalem wui k ab chum ha shahgith i s-wahkim hegam Jesus ihmtham mat ab wo i ha wehmt. Sh wabshaba s-ehbith ch pi wohochuth mas woho pi has wo ha juh

Kush oi wa am wehhejed neok g Barnabas am ha wui g Jesus chuhchai. Tsh hegam hiwigi matsh am i wahki ha shahgith. Sh am ha ahgith mash g Saul am himath ch haha wabsh neith g Jesus amai wohg ch ed ch ep kah mo ab neok. Sh am ep ha ahgith matsh has masma si s-gewkam am i ha mihshmath ab amjed g Jesus amai Damascus t am. Tsh g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa s-wohoch.
Sh am ha wehm thakahim ch wehsko oimmed ch am si s-gewkam ha mihshmath g hemajkam ab amjed g Jesus Jerusalem ch ed.
Kutsh hegam Tutuligo mo neneok g Greek ne'okikaj am i chum e nako matsh wo mua nash pi ha wehm e ne'owin ab amjed g Jesus.
Kutsh g Jesus ihmtham am i kah ihtha k am i bei Cesaria kihhim wui k am ahgith matsh gm hu wo hih e-kihhim wui mash d Tarsus. Neh, tsh gm hu hih.

Tsh am hahawa thotholimat ha'ichu am ha wehhejed wehsko am Judea ch Galilee ch Samaria ch ed. Kutsh mu'i ep ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus k ab si has elith g Jiosh. Kush ab si ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Sh eda g Peter an wehsko oimmed e-jewedga oithk ch am i ha chehgim hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Sh am ha'i thadha Lydda kihhim t am. Kutsh gd hu jiwia.
Sh am hema kih g pi himithkam ch hab chehgig Aneus ch ab wabsh i s-moik ch ash gigi'ik a'ahith ab pi sha'i e nako mas am wo i wami ab e-wo'ikud amjed.
Kutsh g Peter am i chehgim k hab kaij ab wui, “Aneus, Jesus Christ at wo m-thoaj. Ab g i wamig k am i holiwkath g e-wahpakus.” Tsh am ha hekaj i kekiwua k am hab e juh.
Kutsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus hegam mo am kih Lydda ch Sharon kihhim t am nash pi neith matki thoa ihtha o'othham.
Sh am hema kih g uwi Joppa kihhim t am ch d e tho'ibiakam ch chum hekith s-ap ha'ichu am hab junihim ch am ha'ichukaj i ha wehmaj g sho'igkam. Sh hab chehgig ihtha Tabitha mo hab d ahga Kuhwith.
Kush am wabsh kia thaha g Peter Lydda t am. Tsh am wabsh si mumku ihtha uwi k am i muh. Tsh am i ap'ech g chuhkugaj k am woi mash an hema kehk g kih gn hu uhgk kih thahm.

K eda g Joppa pi sha'i mehk ab Lydda t amjed. Kumtsh am i kah amai Joppa t am mo am ha'ichug g Peter k am gohk ha cheha g chechoj matsh am wo wohp k ab wo wai. Kutsh wa woho am wohp k am wai matsh s-hohtam ab wo i hih Joppa wui.

Tsh am wa hekaj i e nako g Peter k gm hu ha oi. Kutsh gd hu thatha. Tsh g Peter gn hu i wah mash an wo'o g muhki. Tsh wehsijj gn hu biha g hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi k si shoani ch ab chehgith g wehschuga matsh wa haschu hab ha juni.

Tsh gm hu wehs i ha wuwhas g Peter k am i tonwua k e ho'ige'ithahu ab Jiosh wui k ab hahawa si neok wui g muhki ch hab kaij, “Tabitha, ab g i wamig.” Tsh am ha hekaj i e chegito k am i nei mash am kehk g Peter k shel i thahiwua.
Kutsh g Peter an i wehmt. Kutsh kekiwua. Tsh ab hahawa wehs i ha waith k ab ha chehgi mo d thoakam.
Tsh ihtha matsh haschu has e juh am wehsko kaitha Joppa t am. Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
Sh mu'i tashkaj am thakahim g Peter Joppa t am heg wehm mash hab chehgig Simon ch ash g hogi chikpan hab wua.
Sh am thadha g siant shonthal Cesaria kihhim t am mash ab amjed g Italy jewed. Kush g ha-uhgchuga hab chehgig Cornelius
ch ash si oith g Jiosh himthag ch am ep i ha wehmt g sho'igkam Tutuligo ch ab ihm g Jiosh. Kush g wehmaj kihkam wehsijj hab wa'ap ab si ihm g Jiosh.
Sh hema tash mash d i waik ohla im hab i juhk, tsh am nenaj ed hab e juh matsh am jiwia g anghil k am si chehch hab kaijch, “Cornelius.”

Sh ab hu wabsh si neith ihtha anghil ch wabsh s-ehbeni ch hab kaij, “Shahchu ap ahgahim ch ab neok?” Sh hab kaij g anghil, “Ab o kaiham g Jiosh g m-ho'ige'ithahuna ch s-hohho'ith hegai map haschu am hab junihim g sho'igkam ha wehhejed.
Pegih, pt hemuch ha'i wo ha cheha g chechoj mat am wo hihi Joppa wui k am wo nei hegai mo hab chehgig Simon Peter.
Am o tha heg kih am mo d hogi chikpantham ch hab wa'ap chehgig Simon ch am kih ge kahchki hugith an.”
Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih hegai anghil mash ab wui neok. Tsh g Cornelius am hahawa waik ha wai g e-pionag. Sh hema ihtham d shonthal ch si oith g Jiosh himthag.
Kutsh am ha ahgi ihtham matsh haschu has e juh k am hahawa ha cheha mat gm hu wo hihi Joppa wui.
Sh am ba'ich d i tash matsh am thahm i juh, sh am wabsh kia hihim ihtham ch ab hi wa aihim g kihhim. Tsh eda g Peter gm hu hejelko him k am e ho'ige'ithahun.
k ash am i si bihugim k chum ha'ichu s-hugimk. Tsh eda koi bai g hihithod. Kutsh am Peter nena ed hab e juh
matsh ab i e kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim. Kutsh ab ha'ichu i e huduni jewedo k hab mahs mo g lohna ch sha'i si ge'ej ch an a'ai e u'ukch chuhchpulij an ch ab i tadanich.
Sh ith eda am ha'ichug g nahnko mahs ha'ichu thoakam ch wahammad ch u'uwhig.
Sh hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag, “Peter, i g wuhshani k am wabsh chum haschu wo ha mua ihtham k hekaj wo e gegos.”
Tsh wabshaba g Peter hab si chei, “Ih, pi ant am hu hab wo ni-juh, ni-kownalig. Pi ani hekith ko'a hegai mo g m-chehanig pi t-hiwgith machs wo ko'ath.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij hegai mo ab neok, “Pi g hab sha'i elith mas pi ap'e hegai mo haschu g Jiosh hemu am m-chehgith mo s-ap'e.”
Tsh waikko hab e juh ihtha am nenaj ed. Tsh amjed im hu hahawa uhpam i e bei ihtha ha'ichu am thahm kahchim wui.
Sh am wabsh kia oithahim g Peter hegai matsh haschu nei. Tsh heg i eda ihtham Cornelius pionag am i s-mai mo hebai i kih g Simon k am thatha k ab gegok kolhai kihjeg t ab
ch ab si s-kaitham ha kakke, “No ia hema thaha mo hab chehgig Simon Peter?”
Kush eda g Peter am wabsh kia chum a'amichuth mas has d ahga hegai mat am nei. Kush hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag, “Neh, ia at ha'i thatha k s-m-neitham.
Pt am wo i e nakog k am wo ha nei. Pi g has sha'i ha elith mo d ge gawul mahs hemajkam k wabsh wo ha oi. Ahni o d ni-tatchui mat ab i hihi.”
Tsh wa woho am i hud g Peter k hab kaij ab ha wui ihtham o'othham, “Ahni ani wud mam s-ni-neithamk. Shahchu amt ahgk ia thatha?”

Sh hab hahawa kaij ihtham o'othham, “No pi ab t-chehani g Cornelius. Heg o d shonthal ha-uhgchuga Cesaria t ab ch si s-ap d o'othham k ch ab si ihm g Jiosh. K g Tutuligo hab wa'ap ab si has elith. Tsh g anghil ab wui i hih ab amjed g Jiosh k hab ahg mat ab wo i m-wai e-kih wui k wo m-kah mapt haschu wo i ahgi.”
Tsh ab i ha wahpki g Peter ihtham waik o'othham mat am wo wa'i kohk. Sh an ba'ich d i tash, tsh i e nakog k gm hu hahawa ha oi. Tsh ha'i ep ha oi hegam mash d Jesus ihmtham ch ab d kihkam Joppa t ab.
Am ba'ich d ep i tash. tsh gd hu hahawa thatha Cesaria t am. Tsh oi wa g Cornelius heki hu am i ha wai g e-hajuni ch e-naipijju. Kush ihtham am wehmaj ha nenida.
Tsh ab wabsh chum i wah g Peter. Tsh g Cornelius ab si tha'iwuni k ab si i gei wecho ab si has elithch.
Tsh wabshaba hab ah g Peter, “Pi g sha'i ni-wui i gehsh. Thani wabsh o'othham.”
Kush am e wehm neneokhim ch am i wahp. Sh am mu'i thadha g hemajkam.

Kush am ha neith g Peter ch hab kaij ab ha wui, “Am am wa s-mahch mach ahchim Tutuligo pi sha'i hiwgithas ab t-himthag amjed machs ab wo i s-em-hajunima ahpim mam d gawul mahs hemajkam, ni'ichs am hu wo em-chehgim em-kihki wui. T wabshaba g Jiosh am ni-chehgi mant i'ajed pi am hu has wo sha'i em-elithath.
Nt hekaj ab i hih pi sha'i has elithk mam d ge gawul mahs hemajkam. Pegih, m haschu ahgch am ni-waith.”
Sh hab kaij g Cornelius, “Am ani ni-ho'ige'ithahun ni-kih am d hu hema i tako imhab i juhk. T am haha wabsh hema jiwia g o'othham. K si tonod g wehschugaj. K ab kehk ni-wui
ch hab kaij, ‘Cornelius, ab o kaiham g Jiosh g m-ho'ige'ithahuna ch s-hohho'ith hegai map haschu am hab junihim g sho'igkam ha wehhejed.

Pt wo ha'i ha cheha mat am wo hihi Joppa wui k am wo wai hegai o'othham mo hab chehgig Simon Peter. Am wo tha heg kih am mo d hogi chikpantham ch hab chehgig Simon ch an kih ge kahchki hugith an.’ Neh, bo kaij.
“Kunt am hahawa ha'i ha cheha mat am hihim k ab i m-wai. Kupt s-ap e juh k ab i hih. Kuch hemuch ia thadha am nenaj ed g Jiosh ch s-kaimk hegai mat haschu g Jiosh am wo i m-ahgi mapt am hab wo chei.”
Tsh wa woho am hahawa ha'ichu i ahgahi g Peter k hab kaij, “Hahawa ant wa s-mai moki woho mo g Jiosh wehs ha wepo masma ha neith g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
K hegam d si tatchuij mo hedai ab i si has elith ch am hab junihim g s-ap'ekam, chum as pi d wo Tutuligo hemajkamk.

Am amki chum heki hu kah ab amjed ihtha mant haschu wo i em-ahgi nam pi ia t-shahgith thadha ahchim Tutuligo. K ahchim am t-ahgith g Jiosh mash s-ha tho'ibiamk g hemajkam am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus Christ. Heg o wud mat g Jiosh am i kei mat wehs d wo ha-kownaligk g nahnko mahs hemajkam.

K wa am hema t-jehnigith ab amjed g Jesus ch am t-pahl wapkon ch hab chehgig John. T am i wuhsh g Jesus k am e pahl wako heg ab John. T g Jiosh ab mah g si ge'e gewkthag am gahi wuhshanim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat hekaj hab wo junihith g e-chikpan. T g Jesus am i shonwuich g e-chikpan Galilee chekshani ch ed k am hahawa wehsko hab junihim Judea chekshani ch ed. Jiosh o am wehmaj. K hekaj wehsko i ha wehmt g e-hemajkamga ch ha thothajith hegam mo g jiawul ha sho'igchuth.
“Kuch ahchim am wehmajkahim ch g si t-wuhpuikaj neith hegai mo haschu hab junihim am wehsko t-jewedga ed ch am Jerusalem ch ed. Kumt an be k mua ab naggiak kots t ab.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed mo d i waik tash k am i t-chehgi.
K pi wabsh chum hedai neith. Ahchim ach wa'i neith mat he'ekiajj g Jiosh heki hu am i t-chuhcha. Tt wa am wehmaj t-gegos am i thahm mat g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed.

Jiosh atsh am si i kei matsh wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat ab wo hiwgath k wo ha lothai hegam mat pi wo e tho'ibia. T g Jesus ab t-mohto'i matt am wo si wohokamch ihtha k am wo ahgahith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.
Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig wehs hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus. Ith o wehsijj wohokamchuth g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
Sh am wabsh kia neok g Peter. Tsh ab i hud g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ha thahm hegam mo am kaiham k ab si i ha mah g gewkthag.

Tsh am gawul ne'okikaj neneo mat pi hebai mai k ab si ihm g Jiosh. Tsh am i ha kaiok ab si e totoths hegam mo wehmaj g Peter natki pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si i ha mah g gewkthag hegam gawul mahs hemajkam.
Sh ab kaij g Peter. “Jiosh atki ab i ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat hab masma ab i t-mah. No hig pi d ha wuikam mat wo e pahl wapko?”
Kumtsh wa woho ha pahl wapko am chehchegch g Jesus Christ. Sh ihtham ab hahawa si ahgith g Peter mat am wo sha'i ha wehm thakahim he'ekia i tash.
Tsh am i kah g Jesus wohochuththam amai Judea jewed t am matsh hegam gawul mahs hemajkam ab bei ihtha Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Sh eda am ha'i d hegam mash hab si elith mat hemho wa hab wo juh g Tutuligo ha-himthag hegam gawul mahs hemajkam matsh ab i s-wohoch. Kutsh am hihi ihtham Peter k am thatha Jerusalem t am. Kutsh hegam am ne'owin k hab si ahg,
“Kah ach maptsh am ha wehm e gegos hegam mo d gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi pahl hikuchkas. P eda s-mahch mo pi t-hiwgithas machs chum hems am wo i wahp ha-kihki ed.”
Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi g Peter matsh haschu has e juh gd hu i shonchuthk mo wa am e ho'ige'ithahun Joppa kihhim t am ch hab kaij:

“Am ani thaha Joppa t am ch am hu hebai ni-ho'ige'ithahun. T am ni-nena ed hab e juh mat ab ha'ichu i e huduni thahm kahchim t amjed k hab mahs mo g lohna ch sha'i si ge'ej ch an a'ai e u'ukch chuhchpulij an ch am ni-tahgio i e ul.
Kunt am si i nei eda k nei g nahnko mahs ha'ichu thoakam, chum hegam ehp mo s-thothajk ch wahammad ch u'uwhig.
“K ab hahawa hema si neok ch hab kaij, ‘Peter, i g wuhshani k wabsh chum haschu am wo mu'a k hekaj wo e gegos.’
“Kuni hab kaij, ‘Ih, pi ant am hu hab wo ni-juh, ni-kownalig. Pi ani hekith ko'a hegai mo g m-chehanig pi t-hiwgith.’
“K hab ep kaij hegai mo ab neok, ‘Pi g hab sha'i elith mas pi ap'e hegai mo haschu g Jiosh hemu am m-chehgith mo s-ap'e.’ Neh, bo kaij ab ni-wui.
Kut ith hab e juh waikko. T amjed im hu hahawa uhpam i e bei ihtha ha'ichu am thahm kahchim wui.
“Kutki eda heki hu am ha'i thatha waik g o'othham. Ihtham ha-ge'ejig o hab chehgig Cornelius ch am kih Cesaria t am ch ab ha cheha matsh ab wo i ni-wai. Tki am thatha mani am tha.

K hab ni-ahgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mant pi has wo sha'i ha el mo d ge gawul mahs hemajkam k wabsh wo ha oi. T ihtham chuhthp t-wepnag m ia gegok am ni-wehm hihi Cesaria wui k am ni-wehm i wahp Cornelius kih ed.
“K heg am t-ahgith matsh g anghil am jiwia kihj am k hab kaij, ‘Am g ha'i ha chehani mat am wo hihi Joppa wui k am wo wai hegai o'othham mo hab chehgig Simon Peter.
T heg am wo em-ahgi mamt has masma wo e tho'ibia wehsijj g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm.’
“Pegih, tki wa woho hab e juh. Kunt am him k am wabsh chum ha'ichu i ha ahgith. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab i hud ha thahm mat wa hab e juh am t-wehhejed ga hu si i wehpeg.
Nt am hahawa i chegito mo wa hab kaij g t-kownalig Jesus, ‘Mat ab i em-mah g John g pahl wakona. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g si ge'e gewkthag ab wo i em-mah pi sha'i mu'i tash i'ajed.’

Neh, t ith amjed am si i e tashogi mat g Jiosh ab ha mah hegam gawul mahs hemajkam hegai mahkigdag mat ahchim ab t-mah mat hekith ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Kunt pi has masma am hu wo sha'i kuh g Jiosh ith amjed.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.

Tsh ihtham am i kah wehs ha'ichu k pi ab hu has hahawa ep ahg ch wabsh si s-hehgigam ab ihm g Jiosh ch hab kaij, “Pegih, boki d Jiosh hab elitha mat ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam hab wa'ap gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.”
Kutsh ha'i hegam matsh wa e gantad matsh hekith i e muhkith g Steven gm hu ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Phenicia ch Cyprus jejewed t am ch Antiok kihhim t am k hegam an wa'i ha mihshmath Tutuligo.
Tsh am hahawa ha'i thatha Antiok t am ab amjed g Cyprus ch Cyrene k am i ha mihshmath hegam ehp mo d gawul mahs hemajkam.
Tsh g Jiosh am i gewkai g ha'ichu ha-ahga. Kutsh mu'ijj hegam hemajkam ab i s-ha wohochuth k ab i e thagito Jesus wui.
Tsh am i kah hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus ch ab thadha Jerusalem t ab matsh has i e juh am Antiok t am k ab hahawa cheha g Barnabas matsh am wo him k wo i ha wehmt.
Tsh gd hu jiwia k am i nei si s-hehgigch matki wa woho g Jiosh ab si s-ha ho'ige'el. Sh am ha ahgith mamt wehs ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui k pi hekith wo sha'i thagito hegai mamt haschu ab i bei.
Sh wa eda si s-ap d o'othham g Barnabas ch si e thagitokch Jesus wui ch ab si u'ukch g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
Tsh hekaj hab i e ah g Barnabas matsh am wo i bei g Saul mat heg am wo i ha wehmt. Sh eda heg am kih Tarsus kihhim t am. Tsh am him

k am i chehg k ab uhpam i wai Antiok wui. Tsh am uhpam hihim k am thatha Antiok t am k hemako ahith ab am i ha wehmt g e wehm wohochuththam amai. Sh eda mu'ij ihtham. Amai ash Antiok t am mamtsh si wehpeg hab ha chehch Christian.
Tsh wa eda am ha'i thatha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ab Jerusalem t amjed amai Antiok t am.

Sh ihtham hema hab chehgig Agabus. Tsh g Jiosh am i tashogi ihtha mat g bihugig wo gei an wehsko jewed thahm. Kutsh am ha ahgi g Jesus ihmtham amai Antiok t am. Tsh amai i amjed am i e nakog k am wehsijj i shuligahi g lial am ha wehhejed hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Judea jewed ch ed. Kutsh gei hegai bihugig mash eda g Claudius am d kownal.
Kumsh am ha chehani g Barnabas ch Saul matsh am wo i ui g lial. Tsh ihtham am i u'u k ab ha mah g ha wanimedtham g Jesus ihmtham amai Judea jewed ch ed.
Tsh eda am i ha sho'igch g kownal Herod hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus
k ab ha chehani g e-shonthalig. Tsh ihtham an bei hegai James mo d John wehnag k mua g is-pahyokaj.

Kush mu'i si s-hohho'ith g Tutuligo matsh hab e juh ihtha. Tsh heg hekaj wabsh ba'ich i si e gewkai g Herod k g Peter an ep bei. Kutsh eda e ai g si ge'e mihshmetha mo eda g Tutuligo pi ko'a g hegai pahn mo jewajithas wewa'ak tash oitham.

Tsh am ha cheha g Herod g e-shonthalig matsh wabsh wo kuh g Peter. Kumtsh am haha wo lothai am ha tahgio g hemajkam mat am wo i ha'asa e piast. Tsh gamai chuhthp i e chuhcha g shonthal matsh gi'ik e wehm wo nuhkuth tash oitham ch s-chuhugam oitham.
Sh wabshaba heg oitham am hahasko e hehemapath g Jesus ihmtham ch am wehhejed si e ho'ige'ithahun.

Kutsh am i e ai matsh ba'ich i si'alim wo e lothai g Peter. Tsh am i s-chuk. Sh am wo'o ch kohsh ha shahgith g gohk shonthal mash am nuhkuth. Kumsh gn hu si wupulshch g nohnhoij ch kakhioj g gohk e hukshchim wapainomikaj. Sh an gohk ep gegok g shonthal ch am nuhkuth g kukpaikud kihkijeg.

Tsh am haha wabsh jiwia g anghil k am wui i kekiwua g Peter. Tsh wabsh si ton am kukpaikud ch ed. Kutsh ihtha anghil ab si ugij g Peter k wuhan k hab kaij, “Oi g kekiwua s-hohtam.” Kutsh gm hu wa hekaj a'ai shul hegai e hukshchim wapainomi mamsh an hekaj wupulshch. Tsh am i kekiwua.
Sh hab hahawa kaij g anghil, “An g s-wihnam i e giwuddath k ab si i wuhpud g e-kaikia shuhshk.” Tsh wa woho hab e juh g Peter. Sh hab ep kaij g anghil, “Ab g wahki g e-lihwa k ab i ni-oith.”
Tsh ab wahk k gm hu i oi. Kutsh am i wuwha ab amjed mash am kuhpikahim. Kush sha pi s-wohoma mat woho ab i wuhshath g anghil nash pi hab e ahg mo wabsh chehchk.

Tsh am hihim k am i wuwha wehpeg kihjeg t ab. Kush am hema kehk g shonthal ch wabshaba pi am hu sha'i ha neith. Kutsh am ep hihim k gm hu ep wuwha mash am kahya wui kihjeg. Kush am hema ep kehk g shonthal ch hab wa'ap pi sha'i ha neith. Tsh wabsh hejel ab i e kuhkpi'o g kihkijeg. Tsh am wa'i hekaj pi e ha'ichuch g anghil.

Tsh am haha wabsh si i e taht g Peter k hab kaij, “Neh, woho atki hab e juh. Jiosh atki ab cheha g anghil mat ab ni-wui wo hih. Tki heg ab i ni-wuhshath kukpaikud amjed ch ni-tho'ibia ab amjed mat has wo i chum ni-juh g ni-wehm o'othham.”
Tsh amjed am hih kihj wui hegai Mary mo d John Mark je'e. Kush eda mu'ijj am e hemapathch ch e ho'ige'ithahun.
Kutsh ab si shontpag g pualit g Peter. Tsh am hema hih g ha-pionag k hab chehgig Rhoda. Sh hab kaij g Peter. “Gam g i kuhpi'ok.”
Tsh heg am i amich mo d Peter ch ab neok k si s-hehgig ch gm hu uhpam meh pi ab hu i kuhpi'ok g pualit k gd hu ha ahgith mo g Peter ab kehk jeg ed.
Sh hab kaij hegam ab wui, “Ptp wabsh chehch mo ab s-kehkathma.” Sh wabshaba am hab wabsh i kaij mo woho. Sh hab hahawa ep kaij, “Na'as d wabsh kok'oi namtsh pi wo mua.”

Kush eda ab wabsh kia shontpag. Tsh ab hahawa i kuhpi'o g pualit k nei mo ab kehk. Tsh am ha hekaj i wah k ab ha ihm k am i ha ahgith mat has masma g Jiosh i wuhshath ab amjed g kukpaikud. Kush si has i elith mat has e juh. Tsh hab hahawa ha ah, “Am g wo ha ahgith hegam James mat g Jiosh ab i ni-wuhshath,” k amjed gm hu hahawa ep hasko hih.
Tsh am ba'ich i mahsi. Tsh am sha'i si e kudu hegam mash am nuhkuth g kukpaikud. “T hebai hih g Peter?” bash kaij.

Tsh g Herod am hahawa si ha cheha mat am wo i gahghi. Tsh wabshaba pi sha'i mai mas hebai hih. Sh am si i ha chehani g Herod mat ab wo ha kakke hegam shonthal mas has e juh. Kush pi neith ch pi mahch mas has e juh. Kush oi wa am ha chehani mat wo ha koktha. Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih g Herod Cesaria kihhim wui ab Judea chekshani t amjed.

Tsh am hebai i cheka. Kutsh wabsh woho'i bagat g Herod ab ha wui hegam mash am kih Tyre ch Sidon t ab. Kutsh ab wui hihi matsh wo chum ap'ech mash haschu i pi ap'e nash pi am chum huniop. Sh am hema d kownal kehsha ch nuhkuth g kihj ch hab chehgig Blastus. Kutsh heg wehpeg ab si i s-nawojima k amjed am wui hihi g Herod k ab kakke mat wabsh ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el.
Tsh hema kei g tash g Herod k ab si s-kehg e enigadath k ab thahiwua kownal thaikud ab k am si s-hasigam ha jehnigi g hemajkam.
Kush ab si hihnk g hemajkam ch hab kaij, “Pi oki d sha'i o'othham ch ab neok noki pi d ge hema jiosh.”
Kutsh pi ha shohbi g Herod k pi am hu has el g Jiosh. Tsh heg hekaj g anghil ab ab hab juh g mumkithag mat waptopad k muh.
Kutsh g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga i ge'etha.
Tsh g Barnabas ch Saul gm hu uhpam hihi ab Jerusalem t amjed mat am i ui g lial. Kutsh g John Mark am i ha oi.

Sh am ha'i ep d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Antiok t am. Hema ihtham ash hab chehgig Simon ch wabshaba hab e a'aga S-chukchu. Kush hema d Lucius ch ab Cyrene t amjed. Kush hema d Manaen ch am wehmaj ge'etha g kownal Herod. Ihtham ash am ha mashcham am ha wehm g Barnabas ch Saul.

Kush am hu hebai wehsijj am he'ekia tashkaj wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab pi ha'ichu ko'a. Kush am ha tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mash g Jiosh hab kaij ab ha wui, “Neh, ab ant ha mohto'i g Barnabas ch Saul mat gm hu mehk wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kumt am wo i ha thagito mat hab wo wa e juh.”

Kush am ba'ich i himchuth hegai mash wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun ch pi ha'ichu ko'a ch ab hahawa ha taht ihtham Barnabas ch Saul matsh hekaj am chehgi mat ha thagito heg wui mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am i ha tashogi.

Tsh gm hu hihi g Barnabas ch Saul mash wa g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am i ha tashogith. Kutsh am ep i ha oi g John Mark matsh am wo i ha wehmt. Tsh ihtham gd hu thatha Selucia kihhim t am. K ith an hugithaj an g ge kahchki. K ab hihhim g wapalko. Kutsh ihtham Barnabas an i chehchsh wahlko ch ed k gm hu aigo i shulig k gm hu thatha Cyprus jewed ch ed. Sh am hema kihhimag ch hab e a'aga Salamis. Kush am ha'i chuhch g Tutuligo ha-chechopi. Sh ihtham Barnabas am i wahpk ch am ha jehnigith ab amjed g Jesus.

Sh gm hu aigo hema ep kihhimag ch hab chehgig Paphos. Kutsh gm hu hihim k am ep ha jehnigith. Sh am tha hegai mash d kownal ith eda jewed ch hab chehgig Sergius Paulus. Kush am hema wehmaj g Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Barjesus ch d s-hasigam ha'ichu hab wuatham ch ha iattogith mash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kumsh hab a'aga Elymas mo hab d ahga Ge Mahkai. Sh g kownal d si ha'ichu s-amichuththam o'othham ch ab i ha wai g Barnabas ch Saul nash pi s-kaimk g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus. Tsh wabshaba ab ha wui kekiwua hegai Elymas k am i chum e nako mat hab wo juh g kownal mat pi ab hu wo ha wohoch.
Saul o hab ep e a'aga Paul Greek ne'okikaj. Tsh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ep si mah g Paul g gewkthag. Sh heg ab si shel i neith g Elymas
ch hab kaij, “Neh, thap Jiawul pionag nap pi ab wabsh i si shuhthags g pi ap'ekamkaj. K heg hab m-wua map ab wui kehk g s-ap'ekam ch chum gawul s-junimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Jiosh at hab wo m-juh mapt pi wo nehnt he'es i tash.” Neh, bash kaij g Paul. Kutsh am wa i hekaj woho hab e juh. Tsh am taht g Elymas mat ab ha'ichu si ma'ish g wuhpuij. K am wabsh i s-chuhugam wehhejed. Tsh an i thahthaghi an chum hema gahgch mat am wo i wanim.
Tsh ab si e toths g kownal k ab i s-wohoch neithok mash has masma g Jiosh am chehgith g e-gewkthag.
Tsh am hahawa gahi ep i shul hegam Paul ab Paphos t amjed k gm hu thatha Perga kihhim t am am Pamphylia jewed ch ed. Tsh wabshaba g John Mark am i ha thagito amai k gm hu uhpam hih Jerusalem wui.

Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hihi ihtham Paul ch Barnabas Pisidia jewed wui. K am hema kihhimag ch hab chehgig Antiok. Kutsh am thatha. Tsh am i e ai g ha-mihshmetha tash. Kutsh gd hu i wahp ihtham Paul e wehm o'othham ha-cheopi ed k am i thadhaiwua.
Kumtsh am ne'okchul g Jiosh o'ohana. Sh hegam mash d ha wanimedtham hab hahawa kaij, “T-naipijju, chum ach si tatchua mamt am wo ha'ichu ha ahgi g hemajkam mat heg amjed ab wo i e gewpkai.”
Tsh ga hu hahawa i kekiwua g Paul ha ba'ich k hab kaij: “T-hajuni ch ahpim mam ia ha wehm ihm g Jiosh, ab g wo i ni-kaiham.

Jiosh atsh ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshonbad matsh d wo hemajkamgajk. Kutsh am i mu'itha mash eda am kihkahim Egypt jewed ch ed. Tsh ab hahawa i ha tho'ibia ab ha amjed g Egypt hemajkam g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj.
Kush an oiopo tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahith ab. Sh g Jiosh am s-hemajim ha nakogahim

ch am wo i ha wahpki ith eda Canaan jewed. Sh eda g wewa'ak kawod thakam hemajkam ia kih. Tsh g Jiosh ha hugio k g ha-jewedga am a'ai i ha tahpjel g t-shohshonbad mash hab masma heki hu ahgith g Abrahambad.
Tsh heg i thahm am hahawa i ha chuhcha g Jiosh g s-chu a'amichuththam mash am ha'ichu a'ap'echuth ha wehhejed. “Tsh ga hu e ai matsh am i thahiwua g Samuelbad k d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.

Kush g t-shohshonbad ab si tahni g Jiosh matsh am hema wo i kei mat d wo ha-kownaligk. Tsh g Jiosh am i kei hegai Saul mash d Kishbad alithag ch ab d Benjaminbad amjedkam. Kush heg d ha-kownalig gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahith ab.

Tsh g Jiosh im hu hab hahawa i juh g Saulbad k g Davidbad am i kei matsh d wo ha-kownaligk. Sh hab kaij g Jiosh ab amjed: Ihtha David mo d Jesse alithag o am si ni-tatchui oithch hab masma ch am e tashogi mat am hab wo juh hegai mant haschu ab wo i ahgi.
“Sh hab ep kaij g Jiosh matsh am hema wo i kei g Davidbad amjedkam matsh d wo t-tho'ibiakamk. Kut wa woho hab e juh g Jiosh. K g Kehshaj hab chehgig Jesus.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab hema wehpeg i wuhshath g t-wehm o'othham. K ith hab chehgig John ch ab i ha mihshmath ch hab ha ahg mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl wapko.

Tsh ihtha John ith hekaj am i kuhgi g e-chikpan mo wa hab ha ahg g hemajkam, ‘Pi g hab wo sha'i ni-elithath mani ahni d hegai mam si nenida. Pi ani d ahni ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu an hugithaj an. Mt wo wa nei mat am epai wo i e maskogi hegai mo hig woho d s-has ha'ichu.’ Neh, bash kaij g Johnbad.
“Pegih, ni-wehm o'othham ch ahpim mam hab wa'ap ab si has elith g Jiosh, ab o wehsijj d t-wuikam ihtha s-kehg tho'ibiathag ahgaj.

Hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam atki an o'oha matsh has wo masmak g Jiosh si Kehsha. K g ha-ne'oki e ne'okchulith t-sha'ashagith wehs mihshmetha tash. Kuki eda hegam t-hajuni mo ab kih Jerusalem t ab pi amichuth g ha'ichu ha-ahga ch hab pi amich g Jiosh si Kehsha mat hekith am jiwia k chum s-ha tho'ibiamk. Jiosh at am i kei g e-alithag Jesus mat wo t-tho'ibia.
K heg pi ha chu'ichig. T eda hegam ab chum chu'ichigch mat g kownal Pilate wo mua. Kumt ab naggia k mua kots t ab k ab hahawa i huduni k gm hu cheh hiha'ini ch ed.
Bat wa masma an o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mat hab wo e juh. Kut ihtham am wabsh wohokamch g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed.

Tsh amjed mu'ikko am si i e chehgi ha wui hegam mash an wehmajkahim ch ab wehmaj i hihi Galilee t amjed ab Jerusalem wui. K ihtham am si s-mahch ch ahgahim am t-shahgith. “Pegih, ab g wo ni-kaiham, ni-wehm o'othham mam ab d ep Abrahambad amjedkam ch ahpim mam ia ha wehm ab ihm g Jiosh. Ahpim at em-wui gei ihtha ha'ichu ahga mamt has masma wo e-tho'ibia nat pi gm hu wabsh s-ohhoth g t-hajuni ab Jerusalem t ab.

Kutt hemuch ia thatha k ia u'apa ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga em-wui. Heki ash hu am ha ahgith g Jiosh g t-shohshonbad matsh wo uhpam i wuhshath g si e-Kehsha ab muhkig amjed. Kutsh wa woho hab e juh. Kutki ith heki hu o'oha g Davidbad mat eda koi hab e juh. K an wa o'ohanas gohkkam ne'i ed heg eda Jiosh heki hu o'ohana mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui: Ahpi ap d si ni-alithag. Hemuch ant am i m-maskogi.

K hab ep masma an o'ohanas mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui: B ant wo m-mah hegai si hekia s-kehg ho'ige'ithadag mani wa am si ahgith g Davidbad. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ch heg hab ahg mat ab i wuhshath g Jesus muhkig amjed mat pi hekith wo sha'i padt g chuhkugaj.
K gn hu ba'ich an ep o'ohadag ch hab chu'ig: Pi at wo sha'i hiwigi g si e-Kehsha mas wo padt g chuhkugaj.
“Neh, pi oki hejel hab e ahg g Davidbad natsh pi muh am hab juniok hegai mat haschu g Jiosh ab mohto'i k am ha wehm e cheh g e-shohshonbad. Tsh hi padt g chuhkugaj.
Heg o hab ahg Jesus mat pi sha'i padt g chuhkugaj nat pi g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
Pegih, ni-wepnag, ith amt hekaj wo chum s-mahchk mat g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig
mamt hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g Jesus. Heg at am wo i em-ap'ech mamt pi wo ha chu'ichigk am Jiosh nena ed. T pi ha'ichu ep wo e nako mas hab masma am wo i em-ap'ech, nih g chehanig.

“T an ep o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mo hab kaij g Jiosh: S-e g wo nen'oithk k am wo si i oithahi ahpim mam wabsh has ni-ahg. Am ant ha'ichu hab wo juh em-shahgith. Kut am hema wo si s-ap i em-tashogi mani d ahni ch hab wua. Mt eda pi ab hu wo ha wohoch. Nt heg hekaj gm hu hab wo i em-juh ab ni-amjed k pi thahm ep wo pihk ni-el em-hekaj. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh. “Pegih, si g wo s-e nen'oithk k ab wo s-wohog el g Jiosh. T hab pi ab hu wo i em-ai g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag.”
Tsh ab i kuhgit g ha-namki. Tsh wo chum hihi g Paul ch Barnabas. Sh wabshaba g hemajkam ab si ha waith mat am ep wo thatha ba'ich mihshmetha tash k am ba'ich ep wo i ha ahgi ihtham ha'ichu.

Tsh am i himto g hemajkam. Tsh ha'i ab i ha oi hegam Paul. Kutsh ab si i ha gewkemhu ab ha'ichu ep ha ahgithk mat am wo wa e nakogath Jiosh hemajimatalig ed. Sh ha'i ihtham d Tutuligo hemajkam ch ha'i d gawul mahs hemajkam ch am ha wehm e mihshmath.
Sh am ba'ich d i mihshmetha tash. Tsh chum alo wehsijj ab e hemapai g hemajkam matsh wo kah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Tsh hegam Tutuligo mash pi ab hu ha wohochuth si s-ha hehgam k hab kaij mo d wabsh s-chu iattomkam g Paul.

Tsh wabshaba ihtham Paul am haha wabsh si ha ahgi, “Ni-hajuni, bo chum mahs matt wehpeg ab wo em-ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g si Kehshaj. Kumtki wabshaba s-ohhoth k hab sha e wua mam pi tatchua g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am Jiosh kihthag ed. Kutt heg hekaj wo em-thagito k hegam ha wui wo i t-nohnogi gawul mahs hemajkam.

Bo wa masma am t-chehanig Jiosh. An o o'ohanas mash hab kaij: Am ant i em-gawulkai mamt am wo i ha tashogi g ha'ichu ni-ahga g nahnko mahs hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm. T ab em-amjed wo s-mai mat has masma wo e tho'ibia. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.”
Tsh am i kah ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam k si s-hehgigam ab ihm g Jiosh nash pi ab ha makiog g e-tho'ibiathag ahga. Kutsh hegam ab i s-wohoch mat hedai g Jiosh i ha ap'ech mat wo e tho'ibia.
Kutsh wehsko i e ahgahi g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus heg eda jewed.

Tsh wabshaba g Tutuligo am si i ha chu'amu hegam u'uwi mash am ha wehm e mihshmath ch hegam mash d haha'ichu heg eda kihhim. Kutsh ihtham am si i ha sho'igch g Paul ch Barnabas k gm hu si ha huhu'i ab amjed g e-jewedga.
Tsh ihtham gm hu hahawa si i shahmuth g jewed ab e-tahtad ab am ha chehgithch mat wo ha thagito nat pi pi ap ab hu i ha nei. Tsh gm hu hahawa hihi Iconium kihhim wui.
Kush hegam matsh ab i s-wohoch ab Antiok t ab si s-hehgig ch ab si u'ukch g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.

Kutsh am hab wa'ap e juh Iconium t am matsh g Tutuligo hemajkam ab ha wui gegokiwua. Paul ch Barnabas atsh am i wahp ha-cheopi ed k am si ha mihshmath. Kutsh mu'i ab i s-wohoch g Tutuligo mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kutsh ha'i hegam mash am ha wehm e mihshmath hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga.
Tsh wabshaba am i wuwha hegam Tutuligo matsh pi ab hu wohoch k am si i ha kudu g gawul mahs hemajkam. Kutsh ihtham s-ha keh'el g Paul ch Barnabas ch hegam ehp matsh ab i s-ha wohoch.

Sh wabshaba tash am oiopo ihtham Jesus chuhchai ha shahgith ch am si tasho ha mihshmath ab amjed g Jesus pihk elithadag. Tsh heg ab i ha mah g gewkthag mat hab wo wuath g si s-hasigam ha'ichu k hab masma wohokamch g ha-ahga.
Tsh hegam hemajkam am i e gawulkai mat ha'i ab ha wehmt g Jesus chuhchai k ha'i g ha-obga ab ha wehmt.
Tsh wehsijj hegam mat ab ha wui gegokiwua g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa i e ap'ech g e-wanimedtham ha wehm mat wo ha sho'igchuth k wo ha ma'ichshul.
Tsh ihtham am i s-mai mamtsh wo ha sho'igch k atsh gm hu wa hekaj ba'ich hahawa ep hihi Lystra kihhim wui. Ihtha Lystra o am hab chu'ig Lyconia jewed ch ed.
Kutsh am thatha k am ha ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
Sh am ha wui hema thaha mash pi himthag ga hu i e-alijk amjed.
Tsh am i nei g Paul mo hab masma ab si kaiham g ahgaj mo ab si s-wohochuth mo g Jiosh woho ha thoajith. Tsh ab si shel i neith
k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Oi g kekiwua.” Tsh gam si tha'iwush g pi himithkam k an has si oimmed.
Tsh am i nei g hemajkam matsh haschu has juh g Paul k ash am si e-ne'okikaj hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ia atki ha'i thatha g jijosh o'othham e wepogithch.
Ith oki d Zeus. Kuki heg d neoktham ch hab d Hermes.” Sh heg hab ahg Paul nash pi heg am neok.
Sh am mia kehk g ha-cheopi. Kush heg eda am kehshch g Zeus. Tsh am i ha wehmaj g ha-pahlig. Kutsh am ha u'apa g totolo ch ha'ichu heosig mat ab ha wui wo iagchul g Paul ch Barnabas.
Kutsh ith pi ha hohho'ithach. Tsh hab ab si wantsh g e-wehschuga k am si wohp ha shahgith g hemajkam k si hihnk ch hab kaij,

“Pi g hab wo t-elithath machs d jijosh. Thach wabsh o'othham hab masma mam ahpim. Ia att thatha matt am wo em-ahgi mamt wo ha'asa ihm hab masma mo d Jiosh hegai mo pi d wohokam Jiosh. Heg o d wohokam Jiosh mat nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch wehs ha'ichu mo an hab chu'ig. Kumt heg wui ab wo i e thagito.
Heki o hu am hab wabsh junihim g hejel e-tatchui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Kuki g Jiosh wabsh s-hemajim ha nakogahim.
K wabshaba chum hekith hab chu'ig mo am e chehgithahim no pi s-kehg ha'ichu hab em-junith ch ab em-mahkch g juhki ch ab bahijith g ha'ichu em-e'es mamt wo s-kokwogk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath.”
Neh, bash kaij ihtham Paul ch wabshaba chum alo pi ha shohbi nash pi chum si tatchua matsh ab ha'ichu wo iagchul ha wui.

Tsh am hahawa ha'i thatha hegam mash wa am ha sho'igchuth Antiok t am ch Iconium t am k am i ha nu'ichkwua g hemajkam. Kutsh ab wui gegokiwua g Paul k ma'ichkwua k am i chewaimed k gm hu i wuhshath ab kihhim t amjed k am wua hab elithch mat muh.
Tsh wabshaba am e chehm hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus k an wehgaj gegok g Paul. Tsh gam si i wamig k gm hu uhpam hih kihhim wui. Am ba'ich d i tash. Tsh gm hu hahawa hihi Derbe wui hegam Paul
k an i ha ahgithahi g Jesus ha'ichu ahga. Kutsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch. Tsh am hahawa hihi Lystra wui ch Iconium wui ch Antiok wui
k am si i ha gewkemhun mat am wo hihimath ch ab wo si hiwgath g Jesus. Ha-mashchama ash hab masma matt hemho wa mu'i ha'ichu wo nakog k am haha wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.

Tsh am hahawa i ha chuhcha hegam mat d wo ha wanimedthamk am ha sha'ashagith mo hebai i e wehm e nanmek. Sh am hahawa wehsijj wabsh e ho'ige'ithahun ch hab he'ekkio pi e gegosith. Sh ihtham Jesus chuhchai ab hahawa i ha thathagitod Jiosh wui.
Neh, batsh wa masma am gahi wuwha g Pisidia jewed k gm hu thatha Pamphylia jewed ch ed
k am ha mihshmethahim Perga kihhim ch ed ch amjed gm hu hahawa ep hihi Attalia kihhim t am.
Tsh am i e nahto g ha-chikpan. Kutsh am gahi i shul ge shuhthagi ch ed an ge'e wahlko ch ed k gm hu thatha hegai Antiok t am mamtsh am i ha thagito Jiosh hemajimatalig ed.

Tsh am wehsijj i e hemapai hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai. Sh g Paul ch Barnabas am ha ahgith mat g Jiosh am si i ha wehmt k ab ha mah g nahnko mahs hemajkam g ap'ethag mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
Tash ash am thadkkahim ha wehm hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai Antiok t am.

Kutsh am ha'i thatha Antiok t ab ab Judea t amjed k hab chum ha ahg hegam matsh ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus, “Jiosh o am t-chehani Mosesbad o'ohana ed mat g chechoj hemho wa wo e o'oha an e pahl hikuchk. Kumt pi wo sha'i e tho'ibia mamtp pi hab wo e juh.”

Tsh wabshaba g Paul ch Barnabas pi sha'i hohho'i ihtha k am si ha ne'owi ihtham Judea t am Tutuligo. Tsh am hahawa i e ap'ech matsh g Paul ch Barnabas am wo hihi Jerusalem wui ha'i ep ha wehm k am wo s-mai mat has wo chei hegam ha'i ehp Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged.

Tsh ihtham am hihim k am i ha ahgithahi hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus Phenicia jewed oithk ch Samaria jewed oithk mat g gawul mahs hemajkam ab i e nodagi Jesus wui. Kutsh wehsijj ab si s-ap i e tahtam k si s-hehgig ihtham mash hedai i kah.

Kutsh gd hu thatha Jerusalem t am. Tsh si s-ha ho'ige'el g Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged ch wehsijj hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai. Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi mat haschu k ab am si i ha wehmt g Jiosh mat am hab juh.

Tsh wabshaba am ha'i ab ha wui gegokiwua hegam mash si s-gewkam oith g chehanig ch hab kaij, “Hemho wa at wo e o'oha an e pahl hikuchk g chechoj k am hab wo junihith hegai t-chehanig mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch.”
Tsh am ep e nam g Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged k tash am a'aga ihtha.

Tsh g Peter am i kekiwua k hab kaij: “Ni-wepnag, s-mahch am mant ga hu i wehpeg am ha ahgi g gawul mahs hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g Jesus nat pi g Jiosh am i ni-gawulkai mant hab wo juh.
Jiosh o s-mahch g o'othham chegitoi ch ab ep ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab wa masma mat ahchim hab t-juh.
Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo s-ha ho'ige'elith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig mat ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.

Pegih, m haschu ahgch ha'i pi'ichuth g Jiosh ab s-wehch ha'ichu ha mohto'ithch g wechij wohochuththam? Ahchim Tutuligo att pi sha'i t-nako machs wehs am hab wo junihith g t-chehanig. T g t-shohshon hab wa'ap pi sha'i e nako.

Pi attki hab masma wo t-tho'ibia. Heg at wo wa'i t-tho'ibia t-kownalig Jesus. Ab att i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. T heg ab i s-t-ho'ige'ith k t-tho'ibia. Pegih, t hab wa'i masma wo e tho'ibia ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam.” Neh, bash kaij g Peter.
Sh am hahawa ha ahgith g Barnabas ch Paul mat haschu s-hasigam hab juh g Jiosh gewkthagkaj am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam. Kush wehsijj ab wabsh i pi shahmuni ch am ha kaiham.
Tsh am i ha'asa neneo. Tsh g James am i kuhgi g ha-ahga mash hab kaij, “Ni-wepnag, ab g wo i ni-kaiham.
Peter o am t-ahgith matsh has masma g Jiosh am chehgi mo pihk e elith ha hekaj g nahnko mahs hemajkam ch am ha'i i ha gawulkai mat d wo hemajkamgajk.
K ith am wohokamchuth mat wa has i masma an o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mash wa hab kaij g Jiosh:
‘Neh, e at padch g Davidbad kownaltalig. K wabshaba ab him g tash mant am ep wo i ap'echuth k am hema wo i kei g amjedkam am kehkud ed mant heg gahi wuhshanim wo i himch g kownaltalig.
T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ab wo i ni-gahghi. Hegam ani ab i ha waith mat d wo ni-hemajkamgak.’
Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ch heg am i t-tashogith heki hu wa'i amjed.
“Kuni hab ep s-che'imk mani hab hi elith matt pi ab hu wo ha mohto'i g t-chehanigkaj hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i e nohnogi Jiosh wui.

Tt hi wabsh wo ha ahgi mat has wo e junihith. T hab ab ha wui wo si s-ap e tahtkkath hegam t-wehm o'othham mo am ha wehm kihthag. Tt wabsh wo ha cheha mat wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed ch pi ab hu wo ihm hab masma mo d Jiosh hegai mo pi d Jiosh ha'ichu ko'athch mo ab e to'ith ha wui k pi wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch.
Ith o wehsko si s-ap s-e mahch no pi an ahgachug wehs kihhim ch ed ch am e ne'okchulith t-wehm o'othham ha-chechopi ed.”

Tsh ihtham Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged am i ap'ech am wehs ha wehm hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus amai matsh am ha'i wo i ha chuhcha. Tsh ihtham am wo i ha oi g Paul ch Barnabas am Antiok wui. Sh ihtham d ha-chuhchai Judas Barsabbas ch Silas nash pi g hemajkam ab si has ha elith.

Kutsh ab ha mah g o'ohana matsh wo bek am Antiok wui. Sh hab chu'ig ihtha o'ohana: “T-naipijju mam d gawul mahs hemajkam ch ab ihm g Jesus ch ab kihthag Antiok t ab ch Syria t ab ch Cilicia t ab. B ach si em-ho'ige'elith ahchim mach d Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged ia Jerusalem t ab.
“Ihtham Barnabas ch Paul o ab t-ahgith mat am ha'i hihi g t-wehm o'othham k am em-kudu am ha'ichu pi ap em-ahgithk. Kuch eda wa chum pi sha'i ha ap'echuth mat hab wo e juh.
Kutt heg hekaj wehsijj ia t-hemapath k am i ap'ech matt has wo t-juh. B o si i s-ap e thagitokch ihtham Barnabas ch Paul am chikpanaj ed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch hekaj chum alo e ko'ij.
Kutt gohk ep i ha chuhcha mat am wo i ha oith k si s-ap wo em-ahgi mach haschu i em-o'ohanith. K d ihtham Judas ch Silas.

T am i t-tashogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mattki pi ab hu wo i em-mohto'i g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo k wabsh wo em-ahgi ihtha mamt am hab hi wo wa junihith. T hab wabsh si s-ap wo e tahtkkath em-wui hegam t-wehm o'othham mo am em-wehm kihthag.

Neh, pi amt wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch ch pi wo ko'ath hegai mo ab e to'ith mo haschu hab chum e elith mo d jiosh. Mt wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed. Mamtp wo si e nuhkuth ith ab k am wo wa s-ap'ek. T g Jiosh am wo wa em-wehmajk.”
Kutsh am hahawa gm hu hihi ihtham Barnabas ch Paul ch Judas ch Silas k gm hu thatha Antiok t am. Tsh am i e hemapai hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus. Kutsh am i ha mah g o'ohana.
Tsh ihtham am ne'okchulith k si s-ap i e taht natsh pi heg hekaj ab si i e gewkemhu.
Kush g Judas ch Silas hab wa'ap d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch am thadkkahim he'es i tash ch mu'i ha'ichukaj am i ha gewkemhu.
Kumtsh am hahawa s-ap i ha thagito mat wo uhpam hihi.
[Tsh wabshaba g Silas hab i e ah mat wabsh ha wehm wo thakath.]
Sh g Paul ch Barnabas he'es i tash am thadkkahim Antiok t am am ha jehnigithch ab amjed g Jesus. Sh mu'ijj hab wa'ap ha ahgith g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus.
Sh am hu hebai amjed, sh hab kaij g Paul ab Barnabas wui, “Am att ep wo hihim k am wo i ha gewkemhu wehs kihhim ch ed mach wa hebai ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo ha nei mas has wa'i masma.”
Kush g Barnabas hab chum kaij mat wo bek g John Mark.
Tsh wabshaba g Paul pi hohho'i mat wo bek nat pi wa am wabsh i ha thagito Pamphylia t am k pi am hu ha wehm i nahto g chikpan.
Kutsh ith am si pi ha ap'et. Tsh hekaj i e gawulkai. Kutsh g Barnabas bek g Mark k gn hu aigo i shul ge'e wahlkokaj Cyprus jewed t am.
Tsh wabshaba g Paul g Silas am epai bek mat wo oi. Kumtsh am e ho'ige'ithahun k am i ha thagito Jiosh hemajimatalig ed.
Tsh ihtham Paul am hihi Syria ch Cilicia jejewed oithk k am i ha gewkemhunahim hegam mash ab ihm g Jesus.

Kutsh hegam Paul am hahawa hihi Derbe kihhim wui k amjed gm hu thatha Lystra kihhim t am. Kush eda amai am hema kih g wechij o'othham ch am oith g Jesus himthag ch hab chehgig Timothy. K g je'ej hab wa'ap am oith g Jesus himthag ch d Tuhligo uwi. Sh wabshaba g ohgbadaj d Greek hemajkam.
Sh wehsijj g Jesus ihmtham am Lystra t am ch Iconium t am am si wehhejed neok g Timothy.
Tsh g Paul s-behim g Timothy e wehm. Sh eda wehs s-mahch g Tutuligo amai mat g ohgbadaj pi pahl hikuch g Timothy. Tsh heg hekaj g Paul an pahl hikuch k hahawa bek.

Kutsh am hihim k hebai i thaiw kihhim t am ch am ha ahgith hegam mo ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hegai matsh ha o'ohani g Jesus chuhchai ch ge'eged am Jerusalem t am k hab ha ahgith mat s-ap am hab wo chum junihith.
Tsh am i mu'itha hegam mash am e wehm e mihshmath wehs kihhim ch ed. Tsh g ha-wohochuthadag am i gewka.

Tsh am gahi wuwha g Phrygia jewed ch Galasia jewed ihtham Paul k am ahgahim g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus. Tsh wabshaba pi ha hiwigi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mas am wo i ahgahi am Asia jewed ch ed.
Tsh gm hu thatha mo an i chekshani g Mysia jewed k hab chum i e ah mat imhab uhpam wo hihi Bithynia jewed wui. Tsh wabshaba ep pi ha hiwigi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Tsh hekaj gm hu gahi hihi Mysia jewed oithk k gm hu thatha Troas kihhim t am. Kunt am ha nam ahni Luke.
Tsh g Jiosh am ha'ichu hab juh nenaj ed g Paul. Sh am hema neith g Macedonia jewed t am o'othham. Kush ith ab kehk ch hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm Macedonia wui k wo i t-wehmt.”
T g Paul am hahawa t-ahgi ihtha. Kuch hab kaij moki tatchua g Jiosh matt am wo hihim k am wo i ha ahgithahi g ha'ichu ahgaj. Tt am ha hekaj i t-nako matt am aigo i chehchsh Macedonia jewed t am.
Kutt an ha hekaj gahi i shul g ge'e shuhthagi ge'e wahlko ch ed k ga hu thatha Samothrace kihhim t ab. Am ba'ich d i tash, tt am thatha Neapolis kihhim t am

k amjed gm hu ba'ich i wahp mo am d Philippi kihhim amai wehpeg chekshani ch ed g Macedonia jewed. Ihtha Philippi o d si s-has ha'ichu. K mu'i am thadha g si ge'e kownal shonthalig. Kuch am he'es i ha'ichugkahim ith eda kihhim.

Pi o am hu hema kehk g Tutuligo hemajkam ha-cheopi. Kutt heg hekaj am hihi mo an ge akimelig kihhim aigo mach hab t-ahg mo am hu hebai apchuthas mo am e ho'ige'ithahun g Tutuligo. K am hebai e hemapaithch g u'uwi. Kutt am i thadhaiwua k am ha wehm neneo.
K hema hegam u'uwi hab chehgig Lydia ch ab amjed g Thyatira kihhim ch d s-ihbhaimagi lohba gagdatham ch ab si ihm g Jiosh. Jiosh at ab i mah g wohochuthadag. Kut ab s-wohog el g Paul

k e pahl wako. T wehs hab wa'ap e juh g wehmaj kihkam. K hab hahawa kaij g Lydia, “Oi g wo t-oith k am t-wehm wo i thadhaiwua t-kih am nach pi d hahawa em-wehm wohochuththam.” Kutt wa woho hab t-juh heg hekaj mat pi t-thagito k ab ep t-waith.

Kuch am hu hebai am hihim matt gm hu wo hihi mo am e ho'ige'ithahun. T ab hema i t-oi g uwi. Kuki g jiawul an u'ukch ch ab mahkch g amichuthadag mo gm hu ba'ich tash ha'ichu ahg. K am ha'i si u'ukch ch mu'i lial u'u ab amjed mo am ha'ichu ha ahgith g hemajkam.
T ihtha uwi ab i t-oith k si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ihtham o'othham o d piongaj g si uhgchu Jiosh ch am em-ahgithahim mamt has masma wo e tho'ibia.”

Neh, bo kaij ch mu'i tashkaj an t-oithahim. T am hahawa pi e nako g Paul k ab si sikol i kekiwua k hab kaij ab jiawul wui, “Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj ani ab si m-chehani mapt wo thagito ihtha chehia.” T am wa i hekaj thagito g jiawul.
T am i nei hegam mo an u'ukch mat hahawa pi has masma ep wo u'uth g lial heg hekaj chehia k hekaj an ha ui g Paul ch Silas k gm hu i ha chewaim haha'ichu ha wui. Ihtham o am thadha si eda g kihhim.
K hegam mat am i ha ui g Paul ch Silas hab ha ahg, “Ihtham o d Tutuligo. Kutt ha cheh mo ha kudut g ia kihkam
no pi chum t-ahgith mash hema d si ge'e kownal mattsh ab wo chum si has elithath. K eda pi hiwgithas machs hab wo t-wuath nach pi ab si wecho g Rome kownal. K pi d t-wuikam ihtha ha'ichu ha-ahga.”
T wehsijj hegam mat ab i e hemapai ab i ha wehmt k ab ha wui gegokiwua g Paul ch Silas. T g haha'ichu gm hu wuashul g ha-wehschuga k am ha'i ha chehani mat wo ha gewitta.
Kumt am i si s-ko'okam ha gewittani k gd hu ha u'apa kukpaikud wui k hab ahgith g lilso ha nuhkuththam mat si s-wihnam wo ha kuh.
T wa woho hab e juh k gd hu si chuhko ha kuh k an ha wahpki g ha-kakhio uhs wupulshpadag ed.
Kutsh am eda i huh g s-chuhugam. Sh g Paul ch Silas am si e ho'ige'ithahun ch si ne'eth ch ab si ihm g Jiosh. Sh am ha'i ep kuhkpi g lilso ch ha kaiham.
T am haha wabsh si s-gewkam ugij g jewed. Tsh g kukpaikud am si wehs u'ugij. Tsh gam si e kuhkpi'o g kukpaikud kuhkpadag. Tsh g ha-wupulshpadag e padch.
Tsh ab si i nea g ha nuhkuththam k hab e ahg mat ne'iopa g lilso k hekaj an bei g is-pahyo mat wo hejel e mua.
Sh wabshaba g Paul am si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi g am hejel e mua'i. Ia ach wabsh i wehs ha'ichug.”
