Tsh am hahawa bei g lahmpa k am si med k am i wahk k si gigiwuk. Sh am wabsh kia thadha g lilso. Kutsh ab i gei ha wecho g Paul ch Silas
k ab i ha wuwhasith k ab ha kakke, “Shahnt masma wo ni-tho'ibia?”
Sh hab kaij ihtham Paul, “B apt wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. T heg wo m-tho'ibia. T ihtham m-wehm kihkam m ia gegok hab wa'ap wo e juh.”
Tsh ihtham Paul am hahawa i ha mihshmath ab amjed g Jesus.
Tsh am ha hekaj i ha u'u k ab i wako g eh'ed mat wa am ha gewitta. Tsh amjed am ha hekaj i e nakog k e pahl-wapko g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm
k gn hu hahawa i ha wahpki g Paul ch Silas e-kih ed k ha gegos. Kush si s-hehgig ihtha wehs ha wehm g e-wehm kihkam no pi ab hahawa wohochuth g Jiosh.
Sh am ba'ich d i si'alim. Tsh g haha'ichu am ha ahgi g chich-lilihi mat wo ha thagito ihtham Paul.
Sh hegai lilso ha nuhkuththam ab ahgith g Paul ch hab kaij, “Ia at gei g ahga ab ha amjed g haha'ichu matsh wo em-thagito. Mt gamai wabsh s-ap e taht k wo hihi.”

Kush wabshaba g Paul hab kaij ab ha wui g chich-lilihi, “Pi att hab wo t-juh. Hemho wa at ab wo i hihi hegam s-has haha'ichu k ia wo i t-wuwhas am ha tahgio g hemajkam nat pi t-gewitta am ha tahgio wa chum pi mahchch mas haschu d t-chu'ichig. K heg pi d chum t-wuikam nach pi u'ukch g t-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am hemajkam.”
Kush g chich-lilihi am hahawa ha ahgith g s-has haha'ichu mo has kaij. Tsh am i kah ihtha k si e totothsith k am hihim
k ab ha ahgi mat wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el k am hahawa i ha wuwhasith k hab ha ahg mat hig gm hu wo hihi ab amjed g kihhim.
T g Paul ch Silas am i wuwhag k gm hu hihi Lydia kih wui. Kut am e nam hegam mat ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga ab amjed g Jesus. T ihtham Paul ab si i ha gewkemhun k gm hu hahawa hihi.
Tsh ihtham Paul am wabsh gahi wuwha g Amphipolis kihhim ch Apollonia kihhim k gm hu thatha Thessalonica kihhim t am. Sh am hema kehk g Tutuligo ha-cheopi.

Tsh heg wui am hihi hegam Paul mo hab wa e wua chum hekith. Tsh g Paul am ha wehm a'aga ab amjed g Jiosh o'ohana k ith hekaj am chum wohokamch mat g Jiosh si Kehsha hemho wa wo e sho'igchuth k wo e mu'a k wabshaba ep wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed. Sh hab ep kaij, “Ihtha Jesus mani ia mahsko wua em-shahgith d hegai Jiosh si Kehsha.” Sh waik thomig oitham am ha jehnigith mihshmetha tash ab.

Kutsh ha'i ab i s-wohochuth k ab i ha wehmt hegam Paul. Tsh mu'i hegam Greek hemajkam ch hegam s-has ha'ichu u'uwi mash ab ihm g Jiosh ab hab wa'ap i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ha-ahga k ha wehmt. Sh hema ihtham hab chehgig Jason. Tsh wabshaba ha'i s-ha hehgam g Tutuligo. Kush am ha'i oiopo g s-papadmakam ch am i ha wehmt hegam Tutuligo k am i ha kudut g kihkam. Kutsh wabsh woho i babgat k am hihim k am wabsh si wahp Jason kih ed mat am wo ha ui g Paul ch Silas k am wo ha u'apa hemajkam ha wui.

Sh wabshaba pi am hu ha'ichug. Kush heg hi wa Jason am tha. Kush ha'i ep thadha g wehmaj wohochuththam. Kumtsh ihtham ha u'u k am i ha chewaim haha'ichu ha wui k si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Ia at ha'i thatha g o'othham k ash wa wehsko ha kudut g hemajkam ch ab wui gegok g si uhgchu kownal hab kaijch mo am hema d ep kownal ch hab chehgig Jesus. K ihtha Jason ab ha to'akch e-kih ab.”
Neh, bash kaij ch hekaj ab si i ha kudut g hemajkam ch haha'ichu mat wabsh woho'i babgat.
Tsh g haha'ichu am cheha g Jason ch hegam ha'i mat wo ha namkith ha'akia mo haschu d i ha-chehanig. Kutsh am hab e juh. Tsh hahawa ha thagito.
Tsh am i s-chuk. Tsh hegam Jesus ihmtham am ha ahgi ihtham Paul matsh gm hu wo hihi Berea kihhim wui. Tsh gd hu thatha k am ha hekaj hihi Tutuligo ha-cheopi wui.

Tsh ihtham s-ap ab i ha nei. Sh am ha mihshmath. Kush si s-hohho'ith ch ab kaiham g ha'ichu ha-ahga ch wehs tashkaj am si hoan g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana mat wo s-mai mas wa woho hegai mash g Paul am ha ahgith.
Tsh mu'ijj ab i s-wohoch g Tutuligo. Tsh mu'ijj g gawul mahs hemajkam hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch. Ha'i ihtham ash d s-has haha'ichu u'uwi.
Tsh am wabsh i chum kah g Tutuligo am Thessalonica t am mash ihtham Paul am ha mihshmath Berea t am hab wa ehp k am ha hekaj i hihim k am i ha kudu g hemajkam.
Kutsh heg hekaj am ahgi g Paul hegam mash ab s-wohochuth mat gm hu wo hih ge kahchki hugithgo. Tsh wabshaba g Silas am wa'i wih Berea t am g Timothy wehm.

Tsh hegam matsh am i bei g Paul gm hu u'apa Athens kihhim t am. Tsh am hahawa ha ahgi g Paul mat wo ha ahgi g Silas ch Timothy mamt hekith wo i e nakog k ab ha hekaj wo i hihi. Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa uhpam hihi ihtham e-kihhim wui.
Sh am thaha g Paul Athens t am ch am ha nenida g Silas ch Timothy. Sh eda wehsko chuhch g ha-jijoshta. Sh g Paul am ha neith ihtham ch hab si pi ap e tahtk.

Tsh am wabsh ap'et mat ha wehm wo si i a'aga g hemajkam am ha-cheopi ed. Kush am ha'i ha wehm e mihshmath g gawul mahs hemajkam. Sh g Paul am epai kuaya ch ed ha wehm ha'ichu i a'aga ab amjed g Jesus am ha ahgithch mat g ko'i wo i wuwha ab muhkig t amjed. Sh am ha'i d jewed t ab ha'ichu s-chu a'amichuththam ch wabsh ab uhpam i ne'owi g Paul. Sh ha'ijj hab kaij, “K haschu hab chum ahg ihtha pi ha'ichu amichuththam o'othham?” Kush ha'i hab ep kaij, “Shahag wepo mo g mehk jewed thahm jijosh am ha a'aga.”

Kush eda hegam kihkam ch hegam mo am wabsh sha thadha s-hohho'ith mat tash oitham wo kaihamath ch wo a'agath hegai mo haschu d si wechij ahga. (19) Kumtsh ab i bei g Paul k gd hu u'apa mo am e nanmek k hab kaij ab wui, “Shah'o d ahga ihtha wechij mashchama map ab amjed neok. (20) Pi ach am wa chum amichuth.”
Tsh am hahawa kekiwua g Paul k hab kaij, “Ahpim kihkam amki ab si has ha elith g jijosh.

Am ani neith m an chuhch g em-jijoshta kahya oithk. Kuki am hema kehk g iagchulithakud mo ith an o'ohanas, ‘Ia amt wo ha'ichu thai heg wehhejed jiosh mattp hems pi mahch.’ Pegih, ihtha pi em-machiga o d hegai mant am haha wo em-ahgi ab amjed.
“Tho ihtha Jiosh mat wehs ha'ichu nahto ch d kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. Wehsko o an ha'ichug g Jiosh. K pi hab sha'i mahs mas am hebai wabsh wo e thai hab masma mam hab ha wua g e-jijoshta.
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g thoakag ch wehs ha'ichu. K pi am hu ha'ichu d sha'i hegai mas ab i si tatchua ab amjed g o'othham mat ab wo mah chikpank.
“Jiosh at am hemako nahto g o'othham k ab amjed i wuhshath g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam k an a'ai i ha gantad wehsko jewed oithk mat hebai heki hu i ap'ech mat an wo kihkath.
K hab d elithaj mat am wo i e gahgithahi g Jiosh k atp hems wo cheh. Pi o sha'i mehk ab hema i t-amjed
ch ab t-mahkch g thoakag ch kihthag. Ha'ijj g em-wehm o'othham o d ha'ichu a'amichuththam ch hab kaij, ‘Ahchim hemajkam ach d Jiosh a'aliga.’
“Pegih neh, ith o d wohokam mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh. Tt pi hab wo ge t-ahgath mas g wohokam Jiosh hab mahs mo ihtham em-jijoshta mat wabsh g o'othham am nahto g ohlakaj o g plahthakaj o g hothaikaj.
Heki o hu pi mahch g hemajkam g Jiosh tatchui. K g Jiosh si s-hemajim am ha nakog. Ni wabshaba hemu em-ahgith mo hahawa ab si i ha chehani g hemajkam wehsko mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.

Am at i ap'ech g tash mat wehs wo ha lothai g hemajkam k heki hu am hema si i kei mat hab wo juh g lothaita. Tsh ith ia mahsi t-shahgith k ia oimmelhim ch e muhkith. Tsh g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig t amjed mat wo wohokamch mo d si Kehshaj.” Neh, bash kaij g Paul.
Tsh ihtham am i kah mo hab kaij matsh hema i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed. Kush ha'ijj wabsh si ash ch wabshaba ha'i hab kaij, “Am g wa ep t-jehnigith ab amjed ihtha.”
Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih g Paul.
Tsh ha'i ab s-wohochuth k ab i wehmt. Sh hema ihtham d Dionysius ch d hema hegam s-chu a'amichuththam. Kush am hema d ep uwi ch hab chehgig Damaris.
Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Paul ab Athens t amjed k am him k am jiwia Corinth kihhim t am.

Sh am hema thaha g Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Aquila ch ab d mahsikam Pontus t ab. K g wehmaj kihkam hab chehgig Priscilla. Ihtham o d ikus kihttham. Kutsh hab wa e juh am ha tahgio matsh g ge'e kownal Claudius gm hu ha huhu'i Tutuligo ab amjed g Rome kihhim. Sh ihtham Aquila ch Priscilla am ahhio Corinth wui.
Tsh g Paul am i ha chehgim k am ha wehm i thahiwua k am ha wehm chikpan no pi hab d wa'ap ikus kihttham.
Kush wehs mihshmetha tash am hihim Tutuligo ha-cheopi wui mat am wo ha'ichu i ha tashogi ab amjed g Jesus. Kush am ha'i ep ha wehm e mihshmath hegam mo pi d Tutuligo ch am kah g ha'ichu ahgaj.

Kutsh am i thatha g Silas ch Timothy ab Macedonia jewed t amjed. Tsh g Paul am hahawa i thagito g e-chikpan k heg am himch matsh am hahawa si i ha mihshmath am si s-mahch ch ahg ab ha wui g Tutuligo mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha mat wo t-tho'ibia.

Tsh wabshaba ab wui gegokiwua ihtham k am si pi ap has ahg. Tsh oi wa g Paul ab si i shahmuth g e-wehschuga ha wui mat wo ha chehgi mat ha thagito k hab kaij, “That wo hejel em-chu'ichigk mamtp wo sha pi e tho'ibia. T ahni pi ab hu ha'ichu d wo ni-chu'ichigk. Nt ia'i amjed g gawul mahs hemajkam ab wo i ha mihshmath.”

Neh, tsh ia'i thagito g ha-cheopi k gd hu hahawa ha mihshmath g hemajkam hema kih am g gawul mahs o'othham. Ith ash ab ihm g Jiosh ch hab chehgig Titius Justus ch an kih hugithaj an g Tutuligo ha-cheopi.
Kutsh mu'i ep ab i s-wohoch am i kahk k am e pahl wapko. Hema ash d chum ha wanimedtham g Tutuligo ch hab chehgig Crispus ch ab i s-wohoch g e-wehm kihkam ha wehm.

Tsh am hu hebai chuhug ch ed am ha'ichu hab e juh Paul nena ed mash kah g Jesus. Kush ab wui hab kaij, “Pi g am sha'i ha'ichu ehbithath. Ia ani m-wehmaj ch pi hedai wo shai hiwigi mas wo s-ko'okam m-juh. Pi g sha'i ha'asa ha mihshmath. Mu'ijj o ia kih ith eda kihhim mat d wo ni-hemajkamgak.”
Sh heg hekaj hemako ahithag ch eda hugkam ehp am ha'ichugkahim ch am ha mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Tsh am hahawa hema i thahiwua g kownal am Greek hemajkam ha-jewedga am k hab chehgig Gallio. Tsh g Tutuligo am i e hemapath k an bei g Paul k am u'apa ge'e kih t am
k hab kaij, “Ihtha o'othham o chum ha chehani g hemajkam mat hab masma ab wo i ihmath g Jiosh mam has masma pi t-hiwgith.”
Kutsh am haha wabsh wo i chum neo g Paul. Sh wabshaba Gallio hab ha ahg, “Pi oki ab wui kehk g ge'e kownal chehanig. T heg hekaj pi wo ni-ap'et mant ab wo em-kaiha.
Thoki wabsh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g em-himthag ch ab hema i amjed g em-wehm o'othham. Mt heg hekaj am hejel wo i ap'ech. Pi ant am hu wo sha'i i hudaw hab mahs ha'ichu.”
Neh, bash kaij ch gm hu si i ha wuwhas ge'e kih amjed.
Kutsh ihtham an wabsh si bei hegai mash d ha wanimedtham am cheopi ch ed ch hab chehgig Sosthenes k am si gewitta ge'e kih bahsho. Tsh pi ab hu has sha'i e taht g Gallio.

Sh mu'i tash am ha'ichugkahim g Paul Corinth kihhim t am ha wehm hegam mash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tsh amjed hab i e ah matsh gm hu uhpam wo hih Syria jewed wui. Sh eda gm hu hihhim g ge'eged wapalko Cenchrea kihhim t amjed. Kutsh gm hu hih g Paul. Tsh g Priscilla ch Aquila gm hu oi. Tsh koi am hu i chehchsh ge'e wahlko ch ed, tsh g Paul hih g e-mo'o matsh wa am he'es i tash pi hih mo d ha-himthag heg hekaj mat ab ha'ichu ah'ath g Jiosh.

Tsh am hahawa gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k ga hu thatha Ephesus kihhim t am. Kutsh am i thadhaiwua g Priscilla ch Aquila. Tsh g Paul am hih mat am wo sha i wah Tutuligo ha-cheopi ed k am ha wehm ha'ichu a'aga.
Sh ihtham ab ahgith mat am wabsh wo i wih ha wehm. Tsh wabshaba pi e nako
k ash hab wabsh ha ahg am wo i himk, “Matp g Jiosh d wo tatchuik, nt wo wa uhpam ep jiwia.” Neh, bash kaij ch amjed ab i chesh ge'e wahlko t ab.
Tsh heg gm hu gahi i gei Cesaria kihhim t am. Tsh amjed gm hu hahawa hih g Paul Jerusalem wui k am i ha chehgim g e-wehm wohochuththam. Am he'es i tash, tsh gm hu hahawa ep gahi i chesh Antiok t am.
Sh am he'es i ha'ichugkahim amai ch am hahawa ep ha thagito k atsh gm hu hahawa ep hih ha oithk g Galasia ch Phrygia jejewed k am i ha gewkemhunahim g e-wehm wohochuththam.
Tsh am hema jiwia g Tuhligo Ephesus kihhim t am k hab chehgig Apollos ch ab d mahsikam Alexandria kihhim t ab ch si s-e mahch ab s-neokimakam t ab ch ash si ge'e s-mahch g Jiosh o'ohana.
Kumtsh heki hu mashcha ab amjed g Jesus. Kush si s-hohho'ith ch am ahgahim ch si s-ap ha mashcham ch eda heg wa'i s-mahch John pahl wakona.
Tsh am i kah hegam Priscilla ch Aquila nash pi am si ha mihshmath Tutuligo ha-cheopi ed. Tsh ihtham am i wai e-kih wui k am s-ap ahgith mo haschu i koi s-mahch ab amjed g Jesus.

Kutsh hab hahawa i e ah g Apollos mat am wo hih Greece jewed wui. Tsh am i wehmt hegam mash ab s-wohochuth g s-kehg ha'ich ahgaj g Jiosh ch am kih Ephesus t am k am ha o'ohani g e-wehm wohochuththam amai Greece ch ed k ab si ha ahgith mat s-ap ab wo i nei g Apollos. Tsh gm hu jiwia k ab si ge'e i ha wehmt.
Sh am ha'i ne'owin g Tutuligo. Tsh wabshaba am ha gewito am ha-kaichuthch g mu'i hemajkam k am si i wohokamch heg hekaj Jiosh o'ohana mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha mat wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam.
Tsh gm hu ba'ich ep hih g Paul k gd hu jiwia Ephesus t am mo eda g Apollos am oimmed Corinth t am. Kush am ha'i kih ch ab chum s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Sh g Paul ab ha kakke, “Namt am wa bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamt hekith ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga?” Sh hab kaij hegam, “Pi ach koi hebai sha'i kah mas am ha'ichu d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.”
Sh hab hahawa kaij g Paul, “A namt koi e pahl wapko g Jesus pahl wakonakaj?” Sh hab kaij, “Pi koi. Johnbad pahl wakonakaj att t-wapko.”

Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Paul, “M o wa woho mash heg am ha ahgith mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi ch wabshaba am ep ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-wohoch hegai mat am epai wo i e maskogi. K heg d Jesus.”
Tsh ihtham ab i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus.
Tsh g Paul an i ha tahtamahim k ab ihmahim g Jiosh. Tsh ab si i bei g gewkthag ab amjed d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k am si gawul ne'okikaj neneok mat pi hebai mai ch am ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Kush am hu d i gamai gohk ihtham chechoj.
Sh am wapke g Paul Tutuligo ha-cheopi ed ch am ha wehm ha'ichu si i a'aga waik mashath ab chum s-ap s-ha mahtchuthamk ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.

Tsh wabshaba ha'i pi wohochuth k wabsh si pi ap neneok ab amjed g Jesus himthag am ha kaichuthch g hemajkam. Tsh heg hekaj am ha thagito g Paul k gm hu hih ha u'uk hegam mat ab i s-wohoch. Sh am hema d Tyrannus ch ge mashchamakud ch ith ha hiwigi. Kush heg eda g Paul am ha wehm a'aga g Jiosh kownaltalig wehs tashkaj
gohk ahith ab. Tsh wehsko e kah g Jesus ahga heg eda Asia jewed.
Kush g Jiosh am si i wehmaj g Paul mash am hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu.
Sh g hemajkam chum hems ab u'u g Paul ha'ichu eniga ch hekaj ab tattam g kok'otham. Kush ha thothad. Tsh g jijawul im hu hab wo i e juh ab ha amjed hegam mo an ha u'ukch.

Sh eda an ha'i ep oiopo g Tutuligo ch hab chum e wua mo im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam. Kush am hema g uhgchu pahl hab chehgig Sceva ch wewa'ak a'alithag. Sh ihtham hab wa'ap chum im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam. Am hu hebai, sh ihtham am hema neith g o'othham mash g jiawul an u'ukch ch hab kaij, “Ab g i thagito ihtha o'othham, ahpi jiawul. Bani si m-ahgith heg gewkthagkaj Jesus mo g Paul ab amjed ha mihshmath.”
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g jiawul ab ha wui, “S-mahch ani g Jesus ch ep s-mahch mo hedai wud hegai Paul ch wabshaba ahpim pi sha'i em-mahch mams hedai wud.”
Kutsh ihtha cheoj mo g jiawul an si u'ukch haha wabsh ha thathge k s-ko'okam ha juh. Tsh gm hu ne'iopa ab amjed g kihj k d wabsh i eh'ed. K g ha-wehschuga wantshas.
Kutsh wehsijj kah ihtha amai Ephesus t am k atsh si s-ehbeni k ab si has i el g t-kownalig Jesus.
Tsh mu'ijj hegam matsh ab i s-wohoch s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus am i e hemapath k mahsko wua g pi ap e-chu'ichig am wehs ha tahgio g hemajkam.

Tsh mu'ijj hegam mash hab chum e elith mo d mamakai am u'apa hegam e-o'ohana mo an ahgas g hihoina k am ha chehgith k ha mei. Tsh eda am i kuint g ha-namkig ihtham o'ohana mash am mei. Kutsh ai g hetaspo wehst-mahm mihl pihsh (50,000).
Kutsh hab masma hekaj si s-gewkam am i hih g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus k am i e gantad. Sh g hemajkam ba'ich i s-gewkam ab u'ukch.
Tsh amjed hab i e ah g Paul matsh gm hu wo hih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed oithk k amjed gm hu haha wo hih Jerusalem wui k amjed am Rome wui wo hih.
Kush eda g Timothy ch Erastus am wehmaj. Kush am ha ahgith g Paul matsh am wo hihi Macedonia wui. Tsh g Paul am wih Asia ch ed he'es i tash.
Kutsh ia'i ithani am i e kudu g hemajkam ab Ephesus t ab heg hekaj Jesus himthag.

Amai ash am hema kehk g ge'e cheopi. Kush am eda e kehshch g uwi ha-jioshga ch hab chehgig Artemis. Kush am hema d plahtha chikpantham ch hab chehgig Demetrius. Sh ith pionag g plahthakaj ha nahto g al kihki mo heg wepogithas cheopi ch mu'i nahto g lial ha gagdathch.
Kutsh g Demetrius am i ha hemapai hegam mash hab wa'ap mahs chikpan hab wua k am si s-gewkam hab kaij ab ha wui, “Ni-naipijju, s-mahch am mo g s-t-kaistalig ab him ith amjed chikpan.

Kum eda si neith ch ep kah ihtha hab chehgi Paul mo hab kaij mo ihtham t-jijoshga pi d sha'i jijosh. T hab am gawul juh g e-chegitoi g mu'i hemajkam ab i s-wohochuthk iia Ephesus t am ch chum alo wehsko am Asia jewed oithk.
Kut wo e padch g t-chikpan nat pi pi ab hu hab masma wo e ihmath g Artemis mo hemuch wehsko ab si e ihm. T g cheopigaj pi ab hu wo e ha'ichuch.”
Tsh am i kah ihtham mat am e hemapai k atsh si babgat k si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “B ach si has elith g t-jioshga Artemis.”
Sh wehsko kaithag g ha-hihinki ch wehs ha babgach g kihkam. Tsh gohk ha ui hegam mash am wehmaj g Paul k am ha u'apa chichwikud ed. Hegam mamtsh ha ui ash d Gaius ch Aristarcas.
Tsh g Paul am chum s-wahkim ha shahgith. Tsh wabshaba g wehmaj wohochuththam pi hiwigi.
Tsh ha'i hegam mash d haha'ichu ch d naipijjuj g Paul hab wa'ap ahgith matsh pi am hu wo hih mamt am i ha ui ihtham gohk.
Tsh eda heg oitham am i si e gewkai g kudutadag. Sh ha'ijj si hihnk has i kaitham. Sh ha'i am wa gawul ha'ichu ep hihnk heg hekaj mash mu'ijj pi sha'i mahch mas haschu ahgch ia e chehm.

Tsh g Tutuligo am hema i kei mat am wo him k ab wo i kekiwua ha wehhejed k am wo ha ahgi mo pi d ha-chu'ichig g Tutuligo. Ith ash hab chehgig Alexander ch am wabsh i chum ha ba'ich i kekiwua mat am wo neo.
Tsh am i nei g hemajkam mo d Tuhligo k pi ab hu sha'i kaiham k wabsh si hihnk e wehm am hu i gohk ohla ab hab kaijch, “B ach si has elith g t-jioshga Artemis.”

Tsh g s-has ha'ichu o'ohantham ha shohbi g hemajkam ash hab kaijch, “Ahpim kihkam! Wehsijj am s-mahch mo ia Ephesus t am e nuhkuth g cheopigaj g si s-has ha'ichu t-jioshga Artemis ch ia ep e nuhkuth hegai hothaigaj mat ab thahm kahchim t amjed i gei.
T pi hedai hab wo sha'i chei mas pi woho ihtha. Kumt ab wabsh wo i e bahbgi k pi am hu ha'ichu wabsh wo si has juh.
Neh, mamt i ha u'apa ihtham o'othham. T eda pi ha'ichu sha'i ha ehs ab cheopi t amjed, ni'is am hu sha'i pi ap has ahg g t-jioshga.
Neh, k am thadha g haha'ichu lothaita tash ch ed. Kut ihtham Demetrius am ha'ab wo ha u'apa matp ab ha'ichu wo s-ha abchutham.
K am ep e nanmek g kihkam ch ha'ichu i a'aga ch am i ap'echuth. Kumt am wo u'apa mamtp ha'ichu ep tatchua.
T hahawa pi ab hu wo t-abch g kownal machs wabsh t-cheggia heg hekaj mat haschu has i e juh ith tashkaj. Kutt pi wo sha'i t-nako machs wo ah mat haschu ahgk hab e juh ha'ichu.”
Neh, bash kaij ch ha thagito.
Tsh am i thotholimat ha'ichu. Tsh g Paul am i ha hemapai g e-wehm wohochuththam k am si i ha gewkemhun k am hahawa ha thagito k gm hu aigo i chesh Macedonia t am
k am heg oithk i ha gewkemhunahi mu'ikpa ha mihshmathk. Am he'es d i tash, t ia jiwia Greece jewed t am

k ia ha'ichugkahim waik mashath. T am hebai i cheka, t am hahawa i chum e nako mat am aigo i chesh Syria jewed wui. Tsh wabshaba g Tutuligo am i e nako mat wo be k wo mua. T hekaj hab i e ah mat am uhpam ep wo hih Macedonia wui.

Tsh ha'i oi g Paul mat gm hu hih. Hema o d Sopater ch ab Berea t amjed ch d alithaj g Pyrrus. K ha'i ep d Aristarcas ch Secundus ch ab Thessalonica t amjed. Tki hegai Gaius mo ab Derbe t amjed ch Timothy am ha oi. Tki hegam ep ha oi Tychicus ch Trophimus mo ab amjed g Asia jewed.
T ia thatha Philippi kihhim t am. Ni ahni Luke ia wabsh kia ha'ichug ch am hahawa oi g Paul. T wabshaba hegam ha'i i'ajed gm hu t-ba'ich i chehchsh Troas kihhim wui matsh am wo t-nenida.

T eda e ai mat g Tutuligo wuhshath g e-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag k hab pi ko'a hegai pahn mo jewajithas. Kutt am hahawa gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k am ha nam Troas t am mo d hetasp tash amjed mat hegam am i t-thagito. Kuch wehsijj am ha'ichugkahim hemako thomig.

Am hu hebai d i shahwai hudunk. Tt am i t-hemapai mo an hebai uhgk g kih k am t-wehm t-gegos matt am wo hehgigchul g Jiosh. K an mu'i e mehmheithch g lalampa. T g Paul am neok k sha'i si tash am t-mihshmath natsh pi wo hih ba'ich tash ed. Kut eda i huh g s-chuhugam.

K an hema thaha g wechij o'othham wintani t an ch hab chehgig Eutycus ch atsh am i s-kohsim k kohsh k i gei ab wintani t amjed k gd hu gei jewedo. K eda waik e thahm kihki mat amjed ab i gei. T am hahawa ha'i be k am s-mai matki heki hu muh.
T wabshaba g Paul am i huduni k an si kohm k hab kaij, “Pi g am wo has e tahtkkath. Tho thoakam.”

T g hajunij gm hu hahawa i bei hegai wechij o'othham kihj wui si s-ap e tahtkch mo d thoakam. Kut gm hu hahawa uhpam ep i chehchsh mo an e mihshmath k am hab juh hegai chemait hugi mat hekaj wo s-chegitok g Jesus muhkig. T g Paul am hahawa ep ha mihshmath k gm hu hahawa hih.
K am hahawa t-ahgith g Paul mattsh gm hu wo nam mo am d Assos kihhim natsh pi wabsh wo i keish g wohg k am wo hih. Kutt heg hekaj gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k gm hu thatha.
T am hahawa t-nam k an t-wehm thahiwua. Tt am ep gahi i shulig k gm hu ai g Mitylene kihhim

k amjed gm hu ai g Chios kihhim. K am ba'ich d ep i tash, tt gm hu ai g Samos kihhim. K eda e aihim mat g Tutuligo gm hu wo hihi Jerusalem wui k am hab wo juh g hehgchulitha Jiosh wui mat s-ap i ha wehmt k am babhaijith g ha-e'esha. K heg wui s-himimk g Paul ch s-e hohtkith ch hekaj hab kaij matt pi am hu wo i huhud Ephesus t am. Kutt hekaj am wabsh gahi wuwha. K am ba'ich d i tash, tt gm hu thatha Miletus kihhim t am.
K oi wa s-ha neithamk g Paul hegam mo d ge'eged am ha shahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam ab Ephesus t ab. Kut ab i ha wai Miletus wui.
T am i thatha. K hab kaij ab ha wui: “Ni-wepnag, s-mahch am mani haschu am hab i junihim am em-shahgith wabsh chum hekith ga hu i amjed mant hekith ia jiwia iia Asia jewed t am.

Ni ab wabsh i ni-sho'igchuth ch hebai ni-oh'og iawua am hab junihithch g Jiosh chikpan nani pi si pihk ni-elith em-hekaj. Am o chum e nakog g ni-wehm o'othham mat wo ni-mua. Ni heg hekaj ab nakog g s-wihnk ha'ichu.

Kum s-mahch mani pi ha'ichu sha'i ehstohim ch wabshaba am wehs em-ahgith mani haschu hab elith mat d wo i em-wehmtadagk. Ni am em-mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mam am e hehemapath ch amai ep si hehe'ejel em-kihki ed.
Kuni am si tasho ha ahgith g ni-wehm o'othham ch gawul mahs hemajkam mat wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui k ab wo bei g t-kownalig Jesus.
K hemuch hab si tahhathag g ni-ihbthag mant am wo hih Jerusalem wui. Pi ani mahch mas haschu has wo mahsk am ni-wehhejed amai.
Ith ani hi wa s-mahch mani heg wui am him mantp hems wo ni-kuhpachuth k wo ni-sho'igch no pi heki hu am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mani hebai i jijiwhia.

Pi o d sha'i ha'ichu g ni-thoakag manis wo si s-huwithath hejel ni-wehhejed. Heg ani wa'i hab s-junimk mant wo nahto hegai mo g t-kownalig Jesus ab ni-chehani mant am hab wo juh. K d ihtha mant am wo i ahgahi g Jiosh hemajimatalig.
“Neh, pi amtki hekith ep wo sha'i ni-nei. Ni heg hekaj s-em-ahgithamk mani wa wehs ha'ichu em-ahgith ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig.
K pi d ni-chu'ichig mamtp hema i pi wo e tho'ibia.
Wehs ant em-ahgi hegai mo haschu g Jiosh am hab elith k pi haschu sha'i ehsto ab em-amjed.

Ab g hejel wo e nuhkuthath ch ep wo ha nuhkuthath g e-wehm wohochuththam. Hegam o g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag em-nuhkuthachuth hab masma mamt wo ha'i ha nuhkuthach g kahwal e-shoshoiga. Kumt wo s-chegitok mat g t-kownalig Jesus eh'ed e iawua mat am ha wehhejed e muhkith k ha tho'ibia.
Ab at ha'i wo i wahp em-shahgith mat hab masma wo s-ta ehbithamak am em-wehhejed mo g sheh'e am ha wehhejed g kahwal k wo chum s-em-u'im.
Kut am ha'i wo i e maskogi g chechoj em-shahgith k wo ha'ichu chum em-iattogi ahpim wohochuththam mat hab masma ha'i im hu gawul wo i em-wanim.
Neh, mt wo si e nuhkuthath ch wo s-chegitokath mani em-mashcham wehsijj waik ahith ab ch g ni-oh'og iawua s-chuhugam oitham ch tash oitham nani pi pihk ni-elith em-hekaj.

“Pegih neh, ab ant wa em-ahgi ab amjed g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag k am haha wo em-thagito Jiosh nohnhoi ed. T g Jiosh wo wa em-nuhkuthath ch ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag k wo em-mah hegai si s-kehg ha'ichu mo ab ha makiog g e-hemajkamga.
Pi ani hekith hedai ha-lialigakaj o g wehschuga sha'i pihk ni-elith.
Ni wabsh g hejel ni-nohnhoikaj am hab junihim g chikpan ch hekaj ni-thagio'ith ch ep ha thagio'ith g ni-wehm chikpantham.

Ni hab wa masma am em-chehgith mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo pi e amichuth. T-kownalig Jesus o hab kaij, ‘T wo s-em-hehgigch hegai mat ab wo ha'ichu em-mah. Mt wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-hehgigk mamt ab wo ha'ichu ha mah.’ Kumt ith wo s-chegitok mo has i kaij.”
I am i ha'asa neo g Paul k am hahawa wehs ha wehm tohtonwua ihtham k am e ho'ige'ithahu.
K wehsijj si shoani ch an si kokme no pi si pihk e elith hekaj ch hab ahg, “Jiosh at wo wa m-wehmajk.”
K si pi ap e tahtk, wahm mat am i chegito mo hab kaij mat pi thahm ep wo nei. T am hahawa wehsijj hihi mo am thaha g ge'e wahlko.

Kutt am hahawa si wehs i ha ho'ige'el g t-wepnag k am ha thagito k am wabsh si shel gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj k ga hu thatha Cos kihhim t ab. Am ba'ich d i tash, tt ga hu ai g Rhodes kihhim k amjed ga hu aigo i thatha Patara kihhim t ab.
Neh, k am hema thaha g ge'e wahlko matsh gm hu wo hih Phenicia jewed wui. Kutt heg ab an ha hekaj i chehchsh k gm hu oi.
Tsh ab wo i e huhuds g wahlko mohtoi Tyre kihhim t am. Kutt am bihbij hugithaj an g Cyprus jewed k am thatha amai Tyre t am.

K am ha'i kih g t-wehm wohochuththam. Kutt ha chehg k am ha wehm thadha hemako thomig ab. T am i ha tashogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matsh am ha'ichu has wo e juh tahgio g Paul. Kum hab chum ahg mat pi am hu wo hih Jerusalem wui.

T wabshaba am i e ai matt wo hihi. Tt gm hu hihi. T wehsijj gm hu t-oi ha wehm g e-wehm kihkam ch e-a'aliga matt gm hu wo i wuwha ab kihhim t amjed. Tt wehsijj am i tohtonwua ge shuhthagi bahsho k am t-ho'ige'ithahun
k ab hahawa a'ai t-ahgith mat wo t-wehmajk g Jiosh. Tt ahchim gn hu hahawa i chehchsh ge'e wahlko ch ed. T hegam gm hu epai hihi uhpam.
Kutt gm hu hahawa ep gahi i shul g ge'e wahlkokaj Ptolemais kihhim wui. K am ha'i kih g t-wehm wohochuththam. Ch am ha wehmajkahim hemako tash ab.

Am ba'ich d i tash, tt ga hu thatha Cesaria kihhim t ab. Kuki am kih hegai Philip mo hema d hegam wewa'ak chechoj matsh wa am e chuhcha matsh am wo i ha wehmt g Jesus chuhchai Jerusalem t ab. Kutt am hihi kihj wui. T am i t-wahpki.
Kuch am wehmajkahim he'ekia i tash. Ihtha Philip o gi'ik u'uwi a'alithag. K ihtham pi ha kuhkun ch am ahgahim hegai mo haschu g Jiosh am ha tashogith.
Kut ab Judea t amjed heg ab jiwia Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam mo hab chehgig Agabus.

Ch am t-mihshmath. T heg an bei g Paul giwud k an hekaj wuh g e-kakhio ch e-nohnhoi ch hab kaij, “Bamtsh masma hab wo m-juh maptp am wo hih Jerusalem wui. T-wehm o'othham atsh an wo si m-wud k ab wo m-thagito gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui. Ith o am ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.”
Kutt am i kah ihtha k ab chum si i ahgith g Paul mat pi am hu wo hih Jerusalem wui.
K wabshaba hab wabsh kaij, “Pi g am wo shoanith. Pi am ap ni-tahtchuth. Ni-nahtokch ani mamtp wo ni-wulsh o chum hems wo ni-mua g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed.”
Kutt pi sha'i t-nako machs wo shohbi k am wabsh i thagito k hab kaij, “Pegih, ith ach wa'i tatchua mat g Jiosh ha'ichu ap'echutha am hab wo e juh.”
Kuch am ep ha'ichug he'es i tash ch am hahawa i t-nakog k gm hu hihi Jerusalem wui.

T am ha'i t-oi Jerusalem wui k am i t-ui heg kih wui matt am wehmaj wo thadhaiwua. Ith o hab chehgig Mason ch ab d si kihkam Cyprus jewed t ab ch ash heki hu wa'i s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
T si s-ap i e taht g t-wehm wohochuththam ab i t-neithok.
Ihtham ha-uhgchuga ash d James. Kutt heg chehgio am wehmaj g Paul. K am wehsijj thadha hegam mo d ge'eged.
T g Paul ab wehs i ha ho'ige'ith k am hahawa si s-ap ha ahgith wehs ha'ichu mat g Jiosh s-kehg am hab juh am gahi wuhshanim am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam.

T am i kaiok ab si ihm g Jiosh k wabshaba hab kaij ab Paul wui, “Neh, t-wehnag, s-mahch ap mat mu'i mihl t-wehm o'othham ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k ab ihm g t-kownalig Jesus k eda ab wabsh kia si has elith g heki hu t-chehanig.
Ihtham o kah mapsh ahpi ha mashcham hegam t-wehm o'othham mo an a'ai kih nahnko mahs hemajkam ha shahgith mat wo s-ohhoth g t-chehanig k pi an hu wo ha o'oha an ha pahl hikuchk g e-a'aliga.
Tho wabsh si shel mat wo kah mapt ia jiwia. Pegih, k hab chum mahs
mapt am hab wo e juh matt has wo i m-ah. M o ha'i d chechoj ch d gi'ik mat he'es pi hih g e-mo'o nat pi ab ha'ichu ah'ath g Jiosh.

Pt am wo ha oith k am ha wehm wo e thagito Jiosh wui ge'e cheopi t am. Am apt ha wehhejed wo namkith mat haschu wo i chum ha namkith heg hekaj. Kumt am haha wo hih g e-mo'o. Pt hab masma wo ha chehgi g t-wehm o'othham map am hab junihim g t-himthag. T heg amjed wo s-mahchk mo pi woho hegai mam haschu ab m-abchuth.

P am wa s-mahch matt haschu am ha o'ohani hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Bo chu'ig g t-o'ohana mat hegam pi wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch kch hegai mo ab e to'ith hegai mo haschu hab chum e elith mo d jiosh. Kut wo si e nuhkuth hab masma mat hegai wa'i si e-hohnig o g si e-kun wehm wo kihk.”

K wa woho am ba'ich d i tash. T g Paul am i ha ui hegam chechoj k am ha wehm i e thagito Jiosh wui k am hahawa i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed k am ha ahgith mat d wo wewa'ak tashk, t wo kuhgit hegai mat ab ah'ath. T am hab wo e juh hegai mat am hahawa ha'ichu wo iagchul Jiosh wui.

K am i e aihim mat wo kuhgit hegai wewa'ak tash. T am hih g Paul k am i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed. Kutsh ha'i am chehg k an bei hegam Tutuligo mo ab Asia jewed t amjed. K eda mu'i an oiopo g hemajkam. Kutsh am si i ha kudut

k ash si hihnk ch hab kaij, “T-hajuni, ia g wo i t-wehmt. Ihtha o'othham o an wehsko si has ahg g t-himthag ch t-chehanig ch ihtha ge'e cheopi. Pi o d ha-ap'ethag g gawul mahs hemajkam mas ia hu wo i wahp. Kutki eda ihtha ha'i i ha wahpkith k hab uamhu g ge'e cheopi.”
Bash kaij nash pi am hu hebai neith g Paul hema wehm g gawul mahs o'othham ch hab e ahg mat am i wahki. Hegai mo wa am wehmaj o hab chehgig Trophimus ch ab Ephesus t ab d kihkam.

T am wabsh wehsko chehmo g pi ha-ap'ethag amai kihhim t am. T ab a'aijed i wohp g hemajkam k an wabsh si bei g Paul k gm hu i chewaim ab amjed g ge'e cheopi. T ab ha hekaj si e kuhkp g ge'e cheopi kihkijeg.
K ihtham s-babgam hemajkam chum mum'a g Paul. Kumtsh am ahgi g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mash am ge e cheggia.
T ab ha hekaj tha'iwush mu'i ha wehm g e-shonthalig k ha'i ehp g ha-ge'ege'ejig k gd hu wo'i mat am e hemapai g hemajkam. T hegam am ha hekaj wabsh si ha'asa cheggia g Paul am i ha neithk.

T g shonthal am him k an bei g Paul. T g ha-ge'ejig hab ha ah mat an wo si wuh g gohk e hukshchim wainomikaj. Kut hab juh. T ab hahawa ha kakke g hemajkam, “Thoh'o wud ihtha o'othham ch haschu has juh?”

K ha'i g hemajkam am hu has i ahg. K ha'ijj ehp am wa gawul ep ahg. T am wabsh i ge nahnko e juh g ha'ichu ha-ahga. Kut pi sha'i amich ihtha shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat haschu has e juh k heg hekaj am wabsh ha ahgith g e-shonthalig mat gd hu wo kuh g Paul.
T an i bei mo an cheshajkudag. T wabshaba wabsh e nondagch g hemajkam k an chum s-behimk ch si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Mu'awo! Mu'awo!” T heg hekaj wabsh uhgk i ul g shonthal mat pi wo e muhkith.
T am haha wabsh i chum wahki g Paul e-kolhai ed. K hab kaij g Greek ha-ne'okikaj ab wui g shonthal ha-ge'ejig, “M ani ha'ichu chum s-m-ahgithamk.” K heg hab kaij, “A kupki neok g Greek ha-ne'okikaj.
Ps hemsi d hegai Egypt t am o'othham mat wa am hu hebai ia i chum shonwuich g cheggiadag. T wa am i wehmt g gi'ik mihl chechoj ch u'a g cheggiakud am tohono jewed oithk.”

K hab kaij g Paul, “Pi ani d hegai. Thani Tuhligo ch ab d mahsikam Tarsus kihhim t ab am Cilicia jewed ch ed ch ab u'ukch g ni-shel ab amjed g si s-has ha'ichu kihhim. Pt ab wo si i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k wo ni-hiwigi mant am wo neo ha wui g hemajkam.”
T wa woho am hiwigi g shonthal ha-ge'ejig. T an i kekiwua mo an cheshajkudag ab ha ba'ich g hemajkam k am neo g hejel e-ne'okikaj k hab kaij:
“Ni-hajuni ch ahpim ge'eged hemajkam, ab g wo i ni-kaiham mant am hejel ni-wehhejed wo neo.”
T am i kah mo g ha-ne'okikaj neok k gm hu wabsh i pi shahmuni. K hab hahawa kaij g Paul:

“Ahni ani d Tuhligo ch ab d mahsikam Tarsus kihhim t am am Cilicia jewed ch ed ch wabshaba ia ge'etha Jerusalem kihhim t am k ia ni-mashcham. K wa g Gamaliel d ni-mashchamtham ch ab si s-gewkam ni-mashcham g t-chehanig. Ni hab wa masma am chum si s-gewkam oith g Jiosh himthag mam ahpim hemuch ith i tashkaj.
Kuni wa heg hekaj ha sho'igchuth ch ha koktha hegam mo an u'ukch ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahga ch wa an ha u'u g chechoj ch u'uwi ch am ha shulig kukpaikud ch ed.

T g uhgchu pahl ch hegam e jehnigiththam am wo wohokamch ihtha mani em-ahgith. Bani wa ha ahg mant am wo hih Damascus kihhim wui. T hegam ab ni-mah g o'ohana am ha wui hegam mo d u'ugchu am ha eda g t-wehm o'othham amai Damascus ch ed. Nt wa am hi wa i hih mant wo ha wupulsh g e hukshchim wainomikaj hegam mo ab s-wohochuth ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahga k wo uhpam i ha ui ab Jerusalem wui mat wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
“Neh, am att wa hihim k gm hu i aihim g Damascus kihhim. K wa am hu d i thahm juhk mat haha wabsh ha'ichu si ton ab amjed g thahm kahchim an wehsko ni-wehgaj.
Nt wa am i gei jewedo. T wa ab hema si neo ni-wui k hab kaij, ‘Saul, s-wohom ap hig ni-sho'igchuth.’
“Kuni si has elith ch hab kaij, ‘Thohp wud ch ab neok?’ “K hab hahawa ep kaij, ‘Thani ahni Jesus map ha sho'igchuth g ni-ihmtham.’
K hegam mo am ni-wehmaj hi wa neith hegai ge'e tonlig ch wabshaba pi amichuth g ne'oki.
“Ni ab hahawa kakke, ‘Shahnt wo ni-juh, ni-kownalig?’ “K wa hab kaij, ‘Ab g i wamig k am him k am i wahki Damascus ch ed. T am hahawa hema wo m-ahgi mapt haschu am hab wo chum wuath.’
“Tki eda pi ni-nenich heg hekaj mat wa am si s-masma ton. T wa am wabsh i ni-wanim hegam mo am ni-wehmaj k gd hu ni-u'apa Damascus t am.
“Kuki wa am hema kih g o'othham ch hab chehgig Ananias ch ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ep am si oith g chehanig. K ab si has elith g t-wehm o'othham amai Damascus t am.
Heg at wa am jiwia ni-wui k ab kehk ch hab kaij, ‘Ni-nawoj Saul, ab g beh'i g e-nentalig!’ Nt ha hekaj s-ap ha'ichu neith k ab si i nei.

“K wa hab kaij ab ni-wui, ‘Neh, am antsh wo m-ahgi matsh ahpi am i m-kei g Jiosh mapt wo s-mahchk g tatchuij ch wo nei g si s-ap'ekam Kehshaj k wo kah mat am hejel wo m-ahgi g ha'ichu e-ahga. K d wa'i ihtha Jiosh mo an u'ukch g t-shohshonbad.
K hab d elithaj mapt d wo hema hegamk mapt am wo si i wohokamch g Jesus k am wo i ha ahgi g hemajkam mapt haschu i neith k haschu i kah.
Pt ha hekaj wo i e nakog k wo e pahl wako ab ihmathch g Jesus. T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig.’ Neh, bo ni-ahg.
“Nt wa am hab juniok ab i hih Jerusalem wui k am hu hebai am ni-ho'ige'ithahun ge'e cheopi ch ed. T wa am haha wabsh ni-nena ed ha'ichu hab e juh
mani neith g Jesus. K hab kaij ab ni-wui, ‘Ia g ha hekaj thagito g Jerusalem k hihm ab amjed nat pi g m-wehm o'othham iia pi ab hu wo kaiha g ha'ichu m-ahga ab ni-amjed.’
“Ni hab kaij, ‘Tp hems wo wa ni-kaiha, ni-kownalig, no pi s-ap s-mahch mani d ahni mani wa an wahkhim ha eda g ha-chechopi ch an ha u'uth ch ha gewittan hegam mo ab m-ihm.
Kuni wa am ha wehmaj ch am nuhkuth g ha-wehschuga hegam mat mua hegai Steven mat am si s-mahch k ah ab m-amjed.’
“K wabshaba hab kaij g Jesus ab ni-wui, ‘Am g wa hihm nant pi am i m-kei mapt am mehk wo hih ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam.’ ” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.

K wa ab hi wa s-ap kaiham ihtham hemajkam. T wabshaba am hab wabsh chum chei ihtha matsh g Jesus am i kei matsh am wo hih ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T am ha hekaj i hihinkiath si s-kaitham k hab kaij, “Mu'awo! Mu'awo! Pi o an hu hab chum chu'ig mas in d wo thoakamk.”
K si hihnk ch ab si shahmuth g e-wepschuga ch g jewed shashkum ch am uhgk si nen'eichuth nat pi am i si babgat.

T g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am hahawa ha cheha g e-shonthalig mat gm hu wo i wahki g Paul shonthal ha-kih ed. T am i wahki. T am ha cheha mat wo gewitta am hugkam mat am wo ha ahgi mat has e juh mo hekaj si hihnkoith g Tutuligo.

T an wulsh mat wo chum gewitta. K am hema kehk g shonthal ha ge'ejig. K ab wui hab kaij g Paul, “Ab ani u'ukch g ni-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am o'othham. K heg hekaj pi hab chum mahs mams wo ni-gewitta pi koi ni-lothaithk.”

T heg am i kah ihtha k am wui hih g si uhgk shonthal ha-ge'ejig k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Nap s-mahch maptki has wo chum chu'i? Ihtha o'othham oki ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am o'othham.”
T am hahawa hih g si uhgchu shonthal ha-ge'ejig am Paul wui k ab kakke ch hab kaij, “Am g ni-ahgith. Nap ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am o'othham?” Sh hab kaij g Paul, “Heu'u.”

K hab hahawa kaij g ha-ge'ejig, “A pt has hig masma ab bei g e-shel. Ahni ant hi ab bei mu'i lial ha namkith.” K hab kaij g Paul, “Ni wabshaba ahni ab u'ukch g ni-shel mani ab d ha amjedkam hegam mo u'ukch g e-shel.”
T ga hu ta'i si i gegokiwua hegam mo an wulshch g Paul mat wo chum gewitta. T g shonthal ha-ge'ejig ep si e toths nat pi ha cheha mat hab wo juh.

Am ba'ich d i tash, tsh g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am i ha cheha g u'ugchu papal mat am wo i ha hemapai g e jehnigiththam nash pi s-mahchimk mo haschu ab abchuth g Paul. T g shonthaligaj gam wul'o g e hukshchim wainomi ab ab g Paul k am i be k am i kei ha wui.

K g Paul ab si ha neith g e jehnitiththam ch hab kaij, “Ni-hajuni, chum ani hekith si ni-nakog mant am hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo sha'i ha'ichukaj si has ni-elithath am tahgio g Jiosh ia i himtham tashkaj.”
Kut hegai uhgchu pahl mash hab chehgig Ananias am ha cheha hegam mo an miabithch gegok mat ab wo si shonihi g Paul chinij ab. T ab shonihi.

K hab kaij g Paul, “Jiosh at hemho ab wo wa uhpam i nodagi ihtha am m-wui ahpi map s-chu iattomk. Ab ap thak ch ni-lothait g t-chehanigkaj ch eda ep melchkwuhim g t-chehanig map ab ha chehani mat ab wo ni-shonihi.”
K hab kaij hegam mo an miabithch gegok g Paul, “S-ko'okam ap has ahg g uhgchu pahl.”
K hab kaij g Paul, “Ni-hajuni, mant hems wo s-mahchk mokis d uhgchu pahl, nt pi hab wo sha'i chei, no pi hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Pi g am wo sha'i pi ap has ahgath g e-ge'ejig.”

K hegam e jehnigiththam ha'i d Sajusi ch ha'i ep d Palasi. T ith am i s-mai g Paul k am si s-kaitham neok ha wui ch hab kaij, “Ni-hajuni, ahni ani d Palasi ch d ha amjedkam g Palasi ch ha wepo s-wohochuth mat g ko'i ep wo i wuwha ab hiha'ini t amjed. Kum heg hekaj ni-lothait.”
T ith am i kah g e jehnigiththam k am ha hekaj a'ai e ne'owin k pi ab hu i e wehmt.
Hegam mo d Sajusi o pi ab hu wohochuth mat g ko'i wo i wuwha ab hiha'ini t amjed ch ep pi wohochuth mo an ha'ichug g anghil o g kok'oi. K wabshaba g Palasi wehs s-wohochuth ihtha.

T am hahawa i si e gewkai g ha-hihinki. T am ha'i gegokiwua hegam mo d chehanig hudawogam ch d Palasi k am si s-gewkam ha shohbith k hab kaij, “Pi att ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas pi ap hab juh ihtha o'othham. Tp hems wa woho g anghil am wehmaj neo.”

T am ba'ich i si e gewkai g ha-ne'owina. Kum hab e ahg mat am hu wo wantsh g Paul. K g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am hahawa ha chehani g e-shonthalig mat am wo ha wohppo'i. Kut am hihim k be k gd i bei e-kih wui.
Sh am ba'ich d i hudunk, tsh am i e chehgi g Jesus Paul wui k hab kaij, “Ia ap si s-mahch ch am ahgahim ha'ichu ab ni-amjed. Kuni am i m-gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa masma hab e juh am Rome t am.”
K am ba'ich d i tash wabsh i si'alim, tsh am ha'i e hemapai g Tutuligo k am chum Jiosh tahgio a'ai si e ahgith mat pi ha'ichu wo hug k ho'ip mua g Paul.
Kush i ba'iwechkim gi'ikko wehst-mahm ihtham matsh hab masma e ap'ech.
Tsh am hahawa hihi ha wui g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged ch hab kaij, “Matt am Jiosh tahgio a'ai si t-ahgi matt pi ha'ichu wo hug k ho'ip mua hegai Paul.

Kumt ahpim g e jehnigiththam ha wehm am wo ahgi g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat ab wo i bek g Paul em-wui. Kumt hab wo e wuath mam ba'ich ha'ichu s-mahchimk ab amjed. Kutt ahchim wo t-nahtokchith matt wo mua mat koi ia hu wo jiwia em-wui.”
Tsh wabshaba g Paul cheoj ma'i am i kah ihtha k am him k am i wah shonthal ha-kih ed k am ahgith g Paul.
Tsh heg am hema wai g shonthal ha-ge'ejig k hab kaij ab wui, “Am g beh'i ihtha wechij o'othham am si uhgchu shonthal ha-ge'ejig wui, matsh wo ha'ichu ahgi.”
Tsh wa woho am i bei wui k hab kaij, “Ihtha wechij o'othham at ia jiwia k am nei hegai Paul mo ia e kuhpch. T heg am ni-waith k hab ni-ahg mant ab wo i bei m-wui matsh wo ha'ichu m-ahgi.”
Tsh g si uhgchu ha-ge'ejig ab bei nowij an k gm hu hekelko i wanimed k ab kakke, “Shahchu apt wo ni-ahgi?”
K hab kaij, “Ni-wehm o'othham at am i e ap'ech matsh si'alim ab wo m-tai mamt am wo i bei g Paul e jehnigiththam ha wui hab wabsh s-e junimk mat am ba'ich ha'ichu wo i s-mai ab amjed.

Pt wabshaba pi ab hu wo ha kaiha. Gi'ikko wehst-mahm i ba'iwechkim chechoj atsh am wo e e'estok ch wo kihshath nat pi am chum Jiosh tahgio a'ai si e ahgi matsh pi ha'ichu wo hug k ho'ip mua g Paul. K hemuch e nahtokch mat am hab wo e juh ch wabsh nenida mapt has wo e juh.”
Sh hab kaij g si ha-uhgchuga, “Pi g am hedai sha'i ahgith hegai mapt haschu ia ni-ahgi.” Tsh gm hu hahawa hih g Paul ma'i.

Tsh g si uhgchu shonthal ha-ge'ejig gohk am ha wai g ha-ge'ege'ejig k hab kaij, “Am g wo ha'i i ha gawulkath gohk siant shonthal ch wewa'akko wehst-mahm ehp mo g kakawyu ha chehchej ch gohk siant ehp mo s-e mahch ab is-pahyo t ab. Kut hegam wo e nahtok ch wo hihi mat d wo i humukt ohlak chuhug am Cesaria kihhim wui.
Kumt am ha'i wo i ha ap'ech g kakawyu mat g Paul wo hekaj. Mt am s-ap wo i be k am wo u'apa heg wui ge'e kownal mo d Felix.”
Neh, bash kaij ch am hahawa o'ohani hegai uhgchu kownal ihtha:
“Ab g i s-ni-ho'ige'ith ahpi uhgchu ni-kownalig Felix. Am ant wo m-o'ohani ahni mani d Claudius Lysius

nat pi g ge'e ha'ichu has e juh. Tutuligo at am wabsh hema si be k chum alo mua. Kunt s-mai mo ihtha ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am kihkam. Kutt hekaj g ni-shonthalig ha wehm am tho'ibia.
Nt amjed am i bei Tutuligo e jehnigiththam ha wui s-mahchimk hegai mam haschu ab abchuth.
Kuki wabshaba pi am hu d shai hegai mas hekaj wo e muhkith o wo e kuhpach. Heg amki ab wa'i abchuth mat g hejel ha-chehanig melchkwua.

Sh am hahawa ha'i e nakog ihtham Tutuligo matsh wo mua. Kunt am ha hekaj ha cheha g ni-shonthalig mat ab m-wui wo bei. Kuni hab ha ahg hegam mo ab ha'ichu abchuth mat ahpi m-wui wo gagda. Neh, ith o wud wa'i.”
Tsh am hab e juh g shonthal hegai mam haschu ab i ha chehani k am i bei g Paul chuhug ch ed k am u'apa Antipatris kihhim t am.
Sh am ba'ich d i tash, tsh hegam shonthal mo wabsh e-tahtadkaj hihim gm hu uhpam hihi Jerusalem wui.
Tsh hegam mo shoshoigakch am i bei Cesaria wui k am thatha k am i mah g kownal g o'ohana k ab wui hahawa i thagito g Paul.
Tsh g kownal am ne'okchul hegai o'ohana k ab kakke g Paul mas haschu jewed amjed. Sh heg am ahgith mo ab Cilicia jewed amjed.
Sh hab kaij ab wui, “M ant wo wa m-nei mat hekith wo thatha hegam mo ab ha'ichu m-abchuth.” Sh g shonthaligaj am hahawa nuhkuth kownal kih ed.

K am d i hetasp tash, t am hih hegai si uhgchu pahl mo hab chehgig Ananias. T g Tutuligo ha-ge'egedga am ha'i oi. T heg ep ha oi mo d chehanig ab s-chu amichuththam ch hab chehgig Tertullus. T wehs ihtham am i thatha kownal wui k am gagda g Paul.

T am wai g Paul. T ihtha s-chu amichuththam am hahawa i ahgahi hegai mam haschu ab abchuth g Paul hab kaijch: “Uhgchu kownal Felix, si ap s-e mahch ch t-wanimed ch mu'i ha'ichu am hab junihim mo d t-ap'ethag iia t-jewedga ed. Kuch heg hekaj s-thotholim kihthag
ch si s-ap t-tahtk chum hekith ch wabsh chum hebai ch ab si s-m-ho'ige'elith.
Kuni hi wa chum pi hohho'ith mant tash an wo m-u'ukch ch hekaj ab si i m-tahni mapt ab wo si s-t-ho'ige'elith k am he'es wo i kaiha ihtha al shopol ha'ichu t-ahga.

“Am att cheh ihtha o'othham. Kuki wa wehsko sha'i si ha kudut g t-wehm o'othham ch am i ha chu'amun mat wo cheggia g kownal ch pi apko ha wanimed mat ab wo i hema s-wohoch mo pi d wohokam ch ab Nazareth t amjed.
Kutt am cheh mat ep chum uamhu g ge'e cheopi ab Jerusalem t ab. Kutt hekaj an bei matt wo lothai g t-chehanigkaj.
T wabshaba g shonthal ha-ge'ejig Lysias am i wahk k si s-bagam am t-wohppo'ith
k ha cheha mat ia ha'ab wo i e bei m-wui. Kutsh hegam mo ab ha'ichu abchuth ab m-wui wo gagda. Pt hems ab wo ha'ichu kakke ihtha o'othham k wo s-mai ab amjed wehs ha'ichu mach haschu ab i abchuth.”
Neh, bo kaij. T wehsijj am wohokamch hegam Tutuligo mat am e nam.
T ab i ai g Paul. T g kownal ab ahgi mat am wo neo. K hab kaij: “Tash ap ia d kownal ch ha lothait g t-wehm o'othham. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk mant am wo hejel ni-wehhejed neo m-tahgio.
M apt wo i hoan k wo wohokamch mo pi woho g ha'ichu ha-ahga ihtham. “Tho wabsh i gamai gohk tash mant am hih Jerusalem wui hab ahgk mant ab wo ihm g Jiosh.
Kunt pi woho sha'i hedai kam'o am ge'e cheopi ch ed k pi woho sha'i am ha kudu g hemajkam amai o hebai i am Jerusalem ch ed.
Pi at wo sha'i e nako mas wo wohokamch hegai mo haschu ab i ni-abchuth no pi pi woho.

“M o hi wa woho mani ab ihm g Jiosh am oithch ihtha himthag mo ihtham hab elith mo pi d wohokam. K eda d wa'i Jiosh mani ab ihm ch d ha-Jioshga g t-shohshon. Kuni wehs ab s-wohog elith g t-chehanig ch hegai mat g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha.
Ni-wehm o'othham o s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh ab wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i muhkig t amjed k ab wo i ha gawulkai g s-ap'ekam k gm hu wo i ha gawulkai g pi ap'ekam. Ni ahni hab wa'ap s-wohochuth ihtha
ch hekaj chum hekith am si ni-nakog mant am hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo sha'i ha'ichukaj si ni-el am tahgio g Jiosh ch am ha tahgio g hemajkam.

“Tash ani gm hu oimmed am ha oithk g gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi ab hu ha'ichug Jerusalem t ab. T hegam gawul mahs hemajkam ab i to'ahi g lial k am ni-nuhkuthach mant am wo i ha u'i g ni-wehm o'othham ab Jerusalem t ab. Nt heg ab ha mah am jiwiak k am hahawa i ni-thagito Jiosh wui k ab ihm ch am hab wua g iagchulitha ge'e cheopi ch ed.
K pi sha'i mu'i ni-wehmaj. Kuni pi d sha'i ahni manis am i shonwua g kudutadag.
K wabshaba d hegam mat am ni-chehg k am i shonwua g kudutadag k d ni-wehm o'othham ch ab thatha Asia jewed t amjed. T ia wo chum u'apa m-wui hegai mo haschu ab ni-abchuth k wabshaba pi ia hu thatha.
T ihtham m ia gegok am wo chum ah matp woho cheh g pi ap chu'ichig ab ni-ab mant wa am i kekiwua ha wui g e jehnigiththam.
Ahni ant wo em-ahgi mani wa hab kaij, ‘Ia am ni-lothait ith i tashkaj heg hekaj mani ab s-wohochuth mat g ko'i uhpam wo i wuwha ab muhkig amjed.’ Na'as ith pi hohho'ith.” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.

Felix o si s-ap s-mahch ihtha Jesus himthag. Kut am i ha'asa neo g Paul. T g Felix am i kuhgi g ha'ichu kaihama hab kaijch, “M ant wo wa i apch ihtha mat hekith wo i jiwia g Lysias ab Jerusalem t amjed.”
Neh, bo kaij ch am hahawa cheha g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat am wabsh wo i u'ukchith g Paul ch wabshaba hi wo wa hiwgithath matp hems am wo neithath g naipijjuj ch am wo ha'ichukaj i wehmtath.

K g felix wehm kihkam d Tuhligo ch hab chehgig Drusilla. Sh ihtham ab s-kaimk g Paul. Tsh g Felix am ha cheha mamt am wo i wahki g Paul. Sh heg am ha ahgith am jiwiak mamt ab wo i chum s-wohoch g Jesus Christ. Sh am hugkam wabsh s-ap kaiham ihtham.

Sh am hahawa i ha ahgithahim mat am wo i e thagito s-ap'ekam wui k pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam no pi e aihim mat g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha gawulkai g pi ap'ekam hemajkam. Tsh g Felix si s-ehbenith k hab kaij, “Oi g gm hu hihm. M ant wo wa ep i m-wai mat hekith am wo s-ni-ap'ek.”
K eda hab chum em-ahg mat g Paul wo ha'i namkith g lial mat wo thagito ch heg hekaj mu'ikko ab i wappaith mat am wo wehmaj neo.

Kut am i e ba'iwich g gohk ahithag. T am hema ep thahiwua g kownal Felix kehkud ed k hab chehgig Porcius Festus. T wa eda g Felix pi sha'i thagito g Paul no pi si tatchua mat si s-ap ab wo i nei g Tutuligo.
Sh am d i waik tash amjed mat am i thahiwua g Festus Cesaria t am, tsh gm hu hih Jerusalem wui.

Tsh ab wui i hihi g u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged hemajkam k am ahgith hegai mo haschu ab i chum abchuth g Paul ch ab si tahni mat ab wo i bei Jerusalem wui. Kush eda ihtham am heki hu e a'aga mat wo mua g Paul mat ab wo u'ath.
Sh hab kaij g Festus, “Am o d wabsh kia lihso Cesaria t am. Nt eda hemuch am uhpam wo hih.
Kumt am ha'i wo ni-oith k am wo ah mam haschu ab abchuth.”

K am thakahim g Festus am hu i hemako thomig k gm hu hahawa hih Cesaria wui. T hegam ge'eged hemajkam gm hu ep hihi. Ba'ich i tash at am i thahiwua g Festus lothaita kih ch ed k am ha chehani mat am wo i wahki g Paul.
T am i wahki. T an wehgaj gegokiwua k ab ha hekaj si pi ap ha'ichu abchuth ch wabshaba pi e nako mas wo wohokamch ihtha.
T g Paul am e wehhejed neok k hab kaij, “Pi ant ha'ichu sha'i pi ap hab juh manis melchkwua g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo k pi sha'i uamhu g ge'e cheopi k pi ab hu sha'i wui kehk g kownal.”
K hab kaij g Festus ab wui, “Pt hig am wo hih Jerusalem wui mant am ha'ab wo m-lothai.” Bo kaij no pi hab elith mat wo s-hohho'i g Tutuligo.
K hab kaij g Paul, “Ia ani kehk kownal lothaita kih ed mant ia ha'ab wo chum ni-lothaitach. Am ap wa si s-mahch mant pi ha'ichu am hu hab sha'i juh mas pi ap'e am ha wui g ni-wehm o'othham.

Pi ant ab hu wo em-tai mams wabsh wo ni-thagito matp hab wo sha mahsk mant mul g chehanig. M o wa s-ap'e mamt wabsh wo ni-muhkith mantp am hugkam mul. K wabshaba pi woho hegai mo ab ni-abchuth. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo i ni-thagito ha wui. Ab ant wui wo i gei g si uhgchu kownal.” Neh, bo kaij g Paul.
K eda am thadha hegam mo am ha'ichu i shelamith ch am a'aga ihtha. K g Festus ab ha kahk ch hab hahawa kaij ab Paul wui, “Neh, pt hemho wa am wo e u'apa si uhgchu kownal wui napt pi ab wui i gei.”
K am hu hebai hema d kownal ch hab chehgig Agrippa. Sh g uwi wehngaj hab chehgig Bernice. Tsh ihtham am chehgio g Festus noki pi s-ap ab i neith.
Sh am he'ekia i tash amjed, sh am ha ahgith g Festus ab amjed g Paul ch hab kaij, “Ia o hema kuhpi g o'othham ch hab chehgig Paul. T g Felix pi i wuhshath.
Kunt wa am hih Jerusalem wui k am ha nei g Tutuligo u'ugchu papal ch ge'eged. K hegam ab ha'ichu abchuth ihtha lihso ch ab ni-chehani mant wo mua.

Ni wabshaba am ha ahgith mo pi hab mahs g t-kownalig chehanig. T hemho wa wehpeg am wo i e hudaw g lihso ha wehm hegam mo ab ha'ichu abchuth k am wo neo e wehhejed. T g kownal ab haha wo mah g namkithadgaj.
“T wa woho i thatha hegam Tutuligo ha wanimedtham. Nt am ha hekaj thahiwua kownal thaikud ed mant wo ha kaiha. Kumt ab i wahki g lihso.
T am gegokiwua hegam mo ab ha'ichu chum abchuth. Kuni hab ni-ahg matp hems ge'e ha'ichu ab wo abch ab t-chehanig amjed.
K wabshaba ab wabsh e-himthag amjed ab ha'ichu ne'owin ch heg amjed ehp o'othham mash hab chehgig Jesus ch atsh heki hu muh. K eda g Paul hab kaij mat uhpam e chegito.
“Nt am wabsh i pi ni-amich mant has masma si tasho ha'ichu wo s-mai ab amjed k heg hekaj ab kakke g Paul mas wo s-hohho'i mat am uhpam wo hih Jerusalem wui k ab ha'ab wo e lothaitach.

K wabshaba ab t-ahgith g Paul mat ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui mat heg am wo mamche hegai mo haschu ab i abchuth. Nt wa woho am ha cheha g shonthal mat wo si nuhkuth k ab wo ai mat am wo e u'apa si ge'e kownal wui.”
Kush hab kaij g Agrippa am Festus wui, “Ahni ani hab wa'ap chum s-kaimk ihtha o'othham.” Sh hab kaij g Festus, “Pt wo wa kah si'alim.”

K am ba'ich d i tash, t hab masma i ha wahpki g Festus mo d si s-has haha'ichu ihtham Agrippa ch Bernice. K hegam ep ha wehmaj mo d si u'ugchu shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch hegam mo d si s-has haha'ichu heg eda kihhim. Kumt am i wahki g Paul.

K g Festus hab hahawa kaij: “Ahpi Agrippa map d kownal ch ahpim s-has haha'ichu o'othham, m ia kehk em-wui ihtha o'othham. K g Tutuligo iia kch ab Jerusalem t ab ab ha'ichu abchuth ab ni-wui ch am si e gewpkath mat hemho wa wo e mua.
Nt wabshaba pi sha'i cheh g chu'ichigaj mas heg hekaj wo e muhkith. “K heg wa hejel hab kaij mat ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui. T hekaj hemho wa am hab wo e juh.

Ni wabshaba pi ni-amichuth mant haschu am wo o'ohani g si ge'e kownal ab amjed. K pi hab chum mahs mas am wo e u'apa g lihso pi am hu tasho ahgk mas haschu d chu'ichigaj. Nt heg hekaj ia u'apa em-wui mamt am wo i kaiha, wahm ahpi Agrippa map d kownal. Ntp hems haha wo s-mai ab em-amjed mant haschu am wo o'oha.”
K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Paul, “B ant m-mah g ap'ethag mapt am hejel e wehhejed wo neo.” T ab ha ba'ich i kekiwua g Paul k am e wehhejed neok

k hab kaij: “Agrippa map d kownal, ahpi ap s-mahch g t-himthag ch ha'ichu pi t-ap'ethag ahchim Tutuligo. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk mant ab m-wui wo neo ith i tashkaj ab amjed hegai mo haschu ab chum ni-abchuth g ni-wehm o'othham. Kuni ab i m-kakke mapt ab wo si i ni-kaiham k ab wabsh wo i ni-bahbgi.
“S-mahch o g ni-wehm o'othham mani has i masma ga hu i amjed mani d wabsh kia si ali nani pi wa eda am wabsh i kih ni-jewedga ed ab Jerusalem t ab.
Thani Palasi wohochuththam. K g ni-wehm o'othham s-mahch mani am si s-gewkam oith g t-himthag.
Ia ani kehk ch wo ni-lothai nani pi ab s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh woho hab wo juh hegai mat haschu am ha ahgi g t-shohshonbad.
Bo ha ahg mat uhpam wo i ha wuwhas g ko'i ab muhkig t amjed. Ith o chum s-wohochuth g ni-wehm o'othham ch eda s-ni-lothaitamk nani pi s-wohochuth mat hab i juh.
“Bani wa wa elith mant am wo si i ni-nakog k wo shohbi g himthaj hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed.

Ni wa wa woho am hab chum ni-junihim amai Jerusalem t am. T wa g u'ugchu papal ab i ni-mah g ni-ap'ethag. Kunid mu'i ha kuh hegam mo ab s-wohochuth hegai himthag k ha wehm ap'ech g e jehnigiththam mamt wo ha koktha.

Kunt wa mu'ikko am ap'ech mamt wo ha sho'igch an i a'ai ha-chechopi ed k am chum ha chehani mat hab wo chei mo pi ap'e hegai Jesus. Kunid wa sha'i si s-ha keh'ith ch am i ni-nako mant am i wah gawul jewed kihhim ch ed mant wo ha sho'igch amai.
“Kunid wa ab si ha tai g u'ugchu papal g ni-ap'ethag k am hih Damascus wui heg wa si hekaj mant wo ha kuh hegam mo s-wohochuth mo hegai Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha.
“Pegih neh, ahpi si s-has ha'ichu, am achd hihim wohg ch ed am hu i thahm juhk. Kud am hab e juh mat am ba'ich i s-mahs ton mo g tash tonlig an t-wehgaj.
Kutt wehsijj i shul am jewedo. “Kunid ahni kah mad ab hema neok ni-wui g ni-ne'okikaj ch hab kaij, ‘Saul, s-wohom ap hig chum ni-sho'igchuth ch wabshaba hejel s-ko'okam has e wua.’
“Kunid si has elith ch hab kaij, ‘Thohp wud ch ab neok?’ “Kud hab hahawa ep kaij, ‘Thani ahni Jesus map ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab si ni-ihm.

Ab g i wamig k kekiwua. Ia ant i ni-chehgi m-wui mant am wo i m-kei mapt d wo ni-pionagk. Kupt am wo ha ahgi g hemajkam ihtha map neith ch kah. Kunt am ha'ichu ep wo m-chehgi imhab i ba'ich. Pt heg am ep wo ha ahgi.
Nt wo m-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g m-wehm o'othham. Kupt am wo ahgahith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. Nt am ep wo m-nuhkuth k wo m-tho'ibia ab ha amjed.

Kupt am wo i ha tashogi mo pi am hu ni-tatchui oithch hab e junihim ch am wabsh jiawul tatchui oithch hab e junihim. T ab wo m-kaiham k ab wo i e thagito ni-wui. Nt hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k hab wo ha juh mat d wo ni-hemajkamgak.’ Neh, bo kaij g Jesus ab ni-wui.
“Pegih neh, Agrippa map d kownal, bad wa masma am i e chehgi ni-wui hegai mo d si ge'e kownal am wehs ha'ichu thahm k hab wa masma ni-cheha. Kunt ahni ab wohog elith

k am ha hekaj i ahgahi Damascus t am g ha'ichu ahgaj k amjed am ahgahi Jerusalem t am ch wehsko Judea chekshani ch ed. K am hahawa ni-tashogith g Jiosh mant am ha wui wo hih g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Ni am mu'ikpa ha ahgithahim mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui k amjed hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
Neh, k d ihtha mad heg hekaj an ni-bei g ni-wehm o'othham am ge'e cheopi ch ed k chum alo ni-mua.

K wabshaba ia'i himtham g Jiosh am ni-wehmaj ch ni-nuhkuth. Ni heg hekaj ia kehk ch am si tasho em-ahgith ahpim mam d s-has haha'ichu mani haschu am ep ha ahgith g sho'ig hemajkam. K ihtha ha'ichu ni-ahga d wa'i hegai mo haschu g Mosesbad ch hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am heki hu ahgahim mat am hab wo e juh.

Sh ihtham am ahg matsh wa g Jiosh si Kehsha wo e sho'igchuth k wo e muhkith k uhpam wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed k ith hekaj wo kuhpi'o g tho'ibiathag am ha wehhejed g Tutuligo ch nahnko mahs hemajkam.”
Neh, bo wa masma hejel e wehhejed neok g Paul. K g Festus ab si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ahpi aptki wabsh e lohgoch, Paul. Ha'ichu m-mahchig atki wabsh m-lohgoch.”
K hab kaij g Paul, “Pi ant sha'i ni-lohgoch, si s-has ha'ichu Festus. Hegai mani haschu hab ahg d si wohokam
ch am wabsh si tasho hab e junihim t-shahgith. K g Agrippa wehs s-mahch.
Agrippa map d kownal, m ap wa s-ha wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Paul, “Nap hab elith mapt ha hekaj wabsh s-pehegi wo i ni-nodagi ith wui Jesus himthag?”

K g Paul hab kaij, “Chum anis ha hekaj o gm hu ba'ich. K wabshaba g ni-ho'ige'ithahuna am Jiosh wui d ihtha mamt wehsijj ahpim mam am ni-kaiham ith tashkaj hems ab wo s-wohochuth k hab wo chu'igk mani ahni ch wabsh hi wo wa pi e wupulshch g e hukshchim wainomikaj.”
T am hahawa wehs i gegokiwua
k ab a'ai e wui hab kaij am hihimathch, “Pi atki ha'ichu has sha'i juh ihtha o'othham mat hekaj wo e muhkith o mas wo e kuhpach.”
K hab kaij g Agrippa ab wui g Festus, “T wo wa chum e thagito ihtha mat hems pi ab hu wo e ah mat ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui.”
Mt am hahawa thagito g Paul ch ha'i ep lilso shonthal ha-ge'ejig wui mat am wo i ha ui ge'echu kownal wui. Ith o hab chehgig Julius ch d ha-ge'ejig hegam mo hab e a'aga Ge'echu Kownal Shonthalig.

K am hema thaha g ge'e wahlko ch atsh am gahi wo i wua Asia jewed wui. T g Julius g e-shonthalig ha wehm am ha ui g lilso k am i chehchsh heg ab wahlko. Nt ahni Luke ep ha oi. T heg ha oi Aristarcas mo ab d kihkam Thessalonica t ab am Macedonia jewed ch ed. Kutt am gahi i shul g ge shuhthagi.
Am ba'ich i tash, tt am thatha Sidon kihhim t am. K eda g Julius s-ho'ige'ith g Paul ch hiwigi mat am wo him k wo ha nei g e-naipijju mat hegam wo thagio'i.
Tt amjed am hahawa gahi ep i shul. K wabshaba g hewel ab si s-gewkam med huduni tahgio t amjed ab t-wui. Tt hekaj an bihbij Cyprus jewed wehgaj mat pi wo heb hu t-wi'ichkwua.
T am hebai i cheka. Tt am gahi i shul hegai ge shuhthagi mo an miabithch g Cilicia jewed ch Pamphylia jewed k ga hu thatha mash ab d Myra kihhim am Lycia jewed ch ed.
T amai g shonthal ha-ge'ejig am hema ep cheh g ge'e wahlko. Ith ash ab Alexandria t amjed am Egypt jewed ch ed ch atsh gm hu wo gahi i gei Italy jewed wui. Kutt heg ab i chehchsh

k am gahi i shul. K wabshaba ab t-wui hewed he'ekia i tash. K hekaj wabsh s-bahbagi him g wahlko ch am hu wa has masma ga hu jiwia Nidas kihhim t ab. T ab i t-shohbi g hewel. Kutt hekaj inhab sha'al i t-nohnogi wakolim tahgio ab wui hegai al jewed mo hab chehgig Crete. K an s-mu'ukam i koa g jewed. K hab e a'aga Salmon Koa.
Kutt heg hugith an bihbij k am hu wa has masma ga hu thatha mash hebai s-ap thadhaiwup g wapalko. K ia amjed pi sha'i mehk hegai kihhim mo d Lasia.
Kuttki pi oi ba'ich hihim k ab wabsh ai mat wo si hewedath s-hehpich'ed. T hekaj wo s-ta ehbithamak matt am gahi wo i shul. K g Paul am ha'ichu chum ha ahgith
ch hab kaij, “Neh'e! Bani masma neith matki wo s-ta ehbithamak matt am gahi wo i shul ia'i amjed. T am hu wo e padch g wahlko ch hegai mo mohto. Kuttp hems ep wo ha'i t-ko'ij.”
T wabshaba g shonthal ha-ge'ejig ab si s-ha wohoch g wahlko nuhkuththam ch enigakam k pi ab hu kaiha g Paul mo ab chum ha ahgith.

Pi o apkothag amai ha wehhejed g wapalko s-hehpich'ed. K heg hekaj mu'ijj hab kaij matt am gahi wo i shulig k wo chum si s-ahim g Phoenix kihhim am Crete t am. Am o e shohbithch g shuhthagi to'otonk. K g wapalko am wabsh s-ap thadhaiwup.

Kut ab s-bahbagi i meh g hewel wakolim tahgio amjed. K hab e ahg hegam mo himchuth g wahlko mat am hab wo e juh mat has masma am e a'aga ch heg hekaj am wupulshpi'o g wahlko k am himch si miabithch g jewed hugithag.
T wabshaba ab haha wabsh s-gewkam i meh g juhpin hewel ab jewed thahm amjed
k ab si s-ta ehbitham wi'ichkwua g t-wahlko. Kut am i pi e nako mas wo mo'oshk himch g wahlko ihtha hewel. Kutt am wabsh i thagito k wabsh hiwigi g hewel mat am i t-wi'ichkwuhi.
K am hema al jewedag ch hab chehgig Cauda. K hi wa sha e shohbith matt an wecho bihbij. K eda am wabsh kia e chewaimed g al chum wahlko shuhthagi ch ed. Kutt am hahawa s-hasigam i cheshaj.

T g chikpantham an hahawa si s-wihnam wupulsh g ge'e wahlko mat pi wo e padch. Am attp hems wo t-wi'ichkwua jewed wui. T g wahlko am hu wo e hiash hia ch ed. T heg hekaj g chikpantham ab i huhuds hegai lohna mo hekaj himchuth g wahlko k wabsh hiwigi mat g hewel am i t-wi'ichkwuhi.
T ihtha sha'i si s-gewk hewel pi sha'i ha'asa. K am ba'ich d i tash. T gm hu i shul hegai mo mohto g ge'e wahlko.
K am ba'ich d ep i tash. K am wabsh kia si hewed. T gm hu i nehnch g hejel e-nohnhoikaj hegai mo haschukaj chum himchuth g ge'e wahlko mat wo si i haukai.
Kutt mu'i tashkaj pi sha'i nei g tash tonlig o g huhu'u. K am wabsh i med g s-gewk hewel. Tt am hu hebai hab haha wabsh i t-ah mattki pi wo sha'i t-tho'ibia.

Kuch tash pi ha'ichu sha'i ko'a. T g Paul ab i ha waith k hab kaij, “Mamt hems ab wo ni-kaiha, kutt pi ab hu wo chum gahi i shul ab amjed matt wa ab thadhaiwua. Neh, t ithani chum pi wo e padch g wahlko. T g ha'ichu mohtoi pi wo heb hu e shul.
Mt wabshaba pi has wo sha'i e tahtkkath. Pi amt hedai wo sha'i e muhkith. Heg at wa'i wahlko wo e padch.
Ith ani s-mahch nat pi hema am i e chehgi g anghil ni-wui
k hab kaij, ‘Pi g sha'i ha'ichu ehbithath, Paul. Hemho wa apt am wo kekiwua si ge'e kownal wui. T g Jiosh ab i m-kaiham k wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mo m-wehmaj.’ Neh, bo kaij g anghil ab ni-wui.
“Kumt am wo si i e gewpkai. Jiosh at woho hab wo juh hegai mo haschu am ni-ahgith g anghil
k ab wo t-u'apa g hewelkaj mo ab hebai al jewedag shuhthagi ch ed.”
Am d i gohk thomig amjed mat am t-ai g s-gewk hewel, t eda i e huh g s-chuhugam. K am wabsh kia t-wi'ichkwuhim. K hegam wahlko nuhkuththam hab elith mach aihim mash ab hebai jewedag

ch heg hekaj am ha'ichu s-wehch i huduni g wijinakaj an wudk mat heg hekaj wo s-mai mas he'es i s-juhk. T gd hu si taht g jewed mat siant gokko wehst-mahm (120) tad wijina hekaj. Kut ab i wanchkwua ihtha s-wehch ha'ichu. K am sha'i he'es, t am ep i huduni. T gd hu ep si taht g jewed mat humukto wehst-mahm (90) tad wijina hekaj.

T am i s-mai moki ab aihim mo ab hema jewedag k s-ehbith mat am hu ab wo gei hohothai ch ed g wahlko. T hekaj gi'ik am shul g s-wehch wapainomi mo hekaj wulshshap g ge'e wahlko k am hahawa si e ho'ige'ithahu mat wo mahsij.
K ha'i hejel s-e tho'ibiamk g wahlko nuhkuththam ch am i huduni g al chum wahlko shuhthagi ch ed hab wabsh s-e junimk mat am ha'i ep wo i huhuds g wupulshpadaj g wahlko.
K wabshaba g Paul hab kaij ab wui g shonthal ha-ge'ejig ch hegam shonthal, “Pi amt wo sha'i e tho'ibia matp wo sha t-thagito ihtham wahlko nuhkuththam.”
T hekaj g shonthal an si hikkumia g wipijina mo an hekaj wulshch g al chum wahlko. T gd hu gei shuhthagi ch ed.
Kuki eda mahsihim. K g Paul am ha chehani mat wo ha'ichu huh hab kaijch, “Tho wa'i gohk thomig mamt amjed pi ha'ichu huh nam pi e kudut ith hekaj pi t-ap'ethag.
Mt ab hig wo ha'ichu hug k ab wo i e gewpkai. Hemho wa amt wehsijj wo e tho'ibia.”
Neh, bat che'iok am ha hekaj bei g pahn k ab si ihm g Jiosh wehs ha wehhejed k am hahawa i hahain k huh.
T wehsijj am i neithok ab si i e gewkemhun k am hahawa ha'ichu huh.
Kuch eda d gohk siant wewa'akko gamai chuhthp (276).
Tt am i wehsijj kokwoth. Kut am hahawa ep i chikpan k gm hu shul g pilkani ge shuhthagi ch ed mat wo si i haukai g ge'e wahlko.

T am i mahsi, t g wahlko nuhkuththam pi sha'i amich hegai jewed mattki ab wui i wuwha. K eda am s-tadaniko i wahks g shuhthagi ch pi hohothaig an hugidaj an. T hab i e ah mat am wo himch g wahlko. Tp hems ab s-ap wo thahiwua heg eda.

T hekaj am si hikkumia g wupulshpadaj. T im hu shul shuhthagi ch ed. K eda an wupulshch hegai mo hekaj s-apko e himchuth g wahlko. Kumt gam si wuhpul'o k am hahawa wabsh i cheshaj hegai lohna mo gm hu ba'ich hab chu'ig. T g hewel am t-wi'ichkwua am wui mo am i wahks g shuhthagi.
T wabshaba gd hu si e hiash g wahlko mo'o o'od ch ed mat koi am hu i wah. K eda sha'i si s-gewkam ab i hihhim g shuhthagi to'otonk. Kut hegai mo gm hu oithch hab chu'ig gam si e ohmi.
T g shonthal am i e ap'ech mat wehs wo ha koktha g lilso mat pi wo i e watchwihim k wo heb hu wohp.

T wabshaba pi ha hiwigi g ha-ge'ejig nat pi s-tho'ibiam g Paul k am wehsijj ha chehani mat wo i e watchwihi am jewed koa wui. Tsh hegam mo s-mahch g watchwi am wo i nehni k hehe'ejel wo i e watchwihi.
T heg ha'i am wo i ha oi an e u'ukch u'us t an mat ab e ohmi g wahlko. Kutt hab masma wehsijj t-tho'ibia ga hu ak mo ab i koa g jewed.
Kuki am ha'i d o'othham ch si s-ap i e taht k ab i t-neith k si s-t-nawojima. Kutt s-mai mash ihtha al jewed d Malta. K eda juhk ch s-hehpith. Kutki am ge t-nahj.
T g Paul am ha'i ku'a mat am wo si i mehmeth g nahtha k am toa mei ch ed. T g ko'oi ab hema si i tha'iwush tonithk k an ki'ish nowij an.

T g kihkam am i nei ihtha ko'oi mo an ki'ishch g Paul k hab kaij ab a'ai e wui, “Ith oki d ha mu'akam ch hi wa chum pi e muhkith am shuhthagi ch ed. Kuki am hab wa mahs matki hemho wa wo e muhkith k ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.”
K wabshaba g Paul am si e nowigith ch gm hu wua g ko'oi mei ch ed k pi sha'i ko'okam e juh.

K ihtham kihkam am chum neith mat wo i tosko o wabsh chum hekith wo muhk k i gei. T wabshaba gm hu wabsh i mehko. T oi wa pi ha'ichu has sha'i juh g Paul. T am hahawa gawul ep i e ah k hab kaij moki d jiosh.
Ha-ge'ejig ihtham hemajkam o hab chehgig Publius ch am wa'i mia oithag. Kuch am wehmaj thadkkahim waik tash nat pi si s-ap ab i t-nei.
Kuki g ohgaj wo'ok ch mumku g s-tonjigkaj ch wakuithagkaj. T g Paul am i wah mo am wo'o k an tahtam k am i tai g Jiosh mat wo thoaj. T wa woho hab e juh mat thoaj.
T am i nei ihtha g hemajkam. T am hahawa mu'i ep thatha g kok'otham k e thothaj.
T hekaj ab si has i t-elith k sha'i mu'i ha'ichu t-mah. Am hu i hebai mat am i e ai matt wo hihi, t ab ep i t-mah hegai matt haschu wo i tatchuath am gahi ep i shuligk.
T eda hema wuhshath g s-hehpich'ed g ge'e wahlko ch hab e a'aga Kukathi Jijosh ch ab Alexandria t amjed. Am d i waik mashath, tt heg ab gm hu gahi i shul juhpin tahgio wui
k ga hu thatha mo am d Syracuse kihhim. Am d i waik tash,

tt gm hu gahi ep i shul juhpin tahgio wui k ga hu thatha mo am d Regium kihhim. Am ba'ich d i tash, t ab i meh g hewel wakolim tahgio amjed. Tt hekaj s-hohtam gm hu thatha mo d i gohk tash mash am d Putoli kihhim am gahi i shuligk.
Kuki am ha'i kih g t-wehm wohochuththam ch ab si t-ahgith mattsh am wo ha wehmajkahim hemako thomig ab. Kutt wa woho hab t-juh k gm hu hahawa hihi Rome wui.

Kutsh wa heki hu am kah hegam t-wehm wohochuththam ab Rome t ab mattsh am wo thatha k atki mehk ab i hihi mat wo t-ho'ige'el. Kut ha'i ihtham am t-nam mo am d Waik Gegosithakud. T ha'i am ep t-nam mo am d Appius Nolawtakud. Kut ab i ha nei g Paul k ab ihm g Jiosh k ab si e gewkai.
Kutt am thatha Rome t am. Kumt wabsh hiwigi g Paul mat wabsh hejelko wo i chiwia. K g shonthal am hi wa nuhkuth.

Mu'i o am kih g Tutuligo. K am d i waik tash. T g Paul am i ha wai g ha-ge'egedga e-kih wui. T am i e nam. K hab kaij ab ha wui: “Ni-hajuni, am amt ni-lihsoch Jerusalem t am k ab i ni-thagito Rome chehanig wui. K eda hab wa chum mahs mant pi has chu'i ab ha wui t-hajuni o g t-himthag.
T hegam Rome t ab haha'ichu ab ha'ichu ni-kakke k chum s-ni-thagitoimk nat pi pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh manis heg hekaj wo ni-muhkith.

T wabshaba g t-wehm o'othham ab wui gegokiwua ihtha. Kunt hekaj hab i ni-ah mantki hemho wa ab wo i gei si ge'e kownal wui mo hi wa chum pi am hu ha'ichu d hegai manis ab wo ha abch g t-wehm o'othham.

Ab ani hiwig hegai Jiosh si Kehsha mach wehsijj nenida ahchim Tutuligo. Ni hab elith mo hema d hegai ch heki hu am i wuhsh. K eda mu'ijj g t-wehm o'othham pi wohochuth mo d hegai ch hab s-ni-keh'ith. Nt heg hekaj ab i em-wai mant em-wehm wo a'agath.”
K hab kaij ab wui, “Pi at ab hu hedai sha'i t-o'ohani hegam ge'eged o'othham ab Judea t ab ab m-amjed. T pi hedai ia hu sha'i jiwia g t-hajuni ab amjed mas am hu i pi ap has m-ahg.
K eda wehsko g hemajkam mu'i pi ap has ahg ihtha himthag mapsh ahpi s-wohochuth. Kuch s-kaimk maps has wo chei ab amjed.”

Neh, bo kaij. T am hahawa a'aga k kei g tash mat wo e jehnigi. T am him k am i e ai g tash. T mu'i am thatha amai mo am thaha g Paul k am i e jehnigi ge tash oitham k gm hu si huduni. K g Paul am i ha tashogith g Jiosh kownaltalig ch am si s-gewkam ha jehnigith mo g Jesus d hegai si Kehshaj g Jiosh mat wa ab amjed an o'oha g Mosesbad ch hegam kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
T ha'i ab i s-wohoch ab kaiok. T wabshaba ha'ijj pi sha'i wohoch.
T am i pi sha'i e ap'et k hab e juh mat wo a'ai hihi. T hekaj ith hab ep chei g Paul, “Tho si wohokam mash wa has i kaij g Jiosh ab em-amjed ab Isaiabad wui. K an hab chu'ig Isaiabad o'ohana ed:
Am g hihm k am hab cheh'i ha wui ihtham hemajkam: Mt wo kah g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch wo neithath mani haschu s-kehg hab em-junith ch wabshaba pi wo amich mani d ahni ch hab wua ha'ichu.

Em-chegitoithag at i e mehkoth ab ni-amjed. Kum pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu ni-wui i e nohnogithamk mant wo i kegch g pi ap em-chegitoithag ch pi ap ha'ichu hab em-juni. Neh, bo masma an o'ohadag mo ith hab kaij g Jiosh.

“Pegih, mtki pi ab hu wo kaiha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mat wo em-tho'ibia. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab wo ha mah g gawul mahs hemajkam ihtha tho'ibiathag ahga mo ab chum s-em-mahkimk. T hegam ab hi wo kaiha.” [
T am i ha'asa hab chei ihtha g Paul. T gm hu a'ai hihi hegam mo ab kah si e ne'owinahimch.]
K am kihkahim g Paul gohk ahith ab hema kih ed mo namkith ch am kih. K g hemajkam am chechga.
K g Paul si s-ap e tahtk ch ab ha neith ch am wabsh si s-mahchim ha'ichu ha ahgith ab amjed g Jiosh kownaltalig ch ha mashcham ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. K pi hedai sha'i shohbith.
Am ant wo i em-o'ohani g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ahni Paul mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ. Jiosh at ab i ni-waith k am i ni-kei mant ith wo ahgachugath.
K d ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj matki g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha matsh wa g Jiosh ab wo i wuhshath.
K ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj am t-tashogith hegai mo d alithaj ch d ge'e t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ith atsh ia mahsi jewed thahm k ab d amjedkamaj g kownalibad David. K heg hekaj tasho mo woho d hemajkam.
Kutsh g Jiosh ab i wuhshath g Jesus Christ muhkig amjed am i thahm matsh e muhkith k hab masma ab t-chehgithch mo d alithaj ch d hekia s-ap'ekam

Kut wa ab si i s-ni-ho'ige'el g Jesus Christ k am i ni-kei am wehhejed g Jiosh mantsh am wo i ha ahgithahi g nahnko mahs hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Kutsh mu'ijj ab wo s-wohochuth k ab wo s-wohog elithath.

Ni am wa kah mamtsh ha'i ahpim Rome t am hemajkam ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh o ab si em-tatchua ch ab i em-waith k am hab em-juh mamt ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ k d Jiosh hemajkamga. Kunt heg hekaj am wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Wehsko o am e a'aga mamtsh ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ. Ni heg hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
Wehs ni-ihbthag amjed ani chikpanith g Jiosh am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj. K g Jiosh s-mahch mani chum hekith ab wui ni-ho'ige'ithahun am em-wehhejed.
S-em-neithamk ani ch ab tahni g Jiosh matp hems am wo ap'ech mant am wo i em-chehgim k wo i em-wehmt em-wohochuthadag ed mamt hekaj am wo i e gewpkai.
Ab att a'ai wo i t-wehmt ab a'ai kahk g t-wohochuthadag.

Am g wo s-mahchk mani mu'ikko am a'ap'echuth mant am wo i em-chehgim. K wabshaba am ha'ichu has e wua mani heg hekaj pi ni-nankog. Si ani tatchua mant am wo i em-wehmt am em-ahgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab masma mani i ha wehmaj hegam mo hahasko kihthag ch hab wa'ap pi d Tutuligo.
Ab o ni-chehani g Jiosh mant wo ha ahgi g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj, chum wa hems hegam mo pi chu a'amichuth ch hegam mo d mischini.
Ni heg hekaj ni-nahtokch mant am epai wo i em-ahgithahi ahpim mam am kih Rome t am.

Wehs at wo ha tho'ibia g Jiosh hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kuni heg hekaj wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch am ahgachug. Tutuligo at wehpeg ab bei e-ap'ethag mat wo e tho'ibia k g gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei.

Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o am t-tashogithch mat hedai g Jiosh am wo i ap'ech e wehhejed. An o o'ohadag: Am at wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh e wehhejed hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kut hegam wo wa'i bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.

Ab o t-wui i e tashogith g Jiosh. K wabshaba mu'i hemajkam gm hu hab i juhkch ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. K ihtha pi ap'ekam an kuhpahim mat wo s-e mai g wohokam. T g Jiosh heg hekaj s-ko'okam wo ha namkith.

Tt wo chum s-mahchk mo has chu'ig g Jiosh am neithch g nahtoij no pi ith am chum t-tashogith mo g Jiosh wehs ha'ichu thahm hab chu'ig ch wehs edgith g gewkthag chum hekith. Kut hemho wa ab wo moht g e-chu'ichig matp hedai pi wo mahchim.

Neh, wehs hemajkam o wa chum s-mahch mo an hema d Jiosh ch wabsh pi ab hu mahkch g has elithadag. Ab o s-ha ho'ige'ith. K wabshaba pi ab hu i ho'ige'elith ch wabsh pehegi ha'ichu chegito. K am wabsh i s-chuhugam g ha-chegitoithag.
Bo e ahg mo s-chu a'amichuth ch eda pi ha'ichu mahch.

Jiosh o d pi ha huhugetham ch d si ha'ichu. Kutt heg ab wo wa'i chum ihmath mo d t-Jioshga. K wabshaba ihtham im hu hab wabsh juhkch ch wabsh ha'ichu jijoshchuth ch ab ha ihm. K eda d wabsh hemajkam ha-nahtoi mo ha o'othhamt o atp hems ha ha'ichu thoakamt. T hekaj g Jiosh am wabsh i ha thagito mat hab wo juh hegai mo haschu hab s-junimk. Kuki hab wua g s-uam ha'ichu ch s-ta edam ha'ichu. U'uwi o ha'i chum hems pi ha kuhkunt ch e wehm hab wua g s-ta edam ha'ichu.
K g chechoj pi ha hohont ch e wehm hab wa'ap wua g s-ta edam ha'ichu. Kut heg hekaj wo si s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jiosh.
Pi o tatchua ihtham mas wo s-mahchk g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am wabsh i ha thagito pi kehg ha-chegitoithag ed. K am hab wua hegai mat haschu pi am hu hab wo chum wuath.

Ab at wabsh i si ha shuhth g nahnko mahs pi ap'ekam mo ha'i si pihk e elith g s-kaisthagkaj ch ha'i s-ta kek'eithama o s-chu hehgamk o s-ha mu'amk o s-chu cheggiamk o s-chu i'attomk o s-chu padhog eh'elithamk o s-chu ahgamk.
Ha'i o s-ko'okam has e ahg o s-ta ko'okthama o chum si e hahaschuth o si i e nakog mat am ba'ich hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam o pi ab hu wohog ha elith g e-ge'egedga
o s-u'ama. Ha'i o pi hab wua hegai mo haschu hab kaij mat hab wo juh o pi hedai pihk elith o pi ab hu ha ho'ige'ith no pi s-keh'ith g Jiosh.

Jiosh chehanig o hab chu'ig mat hema hab wo masmak ch ab wo nako g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. K ihtham am wa chum s-mahch ihtha ch eda am hab wa masma hab e junihim ch wabsh s-hohho'ith mo ha'ijj am hab wa'ap e junihim.

Na'ams ha'ijj ahpim hab kaij “Hah, sho'o wa'i si pi ap d hehemajkam hegam map am ha a'aga k ch hemho wa wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag,” ch amtp eda hems hab wa'ap junihim ihtha. Neh, m wabsh hejel e-ne'okikaj ab e mohto'ith g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
S-mahch ach mo d wabsh i si shel mat wo ha lothai g Jiosh hegam mo hab wua hegai mani am em-ahgith.
Kumt ahpim hemho wa hab wa'ap wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag mamtp am hab wo junihith ihtha.
Ithani o wabsh ab si s-t-bahbgi g Jiosh ch s-hemajim ab t-nenida no pi tatchua matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi.
K wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu kaimk g Jiosh ch pi sha'i pihk e elith hekaj. Ihtham o ba'ich i ge'e ab e mohto'ithahim hegai s-ko'ok namkithadag mat wo nam ge'e lothaita tash ch ed.
Heg at i tash ed wo t-namkith g Jiosh heg hekaj mach haschu hab i junihim.
Heg att wo cheh mach haschu i gahg. Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch wo e gahgithath g Jiosh ap'echutha. T g Jiosh am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed mamt chum hekith an wo wehmajk.
Mu'i hemajkam o wabsh hejel e tatchua ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. T ihtham g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag.
Kut ab wo tahtkkath g sho'igthag ch s-ko'ok, wahm g Tutuligo matp pi hab hu wo kaiha hegai mo haschu t-nuhkuthachuth g Jiosh.

T g Jiosh ab wo si t-ha'ichuch ahchim mach hab junihim g s-ap'ekam k ab wo t-mah g has elithadag ch s-ap tahhathkam. Ahchim Tutuligo att wehpeg bei ihtha s-ap'ekam. Mt wabshaba ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei.
Jiosh o wehs t-wepo ab t-neith ch wehs t-wepo s-t-tho'ibiamk.

Gawul mahs hemajkam o pi hekaj g Moses chehanig ch wabshaba s-mahch mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch wo e lothai heg hekaj mo pi hab junihim g s-ap'ekam. K g Tutuligo s-mahch heg hekaj chehanig mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch heg hekaj hab wa'ap wo e lothai mo pi am hu hab junihim.
Pi at hedai wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh heg wabsh hekaj mo kah g chehanig k washaba heg hekaj mat heg am hab wo junihith.
Heki o hu pi edgith g Jiosh chehanig g gawul mahs hemajkam ch eda s-mahch mo haschu d s-ap'ekam. K g ha-mahchig d ha-chehanig. K g ha-mahchig d ha-chehanig.
K am wa tasho mo wa hab chu'ig no pi e kudut mo hekith hab wua g pi ap'ekam ch s-ap e tahtk mo hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam.

Kut hab wa'ap wo e juh heg eda tash mat kei g Jiosh mat g Jesus Christ wo ha lothai g ha-chu'ichigkaj, chum hems g pi ap ha-chegitoithag. Neh, bo chu'ig ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mani ahgachug.
Mu'ijj g ni-wehm Tutuligo o hab e elith mo s-ap s-mahch g Jiosh tatchui ch am hab junihim g s-ap'ekam no pi edgith g chehanigaj.
Bo e elith mo d ha wanimedtham ch ab ha mahkch g tonlig hegam mo pi edgith g Jiosh chehanig.
Bo e elith mo wehs ab u'ukch g amichuthadag ch wohokam no pi ab u'ukch hegai chehanig. Chum o wa ha mashcham g pi ha'ichu mahchim ch a'al
k ch eda pi hejel am hu hab wua g e-mashchama. Ha'ijj o ha mihshmath mat pi hedai ha'ichu wo ha ehsithath
ch pi wo ha wehm wo'iwua hegai mo pi d ha-wehm kihhim ch eda hejel hab masma hab e wua. Si o pi hohho'ith mat ab wo ihmath g hemajkam nahtoi k ch eda wo ha ehs mo haschu an hab chu'ig ha-cheopi ed.
Ab o chum si e haha'ichuchuth mo edgith g Jiosh chehanig ch eda mu'ikko pi am hu hab junihim ch ab mamka g Jiosh g si edathag.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Gawul mahs hemajkam o s-ko'okam has ahg g Jiosh ha hekaj g Tutuligo.
Tho si ha'ichu g pahl hikuchka em-wehhejed mamtp ab wo wohog elithath g chehanig. Mtp wabshaba pi ab hu wo wohog elithath, k pi has d sha'i ahga g pahl hikuchka.
Matp hema ab wo sha wohog elithath g Jiosh chehanig, t g Jiosh hab masma ab wo neithath mo pahl hikuchkas, chum as pi d Tuhligo ch pi woho hikuchkas.
Gawul mahs hemajkam o pi pahl hikuchkas ch eda ha'i hab e junihim mo hab masma hab chu'ig g chehanig. Kut heg hekaj ab wo e chu'ichigch g Tutuligo no pi edgith g chehanig ch eda melichkwuhim.
Pi o d Jiosh hemajkamga hegam mat wabsh gawul juh g e-chuhkug g pahl hikuchkakaj.

Hegam o hi d Jiosh hemajkamga mat gawul juh g e-ihbthag. Kut pi wo e nako mas g chehanigkaj hab wo juh ihtha. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at hemho wo wa gawul juh g t-ihbthag. Tp hems ab wo em-hehgchul g hemajkam mamt gawul wo juh g e-chuhkug. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab wo em-hehgchul mat gawul wo e juh g em-ihbthag.
Pegih, mtp hems a ha'ijj hab wo chei, “Pi oki ha'ichu d sha'i ha-ap'ethag g Tutuligo ha thahm g gawul mahs hemajkam.”
Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo mu'i ha'ichu d t-ap'ethag. Hema o d ihtha mat g Jiosh ab t-hiwigi g ha'ichu e-ahga matt wo ha ahgi g nahnko mahs hemajkam.
K hi wa chum woho mo ha'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohog elith g ha'ichu ahgaj. T wabshaba g Jiosh woho am hab wo juh hegai mo has i kaij.
