Chum o hekith ahg g wohokam, chum as wehs hemajkam g iattogi hab wua. Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d hekia wohokam, chum as ha'ijj hab kaij mo pi woho.

Ha'ijj o hab kaij, M o wa s-ap'e matt hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam no pi heg hekaj tasho am chehgith mo g Jiosh hab wua g s-ap'ekam. T heg hekaj pi ap hab wo e juh g Jiosh matp s-ko'okam wo t-namkith heg hekaj. Neh, bo kaij.
Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo ahg g iattogi. Jiosh o chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam. Pi at has masma wo e nako mat wo t-lothai matp d wo pi ap'ekamk.

K hab kaij ihtham, T-iattogi o am tashogith mo g Jiosh chum hekith ahg wohokam. Kuch heg hekaj am chehgith mo he'es i ge'ej g Jiosh ha'ichu k ed. Pegih, k haschu ahgch hab kaij g Jiosh machs d pi ap chu'ijkam ch wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
Ha'ijj o an ha iattogith manish hab kaij matt am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch hab masma wo tashogi g s-ap'ekam. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo s-ko'okam ha namkith heg hekaj.
Neh, pi o sha'i ba'ich i s-ap'e g Tutuligo mo g gawul mahs hemajkam. Wehsijj ach wa ab mohtois g pi ap'ekam. K ith an t-u'ukch. Kutt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi o hedai o'othham d sha'i s-ap'ekam
ch pi hedai amichuth mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch pi hedai mahchimk g Jiosh.
Wehsijj at i e mehkoth ab amjed g Jiosh k am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Pi o hedai hab sha'i wua g s-ap'ekam. Pi hedai.
S-ko'okam o neneok hab masma mo s-em-mu'amk ch g iattogi hab kaij. Pi kehg ha-ne'oki o hab masma i wuhshani mo g hialwui ab ko'oi amjed.
E o nahtokch mat s-ko'okam wo em-juh k wo em-mua.
Chum o hebai gantan g sho'igthag ch padchuth g s-ha-hehgig.
Pi o hekith sha'i s-ap e tahtk.
ch pi hekith ab has elith g Jiosh.
Jiosh at ab ba'ich wo i ha chu'ichigch hegam mo edgith g chehanigaj ch pi am hu heg oithch hab e junihim. K hekaj hab mahs mo g Jiosh wehs ab ha abchuth g hemajkam.
Pi at hedai wo e nako mas wehs am hab wo junihith g Jiosh chehanig ch hekaj wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio. Chehanigaj at am wo i t-tashogi mach haschu pi ap'ekam hab wua.

Ia'i ithani at am i tashogi g Jiosh mat has masma wo i ha ap'ech g hemajkam am e tahgio. Chehanig at pi wo sha'i t-ap'echuth k wabshaba heg wohokamchuth mat has masma g Jiosh wo i t-ap'ech. K g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ith hab wa'ap wohokamchuth.
Jiosh at am wo i ha ap'ech hegam matp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo hiwgath g Jesus Christ, chum as has mahs d wo hemajkamk.
Wehs hemajkam at hab juh g pi ap'ekam k pi am hu ais g Jiosh hab elitha.
K wabshaba g Jiosh ab i s-t-ho'ige'ith. T g alithaj Jesus Christ ab moht g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag am t-wehhejed. T hekaj ab i t-ap'ech g Jiosh e wui.

Jiosh at am i ap'ech mat g alithaj wo e muhkith am t-wehhejed k hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig mattp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch. Ab o wabsh s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam heki hu hemajkam mo ab s-wohochuth ch pi chegima g ha-chu'ichig

nat pi g alithaj wo e muhkith am wehs t-wehhejed. Bo wa masma am t-chehgithch g Jiosh mo chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam ch wo e nako mat am wo i ha ap'ech g pi ap chu'ijkam mat hekith ab wo bei g Jesus nat pi heg ab moht g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag.

Neh, k pi ha'ichu d sha'i hegai machs hekaj wo chum si t-haschuthath. Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs wo i t-ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam. Jiosh at am wo i t-ap'ech e wui matt hekith ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
Pi o hegam d wa'i ha-Jioshga mat ab ha mah g chehanig ch wabshaba wehs hemajkam d ha-Jioshga.
Ab o ha wehnath ch wepo masma ab ha neith g Tutuligo ch hegam mo pi d Tutuligo. Wehsijj at hab wa'i masma wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
Ith o pi hab d ahga machs im hu hab i juh g Jiosh chehanig matt hekith ab i s-wohoch. T-wohochuthadag o am i t-gewpkath matt am hab wo junihith g tatchuij mo hab wa chum d ahga g chehanigaj.
Am ant wo i wuhshath g Abrahambad mant am wo i em-tashogi ihtha mani wa em-ahgith. Ihtha Abrahambad ash d t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo

ch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Tsh g Jiosh heg hekaj am i ap'ech e tahgio. Pi atsh wa hejel am i e ap'ech heg hekaj mas hab junihim g s-ap'ekam. K heg hekaj wa pi am hu ha'ichu d sha'i hegai matsh wa heg hekaj wo chum si e haschuthath g Abrahambad.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Abrahambad at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am i ap'ech e tahgio.
Neh, tho em-namkithadag hegai mamt wo ha gehg chikpank.

K wabshaba d em-mahkigdag hegai mamtp ab wo bei ab s-wohochuthk hegai mo ab em-makiog. K g Jiosh hab kaij mat am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch. Ith o d Jiosh mahkigdag.
K ith hab ahg g Davidbad ch hab kaij mo s-ap e tahtk hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh nat pi am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio. K hab masma an o'ohadag:
Sho'o wa'i s-ap e tahtk hegam mat hedam g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k pi ab hu wo ha mohto'i.

David o pi hegam hab wa'i ha ahg mo pahl hikuchkas ch wabshaba hegam hab ep ha ahg mo pi pahl hikuchkas. Heki ani hu ahg matsh g Abrahambad ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s-ap'ekam.
Ith at hab e juh mat koi e pahl hikuch g Abrahambad.

Ab ash wa s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s-ap'ekam. T heg i thahm am hahawa e pahl hikuch mat hab masma am wo wohokamch g e-wohochuthadag mat heg hekaj am i ap'ech g Jiosh. T g Jiosh hab masma wehs am wo i ha ap'ech hegam mat hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch, chum hems hegam mo pi pahl hikuchkas. Heg o wa wepo mach ahchim Jiosh wohochuththam woho d Abrahambad amjedkam nach pi hab masma ap'ethag. Hemho wa att ab wo s-wohochuthath ch ab wo hiwgath hab masma mash wa g Abrahambad.
Jiosh ah am ha ahgith g Abrahambad ch amjedkamaj matsh am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio k wehs ab wo ha mah g jewed kahchki matp ab wo i s-wohoch.

Kut pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk g ha-wohochuthadag matp ith hab wo sha ha juni g Jiosh hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth ch am hab wabsh junihim hegai mo an o'ohanas chehanig ed. T g Jiosh d wo s-iattomkamk matp am hab wo sha ha juni.
Pi att ab hu wo sha'i i t-ap'ech g chehanigkaj k wabshaba heg hekaj ab wo t-abch g t-chu'ichig matt ab wo bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. T hegam mo pi edgith pi heg hekaj ab hu wo e abch.

Pi at ahchim am wa'i i t-ap'ech g Jiosh mach wa an u'ukch g heki hu chehanigaj. Ahpim at am ep i em-ap'ech mamt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj. Batt masma am oithk hab t-juh g Abrahambad k ab hiwig g Jiosh hemajimatalig. Ith o heg wa wepo mo g Abrahambad d t-ohg. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am t-chehgithch mat has wo chum masmak.

Bo masma an o'ohadag mash g Jiosh am ahgith g Abrahambad: Bant m-juh mapt d wo ha-shohshonk g mu'i nahnko mahs hemajkam. Ith at woho hab e juh. K d wohokam hegai Jiosh ne'oki mat g Abrahambad ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh oki e nakog mat ab wo i wuhshath g muhki ab muhkig amjed k am wo nahto ha'ichu hab wabsh che'ek mat am hab wo e juh.

Abrahambad ash wa ab s-wohochuth mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g ali mat eda kekelit chum as pi mahch mas has masma hab wo juh. Tsh heg hekaj hab juh g Jiosh mo d ha-shohshon g mu'i nahnko mahs hemajkam. Bo masma an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo g Jiosh hab kaij: G i ha neith g huhu'u. Ha'akia at d wo k g m-amjedkam. Neh, boki kaij.
Tsh pi sha'i gawul juh g e-wohochuthadag g Abrahambad, chum as hems aihim g siant ahithag. Kush g Sarabad pi ha mamdat.
Abrahambad ash ab si ihm g Jiosh nash pi ab si s-wohochuth mat wo e nakog k woho am hab wo juh hegai mo haschu am ahgith.
Heg atsh hekaj am i ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio k gm hu hab i juh g chu'ichigaj.
K pi heg wa'i wehhejed an o'ohanas hegai
ch wabshaba ahchim ep t-wehhejed. Jiosh atsh gm hu hab ep wo i juh g t-chu'ichig ahchim matt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch.
Heg atsh hekaj am i kei g t-kownalig Jesus mat wo e muhkith g t-chu'ichig wehhejed k ab ep wo i wuhsh muhkig amjed. Kutt am i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio ab i s-wohochuthk ihtha.
Am at i t-ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Kuch heg hekaj ab wui si s-ap t-tahtk.
Sho'o wa'i si s-hemajima a t-wui. Kuch si s-hehgig ch ab nenida mat ab wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed k ab wo si t-ha'ichuch.
Chum as ha'ichu t-kudut, ch eda si s-hehgig nach pi s-mahch mo g t-kudutadag hab t-wua matt wo s-chu nakogath.
T g Jiosh s-ap wo i t-el mach s-chu nakog. Kutt ith hekaj am wo i t-gewpkai heg wui mach ab nenida.
Ab at i t-mah g Jiosh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg ab t-mahtchulith mo si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui. Ch hekaj s-mahch mat woho am wo i t-wahpki g Jiosh e-kihthag ed.
Thach wa pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ha gewkthag machs hab wo juh ha'ichu matt hekaj am wo i t-ap'ech. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat g alithaj e muhkith am t-wehhejed.
Pi o hedai e muhkithamk hema wehhejed. Tp hems hema hi wo wa e muhkith hema wehhejed mo d si o'othham.
Kuch eda d wa chum pi ap chu'ijkam. T g Jiosh am t-chehgi mo he'es ab si i t-tatchua am i ap'echuthk mat g alithaj am t-wehhejed muh k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
Kuch hab s-mahch mat hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo t-namkith.

Heki ach hu pi ab hu hajunima g Jiosh. T g alithaj muh am t-wehhejed mat hab wo t-juh matt ab haha wo hajunit g Jiosh. Pegih, ch ba'ich ab i ap'ethag am Christ tho'ibiatalig ed no pi d thoakam ab muhkig amjed ch wo e nako mat wo i t-wehmtath.
Kuch si s-hehgig mat g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig k am i t-ap'ech mach ab hahawa si s-hajunima g Jiosh.

Ab atsh ha'ichu cheha g Jiosh hegai mo d wehpeg o'othham ch hab chehgig Adam. Tsh heg mulin k hab i shonwuich g pi ap'ekam jewed thahm. Tsh hekaj am i shonwua muhkig. Tsh g Jiosh pi hab ep juh g chehanig am hugkam matsh an i wuhsh g Mosesbad. Sh eda wehsijj hab wua g pi ap'ekam. Kush heg hekaj g muhkig wehsijj ab ha a'ahe, chum as pi mulin g chehanig hab masma matsh wa g Adambad. Jiosh oki am ha'ichu t-chehgithch ab amjed g Christ ith hekaj Adambad.

Wehsijj atsh ab ha'ichu i wahpki am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba gawul mams hegai mat ab i wahpki. Tho muhkig hegai matsh g Adambad ab i wahki wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam. K wabshaba d Jiosh hemajimatalig hegai matsh g Jesus Christ ab i wahki wehs t-wehhejed.

K d al hemako hegai chu'ichig mat hekaj am i wah g s-ko'ok namkithadag. K wabshaba mu'ij g pi ap t-chu'ichig. K eda g Jiosh wehs gm hu hab i junihog am t-wehhejed. Ab o d t-wuikam hegai s-ko'ok namkithadag nach pi ab d Adambad amjedkam. K wabshaba d Jiosh mahkig ihtha mat hab t-juni gm hu hab i juhk g pi ap t-chu'ichig.

Muhkig at ab wehsijj t-ma'ish heg hekaj. Adambad pi ap chu'ichig. K wabshaba g Jiosh si s-hemajim ab t-makiog g ho'ige'ithadag. Kutt am aigo thahm i chehchsh g muhkig ahchim matt ab bei. Ab o t-mahkch g ap'ethag am gahi wuhshanim g Christ matt s-ap wo himath g t-thoakag ith thahm jewed.

Pegih, ith ani em-ahgith mat g Adambad ab i wahki g s-ko'ok namkithadag am wehs t-wehhejed heg hekaj hemako pi ap e-chu'ichig. T wabshaba g Christ am hab juh g tho'ibiathag am wehs t-wehhejed heg hekaj hemako s-ap e-chu'ichig ch ab t-makiog g wechij thoakag.
Adambad at pi wohog el g Jiosh. K heg hekaj mu'ijj d pi ap chu'ijkam. Christ at hejel ab s-wohog el g Jiosh. Kut heg hekaj mu'ijj ab wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio.

Hemajkam o pi hohho'ith g chehanig ch ba'ich hab i s-junimk g pi ap'ekam wa chum s-mahchch g chehanig. K wabshaba ab t-mahks matt hekaj wo s-mahchk mo he'es i ge'ej g pi ap t-chu'ichig. K eda g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag ba'ich i ge'ej no pi gm hu hab i junihog g t-chu'ichig.

Pegih, tt wo chum nei mat am t-gewito g pi ap'ekam nach pi heg hekaj ab aihim g muhkig. Heg o wa wepo mo d t-maliomig g pi ap'ekam ch am t-wanchshulig muhkig wui. Kuch wabshaba hemuch edgith g Jiosh hemajimatalig ab i s-wohochuthk g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Pegih, tp hems ha'i hab wo chei matt hig ba'ich am hab wo i junihith g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh ba'ich wo i s-t-ho'ige'el.

K eda pi hab sha'i chum mahs machs am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Am att i thagito g pi ap'ekam. K pi am hu hahawa ha gewkthag t-thahm. Ith o heg wa wepo matt heki hu muh natt pi pi hab hahawa ep wo junihith g pi ap'ekam.
Ab att t-chehgi g t-pahl wakonakaj matt ab i t-hemakoj Jesus Christ wehm. K heg wa wepo matt am wehmaj muh natt pi ab i t-hemakoj heg wehm mat muh.
T-pahl wakona o wepogithas matt wehmaj gd hu t-hiash am i muhk. T g Jiosh ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag heg hekaj si ge'e e-gewkthag mat hekaj ab i wamigi g Christ muhkig amjed.
Ab att i t-hemakoj heg wehm mat am t-wehhejed muh. Kut hekaj ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. Ith o wepo masma matt am wehmaj ko'o k wehmaj ep t-chechegito.
Am att i thagito g heki hu t-thoakag. Kut hab gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap t-tatchui. K pi an hu hahawa t-wulshch g pi ap'ekam.
Nat hig hab ep wo juh g pi ap'ekam hegai mat heki hu muh? Pegih, tt ahchim hab wa masma am i thagito g pi ap'ekam ab i s-wohochuthk mat g Christ am t-wehhejed muh.
Heg muhkig o d t-muhkig no pi d t-namkithadag. Ith att ab i s-wohoch. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab t-mah g wechij thoakag k ab wo i t-wuwhas muhkig amjed hab masma mat hab juh g Christ.
Pi at hekith ep wo muh g Christ mat wa uhpam ep e chegito. Muhkig o pi am hu thahm gewkthag.
Hemho at muh mat wo kuhgi g pi ap'ekam gewkthag am t-thothakag ed k ep e chegito k hemuch d thoakam wehhejed g Jiosh.
Pegih, mt wo chum kuhgi g pi ap'ekam e-thothakag ed k d wo thothakamk wehhejed g Jiosh ab i e hemakochuthk g Jesus Christ wehm.
Pi g wo hiwgithath g pi ap'ekam mas am ep wo i chikp g em-thoakag mamt hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap e-tatchui.

Wehs amt am wo i e-thagito Jiosh wui namsh pi d e tho'ibiakam ab amjed g muhkig. T am haha wo i em-hekaj g Jiosh mamt am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Pi g wo sha'i e hiwgith mas wo em-hekaj g pi ap'ekam has i masma.
Heki ach hu ab wecho g chehanig ch wabshaba hemuch edgith g Jiosh hemajimatalig ch hab pi hab wo chum junihith g pi ap'ekam.
Pegih, t hahawa pi ab hu ha'ichu wo t-abch g chehanig nat pi g Jiosh ab s-t-ho'ige'ith k t-tho'ibia. Kutp hems heg hekaj ha'i hab wo elithath mat am hab wabsh wo i junihith g pi ap'ekam.
T wabshaba g pi ap'ekam an wo ha u'ukchith matp hab wo junihith. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam ab wo ha namkith. Ab amt wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh. T heg am wo i em-ap'ech e wehhejed.
Pi ap'ekam o wa an em-u'ukch. Kumt wabshaba ab i s-wohoch g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh. Kuni ith hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
E amt wul'o ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. K g s-ap'ekam an hahawa em-u'ukch.

Ni wabsh g pi hasig ne'okikaj em-tashogith nam pi pi koi si s-amichuth. Am amki wa e thagitokch si s-uam ha'ichu wui ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Tsh g Jiosh em-tho'ibia. Kumt am hahawa wehs wo i e thagito s-ap'ekam wui ch hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
Pi am ab hu kaiham g s-ap'ekam mo hekith g pi ap'ekam an em-u'ukch.
Kut pi ha'ichu s-ap hab em-juni g pi ap'ekam. Si am wa e eh'elith mam wa am hab junihim. K g pi ap'ekam ab wabsh em-ahijithahim g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag.
Kumt wabshaba e wul'o ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. K g Jiosh d hahawa em-ahmo ch hab em-juh mam d hahawa s-ap'ekam. K ab him mamt ab wehs wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Hegam mat hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam at ab wo ai g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. T wabshaba hegam mat ab wo i e thagito t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Neh, ni-wepnag, s-mahch amki mo has chu'ig g t-chehanig. Kuni heg hekaj hab em-elith mamt wo s-amich ihtha mant wo em-ahgi. Chehanig o an u'ukch g o'othham am hugkam mat he'es i tash d wo thoakamk.

Pegih, k hab chu'ig g chehanig mat g uwi pi ep wo ha kunt mat eda g kunaj d wabsh wo kia thoakamk. K wabshaba hiwgithas mat wo ha kunt matp g kunaj heki hu wo muh. Pi o ab hu hahawa shohbithch g chehanig.

Pegih, k hab wa'ap chu'ig am t-wehhejed ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Am att i t-hemakoj g Christ wehm. K ith heg wepogithas matt am wehmaj muh. K pi an hu hahawa t-u'ukch g chehanig. Thach enigaj hegai mat e chegito ab muhkig amjed ch hekaj s-ap ha'ichu hab wo chum junihith am wehhejed g Jiosh.
Am o wabsh ha chu'amun g chehanig hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. K ba'ich hab i junihim g pi ap'ekam. K g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag ab ha aihim.

Tt wabshaba ab i t-hemakoj g Christ wehm. T g Jiosh t-wul'o ab amjed g chehanig. Heki ach hu am chum chikpanith g Jiosh g chehanigkaj. K wabshaba hemu g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag t-wanimed. Ch hahawa woho chikpanith.

Ha'i o hab elith mo pi ap'e g Jiosh chehanig. K wabshaba pi woho. Chehanig o am t-tashogith g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Neh, pi att wo chum mahchk mo pi ap'e mach si pihk t-elith g ha'ichu t-enigakaj. K wabshaba g chehanig am t-tashogith mo pi ap'e.
Kuch wa am hahawa ba'ich i s-gewkam si pihk t-elith g ha'ichu t-enigakaj. Matp pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g chehanig, t d wabsh wo pi ha'ichuk g pi ap'ekam.
Neh, pi ani has sha'i ni-tahtk mani eda pi ap mahch g chehanig. Nt hahawa s-mai. T ba'ich am i si e chehgi g pi ap'ekam am ni-eda. Kunt s-mai maniki aihog g s-ko'ok ni-namkithadag.
Jiosh at hab juh g e-chehanig matt heg hekaj wo s-mai matt has masma wo bei g s-ap thoakag. Kunid eda heg ab am cheh maniki d pi ap chu'ijkam ch ab aihog g ni-muhkig ch s-ko'ok ni-namkithadag.
Tho hekia s-ap'ekam ch s-kehgaj g chehanig ch am t-tashogith matt has wo chum t-junihith.

Pi at g chehanig hab ni-juh mani ab aihog g ni-muhkig ch s-ko'ok ni-namkithadag. Pi ap'ekam at hab ni-juh mani wa ab aihog. Chehanig o s-kehgaj. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am t-tashogith mo haschu d pi ap'ekam ch has masma si pi ap'e.
Pegih, k d hekia s-ap'ekam g chehanig. Kuni wa wabshaba d wabsh o'othham. K wa g pi ap'ekam an ni-u'ukch.

Pi o wa ta amichuthama g ni-thoakag am ni-wehhejed mani wa eda wabsh hejel ab ni-hiwig. S-mahch ani mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch wabshaba pi am hu hab junihim ch heg hab wa'i junihim mani haschu i pi hohho'ith.
Ith ani wa hekaj wohokamchuth mo g chehanig s-ap'e.
Pi ani wa hab chum junimk g pi ap'ekam. K wa wabshaba heg an ni-u'ukch. K wa heg hekaj heg wa wepo mani wa pi d si ahni ch am hab junihim.
Ni-thoakag o wa d wabsh hekia pi ap'ekam mani wa eda pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh. Kuni wa pi sha'i ni-nakog manis am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam, chum anis wa hab s-junimk.
Heg ani hab wa'i junihim pi ap'ekam, chum anis pi hab chum junimk.
Heg ani wa hekaj hab kaij mani pi d si ahni ch hab junihim. Pi ap'ekam o wa an ni-u'ukch.
Pegih, boki chu'ig g t-thoakag mach eda pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh. Pi att wo t-nako machs hejel am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam, chum achs hab s-junimk.
S-mahch ach mo s-ap'e g Jiosh chehanig.
K wabshaba g pi ap'ekam an t-u'ukch ch hab t-wua mach ab wui gegok.

Pegih, boki chu'ig g t-thoakag mach eda pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh. Bach chum s-junimk g Jiosh chehanig ch wabshaba am hab wabsh junihim g pi ap'ekam. K pi in hu hedai ha'ichug mas wo t-tho'ibia. Kuch heg hekaj si pi ap t-tahtk. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i kei g e-alithag Jesus Christ. Kut heg t-tho'ibia. Ith ach hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
Pi o ab hu hahawa t-abchuth g Jiosh g ha'ichu t-chu'ichig ahchim mach ab si hiwig g Jesus Christ.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at t-wul'o ab pi ap'ekam t amjed k ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. K pi ab hu hahawa t-aihog g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag.

Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs am hu hab wo junihith g chehanig ch hekaj wo t-tho'ibia nach pi d wabsh o'othham. T wabshaba g Jiosh am i kei g e-alithag mat wo t-tho'ibia. T heg ia i wuhsh jewed thahm k hab masmakahim mach ahchim ch wabshaba pi ha chu'ichig ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.

Jiosh at hab masma am i t-ap'ech e-tahgio k hab masma ab t-neith matt pi hekith sha'i mul g chehanig ahchim mach ab i t-thagitokch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui ch pi am hu hab junihim g hejel pi ap t-tatchui.
Hegam mo hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui o heg hekaj an e u'ukch. K hegam mo hab junihim g tatchuij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag heg hekaj an epai e u'ukch.

Am o hihim s-ko'ok e-namkithadag wui hegam mo hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui. Ch ahchim mach hab junihim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag tatchui am Jiosh kihthag wui hihimath ch hekaj wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath.
Tho obgaj g Jiosh hegai mo hedai g hejel e-tatchui hab junihim no pi pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch pi wo sha'i e nako mas am hab wo e juh.
Pi at wo e nako hegam mo hab wua g hejel e-tatchui mas hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui.
Ch wabshaba ahchim pi g hejel t-tatchui hab wua. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-eda hab chu'ig. Kuch heg tatchui hab wua. Hegam mo pi am hu ha eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o pi d Jiosh hemajkamga.

T ahchim am i t-ap'ech g Christ am tahgio g Jiosh k ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kuch heg hekaj edgith g wechig thoakag, chum as hi wa g muhkig ab wehs ha aihog g hemajkam g pi ap ha-chu'ichigkaj.
Kut am uhpam ep wo t-chegitoich g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab masma mat hab juh g Christ.
Pegih, ni-wepnag, ab o d t-wuikam matt hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.

Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i t-juh mattp am hab wo sha junihith g hejel t-tatchui. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i em-wehmaj. Kumt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni k hab wo edgithath g wechij thoakag.
Ab at t-mah g Jiosh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am t-wanimed. Ch hab s-mahch mach d Jiosh a'aliga
ch ab ihm mo d t-ohg ch pi sha'i ehbith.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-tashogith mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
Jiosh at ab wehs mah g e-alithag g e-ho'ige'ithalig k hab wa'ap wo t-mah nach pi hab wa'ap d a'aligaj. Kutt wabshaba wehpeg ab wo nako g sho'igthag hab masma mat heg hab e juh mo d si alithaj.
Si atsh ge'e ab wo has t-elithath g Jiosh. Kutt hab pi wo sha'i kuint g al t-sho'igthag ia jewed thahm.
Jiosh atsh wehs ha'ichu thahm wo t-mahsko wua ahchim a'aligaj. K wehs ha'ichu nahtoij heg nenida.

Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat wehs e padch g nahtoij mat eda g o'othham pi ap chu'i. Wehs ha'ichu o ab hahawa e wulshch g pi ap'ekamkaj. Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh wo wul'o g e-nahtoi mat hekith am wo mahsko t-wua ahchim a'aligaj. Tsh wehs ha'ichu hahawa ep si s-kehg hab wo mahsk.
S-mahch ach mo hemuch g ha'ichu nahtoij g Jiosh shahag wepo mo shahshani hab sha masma mat g uwi g ali wo be k ab i taht g s-ko'ok.

Ahchim mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ach hab wa'ap shahshani ch ab si nenida mat am wo i nahto g t-tho'ibiathag k wo wechijith g t-chuhkug. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o d wehpeg mahkigdaj g Jiosh ab t-wui.
Ab att i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Kut t-tho'ibia. K wabshaba am wabsh kia wi'is mat wo nahto g t-tho'ibiathag k am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed. Kuch s-wohochuth mat ith hab wo t-juni.
Wohochuthadag o hab d ahga mamt s-e tahtk ch ab wo nenidath hegai mamt koi nei.

Pi ach ahim gewkthag. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i t-wehmaj. Pi ach mahch matt has masma wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath am Jiosh wui. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahtchulith. Kuch hab shahshani ch shoak am Jiosh wui ch pi sha'i mahch matt has masma hab wo chei hegai mo haschu ab t-tahtchuth.

K wabshaba g Jiosh s-mahch g t-ihbthag ch ep s-mahch hegai mo haschu ab t-tahtchuth g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o hab wua g t-ho'ige'ithahuna am Jiosh tatchui oithch. Kuch ab tahni g i wehmtadag am ha wehhejed g Jiosh hemajkamga.
Ab at i t-wai g Jiosh matt d wo hemajkamgajk. Kuch ab wui si pihk t-elith. K g Jiosh heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu am i ap'echuth mat t-wehhejed wo s-ap i wuhsh ha'ichu.
Heki o hu s-mahch g Jiosh mat hedai ab wo kaiha g waithaj ch am ap'ech matt wo wepo chu'igk g alithaj ch wehmaj d wo a'aligajk. T g alithaj d wo wehpeg t-si'ihegk.
T wa woho ab i t-waith k am i t-ap'ech e tahgio k hahawa pi ab hu ha'ichu t-chu'ichigchuth. K am ba'ich ehp mat ab t-mah g si has e-elithadag.
Pegih, bo masma am t-wehhejed kehk g Jiosh. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab t-wui wo kekiwua.
Pi at sha'i t-tha'i g Jiosh g e-alithag. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat pi ha'ichu ep wo sha'i t-tha'i. Alithaj at ab wui e iagchul am t-wehhejed.
T g Jiosh heg hekaj gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu t-abch.

Jiosh alithag at ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag am t-wehhejed muhk. T hab pi wo t-ai hegai t-namkithadag. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed k an s-apko thai e-hugith an. K heg am t-wehhejed e ho'ige'ithahun ab Jiosh wui.
Kuch eda hi wa hebaichujj ab nakog g kudutadag ch s-hasig ha'ichu ch sho'igchuthadag nach pi d Christ wohochuththam. Bihugig ch sho'igthag ch s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu ch cheggiadag o ab ep t-aihog.

Bo chu'ig g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga: “Chum ach hekith ab nakog g s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu am wehhejed g Jiosh. Kum hab t-elith mach ab aihim g muhkig hab masma mo g ha-gi'ichutha kakawal.” Neh, ttp hems hebai hab wo i el mat am i ha'asa si pihk e el g Christ ab t-wui.
K wabshaba ith pi woho. Ab o si pihk e elith g Christ t-wui ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag. Kuch wehs gewitoghim g t-kudutalig.

S-mahch ani mat pi hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i e nako hemuch o gm hu t-ba'ich mas an wo shohbi g Jiosh pihk elithadag ab t-wui mattp hebai wo i k ith thahm jewed o in t-thahm. Pi at g muhkig o g thoakag wo shohbi, ni'is g anghil o g s-ta ehbithamkam gewpkthag. Ab o t-chehgithch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mo t-hekaj si pihk e elith g Jiosh. Kut pi hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i e nako mas an wo shohbi g pihk elithadaj.

Mu'ijj g ni-wehm Tutuligo o s-ohhothamk g Jesus pi wohochuthch mo d Jiosh si Kehsha. Kuni heg hekaj si pi ap ni-tahtk. K g ni-ihbthag sha'i si s-ko'ok. S-mahch ani mani g wohokam em-ahgith nani pi pi ni-elith ch em-ahgith. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag an ni-u'ukch.
Si ani tatchua mat wo e tho'ibia g ni-wehm o'othham, chum anis hems heg hekaj pi wo ni-tho'ibia.

Tho chum Jiosh hemajkamga. Jiosh at ab i ha chuhcha g t-shohshonbad k am ha ahgith mat si s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo t-juni. Ab o si has t-elith g Jiosh ch ab t-mahkch g e-chehanig. Kuch hab s-t-mahch ch hab junihim g ab si has elitha Jiosh wui. T g Jiosh si Kehsha ab t-amjed i wuhsh ia jewed thahm. Tt heg hekaj ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh chum hekith. Neh!

K eda mu'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh si Kehsha. K wabshaba ith pi hab d ahga mas g Jiosh pi am hu hab wo juh hegai mo hab kaij mat hab wo juh. Pi atsh wehsijj g Tutuligo d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak.

Ith ant am wo em-tashogi am em-ahgithch ab amjed g Abrahambad. Pi atsh wehsijj g Abrahambad amjedkam wo enigak hegai mash wa g Jiosh ab makiog. Gohk ash wa a'alithag g Abrahambad. Sh hema hab chehgig Isaac. Kush g Jiosh hab kaij ab Abrahambad wui: Hegam wa'i Isaac amjedkam at wo enigak hegai mani ab m-makiog.

Ihtha Isaacbad ash d hegai matsh wa g Abrahambad wehm kihkam bei matsh eda heki hu okst natsh pi g Jiosh am i ha wehmt k hab kaij: That wo hemako ahithagk, t g Sarah wo ge cheoj madt. Ith o am chehgithch mat hegam d wo wa'i Jiosh hemajkamgak mat hedai g Jiosh am wo i ha chuhcha.
Neh, tsh am hema hohnt g Isaacbad am i ge'ethak. Sh ith hab chehgig Rebecca ch gohk ha mahmadt.

Sh hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui g Rebeccabad: Ge'echu at d wo piongajk g alichu. Tsh eda ihtham koi an hu mamsi k koi ab hu ha'ichu chu'ichig. Tsh g Jiosh ab i wai g chumchu mat hekaj wo tashok mo ab hejel ab g Jiosh mat hedai ab wo i ha wai.
Hegai mo d ge'echu ash hab chehgig Esau. Sh g chumchu hab chehgig Jacob. K hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mash g Jiosh hab kaij: Ab ant i wai g Jacob k g wehngaj Esau pi ab hu i wai.
Pegih, na'ams ha'i hab elith mat pi ap chu'i g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig
nash pi hab kaij ab Mosesbad wui: Nt wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mani hab ha elith.
K heg hekaj tasho mo s-ha ho'ige'ith heg wabsh hekaj mo hab ha elith. Pi at hedai heg wabsh hekaj wo nei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag mas haschu i tatchua ch haschu am hab juni him.

An o o'ohanas mash hab kaij g Jiosh am wui g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam: Am ant i m-thai mapt d wo kownalk ith si hekaj mant ab m-wui wo kekiwua k am wo ha chehgi g ni-gewkthag k am wo mahsko ni-wua wehsko jewed thahm.
K heg hekaj tasho mo g Jiosh s-ha ho'ige'ith mo hedai hab i elith ch hab ha wua mo hedai hab i elith mat pi ab hu wo kaihamath g ne'okij.
Neh, tp hems hema wo kah ihtha k hab wo chei, “Pegih, pi at ha'ichu ab hu wo chum t-abch g Jiosh matp heg hab wa masma hab t-juh map has i kaij.”
Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo pi ab hu sha'i ab g o'othham mas ab wui wo neo g Jiosh. Thach Jiosh nahtoi ch pi edgith g ap'ethag machs ab wui hab wo chei mas haschu ahgk hab masma t-nahto.
Neh, nat hig pi hab wo ha juh g haha'attham g hab mams haha'a mat wo tatchuath? Hema atp hems d wo s-kehg ha'ak ch hema d wo pi kehg ha'ak.
Pegih, t g Jiosh wehs hab ha juh g hemajkam. K ha'i pi ap d hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh s-ha bahbgi. T am wo i e ai mat am wo chehgi g e-gewkthag k wo s-ko'okam ha namkith.
Kuch ha'i s-ap d hemajkam no pi ab si s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh. Am at i t-ap'ech matt hab masma wo nei g gewkthaj.
Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam am d ep waithaj. Jiosh at ab ep i em-gawulkai.
Neh, bo masma an o'ohadag heg o'ohana ed mash hab chehgig Hosea mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Bant wo ha juh hegam mo pi d ni-hemajkamga mat d haha wo ni-hemajkamgak k ab wo si pihk ni-elithath ha wui.
Kumt hab wo ha a'agath mo d ni-hemajkamga. Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh.

Kush wa g Isaiabad d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch hab kaij: E o aihim mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g ha-namkithadag wehs hemajkam. T pi sha'i mu'i wo e tho'ibia g Tutuligo hemajkam, chum as wo si mu'ijk hab sha masma mo g o'od.

Sh wa am hu hebai hab ep kaij g Isaiabad: S-ap atsh huhug g pi ap'ekamkaj hegam kihhim mash hab chechgig Sodom ch Gomorra. Kut ahchim Tutuligo hab wa'ap s-ap wo huhug mat hems g Jiosh pi wo ha'i t-tho'ibia. Sha'i si s-gewkthag g Jiosh.

Pegih, pi am wa am hu e gahgith g Jiosh ap'ethag ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ch wabshaba am i kah ab amjed g Jiosh alithag k ab i s-wohoch. T g Jiosh am i em-ap'ech e tahgio gm hu hab i juhk g pi ap em-chu'ichig.
K g ni-wehm o'othham am i chum e ap'echuth g chehanigkaj ch pi bei g e-ap'ethag
nat pi pi ab hu wohoch g Jiosh k pi ab hu bei g si Kehshaj k wabsh am hab chum s-junimk g s-ap'ekam mat hekaj wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio. Ith o heg wa wepo mat e huchwua ab hothai t ab.

An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Am ant wo i maskogi g si ni-Kehsha ha shahgith g Tutuligo mat d wo chum ha-tho'ibiathagk. T pi wo e tho'ibia hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohoch. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat ab wo e huchwua hothai t ab k wo i shul. Hegam at wo wa'i e tho'ibia mat ab wo i s-wohoch. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana.
Ni-wepnag, chum ani si tatchua mat hu wo i e tho'ibia g ni-wehm o'othham ch heg hekaj am ni-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui.
Hegam o tatchua mat am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio ch wabshaba pi ap mahch mas has masma hab wo e juh.
Jiosh at am i ap'ech matt has masma wo s-ap'ek am tahgio. K g ni-wehm o'othham wabsh s-ohhothamk g apchuthaj ch wabsh hejel am chum s-e apchuthamk
ab s-wohog elithch g Jiosh chehanig. K wabshaba g Jiosh am t-chehgithch matt ab wabsh wo i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo i hiwigi g Christ. T heg am wo i t-ap'ech am tahgio.
An atki hi wa o'oha g Mosesbad mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Wehs amt wo himath g ni-chehanig mamt heg hekaj wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.

K oi wa tasho mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wehs wo himath. K eda in ha'ichug g tho'ibiathag ahga. Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g Jiosh matt ab wabsh wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiwigi. Kut am wo i t-ap'ech hejel e tahgio. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi g hab wo i e ahgi mat hedai am wo em-behijitham g tho'ibiathag thahm kahchim wui. Neh, bo chu'ig nat pi g Jiosh alithag ia heki hu i t-behij.
K an ep o'ohanas: Pi g hab ep wo i e ahgi mat hedai am wo em-behijitham jewed wecho. Jiosh alithag at heki hu ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed mat ab wo t-mah.
Bo hig woho chu'ig: Pi o sha'i mehk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab em-amjed. Chum am hekith ne'okchulith ch si s-mahch. Neh, ith o d ihtha ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g wohochuthadag mach am ahgahim.
Am g wo wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d em-kownalig ch ab uhpam e chegito muhkig amjed. T g Jiosh wo em-tho'ibia.
Wehsijj atsh am wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g alithaj e-ihbthag amjed. T wo e tho'ibia am i wohokamchuthk mo g Jesus d ha-kownalig.
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Mat hedai ab wo s-wohochuth k wo e tho'ibia.
Pi o ahchim wa'i Tutuligo hab t-ahg. Wehs hemajkam o d ha-kownalig g Jiosh ch wehsijj s-ba'ama ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wo tahnith.
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Matp hedai ab wo tai g Jiosh k wo e tho'ibia.
T wabshaba pi hedai has masma ab hu wo tai matp pi ab hu wo wohochuthath. T hab wa'ap pi hedai has masma wo kah matp pi hedai wo ha ahgithath g ha'ichu ahgaj.
Kut pi hedai wo e nako mat hejel wo i e ah mat an wo ahgachugath. Jiosh o wa ab t-chehani. An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Sho'o wa'i si s-kehg hab mahs mat wo thatha g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgtham.

Pegih, ch an ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g si Kehshaj. T ha'i kah k ab i s-wohochuth k ab wui e thagito k ha'i ehp pi ab hu wohoch. An atki o'oha g Isaiabad matsh ith hab wo e juh. K an hab chu'ig o'ohanaj ed: Ni-kownalig Jiosh, pi at mu'i ab hu wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ahchim ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam. Neh, boki kaij.

K hemuch ha'i hab chech'e mo pi wehsijj kah g hemajkam g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo wehsijj neith g Jiosh nahtoi. K g Jiosh o'ohana hab chu'ig: An o wehsko e tashogith g Jiosh e-nahtoi ed.

Tki an o'oha g Mosesbad moki hab kaij g Jiosh am ha wui g Tutuligo: Bam ha ahg g gawul mahs hemajkam mo pi d Jiosh hemajkamga ch pi ha'ichu a'amichuth. Nt wabshaba ab wo ha mah g ap'ethag. Kumt haha wo s-ha hehgam k wo babgat ab ha wui.
Tki g Isaiabad an o'oha mash s-gewkam hab kaij g Jiosh: Am ant ni-chehgi ha wui hegam mo pi an hu ni-gahg. T ab i s-ni-mai hegam mo pi ni-mahch.
T an ep o'oha g Isaiabad mo hab kaij g Jiosh ab ha amjed g Tutuligo hemajkam: Tash oitham ani ab i chum ha waith ihtham hemajkam. K wabshaba pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu ni-wohog elith.

Pegih, na'as hab sha elithas mat gm hu s-ha ohhoth g Jiosh g Tutuligo mat pi d haha wo hemajkamgajk. K wabshaba pi hab mahs. Ahni ani hab wa'ap d Tuhligo. T g Jiosh pi gm hu ni-ohhoth. Benjaminbad o d si ni-shohshon ch heg d amjedkamaj g Abrahambad.

Pi at gm hu s-t-ohhoth g Jiosh. Thach chum hemajkamgaj. Heki at hu ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshon. Batsh wa masma pi gm hu ha ohhoth wenog mash wa g Elijabad d thoakam ch d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. M o hi wa woho mash wa am ha gagda g e-hemajkamga Jiosh wui hab kaijch:
Ni-kownalig Jiosh, ha at koktha g ni-wehm o'othham g ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam k i shul g iagchulithakud. Ahni ant wa'i hejel in wih. K ep chum s-ni-mu'amk.
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g Jiosh ab wui: Am ani wabsh kia nuhkuth g wewa'ak mihl hemajkam. K ihtham ab has ni-elith ch pi ha'ichu ep jioshga. Neh, bash wa kaij g Jiosh.
K ia'i ithani am hab wabsh i masma. Ab at ha'i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh ahchim Tutuligo k ab i t-gawulkai. Kuch ab s-wohochuth.

Pi at heg hekaj ab i t-gawulkai machs haschu has i juh k wabshaba heg hekaj mo s-t-ho'ige'ith. Pi at d wo wohokam ho'ige'ithadagk matp g Jiosh heg ab wo ha himch g hemajkam mo haschu has i junihim k ab wo i ha gawulkai e wui.
Pegih, al he'ekia at ab i ha gawulkai g Jiosh g ni-wehm o'othham. T ihtham cheh g e-gahgi. Mu'ijj at pi cheh no pi pi chechkaithag ab Jiosh wui.
K hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Jiosh at hab ha juh mo pi ha'ichu a'amichuth. K am hab wabsh i chu'ig ith i tashkaj. Shahag wepo mo pi ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu kah.
David ash wa hab kaij ab Jiosh wui: Hegam mat gm hu s-m-ohhoth at wo hejel e sho'igch am e-pipiast ed k wo i shulig k s-ko'okam wo e namkith
k heg wo wa wepok mo pi ha'ichu neith. T g ha-kudutadag ab wo si i wehchi.

Neh, bo chu'ig. Jiosh at am ha thagito hegam ni-wehm o'othham mo pi ab hu kaiham. T heg hekaj am i e ahgahi g tho'ibiathag ahga gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui. Kutp hems ha'i g ni-wehm o'othham wo s-ha hehgam k ab haha wo kaihamath g Jiosh. Kut pi wabsh wo s-kehg ha hugio g Jiosh.

Pi at ap chu'i g ni-wehm o'othham k ab ai g ge'e sho'igthag T heg hekaj g ge'e ho'ige'ithalig ab hih nahnko mahs hemajkam ha wui. Ab o him g tash mat mu'i Tutuligo ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui k ha'akia ab wo ai mo he'ekia hab i ha elith g Jiosh mat wo ha tho'ibia. T g nahnko mahs hemajkam ab ep wo bei g ge'e ho'ige'ithalig heg hekaj.
Thani kehshaj g Jesus Christ mant wo em-ahgi ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kunt wo si ha'ichuch ihtha ni-chikpan.
Tp hems g ni-wehm o'othham wo s-em-hehgam k ha'ijj wo e tho'ibia.

Jiosh at ab i kuhpi'o g ap'ethag am ha wehhejed g gawul mahs hemajkam mat hekith gm hu hab i ha juh g Tutuligo. T g gawul mahs hemajkam ba'ich wo i bei g ho'ige'ithadag mat hekith am wo i e ai g tash mat g Tutuligo ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. Kut woho ab wo i e nohnogi wui.

Neh, ab ach mamka g Jiosh g wehpegkamaj g ha'ichu t-gehgewa ch hab masma chehgith mo wehs d enigaj hegai t-gehgewa. Pegih, t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo o d wehpegkam. K d si shel mat g ha-amjedkam mu'i ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui. Uhs mahmhadag o d Jiosh eniga mamtp ab wo mah g tatkaj. T-shohshon o d tatk. Ch ahchim d mahmhadgaj.

Mt wabshaba wo hikkumi'a hegam mahmhadgaj mat pi ab hu wo bahithagt k ab wo ha namki ab hegam mat wo s-kehg bahithagt. Pegih, t g Jiosh hab masma gm hu hab i ha juh hegam Tutuligo mo pi ab hu wohochuth k ahpim em-ui gawul mahs hemajkam mamt ab i s-wohoch. Kum ab hahawa wehs ap'ethag hegai mo haschu d i chum ha-ap'ethag hegam Tutuligo mo pi ab hu wohochuth.
Mt pi wo e haschuthath mat gm hu hab i ha juh. Jiosh at hab em-juh mamt hab haha wo masmak mam d Abrahambad amjedkam. Pi am d ha-shohshon ch wabsh heg wa wepo mam d mahmhadag.
Mtp hems hab wo chei mat g mahmhadgaj e hikkumi'a mat am wo em-jegel.
T wabshaba hab wa e juh nat pi pi ab hu wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Mt ahpim ab s-wohochuth k hekaj ab gi'is shonaj ab. Mt wabshaba pi wo si e haschuthath ith hekaj.
Gm at hu hab i ha juh g Jiosh hegam Tutuligo mo pi ab hu wohochuth. Kumt ahpim gm hu hab ep wo i e juh mamtp pi ab hu wo wohochuthath.

Jiosh at wo si s-hemajimak ab em-wui mamtp ab wo s-wohochuthath ch wabshaba ab em-wui wo kekiwua mamtp ab uhpam wo i e nohnogi pi ap'ekam wui. Pegih, ab g wo i oithahim ihtha k an wo u'ukchith g Jiosh hemajimatalig.
Jiosh at ab uhpam ep wo ha ui hegam Tutuligo mat ab wo i s-wohoch.

Ab at em-ui ahpim gawul mahs o'othham. Kum wa chum pi e nahtokch. Ith o wepo masma mamt wabsh chum hebai wo ha mul g i'ibhonig k ab wo namki g uhs e-e'es. Tutuligo o chum e nahtokch. T g Jiosh ab uhpam ep wo ha ui hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch. Ith o wepo masma mamt ab uhpam ep wo ha namki g ha-i'ibhonig am i ha mulink.

Neh, ni-wepnag, hemu at ha'ichu mahsko wua g Jiosh. Kuni ith s-em-ahgithamk. Kumt wo s-mahchk ch hekaj pi hab wo chum ge e elithath mam si s-chu a'amichuth. Pi at chum hekith im hu hab wo i e juhkch g Tutuligo ab amjed g Jiosh. Jiosh at mahsko wua mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi am i thahm mamt ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ha'akia ab wui wo i e nohnogi mo he'ekia hab i em-elith g Jiosh.
T haha wo e tho'ibia g Tutuligo. An o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab ant wo i wuhshath g hemajkam ha-tho'ibiakam ab ha amjed g Tutuligo. T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig.
Neh, bat wa masma hab wo e juh g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab ha wui g Tutuligo.

Ahchim Tutuligo ach d chum Jiosh hemajkamga nat pi ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshon. T wabshaba mu'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k hab masma e obgach ab wui. K g Jiosh heg hekaj t-chehani matt am wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj em-wui ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam.
Pi at hekith am gawul wo juh g e-chegitoi g Jiosh.
Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam am wa pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh. K wa g Jiosh pi ab hu em-ho'ige'ith. T g Tutuligo gm hu i e nohnogi ab amjed g Jiosh. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab em-mah g ho'ige'ithadag.
K wabshaba ab him g tash mat hahawa em-wepo masma wo bei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag g Tutuligo.
Wehs hemajkam o d pi ap chu'ijkam am Jiosh nena ed. Kut g Jiosh wehs ha wepo wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi.
Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g Jiosh. K g ha'ichu amichuthadaj ch ha'ichu mahchigaj sha'i si ge'ej. Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas hejel wo s-mai g hab elithaj o wehs wo s-amich mo has masma hab wua ha'ichu.
Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi o hedai sha'i mahch g Jiosh chegitoi ch pi hedai wo e nako mas am wo ha'ichu i shelini g Jiosh.
Wehs ha'ichu o d Jiosh eniga. Kut pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu mah.
Wehs ha'ichu at an nahto. K wehs ha'ichu an hab chu'ig wehhejed. K hab mahs matt chum hekith ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh!

Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, si o s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh. Tt heg hekaj wehs am wo i t-thagito wui matt am wehhejed d wo thothakamk ch am hab wo junihith g tatchuij. Batt masma s-wohom ab has wo elithath g Jiosh.

Pi g am hu ha oithch hab wo masmak hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh ch wabshaba ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui. T heg am gawul wo juh g em-chegitoithag. T hab wehs wo i e wechijith g em-thoakag. Bamt wa'i masma wo s-mahchk mo haschu d Jiosh tatchui. K heg d wa'i si hekia s-ap'ekam.

Jiosh o ab s-ni-ho'ige'ith ch ab ni-mah g gewkthag. Ni heg hekaj hab em-ahg wehsijj mamt pi wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath ch wo si s-mahchk mam haschu am chegito. Wehsijj amt am wo si i mamche mo he'es ab i em-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag ch haschu em-tatchuith mamt am hab wo junithath am oithch g e-wohochuthadag.
Neh, no hig pi woho nahnko ha'ichu hab wua g o'othham chuhchu'ithag, chum as d hemako g honshpadaj.
Pegih, tt hab wa masma nahnko ha'ichu wo junihith mat a'ai d wo i t-wehmtadagk ahchim mach ab t-hemakochuthch g Christ wehm.

Am g wo hekaj g e-gewkthag a'ai e wehhejed hab masma mo g Jiosh am ap'echuthch mamt hab wo e juh. Ha'i o ab em-mahkch g gewkthag mamt am wo ahgahith g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kumt ab wo s-wohochuthath ch wo ahgahith.
Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmtath g e-wehm wohochuththam o wo ha'ichu ha mashchamath

o ha'ichukaj ab wo i ha gewkemhunath. Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt ab wo ha'ichu ha ho'ithath g e-wehm wohochuththam. Am g s-ba'ama hab wo wuath ch s-ha ho'ige'ith. Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt d wo ha wanimedthamk. Kumt wo si chikpanath ch s-gewkam am hab wo junihith. Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt wo s-ha ho'ige'ith k wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth.

Pi g hab wabsh wo s-e junimk mam ab pihk e elith hedai i ha wui ch wabshaba si s-wohom ab si pihk e elith ab ha wui. Pi g hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ab hedai i wui ch wabshaba g s-ap'ekam hab wo wa'i junihith ab ha wui.
Ab g wo si ha tatchuath g e-wehm wohochuththam ch ab has wo ha elithath, chum as aigo pi ab hu has wo em-elithath.
Mt wo si chikpanath ch pi wo papadmak. Si e-ihbthagkaj amt ab wo ihmath g Christ ch wo chikpanthath.
Mt wo si s-hehgigk heg hekaj mo haschu g Jiosh ab em-wuichuth. Am g wabsh wo i s-thotholimak e-kudutadag ed ch chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.
Ha'i o e sho'igchuth g t-wehm wohochuththam. K ab t-ab matt am wo i ha wahpki t-kihki ed k ab wo i ha mah g i wehmta, chum as d wabsh wo ge o'othhamk.
Ab g wo i tahni g Jiosh mat ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mo em-sho'igchuth. Pi g wo sha'i has ha ahgath.
Ab g wo si ha wehm s-hehgigk hegam mo s-hehgig ch ha wehm pi ap e tahtk hegam mo pi ap e tahtk.

Am g wabsh s-ap e wehm wo kihkath. Pi g am wo chum e ha'ichuchuthath ch ab wabsh wo ha tatchuath g sho'igkam ch am hab wabsh wo junihith wabsh chum has mahs chikpan. Pi amt hab wo e elithath mam d s-chu a'amichuththam.
Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam wehs ha wui ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodagi g pi ap'ekam hegam ha wui mat ab em-wui hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
Am g wo i e nakog mamt s-ap e tahtk ch ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam mamtp he'es wo i e nako.
Pi g am wo hejel e agwuan. Jiosh at am hab wo wa em-juni. Neh, bo chu'ig an o'ohanaj ed g Jiosh: Ahni o ab ni-ab mant em-wehhejed hab wo juh g agwuithag.
K hab ep chu'ig g o'ohanaj: Mt wo gegos chum hems g e-obga matp d wo bihugimkamk. Kutp d wo tonomkamk, mt wo wasibi g shuhthagi. T hab masma am hejel wo i e chegito g em-obga.
T wo t-gehg g pi ap'ekam mattp wo hejel t-agwua. Kutt wabshaba wo gehg g pi ap'ekam mattp ab wo namkith g s-ap'ekamkaj.
Am o ap'echuthch g Jiosh mat in wo ha'ichugk g kownaltalig ch am wo t-thahmk. Tt heg hekaj ab wo wechok g ha-chehanig g kokownal
ch pi wo melchkwuath. Jiosh o ab ha mahkch g gewkthag. Kut wo t-namkith matt wo sha melchkwuath.

Tt heg hekaj wo s-ehbithath g kownal matt hab wo sha junihith g pi ap'ekam ch wabshaba pi wo ehbithath mattp g s-ap'ekam hab wo junihith. Am g hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam. T g haha'ichu s-ap wo em-elithath.
Jiosh at am i ha chuhcha g kokownal mat wo t-nuhkuthath. Kut wo s-ta ehbithamk mattp hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam no pi g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g gewkthag mat s-ko'okam wo t-namkith.
Hemho wa att wo himath g chehanig nach pi s-mahch mo pi ap'e matt wo melchkwua.
Ab o d wuikamaj g kownal hegai mo haschu ab t-kowlant mat hekaj wo himath g e-chikpan.
Pegih, tt ab has wo ha elithath g haha'ichu k wo namkithath g kownal hegai mo haschu ab t-chehani.

Pi att hedai wui wo chum t-wulshchith ch wabsh s-ap wo ha namkithath. Ith att wa'i hekaj wo chum t-wulshchith matt ab a'ai t-hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath. Ith o d Jiosh chehanig. Kuch ab s-wohog elith g chehanigaj ab a'ai si pihk t-elithch.

Bo chu'ig g chehanigaj: Pi g wo ha ehsith g ha-wehm kihkam. Pi g wo ha mua'i. Pi g ha'ichu wo ha ehsithath. Pi g wo pihk e elithath g s-kaisthagkaj. Neh wehs ihtha o hab d ahga matt ab wo si pihk t-elithath wabsh chum hedai wui hab masma mach has i masma hejel pihk t-elith.
Pi att hekith am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ab ha wui hegam mach ha hekaj si pihk t-elith. Neh, wehs ach am hab junihim g Jiosh chehanig mattp ab wo pihk t-elithath wabsh chum hedai wui.
Ith att hab wo wuath heg hekaj mat mehk wa'i hih g tash. E at ai matt ab wo si i t-nenenashanich no pi e aihim mat g Jiosh ab wo i t-wuwhas ith amjed jewed.
Pegih, tt wo thagito g pi ap'ekam k g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith. E o aihim matt s-ap wo t-tho'ibia.

Tt wo si t-elithath mattp wo ih'eth ch wo t-nondagch o attp wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwup o attp s-uam has wo t-wuath o attp wo s-ha hehgam o attp wo ha cheggia. Ab o t-ab matt am wo thagito hewai hab mahs ha'ichu k heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo d s-ap'ekam.
Tho si t-kownalig g Jesus Christ. Kutt ab wui wo i t-thagito matt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap t-tatchui.
Ha'i atp hems am wabsh kia pi gewpkthag g em-wehm wohochuththam am e-wohochuthadag ed. Kumt wabsh wo ha tatchuath ch pi wo ne'owi heg amjed mo haschu al i s-mahch.

Neh, am o wa s-ap'e matt wabsh chum haschu hugi wo ko'ath matp wo s-gewkthagk g t-wohochuthadag. K wabshaba ha'i pi gewkthag e-wohochuthadag ed ch heg hekaj hab e elith mo ha'ichu pi hiwgithas mat wo e ko'ath.
Kutt pi a'ai has wo t-eh'el heg hekaj mach haschu i ko'a nat pi g Jiosh ab i t-ui.

Pi o ab hu t-ab machs wo has ahgath g t-wehm wohochuththam. Tho Jiosh pionag. Jiosh o d t-ahmo ch heg am wo i a'appe mas s-ap am hab e junihim g t-wehm wohochuththam. T wabsh wo e nako mat s-ap am hab wo junihith no pi g Jiosh am i wehmaj wehs ha'ichu k ed.
Ha'i o hab e elith mat am wo oithath g Tutuligo ha-pipiast tash ch ha'i hab elith mo wehs tash am wabsh i e wepothag. Ab o hejel t-ab mattp has wo i elithath.

Matp hedai ab wo si has elithath hema tash ch hab e wua mat heg eda ab wo si i ihm g Jiosh. Tp hedai wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath ch ab wo si has i elithath g Jiosh nat pi ab wo si i ho'ige'el heg hekaj ha'ichu hugi. Kutp hedai pi wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath ch hab wa'ap wo si has elithath g Jiosh nat pi ab wo chum ho'ige'el g Jiosh heg hekaj mo haschu i ko'a k ab wo si has i el.
Pi ach hedai wabsh hejel t-wehhejed in d thoakam ch wabshaba Christ wehhejed in d thoakam ch wo muh mat hekith hab wo i el g Jiosh.
Pegih, thach Christ hemajkamga mach in d thoakam ch hab wa'ap d enigaj chum achs hems wo muh.
Christ at muh k ab uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed mat d wo t-kownaligk, chum achs hems wo muh.
Pegih, pi att am wo chum has ahgath g t-wehm wohochuththam. Wehsijj att am wo i gegokiwua wui g Jiosh heg i eda lothaita tash.
Neh, an o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Wehs at ab wo i shul g hemajkam ni-wui k ab wo ni-ihm mani d Jiosh.
Wehsijj att hemho wa hehe'ejel am wo i kekiwua ba'ich matt wo ah g hejel hab t-juni.
Pegih, mt hig wo ha'asa a'ai has e ahgath. Ith amt am hab wo elithath mamt pi am hu wabsh has wo e wuath. T hekaj pi wo heki hih g em-wehm wohochuththam o am wo gei pi ap'ekam ch ed.
Ab ach s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus ch hekaj chum s-mahch mo wehs g ha'ichu hugi hiwgithas matt wo huh. Tp wabshaba hema hab wo elithath mo pi hiwgithas, pegih, k pi ap'e mas an wo bei.

Kutp hems wo heki him k pi wo e tho'ibia matp hema an wo hekaj hegai mo haschu hab elith mo pi hiwgithas. Pi ach tatchua g t-wehm wohochuththam mattp wo heki himch. T eda g Christ wehhejed muh chum s-tho'ibiamk.
Pi g am hu ha'ichu has wo juhni mamt heg hekaj wo has em-ahgath, chum ams hems hab elith mo d s-ap'ekam.

Pi o d si ha'ichu machs haschukaj wo t-gegosithath. K wabshaba ith d si ha'ichu matt am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch ab a'ai t-wui wo si s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo si s-hehgigk mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am i t-ap'ech Jiosh wui.
Pegih, tt hab wa masma am hab wo t-junihith am wehhejed g Christ. T g Jiosh ab wo si s-hohho'i ihtha. T g hemajkam pi ha'ichu wo cheh mas ab wo t-abch.
Tt heg wui am wo i t-nako matt haschukaj ab a'ai wo i t-gewkemhunath ch ab a'ai t-wui wo s-ap t-tahtkk.

Tho Jiosh tho'ibiakam g t-wehm wohochuththam. Pegih, pi g ha'ichu hab wo juhni mas hekaj wo heki hihi. Wehs ha'ichu hugi o hiwgithas. K wabshaba pi ap'e machs wo ko'ath matt haschukaj wo ha heki hihimch g t-wehm wohochuththam.
Kutt heg hekaj wabsh wo thagito hegai mattp haschukaj wo heki himch g t-wehm wohochuththam. Chuhkug attp hems wo thagito o g nawait o wabsh chum haschu.

Am att wabsh wo hejel nuhkuthath mach haschu i s-wohochuth ith amjed ch heg wa'i Jiosh ab wo ahgi. Tt wo s-hehgigk mattp hab wo junihith hegai mach haschu i s-mahch mo s-ap'e. T hab pi wo heki hih g t-wehm wohochuththam.
Pi g am hu hab wo juhni hegai mam haschu pi mahch mas d s-ap'ekam k hab pi ab hu wo e chu'ichigch heg hekaj.
Pi att wabsh hejel am wo t-chegitoth ahchim mach ab wabsh s-ap s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch wabshaba ep wo ha chegitoth hegam mo pi am hu i si s-amichuth mo ha'ichu s-ap'e.
Kut heg hekaj ab wo i e gewkemhunath ch ba'ich wo i s-ap s-amich mo haschu s-ap'e.

Am o t-chehgithch g Christ matt pi wabsh hejel wo t-chegitok no pi pi wabsh hejel am hu e chegito mo wa in oimmed. An at o'oha g kelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam: Jiosh si Kehsha at ab wo nako g has e-ahgadag ab ha amjed hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh. Kut wa woho hab e juh.

Wehs o d t-mashchamadag mat haschu an o'oha g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Kutt heg ab ab wo i t-gewkemhunath ch hab s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenidath matt ab wo bei g t-ap'ethag ab amjed g Jiosh.

Tho Jiosh mo ab i t-gewkemhun matt s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenida g t-ap'ethag. Kuni ab tahni mat hab wo em-juh mamt am oithch hab wo e junihith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ch wehs e wehm ab wo ihmath g ohgaj Jiosh ch hab s-ap wo e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui.
S-ap o ab t-neith g Christ. Kutt ahchim hab wa masma ab a'ai s-ap wo t-neithath ch hab ab wo has elithath g Jiosh.
Chum o hekith am hab junihim g Jiosh mo has i kaij. T heg hekaj ia jiwia g Christ mat am hab wo t-juni ahchim Tutuligo hegai moki haschu g Jiosh ab ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad.

Kumt heg hekaj ab ep wo ihm g Jiosh ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab hab wa'ap s-em ho'ige'el. Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed mo hema hab kaij am Jiosh wui: Ab ant wo m-ho'ige'ithath am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam ch ab wo si ne'eth ch ab wo m-ihmath ha wehm.
K an hab ep chu'ig: Ahpim amt ep wo s-hehgigk gawul mahs hemajkam t-wehm ahchim Tutuligo.
K an hab ep chu'ig: Ab g wo ihmath g Jiosh wehsijj ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ch wo si hehgchulithath.

K an hab ep chu'ig mo hab kaij g Isaiabad: Ab at hema wo i wuhshani k wehs d wo ha-kownaligk g nahnko mahs hemajkam. T hegam ab wo i s-wohoch. Ith at d wo amjedkamajk hegai mash d t-kokownaligbad ha-shohshon ch hab chehgig Jesse.

Jiosh at hab em-juh mamt wabsh wo nenidath matp haschu am hab wo i em-juni. Kuni ab tahni mat ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag mamt hekaj wo si s-hehgigk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkk ab wui. Bamt masma ba'ich i s-ap wo nenidath g e-ap'ethag. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ba'ich wo i em-mah g wohochuthadag.
Ni-wepnag, s-mahch ani mamtp hu hi wa i s-ap am hab e junihim ch mu'i ha'ichu s-mahch mamt s-ap a'ai wo e mashcha.
Ni wabshaba ith eda o'ohana si s-gewkam ha'ichu am em-ahgith mant am wo i em-chegitoich. Jiosh at ab has ni-elith k am i ni-kei

mant d wo piongajk g Jesus Christ em-wehhejed ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam. Am ani wehsko ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh am ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. K heg hekaj ha ap'echuthahim g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K ab ihm g Jiosh ihtham.
Kuni si s-ap ni-tahtk ch chikpanith g Jiosh ahgachugch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus Christ.
Heg at am hab ha juh g gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab s-wohog el g Jiosh heg hekaj mani has i kaij ch has ni-wua. Kuni heg wa'i s-em-ahgithamk mat heg has e juh.

Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab ni-mahkch hegai gewkthag mani hekaj hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu. K ith am wohokamchuth g ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kunt am i ahgahi Jerusalem t amjed wehs jejewed ha oithch gm hu Illyricum (Albania) jewed hugkam.
Chum ani hekith hab ni-elith mant am wo i ahgahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mo hebai pi koi sha'i kah g hemajkam ab amjed g Christ k hab si wechij am wo i shonwuich.
Neh, bo d ahga ihtha Jiosh o'ohana mo hab chu'ig: T wo wa kah k wo s-amich hegam mat koi sha'i kah ab amjed hegai mat wo ha tho'ibia.
Neh, mu'ikko o ni-shohbithch ihtha chikpan nant pi pi koi nahto. Nt hab pi koi i em-chehgim.
K wabshaba hemu pi am hu ha wi'is manis am hu wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha oithch ihtham jejewed. Mu'i a'ahithag ani am chum s-em-chehgimelimk
ch antp hu'i haha wo ni-nako hemuch am himathch Spain jewed wui nani pi am s-himimk. S-mahch ani hi wa mamt am wo i ni-wehmt mant am wo him k am he'es wo i em-neithchkahim ch s-ap wo ni-tahtkk.
Nt wabshaba wehpeg gm hu wo hih Jerusalem wui k am ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmt g t-wehm wohochuththam amai.
Si ash e sho'igchuth g t-wehm wohochuththam Jerusalem t am. T hegam t-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed ch ed hab i e ah mat wo i hemapai g lial k hekaj wo i ha wehmt.
S-ap'e o mat am aigo wo i ha wehmt nat pi ab ha amjed i hih g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
Neh, am ant ha wehm wo hih hegam mat am wo i ui g ha-mahkigdag Jerusalem t am. Heg i thahm ant am haha wo i em-chehgim am himathch mant gm hu wo hih Spain wui.
S-mahch ani matt ab a'ai wo si s-t-ho'ige'el mant am wo jiwia em-wui.

Tham ni-wehm wohochuththam g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-mahkch g gewkthag mamt wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam. Kuni heg hekaj ab em-tahni mamt ab wo si e sho'igch Jiosh wui

k ab wo tai mat wo si ni-nuhkuthath. T hab pi has wo ni-juh hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Christ amai Judea ch ed. Ab g ep wo tahni g Jiosh mat am hab wo ha juh g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wabsh s-ap wo ui g t-mahkigdag.
Nt heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk k am wo i em-chehgim matp hab wo elithath g Jiosh.
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam. Ni ab tahni mat ab ba'ich wo i em-wehmt.
Am atsh wo i em-chehgim ihtha t-wehm wohochuththam mo hab chehgig Phebe ch am i ha wehmt g t-wehm wohochuththam Cenchrea kihhim t am.

Mt s-ap ab wo i nei am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus. Ab o d t-wuikam matt ab wo i ha wahpki hegam mo an oiopoth ch chikpan g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ge'e ha'ichu o am hab junihim ihtha Phebe mu'i t-wehhejed. Kumt am wo i wehmt heg hekaj mat haschu wo i tatchua.
Am g wo ha ahgith g ni-machiga amai mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Kah ani mash am thadha g Priscilla ch Aquila. Ihtham o wa am ni-wehm chikpanahim
ch chum alo e ko'ij ni-wehhejed. Kuni ab si s-ha ho'ige'ith. K hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mo ab ni-ab kah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab wa'ap ab s-ha ho'ige'ith mat ni-tho'ibia.

Kah ani mash am ha'i e hehemapath ch e mihshmath ha-kih am ihtham Priscilla ch Aquila. Kumt am wo ha ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Am g ep wo ahgith g ni-nawoj Epanetus mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Heg o wud mat si wehpeg ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh amai Asia jewed ch ed.
Sh am si i em-wehmt g ni-machiga Mary. Kumt am wo ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.

Sh g ni-hajuni Andronicus ch Junia am ep em-wehmaj. Ihtham at wa wehpeg ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Nt ab hahawa i s-wohoch. S-ap o ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mo heg hekaj ab gawulkthas. Kum wa hab wa'ap ha kuhpchkahim. Am g wo ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
Kush g Ampliatas am ep thak ch d si ni-nawoj am Christ himthag ed.
Sh am ep em-wehmaj hegai Urbanus mo wa am ni-wehm ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Sh g Stacas am ep em-wehmaj ch d si ni-nawoj.
Sh g Apelles am ep em-wehmaj ch hab wa'ap e chehgithch mo am hab wa'ap ha'ichu hab junihim wehhejed g Christ.
Sh g Herodion am ep em-wehmaj ch d ni-hajuni. Ihtham g wo ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Am g wo ha ahgith hegam Aristobulus ch hegam Narcissus mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
Sh am ep em-wehmaj g Tripina ch Triposa ch am chikpan g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Sh g Persis am ep si chikpan.
Sh g Rufus g si ge'e chikpan am hab wa'ap junihim. Rufus je'e o hab masma ab ni-neith mani d madaj. Kumt wehs am wo ha ahgi ihtham mat ab wo s-ni-ho'ige'el.
Sh am e wehm ab ihm g Jiosh hegam Asincritas ch Plegon ch Hermes ch Patrobas ch Hermas ch ha'i ehp. Kumt am wo ha ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
Sh am e wehm ab ihm g Jiosh hegam Philologas ch Julia ch hegam Nerias g e-uwiga wehm ch Olimpas ch ha'i ehp. Kumt am wo ha ahgi mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
Ab g wo e chehgith mam a'ai s-e ho'ige'elith. Wehsijj hegam mo an a'ai e nanmek ch ab ihm g Jesus Christ o ab s-em-ho'ige'ith.

Neh, am ant ha'ichu wo em-ahgi, ni-wepnag. An o ha'i oiopoth ch am gawul junihim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am ha'ichu hab ahg mat hekaj wo e kudu g t-wehm wohochuththam k ab e wui wo gegokiwua. Kumt wo si s-e nen'oithk ab ha amjed k pi ab hu wo i ha miabi.
Ihtham o wabsh hejel e wehhejed hab wua g pi ap e-tatchui ch pi ab hu chikpanith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ho o iattogith hegam mo pi ap mahch g wohokam wabsh si s-kehg neneokch ch s-ap has ha ahg.

Kumsh eda ahpim ab si s-wohog elith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ. Kuni heg hekaj ab si s-hehgig em-hekaj ch am s-em-ahgithamk mamt wo s-ap s-mahchk g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo mahchk g pi ap'ekam.
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam ch s-hohtam wo em-mah g gewkthag mamt wo gewito g Jiawul. Ab ani tahni g t-kownalig Jesus mat wo em-wehmajk ch ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g ho'ige'ithadag.
Ia o ni-wehm chikpan g Timothy ch hab kaij mamtsh ab wo i s-ho'ige'el. K ihtham ab s-em-ho'ige'ith ni-wehm o'othham mo hab chechgig Lucius ch Jason ch Sosipater.
Ia o ni-wehhejed em-o'ohanith ihtha g Tershus ch hab ep kaij mamtsh ab wo i s-ho'ige'el.

Ia ani tha kihj am g Gaius. K ith ab ep s-em-ho'ige'ith. Ia kihj am o e nanmek g Christ wohochuththam. Hegai mo d lial nuhkuththam am wehhejed g kownal ith eda kihhim o hab chehgig Erastus ch ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch hab wa'ap am em-ho'ige'elith. K g Quartus hab wa'ap am em-ho'ige'elith. [
Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.]

Nt am haha wo i em-thagito Jiosh wui. Heg at wo e nako mat wo i em-gewpkai. Mt hahawa s-wihnam ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Heg ani hekaj ahgachug ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam at wa heki hu an o'oha ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus Christ.
T g Jiosh hemu mahsko wua mo has d ahga k am tashogi mat am wo e ahgahith wehs ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam matp hems ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo s-wohog i el. Pi o hebai ha hug g Jiosh
ch wehs ha'ichu s-mahch ch ab i e maskogith am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus Christ. Kutt heg gahi wuhshanim ab wo si ihmath g Jiosh ch ab wo si has elithath chum hekith. Neh, ith ant am wo wa'i em-o'ohani.
Ni-wepnag mam am kih Corinth t am: Am ant wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d Jesus Christ kehsha mo wa am ni-tatchuith g Jiosh. K ia i ni-wehmaj ihtha t-wehnag mo hab chehgig Sosthenes.
Jiosh at ab i em-gawulkai mamt d wo hemajkamgajk. Kumt heg hekaj ab i e hemakoj wehsijj t-wehm ahchim mach hab wa'ap ab ihm g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Chum ani hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj. Ab amt i s-wohoch g Christ. T g Jiosh ab i em-mah g ge'e i wehmtadag.
M heg hekaj s-mahch mo haschu s-ap'e ch s-ap ha'ichu am hab junihim ch s-ap ha'ichu k amjed neneok.
Am o e chehgithch mam s-wihnam an u'ukch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ.
Kum wehs ab i neith g ho'ige'ithadgaj ch ep nenida mat ep wo jiwia.

Jiosh at ab i em-waith k ab i em-gawulkai mat hab masma hab t-juh. Kum hab si s-ap s-mahch g alithaj Jesus Christ. T g Jiosh pi hekith am hu gawul wo juh g hab e-elitha k an wo t-u'ukchith matt pi ab hu wo t-chu'ichigch heg eda tash mat wo ha lothai g pi ap chu'ijkam.

T-kownalig Jesus Christ o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant wo ha'ichu em-cheha. Kunt hekaj wo em-ahgi mamt pi ab hu e wui wo gegokiwua k wabshaba ab wo i hemakoj g e-chegitoithag k wo s-ap e tahtkk ab a'ai e wui.
Ia at ha'i thatha g em-wehm kihkam mo d Cloe hajuni k hab kaij mamsh pi e wehm neneok.
Ha'i amsh hab kaij mamsh ahni am ni-oith ch amsh ha'i g Apollos am oith ch amsh ha'i g Peter am oith. Kumsh ha'i hab e elith mamsh ahpim d wa'i wohokam oiththam g Christ.
Neh, am amtsh a'ai i e ga'agwulkath k eda d chum hemako ab wecho g Christ. Pi att hema ahchim ab muh kots t ab em wehhejed. Heg at wa'i Christ hab e juh. Kumt heg ab wa'i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko.

Pi ant heg wehhejed am hu jiwia manis wehs wo em-pahl wapko. Shahag wepo mant hegam wa'i Crispus ch Gaius ha wapko, pej hegam ehp Stephanus. Pi ant chegito manis ha'i ep ha pahl wapko. Pi ani hab ni-ahg mams ahni wo i ni-oi. Pi at heg hekaj am i ni-kei g Christ manis wo ha pahl wapkonath k wabshaba am i ni-kei mant am wo ahgachugath ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mo hab chu'ig mat ab e muhkith kots t ab t-wehhejed. Neh, ith ani wa'i ahgachug ch pi hekaj g s-hasig ne'oki mams ab wo si has ni-elith k p i am hu wo amichuth k hab pi wo e tho'ibia.

Hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam o hab elith mo d wabsh pi ha'ichu g ha'ichu t-ahga mat g Christ ab muh kots t ab t-wehhejed. Kuch wabshaba ahchim mach d t-tho'ibiakam s-mahch mo g Jiosh hab masma ab t-chehgithch g e-gewkthag.
Neh, an o o'ohanas mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ha'i o hab e elith mat wo i e ap'ech heg hekaj hejel e-amichuthadag. Nt wabshaba am wabsh wo pi ha'ichuch g hab ha-elitha.

Pegih, am o t-chehgithch g Jiosh matt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs wo hejel t-tho'ibia, chum achs hems ha'ichu wo s-amichuthath ch ha'ichu wo s-mahchkath. Pi att hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs wo ha ne'owin k wo cheh g Jiosh wohokam.

Jiosh at hab masma hab t-juh matt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs hejel wo s-mai g Jiosh k wo t-tho'ibia. Ha'i o pi ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K wabshaba hab d elithaj matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia.

Ni-wehm Tutuligo o s-hohho'ith mat ho'ip nei g s-hasig ha'ichu k haha wo s-wohoch hegai mo hab junihim. K g gawul mahs hemajkam s-kaimk g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-mahchig mat hab masma wo chum s-mai g wohokam.

Ch wabshaba ahchim hi heg ahgachug mat g Christ ab muh kots t ab k hekaj t-tho'ibia. Tutuligo o hab elith mo ith wabsh chehgithch mo pi gewkthag. K g gawul mahs o'othham hab elith mo wabsh chehgithch mo pi ha'ichu amichuth.

T wabshaba g Jiosh ab ha'i i t-gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo k hab wa'ap ab ha'i i em-gawulkai ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam matt ab wo i s-wohoch g alithag k wo t-tho'ibia. Hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam o pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth ihtha mat g Jiosh am hab t-juni am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. K wabshaba g Jiosh hab masma am t-chehgithch g e-amichuthadag ch e-gewkthag.

Am g wo s-chegitok, ni-wepnag, mam has i masma mat eda koi ab hu i em-gawulkai g Jiosh mamt d wo hemajkamgajk, Mu'ijj am pi ha'ichu mahch ch pi ha gewkthag ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu am ha-nena ed g hemajkam.
T g Jiosh ab i em-gawulkai mat hekaj am wo ha chehgi hegam mo pi mahch mo d wabsh pi ha'ichu g ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag ch ha-gewkthag.
Pi am ab hu em-ha'ichuchuth ch wabsh s-em-uhwaith. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i em-gawulkai mat hekaj am wo ha chehgi mo pi d sha'i ha'ichu hegam mo g hemajkam ab si has ha elith.
Heg o hekaj hab mahs mat pi hedai wo chum si e haschuthath am tahgio g Jiosh.

Heg at ab i t-wehnath g Christ matt ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed. T g Christ t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam k am i t-ap'ech wehhejed g Jiosh matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekam hemajkamgajk, Bo masma ab t-chehgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu amichuthadag.
Heg o hekaj an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi g hedai hejel ab hu wo e ha'ichuchuthath k ch heg ab wo wa'i ha'ichuchuthath mat haschu hab t-juni g Jiosh.
Kuni ahni hi pi sha'i hasigamkaj neok, ni-wepnag, mant eda am wa jiwia em-wui am ahgachugch
mat g Jesus Christ ab muh kots t ab am t-wehhejed. Kuni hab n-ahg mant heg am wo wa'i ahgachugath
ch heg hekaj si s-gihug ch gigiwuk.
K g ha'ichu ni-ahga pi am hu hab sha'i kaithag matp hems g si s-e mahchim o'othham ha'ichu ahga. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wohokamchuth g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
Heg ani hekaj s-mahch mo g em-wohochuthadag pi ab hu shon heg ab hemajkam ha'ichu amichuthadag ch wabshaba ab Jiosh gewkthag amjed.

Am ani wa hi wa ha ahgith g ha'ichu amichuthadag hegam mat ge'ege'ehogat e-wohochuthadag ed. K wabshaba ith pi d hemajkam ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag, chum hems hegam mo d s-has haha'ichu. Hegam ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag at wabsh ha wehm wo huhug.

Ihtha ha'ichu amichuthadag mani hab ahg o d Jiosh hab elitha am t-wehhejed ch an hab chu'ig mat koi in hu nahto ihtha jewed ch wabsh s-a'agi an hab ah chu'ig. Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat g Christ wo t-tho'ibia.
Heg o d kownal wehs ha'ichu thahm. T eda g s-has haha'ichu ab naggia kots t ab no pi pi mahch g Jiosh hab elitha.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi o hedai sha'i neith o kah o chegito mat he'es i s-kehg ha'ichu am i ap'ech g Jiosh am ha wehhejed hegam mo ab si tatchua.
Jiosh ha'ichu hab elitha o pi ta machima am t-wehhejed. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wehs s-mahch ch am i t-tashogith.
Neh, no hig pi woho mo pi hedai ep s-mahch g ha'ichu t-chegitoi hab masma mach ahchim hejel s-mahch? Pegih, ch ahchim hab wa masma pi hedai ep s-mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu chegitoi.
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab t-mah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am t-eda wo ulinig ch am wo i t-tashogithath mo haschu ab t-makiog g Jiosh.

Pegih, pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs am hu wo tashogi g Jiosh wohokam heg hekaj hemajkam ha'ichu amichuthadag. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahkch g ha'ichu amichuthadag mach hekaj am i tashogith. T hegam wo wa'i s-amich mo hedai edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
T hegam mo pi edgith pi wo amichuth k pi wo bei mo haschu ab t-makiog. Heg wa'i Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab t-mahkch g amichuthadag matt wo s-amich g wohokam.
Ahchim mach edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag att wo t-nako matt am s-ap wo i a'amich mo haschu am i t-tashogithch. K hegam pi t-amichuth matp hedai i pi edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.

Ith o hab ahg hegai mo an Jiosh t amjed o'ohanas: Pi o hedai hejel s-mahch g Jiosh chegitoithag mas ab wo ha'ichu i ahgi. Pegih, bo chu'ig. Kuch wabshaba ahchim s-mahch no pi g Christ ab t-mahkch g e-chegitoithag.

Am ani wa pi hasigam neok, ni-wepnag, mani am em-ahgith g wohokam namt pi pi koi ge'ege'ehogat ith eda t-wohochuthadag ch pi am hu si e thagitokch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. Bam wa'i masma mo g a'al nam pi d wabsh wechij ith eda t-wohochuthadag.
Heg o wa wepo mani g wihbi em-i'ichuth ch pi g ha'ichu hugi em-gegosith ab wabsh s-bahbagi ha'ichu em-ahgithch. Chum wa ia'i ithani amt koi ge'ege'ehogat
k hab wabsh kia chu'ig mo hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Neh, am am a'ai s-e hehgamk ch a'ai e kawani. K ith hekaj am tasho mam ha oithch hab e wua hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
Ha'ijj amsh hab chech'e mam ahni Paul am ni-oith ch ha'ijj hab chech'e mam g Apollos am oith. K ith am wohokamchuth mam ha wepo ha'ichu chegito hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.

Pi ach d si ha'ichu ch d wabsh piongaj g Jiosh mamt ab t-ab bei g wohokam ab amjed g Christ. Tho Jiosh mo ab t-mahkch g t-chikpan. Kuch am hab wabsh junihim mo haschu ab t-mahkch hab masma mo g oithag ch ed chikpantham.

Heg o wa wepo mani ahni am esh g ha'ichu kai am wehpeg ahgch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K g Apollos am wapga g esha am ba'ich i ahgch. K wabshaba d Jiosh ch am i wuhshath g t-esha mamt ab s-wohochuth k am he'es i oi g ha'ichu ahgaj mach am ahgachug.
Kuch heg hekaj pi d si ha'ichu ahchim mach am eshath ch wapga am ahgch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh o d si ha'ichu no pi heg am i wuhshath g t-esha mam ab s-wohochuth ahpim mam kah g ha'ichu ahgaj.
Wehs ach t-wepo masma ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, chum achs hema wehpeg am wo ah, tt hema am ba'ich wo i ahgahi. T g Jiosh ab wo t-mah g t-namkithadag matt he'es hab i juh g chikpan.
Pegih, thach piongaj g Jiosh g Apollos wehm. Kum ahpim d Jiosh eniga mach am em-chikpan wehhejed g Jiosh. Heg o wa wepo mam d Jiosh kihta.

T heg ab i ni-gawulkai mant em-chikp hab masma mani d s-ni-mahchim kihttham ch am shondath g kih am ahgachugk g Jesus Christ. Kum ahpim epai himchuth g kihta ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K ab em-ab mamt si s-nen'oith k am hab wo junihith.
Shondaj o heki hu nahtois ch d Jesus Christ. Kumt pi haschukaj ab ep wo shondath.
Neh, tp hems wo e mehi matp haschu kih wabsh g sha'ikaj hab wo e juh.
Pegih, t hab wa masma wo i e a'appe g em-chikpan. Mt heg hekaj si s-ap hab wo juh
k hab wo bei g e-namkithadag mat hekith wo e mamche.
T hi wo wa e tho'ibia matp hedai pi kehg hab juh g e-chikpan. T wabshaba g chikpanaj wo huhug hab masma mat g sha'i wo meitto am mei ch ed.
Heg o wa wepo mach d Jiosh cheopiga no pi am t-eda kih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Ith amt wo chum s-mahchk.
Jiosh at wo padch matp hedai wo i em-padch nam pi d enigaj ch d hekia s-ap'ekam.

Ha'i amtp hab i e ahg mam s-chu a'amichuth am ha nena ed g hemajkam. Pi g am wo hejel e iattogith. Pi at hab wo t-elithath machs s-chu a'amichuth hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu amichuthadag mattp heg an wo u'ukchith. Am g wo i e nakog mamt an wo u'ukchith, chum as hab wo em-elithath mam pi ha'ichu a'amichuth.
Tho wabsh pi ha'ichu an Jiosh tahgio mo haschu ihtham hab elith mo d ha'ichu amichuthadag. T g Jiosh an wo ha wulsh heg hekaj ha'ichu ha-amichuthadag mo hab masma an o'ohanas wehhejed.
K an hab ep chu'ig mo d wabsh pi ha'ichu g ha-chegitoithag g s-chu a'amichuththam am Jiosh wehhejed.

Kumt hekaj pi hedai wo chum ge t-ha'ichuchuthath. Thach wabsh em-pionag g Apollos ch Peter ha wehm. Wehs ihtha jewed o d em-eniga. Hegai mo hemu in ha'ichug ch hegai mo ab hahawa him o d em-eniga. Thoakag ch muhkig d em-ap'ethag.
Kum d Christ hemajkamga. K heg d alithaj g Jiosh.
Thach wabsh piongaj g Christ. K heg t-nuhkuthachuth matt am wo i tashogi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kumt hab masma wo s-t-mahchk.
Ha-pionag at heg am hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu g ahmoj chehani ch s-ap wo nuhkuth g e-nuhkutha.
Pegih, ni heg am wa'i chikpanith Jiosh. K pi sha'i ni-kudut mamtp has i masma hab wo elithath g ni-chikpan ahpim o hedai i hemajkam. Ni'inis hejel wo ah manis has masma hab wua.

Pi o ha'ichu sha'i ni-kudut am ni-chegitoi ed manis pi ap am hab junihim g chikpan am Jiosh wehhejed. K wabshaba pi ith hekaj e wohokamchuth manis am wabsh i si s-ap am hab junihim. Heg o wa'i Jiosh s-mahch machs hedai s-ap am hab junihim g t-chikpan.

Mt heg hekaj pi ab hu wabsh si s-hohtam hema ha'ichu wo abch mat koi wo e ai g tash. Am at haha wo t-a'appe g t-kownalig mat hekith wo jiwia k wo mahsko wua mach haschu i chegito ch haschu ahgch hab junihim ha'ichu k ab haha wo i t-mahkhi g s-ap has elithadag mo he'es ab i him t-wui.

Neh, ith ani am em-ahgith, ni-wepnag, ab t-amjed ahni ch Apollos mant am wo i em-tashogi mamt pi am hu thahm wo i chesh hegai mo haschu an o'ohanas Jiosh o'ohana ed. Pi amt hedai Jiosh pionag ha ba'ich ab wo si has elithath ch wabshaba ab wehs wo ha kaihamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Pi g wo chum si e haschuthath heg hekaj mam haschu i edgith ch haschu i s-mahch. Jiosh at wehs ab wabsh em-mah mam haschu i edgith.

Bamsh e elith mam heki hu wehs ha'ichu edgith ch heki hu d s-kakais ch d ge kokownal. Kuch eda ahchim Jesus Christ chuhchai pi d s-kakais ch pi d kokownal. Mamt hu'i woho d wo kokownalk. Kutt em-wehm d wo kokownalk.

Kuch eda wehs ha ba'ich d i sho'igkam ch attp hems wo t-ko'ij am wehhejed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Shahag wepo mo g Jiosh am t-chehgithch wehs ha ba'ich hab masma mat g kownal am wo ha chehgi hegam matp ha gewito k ha lilsoch.

Ahpim am hab e elith mam d si ha'ichu s-mahchim ab amjed g Christ ch si s-gewpkthag ch ab d si has ha-elitha hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. K eda ihtham pi kehg has t-elith ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hab t-elith mach pi ha'ichu mahch ch pi ha gewpkthag.
Hebai ach bihugko'o ch ep tonkko'o ch pi edgith g eniga. K hegam t-gewichshulig. Pi ach hebai t-mahch ch kih
ch si chikpan ch hejel t-thagio'ith. K hegam s-ko'okam has t-ahg. Kuch ab wabsh i s-ha ho'ige'ith. T-sho'igchuth o. Kuch wabsh nakog.
An o ahgahim g iattogi ab t-amjed. Kuch wabsh s-hemajim ha wehm neneok. Bo wabsh t-elith mach d wabsh hegai mo g hemajkam s-ohhoth ch gm hu nehnchuth.
Ith ani em-ahgith mant wo ha'ichu i em-shelini hab masma mam d si ni-tatchuithch ni-a'aliga. Pi ani hab ahgch em-ahgith manis wo si em-edawua.

Heg o wa wepo mani d em-ohg ith eda himthag namt pi ab ni-amjed kah g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh k hekaj bei g e-wechij thoakag. T wo mu'ijk g em-mashchamtham ith eda Christ himthag. Ni eda d wa'i ahni mant wehpeg am em-wui u'apa ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mamt heg hekaj e tho'ibia.
Kuni ab i em-gewkemhun mamt am hab wo junihith mani wa haschu am em-chehgith.

Ia o thaha g t-wehnag Timothy. Kuni am ahgith mat am wo i em-chehgim ed k wo i em-chegitoich matt has masma am wo himchuthath g t-thoakag am wehhejed g Christ mani wa am em-mashchamahim ch wehs ha mashchamahim mani hebai i hihhim. S-mahch am mat heg ab ni-amjed ab i s-wohoch g Christ k heg wa wepo mo d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag ch am hab junihim g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
Kah ani mamsh ha'i si e sheshmachuth hab e ahgch mant pi am hu wo i em-chehgim.
Nt wabshaba s-hohtam ab wo i hih em-wui matp g Jiosh hab d wo elithak k am haha wo s-mai mams has masma himchuth g e-thoakag ahpim mam chum si e sheshmachuth ch mu'i neneok.
Ab ach wecho g Jiosh. K pi hab chum chu'ig machs wabsh wo neneokath ch wabshaba g s-ap ha'ichu hab wo junihith heg hekaj Jiosh gewkthag.
Ab o em-ab mamt ab wo i e thagito wui g Jiosh. Nt hemho wo wa s-em-keh'el am jiwiak mamtp pi ab hu wui wo i e thagito, k wabshaba si s-hemajim ab wo i em-nei mamtp ab wui wo i e thagito.
Am ash ha'ichu hab ep chu'ig em-shahgith ch d si ge'e pi ap'ekam. Msh eda si e hahaschuth. Hema ash wabsh hohnig g e-ohgbad hohnig. Eda chump g Jiosh pi wohochuththam pi hab sha'i masma.
Mt wo chum si pi ap e taht mat ith am hab e juh em-shahgith k wo i wuhshath hegai mat am hab juh ihtha pi ap'ekam.
Chum anis pi am hu ha'ichug ch eda heki hu hab i n-ah mat ihtha o'othham hemho wa gm hu wo i e wuhshath,
no pi hab masma t-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus matt hab masma am hab wo junihith. T heg am wo em-wehmajk. Kumt heg hekaj am wo e nam

k wo i wuhshath ihtha o'othham ab e amjed. Kut am wo e sho'igch ihtha o'othham ge Jiawul wecho k atp hems ith hekaj ab wo i e sho'igch Jiosh wui k d wo e tho'ibiakamk mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus k wo ha lothai g pi ap chu'ijkam.

Pi o ap'e mams hab wo chei mam wabsh si s-ap'e mo eda an ha'ichug g pi ap'ekam am em-shahgith. S-mahch am ihtha hab che'ithag, “Al chum jewajithakud o s-gewkthag ch i ko'okpothkath g wahga.” Ith o chum t-tashogith mat g al chum pi ap'ekam ge'e ha'ichu wo padch.

Neh, t wo wa e muhkith g kahwal mad mat wo e wuhshath g t-shohshon ha tho'ibiathag. T g jewajithakud gm hu hab wo i e juh. Pegih, k g Jesus Christ d s-wohokam ch e muhkith am t-wehhejed mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam. Kum heg hekaj pi padchuthas ch gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam mat pi wo em-padch.
Pegih, tt wo si s-hehgigk ith hekaj ch gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam k hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab wo wa'i kaijjith g wohokam.

Heki ant hu wa am em-o'ohanith k em-ahgith mamt pi ab hu wo ha nawojk hegam mo ha wehm wo'iwup mo hedai pi d ha-wehm kihkam ch hegam mo s-bahbanma ch hegam mo melchkwuhim g chehanig kch hegam mo heg ab ihm ch ab wui e ho'ige'ithahun mo pi d Jiosh ch d ha-nahtoi g hemajkam. Pi ani hegam hab ha ahg mo pi d t-wehm wohochuththam ch hab chu'ig. Ihtham o an wehsko hab chu'ig. Kumt pi has masma pi ab hu wo ha miabi.

Hegam ani wa hab ha ahg mo hab e ahg mo d t-wehm wohochuththam ch eda am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Pi g am chum hems wo ha wehm thadhaiwua matp hedai wo ha wehm wo'iwup mo hedai pi d ha wehm kihkam o atp wo s-bahbanmak o atp wo melchkwuhith g chehanig o atp ab wo ihmath mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi ch ab wui wo e ho'ige'ithahunath o atp d wo s-i'imkamk o atp d wo s-chu ehskamk.

Pi o ab hu t-ab machs wo mamche g ha-chu'ichig hegam mo pi d t-wehm wohochuththam. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh. Ab o em-ab mamt gm hu wo i ha wuwhas hegam mat pi wo thagito g pi ap'ekam k eda d chum em-wehm wohochuththam. Ith o hab ahg hegai mo an Jiosh t amjed o'ohanas: “Gam g hu wo i wuhshath g pi ap'ekam hemajkam ab e amjed.”
Pi g am hu a'ai wo e lothaitath am ha tahgio hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ch wabshaba ab e-wehm wohochuththam ha wui wo e thagito. T am wo i ap'ech mamtp haschukaj pi e ap'et.
Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo hab him g tash matt d wo u'ugchuk ith thahm jewed ahchim Jiosh hemajkamga. Pegih, tt wo chum t-nako matt am wo i ap'ech g al chu'uchum ha'ichu am t-shahgith.
Mt ep wo chum s-mahchk matt am hu wa hebai chum hems g anghil wo ha lothai. Kutt wo chum t-nako matt wo ha'ichu i ap'ech ith thahm jewed hejel t-wehhejed.
Pi g am wo beh'i hegai mo pi mahch g Jiosh mas am wo i ap'ech mo haschu i pi ap'e am em-shahgith.
That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamt a'ai wo e lothaitath. Ab amsh si has ha elith g s-chu a'amichuththam ch amtp eda pi hema cheh am e shahgith mas am wo i em-ap'ech.
K amsh a'ai e lothait am wabsh ha nena ed hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
Am am e chehgithch mamt i e gehgch mam eda e kam'on. Matp pi am hu wo i em-ap'ech g em-wehm wohochuththam, mt wabsh pi am hu has wo kaijjith ch wo nako, chum ams ha'ichu em-ehs.
Ni eda kah mamsh wabsh hejel pi ap ha'ichu hab wua ab ha wui ch ha'ichu ha ehsith chum hems g e-wehm wohochuththam.

Mt wo chum s-mahchk mat g pi ap hemajkam pi am hu wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed. Pi g am wo e iattogith mams am hu wo i wahp mamtp ha wehm wo wo'iwupath mo hedai pi d em-wehm kihkam o hedai d em-wehm chechoj o g em-wehm u'uwi o amtp wo jioshgat k ab wo ihmath mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi
o amtp wo s-chu e'eskk o wo s-bahbanmak o wo s-i'imkk o wo ha'ichu ha iattogithath ab hema amjed o wo ha'ichu ha wohppo'ithath.
Ha'ijj am hab chu'igkahim. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu hab i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig k am i em-ap'ech g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehhejed.

Kumsh hahawa ha'i hab chech'e mo wehs ha'ichu hiwgithas matp haschu wehhejed pi an hu ha'ichug g chehanig. Nt wabshaba am wo em-ahgi mo pi wehs ha'ichu s-kehgaj am t-wehhejed. Pi att wo chum hiwigi mat haschu gn hu wabsh wo i si t-ui.

Ha'i amsh hab chech'e, “Ha'ichu hugi o ab d wuikamaj g t-wohk ch g wohk g ha'ichu hugi ab d wuikam,” ch hab chum ahg mo wehs s-ap'e mach haschu i tatchua am wehhejed g t-honshpadag. K wabshaba ith pi woho mamsh has chum ahg. Pi att wabsh wo huhug hab masma mat ihtham ha'ichu k heg hekaj wo si t-nuhkuth. Neh, mo g cheoj tatchua mat ab wo i miabi g uwi nat pi hab masma nahto g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab d ahga ihtha mas wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwua, Pi at hab ahgk t-nahto g Jiosh machs pi ap wo hekaj g t-honshpadag k wabshaba hab ahgk matt g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed wo hekaj nat pi heg am t-wehhejed muh.
Jiosh at ab uhpam i wuhshath g t-kownalig Jesus ab muhkig amjed k hab wa'ap wo i t-wuwhas ahchim heg hekaj e-gewkthag mat hekaj ab i wuhshath g Jesus.
