Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo g em-honshpadag ab gi'i ab g Christ ch d enigaj. Pegih, mt pi woho hab wo juh g e-honshpadag mat ab wo i e wehnath g chehpa'awi.

Aha nam pi mahch mamtp hema i wo wehmaj wo'iwua g chehpa'awi k d haha wo hemakok heg wehm. Si o shel am ahg ihtha g Jiosh o'ohana ch hab chu'ig mo d hemako am Jiosh tahgio hegam mat wo e wehm wohpiwua.
K pi hab chum mahs machs hab wo masmak chehpa'awi wehm ahchim matt ab i t-thagito Christ wui nach pi d hemako heg wehm.

Ni heg hekaj hab kaij mamt wo si e nuhkuth ith amjed mamt pi wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwupath namt pi heg hekaj wo e hemakoj ha wehm k wo uamhu g e-honshpadag k hab masma wo i e mehkoth ab amjed g Christ.
Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo g Jiosh ab em-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am em-eda kih. Pegih, k d cheopigaj g em-honshpadag ch pi d wabsh hejel em-eniga.
Jiosh at am i thagito g e-alithag kots wui mat wo t-tho'ibia. Kutt d haha wo hemajkamgajk ch heg hekaj ab wo si has i elith k wehhejed wo hekaj g t-honshpadag.
Ia ant haha wo em-ahgi hegai mam wa ni-kakke ia ni-o'ohanithk. Ith amt wehpeg ab ni-kakke mas s-ap'e matt pi wo ha hohnt. Kunt hab wo em-ah mo chum hi wa s-ap'e mamt pi wo ha hohnt.
K wabshaba ha'i g ha-tatchuithag si s-gewkthag. K ihtham ha wehhejed ba'ich i s-ap'e mat wo e hohnt mat heg hekaj pi am hu wo i shul pi ap'ekam ch ed.
Kumt ab a'ai e wui wo e thagito ahpim mam d e hohonikam no pi g em-honshpadag d a'ai em-eniga ch pi d wabsh hehe'ejel em-eniga. Mt hab s-ap e tahtk ch wo e wehm kihk.

Pi g a'ai wo e tha'ath, heg hi wa mamtp am a'ai wo e ap'ech mamt he'es i tash pi ab hu wo i e miabi mamt heg hab wo wa'i juh ho'ige'ithahuna k am hab hahawa ep wo masmak mam heki hu mat pi wo em-gehg g ge Jiawul heg hekaj em-tatchui.
Pi ani ab hu em-chehani mams wo ge hohont, heg hi wa mamtp wo tatchuath ch wo e hohont.
Mamt hu'i pi wo ha wehm kihkamk hab masma mani ahni. K wabshaba g Jiosh pi wehs hab masma em-ap'echuthch ch ha'i em-ap'echuthch mamt wo e hohont.
Nt wo ha'ichu em-ahgi ahpim mam pi ha wehm kihkam ch ahpim mat koi g em-wehm kihkam. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo hehe'ejelk mani hab masma.
Mt wabshaba wo e hohont mamtp pi wo e nako mamt wo shohbi g e-tatchui. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo e hohont mamt pi wo e kudutath g e-tatchuikaj.
Tho chehanigaj g t-kownalig Jesus mamt pi wo ohhoth g e-wehm kihkam
k amtp wabshaba hab wo sha e juh k hemho wa pi hema ep wo hohnt o wo kunt k wabsh wo hejelk o an uhpam ep wo i e nodagi e-wehm kihkam wui.

Chum as pi d wo em-wehm wohochuththamk g em-wehm kihkam, mt pi am hu wo ha ohhoth matp wo tatchuath mat an wo em-wehmajk. Jiosh at am i ap'ech em-wehhejed mat pi wo padch g em-kihthag. T g Jiosh ab wo ha ui g em-a'aliga mat d wo a'aligajk. T g em-wehm kihkam pi wo ha padch.
Mt wabshaba wo ha hiwigi mat wo s-em-ohhoth matp wo tatchuath nam pi pi heg hekaj e wupulshch matp wo s-em-ohhoth. Tho tatchuij g Jiosh mamt wo s-ap e tahtkkath ith thahm jewed.
Kum pi mahch mas em-hekaj ab wo s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo e tho'ibia.
Pegih, tt am wabsh wo kia oithath mattp haschu d i wehhejedkam mat hekith ab i t-gawulkai g Christ. Ith ani wehsko ha mashcham g wohochuththam.
Pi o has d ahga mamtp wo pahl hikuchkask o pi wo pahl hikuchkask. Kumt pi wo chum ge gawul e juh ith hekaj. Heg o d wa'i si ha'ichu matt ab wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh.
Mattp haschu d i wehhejedkam mat eda ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh ch heg s-ap am hab wo junihith wehhejed.
Mamtp hedai d wo ha-neneholigak ith thahm jewed ch wabsh pi heg hekaj wo si e eh'el ab s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tp wabshaba am wo sha s-em-ap'et mamt wo e wuhpul'o, mt am hab wo e juh.
Am g wo s-chegitok mat em-wul'o g Christ ab amjed g pi ap'ekam, chum ams d nehol. Wehsijj ach d hahawa neneholigaj g Christ, chum hems ahchim mach pi d ha-neneholiga ith thahm jewed.
Jiosh at ab uhpam t-u'apa e wui heg hekaj e-alithag muhkig. Pegih, pi att hegai wo sha'i hiwigi mas wo t-shohbi mach d piongaj g Jiosh.
Heg o chum hekith am t-wehmaj. Kutt am nenaj ed s-ap hab wo junihith g t-chikpan matp haschu wud matt eda ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.

Neh, nt am haha wo em-ahgi mam haschu ab ni-kakke ab ha amjed hegam mo pi ha wehm kihkam. Pi o d chehanig ihtha mant wo em-ahgi. K wabshaba ab s-ni-ho'ige'ith g t-kownalig Jesus ch ab ni-mahkch g amichuthadag. Kunt heg hekaj wo em-ahgi mo haschu ba'ich i s-ap'e.
Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g t-kudutalig hemu. Kuni heg hekaj hab elith mo ba'ich i s-ap'e mamt am hab wabsh wo i chu'igk mam has i masma.
Mamtp wo ge wehm kihkamk ch pi am wo ohhoth o pi wo ha wehm kihkamk ch pi an hu wo hema i chum gahghi.
K wabshaba pi d pi ap'ekam mamtp an wo bei g wehm kihkam. Hi wa g hohnta at ab ba'ich wo i wuhshath g ha'ichu pi ap'ethag. Kuni heg hi wa chum pi hab elith mams ab hu wo nam.
Pi o am hu ge'e wi'is g tash mat ia ep wo jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm. Kuni am i em-gewkemhun mamt wo e nahtokchith heg wehhejed. Pi g wo sha'i hiwgith mas wo em-shohbi g hohnta
o g chikpan o g has tahhathkam o g em-eniga.
Tt wo hekaj g jewed thahm ha'ichu k wabshaba pi ab hu wabsh wo si pihk t-elithath nat pi wehs wabsh wo huhug.

Chum ani em-tatchuichuth mamt pi ha'ichukaj wo e kudutath. Gohkpa o kahch g t-chegitoi matt wo ge hohnigk. Kutt wabshaba wo t-nako matt heg am hab wo wa'i junihith chikpan am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus mattp pi wo ha hohnigk.
Mattp hedai wo ha hohnt k hemho wa ha'ichu am hab wa'ap wo junihith wehhejed mat wo s-hohho'ithath.

Kumt ahpim u'uwi hab wa'ap wo e nako mamt ab wo gawulkthask ch heg am hab wo wa'i junihith chikpan am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus mamtp hedai pi wo ha kunk o koi wo ha kunt. Mtp wabshaba hedai wo ge kunk ch ha'ichu am hab ep wo junihith ha wehhejed mat wo s-hohho'ithath.

Ith ani hab kaij nani pi tatchua mant am wo i em-wehmt ch pi heg hekaj manis am ha'ichukaj em-shoshobith. Tatchua ani mamt am hab wo junihith mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch pi wo hiwigi mas am ha'ichu wo em-shohbi mamt am wehs wo i e thagito t-kownalig Jesus wui.
Mt wabshaba wo ha hiwigi g u'uwi e-a'aliga mat wo ha kunt mamtp hab wo elithath mo d si tatchui nat pi s-ap ge'ege'ehogat. Am o wa s-ap'e mat am hab wo e juh.
K wabshaba am wa s-ap'e mamt wo ha nuhkuthath mamtp hab wo elithath mo s-ap'e no pi pi d tatchui.
Pegih, am o wa s-ap'e mamt wo ha hiwigi ch hi wa ba'ich i s-ap'e mat pi wo ha kunt.
Matp hedai wo e hohont k d wo e-wehm kihkamk am hugkam mat hekith hema wo i muh. K am hahawa s-ap'e mat ep wo bei g wehm kihkam, heg hi wa mat g e-wehm wohochuththam an wo bei.
Mt wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-ap'e tahtkkath mamt pi ep wo bei g wehm kihkam. Neh, ith o am ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.

Am ant haha wo em-ahgi hegai mam ab ni-kakke ab amjed hegai ha'ichu hugi mo g hemajkam an to'aw am chum iagchulithch g e-jijoshga. Ha'ijj amsh hab e elith mam si s-mahch mamt has wo chum e junihith ch si e hahaschuth g ha'ichu e-mahchigkaj. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mamt am hab wabsh wo junihith mat haschu d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g em-wepnag mamtp woho ab wo ha tatchuath.
Pi amki koi ha'ichu s-mahch mamtp hab e elith mam s-e-mahch.
Jiosh o s-t-mahch ahchim mattp ab si tatchua.
Pegih, k pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshga am t-wehhejed nach pi s-mahch mo g Jiosh d hemako.
K eda mu'i an ha'ichug g gewpkthag an thahm kahchim ch ed ch an jewed thahm mo hab e a'aga jijosh ch kokownal.

Ch ahchim hi s-mahch mo d hemako g Jiosh t-ohg. K wehs ha'ichu d amjedkamaj. Kuch heg wehhejed in d thothakam. K g t-kownalig Jesus Christ d hemako ch wehs ha'ichu nahto. K heg gahi wuhshanim g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag.

Pegih, msh ha'i hi wa s-mahch mo g ha-jijoshga pi d ha'ichu am t-wehhejed ch hekaj pi has e elith ch wabsh ko'a hegai mo an e to'aw ha wehhejed. Sh ha'i g em-wehm wohochuththam pi am hu s-ap s-mahch mo pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshga no pi heki hu wa'i amjed ab has ha elith. Kumsh ko'a hegai mo am e to'aw. Sh ihtham am em-neith ch am em-oithch hab e junihim ch eda hekaj e kudut no pi hab elith mo pi ap'e.
Kumsh ahpim hab kaij mo pi has d ahga am Jiosh nena ed mamt wo huh ihtha. Pegih, matp pi has d ahga k ch pi ha'ichu wo heki em-wua mamt wabsh wo thagito.
Chum as hi wa s-ap'e hejel em-wehhejed mamt wo huh ch wabshaba pi ap'e mamt wo huh matp heg hekaj wo e kudut k wo i shul hegam mo pi hab masma s-mahch ihtha.

Ihtham atp hems am t-oithk hab wo e juh ahchim mach ha'ichu s-mahch k am hab wo juh mo haschu hab elith mo pi ap'e. Pi att am hu wo i wahp k wo t-gegos mo hebai i e ko'a hegai mo an e to'aw ha wehhejed g ha-jijoshga
natt pi heg hekaj wo heki ha himch hegam mo pi gewpkthag e-wohochuthadag ed. Tsh eda g Christ ha wehhejed muh no pi s-ha tho'ibiamk.
Kutt wo padch mo haschu hab chum s-junimk am ha wehhejed mattp wo heki ha himch.
Pi att hekith wo huh matp haschukaj wo heb hu hihi g t-wepnag mat am t-oithch hab wo e junihith.

Pi ani em-ahgith mams am hab wo junihith hegai mani ahni haschu pi am hu hab wua. Ahni ani hab wa'ap pi hekaj g ha'ichu ni-ap'ethag, chum anis d uhgchu ch ge'e ap'ethag nat pi am i ni-kei g Jiosh mant wo ahgachugath g Christ. Ni heg am neith am i thahm mat e chegito k i wuhsh. Kum ahpim d e tho'ibiakam heg hekaj ha'ichu ni-ahga mani am ahgachug wehhejed g Jesus Christ.
Chum as ha'i pi wohochuth mani d Jesus Christ kehsha, m wabshaba ahpim s-wohochuth nat pi em-tho'ibia k hekaj am wohokamch mani d kehshaj.
Ith ani am ha ahgith hegam mo pi wohochuth mani d Christ kehsha.
Ahchim mach d Christ chuhchai ach edgith g ap'ethag matt ab wo bei g t-gegosig heg hekaj t-chikpan.
Christ wepnag ch Peter ch ha'i ehp g Christ chuhchai ash an uh'uthch g e-wehm kihkam mo eda hasko hihhim ch am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kumsh am ha thagio'ith.
Bani wa masma ap'ethag. Kuch eda ahchim g Barnabas wehm pi hekaj g t-ap'ethag ch wabsh hejel t-thagio'ith.

K eda wehs nahnko mahs chikpantham ab u'u g e-gehgewi ab e-chikpan amjed. Shonthal am ha thagio'ith ch g oithag chikpantham ab ha namkith heg hekaj mo haschu i bahijith ch g ha'ichu thoakam ha nuhkuththam ha gegosith heg hekaj mo haschu ab i wuhshani.
Pi o d wabsh hemajkam hab ha-elitha ihtha. An o hab chu'ig heg eda Jiosh chehanig
mat g Mosesbad an o'oha: Pi amt an hu wo wulsh g woiwis chini mat wo kehiwia g ha'ichu bahijitha. Neh, pi o hegam hab wa'i ha ahg woiwis.
Ahchim o hab ep t-ahg. Hegai mo hedai i moihun ch hegai mo hihk g e'es at hemho wa ab wo ha'ichu i nei ith ab e-chikpan.
Heg o wa wepo matt am ei g ha'ichu kai em-shahgith, am em-ahgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K hab chum mahs matt ab ha'ichu wo i nei em-amjed.

Am amsh ha'i i ha wehmaj. Kuch eda ba'ich i ap'ethag matt ab wo chum i nei ha'ichu em-amjed ch wabshaba pi hekith ab hu em-tahni ch am wabsh wehs ha'ichu nakog matt pi an hu wo shohbi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g Christ.
Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo hegam mo am chikpan ge'e cheopi ch ed ab i neith g e-gegosig heg amjed mo g hemajkam ab mahkch g Jiosh.
Pegih, k hab wa'ap masma am t-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus hemu. Ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh attsh ab amjed wo i nei g t-thagio'ithadag.

Ni eda pi hekith sha'i hekaj ihtha ni-ap'ethag ch pi heg hekaj em-ahgith ihtha manis em-chehani mamt wo i ni-thagio'i hemu. Ba'ich i mant wo bihugim k wo muh kih hegai manis wo em-kowlant ith hekaj s-kehg ha'ichu ahga.

Ab o ni-chehani g Jiosh mant wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kunt wo si pi ap ni-tahtkk mantp pi am hu hab wo junihith. Jiosh ash ab ep em-chehani mamt wo t-namkith ahchim mam ab t-amjed kah g ha'ichu ahgaj. Ni wabshaba pi ab hu em-tahni heg hekaj mant ba'ich wo i s-ap ni-tahtkk ab wabsh em-mahkch.
Mantp ahni hab i n-ah mant am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan ch hekaj ab wo bei g ni-gehgewi. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ni-chehani ch ab ni-hiwig.
Pegih, k ith d ni-gehgewi mani si s-ap ni-tahtk heg hekaj mani ab wabsh em-mahkch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Heg ani hekaj pi hekaj g ni-ap'ethag manis wo em-kowlant.
Pi ani hedai ha hiwig ch wabshaba wehs ha wehhejed ni-pionchuth mantp hems hab masma mu'i ab wo i ha nohnogi Christ wui.
Ni am ha oithch hab ni-junihim hegam mo am oith g heki hu t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo mani hekith i ha wehmaj

ch am ha oithch hab ni-junihim hegam mo pi am hu oith mani hekith i ha wehmaj mant hekaj ab wo i ha nohnogi Christ wui. K eda pi hab mahs manis pi ab hu wecho g Jiosh chehanig nani pi am hab junihim mo haschu ab i ni-chehani g Christ.

Pi ant am hab wo junihith mat haschu wo ha kudutath, chum anis s-mahch mo s-ap'e am ni-wehhejed. Tp hems heg hekaj wo ni-hiwigi mant am wo i ha wehmt. Wehs ani ha wepo masma hab ni-wua mantp hems hab masma ab wo i ha nohnogi Christ wui wabsh chum has masma.
Ith ani wehs hab wua mant hekaj am wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh matt t-wehm wo bei g s-ap tahhathkam.
S-mahch am mat g e melchuththam hab wa'i masma wo bei gehgewi mat wo si e nakogath. Tt hab wa masma am wo t-nakogath matt wehs am hab wo juh g Jiosh tatchui.

Hegai mo hedai i tatchua mat wo bei g gehgewi at hemho wa wo e momoisha k wo e nuhkuth wehs ha'ichu k ed. Neh, ith o wehs hab e wua heg wa'i wehhejed mamt ab wo wahki g gihko. T eda wabsh wo huhug. Ch wabshaba ahchim am hab t-junihim heg wehhejed m at pi hekith wo huhug.

Ni hekaj hab hi heg wa wepo mani shel med heg wui mant am wo nahto g ni-mel k ab wo bei g ni-mahkigdag. S-mahch am mo g shonikkashtham pi tatchua mas wo heki wua g e-shonihina. Ni ahni hab wa'ap pi tatchua manis wo heki wua g ni-ap'ethag wehhejed g ni-chikpan.
Shonikkashtham o ab si e nakog ch e momoisha. Ni ahni hab wa masma ni-nakog Jiosh chikpan ed mat pi wo ni-ohhoth heg amjed am i thahm mant ab i em-wai mamt am hab wa'ap wo junihith.

Am am wa chum s-mahch matsh wa haschu has e juh am ha tahgio g t-shohshon matsh wa g Mosesbad am i ha wanim. Jiosh ash hab masma ha nuhkuth ch ha wanimed mash wa g chewagi am ha ba'ich him. Kutsh am gahi i huhud g ge'e shuhthagi.
Ith atsh hab ha juni mat hekaj ab wo s-wohog elithath g Mosesbad.
Wehsijj ash am ko'a hegai ha'ichu hugi mash g Jiosh ab ha mahk
ch wehsijj ab ih'e hegai shuhthagi mash ab ge'e waw t amjed tha'iwuni ch s-wawinig. Ihtha waw o wepogithas g Christ mo g thoakgaj chum hebai ha wehmaj ch ab ha mahkch g ho'ige'ithalig.
Tsh wa eda mu'ijj pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh. Tsh hekaj si pi ha hohho'i ihtham k ab ha hugio tohono jewed ch ed mash an oiopohim. Sh g ha-hohon am wabsh e thagitohim.
Pegih, wehs ihtha o d wabsh chehgitha mat wo t-shohbi matt pi ab hu wo i tatchua g pi ap'ekam mash wa hab e wua ihtham

ch pi ab hu wui wo t-ho'ige'ithahu mo haschu pi d Jiosh mash wa hab e wua ha'ijj ihtham. Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed matsh wa am thadhaiwua k huh mat haschu am to'i hegai mo chum jioshchuth k am i wuwhag k e waila.
Am hu hebai ehp, sh ha'ijj wabsh chum hedai ha wehm wo'iwup. Tsh g Jiosh am ha'i ha cheha matsh wo ha koktha. Tsh gokko gamai waik mihl (23, 000) e ko'ij hemako tash ed.
Am hu hebai ehp, tsh ha'ijj bagach g Jiosh. Tsh heg hekaj am ap'ech matsh wo ha ki'ikka g kohk'oi k wo ha hugio.
Am hu hebai ehp, sh ha'ijj pi ap has ahg g Jiosh hab kaijch mash pi ap ha thagio'ith. Tsh heg hekaj am ap'ech matsh g anghil wo ha hugio. Mt heg hekaj pi am hu ha oithch hab wo e junihith.
Ith ash wehs an o'ohanas mat wo t-shohbithath matt pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ahchim mach hemu in d thothakam am wehs ha oithch.
Ha'ijj amsh hab e elith mam s-gewpkthag am e-wohochuthadag ed. Mt wabshaba wo si s-e nen'oithk mamt pi wo i e jushathkath k pi wo i gei am pi ap'ekam ch ed no pi wehsijj t-a'appem g Jiawul.

Wehs hegai a'appema mo ab t-aihim o chum hedai ab a'ahe. K wabshaba g Jiosh hab kaij matsh wo t-nuhkuthath ch heg hekaj pi hiwgith mas wo t-a'appe am thahm matt he'es wo i t-nako ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag matt wo nakog k wo t-tho'ibia heg amjed.
Pegih, ni-wepnag mani si em-tatchua, pi g ab hu wui wo sha'i e ho'ige'ithahunath hegai mo haschu pi d Jiosh.
Am g wo i a'amichuth ihtha nam pi ha'ichu s-a'amichuth.
Ab ach ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab si ihm g alithaj mach eda hab wua g mihshmetha chemait hugi no pi hab d ahga mat am i thagito g e-hon kots t ab k am iawua g e-eh'ed mat am t-wehhejed muh.
Tho wa'i hemako hegai mat am t-wehhejed muh. Ch ahchim am t-chehgithch mach am wehmaj d hemako am t-wehm hab wuathch g t-mihshmetha chemait hugi.
Jiosh atsh am ha cheha g t-shohshon mat wo ha koktha g ha'ichu thoakam k hekaj wo iagchul g e-chu'ichig wehhejed k haha wo huh hegai chuhkug. K hegam mo ko'a ab ihm g Jiosh.
Pegih, k hegam mo ab ha wui iagchulith g e-jijoshta ab ha ihm ko'athch g e-iagchulitha. K eda pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshta.
Ab o wabsh ha ihm g jijawul pi e mahchch mas has e wua. Kuni pi em-tatchuith mams wo ha wehm ab ha ihm g jijawul ko'athch hegai mo ab ha to'ith.
T-kownalig Jesus Christ o ab t-mahkch ihtha t-mihshmetha chemait hugi. K pi sha'i hiwgithas mams wo ha wehmajk amai mo ab ha ihm g e-jijoshga ko'athch hegai mo ab ha tho'ith.

Shahag wepo mam tatchua mamt wo hehgamch g Jiosh ab ha ihmathch g jijawul mamtp hedai ha wehm ko'a mo haschu ab wui e to'aw g ha-jijoshga. S-e g wo nen'oithk no pi ba'ich i s-gewkthag g Jiosh mam ahpim ch wo s-ko'okam em-namkith.

Msh ha'i hab chech'e mo wehs ha'ichu hiwgithas matp haschu wehhejed pi an hu ha'ichug g chehanig. Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo pi wehs ha'ichu s-ap'e am t-wehhejed. Wehs ha'ichu o hiwgithas ch wabshaba pi wehs d wo i t-wehmtadagk.
Am g wo s-chegitok g chum hedai ha-ap'ethag ch pi wabsh hejel e-tatchui.
Oi g am wabsh wo huhgi matp haschu am e gagda nolawtakud ch ed k pi wo e kudu mas hebai e bei. Pi o ab hu em-ab mams ab wo ha kakke mas d hegai mo ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshga.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo wehs ha'ichu d enigaj.

Mamtp wo tatchuath ch am wo e gegositho ha-kih am hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam ch ab em-waith. Kumt wabsh wo huh matp haschu ab wo i em-to'i k pi ab hu wo ha kakke mas ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshga, wabsh pi wo e kudu mas hebai be k ab em-mah.

T wabshaba hema ab wo sha si em-ahgi mat ab e to'i g ha-jijoshga, mt pi wo huh mat heg hekaj pi wo e kudu hegai mo em-ahgith. Pegih, mtp hems ha'i hab wo chei, “Ms haschu ahgk hig wo ge has ni-ahgath heg hekaj mani haschu i ko'a mani eda heg hekaj ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh?
Kunis haschu ahgk wo ni-shohbi heg wabsh hekaj mam e kudut?”
Pegih, woho o wa mach ap'ethag matt wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath. K wabshaba ab t-ab matt ab wo si ha'ichuch g Jiosh wabsh chum haschu k ed, chum hems heg hekaj mach haschu i ko'ath ch haschu i ih'e.
Am g wabsh s-ap wo kihkath ch pi ha'ichu am hu hab wo junihith mas heg hekaj hedai am hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam, chum hems hegam mo pi d e tho'ibiakam.

Bamt wo masmak mani ahni. Pi ani am hu wa'i hejel ni-chegito ch wabshaba wehs s-ha chegito g hemajkam. Bani wa ni-wua matp hems heg hekaj wo s-hohho'i mani has ni-wua k ab wo s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga k wo e tho'ibia.
Am g wo ni-oithk hab e wuath hab masma mani ahni Christ oithch hab ni-junihim.
Ab ani si has em-elith mamsh chum hekith s-ni-chegito ch am oithch hab e junihim ihtha himthag mant am em-wui u'apa.
Mt wabshaba wo chum s-mahchk mo g cheoj am thahm g uwi. K g Christ am thahm g cheoj. K g Jiosh am wehs ha'ichu thahm.

Ith amt wo chehgithch mam eda e mihshmath. Mt heg hekaj ahpim chechoj pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi mam hekith i e ho'ige'ithahun ch am ep ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamtp ab wo ha ma'ishchith.

Kumt ahpim u'uwi hi ab wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi mam hekith i ha kaichuthch e ho'ige'ithahun ch am ep ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Bat wa masma wo s-ta edamak mamt wo s-wohlim hih g e-mo'o mamtp pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith.
Pegih, mt ab wo e ma'ishchith ch wo e mihshmath k heg hekaj pi wo si e el.

Kumt ahpim chechoj pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi e mihshmathch no pi g Jiosh am t-eda chehgithch g e-gewkthag. Mt wabshaba ahpim u'uwi ab wo e ma'ishchith nam pi ab wecho g chechoj ch ab chehgithch g ha-gewkthag.
Jiosh at wehpeg nahto g cheoj k heg amjed ab i wuhshath g uwi k nahto am wehhejed g cheoj.
Ab o em-neith g anghil. Kumt ahpim u'uwi am wo ha chehgi ab ha ma'ishch g e-mohmi mam ab ha wecho g chechoj.
K eda hab d elithaj g Jiosh mat g cheoj ch uwi ab a'ai wo e hiwgath ch ab a'ai wo i e wehmajk.
Woho o wa mat g Jiosh ab i wuhshath g uwi ab amjed g cheoj. K wabshaba g chechoj ab hahawa uwi t amjed i wuwhag. K wehs ha'ichu ab d Jiosh amjedkam.
Am g wo oithahith ihtha mo pi hab chum chu'ig mas g uwi ab wo e ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui pi ab hu ma'ishch g e-mo'o.
S-mahch ach mo g che'echew mo'o s-ta edama am wehhejed g cheoj
ch wabshaba am wa s-ap'e g uwi wehhejed no pi ab mahkch g Jiosh mat hekaj ab wo e ma'ishchith g mo'oj.

Pi ani ahpim wa'i em-mashcham ihtha. Wehsko ani am ha mashcham mo hebai g t-wehm wohochuththam e hehemapath. Kush wehsijj g Christ chuhchai hab masma ha mashcham. T hab pi hedai ab hu wo chum t-ne'owi heg hekaj.
Msh am ha'ichu ep pi ap hab wua mam am e hehemapath.
Wehpeg ant ith hab wo ah mani kah mamsh ha'i ab e wui gegok am e nanmekch. Ni am wa he'es s-wohochuth ihtha.
Hemho wa at am wo i wuhsh g hab mahs kudutadag em-shahgith mat am wo i e tashogi mo hedai pi ap'e.
Na'ams hab elith mam s-ap hab wua g chemait hugi hekith i e nanmekch ch amsh eda pi ap am hab junihim.
Wehpeg amsh e wehm e gegosith ch eda pi a'ai e ho'ith ch ha'i wabsh s-kokwog ch ha'i nawko'o ch ha'i bihugko'o.

Bo wa masma tasho mam pi ab hu has ha elith g e-wehm wohochuththam ch wabsh si ha edawua hegam mo am d wa sho'igkam. Mt hemho wa ab wo e chu'ichigch ith hekaj. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo e gegos hehe'ejel e-kihki am k am hab wo juh g chemait hugi mam am e nanmek.

Am ani wa em-mashcham hegai mo wa g t-kownalig Jesus am ni-tashogith ab amjed ihtha chemait hugi himthag. Am atsh i shonwua heg i hudunk ab mamtki wa wo gagda matki wo e muhkith. Hegam mash wa ab wui e thagitokch atsh am i e hemapai. Kutsh g Jesus am i bei g chemait

k am i hahai ab ho'ige'ithk g Jiosh k hab kaij, “Tho ni-honshpadag ihtha mamt am i em-hahaini. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mant wo ni-muhkith am em-wehhejed. Ab g wo huhgi ihtha hahainig k ith chum hekith am hab wo junihith mamt hekaj wo s-ni-chegitok.”

Tsh wa woho hab e juh. Kutsh am hahawa bei g tahsa k hab kaij, “Tho ni-eh'ed ihtha nawait. Ith ani hab ahgch hab kaij mat g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua. T g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab wo juh hegai mo wa hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni. Ab g wo ih'i ihtha k ith chum hekith am hab wo junihith mamt wo s-ni-chegitok.” Neh, bo kaij g t-kownalig Jesus.
Kuch hekith am hab i wua ihtha chemait hugi ch am tasho wohokamchuth mat t-wehhejed muh ch ab aihim mat ep wo jiwia.

Pegih, tt am wo si hejel i t-mamche machs wa woho ab ha'ichuchuth g t-kownalig Jesus k am hab haha wo juh g chemait hugi. Tsh ab wo moht g chu'ichig matp hedai pi ap hab wo wuath ihtha chemait hugi no pi pi ha'ichuchuth mat am thagito g e-hon kots wui k am iawua g e-eh'ed mat t-wehhejed muh.
Tt am wo ai g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mattp hab wo juh g chemait hugi pi amichuthch mat am t-wehhejed muh g t-kownalig Jesus.
Heg am hekaj mu'ijj kok'o ch pi ab hu gewpk ch ha'ijj heki hu koi.

Bat wa masma hab wo t-juh g Jiosh hab ahgk matt wo thagito g pi ap t-chu'ichig k pi gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh hab masma mat hegam mat pi ab hu wui wo i e nohnogi. Pi at hab masma s-ko'okam ab wo t-namkith g Jiosh mattp hems wehpeg am wo si hehe'ejel i t-mamche mach has masma.
Pegih, ni-wepnag, am amt wo a'ai e nenida k wehs e wehm hab wo juh g chemait hugi.

Matp hema d wo bihugimkamk ch wo e gegos ab e-kih ab mat koi wo e ai g em-namki. Mt am hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo e chu'ichigch. Am ant haha wo i ap'ech mam haschu ab ep i ni-kakke hekith i em-neithk.
Ab am wa ep ni-kakke ab amjed hegai gewkthag mo g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahkch matt ab a'ai wo i t-wehmajk. Tatchua ani mamt wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab amjed ihtha.
Ithani am hahawa s-mahch mam wa ha'ichukaj am i e wanimed mam eda ab has ha elith mam haschu i chum jijoshchuth.

K wabshaba pi d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch am i em-wanimed namt wa ge e nako mams wo wohokamch mo g Jesus d Jiosh. Hegam mo pi edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o hab elith mo g Jesus am gawulkthas ab Jiosh t amjed. Kuch wabshaba ahchim mach edgith s-mahch mo g Jesus d Jiosh.
Ab o t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g gewkthag matt hab wo junihith g nahnko mahs ha'ichu am wehhejed g Jiosh.
K g t-kownalig Jesus am ap'echuthch matt has masma am hab wo junihith.
K d nahnko mahs chikpan mach am hab junihim ch wabshaba wehs ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh.

Heg o ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K ith am t-gewpkathch ch ab hehe'ejel t-mahkch matt has wo t-junihith ch am a'ai wo i t-wehmajk. Kuch s-mahch mo am t-e'eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag no pi ab t-mahkch g gewkthag.
Ab o ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo s-chu a'amichuth k am wo tashogi g s-hasig ha'ichu ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo si s-mahchk ch ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Ab o ha'ijj t-mahkch g ge'e wohochuthadag ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo ha thoaj

o g s-hasig ha'ichu hab ep wo junihith. Ab o ha'ijj hehe'ejel t-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga matt wo ahgath ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo neneokath g pi t-machiga ne'okikaj ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wabsh wo s-amich hegam ne'oki k am wo i tashogi k ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo s-mahchk mo haschu ahga ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch haschu pi ab hu amjed.
Neh, wehs ihtha o ab d amjedkamaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg ab hehe'ejel t-mahkch mo has i mahs chikpan am hab s-junimk ab gai t-wuhshanim.
S-mahch ach mo g t-honshpadag mu'i nahnko chuhchu'ithag ch wabshaba d wa'i hemako. Kuch hab wa masma wehsijj d hemako ahchim matt ab i t-wehnath g Christ.

Mu'ijj am hi wa pi d Tutuligo. Tt wabshaba pi wo t-nako machs hab wo chei mam pi d t-wehm wohochuththam. Ha'ijj am hi wa d nenehol. K wabshaba pi has d ahga mam has i mahs ch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. Heg at wehsijj ab i t-hemakoch. K hahawa heg wa wepo mach d Jesus honshpadag. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wehsijj an t-u'ukch.
Kuch eda nahnko mahs ha'ichu chikpan hab masma mo g nahnko chuhchu'ithaj g t-honshpadag.
T-tahtad o pi wepo ha'ichu hab wua mo g t-nohnhoi. Kuch wabshaba wehs ha tatchua.
K g t-nahnk gawul ha'ichu hab wua mo g t-wuhpui.
Kuch wabshaba wehs ha tatchua natt ge has masma ha'ichu wo kah mattp pi wo sha ha nahnkk ch pi has masma wo hewagi mattp pi wo sha ha thahkk.
Jiosh at am nahto g o'othham k hab masma hab juh g nahnko chuhchu'ithag ab t-honshpadag ab.
K wehs ab i e wehnathch g hab t-chuhchu'ithag no pi d hemako g t-honshpadag.
Pi ach hegam wa'i tatchua t-wuhpui ch wabshaba g t-nohnhoi ehp k ch pi heg wa'i tatchua t-mo'o ch wabshaba g t-tahtad ehp.
Ha'i o pi gewpkthag g hab t-chuhchu'ithag ch wabshaba hab wa masma d si t-tatchui.
Kuch s-ap ha nuhkuth ch ha ma'ishch mat pi wo mahsk hegam hab chuhchu'ithag mo pi ta neithagma.
Pi ach hab masma s-ha nen'oith hegam hab chuhchu'ithag mo pi has d ahga mat wo e neithath.
Wehs ach ha tatchua g hab t-chuhchu'ithag mat wehs e wehm s-ap wo chikpanath.
Pegih, bach wa masma chum t-wehm s-ap chikpan ch wehs t-wehm wo t-sho'igch mattp hema ha'ichukaj wo t-sho'igch. Kutt wehs t-wehm wo s-hehgigk mamtp hema ab wo si s-ap has t-ah.
Pegih, wehsijj ach d hemako g Jesus Christ wehm ch heg wa wepo mach d honshpadaj ch hehe'ejel d nahnko chuhchu'ithaj.

Jiosh at wehs ab i t-mahkhi matt haschu hab wo junithahith. K ith d si wehs ha thahm t-chikpan mach ha'i d Jesus Christ chuhchai ch am ahgachugch g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed. K ith ab oithch d t-chikpan mach ha'i d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga i tashogiththam. K ith ab oithch d ep t-chikpan mach ha'i d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ha mashchamtham. Ha'ijj ach s-hasig ha'ichu hab wua ch ha'ijj u'ukch g gewkthag matt wo ha thoaj ch ha'ijj am i ha wehmaj ha'i ehp ch ha'ijj am ha'ichu a'ap'echuth ha shahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam ch ha'ijj g pi t-machiga ne'okikaj neneok.

Pi att wehsijj gm hu mehk wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi wehsijj d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga i tashogiththam ch pi wehsijj d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ha mashchamtham ch pi wehsijj u'ukch g gewkthag matt hab wo junihith g s-hasig ha'ichu
o wo ha thoaj ch pi wehsijj neneok g pi t-machiga ne'okikaj ch pi wehsijj ab mahks g amichuthadag matt wo tashogi ihtham ne'oki.
K wabshaba ha'i ihtham mahkigdag ba'ich d i ha wehmtadag g t-wehm wohochuththam. Kutt heg hekaj ba'ich wo i tatchua matt wo hekaj hegam. K eda g pihk elithadag wehs ba'ich d i si ha'ichu.

Neh, ttp hems wo t-nako matt wo neneokath g nahnko mahs o'othham ha-ne'okikaj o chum hems g anghil ha-ne'oki. T wabshaba hegai t-ne'oki heg wo wa wepok mo g s-nakosig ha'ichu am e gew mattp pi wo edgithath g pihk elithadag.

Thach wabsh pi ha'ichu mattp pi wo edgithath g pihk elithadag, chum achs ab wo mahksk matt wo si s-ap i tashogi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o wo s-mahchk g ge'e ha'ichu ch g s-juhk ha'ichu ahga wo s-amichuthath o wo edgithath g wohochuthadag matt wo i himch g tho'ag.

Pi o ha'ichu t-wehhejed s-kehgaj mattp pi wo edgithath g pihk elithadag, chum achs hems wo s-chechojimak matt wehs gm hu wo ha mah g ha'ichu t-eniga, chum hems ab wo i t-thagito mamt wo t-mehith k wo t-koktha ha wehhejed.
Mattp wo edgithath g pihk elithadag ch wo s-hemajimak ch ab wo s-ha bahbgith ch pi wo chu hehgamk ch pi wo woikimak
ch pi am hu wo ha edawua ch pi wo chu tha'ath ch wo s-bamuistk. Pi att wo kuint mat hema pi ap has wo e juh
k pi wo hohho'i g pi ap'ekam k wabshaba si s-ap wo t-tahtkk ab kahkch g s-ap'ekam
ch s-ap hab wo ha elithath g hemajkam. Chum as pi ap hab wo e junihith, tt hab wo ha elithath matp hems wo wa a'ap'et ch hekaj wabsh s-ap wo nakogath matp has wo e juh.

Ab o hehe'ejel t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag g ha'ichu ahga ch pi t-machiga ne'oki ch ha'ichu mahchig mat d wabsh wo i t-wehmtadagk hemuch. Kut wabsh wo huhug ihtham mahkigdaj matt hekith am wo i ai hegai mo haschu g Jiosh wehs s-ap am ap'echuthch t-wehhejed. T wabshaba g pihk elithadag pi hekith wo huhug.
Neh, no hig pi g ali alikaj neok ch alikaj ha'ichu tahtk ch ha'ichu chegito? T wabshaba ab wo i e ai g ge'eligaj. T wo ge'ehogat.

Pegih, tt hab wa masma am gawul wo t-juh matt hekith am wo nei g t-tho'ibiakam am i ko'ok. Hemuch ach wabsh al he'es ha'ichu i s-mahch ab amjed g Jiosh. K ith heg wa wepo mach wabsh s-kohmagim neith ha'ichu. Tt wabshaba heg i tash haha wo si s-ap s-mai ha'ichu ab amjed g Jiosh ab i neithok g t-tho'ibiakam. T g t-mahchig hahawa d wo wehsk hab masma mo hab masma s-t-mahch g Jiosh.

Pegih, chum att hekith ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ch ab s-ap wo nenidath mat am hab wo i junihith g e-ne'oki am t-wehhejed. Chum att hekith wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj. K g pihk elithadag wehs ha ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu.

Pegih, mt am wo e nakogath mamt ab wo si pikh e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo i ha wehmtath heg hekaj mo haschu ab t-makiog g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matt hab wo junihith. T ith d wo si i ha-wehmtadagk matt am wo ha ahgithath mo haschu g Jiosh am i t-tashogith.
Pi at hedai hejel wo s-em-amichuth k ab wo bei g i wehmtadag mamtp wabsh g pi e-machiga ne'okikaj wo neneokath. Heg o wa wepo mach heg hekaj ab wa'i Jiosh wui neneok.
K wabshaba hegai mo am ha ahgith mo haschu g Jiosh am i ha tashogith am i ha wehmaj ch am i ha gewkemhun ch ab ha mahk g s-ap tahhathkam.
Hejel o wa'i e wehhejed hab kaij hegai mo gawul kaitham nenneok. K wabshaba hegai mo am ha ahgith mo haschu g Jiosh am i ha tashogith am i ha wehmaj g e-wehm wohochuththam.

Mamt hu'i wehsijj wo neneokath g pi e-machiga ne'okikaj. Ni wabshaba ba'ich i tatchua mamt wo bei hegai mahkigdag mamt si s-ta amichutham wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Pi at am hu hugkam d wo i ha-wehmtadagk mamtp wo neo heg hekaj pi e-machiga ne'oki, heg hi wa matp am hema wo gagda g em-ne'oki am wehs ha wehhejed.

Pi ant ha'ichukaj wo sha'i i em-wehmt mantp hems am wo jiwia em-wui k heg wa'i hekaj wo neokath pi ni-machiga ne'oki. Bant wa'i masma wo i em-wehmt mant am wo tasho em-ahgi mo haschu am ni-maskogith g Jiosh o g ha'ichu mahchig ab amjed o g ha'ichu mashchamigaj.
Ith ant wo ha'ichu wepogi mamt wo s-amich. S-mahch am mat pi hedai wo s-mahchk mo haschu ne'i am chum a'aga matp g uhs kuikud ch ahlpa pi kehg wo kaitha.
T pi hedai wo s-mahchk g shonthal mat has wo e juh matp g kuhutham pi ap am hu wo kuhu g kuikud.
Pegih, t hab wa masma pi hedai wo em-amich mam haschu am chum a'aga mamtp wabsh gawul kaitham wo neokath. Heg o wa wepo mat an wabsh wo i huhug g em-ne'oki.
Mu'ij o g nahnko mahs ne'oki ith thahm jewed.
Mantp pi wo mahchk g ne'okij g gawul neoktham, kutt d wabsh wo ge o'othhamk ab a'ai t-wui nach ge s-t-amichuth.
S-ap'e o mam si tatchua g mahkigdaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kumt ba'ich am hab wo i junihith mat haschu ba'ich d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g em-wehm wohochuththam.
Hegai mat hedai wo gawul kaitham nenneokath at hemho wa wo chum e ho'ige'ithahun k ab wo tai g Jiosh g amichuthadag mat s-ap wo i tashogi g gawul kaitham e-ne'oki.
Pi att hedai am hu wo i ha wehmtath heg hekaj ha'ichu t-amichuthadag mattp wabsh g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath, chum achs si s-ap t-tahtk am hehe'ejel t-i'ibthag ed.
Kutt heg hekaj pi wabsh wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj ch pi wabsh wo ne'eth g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj ch wabshaba s-ta amichutham hab ep wo t-juh.
Pi at wo e nako hegam mo pi mahch mach has t-wua mat t-wehm ab wo ho'ige'el g Jiosh mattp wabsh g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo t-ho'ige'ithahunath nat ge wo amich mach has kaij.
Ttp hems hi wa si s-ap wo t-ho'ige'ithahu Jiosh wui. T wabshaba ihtham pi ab hu wo bei g i wehmtadag.
Ab o ep ni-mahks ihtha mahkigdag. Kuni ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh mani em-ba'ich i mu'ikko nenneok g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj.
Nt wo ni-nako mant heg hekaj mu'i mihl ne'oki hab wo chei. K wabshaba ba'ich i s-ap'e mach eda t-mihshmath mant al hetasp ne'oki hab wo chei mat wo s-e amich mani haschu chum ha mashcham.

A'alkaj am hab e junihim, ni-wepnag, ab si ha'ichuchuthch ihtha al mahkigdag ch heg hekaj ab si e haschuth. Am g wabsh wo thagito ihtha pi ap'ekam. Neh, a'al o pi mahch g pi ap'ekam. Kumt hab wa'i masma hab wo masmak mo g a'al mamt pi wo mahchk g pi ap'ekam.
An o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Bant wo ha juh g Tutuligo mat wo e gehg k hemho wa ab wo kaihamath g ha-ne'oki g gawul hemajkam. T eda wabsh kia pi ab hu wo ni-kaihamath.

Neh, ihtham gawul kaitham ne'oki mam ab si ha'ichuchuth o wa d chum chehgitha am ha wehhejed hegam mo pi ab hu kaimk g Jiosh ch pi t-wehhejed d chehgitha ahchim wohochuththam. Hegai mo g Jiosh am t-tashogith matt wo ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam o am ha chehgith mo am t-wehmaj g Jiosh, chum as pi am hu wo ha chehgi hegam mo pi kaimk g Jiosh.
T hegam mo s-kaimk ch am wo i wahp t-namki ed hab wo chei matt t-loligoch mattp wabsh gawul kaitham wo nenneokath.
Hemho wa att am wo tasho ahgath mat has chu g Jiosh am wo t-tashogi matt wo ah. Kut wo s-t-amich g pi e tho'ibiakam k wo s-mai moki d pi ap chu'ijkam ch atki wo e lothai.
Wehs g ha'ichu t-ahga at ab ha wui wo tashogi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ha-chegitoi. Kut ab wo i shul Jiosh wui k ab wo ihm k wo wohokamch moki woho am t-wehmaj g Jiosh.

Ith ani hab ahg, ni-wepnag, mamt wehs ha'ichu s-ap am hab wo junihith e-namki ed. Mtp hems hema am wo ah g ne'i k hema g mashchama hab wo juh k hema wo ah mat haschu g Jiosh am wo i em-maskogi k hema hems g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo neo k hema am wo i tashogi mo has d ahga ihtha ne'oki. Wehs ha'ichu at d wo i chum em-wehmta.
Mamtp wo neneo g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj, mt am wa'i waik o gohkajj hab wo juh shakal e oitham. Mt hema am wo i tashogi ihtha mo am hab e kaij.
Kumt pi am hu hab wo chum chei g gawul kaitham ne'oki matp pi am hu hedai wo ha'ichugk mat am wo i tashogi k wabsh hejel e wehhejed ch ab Jiosh wui hab wo chei.
Kumt waik o gohkajj am wo ah mat haschu g Jiosh ab wo em-mah. Kumt ha'ijj am wo a'amich mo haschu am hab e kaij.
Kumt wabshaba wo ha'asa neo matp g Jiosh am hema ep wui wo ha'ichu i tashogi mat am hab wo chei.
Wehsijj am hiwgithas mamt am wo ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hehemakoj. T hab wehsijj wo ha'ichu mahch k ab hekaj wo bei g i gewkemhunadag.
Mt wo nenida g e-ap'ethag mat hekith g Jiosh ab wo em-mah g ha'ichu e-ahga am ha wehhejed.
Pi o tatchua g Jiosh matt wabsh wo has hu t-wuath ch wabshaba matt wo s-thotholimak. Bamt masma hab wo e wuath e-namki ed mo wehsko hab e wua g Jiosh hemajkamga.
Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wabsh wo ha wechok. Bo masma hab chu'ig g heki hu t-himthag chehanig. Pi amt has wo chei ab amjed mo has i kaij g chechoj
k wabshaba ab wo ha kakke g e-wehm kihkam am e-kihki am mamtp wo ha'ichu s-mahchim. That wo si edathagk mamtp ab wo ha kakke mam am e mihshmath.
Pi g hab wo elithath mas ahpim em-gahi wuhshanim ab i wuhsh g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o mams ahpim ab wa'i bei.
Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo ith d Jiosh chehanig mamtp hedai hab e elith mam d Jiosh ha'ichu ahgtham ch edgith g gewkthaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Kumt pi ab hu wo ha kaiha matp hedai pi ab hu wo kaiha ihtha.
Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, am g wo si i e gewpkath mamt wo ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba pi wo ha tha'i hegam mat g gawul kaitham ne'okikaj wo nenneokath.
Wehs amt ha'ichu si s-ap am hab wo junihith e-namki ed ch pi wabsh wo has hu e wuath.
Am ant ep wo em-ahgi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh, ni-wepnag. Ab amt i s-wohoch mant eda am em-ahgi heki hu k s-wihnam gegok am e-wohochuthadag ed.
Tho ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mamt heg hekaj wo e tho'ibia mamtp woho an u'ukch.
Am ant em-ahgi mant haschu bei. K ith d si s-has ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ch hab chu'ig mat g alithaj muh heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig
k uhpam ep e chegito mo am d i waik tash mamt am woi cheo ch ed hab masma mo an o'ohadag Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mat am hab wo e juh.
Am at i e chehgi Peter wui k ab hahawa wehs ha wui g am e-chuhchai
k am ep i e chehgi ha wui g hetasp siant i ba'iwichkim mo ab d wohochuththam. Mu'ijj ihtham o an d wabsh kia thothakam. T ha'ijj hi wa koi.
Am at hahawa ep i e chehgi e-wehnag James wui k ab ep ha wui wehs g am e-chuhchai

k am si ha oithch hab wa'ap i e chehgi ab ni-wui. Ni eda s-ko'okam ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab s-wohochuth. K pi ab hu d chum ni-wuikam manis d wo kehshajk. T wabshaba wa am ni-wui i e chehgith k ab i ni-waith k am i ni-kei.
Bat wa masma si s-ni-ho'ige'el g Jiosh. Kuni heg hekaj d kehshaj ch chum hems wehs ha ba'ich i si chikpan hegam mo am d chuhchaij. K eda d Jiosh mo hab junihim ihtha. Pi ani hejel hab junihim.
K g Jiosh hab wa'ap i ha wehmt hegam mo ni-wehm d piongaj g Jiosh. Wehsijj ach heg am wa ahgachug. K d ihtha ha'ichu t-ahga mam ab s-wohochuth.
Ith o d ha'ichu t-mashchama mat uhpam ep e chegito g Christ. Msh eda ha'i hab chech'e mat pi hedai uhpam ep wo e chegito.
Pegih, t g Christ hab wa'ap pi ep e chegito matp wo wohok mat pi hedai ep wo e chegito.
Kut pi d wo ha'ichuk machs hekaj wo em-mihshmath o mams ab wo s-wohoch.
T d wabsh wo iattogik mattp wo em-ahgi mat g Jiosh ab i wuhshath g e-alithag.
Kumt pi wo sha'i e tho'ibia. T pi ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk g em-wohochuthadag.
T hab wa'ap pi wo e tho'ibia hegam mat heki hu koi ab i s-wohochuthk g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ.
Sha'att wa'i si sho'ig hab wo mahsk wehs ha ba'iwichkim ahchim wohochuththam mattp pi uhpam ep wo t-chegito.
T wabshaba woho ab i wuhsh g Christ muhkig amjed k am i shonwuich mat wo i wuwha g ko'i.
Muhkig at ab i shonwua hema amjed g o'othham. T g i wuhshanig ab muhkig amjed hab wa masma ab i shonwua hema amjed g o'othham.

Hegai mat g muhkig ab amjed i shonwua o d Adambad. Kuch wehsijj mukiog nach pi heg ab d amjedkam ch heg wehm d Hemako. K hegai mat g i wuhshanig ab amjed i shonwua d Christ. Kutt heg wehm ab i t-hemakoj ab i s-wohochuthk k hekaj ab wo i wuwha muhkig amjed.
Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat wehpeg ab i wuhsh g Christ ab muhkig amjed. Tt ahchim ab hahawa hab wa'ap wo i wuwha mach ab s-wohochuth. Ith at hab wo e juh mat hekith ep wo jiwia g Christ.

T am haha wo huhug g jewed. Kut ab wo thagito g Christ g e-kownaltalig e-ohg Jiosh wui. T Wabshaba g Jiosh wehpeg ab wecho wo i ul wehs ha'ichu. Hemuch at ab wo gegokkath g kokownal ch nahnko mahs gewpkthag Christ wui.
T wabshaba g Christ hemho wa wo himchuthath g e-kownaltalig ch ab wo ai mat wehs wo ha gewito g e-obga.
K g muhkig d si oithchkam ha'ichu mamt wo gewito.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mat wehs ha'ichu ab wecho wo i ul g am si e-Kehsha. K oi wa pi hejel hab e ahg g Jiosh mas ab wecho wo i e ul.
T wabsh chum haschu ab wecho wo i ul g Christ. T heg ab hahawa wehs ha'ichu wo thagito e-ohg Jiosh wui. T g Jiosh d wo ge'e kownalk wehs ha'ichu thahm chum hekith.

Neh, ha'ijj at g em-tatchui ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh k hahawa koi. Kumt ha'i hab wa'ap ab i s-wohochuth k e pahl wapko mamt wo ha wehmajk am i ko'ok. Pegih, pi g hab wo cheh'i mas pi ep wo e chegito.
Wehs tashkaj ach pi sha'i huwith g t-thoakag ahchim mach am ahgachug g tho'ibiathag. Kutt pi am hab wo t-junihith matp pi ab hu wo i wuwha g ko'i.
Neh, ni-wepnag, wehs tashkaj o am hab chu'ig g s-ni-mukimkam. Ith ani hab kaij nani pi ab si has em-elith mam d ni-wehm wohochuththam.

Ia at ha'i hab masma ni-cheggia mo g s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu thothakam Ephesus t am. Kunt pi ab hu ha wui wo sha'i kekiwua am ahgachugch matt ep wo t-chegito am i ko'ok matp pi d wo wohokamk. Matp hab chu'ig, nt wabsh oithk hab wo ni-junihith g hab ha-che'i mo hab chu'ig, “Tt hig wabsh wo si t-gegosithath ch wo s-hehgigk natt pi hemuch im hu hab wo i t-juh.”
Mt wo e iattogith k hab wa'ap wo masmak mo hegam mamtp ab wo ha kaihamath.
Ha'ijj amki pi mahch g Jiosh. K ith d si em-edathag. Am g wabsh wo thagito g pi ap e-chegitoi k s-ap ha'ichu wo chegito.
Neh, ha'ijj amsh hab chech'e, “Shaht masma ep wo i wuwha g ko'i. Kut has wo mahskath g hohon matp woho hab wo e juh?”
Pegih, nt wo em-tashogi. T-hohon o wepogithas mo g ha'ichu kai. Heg at am wo e ei jewed ch ed. T g elithaj wo padt. T g kai am haha wo i wuhsh.
Hegai mam am e'esha o d wabsh si s-wohom ha'ichu kai ch pi d wehs hegai mat ab wo i wuhsh.
Jiosh at hab masma am wo wuhshath mo has i masma tatchua k ab mahkch mat hab wo mahskath mo g je'ej. Wehs o gawul mahs g ha'ichu wuhshanig.
K g ha'ichu thoakam hab wa'ap gawul mahs. O'othham o am wa has mahs chuhkug. K g ha'ichu thoakam ch u'uwhig ch waptopi am wa hehe'ejelko gawul mahs chuhkug.
Tash ch mashath ch huhu'u o gawul masma mo g jewed ch gawul masma s-kehgaj.
K ihtham mo an t-thahm hab chu'ig pi e wepo masma s-kehgaj. Mashath o gawul masma s-kehgaj mo g tash. K g huhu'u hab wa'ap gawul masma s-kehgaj mo ihtham ch pi e wepo masma s-kehgaj.

Ihtha t-honshpadag o d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu ch wo hekit k pi wo kehgajk ch pi wo ha gewkthagk ch wo muh k gd hu wo e hiash. T g Jiosh ab wo i t-wuwhas. T g t-honshpadag d haha wo thahm kahchim ch ed ha'ichuk ch wo s-kehgajk ch wo gewkthagk ch pi hekith wo hekit k pi hekith wo muh. Jiosh at ab t-mah ihtha t-honshpadag matt ith thahm jewed wo hekaj. K hab mahs mat hemho wa am wo nahto g thahm kahchim honshpadag matt an wo hekajith thahm kahchim ch ed.

Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana mash g wehpeg o'othham d Adambad. Tsh ith g Jiosh am nahto k ab mah g thoakag k Hekaj am i shonwuich g o'othham thoakag. K wabshaba g Christ ab hahawa t-mahkch g wechij thoakag.
Pi o an hu wehpeg d thahm kahchim thoakag g o'othham ch wabshaba hemho wa in jewed thahm wehpeg mahsi.
Jiosh atsh wabsh g jewedkaj am nahto hegai si wehpegkam. T heg i thahm ia hahawa jiwia g Christ ab thahm kahchim t amjed.
Wehsijj ach ab d amjedkamaj hegai mat g jewedkaj e nahto ch hab wa masma. Ch ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth hegai mat ia jiwia thahm kahchim t amjed hab wa masma mo hegai.
Matt wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed k haha wo wepo masmak.
Pi at an hu wo sha'i i wah thahm kahchim ch ed ihtha jewed thahm t-hon mo aihim g muhkig.
Neh, nt am haha wo em-ahgi g s-a'agi ha'ichu. Pi att wehsijj wo ko'o k wabshaba wehsijj wo gawul t-juh ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Kut ith si s-hohtam hab wo e juh hab masma mam si s-hohtam e wuhigith. Wehpeg at ab wo kaitha g kukuikud k g si ha oithchkam ab wo kaitha. T ab ha hekaj wo i wuwha hegam mat heki hu koi ab i s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tt ahchim mattp in d wabsh wo kia thothakamk hab wa'ap wo gawul t-juh.
Ihtha t-hon at am gawul wo e juh mat pi hekith wo muh.
T hab masma wo e wohokamch ihtha mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Muhkig at im hu hab wo i e juh. Jiosh at am s-ap wo gewito.

Bo wa masma g muhkig mo g si ge'e ko'oi. K g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig heg wa wepo mo g ke'ij. T wabshaba g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gm hu hab i juh g ke'ij ab nakogk g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. Jiosh at am i ap'ech mat hab masma wo t-gewitojel g muhkig. Kuch heg hekaj si s-hehgigam ab ho'ige'ith.

Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, pi at wo sha'i heki e wua matt haschu am hab wo junihith g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed. Kumt heg hekaj s-wihnam wo gegokkath e-wohochuthadag ed ch chum hekith wo si chikpanath wehhejed.

Ith ant hab wo ah heg amjed lial mamt am wo to'awath ha wehhejed hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Judea jewed ch ed. Bani ha ahg hegam wohochuththam mo am mu'ikpa kih Galasia jewed ch ed mat am wo to'awath g e-lialiga.
Kumt ahpim hab wa masma hab wa'ap am wo ha'i to'awath wehs thomig ed mamtp he'ekia wo i e nako am a'amichuthk mam he'ekia i ha gew.
Kumt am wo ha'i i ha chuhcha mat am wo i ui g em-mahkigdag Jerusalem wui. Nt am wo ha o'ohani g ge'egedchu Jerusalem t am am jiwiak em-wui. T ith am wo i bei g em-chuhchai k am wo hihi.
Kunt ahni am epai wo ha oi matp d wo Jiosh tatchuik mant am wo hih.
Wehpeg ant am wo i ha neithahi g t-wehm wohochuththam ha-kihhim oithk am Macedonia ch ed k am haha wo i em-chehgimed
k antp hems wehs s-hehpch'ed oitham am wo em-wehmajkahim. Mt am haha wo i ni-wehmt mantp hebai ba'ich wo i hih.
Pi ant wo em-nei am himathch Macedonia wui nani pi tatchua mant am wo wa tash em-wehmajkahim matp d wo Jiosh tatchuik.
Bani ni-elith mant ia wo ha'ichugk Ephesus kihhim t am ch ab wo ai g bahijitha gegosig.
Ge'ej o g ni-ap'ethag mant am hab wo junihith g Jiosh chikpan iia, chum as hi wa mu'ijj ab ni-wui gegok.
Tp hems am wo jiwia g Timothy em-shahgith. Kumt si s-ap ab wo neithath no pi am hab wa'ap junihim g Jiosh chikpan hab masma mani ahni.
Pi amt wo pi ap hab elithath mo d wabsh wechij o'othham ch wabshaba am wo i wehmt. T hab s-ap e taht k ab uhpam wo i hih. Si ani nenida mat ia ep wo jiwia hegam ha wehm mat am wehmaj wo hihi em-wui.

Am amsh s-neithamk g Apollos. Kuni ab chum si i gewkemhun mat am wo i em-chehgim. K wabshaba pi hab elith mo d Jiosh tatchui mat am wo hih hemu ch heg hekaj pi wo ha oi ihtham mat am wo i em-chehgio k wabshaba am wo wa em-nei mat hekith am wo s-ap'ekath wehhejed.
Am g wo s-e nen'oithath ch s-wihnam wo gegokkath am e-wohochuthadag ed ch s-ge'ehogam am wo chikpanath
ch ab wo e chehgithch wehs ha'ichu k ed mam ab si pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj.

S-mahch am mo hegam Stephanas d si wehpegkam am em-jewedga ed mat wehs e wehm ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Ihtham at am i e thagito mat ha'ichu am hab wo junihith ha wehhejed g wohochuththam. Kuni ab em-gewkemhun, ni-wepnag,
mamt ab wo ha kaihamath hegam mo hab masma em-wanimed mo ihtham ch hegam mo hedai ha wehm chikpan.
Hemu at wabsh ia thatha g Stephanas ha wehm g Fortunatus ch Acaicus. Kuni si s-ap ni-tahtk ch ha neith nani pi si s-em-neithamk.
Ab at si i ni-hehgchul hab masma mat hab em-juh. S-ap amt ab wo ha neithath g hab mahs o'othham.

Hegam mo ab ihm g Christ iia Asia jewed ch ed o am i em-ahgith mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Aquila ch Priscilla ch hegam mo am e nanmek ha-kih am o hab wa'ap am i em-ahgith mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el.
Wehsijj g wohochuththam iia Ephesus t am o hab wa'ap am i em-ahgith mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el. Ab g a'ai wo s-e ho'ige'ithath nam pi d e wehm wohochuththam.
Ia ant hejel wo o'oha g ni-ho'ige'ithadag am em-wui.
Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i ha juh matp hedai pi ab hu wo tatchuath g t-kownalig Jesus. Ia at ep wo jiwia g Jesus s-hohtam.
Si o s-hemajima g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ab em-wui ch ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g i wehmtadag.
Ab ani si pihk ni-elith wehs em-hekaj ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam. Neh, ith ant hab wo wa'i chei am em-wui.

Ni-wepnag mam am kih Corinth t am ch am wehsko Greece jewed ch ed: Am ant ep wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni Paul g t-wehnag Timothy wehm. S-mahch am mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Tho Jiosh tatchui mani heg an ahgachug.
Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
T-kownalig Jesus Christ ohg o hab wa'ap d t-ohg Jiosh ch si s-hemajima ab t-wui. Wehs g i gewkemhunadag o ab amjed him. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si i ho'ige'ithath.
Heg o am i t-gewkemhun wehs t-kudutadag ed. Kuch heg hekaj t-nakog matt am epai wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mo nahnko mahs ha'ichukaj e kudut heg wa hekaj mat haschu g Jiosh hekaj i t-gewkemhu.
M o wa woho mach hebai t-sho'igchuth mach d Jesus Christ wohochuththam. K wabshaba g Jiosh ba'ich i t-gewkemhun heg hekaj mat haschu g Jesus Christ am hab t-juni.

Ahchim ach wa t-sho'igchuth am i em-wehmajch mamt wo e tho'ibia. K g Jiosh am i t-gewkemhun matt hab wa'ap am wo i em-gewkemhu. Mt hab ab wo bei g gewkthag mamt s-ap wo nako hegai hab mahs sho'igthag mach ahchim nakog.
Pegih, s-mahch ach mamt hemho wa hab wa'ap wo bei g i gewkemhunadag nam pi hab wa'ap nakog g sho'igchuthadag.
Tatchua ach matt am wo i em-chegitoich ahpim t-wepnag matt he'ekia i t-sho'igch am Asia jewed ch ed. Sha'at wa'i si s-wechima ab t-ma'ish hegai cheggiadag. Kunt wa sha'i si s-mukima ni-taht.

Bo wa sha tahhathag mant ni-lothaitachuth k hemho wa wo ni-mu'ij. Ith atki hab ahgk hab e juh matt pi ab hu hejel wo t-hiwgath ch wabshaba heg wa'i Jiosh ab wo si hiwgath. Heg o ab i ha wuwhasith g ko'i muhkig amjed
ch t-tho'ibia ab amjed hegai si s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu matt am chum t-ko'ij. Kuch ab si hiwig mat ep wo t-tho'ibia matt pi wo t-ko'ij.
Kum ahpim am i t-wehmaj am e ho'ige'ithahunch t-wehhejed. T g Jiosh am hab wo juh mam haschu ab tahni k ab wo s-t-ho'ige'el. T mu'i ab wo ho'ige'el g Jiosh t-hekaj.
Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab t-mahkch g gewkthag. Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag ith thahm jewed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i em-iattogith ch hab pi t-kudut. Ith o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam.
Heg ach am wa'i em-o'ohanith mamt haschu s-ap wo ne'okchulith k wo s-amich. Am ani hab hi wa chum em-elith mamt am hu wa hebai wehs s-ap wo s-amich
mam haschu wabsh he'es i s-amichuth hemu. Kumt hekaj ba'ich ab wo si has i t-el hab masma matt ahchim ab wo si has em-el mat hekith wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus.

D ant hu'i heki hu hab masma i chum ap'ech mant am wo i em-nei am himathch Macedonia wui k am ep wo i em-nei ab uhpam himathch. Mt hab gokko ab wo bei g ho'ige'ithadag k wo i ni-wehmt mant am wo hih Judea wui.
Nt eda pi koi am hu i em-chehgim. Kumki ha'i hab ni-elith mani wabsh pehegi neok ch pi woho am hu hab wo ni-juh mani wa has i kaij.
K eda pi woho ihtha. Jiosh o s-mahch mani hab chum s-junimk mani haschu hab i ahg mant hab wo juh.
Neh, am ach ahgachug g Silas ch Timothy wehm ab amjed g Jesus Christ. K heg d Jiosh alithag ch chum hekith hab wua mo haschu hab i ahg.
Wehs at am hab t-juni g Jiosh g hab e-elitha am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus Christ. Kutt heg gahi wuhshanim ab wo si hehgchulithath g Jiosh.
Tho Jiosh mat am i t-gewpkathch Christ himthag ed ab t-mahk g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am wohokamchuth mach d hemajkamgaj ch wehs wo bei hegai mo ab t-makiog.
S-mahch o g Jiosh mani pi em-kudutamk ch heg hekaj pi koi am hu ep em-wui hih. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wehpeg am wo i ap'ech hegai mo pi ap'e am em-shahgith.
Pi o hab chum chu'ig machs ahchim am wo em-nu'ichkwuhith em-wohochuthadag ed. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e matt am wo i em-gewkemhu em-wohochuthadag ed. Kumt hab wo s-gegokkath heg eda.
Am ant si i ni-oithahim k hab i ni-ah mantki pi am hu wo i em-chehgim hemu manis wo ge s-em-keh'el.
Mt pi wo ap e taht mantp hab wo ni-juh. Nt ahni hab wa'ap pi wo ap ni-taht.

Heg ant hekaj am wabsh em-o'ohani. Ab amt wo chum ni-mah g s-ap tahhathkam. Kuni pi tatchua manis am wo chum jiwia em-wui k wabsh pi wo ap ni-taht em-wehhejed. S-mahch ani mamt wo s-hehgigk mant hekith ahni wo s-hehgigk.
Si ani pi ap ni-tahtk ch mu'i ni-oh'og iawua am em-o'ohanithk nani pi si pihk ni-elith em-hekaj. Ni eda pi tatchua manis ab wo em-mah g pi ap tahhathkam.
Ab at i em-mah g pi ap tahhathkam hegai mat am si pi ap has chu'i em-shahgith. Kuni pi tatchua manis ab wabsh wo si em-chehmo.
Am at wa ge'e ab nako g e-namkithadag ab em-amjed mamt has i masma am ap'ech.
Mt hahawa ab wo i s-ho'ige'ith k ab wo i gewkemhu nat pi has e juh k am hu wo si pi ap e tahtam k wabsh si s-wohom gm hu hab wo i e juh.
Am g thahm ep wo ahgith mam ab si pihk e elith wui.
S-mahchimk ani am i em-o'ohanithk mams ab wo s-ni-wohog el. Kumt wa woho am hab e juh.
Kunt hab wa'ap ab wo i s-ho'ige'el hegai mat pi ap has chu'i mamtp ahpim ab wo i s-ho'ige'el.
T hab pi wo e nako g Jiawul mas wo t-wohppo'i ihtha t-wehnag. S-mahch ach mo hab wa s-e junimk.
Pegih, nt wa pi am hu em-wui hih am himathch Macedonia wui k wabshaba am hih Troas wui. Tki g Jiosh am ap'ech mant am i ahgachug g ha'ichu ahgaj amai.

Nt am hu hebai ni-kudu nat pi pi oi jiwia g Titus am i em-chehgimedk. Kunt am i ha ho'ige'el g t-wehm wohochuththam amai k gm hu hih Macedonia wui. T am ni-nam g Titus k am ni-ahgith mamt s-ap am hab juh g ni-ne'oki.

Kuni heg amjed ab si ihm g Jiosh mat am i ap'ech hegai mo pi ap'e am em-shahgith. Jiosh o chum hekith ab t-mahkch g gewitoithag hekaj hegai mat g Christ am t-wehhejed hab juh. Ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ o an wehsko e gantan hab sha masma mat g s-ap uhwchu wehsko wo e hewagi mat hebai wo e mehi.

Hegam mat wo e tho'ibia o ab si s-hohho'ith ch kah mo g Jiosh ab ha makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. K hegam mat pi wo e tho'ibia pi hohho'ith ch kah mo am hihim pi ha huhugetham muhkig wui. Pegih, tho si s-has ha'ichu chikpan ihtha.

Kut pi wo e nako mat am hab wo juh hegam mo wabsh pehegichuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch wabsh s-u'imk g lial. Ahchim Christ pionag ach hi pi hab sha'i masma ch pi em-iattogith ch wabshaba s-ap am ahgachug ihtha wohokam mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch.
Pi ani wabsh hejel ni-wohokamchuth mani d kehshaj g Christ ch pi tatchua mams ab wo ni-wohokamch g o'ohanakaj.

Ahpim mamt ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga am heg wa wepo mam d o'ohanaj g Christ ch am wohokamchuth mani d kehshaj. K ith pi an hu o'ohanas hohothai t ab hab masma mash wa hegai heki hu wehst-mahm chehanig ch wabshaba an o'ohanas em-thothakag ed nat pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gawul em-juh k am i em-ap'ech heg hekaj ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kut wehs wo nei mat has em-juni g Jiosh k wo s-mahchk mani d Christ kehsha.
Ith ani hab kaij nani pi ab hiwig g Jiosh heg hekaj mat g Christ hab t-juni.
Pi o d hejel t-gewpkthag ch wabshaba d Jiosh gewkthag mach hekaj am hab junihim g Jiosh chikpan.

K ihtha mach ahgachug d wechij ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K ab ha'i kaiham. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ha mahk g wechij thoakag. Pi o hab masma hegai hekiukam ha'ichu ahgaj ch wabshaba d chehanig. K g pi ap chu'ijkam heg hekaj s-mahch mo ab ha wui him g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag.

Hegai hekiukam chehanig ash an o'ohanas hohothai t ab. Tsh g Jiosh am ha chehgi g e-gewkthag ch e-tonlig matsh wa ab ha mah ihtha g Tutuligo. Mosesbad wuhiosha ash wa si tonod heg hekaj Jiosh gewkthag mash wa an wehmajkahim tho'ag t ab ch ab bei hegai chehanig. Tsh pi sha'i e nako g wehmaj o'othham mas ab wo i nei g Mosesbad. Kush eda am wa chum chukhim hegai tonlig. Neh, Jiosh atsh hab wa masma am ha chehgi g e-gewkthag mat wa ab ha mah hegai hekiukam chehanig mo ab t-namkith g muhkigkaj
k wabshaba ba'ich am t-chehgithch g e-gewkthag mo ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am t-eda chikpan.

Tho si s-has ha'ichu hegai hekiukam chehanig mach hekaj s-mahch mo ab t-aihim g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. Pegih, k ba'ich d i si ha'ichu hegai ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mach hekaj s-mahch mo gm hu hab i junihog g pi ap t-chu'ichig matt d haha wo s-ap'ekamk am tahgio.
T wabsh pi e ha'ichuch g gewkthaj g hekiukam chehanig am t-wehhejed no pi ba'ich i s-gewkthag g Christ ha'ichu ahga.
Hekiukam chehanig at am i huhug. T wabshaba g Christ ha'ichu ahga pi hekith wo ha huhug.
Ith ach ab ab t-gewpkathch ch hekaj am si s-t-mahch ch ahgachug.

Mosesbad atsh wa ab ma'ish g e-wuhiosha matsh g wehmaj o'othham pi ab hu wo nei hegai tonlig mo ab ab tonod ab amjed g Jiosh gewkthag. Sh hegam pi neith mo huhughim hegai tonlig. Ch ahchim hi pi ab hu ma'ishch hegai Jiosh gewkthag mo ab t-ab e chehgithch.

K eda wabsh kia e ehstokch mu'i ha wehhejed g ni-wehm o'othham. K heg hekaj pi mahch mo huhughim g gewkthaj hegai hekiukam chehanig. Im at hu hab wo i e juh hegai pi ha-amichuthadag mat hekith ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ.
Chum wa hems ith i tashkaj o heg wa wepo mo ab ma'ishpi g ha-amichuthadag mo hekith am i ne'okchulith hegai ha'ichu ahga mat g Mosesbad an o'oha.
Neh, ab atsh i e ma'ishpi'o g Mosesbad matsh hekith ab ep i miabi g Jiosh. T ihtham ha-amichuthadag hab wa'ap wo i e ma'ishpi'o mat hekith ab wo i miabi g Jiosh.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o d Jiosh ch am ha'ichug t-thoakag ed am i t-ap'echuthk g Jiosh wehhejed. Kuch hab t-wul'okch mach pi chum t-ap'echuth g chehanigkaj.

Pi o ab hu ma'ishpi g t-amichuthadag ahchim mach ab ihm g Christ. Kuch ab wui nea ch ab chehgithch g gewkthaj ch tonligaj hab sha masma mo g neithakud. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si gawul t-junihim. Tt hekaj ba'ich wo i wepo masmak g Christ.
Ab o s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab t-chehani matt am wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj. Heg ach hekaj pi ha'ichukaj t-shohbithch ch heg am hab wua.
Pi ach hab wua g s-a'agi ha'ichu ch pi ha iattogith ch pi am hu gawul wua g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh o s-mahch mach am ahg g wohokam ch am i t-nakog matt wo s-ap'ek am hemajkam ha-nena ed.
Ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mach ahgachug o hegam wa'i ha wehhejed pi tasho mo pi d e tho'ibiakam.

Jiawul o ge'e gewkthag ith thahm jewed ch thaishch g ha-amichuthadag. K hekaj pi amichuth mo s-ha tho'ibiamk g Christ ch d si hekia s-ap'ekam ch wepo d thoakam g e-ohg Jiosh. Heg o wa wepo mo g Jiosh gewkthag d si s-mahs tonlig ch ab ab tonod g alithaj. K eda ihtham pi neith.
Pi ach hejel t-amjed ha'ichu ahgachug. Jesus Christ o d t-kownalig. Kuch heg amjed an ahgachug ch d wabsh em-pionag wehhejed.
Jiosh atsh am wa i tonlith g s-chuhugam gd hu'i si wehpeg. K heg ha wepo mat am epai i tonlith g t-thoakag nat pi t-mahtchul g Christ. K heg am t-chehgithch g Jiosh.

Thach wabsh chum hemajkam. K eda g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g e-gewkthag. T hab wo s-e mahchk mo d wa Jiosh gewkthag ch am t-eda. Kuch heg hekaj hab sha masma mo g bith haha'a mat hema g lai am ha eda wo to'akchith g s-e-kaisthag.
Mu'ikko ach ha'ichukaj t-kudut. K wabshaba pi ha'ichu t-shohbithch. Hebai ach ha'ichu pi a'amichuth ch wabshaba am wabsh ba'ich i t-gewpkath.
Mu'ikko am t-sho'igchuth. K wabshaba g Jiosh chum hekith t-wehmaj. Hebai am hi wa chum si s-ko'okam has t-wua. Ch wabshaba pi t-ko'ijith.
Chum o hekith am hab chu'ig g muhkig t-wehhejed mamt wa hab masma hab juh g Jesus. K hab masma am tasho e neith g Jesus thoakag am t-thoakag ed.
T-thoakag oithch o am hab chu'ig mattp hems wo t-muhkith am wehhejed g Jesus. K hab wa masma ab e chehgithch g Jesus thoakag id amjed t-chuhkug mo am him muhkig wui.
S-ni-mukimakam o chum hekith am hab chu'ig nani pi am hab junihim ihtha chikpan. K am wa s-ap'e namt pi ith hekaj ab bei g wechij thoakag.
Bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mash hema hab kaij: Am ant neo nani pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Pegih, bach wa masma ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hekaj am ahgachug.
Jiosh at wa ab i wuhshath g t-kownalig Jesus muhkig amjed. Kuch s-mahch mat hab wa'ap ab wo i t-wuwhas ahchim wohochuththam k ab wo i t-wahpki matt am wo wehmajk kihthaj ed.
Pegih, ni ab nakog g sho'igthag am em-wehhejed ch am ha wehhejed hegam mat hab wa'ap wo e tho'ibia am kahk g ha'ichu ni-ahga. K heg hekaj mu'ithahim hegam mo ab ho'ige'ith ch ab si has elith g Jiosh.

Heg att hekaj pi hekith ha'ichukaj an hu wo t-shohbi matt am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan. Ab o hi wa chum aihim g muhkig g t-chuhkug nach pi hekitahim. K wabshaba g t-thoakag wehs tashkaj ab i e wechijith.

Hebaichujj ach hab hi wa elith mo sha'i si ge'ej g t-kudutadag iia. K wabshaba heg ab wui t-u'a g woho si ge'e ap'echuthaj g Jiosh. Heg eda at g Jiosh chum hekith ab wo si has t-elithath. T pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g jewed t ab t-kudutadag.
Ab ach wui t-gewpkathch hegai ap'ethag, chum achs hi wa chum pi neith g t-wuhpuikaj. Hegai mach haschu i neith hemu at wabsh wo huhug. T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai mach am wui t-gewpkathch.

Ihtha t-chuhkug o heg wa wepo mo d wabsh uhksha nat pi wabsh wo e padch. Kutt wabshaba wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg honshpadag an thahm kahchim ch ed. T ith g Jiosh hab wo t-juni. Kut hab wo masmak mo g si s-kehg kih ch pi hekith wo e padch.
Hebaichujj ach si i shahshani nach pi am chum s-hihimimk thahm kahchim wui ch s-behimk hegai s-kehg honshpadag mat g Jiosh ab wo t-mah.
Pi ach hab ahgch shahshani machs im hu hab i s-junimk ihtha t-honshpadag ch wabshaba hab ahgch matt oi ab wo bei hegai wechij t-honshpadag an thahm kahchim ch ed k pi d haha wo mukimkamk.
Jiosh at am i t-ap'ech ith wehhejed k ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo t-wehmajk ch am wo i wohokamch mo haschu ab t-makiog.
Pegih, si ach s-ap t-tahtk ch ia chewed,
chum achs pi neith g t-kownalig Jesus, nach pi ab s-wohochuth ch hab s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag.
Kuch wabshaba ba'ich i chum tatchua matt an wo i t-chihwiapath wehmaj, chum achs wo thagito ihtha t-chuhkug.
K wabshaba pi has d sha'i ahga machs hebai hab chu'ig. Ith o ba'ich d i si ha'ichu matt am hab wo juh g tatchuij, chum achs ia wo ha'ichugk ith thahm jewed o an wo wehmajk anai.
Wehsijj att hemho wa am wo i t-chehgi Christ wui mat am wo t-a'appem k ab wo i t-mahkhi g t-namkithadag mattp has i masma s-ap hab junihim o pi ap hab junihim hegai chikpan mo ab t-mahkch iia.

S-to'o ehbitham hab mahs g Jiosh lothaita. Kuni heg hekaj ab si i ha chehani g hemajkam mat wo hiwigi mat g Jiosh am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio. S-mahch o g Jiosh mo ith d wohokam mani em-ahgith. Kuni hab chum em-elith mam ahpim hab wa'ap s-mahch.

Pi ani hejel chum ni-ha'ichuchuth. K wabshaba mu'ijj ab si has ha elith hegam mo si s-kehg hab mahs pi sha'i mahchk g ha-i'ibthag. Kuni am ha'ichu em-ahgith mamt hekaj wo e nakog k ab wo uhpam i nodagi g ha-ne'oki.
Ha'i ash hab ni-elith mani ge pi ni-mahch ch hab ni-junihim. Ni eda wabsh s-gewkam am hab junihim g Jiosh tatchui. Kum ahpim s-mahch mani s-ni-tahtk ch am hab ni-junihim em-wehhejed.
E at muhkith g Christ wehs t-wehhejed no pi ab si t-tatchua. Kuch hekaj ab aigo si tatchua ch hemho wa am hab s-junimk g tatchuij. Ith o heg wa wepo matt ahchim wehmaj koi
nach pi hahawa pi am hu hab junimk g hejel t-tatchui ch wabshaba heg tatchui am hab s-junimk mat e muhkith k ep e chegito k i wuhsh t-wehhejed.
Heki ani hu wa hab ni-elith mani s-mahch mo has chu'ig g hemajkam ch s-mahch mat has wo chum chu'igkath hegai mat d wo Jiosh si Kehshak. Ni wabshaba hemuch ith s-mahchimk ab amjed g Jiosh.
Tho si wechij thoakam matp hedai ab i e hemakoj g Christ wehm. Im at hu hab i e juh g hekiukam ha'ichu. T g wechij ha'ichu ab i wuhsh.

Jiosh at wehs ith hab juh. Heki ach hu wa d obgaj. T wabshaba g Christ am gawul t-juh mach d hahawa naipijjuj g Jiosh k ab t-chehani matt am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ahgaj mat ha'ijj hab wa'ap ab wo i nawojt g Jiosh.
Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga mat g Jiosh ab chum i ha nawojt g hemajkam k gm hu hab i juh g ha-chu'ichig heg hekaj mat g Christ haschu hab juh ha wehhejed.
Neh, kuch si s-hemajim ab em-waith am wehhejed g Christ mamt ab wo i hiwigi g Jiosh mat am gawul wo i em-juh mamt hahawa pi d wo obgajk.
Wehs at ab abch g e-alithag g pi ap t-chu'ichig mat heg hekaj ab wo t-abch g Christ s-ap'ekam ahchim matt ab wo i s-wohoch.

Bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mo hab kaij g Jiosh: Ab ant wo em-kaiham k wo em-tho'ibia mat hekith wo i e ai g tho'ibiathag tash. Pegih neh, e at ai hegai tash mamt wo e tho'ibia. Kuch si s-hemajim am em-ahgith am wehhejed g Jiosh mamt pi wo heki wua g hemajimataligaj.
Ch wabsh chum s-ap hab junihim g t-chikpan am wehhejed g Jiosh. Mt hab pi ab hu ha'ichu wo t-abchuth k pi ha'ichukaj an wo e kuh.
Kut wo tashok mach d piongaj g Jiosh nach pi ab s-bahbagi nakog g nahnko mahs kudutadag.
Mu'ikko am wa t-gewittan ch hebai gd hu si t-kukpa k ch hebai ep t-bibhiad chum s-t-kokthaimkch. Mu'ikko at wabsh i t-ba'iwich g chikpan. Kuch pi sha'i ha kohsh ch pi sha'i t-gegosith.

Si ach t-nuhkuth ch si t-mashcham ch ab si s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch ab ha wui si s-hemajima ch ab si ha tatchua. Chum ach hekith ahg g wohokam ch chum hekith hab wua g s-ap'ekam ch hekaj cheggia g pi ap'ekam. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am t-wehmaj ch am chehgithch g Jiosh gewkthag am t-chikpan ed.
Ha'ijj o ab si has t-elith ch ha'ijj si t-edawua. Ha'ijj o ab si s-ap has t-ahg ch ha'ijj s-ko'okam has t-ahg. Ha'ijj o hab t-ahg mach s-chu i'attomk. Kuch eda g wohokam ahg.
Ha'ijj o pi ab hu t-mahchimk ch eda mu'ijj s-t-mahch. Ha'ijj o hab elith mach ko'ihim. Kum eda s-mahch mach wabsh kia thotha. Chum am hi wa s ko'okam t-sho'igchuth ch wabshaba pi sha'i t-koktha.
Ha'ichu o pi ap t-tahhathchuth. Kuch eda chum hekith s-hehgig. Chum achs hi wa pi ha'ichu edgith ch eda s-mahch ch ahgachug mo g Jiosh wehs ha'ichu edgith ch ab t-makiog mach haschu i tatchua.
Neh, ith ani wehs ahg si ni-ihbthag amjed nani pi ab si em-tatchua.
Pi ani d ahni manis pi ab hu em-tatchua. Tham ahpim ha'i mam pi ab hu ni-tatchua.
Bani masma chum em-wehm neok mam d ni-a'aliga. Am g hig wo i ni-chehgith mam ab ni-tatchua hab masma mani ahni hab masma ab em-tatchua.
Pi g ab hu wabsh wo si e beh'i ha ab hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jesus Christ. Shaht hig masma g s-ap'ekam ab wo e wehnathk g pi ap'ekam? Shaht masma g tonlig ab wo e wehnathk g s-chuhugam.
Jiawul o ab wui kehk g Christ. Kumt heg hekaj pi ab hu wo i e hemakoj g pi wohochuththam ha wehm.

Ab ach ihm g Jiosh. K pi hab chum chu'ig machs ha'ichu ab ep wo ihmath. Jiosh o am t-eda. K ith heg wa wepo mach d cheopigaj. Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh: Thant wo em-Jioshgak ch am wo em-shahgithk. Kumt d wo ni-hemajkamgak.
K hab ep kaij: Am amt wo i e gawulkai ab ha amjed hegam mo pi ni-mahch k pi am hu wo hudawogath hegai mo haschu d pi ap'ekam.
Nt ab wo i em-bei mamt d wo ni-a'aligak.

Neh, ith ash hab kaij g Jiosh, ni-wepnag, mat am hab wo t-juni. Kutt hekaj ab hig wo si i t-ap'ech heg amjed mo haschu uamhun g t-chuhkug ch t-thoakag k am wo si i t-thagito Jiosh wui ab si has elithch.
Ab g wo si i s-ni-ho'ige'elith. Pi ant hedai sha'i s-ko'okam has juh manis has i masma ha iattogith o manis haschukaj i ha padch o manis haschu i ha ehs.
Pi ani heg hekaj hab kaij ihtha manis ab ha'ichu em-abchuth. Am am wa s-mahch mani ab si em-tatchua. Kut pi ha'ichu wo sha'i i t-gawulkai, chum hems g muhkig.
Ab ani si has em-elith ch ab si em-hiwig ch si s-hehgig ch am si i ni-gewkaj, chum as mu'i ha'ichu t-kudut.
Wehsko o wa an hab chu'ig g kudutadag mant eda am jiwia Macedonia jewed ch ed. Mu'ijj o wa ni-kawhain. Kuni wa am ni-kudut nani ge s-mahch mam has masma hab e junihim.
K wabshaba g Jiosh chum hekith ab t-mahk g gewkemhuna mach eda t-kudut. Kunt wa ab i ni-gewkemhu mat am ni-nam g Titus.

Heg o si s-ap e tahtk ch am ni-ahgith mamsh chum si s-ni-neithamk ch si pi ap e tahtk heg hekaj mat haschu has e juh am em-shahgith. K hab kaij mamsh ab ha wui gegok hegam mo has ni-ahg. Kuni hekaj ba'ich i si s-hehgig hemuch.

Si amsh pi ap e tahtk am ne'okchulithk g ni-o'ohana. Kuni wa chum pi hohho'ith mant heg am em-o'ohani. Kumsh wabshaba pi tash pi ap e tahtk ch am wabsh i ap'ech hegai mash pi ap'e am em-shahgith. Jiosh at hekaj hegai em-sho'igchuthadag. Kuni hahawa si s-ap ni-tahtk.

Bo wa masma hekaj g Jiosh g pi ap tahhathkam am t-thoakag ed matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi k wo bei g s-ap tahhathkam. T wabshaba hegam mo pi ab hu e thagitokch Jiosh wui ba'ich im hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed mat ab wo ha ai g pi ap tahhathkam.

S-mahch am mat has em-juh g Jiosh mamt pi ap e taht. Am amt i e oithahim k si tatchua mat pi hedai ab hu wo em-abch mams pi ap chu'i. Si amt pi hohho'i hegai mo am pi ap chu'ig em-shahgith k ab si i e shohbi hegaj k si s-gewkam i tatchua mamt am wo i ap'ech hegai mo wa am pi ap'e. Am amt e chehgi moki pi d em-chu'ichig hegai matp am hab chu'ig em-shahgith.
Pi ant heg wa'i hekaj am wa em-o'ohani mamt am wo i ap'ech hegai mo wa am pi ap'e. Jiosh o s-mahch mant wa am em-o'ohani mat hekaj am wo e chehgi em-shahgith mam ab si ni-tatchua.
Kuch ab i t-gewkemhun mamtsh ab bei g i wehmta. Titus o si s-ap e tahtk mamsh wabsh si s-ap'e. Kuni heg hekaj si s-hehgig
nant pi si s-ap has em-ah ab wui. Kumt pi si ni-edawua. Chum ach hekith g wohokam ahg ab em-wui. Kut hab wa'ap am e wohokamch hegai mant am ahgi g Titus ab em-amjed.
Ba'ich o ab i si em-tatchua am i chechegitodch mamt si s-ap ab i neith k am si i e nako mamt ab wo s-wohog el.
Si am s-ap hab junihim hegai mani has i kaij. Kuni heg hekaj ab si em-hiwig ch si s-hehgig.
Neh, t-wepnag, am ach s-em-ahgithamk mat haschu wa hab juh g Jiosh am ha shahgith g wohochuththam amai Macedonia jewed t am.
Mu'i sho'igthag at nakog k wabshaba wabsh si s-hehgig ch si s-ap e tahtk ch am hab wua g mahkig mo eda d wa chum si sho'igkam.
Bat juh ihtha mahkig mat he'es i e nako, pej ba'ich i mo he'es i chum e nakog, wabsh hejel hab e elithk.
Ab at si t-tai matt wo ha hiwigi mat hab wo juh ihtha k hab masma am wo i ha wehmt hegam mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch si e sho'igchuth amai Judea t am.
Kut ba'ich am hab i juh mach he'es hab i chum ha elith nat pi wehs am i e thagito chikpanaj ed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mach has masma am ha tashogith.
Am at wa heki hu i chikp ihtha g Titus. Kuni am si i chehani mat am wo i em-wehmt k wo nahto ihtha s-kehg chikpan.

Si am ge'e ha'ichu ab ap'ethag ch ab si s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha'ichu s-mahch ab amjed g Jiosh ch s-kehg neneok ch s-wapagima ch ab si t-tatchua. Kuch heg hekaj hab em-elith mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth am Judea ch ed.
Pi ani ab hu s-gewkam em-chehani mamt hab wo juh ihtha. Ni wabsh chum s-mahchimk mas he'es i ge'ej g em-pihk elithadag. Heg ani hekaj am em-ahgith mat has masma hab juh g i wehmta ihtham ha'i.

Am am wa s-mahch mat has masma am chehgi g e-hemajimatalig g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Thach wabsh sho'igkam. T heg an thagito g e-kihthag ch e-ap'ethag k sho'ig ia ha'ichugkahim matt ahchim ab wo si i bei g ap'ethag.
Bani masma hab elith ihtha mamt am wo i nahto hegai mamt wa am hab i chum juh ha'akith. Ahpim amt wa wehpeg si s-hohho'ith k am hab i junihi ihtha i wehmta.
Pegih, am g wo i e gewpkath k wo nahto. Bamt wa masma s-wapagimam am wo i nahto mamt wa gd hu i wehpeg hab e juh.
Mt wo s-ap e taht k am hab wo juh mamt he'es wo i e nako. T g Jiosh wo wa s-hohho'i.

Pi ani hab ahg mams ahpim wo e sho'igch am i ha wehmajch hegam wohochuththam mo e sho'igchuth. Ithani am ha'ichu s-edgith ch hekaj wo i ha wehmt. T hegam am epai wo i em-wehmt mamtp hekith wo i tatchua g i wehmta. Bamt masma am a'ai wo i e wehmt mamt hekith wo i tatchua g i wehmta.
Bat masma hab wo e juh hegai mo an hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed ch hab chu'ig: Matp hedai he'es wo i edagi ha'ichu, t am wo wa ahijsk mo he'es i tatchua.
Titus o si pihk e elith em-hekaj hab masma mani ahni. Kuni heg hekaj ab si i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
S-ap o e tahtk mani ab ahgith mat am wo i em-wehmt ch am hejel si e nako mat am wo i em-chehgim.
Am ani hema ep ahgith mat wo oi g Titus. Ith o s-ap ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K heg hekaj wehsko ab si has elith g t-wepnag.

K ith d ha-kehsha mat wo t-oi matt am wo i ui g em-mahkig ha wui hegam mach am i s-ha wehmtamk. Si ach s-t-nen'oith matt s-ap hab wo juh ihtha em-wehhejed. T hab pi hedai has wo t-ahg k wabshaba ab wo has elithath g Jiosh.
Pegih, t am wo oi g Titus ihtha t-wehnag. Mu'ikko att am a'appe ab tahnich mat am wo i t-wehmt. Kuki chum hekith s-t-wehmtamk, wahm hemuch no pi ab si has em-elith.
Kum s-mahch mo g Titus d ni-wehm chikpantham ch am wo i em-wehmt. K ihtham ha'i mat am wehmaj wo hihi am d ha-chuhchai g t-wepnag ch ab si ha'ichuchuth g Christ.
Ab ani si s-ap has em-ahg am ha tahgio. Kumt am wo ha chehgi mam ab si ha tatchua. T hegam mat am i ha chuhcha wo s-mahchk mani g wohokam am ha ahgith.

S-mahch ani mam tatchua mamt wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam e-wepnag, chum anis hems pi am hu wo em-o'ohani heg amjed. Ia ani wa heki hu si s-ap has em-ahg ha wui ihtham t-wepnag am ha ahgithch mamt heki hu hab i e ah ha'akith mamt am wo i ha wehmt hegam sho'igkam. Ith at mu'ijj am si i ha gewpkai.
Kuni ithani am ha ahgith ihtham t-wepnag mat am wo hihi em-wui. Mt wo si e nahtokch heg hekaj e-mahkig. Kut pi wabsh wo heki e wua g s-kehg ni-ne'oki ab em-amjed.
Tp hems wo ha'i t-wehmajk g Macedonia t am hemajkam. Kunt wo si ni-el mamtp pi wo e nahtokch mani eda si s-ap em-ahg am ha wui. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap wo si e el.

Heg ani hekaj hab elith mo s-ap'e mant am wo si i ha cheha ihtham t-wepnag mat am wehpeg wo hihim k am wo i em-wehm ap'ech g em-mahkig. Bat masma heki hu wo nahtoisk mant am haha wo jiwia. Mt am wo e chehgi mam woho i s-ha wehmtamk g sho'igkam ch pi hab wabsh wua manis ab si em-chehani mamt am hab wo juh.

S-mahch am mat mu'i wo nei g ha'ichu bahithag hegai mat mu'i wo ei g ha'ichu kai. T pi ab hu mu'i wo nei hegai mat pi mu'i wo ei. Pegih, mt hab wa'ap mu'i ab wo nei g ap'ethag mamtp s-ba'ama ab wo ha'ichu ha mah am Jiosh wehhejed.

Mt wabshaba hejel hab wo e ah mamt he'ekia ab wo i ha mah. Pi o ab hu t-chehani g Jiosh machs ab ha'ichu wo ha mah no pi s-hohho'ith matt si s-ap t-taht k am hab wo juh g t-mahkig k pi wo ge s-tha'ath.
Jiosh at wo e nako mat ab wo em-mah hegai mam haschu i tatchua. Kumt chum hekith wo edgithath mam haschu i tatchua hejel e wehhejed ch am thahm ep wo edgithath mamt am hab wo juh g i wehmta.
Neh, bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Hegai mat si s-ba'ama ab ha'ichu wo ha mahkath g sho'igkam at chum hekith wo e nakogath mat am hab wo e junihith.
Jiosh at ab wo mahkath g ha'ichu kai hegai mat wo e'eshath. T heg amjed ab wo neithath g ha'ichu hugi. Pegih, k hab wa'ap tasho mo s-ba'ama ab t mahkch g i wehmtadag matt am epai ha'i wo i ha wehmt.
Chum at hekith s-ba'ama am wo i em-wehmajk mamt wo s-chechojimak. Kut mu'ijj ab wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh heg hekaj em-mahkig.
Ihtha mamt am hab wo juh at am wo i ha wehmt g Jiosh hemajkamga. T mu'i ho'ige'elig am hab wo juh Jiosh wui.
Em-mahkig at am wo wohokamch mam woho ab s-wohochuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jesus Christ. Kut mu'ijj ab wo si i ha'ichuch g Jiosh
k wo e ho'ige'ithahu am em-wehhejed ab si em-tatchuathch no pi g Jiosh ab si em-mahkch g hemajimatalig.
Ab att wehsijj wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh mat ab i t-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag.
Ha'ijj amsh hab kaij manish s-em-keh'ith wabsh em-o'ohanithch ch antsh ep wo s-hemajimak am ep jiwiak. Pegih, bani wa masma chum si s-hemajima mo g Christ.

Am g wabsh wo s-thotholimak. Nt hab pi wo em-keh'el am jiwiak. Ha'ijj amsh hab kaij manish wabsh hejel ni-wehhejed am hab junihim ha'ichu. Ni eda g Jiosh wehhejed hab wua. Nt wo ni-nako mant wo si s-gewkam neo ab em-wui.
In ach d thothakam jewed thahm ch wabshaba pi hab masma hab t-junihim mo hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.

Hegam o ab wui gegok g Jiosh ch ha iattogith ch ab si ha'ichuchuth g hejel ha'ichu e-mahchig. K wabshaba ahchim ab t-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag. Kuch heg gewkthagkaj wehs gewito ihtha pi ap'ekam ch pi g hejel t-gewkthagkaj.
Pegih, am amt wo i e chehgi mam am wehs e thagitokch ith eda Christ himthag. Nt haha wo s-ko'okam ha namkith hegam mo am wa ha'ichukaj pi am hu wehs i e thagitokch.
Ha'i amki ab wabsh thahmjed ha'ichu neith ch hab chum si e elith mam d si Christ pionag. Am g wo si i e oithahim. Ahchim ach hab wa masma d Christ pionag mamtp has i masma hab e elith.
Pi ani sha'i si ni-elith am he'es i em-ahgithch ab amjed ihtha gewkthag mat g t-kownalig Jesus ab ni-mah. Ab o ni-mahkch mant hekaj am wo i em-gewkemhun k pi gm hu hab wo i em-juh ab amjed.
Pi ani hab ahgch am em-o'ohanith manis wo em-toths.
Tp hems hema hab wo chei, “Paul o si s-ta ke'itham kaij ab t-o'ohanithch ch wabshaba ia t-wui jijiwhia ch pi gewkthag. K g ne'okij d wabsh pi ha'ichu.”
T eda hegai mat hab wo wa chei wo chum s-mahchk mant hab wa masma hab wo chei hekith am em-wehmajkch mani has i kaij am ni-o'ohana ed.
Bamt wo s-mahchk mach pi ab hu sha'i i t-wepnath o t-wepogith hegam mo am si uhgk has e ahg. Wo o wabsh hejel e iattogith no pi hejel am e a'appem ch am hejel e ahg mo has masma.
Ahni ani hi am wa'i hugkam ni-a'aga mat he'es ab i ni-mah g Jiosh g chikpan. Kum ahpim d ni-nuhkutha.
Pi ant sha'i ba'iwich hegai mo g Jiosh ni-nuhkuthachuth mant am jiwia em-wui k am u'apa g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Christ.

Ni hekaj pi sha'i ni-haschuth heg hekaj mo d ha'i ha-chikpan mani am a'aga hegai chikpan mat g Jiosh ab i ni-mah ch wabshaba heg wui am ni-gewkathch mat am wo i ge'etha g em-wohochuthadag. Mt hekaj am epai wo i ni-wehmajk
mamt gm hu ba'ich ep wo i ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mo hebai pi koi hedai am hu ahgachug. Kunt pi hekith hab wo chum chei manis heg hab juh mat wabsh hema hab juh.
Bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed: Pi at hedai ab hu wabsh wo chum si has elithath g hejel ha'ichu hab e-juni. Heg at ab wo wa'i has elithath Jiosh ha'ichu hab juni.
Pi o has d sha'i ahga mas has i elith g o'othham g hejel e-chikpan. Heg o wa'i Jiosh s-mahch machs has i masma hab t-junihim.

Pi o hab chum chu'ig manis hab masma hejel ni-wehhejed wo neokath. Kuni eda ab si em-tatchua am wehhejed g Christ. Kumt hekaj ab wo ni-kaiha. Bam sha masma mam d hohntaj. Kuni si s-em-tha'a hab masma mo g Jiosh mamt wo si e nuhkuth g Christ wehhejed.

Am g wo s-chegitok matsh wa pi wohoch g Jiosh hegai wehpeg uwi mash hab chehgig Eve. Jiawul atsh wa s-a'agi iattogi am gahi wuhshanim g wamad. Kuni s-gihug mat hab wa'ap wo em-juh am gahi ha wuhshanim hegam mash chum em-iattogith. Kumtp hems wo s-ohhoth g Christ

namsh pi ha hiwgith ch ab ha kaiham. Ab ani em-ahgith hegai mo haschu am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab amjed g Christ. Kumsh eda ha'i ab ha kaiham hegam mash gawul ha'ichu am em-ahgith ab amjed.
Ihtham amsh ha'i ab si has ha elith hab masma mo d Christ chuhchai. Ni eda ahni hig woho d kehshaj.
M o hi wa woho mani pi am hu i si s-mahch g amogitha. Kuni wabshaba s-mahch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am em-wui i tashogith.
Ha'i amsh hab ni-elith mani pi ab hu ni-ha'ichuchuth pi sha'i em-hiwgithch mams ab wo ni-namkith. Ni eda am hab ni-junihim mant g s-ap'ekam am hab wo em-juni.
Tatchua ani g lial ch wabshaba pi tatchua manis wo em-wechhu. T hegam wohochuththam mo am a'ai kihhim Macedonia jewed ch ed ab ni-mamka mani haschu i tatchua.
Am ani em-ahgith wehsko Greece jewed ch ed mant pi wo em-hiwigi mams ab wo ni-namkith mani eda am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga em-shahgith.
Pi ani heg hekaj hab kaij ihtha manis pi ab hu em-tatchua. Jiosh o s-mahch mani ab si em-tatchua.

K wabshaba ha'i hab chum kaij mash hab masma chikpan mani ahni. Ni eda ahni pi ha'ichu em-kowlant. K ihtham hi em-kowlant ch hab em-iattogith. Am ash chum ni-wepo e wua ahni mani d Christ kehsha. Pegih, t hemho wa wo chum ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga pi ab hu ha'ichu em-kowlantch.
K wabshaba pi d wohokam Christ chuhchai ch ha'ichu ha iattogith ch chum t-wepo e wua ahchim mach d si s-wohom Christ chuhchai.

Am o wa tasho mat hab masma hab wo e wuath no pi d Jiawul pionag. Jiawul o chum e wepogith g s-ap'ekam anghil. T g piongaj hab wa'ap wo e wepogithath ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-ap'ekam. T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith heg hekaj.
Ha'i amsh hab ni-elith mani wabsh pehegi neok. Nt eda am wo em-ahgi g wohokam ab amjed g ni-chikpan. Ab g wo kaiham mant has wo chei.
Pi o ab hu ni-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus mant hab kaitham wo neokath.
Nt wabshaba am hab wo ni-juh no pi mu'ijj wabsh hejel si e haschuth.
Kum ahpim hab e elith mam s-chu a'amichuth ch eda wabsh ha hiwgith hegam mo pi ha'ichu a'amichuth
mat am hab wo em-juh mo haschu d i ha-tatchui. Tp hems am ha'ichu wo em-wohppo'i o atp s-wihnam an wo em-ui o atp pi ab hu has wo em-elithath o atp s-ko'okam has wo em-ah.
