Ha'i ash hab ni-elith mani pi hab masma ab em-wui mo hegam nani pi si ni-elith. Pegih, woho o wa mant wo si ni-el mantp hab wo masmak. Hegam o si e haschuth ch e wehhejed neneok. Pegih, nt ahni hab wa'ap ni-wehhejed wo neo.
Neh, bash e a'aga mash d Tutuligo ch d Jiosh hemajkamga ch d Abrahambad amjedkam. Pegih, ahni ehp.

Bo kaij mo d Christ pionag. Nt ahni hab wo chei mani ba'ich d i si piongaj mo hegam, chum ams hab wo ni-elithath mani wabsh pehegi neok. Ba'ich ani i si s-gewkam chikpan ch ba'ich i mu'ikko ni-kuhpach g Christ wehhejed. Ba'ich amt i mu'ikko ni-gewitta. Mu'ikko ant chum alo muh.
Hetaspo at am hugkam ab ni-chu'ichigch g ni-wehm Tutuligo mat waikko gamai humukto ni-gewitta.
Waikko at ni-gewitta g Rome t am haha'ichu. Hemho amt ni-ma'ichkwua. Waikko at wachum g wahlko mani an eda. Kuni hemako tash ch hemako chuhug chehmo'im am wi'inoghim shuhthagi ch ed.

S-to o ehbithama am ni-wehhejed mani hebai i oimmed. An o hab chu'ig g wi'inthag ch mu'ij g s-chu e'eskam. Ha'ijj o s-ta ehbitham s-ni-keh'ith g ni-wehm o'othham ch gawul mahs o'othham. Am o ha'ichug g s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu kihhim ch ed ch gm hu jegko ch an ge'e shuhthagi thahm. K hegam mo d chum t-naipijju chum s-ko'okam ni-jujju.
Mu'ikko ant si gewko k pi ha kohsig ch hebai d bihugimkam ch tonomkam. Mu'ikko ani pi ha ha'ichu hugi ch pi ha kih ch s-wihonagi eniga.
Am ba'ich ehp mani wehs tashkaj si ha chegitok hegam mo ab ihm g Christ ch an a'ai hab chu'ig.
Ab ani ha wehm nakog ha'ichu hegam mo pi gewpkthag. Tp hema am wo gei pi ap'ekam ch ed, ni ha wehm si ni-kudut.
Pi ani hejel si ni-ha'ichuchuth. Tho Jiosh mo am chehgithch g e-gewkthag am ni-eda mani eda d wabsh si sho'ig pi gewkam hemajkam. Ni heg ab wa'i ha'ichuchuth.
Jiosh alithag o d ni-kownalig. K g Jiosh s-mahch mo wehs woho ihtha mani em-ahgith. Kunt chum hekith ab wo si hehgchulithath.
Neh, hegai kownal mo ab wecho g ge'e kownal Aretas at wa am i ha chuhcha g shonthal ab Damascus kihhim kihjeg t ab mat an wo ni-be k wo ni-kuh.
Mt wabshaba an ni-thai washomi ch ed k ab i ni-huduni hothai kolhai amjed. Nt hab hi wa al masma ni-tho'ibia.
Pi at ha'ichu wo ni-ap'et manis wo em-ahgi hegai mani haschu am hab junihim. Heg ant wo wa'i em-ahgi mat haschu g Jiosh am ni-chehgi.

Heg at am uhgk i ni-bei e-kihthag wui an thahm kahchim ch ed. Ith at hab e juh gamai gi'ik a'ahithag wehgaj. Pi ani hi wa mahch manis s-wohom an jiwia, aha nat hegai ni-thoakag an jiwia. Heg o wa'i Jiosh s-mahch ihtha. Heg ani hi wa s-mahch mant an i ni-nei Jiosh kihthag ed.
An ant s-ta kakaim ha'ichu kah. K g Jiosh pi ni-hiwgith manis am wo ah.
Ith ant ab wo si has ah mat g Jiosh am ni-chehgi k pi ahni ab hu hejel has wo ni-ah. Jiosh o ab ni-chehgithch g e-gewkthag nani pi d wabsh sho'ig pi gewkam hemajkam.

Kuni mu'i ha'ichu hab wua heg hekaj gewkthaj ch wabshaba pi em-ahgith nani pi pi tatchua mas hedai ab hu wo si has ni-elithath heg hekaj. Heg amt wa'i hekaj ab wo si has ni-elithath mam haschu i neith mani hab wua ch haschu i kah mani hab kaij.

Pi o hab mahs manis wo si ni-ha'ichuchuthath heg hekaj mo haschu am ni-chehgith g Jiosh. K g t-kownalig Jesus hiwgith g Jiawul mat wo i ni-mumkichuth k wo ni-kudutath mant pi ab hu wo si ni-ha'ichuchuthath.
Waikko ant ab chum si ni-ho'ige'ithahu Jesus wui ab tahnich mat gm hu hab wo i juh ihtha ni-mumkithag.

Kut hab masma i nodagi g e-ne'oki, “Ba'ich at i s-ap wo e chehgi g ni-gewkthag ab m-ab mapt wabsh s-ap wo nakogath g e-sho'igthag napt pi pi wo e nako maps hejel wo nako. Heg wa'i ni-gewkthagkaj apt wo e nako.” Neh, kuni heg hekaj si s-hehgig ch wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mani d wabsh si sho'ig pi gewkam hemajkam nant pi hab masma wo taht g Christ gewkthag.

Heg o am chehgithch g e-gewkthag am ni-wehhejed mani hekith i mukialig. Kuni heg hekaj wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk mani mukialig ch ab nakog g s-ko'ok has ahgadag ch s-wehch ha'ichu ch sho'igchuthadag ch kudutadag wehhejed g Christ.

Ab o em-ab mamt ni-wehhejed wo neneokath ab ha wui hegam mash has ni-ahg am em-shahgith. Msh wabshaba pi hab e wua. Kunt hemho wa am ni-wehhejed has wo chei, chum anis pi hohho'ith manis hab wo ni-juh nani pi d wabsh pi ha'ichu. K wabshaba g t-kownalig Jesus ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag am ni-kehshch. Pegih, m haschu ahgch ba'ich ab has i ha elith hegam mash wabsh em-iattogith.
Bani wa junihim g s-hasig ha'ichu ch mu'i ha'ichu ab nakog mani wa eda am ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga em-wui. K ith am chehgithch mani d Christ kehsha.

S-ap ani hab ni-junihim ab em-wui hab wa masma mani ab wehs ha wui hegam mo an a'ai d Christ ihmtham, heg hi wa mani pi em-hiwgith mams ab wo ha'ichu ni-namkith. Ab g wabsh wo s-ni-ho'ige'ith mani pi em-hiwgith.

Ith o d i waikkokam mant am wo i em-chehgim. Kunt pi ha'ichu ab hu wo em-tai nani pi ahpim ab em-tatchua ch pi g em-lialiga. Bam sha masma mam d chu'uchum ni-a'aliga namt pi hemu ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g Christ k hekaj bei g wechij thoakag. K hab chum mahs mat g jehj wo ha thagio'ithath g chu'uchum e-a'aliga ch pi hab mahs mas g chu'uchum a'ai wo ha thagio'ithath g e-jehj.
Am o wa s-ap'e mant am wo hugio g ha'ichu ni-eniga ch ni-thoakag em-wehhejed. Ab ani ba'ich i si pihk ni-elith em-wui mo g jehj ab e-a'aliga ha wui. Kumt heg hekaj ab wo chum si ni-tatchuath.
S-mahch am mani pi ha'ichukaj sha'i em-wechun. Kumsh eda ha'i hab kaij manish wabsh em-iattogith
ch ui g em-lialiga hejel ni-wehhejed. Pi o woho ihtha. Am ant ha cheha hegam Titus mat am wo hihim k wo i hemapai g lial g sho'igkam ha wehhejed.
K hegam wabsh s-ap ha'ichu hab elith ch am hab e junihim mani ahni has i masma.

Na'ams ha'i hab ni-elith mani gm hu wabsh chum ni-oan ith hekaj mani wa hab kaij. K eda pi hab chu'ig. Am ani Jiosh tahgio hab kaij hegai mo d Christ tatchui. K wehs hegai mach haschu hab i junihim d i em-wehmtadag.

S-gihug ani mant wo cheh am jiwiak mamt gawul wo masmak mani hab masma chum em-tatchuith. Mt ahpim hab wa'ap wo cheh mant ahni gawul wo masmak mam has i chum ni-tatchuith. Ntp hems wo cheh mam ha'i wabsh kia e kawani ch ha'i s-e hehgamk ch ha'i pi babmuistk ch s-chu tha'a ch s-ko'okam has e ahg ch chum si e haschuth ch a'ai e cheggia.

T heg wo ni-mah g si edathag am Jiosh tahgio. Kunt wo shoakath mamtki koi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k pi ap e nuhkuth ch ha ehsith g ha-wehm kihkam ch s-tohntom has e wua ch g pi ap'ekam tatchua.

Neh, s-ko'okam ant ab wo ha namkith g pi ap chu'ijkam am i ep em-chehgimedk. K wabshaba an o'ohadag: Bat wa'i masma wo e wohokamch g ha-chu'ichig mamt gohk o waikajj am wo ah mam neith mat pi ap chu'i.
Pi at hedai wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag matp pi wo thagito g pi ap e-chu'ichig. Ith ani heki hu em-ahgith mant wa am ep jiwia.
Mt haha wo s-ap s-mai mo neok g Christ gahi ni-wuhshanim. Heg at s-gewkam am wo i em-chikpan k am wo chehgi g e-gewkthag em-shahgith.

Woho o wa mat e wepogi g sho'ig pi gewpkam o'othham k ab e muhkith kots t ab. T wabshaba g Jiosh am chehgi g e-gewkthag. K g Christ hahawa ep thoakam heg gewkthagkaj. Kunt ahni am i s-mai mani pi ha gewkthag ab i gehshk Christ wui. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag gahi wuhshanim g Christ mant hekaj s-ap am wo i em-chikp.
Am g wo si e mamche k am hejel wo i e a'amich mams am hi wa s-ap hab chu'ig e-wohochuthadag oithch. Mt wo wa chum s-ap s-mahchk mam ab u'ukch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamtp woho d wohochuththam
k hab wa masma wo s-mahchk mani ahni hab wa'ap woho d wohochuththam.
Ab ani si ni-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui mamt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch wabshaba g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith, chum as wo pi ap ni-ahgath hegam mo s-ni-keh'ith.
Pi att wo t-nako matt wo shohbi g wohokam. Hemho wa att am wo wohokamch.
Tt wo s-ap t-taht k ab wabsh wo i t-sho'igch mamtp ahpim wo i gewpka am e-wohochuthadag ed. Ab ach si t-ho'ige'ithahun mamt wehs ab wo i e thagito k am s-ap wo i e nahto.

T-kownalig Jesus o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant wo shohbi g pi em-ap'ekam. Kunt am i em-o'ohani mamt hekaj am wo i ap'ech mant eda koi jiwia. Nt hab pi wo em-keh'el am jiwiak. Tho Jiosh hab elitha mant am wo i em-gewkemhu. Kuni hab pi em keh'ithamk.

Pegih, ni-wepnag, ha'as ant hab wo chei. Am g wo i e nakogi mamt wehs ab wo i e thagito Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. T heg wehs wo i em-ap'ech. Ab g wo i s-wohog elithath g t-mashchamadag ch ab wo i hemakoch g e-wohochuthadag k wo s-ap e tahtk ch e wehm kihkath. T g Jiosh wo em-wehmajk ch wo em-mah g pihk elithadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Ab g a'ai wo si e tatchuath. Ihtham t-wepnag mo ia kih ash s-em-ho'ige'ith.

Ab o si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. K g Jiosh ab si em-tatchua. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-makiog g gewkthag mamt ab a'ai e wui wo si s-ap e tahtkkath. Neh, ith ant hab wo wa'i chei.
Ni-wepnag mam am kih Galasia jewed ch ed: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul mat g Jesus Christ am i ni-kei g e-ohg Jiosh wehm.
K ia ha'i i ni-wehmt g t-wepnag ch ab s-em-ho'ige'ith.
Ab o wa s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Jesus Christ at ab s-wohog el g e-ohg k e sho'igchuth k ab muh kots t ab mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichigk ab wo i t-wuwhas ab amjed g pi t-ap'ethag. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed.
Pegih, tt heg hekaj ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh.
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g e-ho'ige'ithadag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. Kunt si ni-toths mamtsh s-hohtam thagito g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k ab s-wohoch g gawul ha'ichu ahga.

K heg pi d sha'i tho'ibiathag ahga. Hegai wa'i Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d tho'ibiathag ahga. K eda ha'i hemajkam gawul ha'ichu am chum em-ahgith ch heg hekaj ab i chum em-ga'agwulkath ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

T wabshaba g Jiosh am wo ha lothait k s-ko'okam wo ha namkith. Neh, mantp hems ahni o chum hems g anghil gawul ha'ichu wo em-ahgi, t g Jiosh hab wa masma wo t-lothait k s-ko'okam wo t-namkith. Heki am hu ab kaiham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am wa chum s-mahch mo has chu'ig.

Tp hems pi wo hohho'i g hemajkam mani has kaij. Ni eda pi hab ahgch hab kaij mas g hemajkam wo s-hohho'i. Jiosh o s-hohho'ith mani ahgachug g ha'ichu ahgaj. Thani Jiosh alithag pionag. K hab chum chu'ig mant heg ab wo s-wohog elithath, chum as has wo ni-el g hemajkam.
Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo pi ab hu d hemajkam ha amjedkam ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mani am em-ahgith.
Pi at hedai o'othham ni-ahgi o ab ni-mashcha. Tho Jiosh alithag mat ab mahsko wua ni-wui.
Thani Tuhligo. Kumki heki hu kah mani wa hab masma ab ihm g Jiosh mo g ni-wehm o'othham ch si ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus ch am chum s-keshwuimk g ha-hehemaptha.
Thani wa si s-has ha'ichu am t-himthag ed mu'i ha ba'iwechkim g ni-wepo ge'edam nanid pi ba'ich i s-gewkam oith g t-himthag.
T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am heki hu i ap'ech mant eda koi mahsi mant d wo piongajk.

T am hebai i cheka. T am hahawa mahsko wua g e-alithag ab ni-wui mant wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab em-wui ahpim go'ol hemajkam. Kunt pi hedai i wui hih mas wo ni-tashogi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Ab o thadha g Jesus Christ chuhchai Jerusalem kihhim t ab am Judea jewed ch ed ch am ahgachug g ha'ichu ahgaj. Nt wabshaba pi am hu sha'i hih manis hekaj wo ha neith k wo ha wehm neo. Im ant hu hab wabsh hih Arabia jewed wui k am hahawa ep uhpam hih Damascus kihhim wui.
Am o d i waik a'ahithag thahm, nt am hih Jerusalem wui k ab ha'ichu wo kakke g Peter k am wehmaj thakahim gohk thomig ab.
M ant wa'i hemako ep nei g Jesus kehsha. K heg d James ch d wehngaj g Jesus.
Jiosh o s-mahch mo d wohokam ihtha mani em-ahgith.
Am i thahm, mant am hahawa ep hih Syria jewed wui ch Cilicia jewed wui.
K eda pi ni-mahch hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus ch am kih Judea jewed ch ed.
Ihtham wabsh kah mo ha'i hab kaij, “Hegai mo wa t-sho'igchuth o am hahawa ahgachug ihtha Jesus ha'ichu ahga mo wa heki hu chum s-keshwuimk.”
Neh, bash kaij ch ab si ihm g Jiosh am i kaiok mat am gawul i ni-juh.
Am him k am d i wehst-mahm a'ahithag, nt am hih Jerusalem wui wehmaj g Barnabas. Tt am hema i bei g gawul mahs o'othham. K ith hab chehgig Titus.

Jiosh o wa ab ni-chehgith mant am wo him k wo ha nei hegam mo am d ha wanimedtham g Jesus ihmtham. Kutt am ha wehm t-nam. Ni am ha ahgith mani haschu i ahgachug am ha-shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam nani pi s-gihug matp hems ha'i wo padch g ni-chikpan.

K am ha'i ha'ichug hegam mo chum s-em-wupulshpamk ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam hab em-elithch mant hemho wa am hab wo junihith g heki hu t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo. Ihtham o pi woho wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus ch wabsh am thadhak ch chum mamche machs haschukaj pi am hu oithch hab junihim hegai heki hu t-himthag. Am o t-wehmaj g Titus. K ihtham ab si t-ahgith matt hemho wo wa pahl hikuch. Kuch wabshaba ab ha wui gegok. K hegam mo am d ha wanimedtham t-wepo hab elith. Neh, bach wa masma s-ap nuhkuth ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mach am em-wui ahgachug.
Tho wabsh ni-wehm wohochuththam hegam mo am d ha wanimedtham ch pi ha'ichu wechij ab hu ni-ahgith. Pi ani si has ha elith. Wehsijj ach t-wepo d haha'ichu am Jiosh tahgio.

K hegam hab kaij matki g Jiosh am hab wa'ap i ni-kei hab masma mat am i kei g Peter. Heg o d kehshaj ch am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ha wui g Tutuligo. Ni ahni hab wa'ap d kehshaj ch am ahgachug ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam. K g Jiosh wepo ab t-mahkch g gewkthag.

Bamki ha elith hegam James ch Peter ch John mo d ha wanimedtham. T ihtham am wohokamch mat g Jiosh ab ni-mah ihtha chikpan k t-nowi-bebhe. Kutt am i t-ap'ech ab t-wui mat hegam am wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Tutuligo hemajkam ha wui. Nt ahni hi g Barnabas wehm gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui wo ahgachugath.
K hegam hab t-ahg matt wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo d sho'igkam am ha shahgith. Am ani wa heki hu hab junihim ch hekaj si chikpan.

Am ani wa kih Antiok kihhim t am ch am ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T am jiwia g Peter k am ha wehm oimmed hegam go'ol hemajkam mat ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. T am hahawa ha'i t-wui thatha g Tutuligo ab amjed g James. K heg i thahm g Peter pi an hu ha wehm oimmed g go'ol hemajkam ch pi ha wehm e gegosith no pi s-ehbith mat has wo chei hegam Tutuligo.
K hegam ehp mo hab wa'ap d Tutuligo hab wa'ap e wua mo g Peter, chum wa hems g Barnabas.

Ni am ha neith mo pi am hu sha'i ap hab junihim g e-wohochuthadag ch hab kaij ab wui g Peter am ha kaichuthch, “Neh, Peter, thap Tuhligo ch wabshaba hahawa pi am hu hab junihim hegai t-himthag mo wa g Jiosh ab t-chehani. Pegih, p haschu ahgch hab e elith mapt pi wo ha hajunimak g go'ol hemajkam, t ho'ip am hab i junihi g t-chehanig?”
Ahchim Tutuligo ach wa hab chum t-elith mach pi hab masma pi ap'e mo g go'ol hemajkam.

T wabshaba am i t-chehgi g Jiosh mat pi hedai wo e nako mas am tahgio hejel wo i e ap'ech am hab junihithch g chehanig. Bo d elithaj matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo i hiwigi g Jesus Christ. T heg am tahgio wo i t-ap'ech. Pegih, tt heg am hab wa'i juh k am i t-ap'ech.
Am att i s-mai mach d pi ap chu'ijkam am i s-mahchk ab amjed g Christ. Pi at heg hab t-juh machs d pi ap chu'ijkam
k wabshaba am i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio. Kutt d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk mattp wo chum s-t-apchutham g chehanigkaj.
Chehanig o s-hasig. Kutt pi wo t-nako machs am oithk hab wo t-junihith ch am wo i t-ap'ech. Nt heg hekaj am i ni-thagito Jiosh wui mat am wo i ni-ap'ech k am hahawa d wo thoakamk wehhejed.

Jiosh alithag o ab si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ab nako g s-ko'ok muhkig ab kots t ab am t-wehhejed mat heg hekaj ab wo i t-mah g wechij thoakag. Kuch heg hekaj ab hiwig ch d thothakam am nenaj ed ch am wehhejed.

T wabsh wo e nahnkogi g Christ muhkig matp g o'othham wo e nako mas wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed heg wabsh hekaj mo hab junihim g chehanigaj. K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig. Ab o t-wui him g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag heg hekaj Christ muhkig. Kutt pi wo thagito g ho'ige'ithadaj ab hiwigch g Christ.

Heki am hu kah mat ab muh g Jesus Christ kots t ab am em-wehhejed. Kum d pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam mamt ab wo ha kaihamath hegam mo em-iattogith ch hab kaij mamt hab wo junihith g t-chehanig ahchim Tutuligo.
Ab amt i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T g Jiosh ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Kut heg s-ap i shonwuich g em-wechij thoakag. Pegih, m haschu ahgch hahawa pi hiwig mat ba'ich wo i himath g em-thoakag. Pi amt wo e nako mamt s-ap wo nahto g e-thoakag g hejel e-gewkthagkaj.
Mu'i am ha'ichukaj e sho'igchuth am wehhejed g Jiosh alithag. T g em-sho'igthag wo e nahnkogi mamt wo sha thagito g Jiosh alithag.

Ab amt si i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. T heg hekaj ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo em-wehmajk k hab ep wua g s-hasig ha'ichu am em-shahgith. Pi at hab ahgk hab e juh ihtha mams am hab si junihim g Tutuligo ha-chehanig.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Abrahambad at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh. K g Jiosh heg hekaj hab masma ab neith mo s-ap'e.
Kum ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mam ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ba'ich i wepo masma mo g Abrahambad ki hegam mo d si amjedkamaj ch pi ab hu wohochuth. Heg o wa wepo mam ahpim d Abrahambad amjedkam.

Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam o heki hu s-mahch ch an o'oha mat g Jiosh am hab wo ha juh g go'ol hemajkam mat ab wo i s-wohochuth k wo i e ap'ech am tahgio. Kush hab kaij g Jiosh am wui g Abrahambad: Nt wo s-ha ho'ige'el wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam matp hedam ab wo i s-ni-wohoch hab masma mant ahpi hab m-juh.
Pegih, t wa woho ab wo bei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag hegam matp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh hab masma mat g Abrahambad hab e juh.

An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed: Matp hedai pi am hu wehs oithch hab wo e junihith g Jiosh chehanig ch heg amjed wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. K hab mahs mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wehs oithch hab wo e junihith. T heg hekaj wehsijj wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.

K wabshaba an o'ohanas: Jiosh at am wehs wo i ha ap'ech hegam mat ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiw. T ihtham wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. K heg hekaj tasho mat pi hedai wo i e ap'ech am chehanig oithch hab e junihithch.
Pi am ab hu hiwig g Jiosh mamtp wabsh hejel wo s-e apchutham. An o o'ohanas matt hemho wa wehs oithch hab wo t-junihith g Jiosh chehanig ch hab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.

Kuch wabshaba wehsijj d pi ap chu'ijkam. K ab t-wui him g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. T g Christ ab bei t-wehhejed gm hu i e gawulkathk ab amjed g Jiosh no pi an o'ohanas: Gm at hu i e gawulkai ab amjed g Jiosh matp hedai ab e naggia uhs t ab.

Ith at hab t-juni g Christ. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab wo t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mattp hedai ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiw. Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam amt hab wa'ap masma wo bei hegai mash wa g Jiosh am ahgith g Abrahambad mat ab wo t-mah.
Tho t-himthag matp ha'i ha'ichu ab a'ai wo e ah'ath, t pi hedai wo e nako mas am hejel gawul wo juh.
Pegih, k ab si ah'ath g Jiosh g Abrahambad mat wo ha tho'ibia g nahnko mahs hemajkam am hema gahi wuhshanim g Abrahambad amjedkam. Kuki heg hab ahg Christ.
Kut pi sha'i gawul juh g ha'ichu e-ahga g Jiosh mat hekith ab i t-mah ahchim Tutuligo g t-chehanig mo ithani d wa'i gi'ik siant waikko wehst-mahm (430) ahithag amjed.
Jiosh at wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam hab masma mat tho'ibia g Abrahambad mat wa hab masma ab ha ah'ath ha'ichu. Ith at wo em-tho'ibia mamtp ab wo i s-wohoch, k pi hegai chehanig.

K wabshaba am wa ha'ichu wehhejed s-ap'e hegai chehanig. Heg o hekaj tasho mo haschu d pi ap'ekam. K hab d elithaj g Jiosh matt an wo u'ukchith ihtha chehanig am hugkam mat in wo i wuhsh g alithaj. Am ash ha ahgith g Jiosh g chehanig am gahi wuhshanim g anghil.
Kush hema g o'othham am ha wehhejed neok g Jiosh ch hemajkam matsh eda am i ap'ech hegai chehanig. Sh wa eda g Jiosh si hejel am ahgith g Abrahambad g ha'ichu e-ah'atha.

Pi o ab hu wui kehk g Jiosh ha'ichu ah'atha g chehanigaj. Mattp wo sha t-nako machs wehs oithch am hab wo t-junihith g Jiosh chehanig, t wabsh wo t-hiwigi g Jiosh matt heg hekaj wo t-tho'ibia. K wabshaba pi hab sha'i mahs. Heg at hekaj wo t-tho'ibia g Jiosh mo has i masma ab ha'ichu t-ah'ath.

An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo wehs hemajkam d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi wo sha'i e nako mas hejel wo e tho'ibia. T heg hekaj wo ha tho'ibia g Jiosh k ab wo i ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat ab wo hiwgath g alithaj.
An o wabsh t-shohbithch g Jiosh g e-chehanigkaj am hugkam mat ab i t-chehgi matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k wo t-tho'ibia.
T-mashchamahim o g e-chehanigkaj matt has wo chum masmak ch ab wo ai matt ab wo i hiw g alithaj. Kut heg am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh tahgio mattp ab hiwig.
K hahawa pi d ihtha chehanig ch wabshaba d Jiosh alithag mo ab i t-chehgithch matt has wo chum masmak.
E amt pahl wapko mamt am wo e chehgi mamt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k ab bei g alithaj. Kum d hahawa a'aligaj g Jiosh ch hab wo masmak mo g si alithaj.

K g Jiosh wehs t-wepo masma t-neith ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth. Ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam am t-wepo d ha'ichu ahchim Tutuligo am Jiosh tahgio. K g nenehol t-wepo d ha'ichu ahchim mach pi d nenehol. K g u'uwi t-wepo d ha'ichu ahchim chechoj. Wehsijj ach ab i t-hemakochuth ahchim mach an u'ukch g Jesus Christ.
Kuch d hemajkamgaj ch heg hekaj hab wa'i masma mach d amjedkamaj g Abrahambad ch wo bei hegai mat haschu g Jiosh am i ap'ech wehhejed.
Chum as wehs d wo enigajk g ali g ohgaj ha'ichu eniga, t eda pi wo bei t ho'ip am i ge'etha.
Mt wo nuhkuthath g ali ch ep wo nuhkuthath hegai mat haschu d wo enigajk am hugkam mat wo ai g e-ge'elig.
Kuch wa ahchim hab wa masma mo g a'al nat pi g Jiosh kei g e-chehanig mat hekaj wo t-nuhkuth am hugkam matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
T am i s-ap e ai, t g Jiosh ab i ah'ath g e-alithag. Kut ab mahsi k wepo e juh g hemajkam k am i ge'elhim k am hab junihim hegai chehanig mo g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g Tutuligo.
Ab ach wa t-abchuth g t-chu'ichig ab chehanig wecho. Kut ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm mat wo t-tho'ibia am t-wehhejed nakogk g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag matt d haha wo a'aligajk g Jiosh.
T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo t-wehmajk. Kuch hab d a'aligaj ch ab ihm ch hab kaij, “Jiosh t-ohg” .
nach pi hahawa pi d wabsh piongaj. T ab wo i t-mah g Jiosh mat haschu i ap'ech am t-wehhejed mach d a'aligaj.
Heki am hu pi mahch g Jiosh ahpim go'ol hemajkam ch ab ha'ichu e jijoshchuth ch ab ha ihm mo eda pi d sha'i hegai thoakam Jiosh.
Pegih, m haschu ahgch am uhpam ha wui ep s-hihimimk mamt d ep wo ha-neneholigak hemu mam eda am wa chum s-mahch g Jiosh. Pi at wo e nako hegam mas am wo i em-wehmajk.
Kum haschu ahgch si has elith g ha'ichu tash mo hekith i e a'ahe ch am hab wua g piast. Pi amt heg hekaj wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh nena ed.
Si ani s-em-gihug ch am em-chegito mamt hu wo i s-chegitok hegai s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mani wa am em-ahgith.
Am g hab wo masmak mani ahni nani pi hahawa pi ab hu wecho g heki hu t-chehanig.
S-mahch am mo wa ha'ichu pi ni-ap'e mant wa am jiwia k am em-ahgith ab amjed g Jiosh alithag.
M wa eda pi sha'i s-ni-tamhog ch ab i s-ni-ho'ige'ith k i ni-wahkith k am ni-nuhkuth heg wa wepo mantp d hema anghil o d Jiosh alithag.
Ab o wa si ge'ej g pihk em-elithadag mamtsh chum hems g e-wuhpui wo ni-mah heg hekaj pi ni-ap'ethag.
Kut haschu has e juh mam heg amjed hab ni-elith manis s-em-keh'ith ahni mani am chum em-ahgith g wohokam?

Hegam mo hab chum em-elith mamt am oithk hab wo e junihith g chehanig ch hekaj am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio o hab wabsh e wua mo ab em-tatchua ch wabshaba em-iattogith no pi gm hu hab i s-em-junimk ab ni-amjed mamt ab wo si ha ha'ichuchuthath.
M o wa s-ap'e mat ab hema wo em-tatchuath ha'ichu s-ap'ekam wehhejed. Bani wa ni-tahtk chum anis pi am hu em-wehmaj. K wabshaba ihtham em-tatchua g ha'ichu pi ap'ekam wehhejed.

Am am wa s-mahch mo g je'e mu'i ha'ichu nakog g e-a'aliga ha wehhejed ch ab a'ahe mat wo ha ge'ege'el. Pegih, ni ahni hab wa masma mu'i ha'ichu nakog am em-wehhejed mant ab wo em-ahijithaj mamt hab wo masmak mo g Jiosh alithag.
Mant hu am wo i em-wehmajk hemu ch wo em-wehm a'aga ihtha ha'ichu nani pi s-em-gihug.
M haschu ahgch hab chum e elith mamt am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio am oithch hab e junihithch g chehanig? Pi amt wo sha'i e nako mamt am hejel wo i e ap'ech.

Ith ant am wo em-tashogi ab amjed g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana. An o hab chu'ig mash gohk a'alithag g Abrahambad. Hema ash d madaj g Hagarbad ch hema d Sarabad mad ch hab chehgig Isaac. Sarabad ash d Abrahambad hohnig. Kush g Hagarbad d ha-neholiga.
Pi atsh koi bei g e-mad d Sarabad k eda heki hu okst. Sh wabshaba g Jiosh am ha ahgith mat wo ge madt. Kush ihtha madaj d ha-aliga. Sh wabshaba g Hagarbad mad d ha-neholiga hab masma mo g je'ej.

Sarabad ani wepogith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Ch ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth wepogithas g Sarabad mad nach pi woho d a'aligaj g Jiosh. Hagarbad ani wepogith hegai chehanig mat ab e mah Sinai tho'ag t ab am Arabia jewed ch ed. Wehs hegam mo chum s-e apchuthamk am oithch hab e wuathch g chehanig o wepogithas hegai mo d nehol mad no pi pi woho d Jiosh a'aliga. Mu'ijj o hab wa chum e wua g ni-wehm Tutuligo ch hab an e u'ukch hab masma mo g nehol. Ab Jerusalem t ab am ab si hiwig g chehanig. K wabshaba an t-thahm hab chu'ig g wechij Jerusalem. Kuch heg wui t-gewpkathch wehsijj ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh k am tahgio i t-ap'ech.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mash hab kaij g Jiosh: Si g s-hehgigk ahpi uwi mapt pi hekith sha'i madt napt pi ba'ich i mu'i wo a'aligak mo hi hegai mat heki hu madt.
Pegih neh, Isaacbad ash d si ha-aliga hab masma mash am ha ahgith g Jiosh. Ch ahchim hab wa masma d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
Heg ash wa sho'igchuth g Isaacbad mash pi d si ha-aliga. K hemuch hab wa'ap t-sho'igchuth hegam mo pi d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
An o o'ohadag mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab Abrahambad wui: Gam g hu i ha wuwhasith ihtham e-neneholiga. Pi at wo enigak g m-eniga am wehmaj hegai mo d madaj g m-hohnig.
Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, pi ach hab masma mo g ha-neholiga mad ch wabshaba hab masma mo g si ha-aliga
T-tho'ibia at g Christ. S-wihnam g an wo u'ukchith g e tho'ibiathag ch pi ab hu ep wo chum i hiw g chehanig mams hekaj wo e tho'ibia.
Mamt wo sha e pahl hikuch hab elithch mamt hekaj wo e tho'ibia am oithch hab e junihithch g chehanig, k d si shel mamtki wabsh thagito g e-wohochuthadag k pi wo e tho'ibia.
Nam woho hab e elith mamt am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio g pahl hikuchkakaj? Nt wo em-ahgi mamt hemho wa am wehs oithk hab wo e juh g chehanig mamtp heg hekaj am wo i chum e ap'ech.
Am o s-em-apchuthamk g Christ. Mt wabshaba gm hu hab wo i juh mamtp hejel chum s-e apchuthamk am oithch hab e wuathch g chehanig.
Ab o t-mahkch g gewkthag g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kuch hekaj ab wui t-gewpkathch mat g Jiosh s-ap am wo i t-ap'ech e tahgio.
Pi o hi wa has chu'ig matp hema heki hu wo e pahl hikuch o pi wo e pahl hikuch. Tho wa'i ihtha mamt ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo chehgithch g si pihk e-elithadag am i ha wehmajch.
S-ap am wa chum s-wohochuth g wohokam. Tsh wabshaba am ha'i thatha em-wui k im hu hab i chum em-wanchshulig.
Pi o d Jiosh mo im hu hab i em-wanchshulig ab amjed g wohokam.
Bamtp elith mo d wabsh al chum ha'ichu ihtha. T eda wehs wo padch g em-wohochuthadag ch em-thoakag hab masma mat g jewajithakud wehs wo jewaj g wahga.
Bani em-elith mam d wabsh kia ni-wehm wohochuththam ch pi gm hu wo i e nohnogi ab amjed g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo hedai im hu hab i chum em-wanchshulig.

Ha'i o hab kaij mani ahni ahgachug mamt am hab wo junihith g t-chehanig ch hekaj wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed. T wabshaba pi wo chum ni-mu'am g ni-wehm o'othham mantp heg wo ahgachugath. Heg o hekaj s-ni-mu'amk mani ahgachug mat g Jiosh alithag ab muh kots t ab mat hekaj am wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh nena ed.
Mat hu wo i em-thagito hegam mo hab em-elith mamt wo e-pahl hikuchk k hekaj wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed.

Pi at hab ahgk ab i em-wai g Jiosh mat gd hu wabsh wo i si em-thagsh heg hekaj e-chehanig k wabshaba hab ahgk mamt d wo a'aligajk. Pegih, mt heg hekaj ab wo si pihk e elithath ab a'ai e wui ch pi wabsh g hejel e-tatchui hab wo junihith.
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Si g wo pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj hab masma mam hejel si pihk e elith. Kumtp hab wo wuath ihtha ch heg wo wa wepok mam wehs oithk hab e wua g chehanig.
S-e g wo nen'oithk mamt pi a'ai wo s-e keh'ithath namt pi hab wa masma wo padch g e-nawojthag k a'ai wo e padch.

Pi o wepo chu'ig g o'othham tatchui ch Jiosh tatchui. Kumt ab wo e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. T heg ab wo em-shohbithath ch wo i em-wanimedath. Mt hab pi hab wo junihith g hejel pi ap e-tatchui.
Pi at ab hu ha'ichu wo em-chu'ichigch g chehanig mamtp woho am wo i e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui.
M o tasho g wabsh o'othham tatchui. Hegam mo hab wua g hejel e-tatchui atp hems wo'iwup hema i wehm mo pi d ha-wehm kihkam o hab wua g nahnko mahs s-uam ha'ichu.
Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o gawul ha'ichu chum jioshchuth o ha'i atp hems ha hihoin o atp hems a'ai e cheggia o a'ai s-e hehgamk o babgat o nahnko ha ahg o s-chu tha'athag o a'ai e ga'agwulkath.
o s-behimk g ha'ichu ha-eniga o nawkko'o o s-tohntom has e wua. Hegam mo hab masma ha'ichu hab wua at pi am hu wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed.

Kuch wabshaba pi hab mahs ahchim mo am t-eda ulinig g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o am chikpan g t-thoakag. Kuch hab si pihk t-elith ha hekaj ch si s-ap t-tahtk ch ab wabsh i s-thotholima ch s-t-tahtk ch nenida mo haschu g Jiosh ap'echuthch t-wehhejed ch s-ha ho'ige'ith g hemajkam ch s-ap'e ch s-hemajima ch wabsh si t-shohbithch ch am hab wo juh mach has i kaij. Pi o an hu sha'i shohbithch g chehanig hegai hab mahs ha'ichu.
Ahchim mach d Christ hemajkamga att hab i t-ah matt pi am hu hab wo junihith g hejel t-tatchui.
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag. Tt heg hekaj ab wui wo t-thagitokchith mat s-ap wo t-wanimedath.
Pi att wo ge t-haschuthath ch pi a'ai wo t-kudutath ch pi wo chu hehgamk.

Matp hema pi ap ha'ichu hab wo juh g em-wehm wohochuththam, mt am wo i gewkemhu mat am wo i e ap'ech ahpim mam am e thagitokch Jiosh wui. Kumt wabshaba wo e sho'igchuth k si s-hemajim am hab wo juh ihtha heg hekaj mamtp hems hema ahpim haha wabsh pi ap ha'ichu hab wo juh.
Nam hig woho am oithch hab s-e junimk g chehanig? Pegih, k ab t-chehani g Jiosh alithag matt am a'ai wo i t-wehmajk.
Pi g am wo chum si e ha'ichuchuth. Thach wabsh sho'igkam ch wabsh hejel wo t-iattogi mattp ab wo chum si t-ha'ichuch.

Pi att hab wo chei machs ba'ich i s-ap hab wua g t-chikpan mo hema ehp. Tho wabsh hehe'ejel t-chikpan hegai mach hab wua. Kutt heg wo wa'i a'appe hejel t-chikpan k wo si s-ap t-taht mattp s-ap hab wo wuath.
K ab em-ab mamt ab ha'ichu wo ha mah hegam mo am em-mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mamt hekaj am epai wo i ha wehmt.

Pi amt wo e nako mamt wo iattogi g Jiosh. Hejel am e iattogith mamtp hab elith mat pi wo em-namkith g Jiosh heg hekaj mam haschu hab i junihim. Nat hig pi wo ui g eshtham hegai hab mahs kai mat haschu wo ei? Pegih, k hab wa masma am t-thoakag wehhejed.

Mt wo s-ko'okam e namkith am i muhk mamtp hab wo sha juh g hejel e-tatchui k wabshaba chum hekith an wehmaj wo kihkath g Jiosh mamtp wo e thagito Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui k hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
Pi g sha'i ha'asa hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Jiosh o am wa ap'echuthch g tash mat ab wo i em-mah g em-gehgewadag.
Ab g wehs wo i s-ha ho'ige'ithath ch am wo i ha wehmajk mamt he'es wo i e nako, wahm hegam mo d em-wehm wohochuththam.
Hemu ant hejel ha'ichu am wo i em-o'ohani. Mt wo s-mai mani d ahni an neithk mani ha'as an i o'ohan.

Hegam mo ahgahim mamt wo e pahl hikuch k hab wo s-ap'ekam am Jiosh tahgio o ab chum si e ha'ichuchuth mam am oithch hab e junihim g ha-chehanig. K eda hejel pi am hu ap hab junihim. Ab at muh g Christ kots t ab am t-wehhejed. K eda hegam pi ahgachug ihtha no pi s-gihug mat g ha wehm Tutuligo wo ha sho'igch.
Kuni eda heg wa'i ahgachug matt ab wo i s-wohoch mat g Jesus ab muh kots t ab am t-wehhejed. Tho wa'i ihtha mant hekaj ni-tho'ibia. Kut g jewed t ab ha'ichu wabsh pi e ha'ichuch am ni-wehhejed.
Pi o d sha'i ha'ichu g pahl hikuchka. Ith o d si ha'ichu mamt ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k hab wo bei g wechij thoakag.
Ith o d hahawa t-himthag. T g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab wo em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam ahpim mamt am oithk hab wo e junihith hab masma mo wehs hab ha wua g e-hemajkamga.
Pi ant hahawa ha'ichukaj wo sha'i ni-kudu nani pi ab s-babaliwuani heg amjed mat g Jiosh alithag obga mu'ikko ni-gewittan k ni-ma'ikka. Heg o wa wepo mant ni-nakpi mani d piongaj g t-kownalig Jesus.
Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.

Ni-wepnag mam am kih Ephesus t am: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ahni Paul. Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. Kuni kah mamsh ab s-wohochuth g Jesus ch s-ap himchuth g e-thoakag heg wehhejed.
Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh t-ohg g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Jiosh o ab wehs t-makiog g e-ho'ige'ithadag nach pi ab s-wohochuth g alithaj. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si ho'ige'ithath.
Pi at wa koi ha'ichu sha'i nahto g Jiosh k hab i e ah mat ab wo i t-gawulkai matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk am tahgio ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk. Si o pihk e elith t-hekaj
ch am i ap'ech mat g alithaj am hab wo t-juh matt hab wa'ap d wo a'aligajk.
Heg att hekaj ab wo si hehgchulithath g Jiosh. Si o s-ap ab t-neith nach pi d hemako g si tatchuithch alithaj wehm.
Heg eh'ed at am e iawua kots t ab. Kut ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig k wo t-tho'ibia. Si o ge'ej g Jiosh hemajimatalig ab t-wui.
Ab o t-mahkch g ha'ichu mahchig ch ha'ichu amichuthadag.
Pi o ta machima g Jiosh hab elitha. T wabshaba heki hu am i ap'ech mat ia'i ithani haha wo t-mahtchul.

K ith hab d elithaj matsh g Christ d wo kownalk wehs ha'ichu thahm. Am at i ap'ech g tash matsh wehs ha'ichu ab wo i hemakoj Christ wecho. Wehs hegai mo an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hegai mo in jewed thahm at ab wo wechokath.
Wehs at hab wo e juh g Jiosh hab elitha. K hab d elithaj gd hu i shohshon k amjed mat wehpeg ab wo i t-gawulkai ahchim Tutuligo.
K ab t-ab matt ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh ahchim matt wehpeg ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj.

Kumt ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam hab wa'ap kah k ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Kut heg hekaj hab wa'ap em-tho'ibia g Jiosh k hab wa'ap ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mash hab masma heki hu hab kaij matsh hab wo em-juni. Ihtha Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am em-chehgithch mam hab wa'ap d Jiosh hemajkamga hab sha masma mo g em-cheposig am chehgithch g em-eniga.

Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch matt wehs ab wo bei hegai mo haschu ab i t-makiog. S-ap at wo t-tho'ibia ab wehs amjed g pi t-ap'ethag. Kuch heg hekaj ab si has elith.
Ab amtsh i s-wohoch mo g Jesus d em-kownalig k si pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam.
Kuni heg hekaj chum hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.

Jiosh o d si ge'e s-ap'ekam ch d ohgaj g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Kuni ab tahni mat ab wo em-mahkchith g amichuthadag ch am ba'ich wo i e tashogithath em-wui. Mt hab ba'ich wo i s-ap s-mahchk g Jiosh.
Ab ani tahni mat wo em-tashogi mamt has wo masmak am ep i e chechegitok ch haschu wo edgithath mam d ab waithaj ch ab gawulkthas wehhejed.
Mt ep wo s-mahchk mat wehs wo hekaj g e-gewkthag am t-wehhejed ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth. K g gewkthaj si ge'ej.
Am at wa chehgi g e-gewkthag ith hekaj matki ab i wuhshath g e-alithag muhkig amjed k ab thai s-apkojed e-hugith ab an thahm kahchim ch ed

mat d wo kownalk wehs ha'ichu thahm. Thahm kahchim ch ed kokownal ch jewed thahm kokownal o wehsijj ab wecho g Jiosh alithag. K d ihtha ge'e kownal mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch mat d wo t-mo'o am himthamk ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth.

Ch ahchim d hemajkamgaj ch wehmaj d hemako hab sha masma mach d honshpadaj. K heg d t-mo'o. Kuch am t-wehm d hekiakam. K eda heg an wehsko ha'ichug ch wehs ha'ichu an u'ukch ch wehs ha'ichu himchuth am t-wehhejed.
Heki am hu pi edgith ihtha wechij thoakag nam pi d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh.
Jijawul ha-ge'ejig o an em-u'ukch hab masma mo an wehs ha u'ukch hegam mo pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh. Kum hegam ha oithch am hab e junihim ch ab s-wohog elith g ge Jiawul.
Wehsijj ach hab wa masmakahim ch am hab junihim g hejel pi ap hab t-elitha. K wa ab t-wui him g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag.

Pi ach wa ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch gm hu gawulkthas ab amjed heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig. K wabshaba g Jiosh t-hekaj si pihk e elith ch si s-hemajim t-tho'ibia ab amjed g t-chu'ichig k ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. Ith o heg wa wepo mat heki hu ab i t-wuwhas muhkig t amjed
k am uhgk i t-u'u k an e-hugith an t-toa hab masma matsh hab juh g si e-alithag. Kuch hemu in melchuth g Jesus kownaltalig jewed thahm hab masma mattsh an hahawa hab wo junihith thahm kahchim ch ed.
Ith at wehs am hab t-juni g Jiosh gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. K hab d elithaj mat hab masma wehs am wo ha chehgi imhab i amjed mo has masma si s-hemajima ch ab si t-tatchua.
Ab at i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh k tho'ibia natt pi ab i s-wohoch. Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs hejel wo t-tho'ibia. Chum hems g t-wohochuthadag o d mahkigdaj.
Pi o am hu ha'ichug machs haschukaj wo chum si t-gimaihunath no pi pi hejel hab d t-juni machs hekaj t-tho'ibia.
Ab at i t-mah g Jiosh ihtha wechij thoakag. Kuki hab d elithaj matt hekaj am hab wo junihith hegai s-ap chikpan mat heki hu am i ap'ech am t-wehhejed.
Am g wo s-chegitok ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mam has i masma mamt eda koi ab hu i s-wohoch g Christ. Pi am wa pahl hikuchkas hab masma mach ahchim Tutuligo.
K g Jiosh pi ab hu em-mahkch hegai mo haschu ab t-mahkch ch pi ab hu em-mahtchulith mat ia wo i wuhshath g e-alithag mat d wo si Kehshajk. Kum wa pi ab hu wui i e gewpkath g Jiosh

ch pi mahch ch pi edgith g chehanigaj. Kuch wa heg hekaj s-em-keh'ith. M ahpim ab aigo hab wa'ap s-t-keh'ith. K hegai t-keh'ithadag hab sha masma mo g kolhai ch gm hu a'ai t-ga'agwulkathch. T wabshaba g Christ s-ap am oithk hab e juh ihtha chehanig k ab e muhkith kots t ab t-wehhejed k hab masma hugio g gewkthaj g chehanig. K heg pi ab hu hahawa t-chu'ichigchuth ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Jesus Christ at ab i t-hemakoj e wehm. Kuch pi hahawa a'ai s-t-keh'ith nach pi d hahawa hemako.
Pegih, ia at wa jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm k am ahgachug t-shahgith ihtha tho'ibiathag ahga matt am hahawa em-wui u'apa ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam mam wa pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh.
K g Jiosh hab wa'ap ab em-mahkch g ap'ethag ahpim mamt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohochuth k ab wui i e thagito. K hab wa'ap an em-u'ukch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Pi am d haha wabsh mehkjed o'othham ch wabshaba d a'aligaj g Jiosh. K g Jiosh ab em-mahkch g ap'ethag am e-kihthag ed hab masma mo ahchim ab t-mahkch.

Ith o heg wa wepo mam d Jiosh kihta. Kuch heg wa wepo mach d kih shon ahchim mach ha'i d Jesus si chuhchai ch ha'i d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K g Jesus an wehsijj t-u'ukch hab masma mach an ab kihtas.
Am o wabsh kia ge'ethahim ihtha kih no pi g Jiosh i ha ba'ihamahim hegam mo ab hahawa s-wohochuth.
Kuch wehsijj t-wehm si s-ap hab chu'ig ch d s-ap'ekam cheopi no pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am t-eda.
Ia am ni-kuhpch nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha shahgith g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Kuni am ni-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui em-wehhejed nam pi d ni-wehm wohochuththam.
Am amtp hu wa'i kah mo ab ni-wui si s-hemajima g Jiosh ch ab ni-mah ihtha chikpan mant hekaj wo i em-wehmajk.
Am at i ni-chehgi g s-a'agi e-apchutha mant ia he'es hekaj em-o'ohani.
Kumt wo s-mai am ne'okchulithch ihtha mant am em-o'ohani mani has masma s-amichuth ihtha s-a'agi ha'ichu ab amjed g Christ.
Ith o heki hu pi mahch g hemajkam. T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hemuch am hahawa i t-tashogi ahchim Jesus Christ chuhchai ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.

Ihtha s-a'agi ha'ichu ahga o hab chu'ig mam ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa t-wehm ap'ethag ahchim Tutuligo ith eda Jiosh ho'ige'ithalig. Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g e-ap'ethag nach pi ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu ahgaj ch ab hiwig g Jesus Christ.
Kuni ahni d em-pionag ch am em-ahgith ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Heg at si s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am i ni-kehsh k ab ni-mah g gewkthag mant wo em-ahgi.

Shahag wepo mani ahni wehs ha ba'ich d wabsh pi ha'ichu am ha shahgith g Jiosh hemajkamga. T eda g Jiosh ab ni-mah ihtha ap'ethag mant am wo em-ahgi ahpim nahnko mahs hemajkam g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Christ ho'ige'ithalig. Heg o ba'ich i si s-kehg s-ap hab chu'ig mo hig chumpk g si ge'e kaisthag. Kutt pi wo t-nako matt wehs wo s-amich.

Ith o d ni-chikpan mant am wo i ha tashogi g hemajkam mo has masma hab chu'ig ihtha s-a'agi ha'ichu apchuthaj g Jiosh. Jiosh at wehs ha'ichu nahto k wabshaba pi mahsko wua ihtha s-kehg hab e-elitha mu'i a'ahithag oitham
nat pi ia'i ithani wo ha chehgi g anghil kokownal g mu'i nahnko mahs ha'ichu e-amichuthadag am gai t-wuhshanim ahchim mat t-tho'ibia.
Jiosh at am hab juh ihtha gahi wuhshanim g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mat has i masma ap'ech ga hu i wehpeg.
Kuch ap'ethag matt si s-gegokim ab wo i miabi g Jiosh ab s-wohochuthch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj.
Ab ani shoak em-wui mamt am wabsh wo si i e gewpkath k pi has wo e tahtkkath mani ni-sho'igchuth em-wehhejed. Wehs o d wabsh em-ap'ethag ihtha ni-sho'igthag.
Ith ani wehs am i chechegitod ch hekaj ab i gegshshe heg wui mat wehs ha'ichu nahto.
Wehs nahnko thakam hemajkam ch anghil o d nahtoij. T heg ab ha mah g ha-chechgig.
Wehs o edgith g gewkthag g Jiosh ch ge'e ab t-makiog. Kuni ab tahni mat ba'ich ab wo i em-mah. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-eda ha'ichug ch ab t-makiog g Jiosh gewkthag.
Ith o heg wa wepo mo g Christ am t-eda kih. Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mamt chum hekith hab wo masmak mo g Christ ch wo si pihk e elithath ab wehs ha wui.

Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g Christ tatchuithag ab t-wui. Pi at hedai wo e nako mat wabsh hejel wo s-mai mo he'es i ge'ej. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat am wo tashogithath em-wui mamt wo s-ap s-mahchk. T hab wo i em-shuhthath g Jiosh gewkthag.
Jiosh at wo e nako mat ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab wo t-juni mach hems he'es ab i chum tahni o hems he'es i chegitod. Heg o hekaj hab t-junith e-gewkthag mo am chikpan t-eda.
Kutt chum hekith ab wo hehgchulithath ahchim mach d hemako g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm.
Thani lihso heg hekaj mani ahgachug g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuni ab si s-em-ho'ige'itham am em-ahgith mamt hab wo masmak mo has masma g Jiosh em-tatchuith ch ab i em-gawulkai.
Pi g am wo chum si e ha'ichuchuthath ch wabshaba wo s-hehemajimak ch chum hekith ab wo s-e bahbgik ch ab a'ai wo e tatchuath. Am g wo e chehgithath mam ab a'ai e tatchua.
Ab at i t-hemakoch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Pegih, mt wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui mamt pi gm hu a'ai wo i e ga'agwulkai.

Heg o wa wepo mach d honshpadaj g Christ nach pi d hemako ab wecho. Thach hemako no pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag d wa'i hemako ch am wehsijj t-eda. Kuch d hemako nach pi am t-wepo t-gewpkathch heg wui mo g Jiosh am t-wehhejed ap'echuthch thahm kahchim ch ed.
Wehsijj ach d hemako nach pi ab wecho g hemako kownal ch t-wepo ha'ichu ab s-wohochuth ch t-wepo t-pahl wapko.
Thach hemako no pi g Jiosh d wa'i hemako ch wehsijj d t-ohg ch wehs t-thahm d kownal ch an wehsko hab chu'ig ch am ep wehsijj t-eda ha'ichug.
Christ at wehsijj ab i t-mahkhi hegai matt hekaj ab a'ai wo i t-wehmajk.
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana: T wo ha gewito g e-obga k am wo hih thahm kahchim wui k ab amjed wo i ha mahkhi g e-hemajkamga g nahnko mahs mahchig ch gewkthag.
Pegih, bo chu'ig mat g si Kehshaj gn hu uhpam ep wo hih thahm kahchim wui. K heg hekaj tasho mat ia wo jiwia jewed thahm.
Hegai mat ia jiwia jewed thahm o d hegai mat am uhpam hih e-kihthag wui an thahm kahchim ch ed k ab uhpam bei g e-gewkthag k am hahawa wehsko ha'ichug e-nahtoi ed.

Ab at t-mah ahchim e-hemajkamga g nahnko ha'ichu mahchig ch gewkthag. Kuch heg hekaj hab wua g nahnko mahs chikpan wehhejed. Am at ha'i i t-chuhcha matt an wo i oiopo k wo ah g ha'ichu ahgaj k am ha'i i t-chuhcha matt d wo Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththamk ch ha'i matt ab wo i ha wanim Jiosh wui ch ha'i matt wo ha nuhkuthath g t-wehm wohochuththam ch wo ha mashchamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh ihtha nahnko mahs chikpan matt hekaj am wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh hemajkamga matt wehsijj wo t-nahtokchith matt am hab wo junihith g Christ chikpan ch ab a'ai wo i t-gewkemhunath.
Kutt heg hekaj ab wo i t-hemakoj k ab wo i ge'ege'ehogat t-wohochuthadag ed k wehs wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh alithag ch wehs wo wepo masmak.
Pi att hab haha wo masmak mo g a'al machs in has a'ai gawul wo junihith g t-wohochuthadag. T hab pi wo e nako hegam mo am nahnko masma e nakog mat wo t-iattogi.
Am att wo ahgath g wohokam ab pihk t-elithch ha wui ch am wo i ge'ege'ehogat matt hab wo masmak mo g Christ. Heg o wa wepo mo g Christ d t-mo'o.

Ch ahchim d honshpadaj mach ab wui t-thagitokch ch s-ap t-wehm chikpan hab masma mach nahnko mahs d chuhchu'ithaj. Batt wa'i masma am wo i ge'ege'ehogat t-wohochuthadag ed matt ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath ch am wo i t-wehmajk.
Pi g am hu ha oithk hab wo masmak hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Ith o d t-kownalig Jesus chehanig. Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o wabsh pehegi ha'ichu chegito
ch pi ha'ichu a'amichuth ch ep pi chechkaithag. Ith o heg wa wepo mo am s-chuhugam k ed hihim. K g Jiosh heg hekaj pi ab hu ha mahkch g wechij thoakag.
Pi o edgith g si edathag no pi am wabsh e thagitokch pi ap'ekam wui ch hab junihim g nahnko mahs si s-uam ha'ichu.
Mtsh wabshaba ahpim ab kah g tho'ibiathag ahga k am i s-mai g Christ. Am amsh em-mashcham g wohokam ab amjed. Mt amjed pi hab wo chum masmak mo hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh.
Im g hu hab wo i juhni g pi ap e-tatchui. Heg o wa em-iattogith ch em-padchuth.
T wabshaba g Jiosh am hab wo em-juh mat g em-tatchui ch em-thoakag d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk.

Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag. K ihtha thoakag wepo masma mo g Jiosh thoakag ch am e chehgithch mo heg wa'i tatchua s-ap'ekam. Am g wo himath g e-wechij thoakag ch am wabsh wo thagito g pi ap'ekam.
Thach t-wehm wohochuththam ch heg wa wepo mach d Christ honshpadag. K pi hab chum mahs machs a'ai wo t-iattogithath o hedai i ehp. Am g hab wo kaijjith g wohokam.
Hemho wa amt wo babgat ab pi ap'ekam wui k wabshaba pi heg hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. S-hohtam g wo thagito g e-bagatalig.
T hab pi wo e nako g Jiawul mas am hab wo em-juh mamt hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
T wo ha'asa ha'ichu ha ehs hegam matp hedai ha'ichu ha ehsith. Ab o hab wa'ap ha ab mat wo chikpanath ch heg amjed ab wo edgithath mat haschukaj am wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam.
Pi g am wo pi kehg neneokath ch wabshaba wo s-ap neneokath ch ab a'ai wo i e gewkemhunath. T g em-ne'oki hab masma d wo i ha wehmtadagk hegam mat hedai wo i em-kahkath.
Pi g am wo pi ap tahtchuth g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Tho hegai mo am t-eda ulinig. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat g Jiosh s-ap am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed.
Im g hu hab wo i juhni g keh'ithadag ch pi amkadag ch bagatalig ch kawhaina ch has ahgadag.
Jiosh at im hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig matt ab i s-wohoch g Christ. Kumt ahpim hab wa masma ab a'ai wo s-e ho'ige'ithath ch im hu hab wabsh wo i juh matp hema i chum s-ko'okam has wo em-juh.
Ab o si t-tatchua g Jiosh. Kutt am oithch hab wo t-junihith nach pi d a'aligaj.
Christ o am hab junihim g e-ohg Jiosh tatchui ch ab si t-tatchua ch am t-wehhejed e muhkith. Kutt ahchim hab wa'ap ab aigo wo si tatchuath ch ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath.
Thach Jiosh hemajkamga. K pi hab chum mahs machs wo ha wehm wo'iwua matp hedai pi d t-wehm kihkam o achs wo chegito g s-uam ha'ichu o achs wo s-behim matp haschu pi ab hu d t-wuikam.

S-mahch am mat pi am hu wo i ha wahpki g Jiosh hegam mo hab wa masma. Hegai mat wo s-behim mo haschu pi ab hu d wuikamaj o heg jioshchuth. (4) K pi hab chum mahs machs s-bihtagim wo neneokath o achs pehegi wo neneokath. Ab g wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh.
Ha'i oki hab kaij mo am wa s-ap'e hegam mo hab masma hab e junihim. Kumt wabshaba pi ab hu wo kaiha g pehegi ha-ne'oki. Jiosh at hemho wa s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mat pi ab hu wo s-wohog el.
An g hu wabsh wo ha neithath hegam hab mahs hemajkam ch pi am hu ha oithch hab wo e junihith.

Ahpim amsh hab wa'ap masma heki hu. Heg o wa wepo mam wa am s-chuhugam k ed hihimath ch am hahawa i wuwha tonlig ch ed namt pi hahawa s-mai g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Pegih, mt am wo hihimath g e-thoakag ith eda s-ap'ekam tonlig
ch hab masma hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch wo ahgath g wohokam.
T g t-kownalig Jesus wo s-hohho'ithath hegai mam haschu hab wua.

Pi amt am hu wo ha wehmajk hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamt chum hems heg ab wo neneokath mo haschu s-a'agi hab wua ihtham. Kumt wabshaba wo ha ahgi mo pi ap hab e junihim.

T haha wo s-e mahchk mo has chu'ig. Bo d ahga ihtha che'ithag mo hab chu'ig: Bam wa'i masma mo g kohkshtham o g ko'i ahpim mam hedai pi mahch g Jiosh. Ab g wo i wuwhaki no pi g Christ ab em-makiog g tonlig ch wechij thoakag.
Am g wo si s-e nen'oithk mamt has masma wo himchuthath g e-thoakthag ch pi hab wo masmak mam d wabsh pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam.
Ge'ej o g pi ap'ekam hemu. K wabshaba g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g ap'ethag matt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Am g s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag.
Jiosh o am em-wui tashogith g e-tatchui. Am g wo si i a'amichuth k wo s-mai mo haschu wud.

Pi g wo nawkkath namt pi heg hekaj wo padch g e-thoakag mamt pi wo e tho'ibia. Am g wehs wo i e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui. T heg an wo em-u'ukchith ch ab wo em-mahkchith g si ge'e s-ap tahhathkam.
Kumt hab ab a'ai wo i e gewkemhunath ch ab wo ihmath g Jiosh g heki hu mihshmetha nen'eikaj ch wechij mihshmetha nen'ei
ch chum hekith ab wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh t-ohg wehs ha'ichukaj am chehchegch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Ab g a'ai wo i e thagito e wui mamtp woho ab si has elith g Christ.
Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wo i e thagito e-kuhkun ha wui. Ith o ab d em-wuikam nam pi d Christ wohochuththam.
Kun o gewkthag am thahm g e-hohnig hab masma mo g Christ gewkthag am t-thahm ahchim mach ab ihm ch ab si hiwig. Ahchim ach heg wa wepo mach d honshpadaj. K heg d t-tho'ibiakam.
Ab att wehs wo i chum t-thagitokch wui. Kumt ahpim u'uwi hab wa masma wehs ab wo i chum e thagitokch e-kuhkun ha wui.
Ahpim chechoj amt hab masma ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-hohonig mo g Christ ab si t-tatchua. Heg o ha'as ge'e ab si t-tatchua mat am t-wehhejed e thagito mamt wo mua.
Bat wa e juh mat hekaj wo t-wapkon k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth ch ab hiwig. Kut hab wa masma ab i t-gawulkai
e wehhejed matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekam enigajk.

Kumt ahpim chechoj ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-hohonig hab masma mam ab si hejel e tatchua no pi heg wa wepo mam d hemako e wehm. Hejel e hekaj o si pihk e elith matp hedai g e-hohnigkaj si pihk e elith no pi d wa'i hemako.

Pi o hekith hedai hejel s-e keh'ith ch wabshaba am i e nakog mat wo e gegosithath ch wo e nuhkuthath. Kuch ahchim wohochuththam heg wa wepo mach d honshpadaj g Christ nach pi wehmaj d hemako. K heg s-ap t-nuhkuth.
Kumt ahpim chechoj hab wa masma hab wo ha juhkchith g e-hohonig no pi hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana: Cheoj at am wo thagito g e-ohg ch e-je'e k wo ha hohnt k d haha wo hemakok g e-hohnig wehm.
Neh, bo chu'ig ihtha si s-has ha'ichu wohokam ab amjed g hohnta. Kuni ith amjed am i chum em-tashogith mach d hemako g Christ wehm.
K wabshaba hab wa'ap tasho mat g cheoj hemho wa ab wo si tatchuath g e-wehm kihkam hab masma mo ab si hejel e tatchua. T g uwi ab wo si has elithath g e-kun.
Ab o em-ab ahpim a'al mamt ab wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-jehj no pi ith d Christ tatchui ch d s-ap'ekam em-wehhejed.
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh heki hu o'ohana: Ab g wo si has ha elithath g e-ohg ch e-je'e. T wehs wo s-ap'ek em-wehhejed. Kumt ge'eho d wo thothakamk am jewed thahm.
Ith o d wehpeg chehanigaj g Jiosh mo ab wehnags g ha'ichu ahgaj mat ha'ichu hab wo juni hegai mat ab wo s-wohog elithath.

Ahpim jehj amt pi wabsh wo si s-gewkam ha shohbithath g e-a'aliga mamt wabsh wo ha babgach. Tho Jiosh tatchui mamt am wo i ha mashcha ab amjed g Christ hab masma mam ha gegosith k ab wo i ha shohbi pi ap'ekam amjed.
Ahpim nenehol amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-a'amo ch ab wo si has ha elithath ch ab si e-tatchui amjed hab wo junihith g e-chikpan hab masma mamtp hems g Christ hab masma wo chikpanthath

ch d wo piongajk. Pi amt hab wabsh wo junihith mas heg hekaj wo em-neithath g em-ahmo ch wo s-em-hohho'ithath ch wabshaba hab wo junihith wehs g e-ihbthagkaj, chum as hems pi am hu wo em-neithath. Ith o em-tatchuithch g Jiosh.
Kumt s-ap e tahtk k am hab wo junihith g e-chikpan nam pi g Jiosh ep chikpanith ch pi heg wa'i o'othham.
Mt wo s-chegitok mat g Jiosh ab uhpam wo i nodagi g em-namkithadag mamt haschu i s-kehg chikpan hab wo juh, chum ams hems d wo neholk o pi d wo neholk.
Ahpim mam d a'amo amt wo s-ap i ha nuhkuthath g e-pionag ch pi wo ha ebkiothath. Am g wo s-chegitok mam e wehm ahmo an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kut ihtha ahmo wehs t-wepo masma wo t-lothai.
Hemako ha'ichu ant hab ep wo chei. Ab g wo i e gewpkathch Jesus t ab no pi heg ab em-mahkch g ge'e gewkthag.
Ab g wo i hekaj hegai mo haschu g Jiosh ab em-mahkch k hab wo e nako mamt ab wui wo gegokiwua g ge Jiawul s-a'agi cheggiadag.
Pi ach g hemajkam ha cheggia ch wabshaba hegam ha cheggia mo d si pi ap'ekam gewpkthag in t-thahm ch ha-kokownalig ch ha-haha'ichuga ch g jijawul.
Mt heg hekaj ab wo si i hekaj g Jiosh gewkthag mamt wo e nahtokch hemu ch wo e nako mamt ab wui wo gegokiwua g pi ap'ekam mat hekith ab wo i em-cheggia. Kut pi wo sha'i i em-shul.

Neh, mt wo si e nahtokchith wehhejed ihtha cheggiadag. An g wo u'ukchith g wohokam. T ith heg wo wa wepok mo g cheggiakud giwud. Am g hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam. T ith heg wo wa wepok mamt ab hab juh g wainomi lihwa.
Mt wo e nahtokchith mamt wo i ahgahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mo g Jiosh s-ha tho'ibiamk. T ith heg wo wa wepok mamt ab cheka g e-shuhshk.

Jiawul o chum s-em-padchuthamk hab sha masma mat wo ha mehi g hahpod k hekaj wo em-mummu. Mt wabshaba s-wihnam wo u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag hab wa masma mamt g kawad am e tahgio wo ulinichith. T hab pi has wo em-juh.

Ab g wo s-wohochuth mat em-tho'ibia g Jiosh k pi hekith wo em-thagito. T ihtha em-tho'ibiathag hab wo wa masmak mo g wainomi wonami. An g wo u'ukchith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab sha masma mamtp hems g is-pahyo. Ith o ab em-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamt hekaj wo gewito g Jiawul.

Kumt chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab wo tahnith g Jiosh g i wehmtadag. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i t-wehmaj t-ho'ige'ithahuna ed. Kumt wo s-nenenashank ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ha wehhejed g Jiosh hemajkamga.

Ahni amt am hab wa'ap wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ni-wehhejed mat g Jiosh ab wo ni-mah g ne'oki mat hekith wo i e ai mant am wo ha jehnigi. Nt hekaj s-ni-mamachim ch s-gewkam am wo ah ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh mat ia'i ithani hahawa t-tashogi.
Ith ani hekaj d lihso mani ith ahgachug. Kumt am wo si e ho'ige'ithahunath mant s-gewkam wo ahgath mant has wo i chum masmak.
Ab ani chehani g t-wehnag Tychicus mat am wo i em-chehgimed k am wo em-ahgi mani has wa'i masma ch has ni-wua. Tho si s-ap piongaj g Christ ch si s-ap am wo i em-gewkemhu em-ahigthch mach has t-wua.
Am ani ni-ho'ige'ithahun mat g Jiosh t-ohg ch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ab ba'ich wo i em-mah g s-ap tahhathkam ch pihk elithadag nam pi d wohochuththam.
Jiosh at ba'ich ep wo i s-em-ho'ige'el wehs ahpim mam woho ab si tatchua g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.

T-wepnag mam am kih Philippi t am: Am ant wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni Paul g Timothy wehm. S-mahch am mach d piongaj g Jesus Christ namt pi ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed k d Jiosh hemajkamga. Am ach s-ha ahgithamk g em-wanimedtham ch hegam mo am i ha wehmt mat ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'el.
Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Ab ani ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch si s-ap ni-tattam ch ni-ho'ige'ithahun mani hekith i em-chechegitod.
Am am chikpanith g Jiosh ch ha'ichukaj am i ni-wehmaj gd hu i amjed mani wa am em-ahgith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
Kuni heg hekaj s-mahch mat am wo himchuthahith g Jiosh ihtha tho'ibiathag em-wehhejed. Am at i shonwuich em-thoakag ed k wo nahto mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia g Jesus Christ jewed thahm.
Bani wa masma hab em-elith nani pi chum hekith am i em-chegitod. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap chum hekith s-ni-chegito ch ha'ichukaj i ni-wehmt, chum hems hemu mani ia hu d lihso.
Ab o ni-mahkch g Jesus Christ g si ge'e pihk elithadag em-hekaj. K g Jiosh s-mahch mo ith d wohokam mani em-ahgith.
Kuni ab tahni mat hab wo em-juh mat ba'ich wo i ge'etha g pihk em-elithadag ch ha'ichu em-mahchig ch ha'ichu em-amichuthadag.
Mt heg amjed wo s-mahchk hegai mo s-ap'e mamt hab wo junihith ch pi am hu wo edak g pi ap'ekam ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk mat hekith ep wo jiwia g Jesus Christ.
Heg o hab em-wua mamt am wo e chehgithch mam am hab wua g s-ap'ekam ha'ichu ch heg hekaj ab ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ch ab hehgchulith.
S-em-ahgithamk ani mo ba'ich i e gantan ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh heg hekaj mani ia kuhpi.
Wehsijj o s-mahch ia ge'e kownal kih am ch an wehgaj mani d lihso heg wa'i hekaj mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ.
K g t-wehm wohochuththam pi ha'ichu sha'i ehbith ch ba'ich i s-gewkam ia ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga neithch mani wabsh s-ap ab nakog g ni-sho'igthag.

Ha'i o am hi chikpan ab si hejel e-tatchui amjed mat ba'ich wo i chum wahmuth g ha'ichu pi ni-ap'ethag hemuch mani wa hu d lihso no pi s-ni-hehgamk ch wabsh ni-pip'ichuth. K wabshaba ha'i ni-hekaj si pihk e elith ch ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga no pi s-mahch mat g Jiosh am i ni-kei mant wo wohokamch g ha'ichu ahgaj.
K pi has chu'ig. Ni wabsh s-ap ni-tahtk mo e ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, chum as ha'i pi ap ha'ichu e-tatchui ab am wo ahgahi.
E am ho'ige'ithahun am ni-wehhejed. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag i ni-wehmaj. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk ch s-mahch mamt wo i ni-wuhshath.

Tatchua ani mant chum hekith wehs hab wo juh mo haschu i ni-tatchuith g Christ pi ha'ichu ehbithch, wahm hemuch. Bant masma ab wo si has elithath wehs ni-ihbthagkaj, chum anis hems wo ni-muhkith heg hekaj.
Neh, pi o has d ahga g ni-thoakag ni-wehhejed. Chum ani hi wa s-wehmjimk g Christ. K heg hekaj chum s-ap'e mant hu wo i muh.
Ntp wabshaba d wo thoakamk ch ba'ich wo i chikpanthath g Christ. Ni-wehhejed o hi wa ba'ich i s-ap'e mant wo muhk k wo wehmajk g Christ.
K wabshaba em-wehhejed hi ba'ich i s-ap'e mant d wo thoakamk.
Ni heg hekaj s-mahch mant d wo thoakamk ch hab am wo i em-wehmajk. Mt wo i ge'ehogat am e-wohochuthadag ed ch hab wo si s-ap e tahtkkath.
Am ant wo em-wehmajk. Kumt ba'ich ab wo i si has elithath g Christ ni-hekaj.

Bamt masma wo himath g e-thoakag mamt wo ha'ichuch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ. Nt haha wo kah mam am e hemakochuthch ch s-ap ahgachug mat g hemajkam ab wo s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh, chum anis hems pi am hu ep wo em-nei.
Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam mo ab em-wui gegok. T heg amjed wo s-mahchk mat ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Mt ahpim ab wo bei g e-tho'ibiathag ab amjed g Jiosh.
Tho Jiosh hab elitha mamt pi ab wabsh wo s-wohochuthath g Christ ch wabshaba am wehhejed ep wo e sho'igchuthath.
Ab amt wui wo gegokkath g pi ap'ekam hab masma mam am wa neith mani hab ni-wua ch hemu kah mani hab wabsh kia ni-wua.

Bani em-elith mam s-ap ab e thagitokch Jesus Christ wui. K heg ab si i em-gewkemhun. Kum si s-ap e tahtk no pi si em-tatchua. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am em-wehmaj. Kum a'ai e hekaj si pihk e elith.
Nt heg hekaj ab wo si i em-gewkemhu mamt wo i hemakoj g e-chegitoithag k ab ba'ich wo i e tatchuath ch ba'ich wo i s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui. Nt heg amjed wo si s-ap ni-taht.
Pi amt wo s-chu tha'ath ch pi wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath. Ab amt wabsh wo i e sho'igchuthch ab a'ai e wui ch pi wa'i si hejel am wo e chegitoth.
Am g wo wa'i chegitoth g ha-ap'ethag ha'i ehp, pi heg wa'i hejel e-ap'ethag.
Bamt masma ha'ichu wo chum chegitok mash wa g Jesus Christ ch pi hejel wo chum si e ha'ichuch.
Jesus Christ o d Jiosh ch wabshaba pi hab e elith mat hejel wo e wepogi g e-ohg Jiosh.
Ga at hu hab wabsh sha'i juh g e-ap'ethag k wabsh e pionchuth k ia mahsi k wepo mahs mo g o'othham.
Ab o s-wohog elith g e-ohg Jiosh ch ia e sho'igchuthahim ch ab muh kots t ab heg wa wepo masma mo d wabsh pi ap hemajkam.
T g Jiosh ab i wamgith k am ba'ich i si uhgkaj thahm kahchim ch ed k ab mah g gewkthag wehs ha'ichu thahm.
T heg hekaj wehsijj ab wo si has i elith k ab wui wo i shul hegam mo an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hegam mo an jewed thahm ch hegam mo am jewed wecho
k am wo ah mo ihtha Jesus Christ wehs d ha-kownalig. Neh, batt masma ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh.

Ni-naipijju, chum am hekith s-wohog elith hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mani wa am em-ahgith mani eda em-wehmaj. K ba'ich d i si ha'ichu mamt ab wo s-wohog elithath hemu mani wa chum pi am hu em-wehmaj. Am g wabsh wo chikpanath ch wo ge'ege'elhith am e-tho'ibiathag ed ch ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh.
Chum o hekith em-makiog g Jiosh g tatchuithag ch gewkthag mamt am hab wo junihith g hab elithaj.
Kumt heg am hab wo junihith pi has ahgch mamt hekith heg hekaj wo e sho'igch.

T hab pi wo em-chu'ichigch g Jiosh. Tham Jiosh a'aliga ch d wo chum si hekia s-ap'ekamk am ha shahgith hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh. Ihtham o s-chu i'attomk ch totontodag. Kumt hab wo sha masmak am ha wehhejed mo g huhu'u am ha wehhejed g s-chuhugam k ed oiopotham

am ha ahgithch mo g Jiosh ab ha makiog g wechij thoakag. T g Jesus Christ ab wo si em-ha'ichuch mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm. Nt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigk mat g ni-chikpan pi wabsh wo e nahnkogi.

Ab amt i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga k am i e thagito Jiosh wui hab sha masma mo wa ab wui ha'ichu e iagchulith. Kunt hemho wa wo si s-ap ni-taht mamt am wui i e thagito, chum anis hems wo ni-muhkith nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ith at heg wo wa wepok mat g ni-eh'ed wo e iawua em-wehhejed hab sha masma mo wa g nawait e iawua ab ab g iagchulitha.
Pegih, ahpim g ep wo si s-ap e tahtk ni-wehm matp g Jiosh hab wa masma wo ha'ichuch g ni-chikpan.
Hemu ant wo cheha g Timothy mat am wo i em-chehgim matp d wo t-kownalig Jesus tatchuik. T heg ia wo u'apa g ha'ichu ahga ab em-amjed mat am wo i ni-gewkemhu.
Timothy o d wa'i hegai mo hab wa masma hab e tahtk ab em-amjed mani ahni ch si s-ap wo em-nuhkuth.
Ha'i o hi g hejel e-tatchui am hab elith ch wabsh pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth g hab elithaj g Jesus Christ.
Kum eda am wa s-mahch mo hab masma ni-wehm chikpan g Timothy mo g ha-alithag.
Hemu ant wo s-mai matp haschu has wo i mahsk am ni-wehhejed. T am haha wo hih g Timothy em-wui.
Bani elith mo d tatchuij g t-kownalig Jesus mant ahni am hab wa'ap wo i him k wo em-nei.
Ia ant wo cheha g em-kehsha Epaphroditus mat am uhpam ep wo hih em-wui. Ia o i ni-wehmaj hab masma mamsh am ahgith ch mu'i ha'ichu ni-wehm nakog.
Msh wabshaba kah mat wa mumku. K si s-em-neithamk ch e kudut mamsh ith kah.
Woho o wa mat si mumku k chum alo muh. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab si i s-ho'ige'ith k thoaj. K hab wa'ap d ni-ho'ige'ithadag mat pi muh nant pi wo si pi ap ni-taht mat hems wo sha muh.
Ni heg hekaj chehani mat am uhpam wo hih. Mt hab wo si s-hehgigk am neithok. Nt ahni hab wa'ap wo si s-hehgigk ch pi wo ni-kudu em-hekaj.
Kumt ab wo si has el nat pi pi huwi g e-thoakag mat hab wo juh g Christ tatchui k wo i ni-wehmt em-wehhejed.
Mt wabsh wo si s-hehgigk mo d em-kownalig g Jesus Christ. Pi ani has sha'i ni-tahtk mant am ep em-o'ohani hegai mant wa heki hu em-o'ohani. Kut ith d wo i em-wehmtadagk.
Ha'i o hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ch eda chum ahgahim mamt hab wo junihith g chehanig ch hab wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio. Mt wo si s-e nen'oithk ab ha amjed. Bo masma pi ha'ichu amichuth mo g gogogs.

Pi am tatchua mamt wo e pahl hikuch hab masma mo heki hu chehanis matt ahchim Tutuligo hab wo t-juh. Jiosh at heki hu i em-ap'ech e wehhejed namt pi ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab i hiw g Jesus Christ. K ith heg wa wepo mam pahl hikuchkas. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab t-mahkch g gewkthag ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kuch hekaj ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ab si has elith g Jesus Christ ch pi ab hu sha'i hejel t-hiwig machs am oithk hab wo t-juh g chehanig k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia.
Ahni ant ba'ich wo i ni-nako mo hegam mant ab wo hiwgath g chehanig

nani pi d Tuhligo ch ni-pahl hikuch mani eda d gigi'ik tash hab masma mo an o'ohanas chehanig ch ed. Benjaminbad o d ni-shohshon ch d hema hegam gamai gohk t-shohshon ahchim Tutuligo. Thani wa Palasi mo hegam hab e elith mo pi ha chu'ichig ab amjed g t-chehanig.
Ha anid sho'igchuth hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus Christ nani pi hab ha elith mo ab wui gegok g t-chehanig. Neh, banid wa masma hab ni-wua ch hekaj hab ni-elith mani pi ha chu'ichig.
T wabshaba am hahawa i e tashogi g Jesus Christ ni-wui. Kuni hemuch hahawa pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth wehs ihtha nani pi g Jesus Christ ab si ha'ichuchuth.
Wehs ha'ichu o d wabsh pi ha'ichu hahawa no pi ba'ich i s-ap'e mant wo s-mahchk g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Wehs ant ha'ichu s-ohhoth mant wo s-mai g Jesus Christ

k am wo i ni-hemakoj heg wehm. Heki anid hu g chehanig oithch hab ni-elith mani s-ap'e am Jiosh tahgio. T wabshaba am hahawa i ni-tashogi g wohokam g Jesus Christ. Kunt ab i s-wohoch. T hekaj am i ni-ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio.
Ni hahawa tatchua mant wo si s-mahchk g Jesus Christ ch ab wo taht hegai gewkthaj mat hekaj i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed, chum anis hems hab wa'ap wo ni-sho'igch.
Neh, bant wa masma hab wa'ap wo i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed mat d wo si oithchkam tashk.
Pi ani hab kaij manis heki hu wehs ab i neith ihtha ch wehs ap'echuthas ch wabshaba am ni-nakog mant heg ab wo bei mo haschu ab ni-makiog g Jesus Christ ch hekaj an ni-bei.
Heg ant hekaj pi wo chegito mat haschu heki hu has i e juh am ni-tahgio k am wui wo ni-gewkai hegai mo haschu am ni-ba'ich.

Neh, mo g s-melithkam am e gewkathch mat wo ha gehg k wo bei g s-ap e-namkithadag. Kuni ahni am hab wa'ap ni-gewkathch mant wo bei g s-ap ni-namkithadag. K d ihtha mant an haha wo wehmajk g Christ an Jiosh kihthag ed.
Wehsijj att hab wo wa chum t-junihith ahchim mach s-gegokim hihim g t-wohochuthadag. Ha'ijj amtp hems pi hab masma hab e junihim. T wabshaba g Jiosh wo mahsko em-wuij mam haschu i pi ap hab wua.
Am amt wo oithath g wohokam mam ab he'es i heki hu s-mahch ch am hab junihim.
Am ani si s-gewkam oith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am em-chehgith mamt has wo masmak. Mt wo si ha nenashanath hegam mo am hab e wua mani has i masma em-chehgith ch am ha oithk hab wo e junihith.

Ab at e muhkith g Jesus Christ kots t ab mat wo t-tho'ibia. K eda mu'ijj ab wui gegok ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga. Ith o si pi ap ni-tahtchuth. Kuni wa mu'ikko am em-ahgith ihtha heki hu ch hemu am ep em-ahgith.

Ihtham o heg wa'i ab si has elith hejel e-tatchui ch heg wa'i s-hohho'ith jewed t ab ha'ichu. T g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha shul Jiawul kih ed no pi e hahaschuth heg hekaj mat hekaj wo chum si e eh'elithath.
Kuch wabshaba ahchim am chegito g thahm kahchim ch ed t-kihthag. Ab at amjed wo jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ. Kuch ab nenida.

Heg at gawul wo juh g mukialig t-hon heg hekaj si ge'e e-gewkthag mat hekaj wehs ha'ichu wo thahmkath. T g t-hon si s-kehg hab wo masmak hab masma mo g honaj si s-kehg hab mahs ab i wuhshanik muhkig amjed.

Pegih, ab amt i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. M d hahawa si ni-tatchuithch ni-wepnag. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk ch chum si s-em-neithamk. S-gegokim g wo gegokkath am eda g e-wohochuthadag.
Ab ani s-em-ahgithamk ahpim Euodia ch Syntyche mamt pi wo e ne'owinath ch am wabsh wo i e wehmajk nam pi d e wehm wohochuththam.

Ihtham u'uwi o am si i ni-wehmajkahim mach wa am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ni heg hekaj am ep s-m-ahgithamk ahpi map hab e chechcheg I-ha-Wehmttham mapt woho am wo i ha wehmajk map hab masma i ni-wehmajkahim. Clement ch ha'i ehp o hab wa'ap i ni-wehmajkahim. Pi o wehs s-e mahch g ha-chechgig ch wabshaba an o'ohadag heg eda mo an e o'ohan g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig ch an kahch Jiosh kihthag ed.
Si g wo s-hehgig ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mani hab masma chum hekith hab chech'e.
E o aihim mat ep wo jiwia. Kumt heg hekaj wabsh wo i s-hehemajimak ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam.
Pi g wo sha'i e kudut heg hekaj mam haschu i chum tatchua k ab wabsh wo i tai g Jiosh k ab wo i ho'ige'el matp haschu hab wo i t-juni.

T g Jiosh ab wo em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam. K ihtha s-ap tahhathkam pi ta amichuthama ch wabshaba wo chehmo g t-thothakag. Kutt hab pi ha'ichukaj wo t-kudutath ahchim matt ab i t-hemakoch g Jesus Christ wehm.
Am g wo chegitok wehs ihtha mo haschu d s-ap'ekam k ab wo hehgchulithath g Jiosh heg amjed mo haschu d wohokam ch haschu d si o'othhamthag ch haschu d s-ap'ekam ch haschu s-kehgaj.
Am g wo i e mashcham k hab wo junihith hegai mam haschu i kahk ch ab bei ni-amjed. Kut wo e chehgi mo am em-wehmaj hegai mat t-tho'ibia k ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam.

Si ge'e s-hehgig ant bei ab amjed g Jiosh mamt ab ep i e chehgi mam ab si pihk e elith ni-wui. Tash o pi am hu em-ap'e mams ab ha'ichu wo ni-mah k wo i ni-wehmt. Ni wabshaba s-mahch mam si pihk e elith ni-hekaj.
Ni pi hab ahgch hab kaij manis ha'ichu si tatchua nant pi s-mai mant ab wabsh wo si s-ap ni-tahtkk mani haschu i edgith,
chum anis hebaichujj wo bihugim k pi ha'ichu wo edgithath o hebaichujj ge'e ha'ichu wo edgithath.
Jesus Christ o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag. Nt heg hekaj wo ni-nako mant s-ap am hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui.
K wabshaba si s-ap'e mamt am i ni-wehmt pi ni-ap'ethag ed.
S-mahch am ahpim Philippi t am wohochuththam mam d wa'i ahpim ch am i ni-wehmaj am i thahm mant am em-thagito am u'apak g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh amai Macedonia jewed ch ed.
Ni hebaichujj ha'ichu tatchua ab Thessalonica kihhim t ab. Kum ab ni-mamka.
Pi o hab mahs manis heg ab wa'i tatchua em-mahkig. Ba'ich ani i tatchua mamt ab wo bei g ho'ige'ithalig ab amjed g Jiosh.
Ia at u'apa g em-mahkig g Epaphroditus. Kuni hahawa pi ha'ichu sha'i tatchua. Em-mahkig o hab sha masma mo hegai s-ap uhw ha'ichu mo wa ab e iagchulith Jiosh wui. K g Jiosh ab si s-hohho'ith
ch hab wa'ap wo em-mahkath mam haschu i tatchua. Ab o e chehgithch ab amjed g Jesus Christ mo g Jiosh ge'e ha'ichu an to'akch am t-wehhejed.
Chum att hekith wo hehgchulithath g Jiosh t-ohg! Chum hekith!
Ab amt wo ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el. Ni-wehm chikpantham iia o hab wa'ap kaij mamt ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el.
K wehsijj g t-wehm wohochuththam hab wa'ap kaij, wahm hegam mo ia ha'ichug ge'e kownal kih ed.
Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.

T-wepnag mam am kih Colossai t am: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ahni Paul mat g Jiosh am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. K ia i ni-wehmt g t-wehnag Timothy. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh t-ohg ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Chum ach hekith ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahunch.
Ab amtsh i s-wohoch g wohokam ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ab hahawa si ha tatchua g e-wehm wohochuththam. Ith ach hekaj ab i ho'ige'ith g ohgaj Jiosh.
Bam masma nam pi ab wui i e gewpkathch hegai s-kehg kihthag mo g Jiosh am nahtokch t-wehhejed an thahm kahchim ch ed.
Am at em-wui jiwia ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga no pi an wehsko chehmohim g jewed ch am ha ap'echuthahim hegam mo ab kaiham hab masma mo hab em-wua. Woho amsh s-mahch g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag
nash pi am em-ahgith ihtha t-wehm chikpantham Epaphras. Ith ach ab si tatchua ch hab elith mo si s-ap hab wua g e-chikpan am em-shahgith.
Ia at hahawa jiwia k am t-ahgith mamsh ab a'ai si e tatchua g gewkthajkaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.

Kuch heg hekaj chum hekith t-ho'ige'ithahun em-wehhejed. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab em-mahkch g amichuthadag. Kuch ab tahni g Jiosh mat hab wo em-juh mamt s-ap wo hekaj hegai amichuthadag k wo s-mahchk g tatchuij.
Bamt masma ab wo si ha'ichuchuthath g t-kownalig Jesus ch ab wo hehgchulithath am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam namt pi ba'ich i s-ap wo s-mahchk g Jiosh.
Jiosh o wehs edgith g gewkthag. Kuch ab tahni mat ba'ich ab wo i em-mahkath g gewkthag. Mt hekaj wehs ha'ichu s-e tahtk ch wo nakogath ch wo si s-hehgigk.

Jiosh kownaltalig o d hekia tonlig. K g Jiosh s-kehg ha'ichu an nahtokch t-wehhejed ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kumt ab wo si i ho'ige'el mat am i em-ap'ech mam d hahawa hemajkamgaj ch ab wo bei hegai mo an nahtokch.

Jiawul o an wehs ha u'ukch hegam mo hedai pi mahch g Jiosh. K g kownaltaligaj d hekia s-chuhugam. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-wuwhas ab gewkthaj amjed k am i t-wahpki si e-tatchuithch e-alithag kownaltalig ed.
T heg t-tho'ibia k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.

Jiosh o pi ta neithagma ch wabshaba hemu e chehgithch gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. Kutt hab wa'i masma ab wo nei g Jiosh matt wo nei g alithaj. Heki o hu an wehmaj g e-ohg mat eda koi an hu ha'ichu e nahto ch wehs ha'ichu ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu.

Jiosh at am i kei g e-alithag mat wehs ha'ichu wo nahto. T heg wehs nahto hegai mo haschu an hab i chu'ig thahm kahchim ch ed ch in jewed thahm, hegai mach haschu i neith ch hegai mach pi neith. K wehs d chuhchaij g nahnko mahs kokownal in jewed thahm ch an thahm kahchim ch ed. K d Jiosh tatchui mat wehs ha'ichu d wo enigajk g alithaj.
K wehs ha'ichu in hab chu'ig g alithaj gewkthagkaj.

K heg d t-mo'o am himtham ahchim mach ab ihm. Kuch ab amjed bekch g t-thoakag hab masma mo g honshpadag ab mo'o t amjed bekch g e-thoakag. Jiosh alithag o wehs d t-si'ihegi ch ab i wuhsh muhkig amjed mat d wo si s-has ha'ichuk am wehs ha'ichu thahm.
Chum as hab masma ia jiwia g Jesus mo g o'othham k eda d Jiosh wehmaj g e-ohg ch heg hekaj wepo chu'ig.
Ab amt naggai kots t ab k mua. Kut eda ha hiwigi g Jiosh no pi hab d elithaj mat g alithaj wo hejel e iagchul. T heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu wo e nako mat wo chum i e ap'ech am Jiosh wui.
Mehk am wa ab amjed g Jiosh ch d obgaj nam pi pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch pi ap ha'ichu hab junihim.
T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g e-obgatalig k ab wabsh i chum em-hemakoj e wehm heg hekaj e-alithag muhkig. Kumt heg hekaj d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk ch pi ab hu wo ha chu'ichigk

mamtp am wabsh i s-gewkam wo wohochuthath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj ch pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed. Ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga o wehsijj ab d ha wuikam g hemajkam ch heg hekaj an wehsko chehmohim g jewed.

Bo sha mahs mach d honshpadaj g Christ ahchim mach ab ihm. Heg atsh si e sho'igch t-wehhejed. Kuni wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch am oithch ni-sho'igchuth mat s-ap wo e nahto g honshpadaj hegam ha hekaj mat hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ni-ahga.
Am at i ni-kei g Jiosh mant wo em-ahgithahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Ni heg hekaj d em-pionag ch am em-ahgith.
E o ehstokch gd hu i shohshon k amjed mat woho has wo t-juni g Christ. T wabshaba hemuch am si tashogi g Jiosh t-wui.

K d ihtha mat g Christ ab wo t-mah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kut heg am wo t-edak, chum hems ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam, ch hab wo t-juh matt d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak ch wehmaj ab wo si has t-elithath am kihthaj ed.

Kuch am chum t-nakog matt wehs wo ha ahgi g hemajkam ab amjed g Jesus Christ k wo ha shohbith k ep wo ha mashcha mat has wo masmak ha'as mach he'es i s-amichuth. T hab s-ge'ema wo hihimath e-wohochuthadag ed. Kutt am wo ha chehgi Jiosh wui mo hab masma.
Ab o si ge'e ni-mahkch g Christ g gewkthag. Ni heg hekaj am si ni-gewkathch mant wo nahto ihtha chikpan.
Mamt hu wo i s-mahchk mani has i masma s-gewkam ni-ho'ige'ithahun am em-wehhejed ch am ep ha wehhejed hegam mo am kih Laodicea t am, pej wehs ha wehhejed hegam mo pi ni-mahch no ge ni-neith.

Jiosh o am chum wehs t-tashogith g e-amichuthadag ch e-mahchig gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag. Kuni ab tahni mat am wo si i em-gewkemhunath mamt wo s-ap s-mai hegai mo wa g Jiosh am t-tashogith k ab a'ai wo i e tatchuath hab masma mam d e-hajunim.
Ha'i o chum ha iattogith ch gm hu ha wanchshulig ab amjed g Christ. Kumt wabshaba pi ab hu wo ha kaiha, chum as hems hab wo e wuath mo s-ap'e.
Pi ani am hu ha'ichug em-wehm ch wabshaba chum hekith am em-chegito. Am amsh a'ai i e wehmt ch s-gewkam ab s-wohochuth g Jesus Christ. Kuni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk.
Ab amt i e thagito Jesus Christ wui mat d wo em-kownaligk. K d hahawa em-wuikam mamt ab wo wechok ch am wo himath g e-thoakag ch wehmaj d wo hemakok.
An g beh'i g e-gewkthag ab amjed mamt heg amjed ba'ich i s-gewkam ab wo wohochuthath mam has i masma mashchamas ch chum hekith ab wo i mahkchith g e-ho'ige'ithadag.

S-e g wo nen'oithk mat pi hedai wo em-iattogi. Ha'i ash chum s-em-mashchamamk hegai mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-mahchig ch em-ahgith mamt heg ab s-ap wo himath g e-thoakag. Tt wabshaba ab wo beihith g t-mashchamadag ab amjed g Christ
no pi heg d Jiosh am wehmaj g e-ohg, chum as hi wa hab masma ia jiwia mo g hemajkam.
Kumt am i e hemakoj g Christ wehm k wehmaj d hekiakam. K heg ab em-mahkch g wechij thoakag ch d kownal am wehs ha thahm g kokownal am jewed thahm ch an thahm kahchim ch ed.

Heki ach hu wa t-pahl hikuchk ahchim Tutuligo am t-chehanig oithch. K wabshaba d t-himthag ahchim matt ab ihm g Christ matt wo t-pahl wakon k hab wo t-chehgi matt ab i t-hemakoj heg wehm k ab i t-wul'o pi ap t-tatchui amjed. Gd att hu t-wachumch shuhthagi wecho t-pahl wakonch k am ep i wuhsh shuhthagi t amjed. K ith heg wa wepo matt gd hu t-hiash muhk k amjed ab uhpam i wuhsh muhkig amjed hab masma mat g Christ hab e juh.

Neh, ahpim mam d gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi edgith g t-chehanig am wa si gawulkthas ab Jiosh t amjed heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab em-wui mahtchul g e-alithag. Kumt ab i s-wohochuth k hab bei g wechij thoakag. Jiosh alithag at ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag kots t ab k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
Jiawul o chum s-wulshpamk g Jiosh alithag. T wabshaba ab i e wul'o gewkthaj amjed k gewito t-wehhejed k hab masma wehs ha gewito g jijawul.

Jiosh ash wa hab masma ha chehani g Tutuligo mat am wa has mahs ha'ichu hugi wo ko'ath ch am hab wo junihith g mihshmetha piast. Ihtham chehanig o am chum t-tashogithahim mat has wo masmak g Jiosh si Kehsha mat hekith wo jiwia. T wabshaba ia hahawa jiwia g Jiosh si Kehsha k am hejel i e tashogi t-wui. K hahawa pi hab mahs machs am hab wo junihith hegai hab mahs ha'ichu k ch hekaj wo chum s-mahchk g Jiosh si Kehsha.

Ha'i o hab e elith mo em-ba'ich i s-ap'e natsh pi ha'ichu nei am e-nena ed ch hab chum kaij mamt pi wo e tho'ibia k ho'ip ab i e sho'igchuth k ab wo i has ha elithath g anghil. Pi g wo sha'i ha wohochuth. Ho o wabsh chum si e hahaschuth g hejel e-chegitoithagkaj
ch pi ab hu hiwig g Jiosh si Kehsha. K eda heg d t-mo'o ch s-ap ab i t-thagio'ith ch t-ge'elith. Kuch ahchim ab ab gi'i k ch ab ep a'ai t-ab gi'i hab masma mo g hon ch hab wa'ap masma i ge'elhim.

Ith o heg wa wepo matt heki hu koi nach pi d hemako heg wehm mat t-wehhejed muh. Heg at ab i t-wul'o heg amjed mo d wabsh hemajkam ha-mashchama. Pi g heg hekaj am haha wo i chum e ap'echuth Jiosh tahgio.
Hegam mo em-kudut o ab chum em-chehani mamt pi an hu wo hudawgath ch jejkath ch tattamath ha'ichu i.
K wabshaba am wa s-ap'e mamt wabsh wo hekaj mo haschu i s-ap'e. T wabsh wo huhug e hekajk. Hegai mo d wabsh hemajkam ha-chehanig ch ha-mashchama

o pi woho d ha'ichu amichuthadag. Bo em-ahgith mamt heg oithk wo e mihshmethath ch wo e sho'igchuthath ch hab ab wo e sho'igchuthath Jiosh wui. T wabshaba ith pi wo sha'i thotholimagi g pi ap em-tatchui.

Jiosh at ab t-mah g wechij thoakag ahchim matt ab ihm g alithaj mo d t-tho'ibiakam. K ith heg wa wepo mat ab i t-wuwhas muhkig t amjed hab masma mat ab i wuhshath g e-alithag. Hemuch o an thaha g alithaj s-apkojed hugithaj an ch am t-wehhejed ap'echuth matt wo wehmajk. Kutt heg wui am wo i t-gewpkai.
Pi g am hu wo chegitokath g jewed thahm ha'ichu ch wabshaba g thahm kahchim ha'ichu wo tatchuath.
Jiosh at am i t-wehnathk g e-alithag. T heg heki hu muh k an hab chu'ig thahm kahchim ch ed. K ith heg wa wepo matt heki hu ko'o k an wehmaj.
