Ia at ep wo i wuhsh g Christ jewed thahm. Kutt am wehmaj wo i wuwhag k wepo masma wo si s-kehgajk.

Mt gm hu hab wo i juh g pi kehg e-tatchui ch pi kehg e-chegitoi k pi wo wehmaj wo'iwua matp hedai pi d em-wehm kihkam k pi wo pihk e elithath mamt ge'e ha'ichu wo bei. Hegai mat wo s-behim mo haschu pi ab hu d wuikamaj o heg jioshchuth.
S-ko'ok namkithadag at ab ha ab wo gei hegam mo hab masma ha'ichu hab junihim.
Ahpim o wa an em-u'ukch g pi kehg tatchui. Kum wa g pi ap'ekam hab junihim.
An o wa em-u'ukch g bagatalig ch hehgamthadag ch keh'ithadag. Mt wabshaba hemuch im hu wehs hab wo i juh ihtha pi ap'ekam ab e amjed k pi hekith pad wo neokath
ch pi ha'ichu wo ha iattogithath. Wehs at mukito ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu ab em-ab.
Ab amt i e thagito Jiosh wui. T heg ab em-mah g wechij thoakag k em-tatchuith mamt wo wepo masmak ch ab wo s-ap s-mahchk.

Christ o d si s-has ha'ichu am t-wehhejed ahchim mach ab ihm. Heg thoakag o am ha'ichug t-thothakag ed. Kuch heg hekaj ab i t-hemakochuthch. Pi ach hahawa t-gawulkathch ab em-amjed ahchim mach d Tutuligo. Pi o has d ahga g pahl hikuchka. Pi o t-gawulkathch g ha'ichu t-amichuthadag. Nenehol o d hemako ahchim t-wehm mach pi d nenehol. Wehsijj ach d hemako ab ihmch g Christ.

Jiosh o si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ab i t-gawulkai. Kutt heg hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj g hemajkam ch wo s-hemajimak ch s-t-tahtk ch wo nakogath ha'ichu ch pi hab wo chum t-wuath machs d s-has haha'ichu am ha-nena ed.
Jiosh at ab s-t-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig. Kutt hab wa'ap wo s-ha bahbgi hegam mat hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam ab t-wui k hab wa'ap ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el.
Ab o t-ab matt a'ai t-hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath ch hab s-ap d wo hemakok.
Christ o ab em-makiog g s-ap tahhathkam. Ab g wo i ho'ige'ithath heg hekaj ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui nam pi d hemako heg wehm hab sha masma mam d honshpadaj.

Mt am wo s-chegitok g Christ ha'ichu ahga. Jiosh o ab em-makiog g amichuthadag. Kumt ab a'ai wo i e mashchamath ch wo ahgath g Jiosh o'ohana ed nen'ei ch mihshmetha nen'ei ch wo ne'ichuthath g Jiosh ch ab wo i mahkchith g ge'e ho'ige'ithadag.
Wehs amt hab wo junthath g t-kownalig Jesus hegai mamt haschu hab wo junihith. Kumt ab wo ho'ige'ithath g t-ohg Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus.
Ahpim u'uwi mam ab ihm g Christ amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-wehm kihkam. Bo masma em-tatchuith g Jiosh.
Kumt ahpim chechoj wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm kihkam ch ab wabsh wo i s-ha bahbgi.
Ahpim a'al amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-jehj chum hekith. Ith o d tatchuij g Jiosh.
Kumt ahpim ha-jehj pi am wo si ha babgachuthath g e-a'aliga mat pi wo heb hu wua g e-chegitoithag.
Ahpim mam d ha-pionag amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-a'amo woho'i e-tatchui ab heg wabsh hekaj mam ab si has elith g Jiosh ch pi heg hekaj mas am wo em-nei g em-a'amo k wo s-hohho'i g em-chikpan.

Pi o d wa'i o'othham mo em-chikpnachuth ch wabshaba d t-kownalig Jesus. Ab o him g tash mamt an wo wehmajk. T heg ab wo em-namkith heg hekaj em-chikpan. Kumt heg hekaj woho'i e-tatchui ab am hab wo junihith g e-chikpan.

T-kownalig Jesus at ep wo namkith hegai matp hedai hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. Heg at wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithag. Jiosh at wehs wo ha lothai g hemajkam k hab masma wo ha namkith matp has i masma hab e junihim.
Ahpim a'amo amt s-ap ab wo ha neithath g e-pionag ch ep wo s-chegitok mam hab wa'ap ge ahmo. K heg an thaha thahm kahchim ch ed ch d Jiosh.
Ahpim wehs g chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab ep wo i ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh.
Chum ach s-ahgamk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g alithaj. Kumt ab wo tai mat ab wo t-mah g ap'ethag matt hab wo t-juh. Thani lihso nani pi heg ahgachug.
Kumt ab wo tai g Jiosh mat hab wo ni-juh mant am si tasho wo ahgath.
Am g si s-e mamachim hab wo e junihith am ha-nena ed hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh. Ab o em-mahkch g Jiosh g ap'ethag mamt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Am g s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag.
Kumt chum hekith s-hemajim wo neneokath ch wo s-ta kakaim ha'ichu ahgath. Tho em-wuikam mamt wo s-mahchk mamt has masma s-ap ab uhpam wo i nodagi g ne'oki ab wui g hemajkam ha'ichu kakkei.
Ia o t-wehmaj hegai mo hab chehgig Tychicus ch s-ap hab junihim g Jiosh chikpan.
Kuni chehani mat am wo i em-chehgimed k am wo i em-gewkemhu am em-ahgithk mach has wa'i masma.
T heg wo oi em-wehm kihkam Onesimus k d hahawa t-wehm wohochuththam. Ihtham at am wo i em-ahgi wehs ha'ichu mo hab e junihim iia.
Aristarcas o ni-wehm d ep lihso k ch am ep i em-ho'ige'elith. K hegai Mark mo d Barnabas ma'i am ep i em-ho'ige'elith. Heki ani hu em-ahgith mamt ith am wo i wahkith k wo kaiha matp am wo hih em-wui.
Joshua Justus o am hab wa'ap i em-ho'ige'elith. Tho wa'i ihtham waik mo d Tutuligo hemajkam ch ni-wehm chikpan am wehhejed g Jiosh. Kuni ha hekaj am si i ni-gewkemhun.

K ia ep thak ch am i em-ho'ige'elith hegai em-wehm kihkam mo hab chehgig Epaphras. Nt wo em-ahgi mo ith chum hekith si e ho'ige'ithahun am em-wehhejed ch am ha wehhejed hegam mo am kih Laodicea t am ch hegam mo am kih Hieropolis t am. Ab o tahni g mat Jiosh ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag. Mt hab s-ap wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh.
Ihtha si t-tatchuithch t-nawoj Luke mo d mahkai o am ep i em-ho'ige'elith. K g Demas am ep i em-ho'ige'elith.
Am g wo ha ahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam am Laodicea t am ch hegam mo am e-mihshmath kihj am g Nymphas mat ab wo s-t-ho'ige'el.
Ihtha o'ohana amt am wo ne'okchulith k gm hu haha wo ha mah hegam mo am kih Laodicea t am. T am epai wo ne'okchul. T hegam ab epai wo em-mah hegai mant ha o'ohani. Kumt am epai wo ne'okchul.
Mt wo ahgi g Archipus mat am wo i nahto hegai Jiosh chikpan mani wa hab ahgith.
Hejel ant an wo o'oha ihtha wawnim ahni Paul mant am wo si em-ho'ige'el. Pi g wo sha'i pi chegito mani ia hu kuhpi. Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g Jiosh.

T-wepnag mam am kih Thessalonica t am: Am ant ha'ichu wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul. K ia ni-wehmaj g Silas ch Timothy k ch am i ni-wehmaj. Tham woho hemajkamgaj g t-ohg Jiosh ab i e thagitok t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui. Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Chum ach hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj ch em-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahun.

Ab am si s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch hekaj chum hekith hab s-junimk g s-ap'ekam. Pihk em-elithadag o hab em-wua mam si chikpanith g Jiosh. Kum si s-gewkam him g e-thoakag nam pi si nenida hegai matsh hab wo wa t-juni g Jesus. Ith ach am wa wehs s-chegito ch hekaj chum hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
Jiosh o ab si em-tatchua ch ab i em-ui mamt d wo a'aligajk.

Am att u'apa g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj em-wui. Kumt ab i s-wohoch. Pi ach wabsh neneok. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at ab t-mah g gewkthag k am em-chehgi mo d wohokam g ha'ichu t-ahga. Am am wa s-mahch mach s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag am em-shahgith. Bach wa masma am em-chehgith mamt has wo i chum masmak.

Kum am t-oithch s-ap hab e junihim ch hab s-ap hab junihim g t-kownalig Jesus tatchui. Chum ams em-sho'igchuth, mt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig.
An amsh e wehgaj ha chehgithch g e-wehm wohochuththam mat has wo chum masmak. Mu'ijj ash ab em-amjed ha'ichu mahchim hegam mo am kih Macedonia ch Greece jejewed ch ed.

T g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga gm hu a'ai ep jejewed thahm i hih ab em-amjed. Wehsko o an e a'aga mam ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. K ab hahawa d em-wuikam mamt wo ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kuch ab wabsh em-wui thagitokch.
Si amt s-ap ab i t-neith k ab i s-wohoch g s-wohokam Jiosh k gm hu ha thagito hegam mo d wabsh hemajkam ha-nahtoi. Ith o wehsko an a'aga g hemajkam.

Ab o wa t-aihim g s-ko'ok namkitha ab amjed g Jiosh. T wabshaba g Jiosh alithag am t-wehhejed e muhkith mat wo t-tho'ibia. T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig amjed k ab uhpam ep bei. Hemuch amsh s-ap nenida mat ia ep wo jiwia g Jiosh. Alithag ab thahm kahchim t amjed.
Am am wa s-mahch ahpim t-wehm wohochuththam mat s-ap ha'ichu am hab e juh heg hekaj matt am thatha am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Am ach wa em-ahgith mat ha'i t-sho'igch amai Philippi kihhim t am matt eda koi am hu thatha em-wui. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-mah g gewkthag. Kutt am wabsh s-chechojim ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj em-wui, chum as mu'i ab t-wui gegok.
Ha'ichu t-chegitoithag o am wabsh si s-ap'e. Pi ach em-iattogith ch wabshaba wabsh s-chechojim ahg g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mamt ab wui wo i e thagito.

Jiosh at t-a'appem k am i t-chuhcha matt wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. Kuch heg hab wa'i junihim mo haschu d tatchuij ch pi wabsh g hemajkam ha-tatchui hab junimk. Jiosh o am t-mamche mach haschu ahgch hab ha'ichu junihim.
Am am wa s-mahch mach pi wabsh em-hehosimhun ch pi em-iattogith machs wo ha'ichu em-wohppo'i. Jiosh o s-mahch mo d wohokam ihtha.
Pi ach hekith am hu t-gahgith mas g o'othham ab wo ge has t-elithath ch ab wo t-hehgchulithath.

Bo hi wa chum mahs mamt ab wo si has t-elithath ch ha'ichukaj wo i t-wehmtath ahchim mach d Jesus chuhchai. Kuch wabshaba pi am hu t-gahgith ihtha nach pi si s-hemajim ab em-neith hab masma mat g ha-je'e ab wo ha neithath g e-a'aliga.
Si ach pihk t-elith ab em-wui ch hekaj am wabsh i t-thagitokch em-wehhejed mach em-ahgithahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh, chum achs hems heg hekaj wo t-ko'ij.
Am amtp hu wa'i s-chegito mach si chikpan wabsh i si'alim amjed ch mehk s-chuhugam k ed matt pi ha'ichukaj wo em-kudu.
Si ach wa s-ap ab em-neith ch pi hekith hab wua g pi ap'ekam ab hema i em-wui. Jiosh o s-mahch ihtha. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap s-mahch.

Jiosh o ab i em-waith mamt am wo ap'ethagk kihthaj ed ch ab wehmaj wo u'ukchith g ab has elithadag. Kum s-mahch mach am i em-gewkemhun wepo masma mo g ha-ohg ch ab s-ap i em-neneokith ch i em-chehani mamt am hab wo masmak mam d Jiosh a'aliga.

Heg ach wa'i ahgachug Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-ahga. Kumt hab wa'i masma hab elith k hekaj ab i s-wohoch. Jiosh o am i chikpan em-shahgith ch am wohokamchuth mo d ha'ichu ahgaj. Kuch hekaj chum hekith ab si ho'ige'elith.

Am am ha oithch hab e wua hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am a'ai kih Judea ch ed. Ha-wehm o'othham o ha sho'igchuth. K hegam wabsh s-ap ab nakog. Kum ahpim hab wa'ap wabsh s-ap ab nakog mo g em-wehm o'othham em-sho'igchuth.

Tho hegam ni-wehm o'othham mat wa mua g t-kownalig Jesus. Kush d t-shohshon mat wa ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. K hegam ni-wehm o'othham t-sho'igchuth ch gm hu i t-wuwhas ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K g Jiosh pi hohho'ith mo has e wua. Chum o hems ab wehs ha wui gegok g hemajkam

chum t-shohbithch ahchim mach ha ahgith g go'ol hemajkam hegai mat hekaj wo e tho'ibia. T ith ab wabsh ba'ich i ge'ethaj g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. Kut heg gm hu ai mat ab ha wui wo jiwia g wehs s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag.
Pi att sha'i pi em-chegito matt hekith am i t-gawulkai ab em-amjed. Chum ach s-em neithamk
ch am ha hekaj chum si i t-nako matt am uhpam wo hihi em-wui. Ahni Paul ant mu'ikko am chum uhpam s-himim. T am ni-kuh g jijawul ha-ge'ejig Satan.
M eda d ahpim mach am si em-hiwig ch em-hekaj wo si s-hehgigk ch ab wo si ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus mat hekith ep wo jiwia.

Am att i pi t-nako am em-chegitokch. Kum s-mahch matt am i kei g t-wehnag Timothy mat am wo him k am wo em-nei. Tt ahchim am hejel wih Athens kihhim t am. Timothy o si s-ap ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab amjed g Christ. Kutt hab i t-ah mat am wo him k am wo i em-gewkemhun k am wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag.
Kumt hab pi hedai wo sha'i thagito g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heg hekaj e-sho'igchuthadag. Am am wa s-mahch matt wo t-sho'igch ith hekaj t-wohochuthadag.
Ith ach wa heki hu am em-ahgith mach eda am em-wehmajkahim. Kum s-mahch mat wa woho hab e juh.

Kunid s-gihug mat am hu wo i em-bijim g ge Jiawul. Kut wo heki e wua g t-chikpan am em-shahgith. Nt pi ni-nako manis am ba'ich ep wo i neahi k hekaj am i kei g Timothy mat wo s-mai mams am wabsh kia ab s-wohochuth.

T hemuch ia ep jiwia ab em-amjed k ia u'apa g s-ta hohho'itham ahga ab amjed g em-wohochuthadag ch pihk em-elithadag. Am o t-ahgith mam chum hekith si s-ap am t-chegito ch hab wa masma chum s-t-neithamk mach ahchim has i masma chum s-em-neithamk.
Mu'i ach ha'ichu nakog ch mu'i t-sho'igchuth. K wabshaba g em-wohochuthadag ab t-gewkemhun.
S-gegokim amki ab s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuch ab si t-nenenashanichuth
ch ab si i ho'ige'elith g Jiosh mam hab wa masma ab t-mahkch g s-hehgig.
Chum ach hekith ab tahni g Jiosh wehs t-ihbthagkaj matt wo wa ep em-neith k ab wo i em-wehmt mamt s-ap ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Mat hems wo wa'i t-hiwigi g t-ohg Jiosh ch t-kownalig Jesus matt am wo wa ep em-nei.
Ab ach tahni g Jiosh mat ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g gewkthag mamt hekaj wo si pihk e elithath ab a'ai e wui ch ab ha wui g wehs hemajkam.

Kumt s-gegokim ab wo wohochuthath g Jiosh ch ab wui wo gawulkthask ab amjed g pi ap'ekam mamt pi wo ha chu'ichigk mat hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus wehs ha wehm hegam mo d hemajkamgaj ch heki hu koi.

Pegih, t-wepnag, am ach wa em-ahgith mamt has masma wo himath g e-thoakag ch hab wo hohho'ithach g Jiosh. Ab amt bei g ha'ichu t-ahga. Kuch hemuch ab si em-tahni ch ab em-chehani am wehhejed g t-kownalig Jesus mamt ba'ich am hab wo i junihith.
S-mahch am mach wa has masma am em-shelinith g gewkthajkaj.
Jiosh o em-tatchuith mamt ab wo si i e gawulkai pi ap'ekam amjed k wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed.
Ahpim chechoj amt wo s-mahchk mamt wo si s-ap ha hohnt am tahgio g Jiosh ch am hemajkam ha tahgio.
Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o wabsh hejel e-tatchui wehhejed bebhe g uwi. Mt wabshaba ahpim pi hab masma wo be
k hab pi ab hu hedai wui pi ap has wo chu'i. Heki ach hu am em-ahgith mat g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith matp hedai am hab wo juh ihtha pi ap'ekam.
Jiosh at pi hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai machs am hab wo junihith g s-uam ha'ichu. Tho tatchuij matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk.
K heg hekaj ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Hegai matp hedai wo s-ohhoth ihtha mashchama at wo s-ohhoth g Jiosh.
Heki atsh hu i em-tashogi g Jiosh mamt wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam. K pi hab chum mahs machs am hu ep wo ge em-o'ohani ab amjed.
Si amsh pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam am wehs Macedonia jewed ch ed. Kuch wabshaba ab si em-tahni mamt ba'ich am hab wo i e junihith.
Am g wo i e nakog mamt wo s-thotholimak ch am hab wo junihith g hejel e-chikpan ch wo ha'ichu e gahgithath. Ith ach wa heki hu hab em-ahgith.
Bamt masma pi hedai ab hu wo hiwgath mas ab wabsh wo em-mah hegai mam haschu i tatchua. T hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh wo em-nei mam s-chikpnadag k ab wo si has em-elithath.
Si ach em-tatchuith mamt wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab ha amjed hegam mat heki hu koi. T hahawa pi wo i em-bijim g pi ap tahhathkam hab masma mat hab wo ha juh g pi wohochuththam.
Neh, ab at i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig amjed. Kuch s-wohochuth ihtha ch hekaj ab wui nenea mat g Jiosh ab ep wo i ha wuwhas hegam mat koi ab s-wohochuthch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus.
Hegam atsh wo i wuwha ab amjed g muhkig matt koi an hu wo nam g t-kownalig Jesus.

Wehpeg at ab wo si s-kaitham t-wai g anghil ha-ge'ejig. T g Jiosh kuikud ab haha wo kaitha. T ab haha wo i hud g t-kownalig Jesus ab thahm kahchim t amjed. T hegam mat heki hu koi ab s-wohochuthch g Jesus ab wo i wuwha.
T hegam mat hedai in d wo kia thothakamk heg i tash ed ab haha wo i e hemapai ha wehm chewagi ch ed k an wo nam g t-kownalig. Kutt am i amjed chum hekith wo wehmajk g t-kownalig.
Ab g wo si e gewkemhunath ith hekaj ha'ichu ahga.
Pi o hab mahs manis am hu wo em-o'ohani ab amjed mas hekith hab wo i e juh ihtha ha'ichu mani am ahg.

Am am wa s-ap s-mahch mat chum s-a'agi wo e ai mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Neh, pi o ta machima mas hekith wo i jiwia g s-chu ehskam chuhug ch ed, o mas hekith wo i e ai mat g uwi ab wo taht g s-ko'ok k wo bei g ali. K hab wa'ap pi ta machima am ha wehhejed g pi e tho'ibiakam mas hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig.
Ihtham at hab wo kaijjith mo wehs ha'ichu am wabsh i si s-ap'e ch s-thotholima. T am wabsh wo si e ai mat wo e ko'ijith k pi wo e tho'ibia.
Kum eda ahpim e tho'ibiakam s-mahch ihtha. K pi hab chum mahs mat s-a'agi wo jiwia hegai tash em-wui hab sha masma mo g s-chu ehskam.
Jiosh o ha'ichu t-tashogith. Kuch an u'ukch g tonlig hab masma mo hegam mo am tash ed hihim.
Pegih, tt wo chum s-nenenashanik ch pi hab wo masmak mo g nawkkoi.
Hegam mo pi nenenashanik ch nawkko'o o am eda g s-chuhugam.

Kutt wabshaba ahchim s-ap wo t-nahtokchith hab masma mo g shonthal. T-wohochuthadag ch pihk t-elithadag o d wainomi lihwa t-wehhejed. Kuch ab wui t-gewpkathch mat g t-tho'ibiathag s-ap wo e nahto. K ith hab sha masma mo g wainomi wonami t-wehhejed.
Pi at hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh mas wo t-namkith heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig k wabshaba hab ahgk mat g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wo t-tho'ibia.
Heg at muh t-wehhejed k i wuhsh matt d wo thothakamk wehmaj. K wabsh chum has masma s-ap'e chum achs wo heki hu koi o in d wabsh wo kia thothakamk mat wo jiwia.
Mt heg hekaj ab wabsh wo si a'ai e gewkemhunath ch ab a'ai ha'ichukaj wo i e wehmajk mam am hab wa e junihim.
Ab ach si em-tahni mamt s-ap ab wo ha neithath g e-wanimedtham ch hegam mo am em-mashcham ch ab shohbithch g pi ap'ekam em-shahgith. Tho Jiosh hab elitha mo hab wua.
Ab g wo si has ha elithath ch s-ha ho'ige'ithath no pi hab wua a Jiosh chikpan. Am g wabsh wo s-thotholim kihk e wehm.

Ab ach si em-tahni mamt wo ha ahgithath hegam mo s-papadma mat wo chikpanath. Ab g wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mo pi wihnam gegok am e-wohochuthadag ed. I g wo ha wehmtath hegam mo pi ha gewpthag ch ab wehsijj wo si ha bahbgi.
Pi g am uhpam wo agwua mat hema s-ko'okam wo em-juh k wabshaba chum hekith am wo i e nakogath mamt s-ap ha'ichu hab wo wuath ab a'ai e wui ch ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam.
Chum g hekith wo s-ap e tahtkkath.
Chum g hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.
Ab g wo s-ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh, chum atp haschu has wo i chu'igk. Ith o d Jiosh tatchui em-wehhejed ahpim mamt ab i e hemakoj g Jesus Christ wehm.
Pi g am hu wo shohbith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Pi g am wo s-kaihogi hegam mo g Jiosh ab ha mahkch g ha'ichu ahga
k wabshaba wehs ha'ichu wo i a'appemath ch g s-ap'ekam ab wo u'ukchith.
Im g hu wehs hab wo i juhni g pi ap'ekam.

Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam. Kuni ab tahni mat wehs gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap'ekam ab em-amjed k wo si nuhkuthath g em-thoakag ch em-ihbthag ch em-hon mat d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk. Mt am hahawa pi wo ha chu'ichigk mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Jiosh at ab i em-wai e wui k chum hekith hab junihim mo has i kaij.
Am g wo t-wehhejed e ho'ige'ithahunath.
Am g wo ha ahgith g t-wehm wohochuththam mat ab wo i s-t-ho'ige'el.
Ni ab si em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus gewkthagkaj mamt am wo ne'okchul ihtha o'ohana am wehs ha wui g t-wehm wohochuththam amai.
Neh, ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.

T-wepnag mam am kih Thessalonica t am: Am ant ep wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul. K ia ni-wehmaj g Silas ch Timothy k ch am i ni-wehmaj. Tham woho hemajkamgaj g t-ohg Jiosh ab i e thagitok t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui.
Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Chum ach hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj, t-wepnag. Am amsh si i gewkahim e-wohochuthadag ed ch ba'ich i si pihk e elith ab a'ai e wui.

Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap t-tahtk ch wehsko ha ahgithahim g t-wehm wohochuththam ab em-amjed. Msh am em-sho'igchuth nam pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh. Kumsh eda s-ap ab nakog g e-sho'igthag am wehhejed g Jiosh.

Ith o am wohokamchuth mat am i em-ap'ech g Jiosh e wehhejed k pi ab hu ha'ichu wo em-abch am lothaita ch ed. Am am e sho'igchuth wehhejed g Jiosh kownaltalig. K g Jiosh hab em-elith mam d s-ap'ekam ch am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed.
Jiosh at s-ap hab wo juh g lothaita. Hegam mo em-sho'igchuth at wo e sho'igch heg hekaj.

Kumt ahpim wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g e-sho'igchuthadag. Jiosh at hab wo juh ihtha mat hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus ab thahm kahchim t amjed. T ia wehmaj wo thatha g anghiligaj k wo si s-gewkthagk.
T ia wehmaj ep wo e chehgi g si ge'e mei. T wo s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jesus hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh ch pi ab hu wohog elith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus.
Hegam at gm hu wo si i e gawulkai ab amjed g Jiosh k pi hekith wo bei g ge'e gewkthaj k chum hekith ab wo beihith g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.
Ith at hab wo e juh mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. Kut g gewkthaj am haha wo i chehgi mat t-tho'ibia k ab i t-gawulkai e wehhejed.

Pegih, heg ach hekaj chum hekith ab t-ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui am em-wehhejed. Ab at i em-wai mamt wo e tho'ibia k d wo a'aligajk. M hab hahawa s-junimk g s-ap'ekam ab s-wohochuthch. Kuch ab tahni g Jiosh mat am e-tatchui oithk hab wo em-juh k hab s-ap hab wo em-elithath. Jiosh o gewkthag mat hab wo juh ihtha mach ab tahni.
Kumt ab wo si ha'ichuchuthath g t-kownalig Jesus. T heg hab wa'ap ab wo si em-ha'ichuchuthath. Jiosh at si s-hemajim am i ap'ech g e-alithag wehm mat ith hab wo em-juni.
Bach wa em-ahgith mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ab e wui wo i t-ui.

Kush am hema em-ahgith mat heki hu hab e juh. Pi g am wo sha'i e kudut k pi sha'i ha wohochuth, chum as hems hab wabsh e wua mo heg am ha tashogith g Jiosh o atp hems em-ahgith matt ahchim hab masma ha'ichu o'oha.

Koi at e ai. Hemho wa at wehpeg am hab wo e juh mat mu'i ab wui wo gegokiwua g Jiosh hegam mo hab chum kaij mo ab s-wohochuth. T am hahawa hema wo i wuhsh g o'othham k wehs ha ba'iwechkim d wo pi ap'ekamk ch d wo si obgajk g Jiosh ch am wo i wah ge'e cheopi ch ed am Jerusalem t am k am wo thahiwua mat g hemajkam ab wo jiosht. Kut pi wo ha hiwigi mas ha'ichu ep wo jioshgak. T g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo namkithath chum hekith.
Am am wa s-chegito mani wa am wa heki hu em-ahgith ihtha mani eda am em-wehmaj.
S-mahch am mo g pi ap'ekam an e shohbithch hemu. T wabshaba has tash in hu hab wo i e juh hegai mo an shohbithch.
T am haha wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus k si s-masma ab wo e chehgith k ab ab wo ihbhe hegai si pi ap o'othham k hekaj wo mu'a k gm hu wo si i tha'ich mamt hebai wo ha nehnich g jijawul.
T g jijawul ha-ge'ejig Satan ab wo mah g gewkthag. Kut hab wo juh g nahnko mahs s-hasig ha'ichu ch s-ta neithamam ha'ichu mat wo ha iattogi g hemajkam.
Kut hegam ab wo i s-wohoch mo hedai d pi e tho'ibiakam.
Jiosh at hab wo ha juh mat wabsh g ha'ichu iattogi ab wo s-wohoch no pi ihtham s-hohho'ith g pi ap'ekam ch pi ab hu wo bei g wohokam mat hekaj wo chum e tho'ibia.
T hegam mo e iattogith ch ab s-wohochuth hab wa'ap ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.

Mt wabshaba ahpim wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Si o pihk e elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ em-hekaj. Kumt am wehmaj ab wo e ha'ichuchuthath. Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i ap'ech g Jiosh mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo i em-gawulkai wehhejed. Kumt ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj mach wa am em-ahgith. Ith ach hekaj ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh.
Pegih, am ach wa em-mashcham ihtha wohokam ch am ep em-o'ohanith ab amjed. Kumt s-wihnam wo gegokkath ch an wo u'ukchith.
Ab o t-wui si pihk e elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ g Jiosh t-ohg wehm ch ab si s-t-ho'ige'el. Kuch heg hekaj ab wui t-gewpkathch.
Ahchim ach ab tahni mat ab wo i em-gewpkathch mamt g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith ch hab wo kaijjith.

Ab g wo e ho'ige'ithahun, t-wepnag, k ab wo tai g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo e shohbi g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed t-kownalig Jesus. T mu'ijj ab wo si has i elith k ab wo s-wohog el hab masma mo am hab e wua em-shahgith.
Pi ap hehemajkam o pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ab t-wui gegok. Kumt am wo si e ho'ige'ithahunath mat wo t-tho'ibia g Jiosh ab ha amjed.
Jiosh at hemho wa am hab wo juh mo haschu i t-ahgith. S-mahch ach mat ab wo i em-mah g gewkthag k wo em-nuhkuth mat pi wo em-gehg g Jiawul.
Tham t-wehm wohochuththam. Kuch heg hekaj hab em-elith mam am hab junihim hegai mach ab i em-mashcham ch am hab wabsh wo i junihith.
Ch ab i tahni g t-kownalig Jesus mat hab wo em-juh mamt ba'ich wo i mai g Jiosh pihk elithadag k wo s-chu nakogath hab masma mo hab masma g Jesus Christ.

Heki ach hu em-mashcham mamt wo s-wapagimak. K eda ha'i hegam mo d wohochuththam s-papadma ch pi am hu oithch hab e junihim g t-mashchama. Ch ab em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj mamt pi am hu wo ha wehmajk.
Am am wa t-neith mach wa pi sha'i papadma mach wa am em-wehmajkahim. Kum am wa s-mahch mamt am chum t-oithk hab wo wa masmak.
Si ach wa chikpan chum hems s-chuhugam k ed matt am wo wa ha'ichu ha namkithath hegam mach hedai i kih am thadha mamt pi ha'ichu wo heki gei t-wehhejed.
Bo hi wa chum mahs mach ap'ethag mamt ab ha'ichu wo i t-namkith nach pi d Jiosh pionag em-wehhejed. Ch wa wabshaba hejel t-thagio'ith matt am wo em-chehgi mamt has wo chum masmak.
Bach wa em-ahgith mach eda am em-wehmaj mamt pi wo ha gegos hegam mo pi tatchua mat wo chikpanath.
Kah ach mo am em-shahgith ha'i s-papadma ch pi chikpan ch wabsh himchuth g has ahgadag.
Ch ab si ha chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj ch ab ha gewkemhun mat am wabsh wo i e bahbgi k wo chikpanath ch hekaj wo e thagio'ithath.
Kumt ahpim mam wabsh s-ap am hab e junihim am hab wabsh wo i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo thagito
ch wabshaba wabsh wo thagito hegai matp hedai pi ab hu wo wohog elithath ihtha mani ia em-chehani. Tp hems ab wo wa bei g si edathag k am wo i e ap'ech.
Am g wo s-chegitok mo pi d em-obga ch wabshaba d em-wepnag mamt ab wo shohbithath ha'ichukaj.
Chum at hekith am wo em-wehmajk g t-kownalig Jesus. Kuch ab tahni mat chum hekith ba'ich ab wo i em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam.
Ahni Paul ant ia hahawa si hejel ha'ichu wo o'oha hab masma mani hab wa wua an wehs ni-o'ohana ed. Mt hab masma wo s-mahchk mani d ahni.
Neh, ab at wo ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.

Ni-wehnag Timothy: Ia ant ha'ichu wo i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Jiosh at ni-cheha mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ. T hab ab wo hiwgath g hemajkam mat heg am wo ha u'apa Jiosh kihthag wui.

Ab g ni-kaiham ahpi Timothy map d ni-alithag ab i s-wohochuthk g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. Ab o wa si s-m-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i m-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.
Ab ani wa si s-ap m-ahgith mapt am wo wih Ephesus t am mani wa am him gm hu wo himk Macedonia wui. Am g wabsh i thakath ch am wo si ha keshwua hegam mo g iattogi chum ha mashcham.

Ihtham o chum ha mashcham mo g hoho'oki a'agitha ab wehnags g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ep chum ha mashcham mat hemho wa wo s-chegitok g e-shohshonbad ha-chechgig. T wabshaba ihtha ha-mashchama hab wo ha juh mat wo thagito g Jiosh hab elitha k ab wabsh a'ai wo e ne'owinath. Bat wa'i masma wo s-mahchk g Jiosh hab elitha mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj.

Pt wo ha ahgi mat woho ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo e kudutath. Ith at hab wo ha juh mat wo i ge'etha g ha-tatchuithag.
Ha'i at thagito g e-wohochuthadag k hekaj wabsh ha wehm e ne'owin.
Ihtham o hab chum e elith mo d chehanig ha mashchamtham ch wabshaba pi amichuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga chum as hab e elith mo s-e mahchk ch neneok.

S-ap'e o g chehanig. K wabshaba ihtham pi ap hekaj am chum ha shohbithch hegam mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam. K eda g chehanig chum e hekaj mat wo ha shohbi hegam mo g pi ap'ekam hab wua. Ihtham o pi ab hu has elith g Jiosh ch pi ab hu wohog elith. Ha'ijj o s-ha mu'amk chum hems g e-ohg o g e-je'e.

Ha'ijj o g s-totontom ha'ichu chegitok ch chum hems chum e u'uwichuth o e chechojchuth ch e wehm hab junihim g s-uam ha'ichu. Ha'ijj o ha lilsochuth wabsh hejel e wehhejed ch ha iattogith ch ab ha'ichu ha abchuth g s-ap'ekam o'othham. Nahnko masma o ab wui gegok g mashchamaj g Jiosh hegam mo chum ha mashcham g iattogi.
Jiosh o ni-nuhkuthachuth ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu e-ahga. K heg am t-tashogith ihtha mant em-ahgi.
T-kownalig Jesus oki hab ni-elith mant s-ap am hab wo junihith ihtha chickpan nat pi am i ni-kehsh k ab ni-mahkch g gewthag wehhejed. Kuni heg hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith.
Heki anid hu wa ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab s-wohochuth g Jesus ch ab ha wui pi ap has ahg g Jesus. Kut eda heg ab si i s-ni-ho'ige'el nani pi pi ni-mahch ch hab junihim pi ab hu wohochuthch.
Si at s-hemajim ab ni-wui i e tashogi. Nt hab ab i s-wohochuth k ab i ni-hemakoj wehmaj k ab wui a pihk ni-elith.

Neh, hema hab che'ithag o hab chu'ig. “Ia at jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus jewed thahm mat wo ha tho'ibia g pi ap chu'ijkam.” K ith d si wohokam nat pi ab si s-ni-ho'ige'el. Ni eda shahag wepo mani wa wehs ha ba'iwechkim d si pi ap chu'ijkam mani wa cheggia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus ha sho'igchuthch hegam mo ab s-wohochuth. T heg ab wabsh ni-bahbgi mat wehs am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam mat ab wabsh wo ha bahbgi. Tp hems hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Neh, wehs ha'ichu thahm o d kownal g Jiosh ch pi ta neithagma ch pi hekith im hu hab wo i e juh. Kutt ab wo si uhgk i ulin k ab wo hehgchulithath chum hekith. Neh, woho o wa ihtha.

Pegih, ni wehnag, Timothy, heki o hu am i t-tashogith g Jiosh maptki am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan. Kuni ab ep i m-gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa junihith. Hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab m-wui at hab wo masmak mo g s-kehg cheggiakud. Pt hekaj ab wui kehkkath g ge Jiawul.
An g si u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith map haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam. Ha'ijj oki pi hab masma ch hekaj padch g e-wohochuthadag.
Hymanaeus ch Alexander oki ha'i hegam ch pi ap has ahg g Jiosh. Nt gm hu i ha thagito ge Jiawul wui mat wo e sho'igchuth k atp hems wo thagito g pi ap e-chu'ichig.

Si ani s-m-ahgithamk mapt wo ha'ichu ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam. Tho si ha'ichu mat ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui. Pt wo ha ahgi mat ab wo tahnith g i wehmtadag ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath am ha wehhejed g wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam.
K hab ep mahs mat wo e ho'ige'ithahunath am ha wehhejed g kokownal ch u'usagakam mat ihtham s-ap hab wo junihith g e-chikpan. Kutt hab s-thotholim wo kihthagk ch wo s-ap t-tahtkkath.
Neh, ith at wo hohho'ithach g Jiosh no pi d t-tho'ibiakam
ch tatchua mat wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam wo e tho'ibia k wo s-mai g wohokam ab amjed.
Tho wa'i hemako g t-ohg Jiosh. K hab wa'ap d wa'i hemako g si Kehshaj ch d Jesus Christ ch d wa'i hegai mat i t-hemakoch g Jiosh wehm. Jesus Christ at t-wepo e juh mat d wo o'othhamk
ch ab wo bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag k hab wo t-tho'ibia. Ith o am t-chehgithch mo wehs hemajkam s-ha tho'ibiamk g Jiosh.
Kut heg hekaj am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj k wo ha mashcha g gawul mahs hemajkam g wohokam. S-mahch ap wehs ihtha.
Bant wo chei mat wahm g chechoj ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath Jiosh wui ch atp hems am wo uhgk uh'ul e-nohnhoi. S-ap at ha'ichu hab wo elithath ch pi wo sha'i s-bagak ab hedai i wui.
Kunt hab ep wo chei mat g u'uwi wabsh s-ap ab wo e enigadathch ch ep s-ap hab wo juhkchith g e-mo'o mat pi heg hekaj wo chum si e hahaschuthath.
Ab o ha ab mat chum hekith am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch heg amjed wo e chehgithch mo d wohochuththam.
Ab o d ep ha-wuikam mat wabsh s-bahbagi ch s-thotholim ab wo kaiham k wo mahchith g Jiosh himthag.
Ahni ani pi sha'i ha hiwgith g u'uwi mas wo ha mashcha g chechoj o am ha thahm wo e uh'ulinchith.
Ab o ha ab g chechoj mat am wo i ha wanim g hemajkam ith eda himthag. Jiosh at wehpeg nahto g cheoj k am haha wabsh oithk nahto g uwi. Ihtham ash wa hab chechgig Adam ch Eve.
Kush pi d Adambad mat e iattogi. Hegai uwi atsh e iattogith k melchkwua g Jiosh chehanig.

T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab ha mah g u'uwi mat wo e sho'igch hekith am i ha mamsijith g a'al. T wabshaba ab ha amjed wo mahsi g t-tho'ibiakam. Kut wo e tho'ibia matp ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo s-ap'ek ch wo s-e neimakath.
Tatchua o g si s-kehg chickpan hegam matp hedai s-ha wanimelimk g wohochuththam. Neh, ith o d hab ha che'ithag ch d wohokam.

Kunt am wo i em-chegitoch mat has wo chum masmak hegam mo hab s-e junimk. S-ap at d wo o'othhamk. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu ha abch. Hemako at wo wa'i hohnigk ch wo si s-e tahtkk wehs ha'ichu k ed ch wo si s-ap hejel e nuhkuthath ch s-ap ha'ichu am hab wo junihith ch wo s-chechojimak hegam ha wui matp hedai am wo ha chehgio ha-kihki am. Ab o ha ab mat wo s-mahchk mat has masma wo ha mashcha.
Pi o hab chu'ig mas wo nawkko'oth o s-hohtam wo babgatath o wo ha kawnith o heg wa'i lial ab wo si tatchuath.
S-hemajim at am wo ha thahmk g e-wehm kihkam. T g a'aligaj ab wo wechok ch ab wo si has elithath.
Pi at has masma wo s-ap i ha wanim g e-wehm wohochuththam matp pi ap wo ha wanim g e-wehm kihkam.
Pi at d wo hema hegamk mat hemuch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga nat pi am hu wo chum si e haschuthath ch wo i gei hab masma matsh wa g ge Jiawul hab e juh.
Heg amt am wo i kei mo chum hems g pi wohochuththam ab si has elith. T hab pi hedai ab hu ha'ichu wo chu'ichigch mas heg hekaj wo i wua g ge Jiawul.
T hab wa'ap s-ap d wo o'Othhamk hegam mo am i ha wehmaj g ha wanimedtham. Pt wo ha ahgi mat pi wo chu iattomk ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi heg wa'i lial ab wo tatchuath.
Tho si ha'ichu mat am wo si wehs s-ap oithath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam.
Wehpeg amt am wo i ha mamche k am haha wo i ha chuhcha matp s-ap am hab wo masmak.
U'uwi chikpantham at hab wa'ap s-ap d wo u'uwik ch pi wo chu ahgamk ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi wo chu iattomk.
Ihtham i ha-wehmttham at hehemako wo wehm kihkamk ch hab wa'ap s-ap wo ha thahmk g e-a'aliga ch s-ap wo himath g e-kihthag.
Hegam mat s-ap hab wo juh g e-chikpan at pi wo has e elith k si s-gewkam am hab wo junihith. Kumt ab wo si has ha elithath.

Bani chum ni-tahtk mant s-hohtam am wo i m-chehgim. Tp wabshaba hems pi wo ni-ap'et. Kunt heg hekaj am wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohani. Kumt ith ab wo s-mahchk mamt has masma hab wo e junihith mamt s-ap wo himchuthath g Jiosh himthag. Tham Jiosh hemajkamga ch d nuhkuththam g wohokam.

Pi o wa ta machima matt has masma wo s-ap'ekamk am Jiosh tahgio. T wabshaba ith am i t-tashogi g Jiosh. K d wohokam ihtha mo an hab chu'ig ne'i ed: T-wepo at hab e juh g Jiosh alithag k an e mahsith. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wohokamch mo d s-ap'ekam. S-ta neithamam at hab e juh, chum hems g anghil ha wehhejed. S-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed o an e ahgahim nahnko mahs hemajkam ha wui. T mu'i hemajkam ab s-wohoch. Kut am uhpam ep i bei g Jiosh thahm kahchim wui. Neh, pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wo pi wohokamch ihtha wohokam.

Si o tasho am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat ab wo i e ai g tash mat mu'i wo thagito g e-wohochuthadag. Ha'i at wo ha mashcha g iattogi nat pi g jijawul wo i ha wahmuth. T mu'i hemajkam ab wo ha wohog el.
Hegam mat chum hekith wo ha iattogithath at pi wo sha'i e kudutath heg hekaj nat pi gd hu wabsh wo i ha ap'et.

Ihtham o ha mashcham mo d pi ap'ekam mat wo e hohont ch ep pi ha hiwgith mas wo ko'ath g has mahs ha'ichu hugi. K eda wehs ihtha d Jiosh nahtoi ch am wa s-ap'e am t-wehhejed. Ahchim mach s-mahch g wohokam att hekaj ab wo ho'ige'el g Jiosh k ab wo ui g nahtoij.
Jiosh at wehs ha'ichu nahto. K wehs s-kehgaj. Tt hekaj ab wo i ho'ige'ith k ab wo ui.
Bo kaij g Jiosh mat g ho'ige'ithahuna am wo i ap'ech nenaj ed.

Thapt wo s-ap'ekam piongajk g Jesus Christ maptp am wo i ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam ihtha ha'ichu mashchama. Kupt an wabsh s-ap wo u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag ch wehs ha'ichu mashchama ab amjed map hab hi wa masma hab e wua.
Pi g am hab masma hekaj g hoho'oki a'agitha mas d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Pi at hab wo em-juh mamt wo s-a'ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed. Am apt wo si e mashchamath mapt am hab wo junihith s-ap'ekam himthag.

S-ap'e mapt wo e momoisha k wo s-gewkk. K wabshaba ab him g tash mat wo huhug ihtha. K heg hekai ba'ich i s-ap'e mapt wo i e gewkai am e-wohochuthadag ed. Ith o ab m-mahkch g s-ap'ekam thoakag ithani ch imhab i ba'ich.
Tho si wohokam ihtha ha'ichu ahga. K hab chu'ig mat wehs ab wo i chum s-e wohoch.

Jiosh at wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k am wo i e gewpkai wui. Kuch ab s-wohochuth ch heg hekaj am si t-nakog ch mu'i ha'ichu ab nakog matt wo ha ahgi hemajkam ab amjed ihtha.
Am g i ha mashcham ihtha mani m-ahgith k ab i ha chehani mat am hab wo junihith.

Bapt masma s-ap hab wo e junihith ch s-ap wo neokath. T pi hedai pad has wo m-elithath map d wabsh wechij hemajkam. Ab g si pihk e elithath wehs ha wui ch wo si e nuhkuthath ch pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. T hab wo e chehgithahith g em-wohochuthadag.
Am g i e nakog mapt am wo wa ne'okchulithath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha-namki ed ch wo ha mashchamath ch am wo i ha gewkemhunath.

Neh, ha wanimedtham at was e ho'ige'ithahu m-wehhejed k ab m-taht. T wa hegam mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am ah mat has mahs chikpan ab m-mah g Jiosh. Pegih, am g i e nakogath ch heg am hab wo junihith.
T hab ab wo i e gewkemhunath g wohochuththam an m-neithch.
Si g s-e nen'oith map has e junihim ch haschu ha mashcham k hekaj pi wabsh wo heki wua g e-thoakag. T hegam mat ab wo m-kaiha hab wa'ap pi wo heki wua g e-thothakag.

Pi g ab wabsh si chehmoth g keli o'othham k wabshaba ab wabsh wo s-ap ha'ichu kakke hab masma mapt g hejel e-ohg hab chum masma hab wo juhkchith. Wechij o'othham apt hab masma ab wo ha neithath mo d m-wepnag.
ch g o'oki hab masma map g e-je'e ch g wechij u'uwi hab masma mo d m-u'uwiga. Pt wabsh si s-ap wo ha chegitokath.
Am g ha ahgith hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmath mat wo ha nuhkuth hegam mo d si hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi.
K wabshaba pi ab hu ha ab mas wo ha nuhkuth hegam mo ge a'aliga. Ihtham ha-a'aliga at wo chum ha nuhkuth nat pi ha ge'egel. K d Jiosh tatchui mat aigo epai wo i ha wehmtath,
Hegam mo woho d si hehe'ejel wihpkam o heg ab wa'i hiwig Jiosh ch chum hekith ab tahni g i wehmtadag. Ihtham amt wo ha nuhkuthath
ch wabshaba wabsh wo ha thagito hegam mo wabsh e gahgith g s-tahhathkam.
Neh, pt wo ha ahgi hegam mo e wehm mihshmath mat hab wo juh ihtha mani m-ahgith. T hab pi hedai has wo ha ahgath.
Hegam mat pi wo ha nuhkuth g e-hajuni o ba'ich d i pi ap'ekam mo g mischini.
Pi at an hu wo ha ui g wechij u'uwi mat wo ha nuhkuth. Hegam mat wo i ha wehmtath at wo aisk g chuhthpo wehst-mahm a'ahithag ch d wo hegamk mo s-ap e nuhkuthahim g e-kunbad wehhejed
ch s-ap ha ge'egel g a'al ch s-ap ha nuhkuth g Jiosh wohochuththam ch wehsko s-e mahch mo ha'ichukaj i ha wehmt hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag, chum as hems pi d wo ha-machigak.
Wechij u'uwi atp hems ep wo s-kuhkuntam mo eda hab chum kaij mat pi hab wo e juh k wabsh wo chikpani g Jiosh, neh, k hab masma wo e chu'ichigchuth k gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Christ.
Ha'i atp hems wabsh wo s-e papadmakamch an oiopothch ha-kihki oithch, wahm ba'ich i pi ap'e mat wo mai g has ahgadag k an wo gantanath g pi kehg ha'ichu ahga.

Ha'i at heki hu hab masma hab e juh k am i oi g Jiawul. Ith o hekaj ba'ich i a-ap'e mat g wechij u'uwi ep wo kuhkunt k wo mahmadt k wo s-ap thagio'i g e-kihthag. T heg hekaj g t-obga pi wo e nako mas wo pi ap has t-ahgath.
Am g ha ahgith g u'uwi mat wo i ha thagio'i g hehe'ejel wihpkam e-hajuni k pi ab hu hedai wo mohto'i. Hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmath at hegam wo wa'i ha thagio'i mo d si hehe'ejel wihpkam
Am g wehs ha ahgith mat ab wo si has i ha elithath hegam mo d kekel em-wanimedtham ch s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan, wahm hegam mo si chikpan ch hab junihim g mashchama ch mihshmetha.

An o o'ohanas Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed: Pi g an hu wo bishdath g woiwis chini mat wo kehimunath g ha'ichu em-bahithag. T am wo wa ha kamshshapath g ha'ichu em-bahithag. K hab d ahga ihtha mamt hab wa'ap wo ha namkithath hegam mo hab junihim g chickpan, chum hems g Jiosh pionag.
Pi g ab hu kaiham g ha'ichu abchutha ab hema i ha ab ihtham kekel, heg hi wa mat gohk o waik hab wo chei mo si s-ap s-mahch ha'ichu ab ha amjed, mt am haha wo i mamche.
Am apt hemajkam ha kailith k wo si s-ha keh'el hegam mat hedam pi gm hu wo thagito g pi ap'ekam. T hab masma wo s-e gihugath ha'i ehp.

Am g wehs wepo masma hab ha juhni ihtham mani m-shelinith k pi hedai sha'i gm hu wo i gawulkai. Ith ani si s-bahbagi ab m-chehani am ha tahgio g Jiosh ch Jesus ch am ha tahgio g hekia s-ap'ekam anghil.
Pi g am wabsh si s-e hohtkith mapt am wo hema i kei mat wo chikpani g Jiosh. Tp hems d pi ap chu'ijkam. Kut d wo m-chu'ichig mapt s-hohtam am i kei.

Ha'i o g pi ap ha-chu'ichig am tasho e neith. Kum s-ap s-mahch ch pi woho am hu wo i ha chuhcha ihtham. K wabshaba ha'ijj pi am hu tasho e neith g ha-chu'ichig. Mt heg hekaj am wo si i ha mamche mamt hedai am wo i ha chuhcha. (25) K hab wa masma g s-kehg ha-chikpan am tasho e neith. Chum as hi wa pi am hu i si tasho ch wabshaba pi wo ehsto g s-kehg ha-chikpan imhab i ba'ich. (23) Neh, s-e g nen'oithk, Timothy. Pi o kehgaj g shuhthagi amai. Kupt am wo sha'al wehnath g nawait. T hab pi wo m-mumkichuthath hegai shuhthagi.
Hegam wohochuththam mo d nenehol at ab wo si has ha elithath g e-a'amo. T heg hekaj pi hedai wo has ahgath g Jiosh ch pi wo has ahgath g t-mashchama.

Hegam mo g ha-a'amo hab wa'ap d wohochuththam at ba'ich ab wo i si has ha elithath ch ba'ich i s-ap wo ha chikpani nat pi g ha-chikpan d wo ha-ap'ethagk g ha-wehm wohochuththam. Ith apt hemho wa wo i ha mashcham k hekaj wo ha mihshmath mani wa m-ahgith.

Ho o wabsh chum si e hahaschuth ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu mahchim hegam mat hedai i pi heg hekaj wo ha mashcha t-kownalig Jesus Christ mashchama. Heg o d wohokam t-mashchama ch am t-tashogith g s-ap'ekam himthag. K ihtham wabsh tatchua mat wo ha ne'owinath ch wo ha kawnith. Ith o wabsh i wahmuth g hehgamthag ch bagatalig ch pi ap has ahgadag.
Kut hegam wo ha kawhainath matp hedam pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch pi mahch g wohokam ch hab chum elith mat g o'othham wo s-e kaisch ith hekaj t-himthag.
K wabshaba ith d s-wohokam s-t-kaisthag matt wo himath g s-ap'ekam ch wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath, chum achs pi ha'ichu wo edgithath.
Pi ach ha'ichu sha'i u'ath ch in mahsi ith thahm jewed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i be k wo hih.
Heg o am wa chum s-ap'e am t-wehhejed matt ab wo wa al he'es ha'ichu ko'ath ch ab s-ap wo t-enigadathch.
Hegam mo s-e kaischuthamk at heg hekaj hab wo s-junim g pi ap'ekam. T g ha-tatchui gm hu hab wo i ha juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Kut ha'i ep wo ha padch.

Nahnko mahs pi ap'ekam o ab shohshon heg amjed mat hema heg wa'i lialkaj wo si pihk e elithath. Ha'i at heg hekaj im hu hab i e juh ab amjed g e-wohochuthadag k oi wa mu'i ha'ichu pi ap tahhathkam ab nako.

Pi g hab masma hab e juhni mo hegam mani am ha ahg nap pi d Jiosh chikpanthamga. Ith apt eda am wo i e nako s-ap'ekam ch e-wohochuthadag ch pihk elithadag ch ha'ichu nakogadag ch hemajimatalig mapt wo wepo chu'igk mo g Jiosh.

Am g si e gewkath wehhejed g Jiosh k wo s-wihnam u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag mapt hekaj am wo i wah Jiosh kihthag ed hab masma mat g s-melithkam hab wo e juh mat wo ha gehg. Ith at hekaj ab i m-bei g Jiosh mapt wa am si s-kehg ah g e-wohochuthadag am mu'i hemajkam ha kaichuthk.

Bapt wabsh masma hab wo e juh matsh wa g t-kownalig Jesus natsh pi heg s-ap ah g wohokam am tahgio hegai ge'e kownal mo hab chehgig Pontius Pilate. Kupt wehs am hab wo juh ihtha mani m-ahgith k ab wo ai mat ab ep wo i hih g Jesus. T hab pi hedai ab hu ha'ichu wo m-chu'ichigch. Ith ani ab si m-chehani am tahgio g Jesus ch am tahgio g Jiosh. Jiosh o ab ha mahkch g thoakag wehs ha'ichu thothakam ch ab ep wo i m-wehmt mapt hab wo juh g ni-chehanig.
Jesus at ia ep wo i e chehgi heg i tash ed mo kehshch g Jiosh. Jiosh o si s-hemajima ch wehs ha'ichu nuhkuth ch d kownal wehs ha thahm g kokownal.

ch pi hekith ha mumkku. Pi o hedai neith ch pi hedai wo e nako mas wo nei. An o ha'ichug hab mahs tonlig ch ed mat pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo miabi. Pi at hekith wo huhug g gewkthaj. Kutt ab wo si has elithath chum hekith. Neh, bo masma.

Ab g i ha chehani hegam mo d s-kakais mat pi wo si e hahaschuthath heg hekaj ha'ichu e-eniga ch pi ab hu wo hiwgath ch wabshaba ab wo hiwgath g Jiosh. Heg o wud mo s-ba'ama ab t-mahk wehs ha'ichu mach haschu i hekaj s-ap t-tahtk.
Ab g i ha chehani mat am hab wo i junihi g s-kehg chikpan ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmta k pi wo chu tha'ath ch wo ha'ichu ha ho'ithath g sho'igkam. Ith o d woho s-kaisthag.
Bo masma heg wa wepo mo e to'ithahim g s-namkig ha'ichu an thahm kahchim ch ed hekaj wo si s-ap tahtkkath chum hekith.

Si g s-ap nuhkuth hegai mamt ab m-nuhkuthach. Pi g am hu ha wehmajk hegam mo wabsh pehegi e ne'owin heg hekaj mo hab chum elith mo d ha'ichu mahchig. Ith at pi wo sha'i i t-wehmajk matt ba'ich i s-ap wo s-mai g Jiosh.
Ha'i o hab chum e ahg mo edgith ihtha mahchig ch oi wa wabsh heb hu wua g e-wohochuthadag. Neh, Jiosh at wo wa s-m-ho'ige'el.

Ni-wehnag Timothy: Ia ant ep wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ. Tho Jiosh tatchui mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj. T hab wo bei g wechij thoakag hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ab amjed g alithaj hab masma mash wa heki hu hab kaij matsh hab wo e juh.
Ab g ni-kaiham ahpi map d ni-alithag t-wohochuthadag ed. Ab o wa si s-m-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i m-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.

Chum ani hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh mani hekith i ni-ho'ige'ithahun m-wehhejed. Jiosh ash wa am ha tashogith g t-shohshon matt has masma wo himath g t-thoakag ch ab wo si has elithath. Kuni hab masma hab ni-wua ch hab pi sha'i ni-kudut.
P ahpi hab wa'ap ab s-wohochuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. Kuni s-chegito mapt si pi ap e taht mant hekith am i m-thagito. Kuni s-m-neithamk mapt ep wo si s-hehgigk.
Am apt ha oithk hab e juh g e-hu'ul Lois ch e-je'e Eunice mapt ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Pt wo s-chegito matt ab toa g t-nohnhoi m-ab k am m-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahu. T g Jiosh ab m-mah g gewkthag k am m-chehgi mapt has i mahs chikpan hab wo junihith wehhejed. Pegih, pt wo i e gewkath k am hab wo junihith.

Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat an wo t-u'ukchith ch ab wo t-mahkchith g gewkthag ch pihk elithadag ch thotholimadag ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj. Kutt heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath.

Pegih, pt pi has wo e elithath am wehhejed neokch g t-kownalig Jesus ch hab wa masma pi has wo e elithath ab ni-amjed mani wehhejed d lihso. Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag matt am wehhejed wo t-sho'igch. Kupt wo si nako g e-sho'igthag am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj.

Tho Jiosh mat t-tho'ibia ab pi ap'ekam t amjed. Pi att has masma has wo t-juh k wo t-tho'ibia. Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i ap'ech mat wo s-t-ho'ige'el am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus Christ matt d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak.

Ia at jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ k am i t-tashogi g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag. Kah att g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k s-mai matt has masma s-ap am wo gahi wuwha g muhkig edgithch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.
Jiosh at am i ni-kei mant wo ahgachugath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ch wo ha mashchamath.

Kuni heg hekaj hab mu'i ni-sho'igchuth ch pi sha'i has ni-elith ith amjed nani pi s-mahch hegai mani ab s-wohochuth. T heg wo e nako mat s-ap wo ni-nuhkuthath mant wehs am hab wo juh mat haschu wehhejed ab i ni-gawulkai k ab wo ai mat ep wo jiwia.
Ab ani m-mashcham mo has chu'ig g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kupt heg wo wa'i ahgahith nap pi heg s-wohochuth ch ab si tatchua g Christ ch d hemako heg wehm.
Am o t-eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag. Kutt hekaj am wo si s-ap nuhkuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh.
Am ap wa s-mahch mat ia wabsh i ni-thagito hegam mo ab Asia t amjed ia ni-wehmajkahim, chum wa g Phygelus ch Hermogenes.

K wabshaba g Onesiphorus pi has e elith mani d lihso ch an i ni-gahghi ia jiwiak Rome kihhim t am am hugkam mat ni-cheh k mu'ikko ia i ni-chehgimed k ab ni-mamka g s-ap tahhathkam. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat ba'ich ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam Onesiphorus.
Jiosh at wo wa s-ho'ige'el g Onesiphorus heg i tash ed matt ab wo nam g Jiosh. S-mahch ap mat he'es ha'ichu s-ap am hab ni-juni g Onesiphorus amai Ephesus kihhim t am.
Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab t-mahkch g gewkthag ahchim matt ab i t-hemakoch g Jesus Christ wehm. Kuni heg hekaj m-ahgith mapt s-gegokim wo himath g e-chikpan wehhejed.
Mu'i hemajkam ani ha mihshmath m-kaichuthch. Kupt ahpi epai wo ha mashcha hegam mat am wo i e nakog k ha'ijj epai wo ha mashcha ihtha.
Neh, bapt masma wo e sho'igch mat g shonthal am hab junihithch g e-chikpan am wehhejed g Jesus Christ.
S-mahch ap mat g shonthal wehs hab wo junihith hegai mat g uhgchugaj ab wo cheha ch pi ha'ichu wo hiwigi mas wo shohbi. Kupt ahpi hab wa'ap wo masmak am wehhejed g Jiosh.
S-mahch ap mat g s-melithkam pi ab hu wo bei g e-gehgewi heg hi wa mat am hab wo junihith g ha-chehanig. Kupt ahpi hab wa'i masma wo bei g e-gehgewi mapt am Jiosh tatchui oithk hab wo e junihith.
Hegai mo si chikpan g e-esha at wehpeg ab wo ui g e-oda mat wo bai. Kupt ahpi hab wa'ap ab ha'ichu wo i nei am chikpank g Jiosh wehhejed.
Am g i oithahim ihtha mani m-ahgith. T g Jiosh am wo i m-wehmt mapt wo s-amich.

Jesus Christ o hab wa'ap d o'othham ch ab s-ap nakog g sho'igthag. T g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath heg i thahm mat muh. Tho ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mani am ahgachug. Kupt am wo oithahith mat haschu ab nako g Christ ch s-ap ab wo nako g e-sho'igthag.

Ni ahni hab wa'ap ni-sho'igchuth am ahgachugch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga hask mam ep ge ni-wulshch g e hukshchim wapainomikaj hab masma mantp d si pi ap hemajkam. K wabshaba g Jiosh ne'oki pi e wulshch.

Am ani wabsh i ni-thagitokch mantp haschu ab wo i nako ha wehhejed hegam mat g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat wo e tho'ibia. Ihtham at ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. T g Jiosh chum hekith ab wo si has ha elithath.
Tho si wohokam ihtha hab ha-che'i: Chum att hekith d wo thothakamk g Christ wehm mach hedai ab i t-thagitokch wui nat pi t-wehhejed muh.

T heg ab wo t-hiwigi matt wo i wehmt am eda g kownaltaligaj ahchim matt an wo u'ukchith g t-wohochuthadag am t-sho'igthag ed. T wabshaba im hu hab wo i e juh ab ha amjed hegam mat wo thagito g e-wohochuthadag.
Hemho wa at am hab wo juh mo has i kaij. Kut pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab t-amjed, heg hi wa mattp wo thagito g t-wohochuthadag.
Am g i ha chegitochuth ihtha mani wa m-ahgith k ab ha shohbith g Jiosh gewkthagkaj mat pi wabsh pehegi wo neneokath ch pi wo e cheggiath. Ith at wo ha padch hegam mat wo kaiha.
Am g si i e nakog mapt d wo si s-ap piongajk g Jiosh ch si s-ap am wo ha mashchamath g Jiosh wohokam mapt pi wo sha'i si e elithath.

Ha'i at thagito g wohokam k ha mashcham mat heki hu ab i wuwha g ko'i muhkig amjed. Gohkajj ihtham mo ith hekaj ha iattogith o d Hymanaeus ch Phyletus. K g ha-mashchama padchuth g ha-wohochuthadag hab masma mat g pi kehg hihwthag wo em-cheawuagi. Pi g ha wehm a'agath g ha-mashchama. Gm at hu hab wo i m-juh ab amjed g Jiosh.

T wabshaba g Jiosh s-wihnam shondath g e-ne'oki mat pi hedai wo sha'i gawul juh. K an o'ohanas: Jiosh o s-ha mahch mo hedai woho ab s-wohochuth. K an ep o'ohanas: Matp hedai hab wo chei mo d Jiosh hemajkamga k hemho wa gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g pi ap'ekam.

Neh, matp hems am wo ha'ichugk g nahnko mahs hohashaha'a am s-kais kih ed. Tp hems ha'i d wo ohlak ch ha'i d wo plahtak ch ha'i d wo uhsk ch ha'i d wo bithk. Kut wo e hekaj hegam mo s-namkig ha wehhejed g s-has haha'ichu. T g pi namkigchu wabsh chum has masma wo e hekaj.
Pegih, t g Jiosh hab wa masma si s-has ha'ichukaj wo t-hekaj mattp hedai wo t-kegchuthch ab amjed g pi ap'ekam natt pi wo t-nahtokch ch wo i t-gawulkathch wehhejed.

Pegih, pi g am i e thagito pi ap'ekam ch ed k am s-ap wo i e gewkathch s-ap'ekam k ed ch am hab wo junihith mapt haschu wo ha ahgi ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab ha wui g e-wehm wohochuththam. T hegam mo ab ihm g Jiosh ch s-ap ha'ichu chegito m-wehm hab wo masmak.
Bant ep wo chei mapt pi wo ha ne'owi hegam mat wabsh wo has hu kaijjith ch pi e mahch ch e ne'owin. S-mahch ap mat ith am wabsh wo ha u'apa kawhaina ch ed.
Jiosh pionag at pi wo chum ha kawhainath ch wabsh wo si s-hemajimak ab wehs ha wui ch wo si s-ap ha mashchamath
ch si s-hemajim wo ha shohbithath hegam mat ab wui wo gegokiwua ch wo ha mashchamath. Tp hems ab wo ha mah g Jiosh g ap'ethag mat wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo s-mai g wohokam.
T hab masma uhpam wo bei g s-ap e-chegitoithag k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g Jiawul.
Si g s-chegitok mat wehs ha'ichu wo s-hasigk mat d wo i ha oithch tatshk.

Hemajkam at wo s-chu tha'ath ch wo si pihk e elithath g lialkaj ch wo chum si e hahaschuthath. Mu'i hemajkam at wo a'ai s-ko'okam has e ahgath ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodgithath g s-ap'ekam. Mu'i at wo has ahgath g Jiosh. T g a'al pi ab hu wo wohog ha elithath g e-ge'egedga.
Mu'i hemajkam at wo pi a'amdagk ch pi hedai ha hekaj wo pihk e elithath ch ha'ichu wo e iattogithath ab a'ai e amjed ch wo s-ta ehbithamak ch wo s-ta keke'ithamak. Mu'i at wo s-ohhothath g s-ap'ekam.
Mu'i at pi ab hu wo ha tatchuath hegam mo d chum ha-naipijju ch has am wabsh wo si e wuath ch pi ab hu wo tatchuath g Jiosh ch wabshaba g pi kehg s-tahhathkam ab wo tatchuath.
Hemajkam at hi wo wa e mihshmethath ch wabsh pi wo wohochuthath hegai mo haschu ab chum kah ch im hu hab wabsh wo i juh g Jiosh gewkthag. Pi g am hu ha wehmajk ihtham hab mahs hemajkam.
Ha'i at am wabsh ep wo si i wahpkath ha-kihki ed ch wo s-ap ha iattogi g u'uwi. T hegam mo pi gewkpthag am e-wohochuthadag ed ab wo ha kaihamath no pi tatchua g pi ap'ekam ch e kudut g e-chu'ichigkaj
ch pi mahch g wohokam, chum as hems hi wa chum s-mahchimk.
Hegam mo ha iattogith o ab wui gegok g wohokam hab masma mo wa Jannesbad ch Jambresbad ab wui gegok g Mosesbad. Ho o wabsh pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch d ep hegam mat pi e nako am Jesus wohochuthadag ed.
T wabshaba wehsijj wo s-mai mo pi ha'ichu a'amichuth hab masma mat wa am hab e juh ha tahgio g Jannesbad ch Jambresbad. Kut heg hekaj pi wo e nako mat ge'e ha'ichu wo padch.

P wabshaba ahpi hig am oith g ha'ichu ni-mashchama ch ha'ichu hab ni-juni ch ha'ichu hab ni-elitha. S-mahch ap mani haschu ab s-wohochuth ch has masma ab i s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch pihk ni-elith ha hekaj ch nakog ha'ichu.
S-mahch ap mam ni-sho'igchuth. Kuni mu'i ha'ichu s-ko'ok nakog. S-mahch ap mant mu'i ha'ichu nako am Antiok t am ch Iconium t am ch Lystra t am. T wabshaba g Jiosh ni-tho'ibia wehs amjed ihtha.
Kupt ahpi hab wa'ap wo e sho'igch natt pi wehs wo t-sho'igch ahchim mach tatchua matt am wo oithath g s-ap'ekam thoakag ab si i t-thagitok Jesus wui.
T wo i e gewpkai g pi ap'ekam ch s-chu i'attomkam k ba'ich wo i ha iattogithath g hemajkam ch hejel wo e iattogithath.
Tt wabshaba ab i m-mashcha g wohokam. Kupt ab si s-gewkam i s-wohochuth k wo s-wihnam u'ukchith s-mahchch matt hedai m-mashcha.
S-mahch ap map ga hu i e-alijk amjed ab kaiham g Jiosh o'ohana. K ith d hegai map amjed ab bekch g e-amichuthadag. Kupt hekaj ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ k e tho'ibia.

Ab o tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegai mo g Jiosh tatchua mat an wo e o'ohan k d wo t-mashchamak. K heg wehs d i t-wehmtadag matt hekaj a'ai wo t-mashcham k wo s-mahchk g wohokam ch wo shohbithath g pi t-ap'ekam ch am wo i t-shelinith matt has masma s-ap wo himchuthath g t-thoakag.
Kutt heg hekaj wo s-ap t-nahtokch ahchim mach ab ihm g Jiosh matt am hab wo juh wabsh chum has mahs s-kehg chikpan wehhejed.
Jesus at am s-ap wo i nahto g e-kownaltalig ia ep jiwiak k wo ha lothai wehs hemajkam, chum hems hegam mat eda d wabsh wo kia thothakamk. Heg ani hekaj si m-chehani am tahgio g Jiosh

mapt am wo si ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k am wo si e gewkathch mapt am wo ahgath wabsh chum hekith ch pi am hu wo chum ge nenidath mat hekith am wo s-apkot mapt am wo ahgath. Ab g i ha shohbith pi ap'ekam amjed k am i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam wabsh s-bahbgim ha mashchamch.
Ab o him g tash mat wo i mu'itha hegam mat gawul ha'ichu wo ha mashcha. Kut mu'i hemajkam ab wo s-ha kaim
k g wohokam mashchama wo thagito k ab wo hiwgath g hoho'oki a'agitha.
Pt wabshaba ahpi wo si s-e nen'oithk ch wo s-e chegitok wehs ha'ichu k ed ch ab wo nako g sho'igthag. Am g wehs hab juhni g e-chikpan am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga nap pi d piongaj g Jiosh.
Ahni at hi e ai g ni-tashga mant wo ni-muhkith.
S-ap ant nahto g ni-chikpan am s-gewkam i oithk hab masma mo g s-melithkam am si i e nakog mat wo bei g s-ap'ekam e-gehgewi.

K heg am wa'i wi'is mant wo bei g s-ap'ekam ni-gehgewi nani pi g s-ap'ekam am hab junihim. Jiosh alithag o d s-ap'ekam usagakam ch ab wo i ni-mah ihtha mat hekith ep wo jiwia k ab wo i t-gawulkai ge'e lothaita ch ed. Kut wehsijj hab wa'ap ab wo bei g e-gehgewi hegam mo hedai ab si pihk e elith hekaj g Jiosh alithag ch nenida mat ep wo jiwia.
Am g i e nakog k s-hohtam ab i ni-chehgimed

nant pi hejel ia wih. Crescens at gm hu hih Galasia jewed wui. T g Titus gm hu hih Dalmasia jewed wui. Demas at ab si tatchua g jewed t ab ha'ichu k ia wabsh i ni-thagito k gm hu hih Thessalonica wui.
Heg o wa'i Luke ia ni-chechga. Ab apt wo i bek g Mark. T am wo i ni-wehmt ith eda chikpan.
Ab ant cheha g Tychicus mat am wo hih Ephesus kihhim wui.
Ab g i ni-behith g ni-lihwa ch ni-o'ohana, wahm hegam mant hejel o'oha. Ab ant nuhkuthach g Carpus amai Troas kihhim t am.
S-ko'okam at wa has ni-thohththa hegai Alexander mo d hihliyo. T g Jiosh wo wa mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
Neh, pt wo si s-e nen'oithath ab amjed no pi sha'i si wui kehk g ha'ichu t-ahga.
Hegam mat wo chum i ni-wehmt at ia wabsh i ni-thagito mamt wa wehpeg ni-lothai. Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo ha abch ihtha.

Jiosh at wa i ni-wehmt k ab i ni-mah g gewkthag. Nt hekaj hab ni-nako mant am s-ap ah g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha wui hegam mo am ha'ichug nahnko mahs hemajkam. T ab i ni-tho'ibia mamt pi am hu ni-wua maipith ha wui
k hab wa'ap wo ni-tho'ibia ab wehs amjed g pi ap'ekam ha'ichu k an wo ni-u'apa thahm kahchim ch ed. Ab att wo si has elithath g Jiosh chum hekith. Neh, ith o wa'i si.
Am apt wo ha ahgi g Priscilla ch Aquila ch hegam Onesiphorus wehm kihkam mat ab wo i s-ni-ho'ige'el.
Ga at hu wih g Erastus Corinth kihhim t am. Nt g Trophimus ga hu wuiok Miletus kihhim t am nat pi mumku.
Am g i e nakog k ab wo i hih mat koi wo e ai g s-hehpich'edkam. Ihtham wehsijj o ab s-em-ho'ige'ith Eubulus ch Pudens ch Linus ch Claudia ch wehsijj g t-wehm wohochuththam iia.
Neh, am at wo wa em-wehmajk g t-kownalig Jesus. T g Jiosh wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.

Ni-wehnag Titus: Am ant wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d Jiosh pionag ch m-ahgi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj. S-mahch ap mat g Jesus Christ am i ni-kei mant ith wo ahgachugath. K hab d elithaj mant am wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mat g Jiosh ab i ha gawulkai mat d wo hemajkamgajk. T hab wo i gewka g ha-wohochuthadag. T ba'ich wo i mai ihtha wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh.
Bo kaij g Jiosh mat eda pi koi ha'ichu sha'i nahto matsh ab wo ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch.
T hemu am i e ai mat s-ap maskogi g ha'ichu e-ahga.

Kupt ab i s-wohoch ab ni-ab k hahawa wepogithas map d ni-alithag. Ab o wa si s-m-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i m-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam.

Am ant i m-thagito Crete jewed t am mapt am wo i ap'ech mo haschu koi ap'echuthas am ha sha'ashagith hegam mo hemiap e mihshmath. Am apt wo i ha chuhcha wehs kihhim ed hegam mat wo ha wanimedath mani wa ith heki hu m-chehani. Kunt am wo i m-chegitoch mat has wo chum masmak.

That wo si s-ap o'othhamk ch hemako wo hohnigk ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk. T g ha-a'aliga hemho wa d wo wohochuththamk ch ab wo ha kaihamath g e-ge'egedga. T hab pi hedai wo e nako mas ab wo ha'ichu ha abch.
Pi o hab chu'ig mas g ha wanimedtham wo ge e haschuthath o s-hohtam wo babgatath o wo nawkko'oth o wo ha cheggiath o mu'i ha'ichu wo si s-behimkkath.
K wabshaba hab chu'ig mat wo s-thotholimak ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch chum hekith wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo tatchua g i wehmtadag.
Am ap ha mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Kut ith an wo si u'ukchith mat heg hekaj wo i ha gewkemhunath g hemajkam ch wo i ha shohbithath hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Heki at hu mu'i i wuwha hegam mo chum s-keshwuimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha iattogith g hemajkam ch heg hekaj ab ha wanchkwup mat wo ui g lial, wahm hegam mo d ni-wepo Tutuligo o'othham. Kumt heg hekaj wehs e wehm am wo i ha shohbi.
Hema ash hab kaij g s-chu amichuththam am Crete t am, “Ahchim Crete t am o'othham ach s-chu i'attomk ch s-ta keke'ithama ch s-papadma ch wehs ha'ichu si s-behimk.”
Woho o wa mo has i kaij. Kupt heg hekaj si s-gewkam wo i ha shohbi. T hab ab wo m-kaiham k ab wo s-wohochuthath g wohokam.
Pt wo ha ahgi mat pi wo wohochuthath g Tutuligo ha-hoho'oki a'agitha ch hegai mo d wabsh ha-chehanig hegam mo pi tatchua g wohokam.

Wehs o s-kehgaj g Jiosh ha'ichu nahtoi am ha wehhejed hegam mo s-kehg ha'ichu chegitoithag. K wabshaba pi ha'ichu s-kehgaj am ha wehhejed hegam mo pi kehg ha'ichu chegitoithag ch pi wohochuth g wohokam no pi g pi kehg ha'ichu ha-chegitoithag wehs ha'ichu padchuth ha wehhejed. K pi has ab hu sha'i tahhathag g ha-i'ibthag mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam.

Ihtham o hab kaij mo s-mahch g Jiosh ch wabshaba hab e wua mo pi mahch no pi s-ta keke'ithama ch pi chechkaithag. K g ha-thoakag pi kehg hab mahs. K pi ab hu sha'i ha ab ulini mas hab wo juh g s-ap'ekam.
Kupt wabshaba ahpi am wo ha mashcha g wohochuththam mat has wo e junihith ch hekaj wo e chehgithath mo s-kehgaj g Jiosh mashchamadag.

Pt wo ha ahgi g kekel o'othham mat d wo si o'othhamk ch pi wabsh wo i e wahmuth k wabshaba wabsh wo i e bahbgi wehs ha'ichu k ed. T wabsh shelinim wo oithath g e-wohochuthadag ch wo pihk e elithath ab wehs ha wui ch s-e tahtk ch ab wo nakogath ha'ichu.
Kupt hab wa'ap wo ha ahgi g o'oki mat wo s-thotholimak ch wo e chehgithch mo am oithch hab e junihim g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi wo pi kehg neneokath ab hedai k amjed.
T g wechij u'uwi ab ha amjed wo mai mat has wo chum masmak ch ab wo i ha tatchuath g e-wehm kihkam ch e-a'aliga
ch wo e nuhkuthath mat pi hab wo wuath g pi ap'ekam ch wo si s-wapagimak am e-kihthag ed ch ab wo ha wohog elithath g e-wehm kihkam. T hab pi hedai has wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Kupt hab wa'ap wo ha ahgi g wihpiop mat d wo si o'othhamk.
Chum apt hekith hab wo wuath g s-ap'ekam ch hab masma wo ha chehgi mat has wo chum e junihith.
Kupt ab wo si has elithath g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh ch heg wo wa'i ha mashchamath. T hab wo si e elithath hegam mo ab wui gegok g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi wo e nako mas has wo m-ahgath.
Ab g ha ahgith wabsh chum hedai ha-pionag mat ab wo kaihamath g e-ahmo ch pi ab hu wo ne'owinath
ch pi ha'ichu wo ehsithath ch wabshaba wo e chehgithahith mo s-ap d pion. Kut heg amjed am wo i e tashogi mo s-ap'e g ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh matt heg hekaj t-tho'ibia.
Jiosh o wehs s-ha ho'ige'ith g hemajkam ch hab juh g tho'ibiathag chum wehs ha wehhejed. T ith am wabsh s-ap i e chehgi.
Kutt heg hekaj wo s-ohhoth g pi ap'ekam k wo t-nuhkuth matt hab wo wuath g s-ap'ekam ch ab wo si ha'ichuch g Jiosh ith eda jewed.
Batt wo masmak nach pi nenida mach haschu s-wohochuth mat ia ep wo jiwia k si s-tondam wo e chehgi hegai mo d t-Jioshga ch d t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ.
Heg at am i e thagito mat s-ko'okam e muhkith k hekaj t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam k i t-kegch mach d hahawa si hemajkamgaj k si tatchua matt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.

Pegih, am g si ha ahgith wehs ihtha k i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam k ep i ha shohbith mat hedai hab wo i wuath g pi ap'ekam. Pi at hedai wo chum pi m-ha'ichuchuthath nap pi gewkthag mapt ith am hab wo junihith.

Pt am wo ha ahgithath g wohochuththam mat has wo chum masmak. T wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-kokownalig ch am oithk hab wo e junihith g chehanig ch chum hekith wo e nahtokchith mat wo s-ap chikpanath ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.
Am g ha ahgith mat pi wo pi kehg neneokath ab hedai i amjed ch wabshaba wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ch wo si s-hemajimak ab wehs ha wui.

Neh, heki ach hu wa hab masmakahim mo hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh. Pi ach wa ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ch pi ha'ichu amichuth ch hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam ch pi a'amdag ch s-chu hehgamk. Ha'i o s-t-keh'ith. Kuch ab epai s-ha keh'ith.
K wabshaba g t-tho'ibiakam Jiosh si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ia i e chehgi jewed thahm

mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. Pi at hedai wo e nako mas wo e tho'ibia g hejel ha'ichu hab e-junikaj. T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i s-t-ho'ige'ith k gm hu wako g pi ap t-chu'ichig matt wo edagi g wechij thoakag. Heg at hekaj ia jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ jewed thahm k heg hekaj ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o am t-eda ch ab t-mahkch hegai wechij thoakag.
Jesus Christ o ab s-t-ho'ige'ith ch am i t-ap'ech matt wo s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio. Kuch heg hekaj edgith ihtha wechij thoakag ch hab am wehmaj wo kihkath chum hekith am i thahm matt wo koi.

Tho wohokam ihtha mani haschu m-ahgith. Kupt chum hekith am wo ha ahgithath g wohochuththam. T hekaj wo e nuhkuth mat wo s-wapagimak ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Ith at d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g hemajkam.
Kupt pi wo ha ne'owinath hegam mo wabsh pehegi ha'ichu m-kaiam ch am chum m-pip'ichuth ab amjed g Tutuligo ha-chehanig ch chum ge e haschuth ch hab kaij mo ab d ha amjedkam g si s-has haha'ichu.
Gokko apt wo s-ha tha'i hegam mat hedai wo chum a'ai ha ga'agwulkai g wohochuththam. Hegam mat pi ab hu wo m-kaiha o pi ap'e. T g pi ap ha-chu'ichig am wo ha chehgi. Kumt wabsh wo ha thagito.
Ia o ni-wehm thadha g Artemas ch Tychicus. Kunt ihtham am hema wo i kei mat am m-wui wo jiwia. Kupt am haha wo hih Nicopolis kihhim wui mapt am wo ni-wehmajk nant pi am wo thakath s-hehpich'ed.
Kah ani mash am m-wehm tha hegai Zenas mo d chehanig hudawogtham ch atsh am hebai wo ha mihshmetham g Apollos wehm. Kupt he'es wo i e nakog k am wo i ha wehmt mat pi ha'ichu wo pi edagi.
Bat wo wa chum masmak g wohochuththam mat hab wa'ap wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo hab masma tatchua g i wehmtadag.
Wehsijj o am i m-ho'ige'ith ihtham t-wehm wohochuththam mo ia kih. Am g wehsijj i ha ho'ige'ith g t-wehm wohochuththam amai. Jiosh at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.

Ni-wehnag, Philemon: Ia ani kuhpi ahni Paul nani pi ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ. K ia ni-wehmaj g Timothy ch ab s-em-ho'ige'ith. Am ant ha'ichu wo m-o'ohani, Philemon, s-chegitokch map wa s-ap i t-wehmaj ith eda chikpan.
Kupt ith am wo ne'okchul Aphia wui ch heg wui Archipus mo wa t-wehm ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, pej wehs ha wui hegam mo am em-wehm e mihshmath em-kih am.
Ab o si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh ch t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch g s-ap tahhathkam.

Ab apsh wabsh kia si hiwig g t-kownalig Jesus ch si pihk e elith ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam. (7) Sh hegam ab si i e gewkemhun ab neithch map s-ap ha'ichu hab ha junith. Ni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk (4) ch ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab tahni mat ba'ich wo i m-wehmt hemu. (6) Pt hab ba'ich ab wo i chehgi map ge'e edgith g s-ap'ekam ab ihmch g Jesus Christ.
Ab o ni-mahkch g Christ g gewkthag mant ab wo ha'ichu em-cheha ahpim mam ab ihm.

Nt wabshaba ab wabsh wo i m-gewkemhu mapt ha'ichu hab wo ni-juni heg wabsh hekaj map si pihk e elith t-hekaj. Thani keli hemu ch ia kuhpi Jesus Christ wehhejed. Kupt ab wo si pihk e el ni-wui k hekaj hab wo juh g ni-tatchui.
Ia o ni-wehmaj ihtha m-neholiga mo hab chehgig Onesimus. Ni am ahgith ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus. T ab i s-wohoch. K heg wa wepo mo d ni-alithag am t-wohochuthadag ed.
Heki ash hu s-padmam chikpan m-wehhejed ch wabshaba hemu s-wagimam chikpan mo hab masma hab d ahga g chehgigaj ch hab ha'ichu ni-junith am m-wehhejed.
Ab ani chehani mat am uhpam ep wo hih m-wui. Kupt hab masma ab wo neithath mo d ni-alithag.

Chum ani hi wa tatchua mat ia wo i ni-wehmt m-wehhejed mani ia kuhpi ch ahg g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh. K wabshaba pi hab chum chu'ig manis wo m-wohppo'i g m-pionag. Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mat hejel hab wo i e ah mapt has masma wo i ni-wehmt.
Tho heb hu himkam ihtha m-pionag al he'es i tash. Kuki wabshaba hab d elithaj g Jiosh mat hab masma wo e chehg k d haha wo m-wehm wohochuththamk chum hekith.
Tho si t-wehnag, wahm ahpi, no pi d m-pionag ch am i thahm d hahawa m-wehm wohochuththam.
Bap masma hab ni-elith mani d si m-wehnag, pegih, k ch hab wa masma hab wo elithath g Onesimus mat d wo si m-wehnagk.
Ab atsh m-wui pi ap chu'i. Kupt wabshaba ahni ab wo ni-mohto'i.
Ahni ant wo m-namkith heg hekaj, chum aps ahpi ab ni-ab e wulshch nant pi am m-wui u'apa g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mapt hekaj e tho'ibia.
Pegih, pt hab masma hab wo elithath g Onesimus mat d wo m-wehnagk. Ith at ab wo si i ni-gewkemhu am wehhejed g Jiosh alithag.
Ith ant am i m-o'ohani s-mahchch mapt ba'ich i thahm ha'ichu hab wo ni-juni mani m-tahni.
Jiosh at ab wo kaiha g em-ho'ige'ithahuna k ab wo i ni-wuhshath ab amjed g kukpaikud. Nt am ep wo i em-chehgim. Kumt heg hekaj am wo i ap'ech g kih ni-wehhejed.
Ia o ep ni-wehm kuhpi g Epaphras ch s-m-ho'ige'ith.
K ia ep thadha g Mark ch Aristarcas ch Demas ch Luke ch hab wa'ap s-m-ho'ige'ith.
T-kownalig Jesus Christ at wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el.
Heki atsh hu am ha'i i ha chuhcha g Jiosh g t-shohshonbad matsh am wo amogath g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kush ihtham Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam he'es am al i ha tashogith g Jiosh a'ahithag oitham.

Kutsh g Jiosh am hahawa i kei g e-alithag. Tsh ith ia i wuhsh jewed thahm k si s-ap t-tashogith g Jiosh. Ith o wud matsh g Jiosh gd hu i si wehpeg am i kei matsh wehs ha'ichu wo nahto. K heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu d enigaj.

Kutsh eda ia jiwia k e sho'igchuth k e muhkith matsh gm hu hab wo i juh g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mach d pi ap chu'ijkam. Tsh g Jiosh ab hahawa uhpam ep i be k an thai si e-hugith an. Kush si s-kehg s-masma am e chehgithch g s-has ha'ichuthaj mash woho si wepo chu'ig g e-ohg ch wehs an u'ukch g e-nahtoi matsh an s-ap hab wo chu'igk.
Neh, bo wa masma am e chehgithch mo ith d alithaj g Jiosh. K heg hekaj tasho mo ba'ich d i si s-has ha'ichu mo hi g anghil.

Jiosh ash pi hekith hema g anghil hab ahg mo d alithaj ch wabshaba hab kaij ith wui: Ni-alithag, hemu ant am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam map ahpi d wa'i ni-alithag. Kush hab ep kaij: That wo ni-alithagk ch am wo i wuhsh jewed thahm.
K an ep o'ohanas mash hab kaij: Wehs g anghil at hemho wa ab wo hehgchulithath.
K an ep o'ohanas: Anghil o ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgaj hab sha masma mo g hewel ch mei.
Kush wabshaba g Jiosh alithag am wehmaj wehs ha'ichu thahm. Kush g Jiosh ab wui hab kaij: Thap Jiosh. Kut pi hebai wo ha hugk g m-kownaltalig mani ab m-hiwgith. K g m-chehanig chum hekith s-ap'e.
S-hohho'ith ap g s-ap'ekam ch g pi ap'ekam pi hohho'ith Nt heg hekaj am i m-kehsh k ab m-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig wehs ha ba'iwechkim.
Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ch hab ep kaij ab wui: Ni-Kehsha, am apt nahto g jewed kahchim ch thahm kahchim.
T heg wehs wo hekit k gm hu hab wo i e juh hab masma mat g i'ikus. Kupt eda ahpi hi wabsh chum hekith d wo thoakamk ch pi hekith am gawul wo e juh.

Neh, bash kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui ch hab ep kaij: In g hu thahiwua si ni-hugith an k ab wo ai mant wo ha gewito g m-obga. Neh, ith ash wehs hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui ch pi hekith ab hu anghil ha wui hab sha'i kaij.

Anghil ash pi wepo masma g Jiosh alithag ch d wabsh gewpkthag mash am chikpan Jiosh wehhejed. Kuch ahchim d hahawa Jiosh a'aliga t-tho'ibiak ch am wo i wahp kihthaj ed. Kush g anghil d Jiosh pionag ch atsh am wo i t-wehmajk.
Neh, wehs ihtha o ab t-chehgithch mo g Jiosh alithag wehs thahm g e-nahtoi. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si t-u'ukchith ith ab s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj matt kah ch pi gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed.
Pi ash d Jiosh alithag ch d wabsh anghil matsh wa ia u'apa g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heki hu. Tsh wabshaba s-ko'okam bei g e-namkithadag hegam mash pi ab hu ha kaiham.

Sh eda d si alithaj g Jiosh hegai matsh hemu ia u'apa g ha'ichu ahgaj. Kutt hemho wa ab wo kaihamath. Am o t-tashogith g tho'ibiathag. Kutt pi has masma wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag matt pi ab hu wo kaihamath. Hegam matsh ab kah g Jiosh alithag o s-ap am t-ahgith ihtha ha'ichu ahgaj matsh ia u'apa.

K g Jiosh hab ha junithahim g s-hasig ha'ichu ch hekaj am wohokamchuth g ha'ichu ha ahga. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab t-mahkch g gewkthag mach hekaj hab wua g nahnko mahs i wehmtadag ch i gewkemhunadag ab a'ai t-wui.
Pi ash d anghil mas g Jiosh am i ha chuhcha mat am wo himchuthath g kownaltaligaj. Thach ahchim hemajkam.

Neh, an o hebai hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mash hema hab kaij ab Jiosh wui: Ni-Jioshga, thach wabsh al hemajkam maptsh ia wabsh t-shul mattsh am wo ha wechokath g anghil he'es i tash. Pi oki hab chum chu'ig maps ab wo has t-elithath ch wo t-thagio'ithath. Ptsh eda ab wo si t-haha'ichuchuth k ab wo t-mah g si s-kehg s-has ha'ichuthag
k am wo i t-chuhcha wehs ha'ichu thahm. Neh, bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana ch hab d ahga mat wehs g Jiosh nahtoi am wo ha wechokath g hemajkam. Pi o hab chu'ig ithani.

Kuch wabshaba s-mahch matsh heki hu i shonwua ab Jesus amjed matsh hab wo e juh. Heg atsh wa i e jumalkath k t-wepo e juh k he'es i tash ha wecho g anghil ch chum hems e thagito muhkig wui am wehs t-wehhejed. Ith o d Jiosh hab elitha no pi si s-t-ho'ige'ith. T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab si ha'ichuchuth k an thai mat d wo t-kownaligk.

Wehs ha'ichu o d Jiosh nahtoi ch wehhejed an hab chu'ig. T heg si s-hemajim am i ap'ech mat g Jesus wo e sho'igchuth k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia matt d wo a'aligajk ch am hahawa chum hekith wo wehmajk si s-kehg kihthaj ed. Jiosh hab elitha o wehs s-ap'e.
Pegih, tsh hab wa masma ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh alithag matt hab wa'ap d wo Jiosh a'aligak ch pi wo ha chu'ichigk. Kush heg hekaj pi sha'i e elith mat hab wo t-a'agath ‘ni-wepnag.’

An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mash g alithaj s-t-nawojimk ch hab ahg g Jiosh: Bant wo ha a'agath mo d ni-wepnag hegam mat ab wo s-m-wohoch am i kahk g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Amt ant ha shahgith ab wo m-hehgchulithath.

Kush hab ep kaij: Ab ant hab wabsh masma wo s-m-wohochuthath mo g m-hemajkamga. K an ep o'ohadag matsh ia wo jiwia k wo ha wehmajk ch hab wo ah: Ihtham o d Jiosh a'aliga. Kut am ni-nuhkuthach. Neh, bash kaij ch hab t-a'aga ‘Jiosh a'aliga.’

Kush eda g Jiawul edgith g gewkthag mat ab wo t-abch g t-chu'ichig matt hekaj gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh. Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh alithag t-wepo e juh mat hekaj s-ap ab wo bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag k wo hugio g Jiawul gewkthag mat hahawa pi wo e nako mas gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh.
Jiosh alithag atsh gewito g Jiawul am t-wehhejed. Kutt heg hekaj pi wo ehbithath g muhkig.
Pi ash d anghil mas g Jiosh wo ha tho'ibia. Thach ahchim hemajkam mach ab s-wohochuth.

Tsh heg wa hekaj am t-wepo e juh k t-wepo masma ia oimmelhim ch ha'ichu nakog. Bat wa'i masma s-ap d wo t-uhgchu pahligk ch ab wo s-t-ho'ige'ithath ch gm hu hab wo i juh g t-chu'ichig am wehhejed g Jiosh.
Jiawul o chum t-chehani matt hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. K wabshaba g Jesus s-ap e nakog mat am wo i t-gewkemhunath nash pi hab wa'ap nakog mash wa g Jiawul chum chehani g pi ap'ekam.
Pegih, ni-wehm wohochuththam, ab at i em-gawulkai g Jiosh gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus. Heg o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhgchu t-pahlig. Kumt wo oithahith mo has chu'ig.
Jiosh atsh heki hu am i kei g Mosesbad ha thahm g e-hemajkamga. Kush heg s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan. Pegih, sh g Jesus hab wa'ap s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan am Jiosh wehhejed.
Kutt wabshaba ba'ich ab wo i si has elithath g Jesus mach g Mosesbad no pi d Jiosh ch wehs ha'ichu nahto.

Mosesbad ash s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan am ha shahgith g Jiosh hemajkamga ch wabshaba d wabsh Jiosh pionag. Tsh g Jiosh am i kei matsh wo ha'ichu a'aga wehhejed matsh gm hu ba'ich hahawa s-ap wo i e tashogit.

Kush eda g Jesus d Jiosh alithag ch d si kehshaj matsh wehs am wo ha thahmkath g hemajkamgaj. Kuch ahchim d hemajkamgaj mattp pi wo thagito g t-wohochuthadag k wabsh s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenida mat hab wo t-juni mo has i kaij.

Neh, bash masma hab chu'ig am t-wehhejed mash wa hab chu'ig am ha wehhejed g t-shohshonbad ahchim Tutuligo. Hegam ha wui ash hab kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag: Ab o em-waith g Jiosh hab masma mo wa ab ha waith g em-ge'egedga.
Hegam o pi chechkaithag Kumt pi hab wo chum masmak. Jiosh o wa am ha wehhejed ap'echuthch g jewed ch ab ha waith mat s-ap am wo thadhaiwua heg eda. T wabshaba wa pi am hu i wahp
k wabsh pip'ichuth ch am thadha gm hu jegko am wa chum neithch mo haschu am hab ha junith gi'ikko wehst-mahm (40) a'ahith ab.
T g Jiosh pi am hu i ha wahpki heg oitham k s-ha keh'ith k hab kaij: Chum o hekith pi ap chegito ihtham hemajkam ch pi mai g ni-himthag.
Kunt hab si i ni-ah mat pi hekith am hu wo i wahp k pi hekith wo s-ap thadhaiwua ihtham ge'eged mo hab masma k wabshaba ab wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag.

Neh, tsh wa woho hab e juh g Jiosh ne'oki am ha wehhejed. Kumt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'eithath mamt pi hab masma wo pi chechkaithagk. Jiosh o d thoakam ch woho gm hu hab wo i em-juh mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath.
Ab o t-waith g Jiosh hemu ch wabshaba pi chum hekith ab wo t-waithath. Mt wo e iattogi g pi ap'ekamkaj mamtp pi ab hu wo kaihamath g Jiosh. Ab g a'ai wo i e gewkemhunath mamt ab wo kaihamath.
Thach s-wohom Christ hemajkamga mattp an wo si u'ukchith g t-wohochuthadag wehs t-thoakag oitham.
Mt heg hekaj wo s-chegitok ihtha mani am em-ahgith ch pi wo pi chechkaithagk hab masma mash wa hegam mash pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh.
Jiosh atsh wa am ha tho'ibia ab ha amjed g Egypt t am hemajkam am gahi wuhshanim g Mosesbad. Kush eda hahawa pi chechkaithag.

Sh g Jiosh s-ha keh'ith ch hab kaij matsh pi wo ha hiwigi mas am wo i wahp amai mash hebai am chum ap'echuthch ha wehhejed k ho'ip wehs koi hegam ge'eged mash pi ab hu wohog elith. Kush heg hekaj am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm (40) a'ahith ab.
Neh, ith o am t-chehgithch matki heg hekaj pi am hu ha wahpki g Jiosh heg eda jewed mash pi ab hu wohochuth.

Kutki heg hekaj pi am hu ha ap'et g Jiosh waitha. Kutt ahchim wo s-t-gihugath matt pi hab wo masmak mash wa hegam. Jiosh ash am t-wehhejed ap'echuthch e-kihthag ed hab sha masma mash wa am ha wehhejed chum ap'echuthch hegai jewed.

Ith ash am ap'echuthas gd hu i amjed matsh am e nahto g jewed. Sh wabshaba hab masma hab chu'ig am t-wehhejed mash wa hab chu'ig am ha wehhejed. Jiosh ash hab kaij matsh pi hedai am hu wo i wah pi ab hu wohochuthch k wabshaba ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo s-wohochuthath ch hab s-ap am wo i wahp kihthaj ed am i t-pihhunk ia jewed thahm.
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed matsh nahto g jewed ch thahm kahchim chuhthp tashkaj k am hahawa i e pihhu heg eda wewa'ak tash.
Pegih, sh am t-wehhejed an hab chu'ig g s-ap heubagitha wehmaj g Jiosh. Sh wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh. Kush hab kaij matsh pi hekith am hu wo i wahp.

Hegam mat ab wo s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh atsh am wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed. Neh, pi atsh am hu i wahp heg eda jewed mash g Jiosh am wui ha waith hegam matsh wehpeg kah g waithaj natsh pi pi ab hu wohoch.

Tsh wabshaba g ha-a'aliga am i wahp. Tsh g Joshuabad am i ha wanim. Kush ab ha wui hab hahawa kaij g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ihtha mani wa am em-ahgith: Ab o em-waith g Jiosh hab masma mo wa ab ha waith g em-ge'egedga. Kumt pi wo pi chechkaithagk hab masma mo wa hegam. Heki atsh hu am i wahp heg eda jewed. K heg hekaj tasho mo pi ab hu heg wui ha waith g Jiosh

ch wabshaba ha waith matsh d wo hemajkamgajk. Kut hab wo e nahtokch mat am wo i wahp heg eda si s-kehg s-hehgig mash ha wehhejed ap'echuthch. Jiosh atsh am i nahto g e-chikpan k hahawa si s-hehgig. Kutt ahchim hab wa'ap wo nahto g t-chikpan k wo si s-hehgigk mattp wo t-nahtokch.
Pegih, oi g am wo e nakog mamt am wo i wahp k wo si s-hehgigk am wehmaj g Jiosh. Pi atsh am hu i wahp hegam matsh pi ab hu wohog el g Jiosh. Kutt wo s-t-nen'oith k pi hab wo masmak.

Sho'o wa'i si s-gewkthag g Jiosh ne'oki. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am chehgithch mo has chu'ig g t-thoakag ch t-chegitoithag. Bo masma g ne'okij mo g s-mu'uk wainomi mamtp hems heg hekaj gd hu wo si hikuch g chuhkug ch oh'o k wo cheh mo haschu gd hu si eda.
