Mu'ijj g heki hu hemajkam ash wa pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh. Kutsh hab juh g ge'e wi'inthag matsh ha wi'in. Sh eda am wa chum ahgahim g s-ap'ekam ihtha mash hab chehgig Noah. Tsh ith tho'ibia g Jiosh ch wewa'ak ehp g wehmaj kihkam.
Sh gm hu ba'ich, kush sha'i si pi ap'e hegam mash am d kihkam Sodom ch Gomorra t am. Tsh g Jiosh am wabsh i ha hugio ihtham kihhim g meikaj mat wo ha chehgi g pi ap hemajkam mat has wo ha juh.
Kush am hema kih g s-ap'ekam o'othham ch hab chehgig Lot ch si s-wohom pi hohho'ith g pi ap ha'ichu hab ha-juni. Tsh ith g Jiosh tho'ibia matsh hekith i ha hugio hegam kihhim.
Wehs ihtha o am t-tashogith mo g Jiosh e nahtokch mat wo ha tho'ibia g s-ap'ekam o'othham ab amjed g ha-kudutadag k s-ko'okam ab wo ha namkith g pi ap'ekam mat wo e ai g ge'e lothaita tash.

Jiosh at ba'ich i si s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo d wabsh totonto ch pi ap hekaj g e-chuhkug ch pi ab hu wohog elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Hegam mo ahgachug g pi wohokam o e sheshmachuth ch si e hahaschuth ch s-ta kek'eitham neneok ch s-ko'okam has ha ahg hegam mo d haha'ichu an thahm kahchim ch ed.
Anghil o ha ba'ich i s-gewpkthag ch eda pi sha'i ko'okam ab ha abchuth hegam haha'ichu am tahgio g Jiosh.

K eda hegam s-chu i'attomkam pi ha'ichu am hu chegito hab masma mo g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch s-ko'okam has ahg hegai mo haschu pi amichuth. T g Jiosh wo ha hugio hab masma mamtp hems wo mua g ha'ichu thoakam.

S-ko'okam at ab wo bei g e-namkithadag heg hekaj mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam. Thash ha-hohho'itha mat chum hems tash ed hab wo junihith g si s-uam ha'ichu. Am ash em-wehm e gegosith. K d si edathag mo hab s-junimk g iattogitha.

Heg o wa'i tatchua mat g u'uwi an wo ha neithath ch pi ap ha'ichu am wo chegitoth. Shahag wepo mo pi ha huhuge g pi ap ha-tatchui. S-u'imk o hegai mo pi ab hu d ha-wuikam ch im hu hab pi apko i ha wanimed hegam mo pi gewpkthag. Jiosh o heki hu ab ha mohto'ithch g s-ko'ok namkithadag.

Heki at hu i e mehkoth ab amjed g s-ap'ekam hab masma matsh wa hema hab e juh mash hab chehgig Balaam. Ihtha Balaambad ash d chum Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wabshaba s-u'imk g lial am hab junihithch g pi ap'ekam.
Tsh g Jiosh shohbi g pi ap ha'ichu hab elithaj am hab juhk g wuhlu shoigaj mat haha wabsh neo.

No hig pi woho mo pi ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgaj g shongam matp wo gaksh o g s-chuchk chewagi matp gm hu wabsh wo wi'ichkwua? Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgaj ihtham mo pi ahg g wohokam. Jiosh at am wo ha shul si s-chuhugam k ed.
Chum o si s-gimaim ch pehegi neneok ch s-uam ha'ichukaj i ha wanchshulig hegam mo chum e nakog mat wo e tho'ibia
no pi am ha ahgith mo wabsh chum haschu s-ap'e ch eda hejel e wupulshch g pi ap'ekamkaj. Matp haschukaj wo e gewito g o'othham k heg hekaj wo e wulshchith.
Hegam s-chu i'attomkam at s-mai g wohokam ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k hekaj wo chum e tho'ibia. Kut heg hekaj ba'ich wo i pi ap'ek mat am ep wo e wupulsh g pi ap'ekamkaj.
Ab o ha mahkch g Jiosh g ha'ichu e-ahga. K wabshaba ba'ich i s-ap'e mat hems pi wo kah matp wabsh gm hu wo s-ohhoth.
T am wo e wohokamch ihtha hab ha-che'ithag: Gogs at am uhpam wo bah g e-wihos, ch ith ehp, Kohji o tatchua mat am uhpam wo gei bith ch ed, chum as wo si e kegch.
Pegih neh, ni-wepnag, ith o d wa'i gokkokam mant am i em-o'ohanith k am i em-chegitol ihtham ha'ichu.
Chum ani si em-tatchuith mamt wo s-chegitok g ha'ichu ha-ahga g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch ep wo s-chegitok hegai chehanigaj g t-tho'ibiakam kownal Jesus mo g am chuhchaij am wa em-ahgith.
Mt wo s-mahchkath mat am wo i e aihi mat ep wo jiwia g Jesus, t an ha'i wo i wuwha mo heg wa'i hejel e-tatchui am hab s-junimk. Ihtham at wo has em-ahgath

ch pi ab hu has wo elithath g wohokam ch hab wo kaijjith, “Mki wabsh hejel e iattogith mam hab chech'e matsh ep wo uhpam jiwia g Jesus. T eda pi jiwia. T mu'ijj heki hu wa'i koi g t-shohshon. Wehs ha'ichu o am hab wabsh i e junihim mo has i e junihim ga hu hebai i amjed mashp hekith in i e nahto g jewed.”
Ihtham o hab s-e junimk mo pi mahch mo ith d wohokam matsh wa g Jiosh am neok k am nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed. Ihtha jewed atsh ab i wuhsh shuhthagi t amjed k g shuhthagikaj e nahto.
K am i himtham, sh d wa ep shuhthagi mat ha wi'in k ha hugio g hemajkam.
K hab wa masma wabsh g e-ne'okikaj an u'ukch g Jiosh g thahm kahchim ch jewed ch ab wo ai mat wo ha lothai g pi ap hemajkam k im hu hab wo i ha juh mei ch ed.
Ith amt ep wo s-chegitok mo g mihl a'ahithag hab wa'i masma mo g hemako tash am wehhejed g Jiosh.

K wabshaba am hemajkam t-wehhejed shahag wepo mo si chewaj g tash mat g Jiosh am hab wo juh hegai mash hab s-t-junithamk. K eda g Jiosh si s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch ab chum ha nenida no pi pi hab chum sha'i elith mas hedai wo huhug am pi ap'ekam ch e d pi gm hu s-ohhothk g pi ap e-chegitoi.

Neh, no hig pi woho mo pi ta machima mas hekith g s-chu ehskam am wo wah em-kih ed? Pegih, k hab wa'ap pi ta machima mas hekith ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus. S-hohtam atsh wo jiwia. Kutsh wo si s-kaitham huhug g thahm kahchim k wo meitto g tash ch huhu'u ch jewed.
Wehs ha'ichu atsh wo huhug. Mt heg hekaj ab wo chum si i e thagitokch Jiosh wui
ch ab wo nenidath hegai tash ch am wo e nakogath mat hems s-hohtam wo e ai. Tsh hi wo wa chum meitto g thahm kahchim ch jewed.
Sh wabshaba g Jiosh hab kaij mat heg i thahm am haha wo nahto g wechij thahm kahchim ch wechij jewed. Tsh g s-ap'ekam an hab wo wa'i e junihith anai. Neh, ith ach ab si nenida.
Pegih oi g wo, tt hig am wo si i t-nako matt wo si s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio k wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath ab a'ai t-wui. T g Jiosh s-ap ab wo t-neithath.
Am g wo s-amichuthath mo g Jiosh am wabsh s-t-bahbgi mattp hems wehsijj wo t-tho'ibia. Paul at wa am hab wa'ap em-o'ohani ihtha heg hekaj amichuthadag mo g Jiosh ab mahkch.

Bo wa masma hab chu'ig wehs o'ohanaj ed mo am ha o'ohanith g a'ai hemajkam ith amjed. Hahasko o s-hasigam hab kaithag g o'ohanaj. K pi ap am hu i tashogith hegam mo pi amichuth g e-wohochuthadag ch pi wihnam gegok heg eda mo hab wa masma hab ep wua g heki hu o'ohanaj g Jiosh. Ho o wabsh hejel ab e mohto'ith g pi ap chu'ichig. T im hu hab wo i ha juh g Jiosh.
Am am wa heki hu s-mahch wehs ihtha, ni-wepnag. Hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog elithath g Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed. Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi am hu ha oithk hab wo e junihith.
Am att hig wo i t-nako matt ab ba'ich wo i mahchith g t-tho'ibiakam kownal Jesus Christ ch ba'ich wo i bei g i wehmtadag ab amjed. Heg ach ab si hehgchulith ch chum hekith ab wo si ihmath.

Ni-wepnag: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ab amjed hegai mat ia u'apa g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga jewed thahm k ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag. Chum ash hekith wehmaj g e-ohg Jiosh an thahm kahchim ch ed ch wabshaba ia i wuhsh jewed thahm. Kuni si neith g hejel ni-wuhpuikaj ch kahk ch ab tahtk g ni-nohnhoikaj.
Ahchim mach wa neith g Jiosh alithag ach am em-ahgith ab amjed mamt hekaj t-wehm ab wo ihmath g Jiosh. Jesus Christ o d Jiosh alithag.
Kuni am em-o'ohanith ahpim mam ab s-wohochuth mamt hekaj wo si s-ap e tahtkkath. Nt ahni hab wa'ap wo si s-ap ni-tahtkkath em-wehm.
Jesus o am t-ahgith mash g Jiosh d hekia tonlig.
T wo ha iattogi matp hedai hab wo chei mo s-mahch g Jiosh k eda hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Ith o am s-chuhugam k ed him.

Jiosh o d wohokam. Kutt wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath ab a'ai t-wui am oithch hihimathch g wohokam. Kut heg gm hu hab wo i junihith g pi ap t-chu'ichig nat pi heg hekaj t-wehhejed muh g alithaj. Heg o wa wepo mo g alithaj eh'ed gm hu wakon g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
Pi g hab wo sha'i cheh'i mams pi ha chu'ichig. Heg o d iattogi.
Tt wo mahsko wua g t-chu'ichig. T g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh k wo i t-kegch. Heg at hekaj ab nako g Jiosh alithag g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag ab e sho'igchuthk kots t ab.
Jiosh o am t-tashogith matt wehsijj hab juh g pi ap'ekam. Kut hedai hab wo chei mo pi ha chu'ichig k am wo e chehgi mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh.

Tham ni-a'aliga ab i s-wohochuthk g ha'ichu ni-ahga. Kuni ab i em-gewkemhun mamt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam. Jesus Christ o d hekia s-ap'ekam ch ab e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui am t-wehhejed. Kutt am wo ahgi g Jiosh g t-chu'ichig matt hekith am hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam.
T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g t-chu'ichig nat pi g alithaj heg hekaj nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag. Kut wabsh chum hedai wo chum e nako mat ab wo i e nodagi wui.
Tt wo s-mahchk mach woho'i s-mahch g Jiosh matt am hab wo junihith mo haschu ab i t-chehani.
Hegai mat pi am hu oithk hab wo e junihith g Jiosh chehanig o pi mahch g Jiosh, chum as hems hab wo chum chei mo s-mahch.
Ahchim mach hab wua g Jiosh tatchui ach woho'i ab si tatchua. Ith at am wo t-chehgi mach woho d a'aligaj.
Jiosh alithag o chum hekith am hab junihim g e-ohg tatchui. Kutt ahchim hab wo chum masmak mattp woho d a'aligaj g Jiosh.
Pegih, ni-tatchui, pi ani em-ahgith g wechij chehanig am em-ahgithch mamt ab a'ai wo si e tatchuath. Jiosh o wa heki hu hab masma t-chehani. Kum ith ab kaichug heki hu wa'i amjed.
T eda g Jiosh alithag am i wechijith t-wehhejed mat ab i t-mah g wechij thoakag. Tonlig o gm hu hab i wua g s-chuhugam am t-wehhejed.
Am o wabsh kia him s-chuhugam k ed matp hedai s-keh'ith g e-wehnag, chum as hab wo kaijjith mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam.
Tt am tonlig ch ed wo hihimath mattp woho ab wo si ha tatchuath g t-wepnag. T pi hedai wo pihk chu'i heg hekaj mach has masma.
K wabshaba am s-chuhugam k ed him hegai matp hedai wo s-ha keh'ithath.
Pi ant hab ahgk am wo em-o'ohani mams pi mahch g Jiosh. Gm at hu hab i juh g em-chu'ichig. Kum s-mahch.

Ahpim mam d si ge'eged am s-mahch mo g Jesus chum hekith d thoakam. Kum ahpim wechij hemajkam s-gewkthag ch am gewito g Jiawul nam pi s-gegokim ab e u'ukch Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab. Heg ant hekaj am wo i em-o'ohanith k ab wo i em-gewkemhu.
Pi g wo sha'i si pihk e elithath heg ab mo d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu. Hegam matp hedai wo si pihk e elithath ith ab ha'ichu at pi wo sha'i pihk e elithath ab Jiosh wui.
Pi o d sha'i Jiosh hab elitha matt hab wo s-junim g pi ap'ekam o si s-wohom wo s-behim mach haschu i neith o machs haschukaj wo si t-haschuthath. Wehs ihtha o d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu
ch hab wa masma d wabsh huhugetham ha'ichu. T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai wechij thoakag mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch ahchim mach am hab junihim g tatchuij.
Am am wa kah matsh an wo i e maskogi hegai mash d si obgaj g Jiosh alithag. Heki at hu mu'i an i wuwha t-shahgith mo d obgaj. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo e aihim mat wo huhug g jewed.
T wo chum t-wehm wih matp d t-wehm wohochuththam k wabshaba am i t-thagito. K heg hekaj tasho mo pi woho d t-wehm wohochuththam.
Jiosh alithag at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg am t-wehmaj ch i t-wehmt. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch g wohokam.
Pi o hekith g iattogi d wohokam. Kum s-mahch ihtha nam pi s-mahch g wohokam. Nt heg hekaj am em-o'ohani ihtha.
Hegam mo hab kaij mo g Jesus pi d Jiosh alithag o wehs ha ba'ich d i s-chu i'attomkam ch d obgaj. Heg o hekaj e chehgith mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh.
Hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh alithag o hab wa'ap pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh. Hegam o ab wa'i ihm g Jiosh mo hedai ab ihm g alithaj.
Mt am wabsh wo i wohochuthath ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mam ga hu i wehpeg amjed kaichug. Kut heg hekaj chum hekith am wo em-wehmajk g Jiosh g e-alithag wehm.
Heki o hu hab kaij g Jiosh matsh ab wo t-mah ihtha wechij thoakag matsh pi hekith wo huhug.
Am ant em-o'ohani ab ha amjed hegam mo em-iattogith ch im hu hab i s-em-junimk ab amjed g Jesus. Kumt pi ab hu ha'ichu wo mahchim ha ab.

Pi o hab chum mahs mams wabsh chum hasko amjed wo i e gahgithahi mam haschu i pi amichuth. Jiosh alithag at ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kut heg chum hekith am wo em-wehmajk ch wehs wo em-mashchamath g wohokam. Kumt ab wo kaihamath g mashchamaj ch ab wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh alithag
ch hab masma pi wo si e el mat hekith ep wo jiwia.
Tho hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh. Kumt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mamtp hedai hab junihim g s-ap'ekam ch d a'aligaj.
Jiosh at hab t-juh mach d hahawa a'aligaj no pi si pihk e elith ab t-wui. Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh alithag o pi mahch mach ahchim hab wa'ap d Jiosh a'aliga.

Batt wo chum masmak mo g Jiosh alithag nach pi hab wa'ap d a'aligaj. K pi koi am hu i si tasho matt has wo masmak nach pi wabsh s-kohmagim neith mo has i masma g Jiosh alithag. T hekith ep wo jiwia k ab wo i e chehgi t-wui. Kutt haha wo wepo masmak natt pi wo s-mai mo has masma.
K eda hemu tasho mo d si hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh alithag. Kutt ahchim wo si t-nuhkuthath matt d wo s-ap'ekamk nach pi s-mahch mat ep wo jiwia. Kutt wo neith k wo wepo masmak.
That wo pi ap chu'ijkamk am Jiosh chehanig ed hegai mat hedai hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam.
Pi o ha chu'ichig g Jiosh alithag ch in i wuhsh jewed thahm wepo masma g o'othham mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig.
Pi att am hu hab wo chum junihith g pi ap'ekam mattp ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh alithag. Hegai mat hedai hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam oki pi mahch g Jiosh alithag.

Ha'i o hab kaij mamt d wo s-ap'ekamk, chum hems pi am hu hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam. S-e g wo nen'oithk mat pi wo em-iattogi. Jesus o am t-chehgithch g hejel e-thoakagkaj matp hedai d wo s-ap'ekamk ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam.

Matp hedai hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch d wo Jiawul pionagk nat pi hab wo junihith g tatchuij g Jiawul. Jiawul o hab junihim g pi ap'ekam gd hu i si wehpeg amjed. T ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm mat wo hugio g Jiawul chikpan.
Pi att am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ahchim mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh nach pi edgith g wechij thoakag.

K ith hekaj tasho mo hedai d a'aligaj g Jiosh ch hedai am oith g Jiawul. Pi o d sha'i a'aligaj g Jiosh hegam mat hedai pi hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi ab hu wo pihk e elithath ab ha wui hegam mo d chum ha-wepnag.
Ihtha mani em-ahgith o d hegai mam kaichug gd hu i amjed mamt wehpeg kah. Ab g wo si pihk e elithath a'ai e wui.

Neh, hema ash wa d Cain ch hab junihim g Jiawul tatchui. Kumt pi oithk am hab wo e junihith. Cain cheoj wehnag ash wa hab junihim g s-ap'ekam. Sh g Jiosh si tatchua. Tsh g Cain heg hekaj s-hehgam k mua.
Pi g wo sha'i e totothsith mat hems g hemajkam hab wa masma wo s-em-keh'ithath.

S-mahch ach mo ab t-mahkch g Jiosh g wechij thoakag nach pi si pihk t-elith ha hekaj g t-wehm wohochuththam ch hab masma ab ha neith mo d t-wepnag. Hegam mo pi pihk e elith ha hekaj g e-wepnag o hab sha masma mo g ko'i.
Heg o wa wepo mo d ha mu'akam matp hedai s-ha keh'ith. Kuch s-mahch mo pi edgith g wechij thoakag hegam mat hedai d wo ha mu'akamk.

Jiosh alithag at ab muh kots t ab t-wehhejed no pi t-hekaj si pihk e elith. Ith o hekaj tasho mo haschu d pihk elithadag. Kutt wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj g t-wepnag am hugkam matt chum hems wo t-muhkith am ha wehhejed.
Pi o sha'i pihk e elith ab Jiosh wui hegai mat hedai ha'ichu wo s-edgithath ch pi heg hekaj ab hu wo i wehmt g e-wehnag.
Ab att wo ha mah g t-wepnag g i wehmtadag matp wo tatchua k pi hab wabsh wo kaijjith mach si pihk t-elith ha hekaj. Pegih, si ach pihk t-elith ha hekaj g t-wepnag.
K heg hekaj tasho mach edgith g wohokam. Ith att hekaj ab wo i t-gewkemhu matt ab wo i miabi g Jiosh.
Hebaichujj ach ab ha'ichu t-chu'ichigchuth. K wabshaba g Jiosh ba'ich i s-gewkthag mach ahchim ch wehs ha'ichu s-mahch
ch gm hu hab i juh hegai t-chu'ichig. Tt hab pi ha'ichu ab hu wo t-chu'ichigchuth k ab wabsh wo i miabi g Jiosh pi sha'i has t-elithch.
Bach junihim g Jiosh tatchui ch hegai mo haschu ab t-chehani. K g Jiosh heg hekaj am hab t-junith mach haschu ab i tahni.
K ith d chehanigaj g Jiosh matt ab wo s-wohochuthath g alithaj ch ab a'ai t-wui wo si pihk t-elithath mo hab masma t-chehani g alithaj.
Mach hedai ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh att ab si t-hemakoj heg wehm. Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K ith d Jiosh ch t-wehmaj. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mach d a'aligaj.

Mu'i at an i wuwhag k hab chum e wua mo d ha mihshmaththam. K eda pi ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Kumt heg hekaj pi wabsh chum hedai ab wo s-ha wohochuth k ho'ip ha a'appe mas woho ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag.
Ahchim o wa'i t-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mach hedai wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh alithag ch ia mahsi k d o'othham hab masma mach ahchim.

Pi o am hu ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hegam mo hedai pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh alithag. Am o hema ha wehmaj ch d Jesus obga. Heki am hu kah mat an wo i wuhsh g obgaj. K hemuch in ha'ichug no pi an ha wehmaj hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh alithag.

Jiosh alithag obga o am ha wehmaj hegam mo g iattogi chum ha mihshmethahim. K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag in t-wehmaj. Kutt heg hekaj ha gewito no pi heg ba'ich i s-gewkthag mo hi g Jiosh alithag obga.
Hegam o ab wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu k amjed neneok. K hegam ab ha kaiham mo hab wa'ap pi mahch g Jiosh.

Pi o ab hu t-kaiham mach chum neneok ab amjed g Jiosh no pi pi mahch g Jiosh. Hegam o ab wa'i t-kaiham mo hedai s-mahch g Jiosh. Bach masma s-mahch mo hedai edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. Heg o am ha tashogith g wohokam.
Ab att wo chum si pihk t-elithath a'ai t-wui no pi g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g pihk elithadag. Mamtp woho wo s-mahchk g Jiosh ch d a'aligaj ch wo si pihk e elithath.
Jiosh o si t-tatchua ch heg hekaj si pihk e elith ab t-wui. K hegam mo pi edgith g pihk elithadag pi d sha'i a'aligaj.

Jiosh at ab i wuhshath g si hemako e alithag ith thahm jewed. T heg ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mach heg ab beihog. Kut hab masma ab t-mah g wechij thoakag. Bat wa masma am t-tashogi g Jiosh mo si pihk e elith ab t-wui. Kutt heg amjed i s-mai g pihk elithadag k hahawa si pihk t-elith ab Jiosh wui.
Am o wa tasho mo ab t-wui si pihk e elith g Jiosh. Pegih, ni-wepnag, ahchim att hab wa'ap wo chum si pihk t-elithath ab a'ai t-wui.
Pi ach hedai hekith sha'i neith g Jiosh g t-wuhpuikaj. K wabshaba heg ab t-mahkch g si ge'e pihk elithadag. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo t-wehmaj.
Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K heg d Jiosh ch ab t-wehm kihthag. Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mach d a'aligaj.
Heki at hu am i kei g Jiosh g e-alithag mat ab wo i hih jewed wui k wo ha tho'ibia g hemajkam. Kuni si neith ihtha ch heg amjed am em-ahgith.
Wehsijj ach d a'aligaj g Jiosh matt hedai ab s-wohochuth k ah mo g Jesus d si alithaj.
Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui ch ab si t-hemakojithch e wehm. Jiosh o ab si t-tatchua. Kuch s-mahch mach d a'aligaj nach pi ab a'ai si t-tatchua.
Ab o t-mahkch g si ge'e pihk elithadag. Kuch wepo masma ab si tatchua mo g alithaj ch hab s-ap t-taht k wo ai g lothaita

k pi wo ehbithath. Gm at hu hab i juh g pi ap t-namkithadag g Jiosh no pi si pihk e elith ab t-wui. Kutt heg hekaj pi wo ehbithath ch wabsh aigo wo si pihk t-elithath ab wui. Pi o pihk e elith ab Jiosh wui hegai mat hedai wo s-ehbithath.
Wehpeg o si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui. Kuch heg hekaj edgith g pihk elithadag.

Pi o woho d Jiosh wohochuththam mo hedai pi ab hu pihk e elith t-wui ahchim mach d wohochuththam. Ba'ich o i s-hasig matt ab wo si tatchua hegai mach pi neith. Pi at wo e nako mat ab wo si tatchua g Jiosh matp hedai pi ab hu wo si ha tatchua g e-wepnag.
Ab o t-chehani g Jiosh ahchim mach ab si tatchua matt ab epai wo si ha tatchuath g t-wepnag.
Thach Jiosh a'aliga wehsijj ahchim mach s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d alithaj g Jiosh ch d si Kehshaj. Kutt ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath nach pi d t-wepngam. K g Jiosh d t-ohg.
S-mahch ach mo d wohokam g t-tatchuithag ab a'ai t-wui nach pi ab si tatchua g Jiosh.
K am wa tasho mach ab si tatchua g Jiosh nach pi ab s-wohog elith. K g chehanigaj pi sha'i wehch am t-wehhejed.

Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g gewkthag matt wo gewito g pi ap'ekam. Ab ach s-wohochuth g alithaj. K heg hekaj ab t-mahkch hegai gewkthag matt heg hekaj gewito g pi ap'ekam. Pi at wo e nako g pi wohochuththam mas wo gewito g pi ap'ekam.
Jesus Christ at ia jiwia jewed thahm k e pahl wakon k am hab juh g e-chikpan k am hahawa e muhkith am t-wehhejed.

T g pahl wakonaj ch muhkigaj am wohokamch mo d Jiosh alithag ch d thoakam ith thahm jewed. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab wa'ap wohokamchuth. Ihtham waik o am wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh alithag.
Neh, ab ach s-wohochuth g o'othham mat ab ha'ijj wo t-ahgi mo si s-ap s-mahch. K g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ba'ich i s-gewkthag mat heg am wohokamch g e-alithag.
Kutt hedai ab wo s-wohoch g Jiosh alithag k wo si s-ap s-mahchk mo d wohokam. Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at t-wehhejed wo wohokamch. Hegam mo pi wohochuth g Jiosh oki hab elith mo t-iattogith.
Ab o i t-tashogith g Jiosh mo ab t-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag.
Ahchim mach ab ihm g alithaj ach edgith hegai thoakag. K hegam mo pi ab hu ihm pi edgith.
Ith ant am em-o'ohani ahpim mam ab ihm g Jiosh alithag mamt hekaj wo s-mahchk mam edgith ihtha wechij thoakag.

Si ach s-mahch mat ab wo t-kaiha g Jiosh matt ab ha'ichu wo tai matp ith am tatchuij oithch d wo ha'ichuk. Kutt heg hekaj ab wo i t-gewkemhunath ch ab wo ha'ichu tahnith nat pi woho am hab wo t-junithahith.

Ab att wo tahnith g Jiosh mat gm hu hab wo i juh g ha-chu'ichig g t-wehm wohochuththam matp ab wo e shohbi. Kut hab wo juh mach haschu ab tahni. Pi ani em-ahgith mams wo e ho'ige'ithahu ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo sha'i e shohbi.
Wehs o ha'ichu d pi ap'ekam mo haschu i pi d Jiosh tatchui. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g ha-chu'ichig hegam mat ab wo e shohbi.

S-mahch ach mo g Jiawul edgith g gewkthag am wehs ha thahm hegam mo pi d Jiosh a'aliga. Kuch eda ahchim d Jiosh a'aliga. Jiosh alithag o t-nuhkuth. Kut pi wo sha'i e nako g Jiawul mas gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed. Pi att am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ahchim mach d Jiosh a'aliga.

K g Jiosh alithag ab t-mahkch g amichuthadag matt wo s-mahchk g wohokam Jiosh ch wo edgithath g wechij thoakag. Heg at hekaj ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm. Heg o d wa'i t-Jioshga mo d si wohokam Jiosh.
Kumt pi ha'ichu ep wo jioshchuth k pi hedai ep ab hu wui wo e ho'ige'ithahunath.

Ni-tatchui ni-wepnag: Am ant wo ha'ichu i em-o'ohani ahni mani d hema ha wanimedtham wehsijj hegam mo ab si ihm g Jesus Christ. Si ani pihk ni-elith em-hekaj nach pi d t-wehm wohochuththam. Wehs g t-wehm wohochuththam o hab wa'ap si pihk e elith em-hekaj. Pi at hekith gm hu hab wo i e juh g wohokam ab t-amjed.

Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g e-alithag Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mah g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam. Kumt ab wo u'ukchith g wohokam ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj.
Si ani s-ap ni-tahtk ch ia ha'i ha neith g em-wehm kihkam. K ihtham an u'ukch g wohokam hab masma mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh.
Kuni ab wehs i em-gewkemhun mamt ab a'ai e wui wo si pihk e elithath. Pi o d wechij chehanig ihtha mani am em-ahgith. Edgith ach ihtha gd hu i shohshon k amjed.
Kutt ab a'ai t-wui wo si pihk t-elithath ch hekaj am wo t-chehgithath mach ab s-wohog elith ihtha chehanigaj g Jiosh.
Mu'i at an i wuwha mo chum s-ha mashchamamk g hemajkam ch eda d wabsh s-chu i'attomkam ch d obgaj g Jiosh alithag no pi pi ha mashcham mat ia mahsi k d o'othham hab masma mach ahchim.
Kumt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba wehs wo bei mo haschu ab em-makiog g Jiosh.
Hegam matp hedai am gawul wo juh g Jiosh alithag mashchama o pi sha'i mahch g Jiosh. S-mahch ach g Jiosh ch ep s-mahch g alithaj ahchim mach am oithch hab masma g alithaj mashchama.

Kumt heg hekaj pi ab hu wo ha kaihamath hegai mat hedai wo chum s-em-mashchamam k eda pi wo ahgachugath g Jiosh alithag mashchama. Pi g am hu wo i ha wahpkith e-kihki ed k chum hems pi hab wo chei ab ha wui. “Jiosh at wo wa em-wehmajk,”
mamt pi ab hu wo i ha wehmt hegam mat am wo ahgachugath g pi wohokam.
Mu'i ani ha'ichu s-em-ahgithamk ch wabshaba pi ith hekaj am i em-o'ohani nani pi am s-himimk mant wo em-neith k wo em-wehm neo. Kutt am t-wehm si s-ap wo t-tahtkk.
Ia o ha'i kih g t-wepnag ch ash si pihk e elith em-hekaj.
Ni-tatchui ni-wehnag, Gaius: Am ant wo ha'ichu i m-o'ohanith k d hema ha wanimedtham wehsijj hegam mo ab si ihm g Jesus Christ.

Ia at ha'i thatha hegam mash am em-wui ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k ia t-ahgith mapsh si s-ap himchuth g e-thoakag am oithch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga map has i masma chum hekith hab e junihim. Si ani s-hohho'ith ch kah mapsh am wabsh kia si s-ap e tahtk am Jiosh wui. Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat wehs ha'ichu wo s-ap'ek am m-wehhejed. Kupt wabsh wo si s-thoak.
Tho si s-ap tahhathkam am ni-wehhejed mat hegam mani ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga wo si s-ap u'ukchith.
Kupsh am s-ap ha thagio'ith hegam mash am thaiw am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga, chum as pi d m-machiga.
Ihtham mat ia thatha o t-ahgith mapsh si pihk e elith ha hekaj. Kuni ab si i m-gewkemhun mapt ba'ich wo i ha wehmajk mat gm hu hasko ep wo i ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.
Ihtham o t-ahgith mash pi ha hiwgith hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jesus mas ha'ichu ab wo i ha mah.
Ahchim o ab d t-wuikam mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh alithag matt wo i ha wehmtath hegam mo ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga.

Ith ani chum em-tashogith heki hu ni-o'ohana ed ahpim mam am e wehm e mihshmath. Kush wabshaba g Diotrephes pi chegima g ni-o'ohana ch am em-iattogith ch pad neok ab t-amjed ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Tatchua ash g Diotrephes mat d wo em-wanimedthamk. Am ant wo em-tashogi am jiwiak mo pi ap'e hegai mo haschu am hab junihim. Pi ash ab hu i ha wahpkith ch pi ha thagio'ith hegam mo am thaiw am ahgachugch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ash pi em-hiwgith mams ahpim hab wo chum juh ch wo chum em-wuwhas ab em-namki amjed.
Matp hedai hab masma hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch pi mahch g Jiosh. Pi g am hu s-ha wepom k wabshaba hegam s-ha wepom mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam. Ihtham o d Jiosh a'aliga.
Hema hegam mo hab junihim g s-ap'ekam o d Demetrius. Wehsijj am hab wa kaij. Kuni s-mahch mo d wohokam. Kum ahpim s-mahch mani chum hekith g wohokam ahg.
Mu'i ani ha'ichu s-m-ahgithamk ch wabshaba pi ith hekaj am i m-o'ohani
nani pi am s-himimk mant wo m-neith k wo m-wehm neo ab amjed.
Si g s-ap e tahtk am Jiosh wui mat m-tho'ibia. Ia o ha'i kih g t-wepnag ch ash si pihk e elith m-hekaj. Am g wehs ha ahgith g t-wepnag mach si pihk t-elith ha hekaj.

Ni-wepnag: Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahni mani d Jude ch d piongaj g Jesus Christ ch d James wehnag. Jiosh o si pihk e elith em-hekaj ch ab i em-gawulkath k em-nuhkuth am wehhejed g e-alithag Jesus Christ.
Ab ani tahni g Jiosh mat ab ba'ich wo i s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab ba'ich wo i em-mahkath g s-ap thahhathkam ch pihk elithadag.

Ab ant ha'ichu wo i chum em-o'ohani ab amjed g t-tho'ibiathag. T wabshaba ha'i i wuwha mo d s-chu i'attomkam ch am chum gawul s-junimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g tho'ibiathag ch ab wui gegok g t-kownalig Jesus Christ. Ihtham o hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam ch heg hekaj hab kaij mat g o'othham wabsh chum haschu has wo junihith ab i s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. K wabshaba heki hu an o'ohanas mat s-ko'okam wo ha namkith g Jiosh hegam mat ab wui wo gegokiwua. Heki o hu t-ahgith g Jiosh matt haschu ab wo chum s-wohochuthath. Kum ahpim ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu ahgaj. Nt heg hekaj am wo i em-o'ohanith k ab wo i em-gewkemhu mamt si s-gewkam wo u'ukchith.

Am g wo s-chegitok mat has ha juh g Jiosh hegam mo pi ab hu wohog elith. Chum as wehs e tho'ibia g Tutuligo ab Egypt jewed t amjed, k eda mu'ijj pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch hekaj s-ko'okam e ko'ij.

Am g wo s-chegitok mat has e juh g anghil. Ab o chum s-wohog elith g Jiosh ch wabshaba ha'i gm hu hab i e juh ab amjed. T hegam am i ha kuh g Jiosh k am s-wihnam ha kuhpch s-chuhugam k ed mat wo ha lothai ge'e lothaita tash ch ed.

Am g wo s-chegitok mat has i ha juh hegam mo am kih Sodom kihhim t am ch Gomorra kihhim t am ch gn hu ha wehgaj. Bo wa ep pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam am ha wehm wohpiwup hegam mo pi d ha-wehm kihkam. Chechoj o am e wehm wohpiwup ch hab wua g pi ap'ekam. T g Jiosh ab i huduni g mehi am ha thahm ihtham kihhim k am wehs ha koktha g hemajkam. Bo wa masma i t-tashogith g Jiosh mat s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mat pi wo thagito g pi ap'ekam. T g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag pi hekith wo huhug.
Ihtham s-chu i'attomkam mo am ha'ichu chum em-mashcham ash ha'ichu chehchk ch heg oithch am hab e junihim ch hekaj e uamhun ch pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch nahnko ha ahg g anghil.

Chum ash wa hems hegai anghil ha-ge'ejig mash hab chehgig Michael pi s-ko'okam ab abchuth g ge Jiawul no pi heg hab wa'ap d chum anghilkahim. Jiawul ash wa pi ap hab e wua am chum s-behimkch g Mosesbad mat am i muh. Kush ihtha Michael am s-tha'ith ch wabshaba pi s-ko'okam has ahg ch hab hi wabsh kaij, “Jiosh at wo wa'i s-m-keh'el heg hekaj.”
Sh wabshaba hegam s-chu i'attomkam nahnko ahg mo haschu i pi amichuth ch hab wua mo haschu i tatchua hab masma mo g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch hab masma e uamhun.

Jiosh at s-ko'okam wo ha namkith no pi pi ab hu wohog elith. Heki o hu mash wa hema d Cain ch mua g e-wehnag. Kush eda g wehngaj d s-ap'ekam. K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam am hab wa'ap e wua. Hema ash wa d Balaam ch am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heg wabsh hekaj mat wo ui g lial. K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa'ap e wua. Hema ash wa d Kora ch ab wui kehk g Jiosh. K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa'ap e wua. T heg hekaj g Jiosh im hu hab wo i ha juh ab e amjed.

Kah ani mash ihtham s-chu i'attomkam am em-wehm e gegosith ch am chum em-uamhun. Neh, pi at am hu wo i em-wehmajk g chewagi matp gm hu wabsh wo wi'ichkwua k pi wo ha juh. T hab wa masma pi am hu wo i em-wehmajk ihtham mo wabsh hejel i e chegito. Neh, t wabsh wo e huhp g ha'ichu babhetham uhs matp pi ab hu wo ha babheth mat eda wo chum e ai mat ab wo bai. Kut ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa masma wabsh wo huhug no pi pi sha'i e chehgith g ha'ichu s-ap'ekam ab ha amjed.

S-ta edam ha'ichu ash am wabsh e chehgith ab ha amjed hab masma mo g totshagi am e chehgith an shuhthagi hugith an. Ihtham o wabsh pi thotholima ch ab aihim mat g Jiosh gm hu wo ha shul ge'e s-chuhugam k ed.

Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh heki hu hema tashogi mat has wo ha juh. Sh ith hab chehgig Enoc ch d wosmdaj hegai mash g woskaj wosk d si wehpeg o'othham. Sh g Jiosh hab ahg mat wo ha ahgi g hemajkam mat ab wo i hih g Jiosh mat wehs wo ha lothait k s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo pi tatchua ch has ahg ch hab wua g pi ap'ekam. T wehst-mahm mihl anghil ab wo i oi.
Ihtham s-chu i'attomkam o chum hekith a'aga g pi e-ap'ethag ch hab wua g pi ap e-tatchui. Ge o e hahaschuth ch hab wabsh e wua mo ab ha'i si ha haha'ichuchuth mat hekaj ab aigo wo si ha haha'ichuch.
Am g wo s-chegitok mo haschu i em-ahgith hegam mo d chuhchaij g t-kownalig Jesus Christ.
Bo wa kaij ab em-wui, “Am at ha'i wo i wuwha em-shahgith mo eda e aihim g si ha oithch tash k hab wabsh wo junihith g hejel e-tatchui ch wo nahnko em-ahgath.”
T am wo tashok mo ihtham pi sha'i e thagitokch am wui g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag no pi am hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui ch hab chum em-wua mamt ab a'ai e wui wo gegokiwua.
Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam g t-wohochuthadag. Kumt heg ab ba'ich i s-wihnam wo e u'ukchith. T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mahkchith g gewkthag mamt hekaj am wo neneokath Jiosh wui.
Mt wabsh chum hekith am wo edak g Jiosh pihk elithadag ch s-e tahtk ch wo nenidath mat g t-kownalig Jesus ab wo i em-wahpki Jiosh kihthag ed mamt hahawa chum hekith an wo ha'ichugk.
Ab g wo i s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam mo pi mahch mas haschu wo s-wohoch
k am wo i ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. T hab wo e tho'ibia ab i s-wohochuthk. Kumt wabshaba wo s-e nen'oithk mo haschu pi ap hab wua mamt ahpim hab wa'ap pi heg hekaj wo e uamhu.

Ab att wo si has elithath g Jiosh nat pi g alithaj Jesus Christ t-tho'ibia k d t-kownalig. Jiosh o si s-gewkthag ch wehs ha'ichu thahm chum hekith. Ab att wo i t-thagito wui. T wo e nako mat wo t-nuhkuth. Kutt pi gm hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed. T am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed. Kutt wo si s-hehgigk ch ab wo si has elithath chum hekith.

Hemu at am i tashogi g Jesus Christ hegai matsh haschu am hab wo e juh pi sha'i mehk i'ajed. Jiosh ash am ahgith matsh am wo t-chehgi ahchim mach d piongaj. Tki heg am hema i kei g anghil. T ith am ni-chehgi ahni John mani d piongaj g Jesus Christ.
Kuni ia o'ohan hegai mani haschu i neith. Ihtha ni-o'ohana o d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch d hegai wohokam mat am i maskogi g Jesus.
Jiosh at wo wa s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat am wo i ne'okchul ch hegam mat ab wo kaihamath. E ash aihim mat am hab wo e juh wehs ihtha gm hu ba'ich ha'ichu ahga mant in wo o'oha.

Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahpim wewa'ak thakam Jesus Christ ihmtham am Asia chekshani ch ed. Ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab ba'ich wo i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam g t-ohg Jiosh ch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch Jesus Christ. T-ohg Jiosh o chum hekith an ha'ichug. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wehmaj ch wewa'ak masma e chehgithch am t-wehhejed. K g Jesus Christ si s-ap am i t-tashogith g wohokam ch d hegai mat si wehpeg ab uhpam s-ap i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed k am hahawa ha thahm g wehs kokownal ith thahm jewed. Ab o si t-tatchua ch heg hekaj e muhkith t-wehhejed k t-tho'ibia ab pi ap t-chu'ichig amjed
k hab t-juh mach d hahawa piongaj g t-ohg Jiosh ch am wo i ahgahith g ha'ichu ahgaj. Jesus Christ o wehs u'ukch g gewkthag. Kutt ab wo ihmath chum hekith.
Neh, e o aihim mat ep wo jiwia ab thahm kahchim amjed. Wehs hemajkam at wo neithath, chum wa hegam mat ab sisish kots t ab. Wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam at wo shoshani heg hekaj.

T-kownalig Jiosh o wehs u'ukch g gewkthag ch hab kaij, “Ahni ani d alpha ch d omega.” Ihtham o d si wehpeg ch si oithchkam o'ohana. K hab ahg g Jiosh mo si wehpeg an ha'ichug ch si ha oithch an wabsh wo kia ha'ichugk.

Thani em-wehm wohochuththam ahni John nach pi ab t-hemakochuthch g Jesus Christ wehm. Ni am em-wehm ap'ethag Jiosh kownaltalig ed ch hekaj em-wehm ni-sho'igchuth. An amt ni-wua heg ab al sikod jewed mo hab chehgig Patmos ch am ha'ichug shuhthagi ch ed nani wa pi si s-gewkam ahgahim g Jiosh ne'oki ch hegai wohokam mat g Jesus am i tashogi.
K am hu hebai d thomig tash. Ni ab ihm g Jiosh. K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si i ni-wehmaj. Kuni kah mat ab hema si s-kaitham neo ab ni-wehgaj k hab sha kaithag mat g kuikud ab ku

k hab kaij, “An g o'ohan mapt haschu wo i nei k am haha wo ha cheha mat am wo i bei ihtha o'ohana hegam ha wui wewa'ak thakam Jesus ihmtham amai Ephesus t am ch Smyrna t am ch Pergamum t am ch Thyatira t am ch Sardis t am ch Philadelphia t am ch amai Laodicea t am.”
Neh, nt ab si sikol i kekiwua mant wo nei mas hedai ab ni-wui neok k haha wabsh nei mo g wewa'ak ohla lalampa an thadha chuhchakud t an.
K am ha shahgith hema kehk ch hab mahs mo g Jiosh si Kehsha. K g lihwaj gd hu si ais g tahtdaj. K g ohla giwud an hab juhkch e bahsho.
K g mo'oj si s-tohta hab masma mo g s-wihs gew. K g wuhpuij si s-masma tonod hab masma mo g s-toni nahtha.
K g tahtdaj si s-wegima tonod hab masma mo g kohwli hahgig. K g ne'okij hab masma hab kaithag mo g si ge'e shuhthagi an med.
Ith o an u'ukch g wewa'ak huhu'u s-apko e-nowi ed ch an kamshch g is-pahyo. K ith ab i wuhshanis chinij ab. K g wuhioshaj sha'i si tonod hab masma mo g tash tonlig thahm juhk.
Kunt am i neithok ab i gei wecho hab sha masma mo g muhki. Kut an ni-tahtam k hab kaij, “Pi g am sha'i ni-ehbenith. Thani ahni mani si wehpeg ia ha'ichug ch chum hekith ia wo ha'ichugk.
Am ant wa chum ni-muhkith k uhpam ep ni-chegito k chum hekith d haha wo thoakamk. Am ani thahm gewkthag g muhkig ch am thahm gewkthag amai mo am ha'ichug g ko'i.
“Pegih, am g o'ohan map haschu i neith mat hab wo e juh hemu ch haschu hab wo e juh imhab i thahm.

Am ant wo m-ahgi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ab amjed ihtham wewa'ak huhu'u mani in u'ukch ch ihtham wewa'ak lalampa. Ihtham wewa'ak lalampa o d hegam ni-ihmtham mo am kihthag hegam ha eda wewa'ak kihhim. K ihtham wewa'ak huhu'u o d ha-wanimedtham.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab ni-ihm ch am kihthag Ephesus t am. Ihtha ha wanimedtham at am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani an ha u'ukch g s-apkojed ni-nowikaj g wewa'ak huhu'u ch an oimmed ha shahgith g wewa'ak lalampa.

S-mahch ani mam haschu hab junihim. S-ap am chikpan ch am wabsh s-e bahbgi ch pi ab hu sha'i ha bahbgi hegam mo ab ni-wui gegok. Ha'i o hab chum kaij mo d ni-chuhchai. Kumt eda ha a'appem k s-mai mo d wabsh s-chu i'attomkam.
Ab amt s-bahbagi nako g sho'igthag ni-wehhejed k pi sha'i ha'asa.
“Neh, ith o s-ta hohho'ithama. K wabshaba ha'ichu pi ta hohho'ithama ab em-ab. Pi am ab hu ni-tatchua hemuch hab masma mam wa gd hu i heki hu.
Am g wo i oithahim mamt he'esko i e mehkoth ab ni-amjed k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi mamt hab ep wo masmak mam wa heki hu. Mtp sha pi gawul wo i e juh, nt gm hu wo i bei g em-tonligga.

Ith am hi wa s-ap am hab junihim mam si pi hohho'ith mo haschu s-ta edam hab junihim hegam mo am oith g Nicolas. Ith o wa chum pi apko ha wanimed g Jiosh hemajkamga. Ahni ani hab wa'ap si pi hohho'ith ihtha.

“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath. “Ab ant wo ha mah hegam mat gewito g pi ap'ekam g ap'ethag mat ab wo huh g bahidaj hegai uhs mo ab ha mahk g thoakag ch am kehk Jiosh oithag ed.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Smyrna t am. Ith at am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani si wehpeg ia ha'ichug ch si ha oithch ia wabsh wo kia ha'ichugk, ahni mant muh k ep i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed.

S-mahch ani mam e kudut. Tham hi wa chum sho'igkam iia ch wabshaba d s-kakais am Jiosh tahgio. S-mahch ani mo ha'i si pi ap has em-ahg g Tutuligo. Ihtham o hab e elith mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch eda wa chum pi woho no pi d wabsh Jiawul hemajkamga.

“Pi g am wo sha'i ehbithath mamtp haschu i s-ko'ok ab wo nako. Neh, mt wo em-kuh. K wabshaba d wabsh Jiawul chi'oitha ihtha. Kut am wa'i wehst-mahm tash hab wo mahsk ihtha em-kudutadag. Am amt wo hihimath e-wohochuthadag oithch am hugkam mamt hekith wo i koi. Kunt ab wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hab masma mamt g gihko wo mah hegai mat wo ha gewito.

“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath. “Hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam at pi wo ai g gokkokam muhkig.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Pergamum t am. T ith am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mo g ni-is-pahyo ge a'aijed mu'ukasig.
S-mahch ani mo g Jiawul himthag si s-gewkthag amai. M eda ab wabsh kia s-ni-mahch ch e ahg. Hegai mo d Antipas ch ab si s-ni-wohokamchuth at wa e muhkith amai. Kumt eda wa pi sha'i ni-thagito.

“K wabshaba am ha'ichu d hegai mani pi hoho'ith am em-shahgith. Am o ha'i em-wehmaj ch am hab wua hegai mat wa haschu ha mashcha g Tutuligo ihtham Balaambad ch Balakbad. Ihtham at wa ha mashcha mat wo huh hegai ha'ichu hugi mo wa ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshchutha ch ehp mat hab wo wuath g s-tohntom ha'ichu. Ith o wehs d pi ap'ekam am ni-tahgio.
Am o ha'i ep em-wehmaj mo g Nicolas mashchama ab s-wohochuth.
Gam g hu wo s-ohhoth ihtha pi ap'ekam. Nt wo em-cheggia heg hekaj is-pahyo mo ab i wuhshanis ni-chini amjed mamtp pi am hu wo i e ap'ech.

“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath. “Ab ant wo ha mah hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam hegai pi ta behima ha'ichu hugi mo hab e a'aga ‘manna.’ Ab ant ep wo i ha mahkhi ihtham g s-toa Hothai. T hegam ha ab an wo o'ohanask g wechij chehgig. T hegam wo wa'i hehe'ejel s-mahchk g chehgig mat hedai i bei.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Thyatira t am. T ith am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ni-ahga ahni Jiosh alithag mo g ni-wuhpui hab masma tonod mo g nahtha. K g ni-tahtad hab masma tohonnod mo g thahpiunas kohwli.
S-mahch ani g s-ap'ekam em-chikpan, pihk em-elithadag, em-wohochuthadag ch em-hemajimathadag ch em-bahbgithadag. Ba'ich am hab i e junihim ia'i ithani.

“K wabshaba am ha'ichu d hegai mani pi hohho'ith am em-shahgith. Am am wabsh hiwgith hegai uwi mo e wepogith g Jezebelbad ch hab e a'aga mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam. Ith o ha mashcham g ni-ihmtham mat am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ha'ichu ab a'ai e wehm ch ep wo ko'ath hegai ha'ichu hugi mo ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshchutha.
Ab ant wa he'es i mah g tash mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. K wabshaba pi hohho'ith mat wo thagito g pi ap'ekam.
Kunt heg hekaj hab wo juh mat wo mumku k wo wo'iwua. T hegam chechoj mo am wehmaj wohppo am wehmaj ep wo e sho'igch. S-hohtam ant hab wo juh ihtha heg hi wa matp gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
Nt wo ha koktha g mahmdaj mat wehs g ni-ihmtham wo s-mai mani s-mahch g hemajkam ha-chegitoithag ch ha-tatchuithag. Ab ant wo em-namkith heg hekaj mam haschu has i junihim.

“Ha'ijj ahpim Thyatira t am hemajkam amt pi am hu i oi ihtha pi ap'ekam mashchamadag k pi mai hegai mo ha'ijj hab a'aga ‘Jiawul si s-juhk s-a'agi ha'ichu.’ Pi ant ab hu ba'ich ha'ichu s-wehch wo em-mohto'i.
Mt wabshaba hemho wa wo s-wihnam u'ukchith hegai mam haschu i edgith ch ab wo ai mant wo uhpam jiwia.

“Ni-ohg Jiosh at ab ni-mah g gewkthag mant wehs s-gewkam wo ha thahmkath g jejewed ch wo ha padch g pi ap'ekam kokownaltalig. Kunt ab wo ha mah ihtha gewkthag hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam k am hab wo junihith g ni-tatchui ch ab wo ai mant ep wo jiwia. T am ni-wehm wo ha thahmkath g jejewed. Kut am ha wehhejed wo mahsi g ho'ige'ithadag hab masma mat g s-mahs hu'u.
“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Sardis t am. T heg am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani an u'ukch g wewa'ak huhu'u ch am kehshch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wewa'ak masma wo e chehgithath em-wehhejed. S-mahch ani mam has chu'ig. Bam em-elith mam d s-ap'ekam. Mt eda e mehkoth ab ni-amjed.
Neh, mt ab wo i nehnen k ab wo i gewkai hegai mam haschu wabsh kia edgith mat koi wo s-ap muh. Pi o hohho'ith g Jiosh hegai mam haschu am hab junihim.

Am g wo s-chegitok mam wa haschu ab em-mashcham k ab wo i s-wohog elith k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Kumtp pi wo sha nehnen, nt s-a'agi ia wo jiwia hab sha masma mo g s-chu ehskam. Kumt pi wo sha'i mahchk g ohla mant hekith wo i jiwia.
“Ha'ijj ahpim amai Sardis t am am hi wa si e nuhkuth mat pi ha'ichu wo em-uamhu. Ahpim mam s-ap am hab e junihim amt ni-wehm wo himath s-tohtam e enithadathch.

Hegam mat hedai wo gewito g pi ap'ekam at s-tohtam wo e enigadath. An o o'ohadag g ha-chechgig an thahm kahchim ch ed mo d e tho'ibiakam. Kunt pi wo sha'i oa g ha chechgig k wabshaba hab wo chei am tahgio g ni-ohg Jiosh ch am ha tahgio g anghiligaj mo d ni-hemajkamga.
“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Philadelphia t am. T heg am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani d hekia s-ap'ekam ch d wohokam ch an u'ukch g Davidbad yahwi. Ith ani hekaj ha'ichu kukpi'ok. T pi hedai wo e nako mas ab ep wo kuh. Kuni ha'ichu kukpa. T pi hedai wo e nako mas ab ep wo kuhpi'o.
S-mahch ani mam pi am hu i si s-gewpkthag ch wabshaba am oithch hab e junihim g ni-mashchama ch ab si ni-hiwig. Ab ant i hema kuhpi'o g kihjeg em-wehhejed. T pi hedai wo e nako mas ab ep wo kuh.

“Ha'i o hab e a'aga mo d Tutuligo ch d Jiosh hemajkamga. K eda hab chu'ig mo d wabsh Jiawul hemajkamga. Bant wo ha juh mat ab wo i hihi em-wui k ab wo i shulig k ab wo si has i em-el. T wo wehsijj s-mai mani ahpim ab si em-tatchua.
“Am am hab junihim g ni-chehanig ch s-bahbgim ab nakog ha'ichu. Nt heg hekaj wo em-nuhkuth heg amjed kudutadag mo ab him ha wui g wehs hemajkam mat am wo ha a'appe wehs jewed shuhthgim.
S-hohtam ant wo jiwia. Am g wo si nuhkuth hegai mani ab em-mahkch. T hab pi hedai wo sha'i em-wohppo'i hegai mani ab em-makiog hahawa.

“Bant wo ha juh hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam mat d wo u'ugchuk am Jiosh kihthag ed hab sha masma mo g che-tondag am ge'e cheopi ed. Kut ihtham pi hekith wo sha'i thagito g Jiosh kihthag. An ant ha ab wo o'oha g ni-Jioshga chehgig ch g Jiosh kihhim chehgig. Jiosh kihhim o d Wechij Jerusalem ch ab wo i hud Jiosh amjed an thahm kahchim ch ed. Ab ant ha ab ep wo o'oha g ni-wechij chehgig.
“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”

K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “Am g o'ohanith g ha wanimedtham hegam mo ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag Laodicea t am. T heg am wo ha ahgi mani hab kaij: “Ith o d ha'ichu ni-ahga ahni mani s-ap wohokamchuth g wohokam ab amjed g Jiosh ch am wehs thahm g Jiosh nahtoi.
S-mahch ani mam has chu'ig. Bam chum e elith mam s-ap ab ihm g Jiosh. Kum eda pi am hu woho i e thagitokch wui.
Nt heg hekaj gm hu hab wo i em-juh ab ni-amjed hab sha masma mamt gm hu wo wiho g wabsh s-huhk wasib.

Bam chech'e mo am wabsh i s-em-ap'e ha'ichu nam pi d s-kakais ch hab ep chech'e mam pi ha'ichu ep sha'i tatchua. Ni wabshaba em-ahgith mam si sho'ig ch s-ta ho'ige'ithama ch gm wabsh i s-thathpk ch pi nenea.
Ab g wo i e thagito ni-wui k hab masma wo edagi g s-wohom kaisthag ch s-kehg wehschuga ch kulani am wehhejed g em-wuhpui. Kumt hahawa pi wo sho'igk ch pi wo s-thathpk ch wo s-neneak.
Ha'ichu ani shohbith ch ha gewittan hegam mani ab si ha tatchua mat hekaj gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.

“Neh, ab ani em-waith ni-wui. K heg wa wepo mani ab kehk em-kihjeg ab ch ab shontpag ch ab em-chehcheg. Kumt wo kah mani ab neok k wo i kuhpi'o g kihjeg. Nt ab wo i wah. Kutt ab a'ai wo t-ihmath ch t-wehm wo si s-hehgigk hab masma matt hems wo t-wehm t-gegosithath.
Ni-ohg Jiosh at an ni-thai e-hugith an kownal ni-thaikud an nant pi gewito g pi ap'ekam. Kunt ahni am hab wa'ap wo em-thai ni-hugith an kownal thaikud t ab mamtp hedai wo gewito g pi ap'ekam.
“Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim. Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath.”

Ab ant hahawa i nen k ha'ichu ep neith. Am ni-tahgio o hab sha mahs mo ab kuhpi'okas g thahm kahchim hab sha masma mo ab ge kihjeg. Kuni ep kah g ne'okij g Jesus. K hab sha kaithag mo g kuikud ch hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Ab g i hihm. Nt am wo m-chehgi mat haschu hemho wa am hab wo e juh i'ajed imhab.”
T ha hekaj ab si i ni-wehmt g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag. K shahag wepo mat g thahm kahchim am e chehgi ni-wui. Kuki g ge'e kownal thaikud ab kehk. K an hema thaha ith ab.

K g wuhioshaj wabsh tonod hab masma mo hegam si s-kehg hohothai mo hab e a'aga ‘jasper’ ch ‘carnelian.’ K an kownal thaikud wehgaj hab chu'ig g kiohod. K ith s-chehthagi hab masma mo hegai s-kehg hothai mo hab e a'aga ‘emerald.’
Kuki an wehgaj hab ep chu'ig g gokko gamai gi'ik kownal thathaikud. Kuki an ha ab thadha g gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged ch s-tohtakaj e enigadathch ch g ohla gigiko ab wahpkch.

Kuki ab ge'e kownal thaikud amjed ab si memhe g wepgi. Kuki ab toahim g tataniki. Kuki g wewa'ak kuhchki am memeihim ba'ich g ge'e kownal thaikud no pi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wewa'ak masma e chehgithch am t-wehhejed.

Am ba'ich g ge'e kownal thaikud oki sha'i si s-thahpk ch hab masma mo g mi-lihtha am tadani ch am wabsh gai tonod. An wehgaj g kownal thaikud oki an a'ai gegok g gi'ik ha'ichu thothakam ch wehsko wuhpui.
K hema hab sha mahs mo g mawith. K hema hab ep mahs mo g wisilo. K hema g wuhioshaj hab mahs mo g o'othham wuhiosha. K hema hab mahs mo g ba'ag ch an tha'a.
K wehsijj ihtham chuhthp a'an. K g ha-a'an wehsko wuhpui. K chum hekith ne'e hab masma: “Ab ach si has elith g t-kownalig Jiosh. Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam ch si s-gewkthag ch chum hekith an ha'ichug.”
Kuki am ne'e ihtham gi'ik ha'ichu thothakam ch ab mahk g has elitha ch ho'ige'elig hegai mo chum hekith an ha'ichug ch an tha kownal thaikud t an.
K heg wui ab hab wa'ap i shuhullig hegam ge'eged ch am wuashulig g e-gigiko ch am wecho shuhullig ch ab ihm ch hab chech'e:
“T-kownalig Jiosh, ab ap ap'ethag matt ab wo si m-hehgchulithath ch ab wo si has m-elithath nap pi wehs s-gewkthag ch wehs ha'ichu nahto. K hab d m-elitha mo in hab chu'ig.”
Ni haha wabsh neith. Kuki an u'ukch g holiwek o'ohana s-apkojed e-nowi ed hegai mo an tha kownal thaikud t an. K wehsko o'ohanas ab ab ihtha ch wewa'akpa ab si bithshpi ch cheposithas.
Neith ani ehp g si s-gewk anghil. K heg si s-kaitham amog ch hab kaij, “Thoh'o am hugkam ap'ethag mat wo e nako mat wo wantsh g chechposig k ab wo i kuhpi'o ihtha o'ohana?”
T wabshaba pi hedai e cheh an thahm kahchim ch ed ch in jewed thahm ch am jewed wecho mat wo e nakog k wo kuhpi'o k an wo i nei eda g o'ohana.
Ni heg hekaj si pi ap ni-tahtk ch shoak.

K hab hahawa kaij hema hegam ge'eged ab ni-wui, “Pi g am shoakath. Neh, Mawith Namkam at gewito g pi ap'ekam k hab wo e nako mat wo wantsh g wewa'ak chechposig k ab wo i kuhpi'o g holiwek o'ohana. Bo masma hab chu'ig mo hab masma o'ohadag mo ith ab d Judabad amjedkam ch d ep Davidbad amjedkam.”

Kuni hahawa neith hegai moki hab ahg. K eda ihtha Mawith Namkam hab masma ab i e chehgithch mo g kahwal mad ch atki heki hu e muhkith k ithani am kehk si eda g kownal thaikud. K an wehgaj gegok hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thothakam ch hegam ge'eged. K hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch wewa'ak a'ag ch wewa'ak wuhpui. Ihtham wewa'ak wuhpui o hab d ahga mat ab amjed i hih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag k an wehsko neith ch nuhkuth g Jiosh nahtoi.
T am hih hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch k am bei g holiwek o'ohana ab s-apko nowij ab hegai mo ab tha kownal thaikud t ab.

T ha hekaj ab wui i shul hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged. K ihtham wehsijj ge ahlipa ch ohla hohas-haha'a. K hegam ha eda hohas-haha'a s-ap uhw shuhthagi ch ith d ha-ho'ige'ithahuna g Jiosh hemajkamga.

K am hema a'aga g wechij ne'i. K g ha-ne'i hab chu'ig: “Ahpi ap ge'e ap'ethag mapt wo e nakog k am wo bei g holiwek o'ohana k wo wantsh g chechposigaj napt pi e muhkith k hekaj ab uhpam i ha ui g hemajkam am wehhejed g Jiosh. K g m-u'i d wehsko thakam hemajkam ch d nahnko kaitham neneoktham ab wehs jejewed ha amjed.
Bapt ha juh mat wehs d wo papalk ch ab wo ihmath g Jiosh ch d wo kokownalk wehsko jewed thahm.”
Nt am hahawa nea k ha kah mu'i mihl anghil. Ihtham o an wehgaj gegok g ge'e kownal thaikud am ha wehm hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam ge'eged

ch si s-kaitham ne'e hab masma: “Hegai mat kahwalkaj e muhkith o ab ab ulini mamt am wo i kei wehs ha'ichu thahm k ab wehs wo mah g s-kaisthag ch ha'ichu amichuthadag ch gewkthag ch ab has elithadag ch hehgchulithadag ch ho'ige'ithadag.”

Kuni ha kah g wehs ha'ichu thoakam an thahm kahchim ch ed ch an jewed thahm ch am jewed wecho ch am ge'e kahchki ch ed. Wehs ihtham o am ne'e hab masma: “Tho ha wuikam g Jiosh heg wehm mat kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch mamb ab wo si pihk e elithath ha wui ch ab wo si has ha elithath ch ab wo ha hehgchulithath ch ab ha wui wo thagitokchith g e-gewkthag chum hekith.”
Tki hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ab wohokamchuth k hab kaij, “Am o wa woho ihtha.” T g ge'eged ab i shul wecho k ab si ihm.
Ni ab neith hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kutki hema gam wantsh hegam wewa'ak chechposig. K hema hab kaij hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam, “Ab g i hihm.”

K g ne'okij hab sha kaithag mo g tataniki. Nt hahawa ep chum nei. Tki g s-toa kawyu am hema i wuhsh. Kuki ab hema cheshaj ch g gaht u'a. Mt g gihko an hab juh mo'oj an. Ge oki gewkthag ch am i wuhsh mat wo ha gewito g hemajkam.
Kutki am hahawa ab kuhpi'o g gokkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuni kah g gokkokam ha'ichu thoakam. K hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm.”
Tki ab hema ep i wuhsh g kawyu k ge s-wegi. K ab hema cheshaj. Kumt ab mah g gewkthag mat hab wo juh g cheggiadag an jewed thahm mat g hemajkam wo a'ai e koktha. Kumt g ge'e is-pahyo ab mah.

Tki ab hahawa i kuhpi'o g waikkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuni kah g waikkokam ha'ichu thoakam. K hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm.” Nt chum nei. T g s-chuk kawyu ab i wuhsh. K hema cheshaj ch g pisaltakud u'a.

K am hema neok ab ha shahgith hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hab kaij, “T wo si s-namkigk g ha'ichu hugi. Mt chum hems wo ha namkith g e-nahtoi am chikpank hemako tashkaj mamt wo ha nolawt g al hemako s-wehch pilkani o g waik s-wehch si-wahyo. Mt wabshaba pi wo shohbi g manjeki ch nawait.”
Tki gam hahawa wantsh k kuhpi'o g gi'ikkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Ni kah g gi'ikkokam ha'ichu thoakam. K hab kaij, “I hihm.”

Nt ab i chum nei. Tki g s-kohmagi kawyu ab i wuhsh. Kuki hema cheshaj ch hab chehgig Muhki. Kuki ab si mia oithch him hegai mash hab e a'aga Jiawul Kih. Mtki ihtham ab ha mah g gewkthag am thahm g hemako tahpani mo gi'ikko e tahpanch (¼) ihtha jewed. Kutki ha koktha cheggiadag ch ed ch g bihugigkaj ch mumkithagkaj. Tki g mischini ha'ichu thoakam hab wa'ap ha'i wo ha koktha.

Tki gam hahawa ep wantsh k kuhpi'o g hetaspokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuni neith ab wecho g iagchulithakud g ha-thothakag hegam matki e ko'ij heg hekaj mo am ahgahim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch pi sha'i thagito g ha'ichu e ahga.

Ihtham o si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij, “Si s-gewkam kownal ch si s-ap'ekam ch si s-wohokam, he'es at wo i tashk mapt haha wo ha lothai g hemajkam an jewed thahm k ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag heg hekaj mat t-koktha?”
Mt ab hahawa wehsijj i ha mahkhi g s-tohta liliwa k hab ha ahg mat wo sha'al ba'ich i e uh'ulinihogith k ab wo ai mat wehs wo e ko'ij hegam ha wehm pion ch ha-wepnag mat ha wepo masma wo e ko'ij.

Tki gam hahawa ep wantsh k kuhpi'o g chuhthpokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Tki am sha'i si u'ugij g jewed. Kutki g tash ge chuku hab masma mo g s-kowk s-chuk ikus. Kutki g mashath wehsko ge wegih hab masma mo g eh'ed.
Tki g huhu'u i shul ab thahm kahchim amjed an jewed thahm hab sha masma mat g pi bakam suhna wo i shul ab e-jehj amjed mat g s-gewk hewel wo si u'ugij.
Tki g thahm kahchim ab wabsh i huhug hab sha masma mat g tapial wo i e holiwkath k gd hu wo e cheh. Tki wehs g thohtha'ag ch g al si'iskod jejewed am shuhthagi ch ed gm hu gawulko i e uh'ul.

Ni ha neith matki wehs chum e e'esto g hemajkam, chum hems g kokownal ch si s-has haha'ichu ch shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch s-gewpkkam ch hegam ehp mo d sho'igkam ch hegam mo d nenehol. Am atki chum e e'esto chehcho ch ed ch am hohothai wepcho

ch ab si hihnk thohtha'ag ch hohothai wui hab kaijch, “Ab g wo i shulig t-thahm mat pi wo t-neithath g Jiosh. Oi g wo t-e'esto ab amjed hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch mat pi wo s-ko'okam t-namkith.
E o aihim g lothaita tash. Kutt pi wo sha'i t-nako matt ab wui wo gegokiwua.”

Ntki haha wabsh ha nei g gi'ik anghil. K hema ab kehk si'alig tahgio ch hema ab huduni tahgio ch hema ab wakolim tahgio k ch hema ab juhpin tahgio. Kuki ihtham an u'ukch g gi'ik hewel mat pi an hu wo hewedath jewed thahm o an kahchki thahm. Kuki gm hu wabsh i pi hoini wehs ha'ichu.

Kuni hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. Kuki ith ab him si'al wecho amjed ch g Jiosh cheposithakud u'a. Kuki eda ab mahks hegam gi'ik mat wo padch g jewed ch kahchki. K wabshaba ihtha hema ab ha wui hab kaij.
“Pi g am s-ko'okam has wo juhni g jewed ch kahchki ch kukui. Kutt ab ho'ip kia ha chepos g Jiosh pionag ab ha-koka ab.”
Kuni kah mash d siant gi'ikko wehst-mahm gamai gi'ik mihl (144,000) hegam mamt ha chepos heg hekaj Jiosh cheposithakud.
Am o ha'ichug g gamai gohk mihl (12,000) ab wehsijj i ha amjed g t-shohshonbad. Ihtham o wa d gamai gohk ch wa hab chechgig Judah, Reuben, Gad,
Asher, Naphtali, Manasseh,
Simeon, Levi, Issachar,
Zebulun, Joseph, Benjamin.

Ntki hahawa ep ha nei moki am sha'i si ge'e hemapig hab chu'ig. Kuki pi ta kuintama ihtham hemajkam ch ab amjed g wehsko jejewed ch d nahnko mahs o'othham ch nahnko kaitham neneoktham. Kuki am thaha e-kownal thaikud ab hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuki hegam mu'i hemajkam am ba'ich gegok ch s-tohtakaj e enigadathch ch g ha'ichu i'ibhonig an uh'ukch
ch si s-kaitham neneok ch hab kaij: “T-tho'ibiathag o ab amjed g Jiosh ch ab amjed hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.”
Kuki wehsijj g anghil an ha wehgaj gegok ch am i shulig ch ab ihm g Jiosh ch hab ep kaij:
“Ab ach si ho'ige'ith ch si hehgchulith g Jiosh no pi wehs edgith g amichuthadag ch gewkthag chum hekith. Amen.”
Tki hema hegam ge'eged ab ni-kakke k hab kaij, “Thoh'o wud ihtham hemajkam mo s-tohtam e enigadathch ch hebai amjed hihim?”

Ni hab kaij ab wui, “Pi ani sha'i mahch. Ahpi ap wa s-mahch.” K hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Ihtham o d hegam mat ab s-ap gahi wuwha g si ge'e sho'igchuthadag. Heg o wa wepo mat am i wapko g e-wepschuga heg hekaj eh'edaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
Heg o hekaj ia gegok Jiosh ba'ich ch ab ihm wehs tashkaj ch s-chuhugam oithk. Kut g Jiosh wo ha nuhkuthath chum hekith.
Pi at thahm d ep wo bihugkoik o d wo tonkkoik. Pi at hekith ep wo s-tonik ha wehhejed.

Hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch at wo ha nuhkuthath hab masma mo g kahwal nuhkuththam ch am wo i ha wanim heg wui s-kehg thoakag mo heg wepogithas shonkam shuhthagi. Kut g Jiosh ab wehs wo i oa g ha-oh'og.”
Tki am hahawa wantsh k kuhpi'o g wewa'akkokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kuki gm hu wabsh i pi shahmuni an thahm kahchim ch ed am hu'i eda hugkam ohla.
Kuni haha wabsh ha neith hegam wewa'ak anghil moki am gegok Jiosh tahgio. Mtki ihtham ab i ha mahkhi g wewa'ak kukuikud.

Kuki am kehk g iagchulithakud kownal thaikud ba'ich. Tki heg wui am hema ep jiwia g anghil k g ohla ha'a u'a. Kumtki am eda ge'e to'i g s-ap uhwchu mat ab wo i wehnath g ha-ho'ige'ithalig g Jiosh hemajkamga k am wo iagchul Jiosh wui.
Kutki g anghil mehi g s-ap uhwchu. Tki g kuhbs ab amjed am uhgk i chesh wehnathk g ha-ho'ige'ithalig g hemajkam.
Tki am hahawa bei g mehi ab amjed g iagchulithakud heg hekaj ohla ha'a k am iawua jewed thahm. Kutki am sha'i si kop g tataniki k si s-kaithag. Kuki g wepgi an tohonnod ch g jewed si u'ugij.
Tki hegam wewa'ak anghil mo u'a g wewa'ak kukuikud am i e nako mat wo ku.

Tki g wehpeg anghil am si kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Tki g chea ch mehi wehnathch g eh'ed ab i e iawua an thahm g jewed. Kutki hemako tahpani mei g jewed mo waik e tahpanch (⅓). Kutki g kukui hab wa'ap masma ha'as meitto. Tki g washai wehs meitto.

Tki g gokkokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Tki am ha'ichu e tha'ich ge shuhthagi ch ed ch hab sha mahs mo g ge ge'e tho'ag ch meihim. Tki hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g ge shuhthagi wabsh e eh'edch.
Tki ha'akia ep koi g ha'ichu thoakam am ge shuhthagi ch ed ch ha'akia ep wachkk g wapalko am shuhthagi ch ed.

Tki g waikkokam anghil am hahawa ep ku. Tki g ge'e hu'u ab i gei thahm kahchim t amjed k hab masma meihim mo g kuhchki ch ma'ish g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g a'akimel ch shohshonkam shuhthagi.
K hab chehgig ihtha hu'u S-siwkam. Kutki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g shuhthagi wabsh ge siwa. Tki mu'i hemajkam koi chum i'ik ihtha shuhthagi no pi si s-siw.

Tki g gi'ikkokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Kutki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g tash ch mashath ch huhu'u ge chuku. Kutki heg hekaj ha'as huhug g ha-tonlig ch ha'as tash pi tonod tash oitham ch chuhug oitham.

Nt am hahawa ep i nen k kah. Kuki si s-kaitham hab kaij g ba'ag an uhgk tha'athch, “Eh, si s-ta ehbithama! That wo si s-ta ehbithamak am ha wehhejed hegam mo an kih jewed thahm mat ab wo kaitha g kuikud ab ha amjed hegam waik anghil mat am ep wo kuhk.”
Tki am hahawa ep kuhu g hetaspokam anghil g e-kuikudkaj. Kuni neith g hu'u. Tki ith am gei jewed thahm ab thahm kahchim t amjed. Kumtki ab mah hegai yahwi mo heg d wuikam wag mo pi hebai hug.
Kutki ihtha hu'u am kuhpi'o hegai wag. Tki g kuhbs hab masma ab i wuhsh mo ab amjed g si ge'e nahthakud. Kutki g tash tonlig wabsh wehsko chuku heg hekaj kuhbs ab amjed g wag.
Tki g ge'eged shosh'o ab i huhud amjed g kuhbs an thahm g jewed. Kumtki ab ha mah g gewkthag mat s-ko'okam wo ha juh hab masma mo g nanakshel.
Kum hab ha ahg mat pi wo ko'okam has juh g washai ch kukui ch wehs ha'ichu wuhshanig. Hegam atsh wo wa'i s-ko'okam has ha juh hemajkam mo pi ab hu cheposithas e-koka ab heg hekaj Jiosh cheposithakud.

Kumtki pi ha hiwigi ihtham shosh'o mat wo ha koktha ihtham hemajkam k wabshaba wabsh wo s-ko'okam ha sho'igch hetasp mashath ab. Kuki g s-ko'ok ab amjed g ha-sho'igchutha hab masma s-ko'ok mo g nakshel ke'i.
Kutki heg oitham hetasp mashath ihtham hemajkam wo chum si s-ko'im k wabshaba pi wo koi.
Kuki ihtham shosh'o hab mams mo hegam kakawyu mo e hekaj am cheggiadag ch ed. Kuki g ha-mohmi hab mams mo g u'uwi ha-mohmi. K an ha-mohmi an wahpkch g ohla gigiko.
Kuki g ha-wuhpiosha sha o'othham ha-wuhpiosha mams. Kuki g ha-tahtami hab mams mo g mawith tahtami.
Kuki g ha-babsho ab ha'ichukaj mam'aishch mo hab sha mams mo g wainomi koktoni. K g ha-a'an hab sha kaithag mo g mu'i cheggiakud kakalit an wohpo mat wo ha cheggia.
Kuki g ha-bahbhai ch ha-u'ush hab mams mo g nanakshel ha-u'ush. K g e-bahbhaikaj e nakog mat wo s-ko'okam has ha juh g hemajkam hetasp mashath ab.

Kuki ep ge kownalig. K ith am ha wanimed ch d hegai anghil mo nuhkuth g s-juhk wag ch hab chehgig am t-ne'oki ed Abbadon k ch am Greek ha-ne'oki ed hab chehgig Apollyon. K ith hab d ahga Ha'ichu Padchuththam.
Tki am i huhug ihtha wehpeg si s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu. K ith i thahm matki am hab ep wo e juh g gohk si s-ta ehbitham ha'ichu.
Tki g chuhthpokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. Kuni kah mo ab hema neok ab chuhchpulij amjed hegai ohla iagchulithakud mo am kehk ba'ich g Jiosh.
K hegai mo ab neok hab kaij heg wui anghil mo d chuhthpokam ch an u'ukch g kuikud, “Ha g thagito hegam gi'ik anghil mo am e wupulshch heg bahsho akimel mo hab chehgig Euphrates.”

Mtki am i ha thagito ihtham gi'ik anghil. Ihtham oki wa e nahtokch ith si wehhejed ohla ith si tash ed ith si mashath ab ch ith si ahithag ed mat wo ha koktha g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch wehs hemajkam.
Kum am ni-ahgith mash d gohk siant mi-yohn (200,000,000) ihtham mo g kakawyu ha chehchejch.

Kuni am ni-tahgio neith g kakawyu ch hegam mo ha chehchejch. Kuki g ha-wainomi koktoni si s-wepegi ch ep s-o'am ch hab masma s-chehethagi mo g thahm kahchim. K g kakawyu ha-mohmi hab mams mo g maipith ha-mohmi. K ab ha-chihchini amjed ab i wuhshani g mei ch kuhbs ch s-uam uhw.
Tki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g hemajkam e ko'ij ith hekaj waik ha'ichu mo ab wuhshani ha-chihchini amjed.
Kuki ihtham kakawyu hab wa'ap s-gewpkthag am ha bahbhai am. Ha-bahbhai oki hab mams mo g kohk'oi ch ab ge mohmi. K ith hekaj s-ko'okam has ha wua.

Kutki wabshaba hegam hemajkam mat an wih pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig k ab wabsh kia ha ihm g jijawul ch ab ep ha ihm g e-jijoshchutha. Kuki eda ihtha pi am hu ha'ichu d i ha-wehmtadag. Ha-jijoshchutha o d wabsh ha'ichu ha-nahtoi ch pi ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu kah ch pi sha'i oiopo no pi d wabsh ohla ch plahtha ch kohwli ch hothai ch uhs.
Ihtham hemajkam atki pi sha'i thagito g e-mu'adag ch e-hihoina ch ha'ichu ehsig ch hegai mo s-tohntom ha'ichu wua a'ai e wehm.

Ntki hahawa ab nei matki ab hema i hud g s-gewk anghil ab thahm kahchim amjed. Ith oki g chewagikaj e enigadathch ch g kiohod an hab juhkch e-mo'o an. Kuki g wuhioshaj hab mahs mo g tash. K g kakhioj hab mahs mo g mehi am wuhshanim.
Ith oki g s-apko e-tadkaj am keishch g ge shuhthagi ch g s-ohgig e-tadkaj am keishch g jewed. Kuki an hab chu'ig g o'ohana nowij ed ch pi holiwkas.
Kuki am si s-kaitham neok ch hab sha kaithag mo g mawith ab todk. Kutki g wewa'ak tataniki ab hahawa uhpam neneo todkch.
Nt am haha wabsh wo i chum o'oha. Tki wabshaba ab hema neo thahm kahchim t amjed k hab kaij, “Pi g am hedai sha'i ahgith mo has kaij ihtham wewa'ak tataniki. Pi g an hu sha'i o'ohan.”
Kutki ihtha anghil mo an thahm kehk g ge kahchki ch jewed ab si uhgk i bei g s-apkojed e-nowi ab thahm kahchim wui
k hab kaij, “Jiosh o chum hekith an ha'ichug ch nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed kahchim ch ge kahchki ch wehs ha'ichu mo am ha eda ihtham k hab kaij mat am wa e ai mat ge'e ha'ichu hab wo e juh.
Wewa'akkokam anghil at am wo kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. T am hab haha wo juh g Jiosh g s-a'agi e-apchutha mo wa am ha ahgith hegam e-pionagbad mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.”
Kutki hegai mo wa ab neok ni-wui ab thahm kahchim t amjed ab ep neok k hab kaij, “Neh, an o u'ukch g o'ohana hegai anghil mo an thahm kehk g kahchki ch jewed. Am g hihm k ab beh'i.”
Nt am hih wui hegai anghil k ab tahni mat wo ni-mah. K hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Ab g be k huhgi. T wo si s-i'owik mapt wo huh ch wabshaba wo siwa am m-wohk ed.”
Nt ab bei g al o'ohana nowij ab k huh. K s-wohom si s-i'owi mant huh. Nt wabshaba am i bah. T hahawa si siwa am ni-wohk ed.
Kum ab hahawa ep ni-ahgith ihtha, “Am apt ep wo o'oha g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab ha amjed mu'i nahnko mahs mehk jewed thakam hemajkam ch kokownal ch nahnko kaitham neneoktham.”
Kumtki ab hahawa hema ni-mah g kuintakud uhs k hab ni-ahg, “I g wuhshani k an kuint g Jiosh cheopiga ch g iagchulithakud k wo ha kuint hegam mo am e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui amai.

T wabshaba hegai mo an wehgaj kolhaitas am i e thagito ha wui g nahnko mahs hemajkam. Pt pi an hu has wo i juh. Ihtham nahnko mahs hemajkam at wo kehiwia hegai mo d chum si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim am oitham g gi'ikko wehst-mahm gamai gohk (42) mashath.

Jiosh o hab kaij, “Gohk ant wo ha mah g ni-pionag g gewkthag. T ihtham am wo ahgahi g ha'ichu ni-ahga ab wabsh sho'ig e enigadath g thahumkaj heg oitham hemako mihl gohk siant chuhthpo wehst-mahm (1260) tash.”

Neh, t am hahawa ni-chehgi matki has wo masmak ihtham gohk. Kutki hab wo masmak mo hegam gohk olive u'us wuhshanig mo wa heki hu o'ohanas ab ha amjed ch hab ep wo masmak mo hegam gohk lalampa mo am chuhch ge'e cheopi ch ed.
Kuki g mehi ab i wushke ha-chihchini amjed ch ha koktha g ha-obga. Kut hedai wo i chum s-ko'okam has ha juh k wo e koktha.

Ab oki mahks g ap'ethag mat wo kuh g thahm kahchim. T pi wo ha juhkath heg oitham mat am wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga. Ab oki ep mahks g ap'ethag mat wo eh'edch g shohshonkam shuhthagi k an wo i wuhshath g nahnko mahs si sho'igthag ch mumkithag ia jewed thahm.

Tki am wo i nahto g e-chikpan. Tki ab hema wo i wuhsh g s-ta ehbithamakam o'othham ge shuhthagi t amjed k e wepogithch g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch wo ha cheggia k wo ha gewito k wo ha koktha ihtham gohk.

Tki g ha-ko'ithag am wo wehchkath wohg ch ed heg eda ge'e kihhim mat wa amai g s-ap'ekam t-kownalig ab e naggia kots t ab. Ihtha kihhim at e wepodath g si pi ap'ekam k hab e a'aga Sodom ch hab ep e a'aga Egypt.
Wehs nahnko kaitham neneoktham an wehs jewed thahm atki wo ha neithath mat ihtham gohk am wo wehchk waik eda hugkam tash. Kumtki pi wo ha hiwigi mamt gd hu wo ha hihash.
Tki g hemajkam wo si s-hehgigk mat koi ch wo pipiast k ab a'ai wo e mah g ha'ichu mahkigdag noki pi ha sho'igchuth ihtham gohk.
Am i thahm g waik eda hugkam tash, ni am neith matki g Jiosh ab haha wo i ha mah g thoakag. Tki wo gegokiwua. Kutki wehsijj hegam mat wo nei ihtha wo si s-ehbeni.
Kutki ihtham gohk wo kah mo ab hema si neok ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Ab g wo i hihim.” Kutki am wo i chehchsh thahm kahchim wui am chewagi ch ed am ha-neithag ed g e-obga.

Tki am wa'i hekaj am si s-gewkam wo u'ugij g jewed. Kutki g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch (1/10) g kihhim wo i gei. Kutki wewa'ak mihl (7000) hemajkam wo e ko'ij heg eda jewed u'ugij. Kutki hegam ha'i matki am wo wih wo sha'i si s-ehbeni k ab wo si has el g gewkthaj g Jiosh.
Ith o d i gokkokam ha'ichu s-ta ehbithamakam mat ia'i kuhgi. T wabshaba g waikkokam hahawa s-hohtam hab wo e juh.

Kut g wewa'akkokam anghil am hahawa kuhu g e-kuikudkaj. K am ha'i si s-kaitham neneok ab thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij, “Wehs g kokownaltalig ia jewed thahm at d haha wo Jiosh kownaltaligk. Kut am wo ha thahmkath g si e-kehsha wehm i'ajed ch chum hekith.”
Kutki hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged ab i shulig k gd hu si kokawua k ab ihm g Jiosh
ch hab kaij: “T-kownalig Jiosh, chum ap hekith an ha'ichug ch am hahawa wehs i chehgi g e-gewkthag k am i himch g e-kownaltalig. Kuch heg hekaj ab si m-ho'ige'elith.

Hegam mo pi m-mahch o si s-babga. Kut e ai mapt wo ha lothai. Wehsijj g ko'i at wo i wuwhag k wo e lothaitach. Kupt wo ha mah g ha-mahkigdag g ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam ch wehs hegam mo d m-hemajkamga ch ab s-m-wohog elith, chum as hedai d wo k. E at ai mapt gm hu hab wo i ha juh hegam mo padchuth g jewed” Neh, bo kaij hegam ge'eged.

Kutki g Jiosh cheopi an thahm kahchim ch ed ab i e kuhpi'o. T am e chehgi hegai uhs washa mo am eda wehch g Jiosh ha'ichu ah'athadag. Kut am si tohonno g wepgi. K an kaithag g tataniki. T g jewed u'ugij. T g chea s-gewkam gei.

Am atki hahawa ha'ichu si ge'e e chehgi an thahm kahchim ch ed. Am aniki neith mat g uwi am hema i wuhsh. Kuki g ipudaj hab mahs mo g tash. Ihtha uwi oki an keishch g mashath ch g gihko ab wahkch e-mo'o ab. K ith ab gamai gohk huhu'u an thadha.
Kutki wo ge madt. Tki ab i hihhi g s-ko'ok matki wo mahmadho. K hekaj am si shoshshak.

Am atki hahawa ha'ichu ep i e chehgi thahm kahchim ch ed. Niki am neith matki am hema i wuhshani k e wepogith g ge'e nehbig hujud ch ge s-wegi ch ge wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag. K g gigiko an hab chuhchu'ig wehs ha ab g mohmij.

Kutki g e-baikaj i ha chewaim g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g huhu'u k im hu hab i ha juh ab thahm kahchim amjed ch am ha nehnich jewed thahm. Kutki wo mahmadho hegai uwi. T ihtha Nehbig Hujud e wepogiththam am wui i kekiwua mat wo huh g madaj mat wabsh wo chum mahsi.
Kutki am i mahmadho g uwi. Tsh g madaj am d wo kownalk wehs ha thahm g jejewed. Mtki am ha hekaj bei g ali k gm hu i bei Jiosh wui. K heg an tha kownal thaikud ed.
Tki hegai uwi gm hu heb hu meh am tohono jewed ch ed. Am atki i apch g Jiosh wehhejed mat am wo e nuhkuth hemako mihl gohk siant chuhthpo wehst-mahm (1260) tash.

Tki an haha wabsh g cheggiadag hab e juh Jiosh kihthag ed. Hegai anghil mo hab chehgig Michael g e-anghiliga ha wehm oki cheggia g Nehbig Hujud. K wehs g jijawul am i wehmt g Nehbig Hujud. Tki wabshaba hegam Michael ha gehg. Kumtki hahawa pi ha hiwigi mas an ep wo ha'ichugk Jiosh kihthag ed.

Ihtha Nehbig Hujud atki gm hu si e wua ab amjed g thahm kahchim. Heg oki wud mash wa ko'oi masma ch hab chehgig ge Jiawul ch hab ep chehgig Satan. Ith o ha iattogith g wehs hemajkam an jewed thahm. Ab amt i ha nehnich g piongaj wehmaj.

Ntki hahawa hema ep kah an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kuki ith si s-kaitham hab kaij, “Neh, chum o hekith ab kehk g ge Jiawul Jiosh ba'ich ch ab chum ha'ichu ha abchuth g Jiosh hemajkamga. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu i wuhshath k am i maskogi g si e-Kehsha gewkthag. Kut hab wa masma i e maskogi g ha-tho'ibiathag g Jiosh hemajkamga.
“Jiosh si Kehsha at am i e thagito mat g eh'edaj e iagchul ab Jiosh wui. K g hemajkamgaj heg hekaj ab si hiwig ch s-ap ahgachug g wohokam ab amjed ch hab gehg g Jiawul, chum as hems wo e muhkith.

T wo si s-hehgigk wehsijj hegam mo am ha'ichug Jiosh kihthag ed. T wabshaba wo si e sho'igch hegam mo am ha'ichug jewed thahm. Jiawul at si s-bagam ab wo i hud jewed thahm s-mahchch mo pi sha'i tash hiwgithas.”
Pegih, am amtki wa tha'ich jewed thahm ihtha Nehbig Hujud mo d Jiawul. Tki wa eda heki hu madt hegai uwi. T g Nehbig Hujud an ha hekaj i hu'ui.
Kumtki ab a'anch g uwi g ba'ag a'ankaj mat gm hu wo tha'a k gn hu wo e ehstokch tohono jewed ch ed. Kumtki am wo nuhkuthath waik eda hugkam a'ahithag mat g Nehbig Hujud pi wo mua.
Tki g Nehbig Hujud ab haha wabsh i iawua g shuhthagi e-chini amjed am oithk hegai uwi mat gm hu wo i chum moht.
Tki wabshaba g jewed ab i wehmt g uwi, heg wa wepo mat ab i kuhpi'o g e-chini k im hu bah hegai shuhthagi mo ab tha'iwuni Nehbig Hujud chini amjed.

Tki haha wabsh woho'i bagat g Nehbig Hujud ab wui g uwi k amjed am i ha cheggia hegam mo ab d amjedkamaj. Uwi amjedkam oki d hegam mo ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh chehanig ch ab s-wohochuth hegai wohokam mat am i ha tashogi g Jesus.
Kuki am hahawa kehk g Nehbig Hujud ge shuhthagi koa an.

Ntki haha wabsh nei hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam o'othham mo e wepogithch g mischini ha'ichu thoakam. Ith at ab i wuhsh ge shuhthagi t amjed k ge wehst-mahm a'ag ch wewa'ak mohmi. K an a'agaj an gigiko an shahsh'ai. K an mohmij an o'ohadag g si pi ap'ekam chechgig.

Ihtha s-ta Ehbithamakam oki hab sha mahs mo g ohshod. K g tahtdaj hab sha mams mo g judumi tahtad. K g chinij hab mahs mo g mawith chini. T g Nehbig Hujud ab mah g gewkthag ch e-kownaltalig wehs jewed thahm.

Hema g mo'oj o hab sha mahs matki wa e muhkith k wabshaba ep thoa k e chegito. Kut ab si has i el g hemajkam wehsko k am i oi ihtha s-ta Ehbithamakam. T wehs hemajkam ab i ihm g Nehbig Hujud nat pi ab mah g e-gewkthag hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam
k ab ep ihm g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch hab kaij, “Pi oki hedai hab sha'i masma mo ihtha. Pi atki hedai wo sha'i e nako mat wo cheggia.”
Kum wabsh hiwgith ihtha mat wo si pi kehg neokath. Kumtki ab ep mah g gewkthag am oitham g gi'ikko wehst-mahm gamai gohk (42) mashath.
Kut ihtha am ha hekaj pad neo ab wui g Jiosh k pi ap hekaj g chehgigaj ch nahnko ahg g Jiosh kihthag ch hegam mo an kih kihthaj ed.
Ab amtki hiwigi mat wo ha cheggia g Jiosh hemajkamga k wo ha gewito. Kumt ab ep mah g gewkthag am ha thahm g wehsko thakam hemajkam mo has i kaitham d neneoktham.

K wabshaba g Jiosh hemajkamga ha chechgig o an o'ohadag e tho'ibiakam ha-o'ohana ed. Ihtha o'ohana o d enigaj hegai mat kahwalkaj e muhkith am ha wehhejed. Ihtham e tho'ibiakam at pi ab hu wo ihm hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam. Hegam wa'i mo pi an hu o'ohadag heg eda o'ohana at ab wo ihmath hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam.
Am g wo s-ap i a'amichuth ihtha.

Hegam mo hedai d ha wuikam mat wo e kuhpach at hemho wa wo e kuhpach. Hegam mo d ha wuikam mat wo e ko'ij at hemho wa wo e ko'ij. K eda d ha-wuikam g Jiosh hemajkamga mat wo s-chu nakogath ch wo s-gewkk am e-wohochuthadag ed.

Ni hahawa ep neith matki ab hema ep i wuhsh gd hu jewed wecho amjed. Ith o hab wa'ap mahs mo g s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu thoakam ch ge gohk a'ag hab sha masma mo g kahwal a'ag ch hab masma neok mo g nehbig hujud.

Hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wehpeg i wuhsh oki ab mahkch g gewkthag hegai mat am hahawa i wuhsh. K heg ab wehs ha chehani g hemajkam jewed thahm mat ab wo si has elithath hegai wehpeg s-ta Ehbithamakam matki uhpam e chegito.

K ith hiwgith mat am hab juh g si ge'e s-hasig ha'ichu. K wehs hemajkam neith mat ab i huduni g mehi thahm kahchim t amjed in jewed thahm. Bo wa masma wehs ha iattogith g hemajkam ith thahm jewed ch d s-chu Iattomakam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam ch ab ha chehani mat am ha'ichu wo nahto mat heg wo wepogithask s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wehpeg i wuhshani k atki e muhkith g is-pahyokaj k uhpam e chegito.

Hegai s-chu Iattomakam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam atki am ihbheiwua ith eda mat am e nahto. Tki heg hekaj e nako ihtha ha'ichu ha-nahtoi mat wo neok k ep wo ha koktha wehs hegam mat pi ab hu wo i shul wui.

Tki ihtha s-chu Iattomakam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam i ha huilisamath wehs hemajkam matp hedai d wo i k mat an wo e chepos heg hekaj wehpeg s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig. Kumtki wa woho an ge ha chechpos an s-apkojed ha-nohnhoi an ch ab ha-koka ab.
Pi atki hedai wo e nako mas ha'ichu wo ha nolawt o ha'ichu wo gagda, heg hi wa mat ab wo cheposigk g s-ta Ehbithamakam chehgigkaj o heg hekaj nuhmilo mo d chehgigaj nuhmilo.

Ith oki d si s-juhk ha'ichu. Kut am wo i mamche matp hedai wo s-chu amichuthath mo has d ahga hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam nuhmilo no pi hegai nuhmilo d chehgigaj hema o'othham. K ihtha nuhmilo d chuhthp siant chuhthpo gamai chuhthp (666).

Ntki ab ep nei Kuki hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch an kehk Sion tho'ag t ab. K ith wehm g siant gi'ikko gamai gi'ik mihl (144,000) hemajkam am gegok. K an ha-koka an o'ohadag g chehgigaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch ch heg ohg chehgig.
Kuni kah mo ab hema neok thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaithag mo g ge'e shuhthagi s-kaitham med ch hab kaithag mo g tataniki an thoahim. Hegai mani kah o hab kaithag mo mu'i a'alpa am e gew.
Hegam hemajkam mani wa ha neith oki am ahg g wechij ne'i ch am gegok wui hegai kownal thaikud ch hegam ha wui gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam ge'eged. Kutki pi hedai ep wo e nako mas wo mai g ha-nei.

Ihtham oki d hegam mat pi sha'i ha hohont k si e nuhkuth mo pi ha wehm wohppo. Kut am ha wehhejed e muhkith hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch k ha tho'ibia. Kuki ihtham an oithahim mo hebai i oimmed ch d wehpegkam e tho'ibiakam.
Pi oki hekith ha'ichu ha iattogith ch pi ha chu'ichig.
Ntki hahawa hema ep nei g anghil. K ith an tha'a uhgk ch ahgahim g pi ha huhugetham s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ab ha wui g nahnko kaitham neneoktham an wehsko jewed thahm.

Si o s-kaitham hab kaij, “Ab g wo si has elith g Jiosh ch ab ihm. E at ai mat wo ha lothai g hemajkam. Ab g wo i tohtonwua k ab wo i ihm g Jiosh. Heg at nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed ch ge shuhthagi ch g shohshonkam shuhthagi.”

Tki am hahawa hema ep i oi hegai wehpeg anghil k hab kaij, “I at gei ihtha ge'e kihhim. Wehs hemajkam o am hab wua g pi ap'ekam a'ai e wehm ith hekaj kihhim. K heg hekaj hab e a'aga Babylon. Shahag wepo mo ha nawkkoichuth.” Neh, bo kaij hegai gokkokam anghil.

Tki g waikkokam anghil am i ha oi hegam gohk k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “T wo ha mah g Jiosh g s-ko'ok namkithadag wehs hegam mo hedai ab si has elith hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam ch ab chechposithas heg hekaj cheposigaj e-koka ab o an e-nohnhoi an. Ith o heg wa wepogithas mat g Jiosh ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok nawait nat pi am wo s-ko'okam ha mehi g ha'ichu s-mehithagkaj am ha tahgio g s-ap'ekam anghil ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.

T g kuhbthaj hegai mehi mat s-ko'okam wo ha mehi am wo wuhshanith uhgk ia'i amjed ch chum hekith. Pi o am hu ha'ichug g ulinihogig ha wehhejed hegam mat ab i shul wui g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch ab wui g wepogithaj k ab e chepos heg hekaj chehgigaj.” Neh, bo kaij ihtha anghil.
Ith att hekaj hemho wo wa si s-chu nakogath ahchim mach d Jiosh hemajkamga ch ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh chehanig ch am s-gewkam oith g Jesus.

Ni hahawa hema ep kah. Kuki ith ab neok thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij mantsh an wo o'oha ihtha, “T wo si s-ap e taht hegam mat wo koi, ab s-wohochuthch mo g Jesus d ha-kownalig.” K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab kaij, “Tho si wohokam ihtha. T wo si s-ap e ulinihogi ihtham heg amjed s-wehch e-chikpan k ab wo bei g e-mahkigdag heg wehhejed.”
Ntki hahawa nei g s-toa chewagi. Kuki an ith thahm hema thak ch hab mahs mo g Jiosh si Kehsha. K g ohla gihko ab e wahkch mo'oj ab. K an u'ukch g s-mu'uk ohso.

T ab hema i wuhsh g anghil ab amjed g ge'e cheopi k ab si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij heg wui mo an tha chewagi ch ed, “Heg o wa wepogithas mapt an wo hikkumia g uhdwis bahithag g e-ohsokaj am wehsko jewed thahm. E at ai g ge'e lothaita tash. Kupt am wo i ha hemapai g hemajkam heg wehhejed.”
Kut hegai mo an tha chewagi thahm ab si i widu g e-ohso an jewed thahm heg wa wepo mat am hab wo juh g oda.
Niki hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. T heg ab i wuhsh cheopi t amjed an thahm kahchim ch ed k an hab wa'ap hema u'ukch g s-mu'uk ohso.

K am hema ep kehk g anghil ch am nuhkuth g nahtha ab ab g iagchulithakud. Ith at am hih heg wui mo g s-mu'uk ohso an u'ukch k si s-kaitham hab kaij, “E at ai g ge'e lothaita tash. K heg wepogithas mapt an wo hikkumia g uhdwis g e-ohsokaj.”
Kut wa woho ab i widu g anghil g e-ohso an jewed thahm k am hikkumia g uhdwis k am ha shul kehiwinakud ch ed. Ith o am chehgithch mat g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith.
Kum ha kehiwia g uhdwis gm hu jeg ed ab amjed g kihhim. T g ha-eh'ed ab i meh ab amjed g kehiwinakud hab masma mo g wi'inthag mo gohk siant mihya chewaj ch hetasp tad s-juhk.
