Ntki hahawa ep nei g si ge'e chehgitha an thahm kahchim ch ed. Wewa'ak anghil oki u'a g wewa'ak sho'igthag. Ihtham oki d si ha oithchkam sho'igthag. Jiosh atki ith hekaj am wo i kuhgi g s-gewk e-a'appemadag.

Neith ani mo am ha'ichu tadani ch hab sha mahs mo g mi-lihtha ch g mehi wehnags. Ha ani ep neith hegam mat gewito hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam pi ab hu has elithch g wepogithaj ch ab hu cheposig heg hekaj chehgigaj ch nuhmilo. Am oki gegok hugithaj an ihtha mo sha mi-lihtha mahs ch g a'alpa an u'ukch mat g Jiosh ab ha mah.

Mosesbad ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch oki ab ha mahkch g ne'i. K ith am a'aga: “T-kownalig Jiosh, thap si s-gewkthagkam. K g ha'ichu hab m-juni d si ge'e ha'ichu ch sha'i si s-kehgaj. T-kownalig an wehsko jewed thahm, tho si s-ap'ekam ch wohokam g m-himthag.

Wehsijj att ab wo si has i m-el. Pi at hedai wo sha'i pi am hu ah map d si ha'ichu nap pi ahpi d si hekia s-ap'ekam. Wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam at ab wo i hihim k ab wo i shul m-wui no pi wehsijj neith g si s-ap'ekam ha'ichu hab m-juni.”
Am i thahm ani hahawa ep neith moki ab kuhpi'okas g Jiosh cheopiga an thahm kahchim ch ed. Kuki heg eda am ha'ichug hegai ikus kih mo hab d ahga mo g Jiosh am ha wehmaj g e-hemajkamga.
Tki ab i wuwha g wewa'ak anghil k u'a g wewa'ak si oithchkam sho'igthag ab amjed g cheopi. Ihtham anghil oki si s-kehg s-tohtam e enigadathch ch g ohla babshodag an hab juhkch e-babsho an.
Tki hema hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ab ha mah ihtham wewa'ak anghil g wewa'ak ohla hohas-haha'a. Kuki ihtham shuhshuthch g s-ko'ok namkithadag.

Hegai cheopi o ab wabsh i shuhthags g kuhbskaj no pi am ha'ichug g s-tondam gewkthaj g Jiosh. Kut pi hedai wo e nako mas an hu wo i wah cheopi ch ed am hugkam mat wo kuhgi ihtham wewa'ak sho'igthag mat u'apa hegam wewa'ak anghil.

Kuni wa hema ep kah. K ith am s-kaitham neok ab amjed g cheopi ab ha wui ihtham wewa'ak anghil ch hab kaij, “Am g wo hihim k wo iawua g s-ko'ok namkithadag an jewed thahm ab ha amjed hegam hohas-haha'a.”

Tki g wehpegkam anghil am him k am iawua an thahm g jewed hegai mo wasibch e-hoas-ha'a ch ed. Kutki g si s-ko'ok ch s-ta ehbithama hihiwthag ha ai hegam mo ab ha ab hab chu'ig g s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig ch ihtham mat i shul ab wui g wepogithaj.
Tki amjed g gokkokam anghil am hahawa epai iawua hegai mo wasibch an ge shuhthagi thahm. Tki g shuhthagi hab masma e eh'edch mo g muhki eh'ed. Tki wehs ha'ichu koi am ge shuhthagi ch ed.
Tki amjed g waikkokam anghil am epai iawua hegai mo wasibch an a'akimel ch ed ch shohshonkam shuhthagi ch ed. Kutki e eh'edch g shuhthagi.
Kuni kah mo hab kaij ab Jiosh wui hegai anghil mo nuhkuth g shuhthagi: “Thap si hekia s-ap'ekam Jiosh ch chum hekith an ha'ichug. K ab d ha-wuikam ihtham g s-ko'ok namkithadag.
Iawua at g ha-eh'ed g m-hemajkamga ch hegam ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam. Kupt heg hekaj g eh'ed ab ha mah mat wo ih. Ith o wa si e gahgith ihtham.”
Niki amjed hahawa hema ep kah. K ith ab neok iagchulithakud amjed ch hab kaij, “T-kownalig Jiosh, thap si s-gewkthagkam. K g m-lothaita si woho ch si s-ap'e.”
Tki amjed g gi'ikkokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an tash t an. Kut ha mehi g hemajkam g e-s-tonikaj.
T eda ihtham pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi. Jiosh o ha hiwgith mat wo e sho'igch. K heg hekaj ab si s-ko'okam has ahg ch pi ab hu has elith g gewkthaj.

Tki amjed g hetaspokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an thahm g s-ta Ehbithamakam kownal thaikud. Kutki g s-chuhugam an gei wehsko s-ta Ehbithamakam kownalitalig ed. Kuki g hemajkam si e kihk'ishch pi nakogch g s-ko'ok
ch si pi kehg neneok ab Jiosh wui heg hekaj e-hihiwthag ch ha'ichu s-ko'ok ch wabshaba pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi.
Tki amjed g chuhthpokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch heg eda ge akimel mo hab chehgig Euphrates. Tki gaksh ihtha mat ab gahi wo i huhud g kokownal ab si'al wecho amjed.

Niki hahawa ep neith g waik pi kehg gewpkthag. K ihtham hab mahs mo g babath ch d jijawul ch ab i wuwha ha-chihchini amjed g Nehbig Hujud ch g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch g s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam ch hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu.
Ihtham waik gewpkthag atki am hihi ha wui g kokownal an wehsko jewed thahm mat ab wo i ha hemapai. Kutki ihtham kokownal wo ha cheggia g Jiosh hemajkamga.

(Bo kaij g Jiosh alithag, “Ab g wo ni-kaiham. Bant masma s-a'agi wo jiwia mo g s-chu ehskam. T wo s-ap e tahtkkath hegam mat wo s-nenenashanik. T wabshaba hegam mat pi hab wo masmak wo si e elithath hab sha masma mo an wabsh s-thahpkam oiopo.”)
Tki amjed hegam waik gewpkthag am ha u'apa g kokownal amai mo g Tutuligo hab a'aga Armageddon.
Tki amjed g wewa'akkokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an hewel ch ed. K ab hema si s-kaitham neok ab amjed hegai kownal thaikud mo am tha cheopi ch ed hab kaij, “Am at hab e juh.”

Tki am si tohonno g wepgi k am si kokp g tataniki. Tki g jewed si s-gewkam u'ugij. Pi oki hekith hab sha'i masma u'ugij g jewed am i amjed mat an e nahto g o'othham. Ith oki d si ge'e jewed u'ugij mo pi hebai hab sha'i masma.

Tki hegai ge'e kihhim waikpa e tahp. Kutki wehsko g kihhim gn hu a'ai jewed thahm i shul. Jiosh o am wa s-chegitok hegai ge'e kihhim mo hab e a'aga Babylon ch ab mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag. Ith at heg wo wepogithask mat ab wo ih g si s-nawmthag nawait nat pi heg hekaj si s-ko'okam wo e juh.
Kutki wehs g si'iskod jejewed ch thohtha'ag wo heb hu hihi.

Tki g sha'i si ge'eged chea an wo i shul. Ihtham oki hehemako am hu i siant s-wehch ch atki ab wo i shul thahm kahchim amjed am ha thahm hegam pi ap'ekam hemajkam. Kutki ihtham ab wo si pad neneo Jiosh wui.

T amjed hegam hema wewa'ak anghil mo an uh'ukch g wewa'ak hohas-haha'a am jiwia ni-wui k hab kaij, “Ab g i hihm k neith ihtha ge'e kihhim mo am miabithch kehk g mu'i a'akimel ch heg wepogithas mo g si pi ap'ekam chehpa'awi. Ith at wehsko wo ma'ish g jewed g pi ap'ekamkaj.

Kokownal wehsko jewed thahm at heg hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam. T g hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm wo noda hab juhkch g s-tohntom ha'ichu hab masma mamt wo nawkk i'ok g nawait. Neh, nt am wo m-chehgi mat has masma ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag ihtha pi ap'ekam kihhim.”

T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si i ni-wehmt. Tki g anghil am i ni-bei tohono jewed wui. Ni am g uwi neith. Kuki ith an thaichug s-wegi s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu thoakam ab. K ith wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag. K g pi ap'ekam chechgig an o'ohadag wehsko ab.

Ihtha uwi o si s-ihbhaimagim ch s-wegima e enigadathch ch g ohlakaj ch s-kehg hohothaikaj e hehosithch. K an nowij ed hab chu'ig g ohla tahsa ch shuhthags g si s-uam ha'ichu. Ith o hab d ahga mo d wabsh tohnto ihtha kihhim.
Ab koaj ab o o'ohadag g chehgig. K ith s-a'agi has d ahga ch hab chu'ig, “Si Ge'e Babylon kihhim o hab sha masma mo d ha-je'e g wehs chechpa'awi ch totonto ith thahm jewed.”
Neith ani mat sha'i si s-ap e taht ihtha uwi mat e ko'ij hegam mat pi thagito g Jesus. Heg o wa wepo mat nawm i'ok g ha-eh'ed. Kunt am i neithok wabsh woho'i si has ni-taht.
K ab ni-kakke g anghil ch hab kaij, “Shahchu apt ahgk si has e taht. Am ant wo m-ahgi mo has d ahga ihtha map s-neithma.

Ihtha s-ta Ehbithamakam mo wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag o d chum thoakamkahim ch hahawa e muhkith k wabshaba ep wo e chegito k ab wo i wuhsh s-juhk wag t amjed k hahawa ep wo e muhkith. T heg hekaj wo si has i e taht g pi e tho'ibiakam. Ihtham o g ha-chechgig pi an hu o'ohadag heg eda o'ohana mo an g ha-chechgig o'ohadag g e tho'ibiakam.
“K d ha-wuikam g Jiosh hemajkamga mat wo s-amich ihtha. Hegam wewa'ak mohmi o d wewa'ak ka'akwulk. K ihtham ha thahm thaha ihtha uwi. Ihtham mohmi o d ep wewa'ak kokownal.
Hetasp ihtham at im hu hab i e juh. K hemako d wabsh kia kownal. Kut hemako koi am hu i thahiwua k hekith am wo i thahiwua k pi sha'i tash am hu wo thakath.
Hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat e muhkith at d wo gigi'ikkokam kownalk. Ith o ha wehm chikpan hegam wehpeg wewa'ak kokownal ch gm hu wo him k wo e muhkith.
“Hegam wehst-mahm a'ag map neith o hab d ahga mat wehst-mahm kokownal ab ep wo i wuwha. Ihtham at he'es ab wo i wehmt hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam
k ab wo mah g e-gewkthag no pi wehsijj e wepo masma ha'ichu hab elith.

Ihtham at wo cheggia hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. T oi wa heg wo ha gewito no pi d ge'e kownal am ha thahm g kokownal. T hegam mo si s-gewkam am oith ihtha mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch am wehmaj wo ha gewito nat pi ab i ha waith k am i ha chuhcha.”

K hab ep kaij g anghil ab ni-wui, “Am ap neith mo ihtha uwi am mu'i ha thahm thaha g ge shuhshugi. K ith hab d ahga mat g ge'e pi ap'ekam kihhim am wo thahmkath mu'i jejewed ch mu'i nahnko mahs hemajkam.

Kut g Jiosh hab wo ha juh hegam wehst-mahm kokownal mat ab wo wechokath g s-ta Ehbithamakam. Kut e wehm wo si s-keh'ithath hegai ge'e kihhim mo wepogithas g pi ap'ekam uwi ch wehs ha'ichu wo wohppo'i. T heg gm wabsh wo i thahpkath. T ihtham wo huh g chuhkugaj k wo hugio g meikaj. Neh, bat wa masma am oithk hab wo e juh mo has i kaij g Jiosh.
Ihtha uwi map neith o d hegai ge'e kihhim mat s-gewkam an wo ha u'ukch g kokownal a'ai jewed thahm”
Am i thahm, ni hahawa ep neith g anghil. Tki ith ab i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k ge'e u'ukch g gewkthag. K ab amjed g tonlig wabsh wehsko tonod an jewed thahm.
K am si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij: “I at gei ihtha ge'e kihhim mo hab masma mo g chehpa'awi. Jijawul o ebkioth. Nahnko mahs s-u'amakam ch pi a'amkam u'uwhig o am kih eda.

Bat wa masma e padch g kihhim nat pi mu'i ha padch g hemajkam g pi ap'ekamkaj. Heg o wa wepo mat ha nawkkoich. T am wehmaj ab wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag. T g kokownal wehsko hab juh g pi ap'ekam ith hekaj kihhim mo g chehpa'awi wepogithas. T g s-kakais wehsko jewed thahm ba'ich i s-e kakaisch heg hekaj pi ap'ekam mo am hab e wua.” Neh, bo kaij g anghil.

Ni hahawa ep kah mo ab neok g Jiosh thahm kahchim amjed ch hab kaij: “Ab g wo i wuwhaki, ni-hemajkamga. Ab g wo i wuwhaki ab amjed ihtha kihhim mo hab sha masma mo g chehpa'awi. Pi g am hu wo wehmajk heg eda pi ap'ekam. Pi g ab hu wo wehmaj beh'i g s-ko'ok namkithadaj.
Pi ap chu'ichigaj o sha'i si uhgk sipulkas. Kuni s-chegito g pi ap chu'ichigaj.

S-ko'okam at hab em-juh. Kumt uhpam s-ko'okam hab wo juh. Ab g ba'ich wo i nodgith g chu'ichigaj wui. Heg at wo wa wepothagk mamt am wo i shuhthath g kohbaj heg hekaj i'ithag mo e thahm ba'ich i s-gewk mat wa has i masma am hab em-juh.

Ab g wo mahki g ha'as sho'igthag ch pi ap tahhathkam mo wa he'es hejel ab e mahkch g ab si has e-elithadag ch kaisthag. T wo si e sho'igch hab masma mo g hejel wi'ikam uwi k eda hab e elith mo d kownal ch pi hekith wo e sho'igch.

Kut ith hekaj g sho'igthaj wehs ab wo i shul thahm wabsh shel i e oitham. K g sho'igthaj d s-ko'ok mumkithag ch pi ap tahhathkam ch bihugig Am at wo meitto ihtha kihhim. S-gewkthag ani ch wo lothait k s-ko'okam wo namkith.” Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh.
Hegam kokownal mo wehmaj hab junihim g pi ap'ekam at wo si shoanith wehhejed am i neithok mamt mei.

Ihtham o ga hu wabsh mehk gegok no pi s-ehbith mat wo nei g sho'igthaj ch hab kaij: “Ih, sho'ig! Ihtha si ge'e s-gewk kihhim mo e wepogith g Babylon at sha'i si s-hohtam ab bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag.”
K g s-kakais ith thahm jewed hab wa'ap si shoani ch pi ap e tahtk wehhejed no pi hahawa pi hedai ha nolawt g ha-gagli.

Pi oki hedai ha nolawt g ha-ohlaga ch ha-plahthaga ch s-namkig hohothai ch g s-namkig ha-lohbaga ch g mamskal ch g s-namkig uhs. Nahnko ha'ichu oki hab wua g al-huanthi a'agkaj ch s-namkig uhs ch kohwli ch wainomi k ch s-namkig hothaikaj. K oi wa pi hedai ha nolawt.

Am o chum gagda hegai mo haschu am wehnaths g ha'ichu hugi ch nahnko mahs s-ap uhwchu ch nawait ch e ko'atham a-saithi ch chu'i ch pilkani ch haiwani ch kahwal ch kakawyu ch kakalit ch nenehol ch chum hems g o'othham thothakag. K pi hedai ha nolawt.
K hab kaij ihtham s-kakais ab wui hegai kihhim: “Wehs hegai map ab si tatchua at huhug. M-kaisthag ch s-m-kehgthag at im hu hab i e juh. Kupt pi thahm ep wo ha edagi.”
Hegam mat s-e kakaisch am ha'ichu gagdak atki ga hu wabsh mehk wo gegokk no pi s-ehbith g sho'igthaj. Ihtham at wo si shoanith ch wo pi ap e tahtkkath
ch hab wo kaijchith: “Ih, sha'i si sho'ig ihtha si ge'e kihhim mat wa eda ab wo si s-kehg e enigadathch g s-ihbhaimagi ch s-wegi lohbakaj k ab hab wo juhkchith g ohla hehosimhuna ch s-kehg hohothai.

T eda sha'i si s-hohtam wehs heb hu shul g e-kaisthag.” Wehsijj oki ga hu wabsh mehk gegok hegam mo d ha-ge'ege'ejig an wapalko ch ed ch hegam mo an thadhaichug ch hegam mo d pion an wapalko ch ed ch wehs hegam mo ab behe g e-kihthag ab ge shuhthagi t amjed.
Am o meihim g kihhim ch g kuhbs am wuhshani. K wehs ihtham am neith ch si hihnk ch hab kaij, “Pi o hekith hema kihhim hab sha'i masma d ge'e kihhim.”

T ihtham ab hahawa iawua g jewed e-mo'o ab k si s-kaitham hihnk ch si shoani ch hab kaij: “Sho'ig, sho'ig, ihtha si ge'e kihhim. Ihtha kihhim o wud mat ia s-e kakaisch hegam mo e'edgith g wapalko. Sha'i si s-hohtam at wehs ha'ichu heb hu shul ihtha kihhim.” Neh, bo kaij ihtham pi ap'ekam hemajkam.

Kut oi wa d wo si ge'e s-hehgigk an thahm kahchim ch ed mat i gei ihtha pi ap'ekam kihhim. Jesus chuhchai ch Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wehs g Jiosh hemajkamga at wo si s-hehgigk. Jiosh at ab wo abch ihtha kihhim g chu'ichig mo has ha juhkchkahim.

Kut am hahawa hema i e chehgi g si s-gewk anghil k am hema bei g hothai. Ihtha hothai oki ha'as ge'ej mo g si ge'e chu'ikud. T g anghil am tha'ich ge shuhthagi ch ed k hab kaij: “Bat masma am wo si e tha'ich ihtha ge'e kihhim mat pi hekith hedai ep wo neithath.
Hegam mumsigo mo ha gew g a'alpa ch uhs kukuikud ch kohwli kukuikud at pi hekith am hu ep wo piast amai. Pi at hekith am hu ep wo e chikp g nahnko mahs chikpan amai. Pi amt hekith am hu wo chu'ath.

Pi at hekith am hu ep wo e mehmheith g lalampa. Pi at hekith hedai am hu ep wo e hohont. Hegam mo d s-kakais iia o wa u'ukch g gewkthag wehsko jewed thahm. K wa ia ge has e wuihim g mamakai ch hekaj ha iattogith g hemajkam an wehs jewed thahm. T eda wehs huhug ihtha.” Neh, bo kaij hegai anghil.
Kumtki s-ko'okam wo namkith g kihhim nat pi ia e ko'ij g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch Jiosh hemajkamga. Chum o hems d chu'ichigaj hegam mat gn hu a'ai jewed thahm e ko'ij.

Nt amjed hahawa ha'ichu kah. K ith hab kaithag mo sha'i mu'i hemajkam am neneok an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hab kaij: “Ab ach si has elith g Jiosh. Tho'ibiathag ch ab has elithadag ch gewkthag o ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh.

Tho wohokam ch s-ap'ekam g Jiosh lothaita nat pi s-ko'okam ab namkith ihtha si pi ap'ekam chehpa'awi mo padchuth g jewed heg hekaj e-tohntomthadag. Jiosh at s-ko'okam ab namkith nat pi ha koktha g piongaj.”
K am ep Hihnk ch hab kaij: “Ab ach si has elith g Jiosh. Mei at ihtha ge'e pi ap'ekam kihhim. T g kuhbs ab amjed chum hekith am wo wuhshanith.”
K eda an thahm kahchim ch ed thaha g Jiosh e-kownal thaikud an. T ab wui i tohtonwua hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged k ab si has elith ch hab kaij, “Pegih neh, ab ach si has elith g Jiosh.”

K ab hahawa hema neok miajed g Jiosh kownal thaikud ch hab kaij: “Ab g wo si has i elith g Jiosh ch ab s-wohog elith ahpim piongaj ch ahpim wehs hemajkam mam ha'i d s-has haha'ichu ch ha'i pi d has haha'ichu.”

Ni hahawa ep kah mu'i hemajkam. K g ha-ne'oki hab kaithag mo g s-gewk shuhthagi an med ch hab kaithag mat g tataniki ab si s-kaitham kop. Ha ani kah mo hab kaij: “Ab ach ihm g Jiosh no pi d si uhgk t-kownalig ch u'ukch g gewkthag am wehs hemajkam ha thahm.

Ab att wo si i s-hehgigk ch wo s-ap t-tahtkkath ch ab wo si has i el g gewkthaj. E at ai mat ab wo i ha hemapai g e-hemajkamga hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. T heg wo wa wepothagk mo g si ge'e hohnta. T g hemajkamgaj ab si e nahto wehhejed
hab sha masma mat g wo kuntam ab si s-tohama wo e enigadath. Ihtha lohba o wepogithas g s-ap'ekam ha'ichu hab ha-juni.”

K hab kaij g anghil ab ni-wui, “An g o'ohan ihtha: Ab at wo i ha hemapai g e-hemajkamga hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. Kut wo si s-hehgigk hab masma mamt wo si s-hehgigk am ha-gegosig ed g wo ha hohntam.” K hab ep kaij g anghil, “Ith o d si s-wohokam Jiosh ne'oki.”

Kunt am hahawa si i gei wecho k ab si has i el. K wabshaba hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Pi g hab masma ab si has ni-elith mani d Jiosh. Ab g si ihm g Jiosh. Thani wabsh piongaj hab masma mam ahpim mam ab s-wohochuth hegai wohokam mat g Jesus am i em-tashogi.” Neh, bo kaij g anghil. K ihtha wohokam d hegai mo ab amjed an u'ukch g e-amichuthadag g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam.
Nt hahawa ep nei g thahm kahchim. T i e kuhpi'o. K am hab chu'ig g s-toa kawyu. K an ab tha hegai mam hab a'aga Wohokam. Heg o d hegai mo am s-ap ha lothait ch s-ap hab wua g cheggiadag.
Wuhpuij o hab masma s-mahs mo ab mehmheihim. K mu'i gigiko an hab chuhchu'ig mo'oj an. An o hema o'ohadag g chehgig ab ab. K heg wa'i hejel s-mahch mo haschu wud.
K g lihwaj d wabsh i eh'ed. Kum hab a'aga Jiosh Ne'oki no pi g Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim neok ab t-wui.
T g mu'i anghil am i oi hab masma mo g shonthal k g s-tohta kakawyu ha chehchejch ch s-tohtam e e'enigadathch.

Is-pahyo o ab i wuhshanis chinij amjed hegai Jiosh Ne'oki. T ith heg hekaj wo ha gewito g jejewed k am hahawa s-gewkam wo i ha wanim g wainomi usagakaj k s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mo bagachuth g Jiosh. Ith at heg wo wa wepothagk mamt g uhdwis wo kehiwia.
Ab lihwaj ab ch an kahioj an o ith chehgig an o'ohadag ‘Si Ge'e Kownal am Wehs ha Thahm g Kokownal.’

Ni hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. Ith o am kehk tash ch ed. K eda g u'uwhig an nen'e hewel ch ed. K ith ab ha wui si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij, “Am g wo hihim k am wo i e hemapai mat g Jiosh am hab wo em-juni g si ge'e gegosig.

T wo em-gegos g pi ap hemajkam ha-chuhkugkaj. Kumt chum hems wo huh g ha-chuhkug g kokownal ch shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch s-has haha'ichu ch ep wo huh g ha-chuhkug g kakawyu ch hegam mo ha chehchejch ch hegam mo d nenehol.”

Ni hahawa ep neith hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wa heki hu in i wuhsh. Wehs g kokownal an jewed thahm at am i ha hemapai g e-shonthalig k am i wehmt g s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wo cheggia hegai mo g s-toa kawyu cheshaj. Kut ith g shonthaligaj i wehmt.

Kumt bei hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam ch heg ehp s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam. Tho ihtha mo wa ha iattogith g s-hasig ha'ichukaj hegam mo ab hab juhkch g s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig ch hegam mat ab i shul wui g wepogithaj. Kumt ha ui hegam gohk k wabsh thoakk am ha nehnich heg eda kahchki mo chum hekith meihim.
Hegai mo wa g s-toa kawyu cheshaj at ha koktha g ha-shonthalig heg hekaj is-pahyo mo wa kamshch ab e-chini ed. Kut g u'uwhig am huh g ha-chuhkug k si s-kokwoth.
Ni amjed hahawa hema ep neith g anghil. T ith ab i hud thahm kahchim amjed k an u'ukch g yahwi ith wehhejed s-juhk wag ch an u'ukch g chew e hukshchim wainomi.
K am thaha g Nehbig Hujud ch d ge Jiawul ch hab chehgig Satan. Tki g anghil an si wulshp

k am tha'ich heg eda s-juhk wag k ab si yahwidath k ab ep si bithsh. T hab pi ab hu ep wo i wuhshani k pi ep wo ha iattogi g hemajkam am hugkam mat wo e ai g hemako mihl a'ahithag. Ith at i thahm am hi wa ep wo sha'i e thagito pi sha'i tash.

Kuni hahawa ep neith g kokownal thathaikud ch hegam mo an thadha. Ihtham amtki ab ha mah g gewkthag mat d wo u'usagakamk. Am ani ep ha neith hegam mat e ko'ij no pi am ahgachug hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mo g Jesus am ha tashogith. Ihtham at pi ab hu sha'i has i el g s-ta Ehbithamakam ni'is g cheposigajkaj ab hu e chechpos e-koka an o e-nohnhoi an. Jiosh at ab ha mah g ap'ethag mat ab wo i wuwha muhkig amjed k am wo i ha wanimedath g hemajkam wehmaj g Christ hemako mihl a'ahith ab.

Hegam mat wehpeg ab wo i wuwha muhkig amjed at wo si s-hehgigk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ch pi am hu gahi ep wo wuwha g muhkig. Jiosh at hab wo ha juh mat d wo papalk ch d wo piongajk g alithag. Kut heg wehm am wo i ha wanim g hemajkam hemako mihl a'ahith ab. (5) T wabshaba pi koi ab hu uhpam wo i e chechegito hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh am hugkam mat wo huhug g hemako mihl a'ahithag.
Am i thahm g hemako mihl a'ahithag, mtki ab wo i wuhshath g ge Jiawul amjed mam am kuhpch.

Kutki am wo him k am ep wo ha iattogi g hemajkam an wehsko jewed thahm. Ihtham hemajkam at ha'i hab wo e a'agath Gog O'othham ch ha'i hab wo e a'agath Magog O'othham. Kut g Jiawul am wo i ha hemapai mat hab wo juh g cheggiadag. Kutki hab sha masma wo mu'ijk mo g o'od an shuhthagi bahsho
ch am wehskojed wo i e hemapath k an wo e keshwua ha wehgaj hegam mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch am kih Jerusalem ch ed. T oi wa g mehi ab wo i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k wo ha hugio.

Mt amjed g ge Jiawul am tha'ich heg eda kahchki mo chum hekith meihim. Tho ihtha mei kahchki mamt am eda heki hu ha nehnich g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam. Ihtham atki ab wo nako g s-ko'ok tash oitham ch chuhug oitham am i amjed ch chum hekith.
Ni hahawa ep neith mo g si ge'e s-toa kownal thaikud am kehk. K ab thaha g Jiosh. T g jewed ch thahm kahchim heb hu wohp ab amjed k pi hekith ep sha'i e neith.

Kuni ha neith hegam mo d ko'i ch d nahnko i mahs hemajkam. Ihtham o am gegok wui g kownal thaikud. Kut i e kuhkpi'o hegam o'ohana mo an o'ohadag g pi ap ha-chu'ichig. T am ep i e kuhpi'o hegai o'ohana mo am eda o'ohadag g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig. T g Jiosh ha lothai g ko'i.
Wehsijj at i wuwha ab ge shuhthagi t amjed ch ab hiha'ini t amjed an wehsko jewed thahm. T g Jiosh ha lothai heg hekaj mo haschu i pi ap has junihim.

Pi o an hu o'ohanas g ha-chechgig heg eda o'ohana mo an o'ohanas g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig. Kumt hekaj am ha shul heg eda kahchki mo meihim. Ith at hab wo masmak mo g gokkokam muhkig. T g Jiosh am wo hugio g muhkig k am ep wo hugio amai mo am ha'ichug g ko'i.
Ni hahawa ep neith g si wechij thahm kahchim ch si wechij jewed. Hegai wehpeg thahm kahchim ch wehpeg jewed at wa heb hu hihi. T g ge shuhthagi am wabsh i huhug.

K ab i hudunihim g si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim thahm kahchim t amjed. Ith atki g Jiosh nahto. K hab e a'aga Wechij Jerusalem ch si e nahtokch am wehhejed g Jiosh alithag hab sha masma mat g wo kuntam wo si e nahtokch mat wo nam g wo e-kunta.

Ab o thaha g Jiosh e-kownal thaikud ab. Kuni kah mo hab kaij, “Ithani at g ni-kihthag ia i hud ha wui g hemajkam. Am ant ha wehm wo kihkath. Kut d wo ni-hemajkamgak. Am ant wo ha wehmajk ch d wo ha-Jioshgak
ch ab wo i thagi'o g ha-oh'og ab ha-wuhpui ab. Pi at hedai haha wo muh o pi ap wo e tahtkkath o wo shoakath o wo tahtkkath g s-ko'ok. Im at hu hab i e juh g hekiukam.”

Neh, bo kaij g Jiosh ch amjed hab ep kaij, “Ithani ant am hahawa si wechij nahto wehs ha'ichu,” ch hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “An g o'ohan ihtha wohokam mani m-ahgith. Wehs hemajkam at ab wo chum s-wohoch,”

K hab ep kaij, “E at nahto wehs ha'ichu. Ahni ani d alpha ch d omega. Ith o hab d ahga mani si wehpeg ia ha'ichug ch si ha oithch ia wabsh wo kia ha'ichugk. Nt wo ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam matp hedai wo tatchua hab masma mamt wo ha wasibi g tonkkoi g shuhthagi.
Ab ant ni-wui wo i ha gawulkai mat d wo ni-a'aligak hegam mat hedai i gewito g pi ap'ekam.

T wabshaba wo e nehnich mei kahchki ch ed g s-chu ehbithkam ch pi wohochuththam ch hegam mo loligog ch chum e u'uwichuth o chum e chechojchuth ch ha mu'adkam ch totonto ch s-chu hihoinkam ch s-chu i'attomkam ch hegam mo wabsh g o'othham nahtoi ha jijoshchuth. Hegai mei kahchki o d gokkokam muhkig.”
Hema hegam wewa'ak anghil mat am u'apa g si oithchkam sho'igthag at am jiwia ni-wui k hab kaij. “Ab g i hihm. Nt am wo m-chehgi hegam mo d hohnigaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.”

T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab si i ni-wehmt. T g anghil am i ni-be k am ni-u'apa si uhgk tho'ag thahm k ab i ni-chehgi hegai hekia s-ap'ekam kihhim mo d Wechij Jerusalem. Ith o ab hudunihim thahm kahchim t amjed ch d Jiosh nahtoi
ch si tonod g Jiosh tonligkaj hab masma mo hegai si s-kehg gai tondam hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper.

An kihhim wehgaj o hab chu'ig g uhgk kolhai. K ith eda hab chu'ig g gamai gohk kihkijeg. K g gamai gohk anghil ab ha nuhkuth g kihkijeg. An o kihkijeg t an hab chu'ig g ha-chechgig hegam gamai gohk thakam Tutuligo hemajkam.
Waik kihkijeg o hab chu'ig an si'alig tahgio ch waik an juhpin tahgio ch waik an wakolim tahgio ch waik an hudunig tahgio.
K ihtha kihhim kolhaidag o an hab junis gamai gohk hohothai thahm. K ihtham ha ab an o'ohadag g ha-chechgig hegam gamai gohk chuhchaij hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
Hegai anghil mo ab ni-wui neok o g ohla kuintakud uhs an u'ukch mat hekaj wo kuint g kihhim ch g kolhaidaj ch g kihkijeg.
K ihtha kihhim si s-ap s-chuhchpul ch ha'as uhgk ch ha'as chewaj mo he'es i s-tadani. T g anghil am kuint. K d mihl hetasp siant (1500) mihya.
T g anghil am ep kuint g kolhaidag. K d gohk siant gamai chuhthp (216) tad uhgk.
K hegai kolhai heg hekaj hab junis hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper. K g kihhim d wabsh gai tondam ohla.

K g shondaj ith hekaj hab junis nahnko mahs si s-kehg hohothai. Wehpeg shondaj o d hegai hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper. K g gokkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga sapphire. K g waikkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga agate. K g gi'ikkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga emerald.

K g hetaspokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga onyx. K g chuhthpokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga carnelian. K g wewa'akkokam s-oam ch d hegai mo hab e a'aga quartz. K g gigi'ikkokam d hegai mo ab e a'aga beryl. K g humuktokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga topaz. K g wehst-mahmhokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga chalcedony. K g gamai hemako d hegai mo hab e a'aga turquoise. K g gamai gokkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga amethyst.

K g gamai gohk kihkijeg d hegai hothai mo hab e a'aga pearl. Wehsijj hegam kihkijeg o hab junis ab hehemako pearl amjed. K g kahya am kihhim ch ed d wabsh ohla ch am wabsh gai tonod hab masma mo g mi-lihtha.
Pi ani sha'i hema neith g cheopi. Wehs g kihhim o d wabsh ge cheopi no pi an eda kihthag g Jiosh ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.
Pi o an hu ha'ichug g tash ch mashath. Jiosh o an wehsko tonlithch g kihhim heg wehm mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj.
Hemajkam am jewed thahm at s-ap am wo hihimath ith hekaj tonlig. T g kokownal am wo u'apa g e-kakaisthag.
T g kihkijeg chum hekith ab wabsh wo kuhkpi'okask. Pi at hekith wo s-chuchkagath. T heg hekaj pi ab hu wo i e kuhkp g kihkijeg.
Si s-has haha'ichu am wehs jejewed ch ed at am wo u'apa g e-kakaisthag.

T wabshaba pi am hu wo hiwgithask g s-uam ha'ichu. T pi ab hu wo i wahp g s-chu i'attomkam ch hegam mo hab junihim g s-ta edam ha'ichu. Hegam at am wo wa'i wahpkath heg eda kihhim mo g ha-chechgig an o'ohadag heg eda mo g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig an o'ohadag. Ith o d o'ohanaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch.

T am hahawa ni-chehgi g akimel hegai anghil. K ith ab tha'iwuni heg amjed kownal thaikud mo g Jiosh an thaha heg wehm mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. K hab d ahga ihtha mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. Shuhthagi o si tohonnod hab masma mo g tondam hothai
ch an si eda med g kahya. K g thoakag uhs ge a'aijed shohshon ch an a'ai kehk ihtha akimel ch an babhe hemho wehs mashath ab. K g hahhagaj d ha-kulaniga g nahnko mahs hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm.
K pi an hu ha'ichug hegai mo pi hohho'ithachuth g Jiosh. Am at wo ha'ichugk g Jiosh kownal thaikud. Kut an wo thakath hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch. T g piongaj ab wo si has elithath
ch wo neithath g wuhioshaj. T g chehgigaj an wo o'ohadagk ha-koka ab.
Pi at thahm ep wo s-chuhugamk nat pi g tonlig a'ai wo wuhshanith ab amjed g Jiosh. Kut pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g tash. T pi wo e tatchuath g lalampa. T g Jiosh hemajkamga am d wo kokownalk chum hekith.

K hab hahawa ep kaij g anghil ab ni-wui, “Ihtham ha'ichu ahga o woho. Kut wehsijj ab wo chum s-wohoch. Jiosh o wa ab ha mahkch g ha'ichu i e-tashogiththam g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am wo ha'ichu ha chehgi ch am ep ni-chehani mant am wo em-chehgi hegai mat haschu has wo e juh s-hohtam.” Neh, bo kaij g anghil.
K g Jesus hab kaij, “Ab g wo i ni-kaiham. S-hohtam ant wo jiwia. Jiosh at wo wa s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wo s-wohog el wehs ihtha gm hu ba'ich ha'ichu ahga mo in o'ohanas.” Neh, bo kaij.
Kuni ahni John wehs kah ch wehs neith ihtha mani in o'ohan ith eda o'ohana. Am o wa kehk hegai anghil mo ab ni-wui neok. Nt ab i gei wecho k ab chum si has elith am i neithok k kaiok ihtha wehs.

K wabshaba hab kaij ab ni-wui, “Pi g am hab e juhni. Thani wabsh em-wehm pion ahpim Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wehs hegam mo ab s-wohog elith mo haschu an o'ohadag ith eda o'ohana. Ab g has i elith g Jiosh.”
K hab ep kaij ab ni-wui, “E o aihim mat wehs am hab wo e juh ihtha map neith ch kah ch an o'ohan. Pi g am ehsto.

“Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas am gawul wo e juh mat hekith wo e ai ihtha. Hegam mo d p ap'ekam at d wabsh wo pi ap'ekamk. T hegam mo d s-ap'ekam am hab wabsh wo i chu'igkath ch am hab wo wa junihith g s-ap'ekam.”
K g Jesus hab kaij, “Ab g wo ni-kaiham. S-hohtam ant wo jiwia k wo u'ath g ni-mahkigdag mant ab wo i ha mahkhi ha'as mat hedai he'es ha'ichu hab i juh.
Ahni ani d alpha ch d omega. Ith o hab d ahga ‘si wehpegkam ch si oithchkam’ ch hab d ep ahga ‘i shonkam ch i kuhgkam.’ ”

Neh, no hig pi woho mat wo si s-ap e tahtkk ch pi wo si e el hegai mat g wehschugaj s-kehg wo wakonask, Pegih, mt hab wa masma wo si s-ap e tahtkk matp gm hu hab wo i e juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig. Jiosh at ab wo em-mah g ap'ethag mamt ab wo ko'ath g bahithaj hegai thoakag uhs ch ab wo i wahp kolhai kihjeg t ab heg eda Wechij Jerusalem. Kumt wo si s-hehgigk.

K wabshaba am jeg ed hab chu'ig hegam mo s-uam ha'ichu hab wua ch hegam mo hab wua g hihoina ch s-totontomkam ch ha mu'akam ch hegam mo jijoshchuth g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-nahtoi ch hegam mo s-hohho'ith g ha'ichu iattogi ch ha'ichu ha iattogith.

K hab kaij g Jesus, “Ahni ant am cheha g ni-anghiliga mat am wo em-ahgi ihtha wehs ahpim mam am kawod e nanmek ch ab has ni-elith. Ahni ani d Davidbad amjedkam ch wepo masma mo g si s-mahs si'alig hu'u.”

Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab i ha waith g hemajkam am gai ha wuhshanim hegam mo ab si has elith g Jesus Christ, Ihtham o hab kaij, “Ab g wo beh'i g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.” Kut wehsijj hegam mat ab wo kah ihtha at hab wa'ap wo chei, “Ab g wo beh'i g pi ha huhugetham thoakag.” Pegih, ab g wo beh'i wehsijj ahpim mam hedai i tatchua. Bo wa masma am em-wehhejed mo g shonkam shuhthagi am ha wehhejed g tonkkoi.

S-e g wo nen'oithk ahpim mamt ab wo i kah mamt pi am hu gawul wo juh ihtha gm hu ba'ich ha'ichu ahga mo in hab chu'ig ith eda o'ohana. Mu'i o ha'ichu in o'ohadag g sho'igthag. Kut ith ab wo i wehnath g Jiosh g s-ko'ok em-namkithadag mamtp ab ha'ichu wo i wehnath hegai mo in o'ohadag.

K in o'ohadag mach ap'ethag matt am wo i wahp Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kihhim ed k wo huh g bahithag hegai uhs mo ab t-chehgithch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag. T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g em-ap'ethag mamtp ahpim ha'ichu gm hu hab wo i juh ith amjed o'ohana.
Hegai mo am s-mahch ch ahg wehs ihtha o hab kaij, “Woho o wa. S-hohtam ant ab wo i hih.” Pegih oi g. Ab g i hihm, t-kownalig Jesus.
T wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el g t-kownalig Jesus k am wo em-wehmajk.
